steps: In a small bowl, combine butter, raspberries, vanilla extract, peaches, sugar, pure vanilla extract, peaches, vanilla ice cream, raspberries and raspberries. Pour mixture into a blender and process for 1 minute or until smooth. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes.
ingredients: unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, sugar, pure vanilla extract, peaches, vanilla ice cream, raspberries
name: vanilla roasted peaches with raspberries

steps: Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, stir cookie mix, butter, egg, flour and almond extract until soft dough forms. Fit cookie press with desired template. Fill cookie press with cookie dough. Press cookies onto ungreased cookie sheets. Decorate as desired using colored sugars and sprinkles. Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute. Remove from cookie sheet to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg yolk, lemon flavoring, lemon rind, flour, salt
name: lemon cheese spritz cookies for christmas

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Place a large, heavy skillet or roasting pan in the oven to heat. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Put on high heat to boil. Once boiling, lower heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain the potatoes well, and place on paper towels. Put the flour on a plate. When the potatoes are dry, roll them in the flour to coat. Remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the oil and potatoes. Roast, shaking the pan occasionally until the potatoes are golden brown all over, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the garlic, sage and butter. Return to the oven for one minute. Season generously with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: small potatoes, butter, olive oil, garlic, fresh parsley, dried rosemary, dried basil, salt and pepper
name: herbed roast potatoes

steps: Drain sherbet juice and reserve. Combine sherbet juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: water, orange jell-o, cool whip lite, orange sherbet
name: orange sherbet jello

steps: Mix eggs, cheese, milk, ziploc bags, ham, diced tomatoes, bacon, green pepper, diced onion. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve.
ingredients: eggs, cheese, butter, milk, ziploc bags, ham, diced tomatoes, bacon, green pepper, diced onion
name: camper s omelets

steps: Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with frozen hash browns. Cover hash browns with sausage. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir together the remaining ingredients. Pour this mixture over everything. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, cooked ham, onion, eggs, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, fresh chives
name: country breakfast scramble

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, add the apple wedges. Bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and gently boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally until the apple wedges softened, approximately 15 minutes. Transfer sauce to a food processor and puree. Add the cinnamon stick. Let stand several hours before serving.
ingredients: cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, whole allspice, honey, cranberry-apple juice, cheesecloth, ice
name: spiced cranberry apple juice

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, brown sugar, soy sauce, white vinegar, toasted sliced almonds
name: green beans with garlic butter and almonds

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook 5 minutes, or until no longer pink, turning occasionally. Stir in reserved marinade and tomatoes with juice. Heat to boiling, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 15 minutes, or until a thermometer in thickest portion registers 160 degrees and juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, edam cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, thyme leaves, prosciutto
name: edam and tomato chicken parcels

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour them into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender.
ingredients: fresh okra, buttermilk, self-rising cornmeal, self-rising flour, salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, bacon drippings
name: fried okra

steps: In a large skillet, brown pork in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops.
ingredients: shallots, fresh ground black pepper, boneless pork loin, egg, muscovado sugar, fish sauce
name: thit kho to pork in clay pot

steps: In a large bowl, combine water, sugar, orange juice concentrate, lemon juice, half-and-half cream. Mix well. Pour mixture evenly into 4 ice cube trays. Set trays on a cookie sheet and set in freezer. Freeze solid. When ready to serve, put sherbet cubes in fancy dessert glasses. Let set a few minutes to thaw slightly.
ingredients: water, sugar, frozen orange juice concentrate, lemon juice, half-and-half cream
name: delicious orange sherbet no ice cream machine

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: water, brown lentils, olive oil, onions, garlic, carrot, celery, tomatoes, oregano, salt & pepper
name: lentil bolognese for pasta

steps: Mix together dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, salt, garlic powder, brown sugar, chicken broth, olive oil, soy sauce, salmonpreparation:Combine all ingredients except the salmon or chicken in a container that can be sealed. Mix together dill weed, lemon-pepper seasoning, salt, garlic powder, brown sugar, chicken broth, olive oil, soy sauce, salmonpreparation:Preheat broiler. Rinse salmon and pat dry. Arrange salmon, skin side down, in a foil-lined jelly-roll pan and rub thoroughly with soy sauce. Season salmon with salt and pepper and broil about 4 inches from heat 12 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer salmon to a platter and garnish with herbs. Serve salmon warm or at room temperature with mustard dill sauce.
ingredients: butter, flour, fish stock, light cream, salt, dill, lemon, juice of
name: ukrainian dill sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, sugar, nuts, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground nutmeg, salt, eggs, banana, unsweetened applesauce, honey
name: honey banana muffins

steps: In small bowl, combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: olive oil, white vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, avocados, grape tomatoes, red onion, fresh thyme
name: grape tomato and avocado salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the powdered sugar, butter, egg, vanilla, almond extract, flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar, baking soda, cream of tartar
ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, egg, vanilla, almond extract, flour, baking soda, cream of tartar
name: grandma s sugar cookies

steps: Heat oil in a 10 inch heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot. Pan fry the garlic in batches, turning occasionally, until golden on all sides, about 3 minutes per batch. Transfer with slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. Chop over some fresh parsley to serve.
ingredients: garlic, olive oil, cauliflower, parmesan cheese, salt and black pepper, fresh parsley
name: roasted parmesan garlic cauliflower

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, olive oil, italian salad dressing mix, low-fat parmesan cheese
name: weight watcher green bean casserole

steps: In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoon bacon fat and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice.
ingredients: green beans, onions, olive oil, parmesan cheese, garlic clove, bacon
name: baked garlic bacon green beans

steps: In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. Pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly.
ingredients: bratwursts, white onion, apple, garlic, coarse black pepper
name: bratwurst bake

steps: Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until cheese is set.
ingredients: hot dog, bacon, sweet relish, stuffed green olives, saltine crackers, mayonnaise, pepper
name: tubesteak pate

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, garlic clove, butter, sesame seeds
name: sesame garlic beans

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired.
ingredients: baking potatoes, onions, garlic powder, butter, salt and pepper, aluminum foil, sour cream, bacon bits
name: bbq potato with onion garlic

steps: Heat oil in a medium large soup pot. Add onions and cook over medium-low heat until completely translucent. Add tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Add chicken stock. Bring to a simmer and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Add pesto. Blend to desired consistency with hand blender, food processor or blender. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, canned tomatoes, garlic, dried basil, dried oregano, olive oil, tapenade, cream, salt and pepper, fresh basil
name: fantabulous tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely.
ingredients: flour, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, butter, chocolate chips, nuts, caramel ice cream topping
name: gina s oatmeal caramelita s

steps: Stir mayonnaise with hardboiled egg, garlic clove, paprika, parsley until evenly combined. Drain tuna and break apart using a fork. Add to mayonnaise mixture and stir until evenly combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve as a sandwich filling or as part of a salad plate. Can be made up to 24 hours ahead.
ingredients: tuna, mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes, ripe olives, hardboiled egg, garlic clove, paprika, parsley
name: thon en salade swiss tuna salad plate

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack.
ingredients: sugar, bananas, vegetable oil, eggs, flour, breadcrumbs, baking powder
name: banana upside cake bolo de banana

steps: Heat broth and water to boiling. Add chicken broth, chicken, diced tomatoes, red beans and rice mix, cheese. Simmer on medium for about 15-20 minutes or until pasta is the way you like it.
ingredients: chicken broth, chicken, diced tomatoes, red beans and rice mix, cheese
name: easy spicy chicken rice soup

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs, bacon, blue cheese, turkey breast, avocado, tomatoes, lettuce, and bacon. Add bacon, blue cheese, turkey breast, avocado, tomatoes, lettuce, and bacon. Add
ingredients: whole wheat bread, ranch dressing, eggs, bacon, blue cheese, turkey breast, avocado, tomatoes, lettuce
name: california cobb club sandwiches

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: frying chickens, salt water, flour, oil
name: knott s berry farm fried chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine the eggs and milk. Add the sugar, black pepper, cubed bread, both cans of corn amd mix well. Pour into large baking dish that has been coated with non-stick cooking spray. Combine the softened butter and cereal and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle over top of corn mixture and bake, uncovered, until light golden brown.
ingredients: frozen corn, bacon, green bell pepper, onion, sea salt, black pepper
name: cook s fried corn

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: sweet onions, butter, chicken broth, cream cheese, mayonnaise, pistachios
name: golden onion dip

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: carrot, zucchini, lemon juice, dried basil, onion powder, butter, pepper, salt
name: herbed carrots and zucchini

steps: Heat butter, sugar and water in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the candy. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: sugar, dark corn syrup, butter, half-and-half, blanched almond
name: swedish hard candy

steps: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, mozzarella cheese, bel paese cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh chives, ground pepper, vegetable oil
name: three cheese frittata

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Add salt and pepper and mix well. Serve with chips, pita or vegetables.
ingredients: edamame, red onion, fresh parsley leaves, garlic clove, fresh lemon juice, miso, kosher salt, thai sweet chili sauce, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: edamame dip alton brown

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl combine all ingredients and set to the side. Heat the oil in a heavy bottom oven proof skillet until the oil shimmers. Pat the chops dry and add them to the hot pan. Cook for two minutes on the first side, flip the chop and cook for an additional minute. Transfer the chops to a plate. Pour the excess oil out of the pan. Add the sauce mixture, scrape up the browned bits on the bottom of the pan. Simmer the sauce over medium heat, stirring frequently until sauce is thick and glossy, about 4- 5 minutes. Take the pan off the heat and add the pork chops to the pan, turning to coat in the sauce. Place the skillet in the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Spoon the sauce on top of the pork chops and serve.
ingredients: pineapple rings, brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic powder, pork chops, ground black pepper
name: pineapple grilled pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Place fish fillets in a greased 9x13 dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine lime juice, sour cream and herbs, stir well. Pour over fish. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till flakes easy with fork.
ingredients: sole fillets, flour, dried herbs, salt, pepper, butter, fresh lemon juice
name: lemon herb fish fillets

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, bacon, onion, green bell pepper, cheddar cheese, egg, milk, salt, pepper
name: morning casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray muffin pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pumpkin pie spice. In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg and applesauce. Stir in squash. Fold the squash mixture into the flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into the greased muffin pan, filling cups about full. Bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: cocoa powder, salt, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, sugar, butternut squash, canola oil, slivered almonds
name: cocoa roasted butternut squash

steps: Melt cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, miracle whip, chopped tomato, cucumber, black olives, feta, pita bread
name: mediterranean layered dip

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: flour, paprika, manchego cheese, eggs, breadcrumbs, oregano, oil
name: queso frito fried cheese

steps: In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately.
ingredients: corn, french haricots vert, cider vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil, red onion, fresh parsley
name: fresh corn and green bean salad

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, celery rib, onion, butter, chicken broth, chicken bouillon, fresh parsley, cream-style corn, eggs, salt and pepper
name: chinese chicken and corn soup

steps: Cut the paula deen in half and place it on a baking sheet. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the paula deen is golden brown. Remove from the oven and let cool for about 15 minutes
ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, chicken base, sugar, fresh okra, fresh ground black pepper
name: the lady and sons okra and tomatoes paula deen

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees farenheit. Place chicken in ungreased 13 x 9 x 2 inch oblong pan. Mix the remaining ingredients together. Pour over chicken. Cook uncovered, spooning oil mixture over chicken occasionally, for 30 minutes. Turn the chicken and cook until thickest pieces are done, about another 30 minutes. Garnish with lemon slices.
ingredients: potatoes, onions, frying chicken, lemon, butter, oregano, salt and black pepper
name: oregano lemon chicken

steps: Place the couscous in a bowl and pour over 300ml boiling water. Leave for 30 minutes until the water has been completely absorbed, allow to cool. Add the olive oil, lemon juice, cilantro and seasoning to taste. Add chili pepper, tomatoes and onions and stir gently to combine ingredients. Allow to chill for at least an hour. It allows the flavours to mingle. Keeps well in the fridge for 2 or 3 days.
ingredients: chicken broth, couscous, dried tart cherries, carrots, cucumbers, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, slivered almonds
name: dried cherry couscous salad

steps: Place salmon fillets, in a single layer, in a greased baking pan. Sprinkle each fillet with salt and pepper. In cup combine dijon, butter and honey. Brush mixture on top of each fillet. Bake in preheated 450 degree oven, for 10minutes. Garnish with lemon slices.
ingredients: dijon mustard, butter, honey, fresh breadcrumb, fresh parsley, pecans, fish fillets, salt and pepper
name: villa capri s fish fillets with pecan crunch coating

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients in a medium casserole dish. Put in oven for 10 minutes. Remove and stir ingredients until well mixed. Place back in oven and bake for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: frozen corn, butter, cream cheese, salt, pepper, parsley
name: cream cheese corn

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees f. Arrange asparagus and mushrooms on aluminum foil-lined 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan. Sprinkle garlic, salt and pepper on top. Drizzle melted butter over vegetables. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, white button mushrooms, butter-flavored cooking spray, lemon juice
name: asparagus with mushrooms fat free and delicious

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Combine whole wheat flour, oats, sugar and baking soda. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Set aside 1 cup of crumb mixture. Press remainder on bottom of greased 13 x 9 pan. Spread half of the marshmallows on top and sprinkle with apples. Top with reserved crumb mixture. Bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. Sprinkle remaining marshmallows on top and place under broiler just until marshmallows are lightly golden, 1 to 2 minutes. Cool. Place caramels and water in small microwaveable bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stir until smooth. Drizzle on top, chill to set caramel. Bake at 375
ingredients: apples, caramels, milk, white chocolate chips, cinnamon sugar, wooden sticks
name: apple pie caramel apples

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, salt and pepper. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice.
ingredients: butter, celery, onion, chicken broth, reames frozen noodles, cooked turkey, fresh parsley, flour, cold water
name: day after thanksgiving noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cover baking sheet with foil and spray with cooking spray. Put torn bread in large bowl. In skillet, saute onion and celery in the butter. Once soft, add parsley, pepper, salt and poultry seasonings and mix well. Add cooked mixture to bread and again mix well. Pour chicken broth over bread and again mix well.
ingredients: bread stuffing mix, celery, onions, mushroom, butter, chicken broth
name: mrs cubbison s bread stuffing

steps: In a double boiler, melt caramels, butter, and milk. Keep water in the bottom of pot to a minimum boil. Dip one marshmallow into melted mix using a fork. Remove, and roll in marshmallow toffee balls. Place on tray covered with wax paper. Repeat until bag of marshmallows is finished. Freeze marshmallow balls if desired. Enjoy.
ingredients: macintosh toffee bars, condensed milk, margarine, marshmallows, rice krispies
name: marshmallow toffee balls

steps: Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a sauce pan. Bring to a boil and boil for only 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until spreading consistency. Cooking time does not include time to cool.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla
name: nana s chocolate frosting

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine flour, salt, baking powder, onion, chile, egg, milk, oil. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, combine flour, salt, baking powder, onion, chile, egg, milk, oil. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, combine flour, salt, baking powder, onion,
ingredients: flour, salt, baking powder, onion, chile, egg, milk, oil
name: onion bhajia

steps: In a large bowl, combine the goat cheese, cajun seasoning, hard goat cheese, green onion, romaine lettuce, paprika, salt and pepper in a small jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake to combine. Dressing can be made several days in advance and refrigerated, shake well before using. Combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Chill until serving time. To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Add additional freshly ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: baby shrimp, mayonnaise, soft fresh goat cheese, cajun seasoning, hard goat cheese, green onion, romaine lettuce, paprika
name: shrimp goat cheese salad in romaine

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Place broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, frozen chopped broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, egg, pepper, salt, garlic powder
name: spinach broccoli bake

steps: Place chocolate, milk and sugar in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Whisk slowly until the chocolate melts and sugar dissolves. When it is smooth and steamy, put into mugs and top with a little cinnamon. Place chocolate, milk and sugar in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Whisk slowly until the chocolate melts and sugar diss
ingredients: low-fat milk, cocoa powder, salt, splenda sugar substitute
name: rich hot chocolate for one

steps: Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cucumber. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle.
ingredients: cucumber, onion, dried dill weed, sugar, vinegar, water, salt
name: just cucumber slices

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Heat butter over medium-high heat. Add onions, and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Add flour, salt, and pepper to skillet. Stir until smooth. Gradually stir in milk until blended. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 min or until thickened. Reduce heat to med. Return onions to the pan. Heat through.
ingredients: butter, red onions, jalapeno, brown sugar, kahlua, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, heavy cream
name: luscious creamy glazed onions

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes. Top each breast with a slice of swiss cheese and bake 5 more minutes just until cheese is melted.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, butter, cheddar cheese, avocado
name: avocado cheddar grilled cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Fry onion, garlic, mushrooms and leek in a pan in the olive oil until softened. Rinse and drain mixed beans and kidney beans and add to pan. Add tomatoes and heat through. Combine the parmesan and the grated parsnip in a bowl and put aside. Place the bean mixture in an oven proof casserole dish. Cover with the parmesan and parsnip mixture and sprinkle over some olive oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy.
ingredients: olive oil, brown onion, garlic cloves, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, stock, macaroni, frozen mixed vegetables, borlotti beans, parsley
name: pantry minestrone

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an 8 inch square baking pan. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, sugar, and vanilla. In a another bowl, whisk together flours, cocoa, baking powder and soda. Make a well in the center and add wet ingredients. Mix until just combined. Gently fold in walnuts and blueberries. Spread mixture into prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes, until center is firm and not sticky. Let cool completely before slicing. Makes 16 brownies.
ingredients: mint leaves, blueberries, diet lemon-lime soda, mint
name: wild blueberry beginner

steps: Heat oven to 375 drgrees. Drop a piece of butter in the bottom of each of 10 compartments of a muffin tin. Arrange the banana slices on top. Sprinkle the pecans and brown sugar over the bananas. Top each compartment with a biscuit. Bake until golden, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven. Place a baking sheet on top of the buns in the muffin tin while they are atill hot. Carefully flip the tin over, tapping the bottom to release the buns. Transfer to a platter, serve warm.
ingredients: butter, light corn syrup, brown sugar, pecans, frozen yeast dinner roll dough
name: bite size sticky buns

steps: Grate zucchini. Chop onion, add to zucchini. Add beaten eggs, bisquick, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Mix well. Fry as pancakes on hot greased griddle or skillet. Serve as a side dish.
ingredients: zucchini, salt, egg, bisquick, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper, canola oil
name: barb s zucchini patties

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In small bowl combine mustard, brown sugar and curry powder until well blended. Spread cornflake crumbs on a sheet of waxed paper. Spread some of the mustard on each thigh, coating both sides, and coat completely with crumbs. Place on a shallow baking pan and bake on center rack for 35-40 minutes, or until cooked through.
ingredients: chicken thighs, bananas, brown sugar, smoked paprika, cinnamon, sour cream, walnuts, basmati rice, green beans
name: flying jacob oven baked chicken thighs

steps: Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lean bacon, mustard, pineapple juice, brown sugar
name: chicken yeffa

steps: Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles.
ingredients: pasta, boneless skinless chicken breasts, turkey bacon, olive oil, parmesan cheese, frozen chopped spinach, chicken broth, dry ranch dressing mix, grape tomatoes, garlic
name: chicken bacon ranch noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 2 cookie sheets. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and nutmeg. Set aside. Beat the butter and brown sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer at high speed until well blended. Beat in the eggs and apple juice. Gradually add the flour to the butter mixture, beating at low speed until well blended. Stir in the apple and pecans. Drop the dough by teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: light brown sugar, shortening, egg, flour, salt, nutmeg, apple
name: apple jack cookies

steps: Place broccoli and broth in medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, cover, and heat in microwave for 4 minutes on high. Remove broccoli from microwave, add bell peppers, and saut in butter and olive oil in a skillet over medium heat for approximately 2 minutes. Sprinkle on lemon juice and white pepper. Mix thoroughly, and saut for 1 more minute remove from heat.
ingredients: chicken broth, broccoli floret, carrot, minute rice, lemon juice, pepper
name: quick lemon broccoli rice

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: burrito-size flour tortillas, olive oil, cheddar cheese, mashed potatoes, onions, black pepper, hot salsa, canned jalapeno slices
name: potato cheddar quesadilla

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. In a large bowl combine the pumpkin puree, condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, ginger and nutmeg. Mix well and turn into the crust. Bake 15 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 350f and bake another 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted 1-inch from the edge comes out clean. Cool before cutting. Garnish with whipped cream. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: light sour cream, eggs, pumpkin, brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground cloves, salt, sugar, unbaked pie shell
name: sour cream punky pie pumpkin

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add onions, cover, and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally for about 30 minutes. Add the stock and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Add cream and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer to thicken slightly. Season generously with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls, top with stilton toast, and run under the broiler until the cheese is melted and brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: onions, ale, beef stock, potatoes, butter, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: brown onion ale and cheddar cheese soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease 13-by-9-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Unroll pizza dough and press evenly over bottom and about 1 inch up sides of prepared pan. Brush dough lightly with olive oil. Sprinkle with garlic and basil. Cover with drained tomatoes, artichoke hearts, and mushrooms. Sprinkle with feta cheese and sliced bell pepper. Bake for about 20 minutes until crust is golden brown.
ingredients: marinated artichokes, tomatoes, onion, mushroom, mozzarella cheese, rolls
name: castroville special

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Finely crush cornflakes. Mix together cornflakes, flour, seasoning salt, pepper and poultry seasoning. Beat eggs with water. Dip chicken strips in egg mixture and then roll in cornflake mixture. Press mixture firmly onto chicken to coat well. Lay chicken strips on baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 30 minutes or until chicken is tender and cooked throughly. Baking time varies depending on size of strips. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce. These can also be fried in oil for 6-8 minutes but i prefer baking to keep them healthier.
ingredients: corn flake crumbs, salt, chicken pieces, pepper, parmesan cheese, egg whites, skim milk
name: cornflake crumb parmesan chicken

steps: In a large bowl, combine the macaroni, macaroni, cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mozzarella, jack cheese, mo
ingredients: whole wheat macaroni, milk, pre-shredded mozzarella cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, diced tomatoes with basil oregano and garlic, pepper
name: pepper jack pasta with tomatoes

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes to blend flavors. Remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot with cinnamon sticks and sliced apples if desired.
ingredients: cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, whole allspice, apple cider, brown sugar, orange
name: warm slow cooker or crock pot cider

steps: Place chicken in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Pour over chicken. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry onion soup mix, heinz chili sauce, grape jelly
name: the easiest crock pot chicken

steps: In a large bowl combine noodles, butter, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, salt, vegetable oil, waterpreparation:In a large bowl combine noodles, broccoli florets, cream of chicken and broccoli soup, sour cream, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and noodle mixture. Over medium heat, heat through, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: noodles, butter, parmesan cheese, egg, salt
name: 5 minute comfort food

steps: Mix all ingredients except for grape tomatoes. Blend well to incorporate flavors. Finally mix in grape tomatoes. Chill till serving. We serve with flour tortillas cut into triangles and deep fried till lightly browned.
ingredients: raw shrimp, grape tomatoes, garlic cloves, green onion, basil, oregano, salt, olive oil, butter, red chili peppers
name: impress them shrimp with grape tomatoes

steps: Preheat the oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: whole milk, bananas, egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, salt, heavy cream
name: banana gelato

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, white sugar, egg, dates, butter, nuts, boiling water, salt, vanilla
name: mrs allen s date loaf

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, chocolate chips, cocoa, and walnuts in a large mixing bowl. In a small mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gently, fold the egg whites into the lumpy batter. Pour the batter onto the iron and bake until done. For an even more sinful treat, top with whipped cream, fresh strawberries or raspberries, chocolate sauce and chopped nuts.
ingredients: flour, cocoa, baking powder, sugar, weetabix, butter, milk
name: chocolate weetabix fudge

steps: Place the carrots in a large bowl and stir in the orange pieces. Add the mandarin orange pieces, salt and lemon juice. Pour over the carrots. Cook and stir until the mixture thickens.
ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, orange juice concentrate, mandarin orange pieces, salt
name: orange carrots

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, sazon goya, dried oregano, black beans, chicken broth, cilantro, fresh tomato
name: south beach diet black bean soup phase i friendly

steps: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: roast, pepperoncini peppers, garlic, oregano, basil, italian spices
name: italian beef in the crock pot

steps: In a large nonstick skillet or saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Add the broccoli, tomatoes and orzo. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the shrimp, salt and pepper. Stir in basil and butter. Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes or until shrimp turn pink and orzo is tender.
ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, saffron thread, orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, fresh flat-leaf parsley, salt, black pepper, shrimp, lemon
name: shrimp with saffron orzo

steps: In a small saucepan, combine chicken broth, sugar and salt. Bring to a boil. Add the dill and butter. Toss until butter melts. Return carrots to pan and add the dill and butter. Return carrots
ingredients: baby carrots, chicken broth, butter, dried dill seed, dried parsley, lemon juice
name: dill buttered carrots

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl except for beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celerypreparation:Cut or trim beef if needed. Place all ingredients in a bowl except for beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celerypreparation:Cut or trim beef if needed.
ingredients: chuck roast, ketchup, red wine vinegar, brown sugar, dijon-style mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, garlic powder, liquid smoke flavoring
name: crock pot barbecued beef

steps: Cook noodles as directed on the package. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine soy sauce and the next seven ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well with a wire whisk. Pour over the noodles. Toss gently. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: spaghetti, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, low sodium soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper, green onion
name: kittencal s quick 5 minute chinese noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Set aside. With mixer, cream together eggs and sugar. Add flour, baking powder, salt, melted butter and almond extract, beating until just mixed. Spread into prepared baking pan and sprinkle with the almonds. Bake for 30 minutes or until tested done and lightly browned. Cool and cut into bars.
ingredients: butter, unsweetened baking chocolate, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, kahlua
name: soomie s kahlua brownies

steps: In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leaves. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy.
ingredients: vegetable oil, beef gravy, potatoes, cheese curds
name: poor man canadian poutine

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, smooth peanut butter, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, semisweet chocolate chunks, baking powder, salt
name: barefoot contessa pb choc chunk cookies

steps: Put the beans in a large pot and cover with water. Bring beans to boil and let boil for 1 hour. Check closely, as beans cook, you will probably need to add more water. Run tap water until very hot before adding to beans. Add bacon pieces and cook another 45 minutes. Add spices and reduce heat to low and cook another 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: red kidney beans, water, lard, sea salt
name: red beans poor holler style

steps: Preheat over to 350 degrees. Cream together the butter and brown sugar. Add the flour and press into a buttered 9x13 baking pan. Bake 15 minutes. In a sauce pan combine the sugar and light corn syrup and bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Add butterscotch chip and peanut butter. Stir until melted. Add corn flakes. Spread carefully onto the crumb crust. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, flour, white sugar, light corn syrup, peanut butter chips, chunky peanut butter, corn flakes
name: peanut butter crunch squares

steps: Heat oil in a medium large soup pot. Add onions and cook over medium-low heat until completely translucent. Add tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Add chicken stock. Bring to a simmer and allow to simmer for 15 minutes. Add whipping cream. Add pesto. Blend to desired consistency with hand blender, food processor or blender. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
ingredients: tomato sauce, tomato paste, water, garlic salt, sugar, salt, whole milk
name: copycat campbell s tomato soup

steps: Place tomatoes in a medium bowl. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine oil and vinegar. Add parsley, basil, oregano, salt and sugar. Mix well. Pour over the tomatoes. Cover and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. Drain. Serve on bed of lettuce if desired.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, vodka, celery salt, lemon pepper seasoning
name: merry tomatoes

steps: Spray frying pan with nonstick cooking spray. Heat pan, saute onion, and add ground boca when onions start to brown. Saute boca and onions. Season to taste with cumin, onion powder, salt, pepper, chili powder. Add stewed tomatoes and continue to cook over a medium flame for about 8 minutes. Add the kidney beans for the last three minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground beef, cold water, oil, onions, tomatoes, green bananas, uncooked rice, salt, pepper
name: zoo tosopy paraguayan ground beef stew

steps: Heat the ghee, then add the onions and cook until golden, about 5 or 6 minutes. Add the chicken bouillon and water. Once the mixture boils, stir in the rice. Cover, reduce heat and cook on low for about 25 minutes until rice is tender. Serve rice with chicken on top. Garnish with toasted almonds.
ingredients: olive oil, lime juice, chili powder, cayenne pepper, salt, sugar, chicken breast halves, mangoes
name: chicken mango kabobs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine butter, garlic, jalapeno, green onion, and mayo in a bowl. Cut the bread on a diagonal into 1 wide diamonds. Do not cut all the way through the bread. Spread the butter mixture and cheese into the cut slots in the bread. Wrap in foil and bake for 15 mins unti the cheese is melting. Remove the top layer of foil, exposing the top of the bread. Bake for an additional 5 mins unti the cheese is melting. Remove the top
ingredients: round sourdough loaf, cream cheese, pickled jalapeno pepper juice, garlic powder, jalapeno pepper, bacon bits, monterey jack cheese
name: jalapeno popper pull apart bread

steps: Place cauliflower and water in a two-quart microwave dish. Cover, cook on high for 6 minutes. Stir. Cook another 6-8 minutes. Drain. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, chives, s & p. Spoon over veggies. Sprinkle with cheese. Pop it back into the microwave for another 2 minutes--cheese should be melted.
ingredients: cauliflower, mushrooms, green pepper, heavy cream, sharp cheddar cheese, scotch whisky, oatmeal, nutmeg, salt and pepper, mixed nuts
name: cauliflower cheese and whisky old scottish recipe

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, large shrimp, fresh garlic, seasoning salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil
name: baked italian shrimp

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: cabbage kimchi, lean ground beef, sesame oil, soy sauce, green onions, garlic, black pepper, cooked rice, eggs
name: kimchi bokkeum bap kimchi fried rice

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove pork from marinade and pat dry with a paper towel. Mix honey and brown sugar on a plate. Roll pork in honey mixture and then roll in the sesame seeds. Roast in a shallow pan for 20 to 30 minutes or until meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part registers 160 degrees. Suggested to serve over rice.
ingredients: chicken broth, cornstarch, soy sauce, green onions, pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, garlic, fresh broccoli, sesame seeds
name: sesame pork and broccoli

steps: Mix the ground beef, buttery cracker, cheddar cheese, dry onion soup mix, eggs, ketchup, steak sauce. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, buttery cracker, cheddar cheese, dry onion soup mix, eggs, ketchup, steak sauce
name: rempel family meatloaf

steps: In a small sauce pot place three ingredients and enough salted water to cover, to a boil. Cook 20 minutes. Pour over spinach to drain. Discard rosemary. Return potatoes and spinach to pot and stir in butter and broth. Using hand masher, mash mixture until smooth. Stir in peppers and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, carrots, parsnips, celeriac, swede, butter, milk, black pepper, nutmeg
name: three root mash

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line 9-inch pie plate with pastry. Combine sugar, flour, spice and salt. Add to peaches and mix lightly. Fill pie shell with peach mixture. Dot with butter. Place top crust and crimp edges. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until done.
ingredients: pie crust, peaches, sugar, cornstarch, water, peach jell-o
name: fresh peach pie easy

steps: Spray 9 x 13 pan with cooking spray. Line pan with bread quarters. Cut sausage into small pieces as you brown it. Drain. In marge mixing bowl combine cooked sausage, eggs, evaporated mild, water, cheese, mustard, and salt. Pour over bread. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 - 60 minutes. Can be served with salsa.
ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, dry mustard, paprika, cayenne, salt, sour cream, sausage, eggs
name: sunny side up casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, whisk the sugar, buttermilk, oil, egg, and vanilla together until smooth. In a medium bowl, sift the flour, cocoa and baking soda together and add to the buttermilk mixture, stir until the ingredients are just combined. Be careful not to overework the batter, if there are lumps, they will disappear during baking baking. The less you work the batter, the more tender the pies will be. Fill 6 nonstick muffin top cups with the batter. Bake for 10 minutes in the center of the oven. To prevent the pies from getting soggy after baking, remove the cooked muffins from their cups and cool them on a rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: pie shell, eagle brand condensed milk, bananas, lemon juice, sweetened whipped cream, cocoa
name: banoffi pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: fat free cream cheese, jumbo lump crab meat, green onion, parmesan cheese, garlic, marinated artichoke hearts, crushed red pepper flakes, cooking spray
name: best crab dip on the planet

steps: Heat skillet on medium heat, the add the 2 slices of bread butter side down on skillet, add provolone, then turkey. Top with the other pieces of bread butter side up. Cook for about 3 minutes until toasted well but not burnt, flip and cook the other side for another 3 minutes or so. Cut in half and serve.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, provolone cheese, turkey, fat-free mayonnaise
name: best grilled cheese and turkey sandwich

steps: In a large pot, saute black beans in oil over medium-high heat until the beans are soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: dried black beans, bacon, onion, liquid smoke, dark molasses, brown sugar, jalapeno
name: crock pot smokey black beans

steps: In a large frypan, heat oil over medium high heat. Saute garlic until light golden and fragrant. About 10 seconds. Add shrimp and rosemary. Saute just until shrimp are pink, about 1 minute. Add sherry, salt, pepper and hot pepper sauce. Saute until liquid is reduced by half, about 3 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, flat leaf parsley, dry sherry, red chile, mussels, salt and black pepper
name: mussels in sherry

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the sugar, balsamic vinegar. Simmer until liquid has reduced by half, it should become slightly thicker. Remove from heat and set aside. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Place peaches cut side down onto the grill, and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the flesh is toasted. Turn peaches over. Brush the top sides with the balsamic glaze, and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Transfer the peach halves to individual dishes and drizzle with the remaining glaze. Sprinkle with with crumbled blue cheese.
ingredients: peaches, honey, balsamic vinegar, feta cheese
name: balsamic honey grilled peaches with feta

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Lightly grease a 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Melt butter in skillet. Saute celery and onion till tender, about 3 minutes. In large mixing bowl, combine cornbread, bread, celery and onions, sage and black pepper. Stir broth and beaten eggs into cornbread mixture. Blend well. Stir in chopped boiled eggs. Pour into prepared baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: celery, onions, butter, cornbread mix, sage
name: my mother s cornbread dressing

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread fruit cocktail mix in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, cool whip, vanilla wafers, bananas, and pudding mixture in glass serving bowl. Top with fruit cocktail, wafers, and remaining cool whip. Serve chilled.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, baking soda, eggs, fruit cocktail, milk, coconut, butter, vanilla extract
name: fruit cocktail pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish fillets in a greased 9x13 dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine lime juice, sour cream and parsley, stir well. Pour over fish. Sprinkle with lime rind. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till flakes easy with fork.
ingredients: fish, garlic cloves, parsley, preserved lemon, pine nuts, pepper, salt, olive oil
name: lemon and parsley whole baked fish

steps: Cream sugar, molasses, and butter in a mixing bowl. Add pumpkin and egg and mix well. Mix the dry ingredients into the pumpkin batter and fold in nuts. Grease muffin tins and fill half full. Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes.
ingredients: brown sugar, molasses, butter, egg, pecans, squash, baking soda, salt, flour
name: shaker squash muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, worcestershire sauce, salt, ground cinnamon, garlic powder, cayenne, hot pepper sauce, pecan halves
name: super spiced pecans

steps: Whisk together cream cheese, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt
ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, dry sherry, curry powder, salt, mango chutney, green onion
name: chutney glazed cheese pt

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: brown sugar, maple syrup, bourbon, honey, butter, cinnamon, ground cayenne pepper, salt, sweet potatoes
name: sweet potatoes bourbon glazed spicy

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: granny smith apples, red delicious apples, water, brown sugar, ground allspice, ground cinnamon
name: quick easy applesauce

steps: Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish.
ingredients: cod fish fillet, fresh parsley, pepper, onion, garlic clove, butter, orange juice, lemon juice, orange peel
name: citrus cod

steps: Spray interior of slow cooker with non stick cooking spray. Place pie filling in slow cooker. In a mixing bowl, combine dry cake mix, and butter, and spoon over filling. Drop walnuts over top. Cover, and cook on low for 3-5 hours, or until a toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
ingredients: cherry pie filling, yellow cake mix, butter, walnuts
name: cherry supreme

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder
ingredients: ground beef, onion, flour, water, salt & pepper, ketchup, mustard, hamburger buns
name: maid rites sloppy joes

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: pie shell, eggs, scallions, milk, cream, butter, salt, pepper
name: basic quiche

steps: Mix pineapple juice, banana, coconut, paper cups, wooden popsicle sticks, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups, paper cups
ingredients: pineapple juice, banana, coconut, paper cups, wooden popsicle sticks
name: tropical popsicle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, salt, all-purpose flour, chocolate syrup, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: best chocolate syrup brownies

steps: Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until softened, stirring occasionally with a whisk. Add chicken broth, lemon juice, capers, and cook until thickened, stirring occasionally with a whisk. Pour over fish, sprinkle with parsley, and cook until thickened, stirring occasionally with a whisk. Pour over fish, sprinkle with parsley,
ingredients: butter, garlic, olive oil, white flour, chicken broth, lemon juice, capers
name: piccata sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place chicken breasts in a single layer in a shallow baking pan. Combine pecans, bread crumbs, and butter. Sprinkle evenly over chicken, press lightly into chicken to secure. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: apricot preserves, dijon-style mustard, curry powder, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cashews
name: cashew crusted chicken

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add the arugula, frisee and the beet cut outs and toss. Add the chives and toss. Add the
ingredients: garlic clove, extra virgin olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper, hearts of palm, artichoke hearts, grape tomatoes, fresh parsley, mesclun
name: marinated hearts of palm salad

steps: Drain and rinse the clams. Press to remove excess water. Chop finely. Add the potato, beaten egg, lemon juice, green onion, salt and pepper. Blend well and add 1-2 tbsp bread crumbs or enough to be able to shape the croquettes. Roll into small balls, and roll in the egg then the breadcrumbs. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Fry in oil in batches until brown about 5 minutes. Drain and serve plain or with a sauce of your choice.
ingredients: lime juice, razor clams, buttermilk, panko breadcrumbs, peanut oil, unsalted butter, salt and pepper
name: razor clams oregon style

steps: In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: unsweetened cocoa powder, water, sugar, instant coffee, fat-free frozen yogurt, fat-free whipped topping, fat-free cookies
name: guilt free cappuccino sundaes

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Prepare pastry. In small saucepan, combine blueberries, cornstarch, and sugar over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Spoon into pastry shell. In small mixing bowl, beat the condensed milk, lemon, and egg yolk until well-blended. Spoon evenly over blueberry mixture. Bake 30 minutes, cool, then chill thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, salt, half-and-half, blueberries, bourbon
name: lime bourbon blueberry pie

steps: Heat oven to 450f. Place florets in a large bowl with oil, salt, pepper & pepper flakes and toss to coat. Spread out on a baking sheet. Roast the vegetables, stirring once, until tender-crisp and browned in spots, 15 to 25 minutes. Serve hot or warm with lemon wedges, if desired. Enjoy.
ingredients: shortcrust pastry, all-purpose flour, olive oil, garlic clove, onion, roasted red peppers, peppadew peppers, egg, cream, salt and pepper
name: roasted red pepper tart

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, mini marshmallows, whipping cream
name: whipped cranberry salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with nonstick cooking spray. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: pasta, unsalted butter, olive oil, white button mushrooms, heavy cream, rotisserie-cooked chicken, frozen peas, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: creamy mushroom chicken and pasta

steps: Slice the onion in half crosswise and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the onion was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage.
ingredients: brown bread, mayonnaise, onions, salt and black pepper, tomatoes, parsley
name: new yorker onion sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pre
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cream cheese, sour cream, taco seasoning, tomatoes, black olives, green onion, cheddar cheese
name: easy taco pizza appetizer

steps: Season pork chops, in a baking dish, with pepper and paprika. Add boullion cubes, onion, and water. Cover with foil paper. Bake at 375 degrees fahrenheit for 2 hours or until tender. Uncover and allow to brown, not burn, making sure there is still water in the bottom of the pan, for 10 to15 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, cream of mushroom soup, lipton onion soup mix
name: dee s pork chops casserole

steps: In a large heavy skillet with lid, warm canola oil over medium-low heat. Add the ginger, cinnamon, and cloves. Cook, stirring, for 10 to 15 seconds. Add the cabbage, apples, maple syrup, and salt. Stir, reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for about 30 minutes. After the 30 minutes, add the vinegar and increase heat to medium. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until most of the liquid evaporates. Sprinkle each serving of cabbage with 2 tablespoons of the pumpkin seeds.
ingredients: red cabbage, granny smith apple, apple cider, vegetable oil, salt, caraway seed
name: red cabbage with apples

steps: In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles.
ingredients: scallops, soy sauce, dry sherry, garlic clove, ground ginger, sesame oil, cooked broccoli, garlic sauce, cooked rice
name: fast and easy scallop stir fry for one

steps: Heat grill to medium-high, cook shrimp for 2 to 3 minutes a side, basting with reserved sauce. Cook the shrimp until opaque. Be careful not to overcook.
ingredients: cilantro, tomatoes, green onion, medium shrimp, clam juice, iceberg lettuce, ketchup, limes, juice of, tabasco sauce
name: mexican shrimp cocktail a nice twist

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix butter, icing sugar, black sesame seed, white bread with 1 tablespoon of icing sugar. Add 1/2 teaspoon of black sesame seed and 1/2 teaspoon of black sesame seed mixture. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-2 minutes.
ingredients: butter, icing sugar, black sesame seed, white bread
name: sweet toast kanoom pang naneuy
