steps: Cook beef, onion, garlic, dried basil, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni,
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried basil, tomato sauce, chicken broth, macaroni, zucchini
name: italian skillet meal

steps: In a large skillet, cook pasta until crisp. Remove pasta with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in drippings for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta.
ingredients: fettuccine pasta, chicken, carrot, chicken stock, red capsicums, dried garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: chicken and pepper pasta

steps: Cook the pasta al dente drain and run under cold water until cool. Chop all the vegetables finely. Once the pasta is completely cooled and dry, mix in the vegetables. Add mayo then dill. Mix very well. Add shredded cheddar and mix well. Chill in the fridge at least two hours to let flavors meld.
ingredients: penne, frozen peas, mayonnaise, lemon, juice of, tuna in olive oil, red peppers, red onion, rocket, carrot, parmesan cheese
name: hot pasta salad

steps: Mix together the sour cream, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, avocado
ingredients: light sour cream, taco seasoning mix, avocados, lemon juice, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese
name: easy mexican dip

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned blueberries into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature.
ingredients: blueberry muffin mix, peaches, sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, butter
name: blueberry peach coffee cake

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot.
ingredients: flour tortillas, enchilada sauce, cream cheese, sour cream, salt, ground cumin, pepper, chicken, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese
name: 3 cheese chicken enchiladas

steps: Heat the oven to 400f. Put the chicken skin-side-up in a small roasting tin. Mix together the garlic, thyme and butter and dot over the chicken. Scatter around the red onions and pancetta and drizzle with oil. Roast for 20 minutes until the chicken has cooked through and the onions are softened. Divide the salad between 4 plates and top with the red onions, pancetta and chicken.
ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, pepper, dried thyme, butter, onion, dry white wine, whipping cream, liquid honey
name: roasted chicken with thyme and honey cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toss together berries and apples, spread evenly over bottom of 8x8 baking dish. In medium bowl combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and oats. Using pastry cutter work butter into oat mixture until crumbly. Spread over fruit, pressing down lightly. Bake 40-45 minutes or until top is lightly browned. Cool before serving. Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: apples, maple syrup, flour, quick-cooking rolled oats, brown sugar, butter
name: vermont apple crisp

steps: Bake at 375 degrees for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: oil, water, matzo meal, salt, sugar, eggs, hot dogs
name: passover hot dog rollups

steps: In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, salt, butter, evaporated milk, marshmallow creme, milk chocolate candy bars, sweet chocolate, nuts
name: million dollar fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Mix together first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. In a large mixing bowl, beat brown sugar and butter till fluffy. Add eggs and beat till well blended then beat in vanilla. Stir in flour mixture till well combined. Spead mixture in pan. Combine granulated sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over the dough. Bake for 20-23 minutes. Do not overcook. The center surface of the bars should stay very slightly depressed when done.
ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil
name: soft snickerdoodles

steps: In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and almond extracts. Blend well.
ingredients: sugar, cocoa, salt, milk, vanilla extract
name: hot cocoa for one

steps: Combine ground beef, pork sausage, dry breadcrumbs, onion, barbecue sauce, egg, onion soup mix, jalapeno pepper, salt and pepper, hamburger buns. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. Mix water and cornst
ingredients: lean ground beef, pork sausage, dry breadcrumbs, onion, barbecue sauce, egg, onion soup mix, jalapeno pepper, salt and pepper, hamburger buns
name: dagwood burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. Unroll the crescent rolls and press into baking dish pinching seams together. Bake 5 minutes, or until lightly brown. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with pieces of brie cheese. Spoon the cranberry sauce over the cheese. Top with pecans. Bake an additional 8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown. Cool 5 minutes and cut into squares.
ingredients: unbleached flour, brie cheese, egg, fresh breadcrumb, vegetable oil, fresh cranberries, sugar, water
name: fried brie with cranberry sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, celery, beef roast seasoning, half-and-half, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk, cream of chicken
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, celery, beef roast seasoning, half-and-half, cream of chicken soup, buttermilk biscuit mix, cheddar cheese, milk
name: oven chicken and dumplings homemade gourmet

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix egg yolks, egg whites, sugar, pastry flour, vanilla, fresh lemon rind. Mix well. Pour into a greased and floured cake pan. Bake for 50 minutes.
ingredients: egg yolks, egg whites, sugar, pastry flour, vanilla, fresh lemon rind
name: pan di spagna italian sponge cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut zucchini into wedges, like you would steak cut fries. Beat egg with 1 tablespoon water. Mix parmesan cheese with herb seasoning. Dip zucchini into egg, then coat with cheese by pressing slices into mixture. Bake on well greased baking sheet for approximately 15 minutes, or until they reach desired browness. You can also turn them carefully to brown on both sides. I do not turn them when i make them.
ingredients: zucchini, onion, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic, oregano, pepper, oil
name: zucchini stuffing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll the crescent dough and separate into triangles. Cut each in half lengthwise, forming two triangles. Place 1 t pork sausage mixture and some cheese along the wide end of each triangle, carefully roll up. Place point side down 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees for 11-15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, garlic clove, chives, dried basil, egg, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, sharp cheddar cheese, sesame seeds
name: crescent sausage rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, zucchini, salt
name: zucchini spaghetti

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl, set aside. Combine shortening, peanut butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix until well blended. Blend in reserved dry ingredients, stir in coconut. Batter will be very stiff. Spread batter into a well-greased 13x9x2in baking pan. Bake at 350 degree for 25-35 minutes, or until golden brown. Cut into bars when completely cool.
ingredients: vanilla protein powder, rolled oats, wheat germ, rice krispies, peanut butter, honey
name: diet chewy crunchy snack bars

steps: Mix together salt, pepper, paprika and garlic and rub into roast. Cover and chill to marinate. Brown well on both sides in oil, then place in crock pot and add beef broth and onions. Cook 6 to 8 hours on low or until tender. Add chili sauce the last hour of cooking.
ingredients: boneless beef roast, spaghetti sauce mix, celery, onion, green pepper, water, salt and pepper, ketchup
name: crock pot italian roast beef

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks.
ingredients: graham crackers, whipping cream, miniature chocolate chips, brown sugar, butter, pecans, vanilla frosting
name: cupcake cookies

steps: Put the baby carrots in a large saute pan over medium heat, melt butter, add sugar, pineapple juice and the ginger. Bring mixture to a light boil and stir until sugar has melted and incorporated into all the other ingredients. Pour mixture over the carrots and toss gently.
ingredients: unsalted butter, baby carrots, crystallized ginger, dark brown sugar, chicken broth
name: ginger baby carrots

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add marjoram, garlic-pepper, and seasoned salt. Toss to coat. Bake at 425 for 30-45 minutes or until duck is tender. Remove to a plate, and add marjoram, garlic-pepper, and seasoned salt. Remove to a plate, and add
ingredients: duck, lard, salt, marjoram
name: north croatian roasted duck

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: butternut squash, bulgur wheat, reduced-fat feta cheese, dried sage, fresh ground black pepper, agave syrup, lemon, juice of
name: bulgur and butternut squash

steps: Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat. Add garlic and coriander and cook until fragrant. Add turkey and cook for 15-20 minutes. When potatoes are soft add spinach and stir until completely wilted. Cover and bring to a boil, turn down heat and simmer for 10 minutes. When potatoes are soft add spinach and stir until
ingredients: lemon juice, ground coriander, cayenne pepper, salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless turkey breast, frozen spinach, pepper, fresh cilantro
name: broiled turkey over spinach

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook until onions soften. Add chili powder, salt, pepper, onion powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili
ingredients: lean ground beef, onions, diced tomato, instant brown rice, pepper, chili powder
name: texas hash core

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: reduced-fat sour cream, fresh goat cheese, fresh chives, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, vegetable oil, chicken cutlet, boston lettuce, bing cherry, walnut pieces
name: seared chicken salad with cherries and goat cheese dressing

steps: Place shredded chicken breasts in a large crock-pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the adobo sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, chipotle chiles in adobo, black beans, sweetcorn, rotel tomatoes & chilies
name: crock pot shredded chipotle chicken

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: pinto beans, bacon, onion, celery, salt, pepper, garlic powder, marjoram, thyme
name: pinto bean soup

steps: Place wings in a plastic bag set in a shallow dish. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, ginger, crushed red pepper, five spice powder and garlic. Pour over wings. Close bag and toss to coat. Chill in refrigerator several hours or overnight, turning bag occasionally. Remove wings from bag, reserving marinade. Place wings on a foil-lined 15-by-10-by-1-inch baking pan. Bake, uncovered, in a 450-degree oven for 10 minutes. Brush with reserved marinade. Bake 15 to 20 minutes longer or until chicken is tender and no longer pink.
ingredients: chicken wings, onion soup mix, molasses, soy sauce, salsa, hot pepper sauce, lemon juice, garlic powder
name: wing dingers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray cookie sheet with nonstick spray. Bake at 350 degrees f. for 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: cherry pie filling, fresh lemon juice, flour, pecans, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, allspice
name: quick n easy cherry pecan cobbler

steps: Heat oil and butter in skillet. Add chicken and saute over med-high heat, turning often to lightly brown. Put chicken into baking pan. Saute onions and garlic, add tomatoes, tarragon, vinegar, capers& wine. Pour over chicken and bake in 350 degress oven for 30 to 45 minutes, depending on size of chicken breast.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, seasoned flour, olive oil, white wine, diced tomatoes, garlic cloves, onion, olive
name: mama s chicken provencal

steps: Heat oil and butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. When butter has melted, add half of the asparagus to the skillet with. Using tongs, distribute spears in an even layer. Cover skillet. Cook until spears are tender and still crisp, about 5 minutes. Uncover, increase heat to high and season asparagus with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until spears are tender and well-browned along one side, 5 - 7 minutes, using tongs to occasionally move spears from the center of the pan to the edge of the pan to ensure all are browned. Transfer to serving dish, adjust seasonings as needed and, if desired, squeeze lemon over spears. Serve immediately.
ingredients: asparagus spears, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, garlic clove, sesame seeds, black pepper, salt
name: grilled asparagus rafts

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Cook scapes, peppers& seasoning, stirring occasionally, until tender-crisp, about 2 minutes. Drain& chill under cold water, then drain well& pat dry. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Stir in almonds.
ingredients: fresh green beans, scallions, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemon peel, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sliced almonds
name: garlic roasted green beans with almonds

steps: Place zurichgeschnetzeltes in an 8x8-inch baking dish that has been lightly sprayed with pam. Top with swiss cheese slices. Combine soup and wine, stirring well. Drizzle melted margarine over crumbs. Bake at 350f for 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breasts, mushrooms, lemon juice, oil, white wine, cream, salt and pepper
name: zurichgeschnetzeltes or diced chicken

steps: Slice onion and put on bottom of crock pot. Season the steak with pepper and garlic salt. Heat the oil in a skillet and lightly brown the steak. When done, place steak on onions in crock pot. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over top of steak. Cook 4-6 hours depending on your crock pot or until steak is tender. Serve over noodles or rice.
ingredients: round steaks, onions, worcestershire sauce, cornstarch, nonfat beef broth, bell peppers, salt and pepper, garlic powder, olive oil, skim evaporated milk
name: low fat crock pot pepper steak

steps: Combine raw peanuts, granulated sugar, white karo, salt, butter, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla, baking soda, vanilla,

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add in tandoori paste, yogurt, lime, juice of, garlic and saute for 3-4 minutes or until tender. Stir in apricot preserves, lemon juice, hot sauce and creole seasoning, reduce heat to low and cook for 5-6 minutes, stirring with wooden spoon until heated through. Place the alan s tandoori chicken on top of a rack on a medium shallow baking dish, then brush the chicken all over with the prepared glaze. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Enjoy with rice if desired.
ingredients: chicken breasts, tandoori paste, yogurt, lime, juice of, garlic
name: alan s tandoori chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place the brie in a shallow baking dish. Top with the walnut mixture. Bake for about 8-10 minutes or until soft and heated through. Serve immediately with assorted crackers and pear slices.
ingredients: brie round, crescent roll dough, butter, brown sugar, sliced almonds
name: caramelized baked brie

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, water, chicken bouillon cubes, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh broccoli, salt, ground black pepper, light cream, cheddar cheese
name: cheese and broccoli chicken soup d v o

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine the bran and milk in a mixing bowl. Let stand 2 minutes or until most of the moisture is absorbed. Add the egg and oil. Beat until well blended. Sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the bran mixture and stir just enough to blend. Fold in raisins, but do not over mix. Spoon the batter into oiled muffin cups and bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot.
ingredients: raisin bran cereal, sugar, flour, baking soda, eggs, oil, buttermilk, crushed pineapple, raisins
name: mom s refrigerator bran muffins

steps: Combine butter, cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator.
ingredients: green beans, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, ground cumin, chili powder, red onions, chickpeas, red kidney beans, salt and pepper
name: three bean salad

steps: Mix all marinade ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy
ingredients: boneless leg of lamb, parsley, oregano, white wine, diced tomatoes, artichoke hearts, garlic cloves, pepper
name: roast lamb with tomatoes and artichoke hearts

steps: Preheat oven to 190c. Line a large baking tray with baking parchment. Place bread in a blender or food processor and blend to make fine breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the grated cheese and. Place the egg white and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dip the chicken pieces in the flour first to lightly dust then dip into the egg whites and finally into the cheesy breadcrumbs, turning to evenly coat. Place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, there is no pink meat and the juices run clear when pierced with a sharp knife. Serve the chicken dippers with tomato sauce or mayonnaise.
ingredients: chicken breasts, bacon, ranch dip mix, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, panko breadcrumbs
name: chicken burgurs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake in preheated oven 45 minutes. Bake in preheated oven 45 minutes longer.
ingredients: cornbread mix, onion, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of celery soup, chicken broth, hard-boiled eggs
name: chicken and cornbread bake

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: cream cheese, garlic cloves, wonton wrappers, egg white
name: garlicky cream cheese wontons

steps: In a large mixing bowl, whisk the olive oil into the dressing until slightly thickened. Add the lemon juice, salt and pepper and mix well. Add the vegetables. Toss to coat all the vegetables. Top with cheese to serve.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, red cabbage, green onion, canola oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, salt, fresh ground black pepper, blue cheese
name: red cabbage and romaine coleslaw with blue cheese dressing

steps: Spray 9 x 13 pan with cooking spray. Line pan with bread quarters. Cut sausage into small pieces as you brown it. Drain. In marge mixing bowl combine cooked sausage, eggs, evaporated mild, water, cheese, mustard, and salt. Pour over bread. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 - 60 minutes. Can be served with salsa.
ingredients: seasoned croutons, sausage, eggs, milk, cream of mushroom soup, frozen chopped spinach, mushrooms, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, dry mustard
name: make ahead breakfast casserole

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: baby carrots, water, honey, butter, dark brown sugar, white wine vinegar, salt, ground allspice
name: honey glazed baby carrots

steps: Heat 2 t olive oil in a skillet that you can eventually place under the broiler. Add onion to skillet and cook until soft, about 4 minutes. Add 1 t olive oil and heat. Add eggs seasoned with salt, pepper, parsley, rosemary, thyme, salt and pepper. Cook until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Gently place the rounds of tomato on the egg mixture. Cover and cook over low heat until bottom of frittata begins to solidify
ingredients: olive oil, bell peppers, red onions, eggs, egg whites, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, frozen peas, fresh parsley
name: onion and pepper frittata

steps: Place cucumber in a mixing bowl and whip with an electric mixer until fluffy. Add dressing, milk and dill weed. Mix well until well blended. Stir in cucumber and onion. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to allow flavor to blend.
ingredients: ranch dressing, cucumber, milk, prepared horseradish, cider vinegar, wasabi powder, salt, cayenne pepper
name: wasabi cucumber ranch dip

steps: Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Add broccoli and stir-f
ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, prepared horseradish
name: tangy broccoli low carb

ingredients: tomatoes with onion and garlic, tomato sauce, italian seasoning, orzo pasta, boneless skinless chicken breasts, water
name: darlene s italian herb crock pot chicken

steps: Place chicken in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Pour over chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, 7-up soda, seasoning salt, parsley flakes
name: 7 up chicken in crock pot

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the stock, with the dill added, to a boil. Add rice. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for about 15 to 20 minutes-- just until the rice is tender but still firm. In the bowl with the beaten eggs, slowly stir about 2 cups of the soup in, beating constantly. Once combined, slowly pour this mixture back into the soup-pot. Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes or until the soup has slightly thickened. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Taste and add salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken broth, rice, eggs, lemon, juice of
name: soupa avgolemono egg lemon soup

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Add the sesame seeds and cook, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Add the
ingredients: soy sauce, chinese barbecue sauce, honey, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, chicken drumsticks, toasted sesame seeds
name: sticky chicken drumsticks curtis stone

steps: Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, cream of tartar & baking soda till well combined. Drop tablespoon size balls in sugar, roll to coat. Place 12 cookies on a parchment lined cookie sheet, do not flatten. Bake at 350 for 10 - 15 minutes. Slide parchment with cookies onto wire rack to cool. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, warm water, salt, flour, chocolate chips
name: mom s soft chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Unroll crescent dough and place in a circle on round stone, with the wide ends in the middle and the pointed ends to the outside. You should have an circle in the middle of the stone. You will need to overlap the wide ends a bit to make a circle. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, using more mayo if mixture appears to be dry. Place the mixture in a circle on the crescent rolls on the wide ends. Fold the pointed ends over the mixture to the middle of the stone. Tuck the ends under. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown. Slice and serve.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cooked chicken, cheddar cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, milk
name: creamy chicken crescents

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks.
ingredients: butter, peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt
name: criss cross peanut butter cookies

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium heat, add spinach, tomatoes, onions, garlic cloves, green pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno
ingredients: bacon, grape tomatoes, small shell pasta, butter, colby cheese, salt & pepper
name: sammie s bacon tomato pasta

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, ground cumin, long grain rice, salt, green onion
name: southwestern rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, salt, pepper, eggs
name: onion omelet from the ticino

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat together butter, eggs, butter, nuts, powdered sugar, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream
ingredients: duncan hines butter cake mix, eggs, butter, nuts, powdered sugar, cream cheese
name: park plaza squares

steps: Saute onion in butter till tender. Add mustard, worcestershire sauce and poppy seeds. Place in refrigerator until it reaches spreading consistency. Open the rolls, spread both sides with the mixture. Place small amount of ham and cheese on roll and replace the top of the roll. Cover with foil and heat at 425 degrees for 20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, prepared mustard, poppy seeds, onion, worcestershire sauce, rolls, ham, swiss cheese
name: ham delights

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine apricot jam, coconut, pecans and powdered sugar in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Add crescent rolls and stir to completely coat nuts. Spread nuts evenly on lined baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour, stirring every 10 minutes. Cool and serve.
ingredients: crescent roll, apricot jam, coconut, pecans, powdered sugar
name: easy apricot crescents

steps: In a large saute pan, heat the oil until hot but not smoking, add the onion, and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for an additional 8 minutes, or until the onions are a bit soft on the exterior. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, combine the chipotles and vinegar in a blender or food processor and puree. Transfer to a medium-sized bowl, add the cumin, lemon juice, molasses, oregano, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Add the apples and onions to the chipotle mixture and stir well. Allow to sit in the refrigerator, covered, overnight or for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: fat free sour cream, garlic cloves, chipotle chile in adobo, fresh cilantro, spring onions, sea salt, ground cumin, lime juice
name: fat free creamy chipotle cilantro sauce dressing

steps: In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping.
ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding, lemonade mix, milk, cool whip, graham cracker crust
name: sugar free lemon ice box pie

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, and cook over medium-high heat for 5 mins until onion is translucent. Add garlic, and cook for 5 mins until garlic is translucent. Add arborio rice, and cook for 5 mins until garlic is translucent. Add tomatoes, and cook for 5 mins until tomatoes are translucent. Add tomatoes, and
ingredients: olive oil, onion, arborio rice, tomatoes, water, salami, sun-dried tomato, black olives, dried chili pepper flakes, parmesan cheese
name: risotto napoletana

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden.
ingredients: egg, sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, apple, nuts, vanilla
name: easy apple puff

steps: Place the dressing in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. Sprinkle with chopped mint or pistachio.
ingredients: orange juice, lemon juice, sugar, egg, fresh fruit
name: fruit salad dressing

steps: In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush sesame seed with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: catfish fillets, honey, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh breadcrumb, dried thyme, salt, ground black pepper
name: honey dijon mustard fish

steps: Wash and dry the scallops and separate the coral from the white flesh. Peel and smash the garlic. Melt half the butter in a saucepan and cook the white flesh very gently for 10 minutes, until tender. Season to taste. Place on paper towel and keep hot between two plates over a pan of hot water. Pour out the butter from the pan, wipe it out with paper and add the remaining butter and the coral, cook for 1 minute only on each side. Add the white flesh and the herbs and garlic, leave over the heat just long enough to mix thoroughly and divide between the heated shells. Serve immediately with a dry rose wine.
ingredients: couscous, boiling water, butter, scallions, fresh parsley, salt, black pepper
name: scallion couscous

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: peanut butter, water, soy sauce, lemon juice, honey, garlic, chili powder, dried red pepper, peanuts, paprika
name: peanut chili dip

steps: In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want.
ingredients: ground chuck, onion, green pepper, kidney beans, potatoes, corn, tomatoes, chili powder, salt & pepper
name: cowboy ground chuck stew

steps: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the lamb and cook for 5 minutes, turning halfway through, until the lamb is done to your liking and the sauce has reduced to a sticky consistency. Serve the lamb with mashed potatoes and steamed snow peas. Garnish with the reserved rosemary.
ingredients: oil, lamb, beef stock, onions, prunes, dried apricots, tomato paste, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, slivered almonds
name: one pot moroccan lamb

steps: Combine all of the ingredients except the fruit in a bowl. Pour it into an 8x8 pan coated with cooking spray. Add the fruit right on top. The crust will come up over the fruit and cover it. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, flour, baking powder, milk, salt, butter, pie filling
name: any fruit cobbler

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add butter. While whisking, slowly add in flour. When blended, add salt, pepper, nutmeg and cayenne. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking constantly. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until thickened and bubbly. Mix in the parmesan cheese. Season with salt and lots of black pepper.
ingredients: unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, whole milk, kosher salt, nutmeg
name: besciamella sauce

steps: In a small bowl whisk together the sardines, onion, celery, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, lemon juice. In a separate bowl whisk together the sardines, onion, celery, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, lemon juice. In a separate bowl whisk together the sardines, onion,
ingredients: sardines, onion, celery, low-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, lemon juice
name: omega spread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Thaw spinch according to package directions. Drain well. Chop up artichoke hearts. Add all ingredients in a medium sized casserole dish. Bake in middle oven rack for 25 to 30 minutes, or until slightly golden and bubbly. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: wonton wrappers, cooking spray, artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, frozen chopped spinach, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, red pepper, minced garlic cloves
name: spinach and artichoke cups

steps: Combine all ingredients except jam in a bowl. Beat ingredients at low speed until crumbly. Reserve 2 cups of this mixture. Press mixture firmly into bottom of greased 13x9 pan. Spread jam in a thin layer across pressed mixture. Now evenly sprinkle the reserved 2 cups across the top of jam. Bake 20-30 minutes or until golden brown. Let sit in pan or glass dish to cool for about 15 minutes and than cut into squares before cookie bar is completely cooled.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, vanilla essence, egg, plain flour, rice flour, baking powder, raspberry jam
name: vanilla jam swirls

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and cook for one minute. Cover and cook for one minute. Cover and
ingredients: liver, flour, bacon, onion, beef broth, water, pepper, tarragon
name: beef liver and onions

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: water, chicken bouillon cubes, diced onion, carrot, celery, diced tomatoes, garlic clove, salt & pepper, chicken breast, noodles
name: chicken and tomato soup

steps: Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving.
ingredients: onion, mexican blend cheese, light sour cream, green enchilada sauce, diced green chilies, flour tortillas
name: light sour cream and cheese enchiladas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: peanut butter, white sugar, egg, baking soda, vanilla, chocolate chips
name: flourless peanut butter cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Stir together brown sugar, cayenne, and black pepper in a small bowl. Arrange bacon slices in l layer on a large broiler pan and bake in middle of oven for 20 minutes. Turn slices over and sprinkle evenly with spiced sugar. Continue baking until bacon is crisp and brown, 15 to 20 minutes more, then transfer to paper towels to drain.
ingredients: smoked bacon, onion, garlic clove, water, brown sugar, cider vinegar, salt, ground red pepper, collard greens
name: bacon and brown sugar braised collard greens

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker squares, butter, brown sugar, sliced almonds
name: almond graham cracker cookies

steps: In a medium pot, heat the oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice.
ingredients: chicken broth, stewed tomatoes, boneless skinless chicken breasts, basmati rice, fresh flat-leaf parsley, curry powder, garlic, dried thyme, fresh ground pepper
name: curried chicken and rice soup

steps: Combine graham cracker crumbs with 2 tablespoon of the sugar, and melted butter. Press mixture on bottom and sides of lightly buttered pie pan. Beat egg yolks until thick. Combine with condensed milk. Add lemon rind and juice gradually, stirring until thick. Stir in 1 cup coconut. Whip egg whites until foamy. Gradually beat in rest of sugar, then beat until stiff. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into tray. Sprinkle top with remaining coconut. Chill in freezer until firm about 4 to 6 hours.
ingredients: graham crackers, sugar, margarine, egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, realemon juice, whipped topping
name: freezable lemon squares

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad.
ingredients: garlic, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper, cayenne, olive oil, anchovy fillets
name: outstanding greek salad dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, butter, whipping cream, salt and pepper, fresh parsley
name: julia child chopped brussels sprouts in cream

steps: Place half the peppers and tomatoes on the bottom of your crock pot. Add meat. Top with remaining peppers & tomatoes. Turn to low for 6 hours. If you with to thicken the sauce, mix cornstarch with a bit of water and add to crock pot. Stir. Turn to high for the last 15 minutes. Serve over your favorite pasta.
ingredients: butter, buddig beef, flour, milk, instant chicken bouillon, pepper
name: creamed chipped beef s o s for biscuits or toast

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: water, white sugar, frozen lemonade concentrate, frozen orange juice concentrate, orange sherbet, ginger ale, carbonated water, maraschino cherries, orange, ice
name: island punch

steps: Combine the red onions, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, crushed red pepper flakes, pitted black olives, oregano leaves, salt and pepper. Mix in the oregano and lime juice. Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Let the salso sit 15 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
ingredients: red onions, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, crushed red pepper flakes, pitted black olives, oregano leaves
name: charred red onion salsa

steps: Place flour, sugar, salt, sugar, and shortening in large tupperware or other plastic container with lid. Seal tightly. Shake 3 minutes. Open & make sure mixture is uniform. Add water. Shake 3 more minutes & open to see if mixture is large dough ball of uniform consistency. Roll out on floured surface. Can be frozen for later use.
ingredients: flour, salt, butter, egg, sour cream
name: sour cream pie crust

steps: Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley.
ingredients: daikon radish, fennel bulb, carrot, onion, lemon, extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper
name: chef boy i be illinois daikon and fennel salad

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread.
ingredients: mayonnaise, onion, swiss cheese, chives, sourdough bread
name: swiss cheese dip

steps: Preheat oven 325f. Melt chocolate chips and butter on low heat. Stir then add eagle brand milk,. Flour, nuts and vanilla. Cool. Spoon by teaspoon onto greased pan. Bake at 325f for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cream cheese, eggs, butter, slivered almonds, creamy chocolate fudge frosting mix
name: cheesecake fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg substitute, nonfat milk, canola oil, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: toasted walnut bread

steps: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, saltpreparation:In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions, lemon, juice of,
ingredients: cucumbers, green onions, lemon, juice of, garlic, dill, fresh ground pepper, cottage cheese, yogurt, feta cheese, salt
name: mediterranean creamy cucumber salad

steps: In a saucepan, combine the half-and-half, white chocolate, and salt. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth. Remove from heat and add in vanilla. Whisk until frothy. Pour into warmed mugs. Garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: whipping cream, half-and-half, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pure vanilla extract, chocolate whipped cream
name: chocolate thunder

steps: Melt butter in a shallow pan. Add apple pieces and cook over medium-high heat until golden and tender, about 10 minutes. Add the honey. Turn up heat a little to crisp up the outside a little. Remove and let cool a little before serving. Serve with cold thick yogurt.
ingredients: butter, prepared mustard, light corn syrup, hot dogs, tart apples
name: glazed apples n franks for 2

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus, pecorino cheese, butter, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper
name: buttered balsamic asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Place fish fillets in a greased 9x13 dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine butter, onion, fish, paprika, salt and pepper, water, sour cream and parsley, stir well. Pour over fish. Sprinkle with lime rind. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till flakes easy with fork.
ingredients: butter, onion, fish, paprika, salt and pepper, water, sour cream
name: fish with sour cream sauce

steps: In a small bowl, mix 1 tbsp of plain flour and 1 tsp of dried sage on a plate. Wash the chops and coat them in the flour and sage mixture. Melt the butter in a medium skillet. Add the olive oil and heat until hot. Add the pork chops, cook for 6 minutes moving occasionaly to avoid sticking. Turn over and cook for a further 6 minutes. Server with salad and baked potatoe.
ingredients: onions, fresh sage leaves, soft breadcrumbs, butter, salt and pepper
name: sage and onion stuffing

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: corn tortillas, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, scallions, jalapeno pepper, fresh cilantro
name: scallion quesadillas

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic powder and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the onion and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, tuna in water, garlic powder, cumin, salt, ground black pepper, onion, black olives, fresh parsley, tomato sauce
name: tuna with olive sauce

steps: Place the tea bags in a large bowl and pour the tea mixture on top. Place the tea bags in a large glass bowl and pour the tea mixture on top. Pour the tea mixture on top. Pour
ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, sugar, cranberry juice cocktail, dry white wine
name: pink sangria tea

steps: Put ice into a cup. Pour pineapple juice into cup with ice. Next, pour pineapple juice into cup, and stir. Then, pour pineapple juice into cup, and stir. Finally, pour pineapple juice into cup, and stir. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh pineapple, ice cubes, sugar, lemon juice
name: helado de pina pineapple ice

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, button mushrooms, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, sesame oil, soy sauce, red chili pepper flakes, salt
name: roasted green beans with mushrooms

steps: In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh spinach, tomatoes, water, salt & pepper, uncooked rice
name: spinach and rice

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the cream, onion, lemon juice, sour cream, fresh parsley, radishes, cooking oil, tortilla chips. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: black beans, onion, lemon juice, sour cream, fresh parsley, radishes, cooking oil, tortilla chips
name: black beans with cream

steps: Wash the fruits in cold water. Chop the fruits in a food processor and mix them in a mixing bowl. Drizzle with lemon juice and honey. Cover tightly and put in the refrigerator for 1-2 days. The fruits will soften and the flavors will blend. Can serve with cream or whipped cream.
ingredients: sultana, dried apricot, water, honey, lemon juice, coconut, powdered milk, desiccated coconut
name: dried apricot slice

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, curry powder, salt, pecan halves, mixed fruit
name: caribbean curried pecans

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: real butter, sugar, egg, milk, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder
name: wilton butter press cookies

steps: In a dutch oven, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Remove from the heat. Add tea bags. Steep for 5-8 minutes. Discard tea bags. Stir in juice concentrates and remaining water. Serve over ice.
ingredients: frozen sliced strawberries, frozen orange juice concentrate, crushed pineapple, mandarin oranges, lemon juice, bananas
name: fruit cups

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, orange zest, cinnamon, orange juice, and brown sugar. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: oranges, cranberries, sugar, ground cinnamon
name: cranberry orange sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt margarine in a skillet, cook turkey on the bbq or on a george forman grill-set aside. Slice turkey slices thin and saute in oil over medium-high heat until onions are soft and browned-set aside. Slice focaccacia bread into 2 sides - toast. Assemble sandwich. Cut in half and eat.
ingredients: mayonnaise, cilantro, fresh oregano, garlic, pepperoni, brie cheese, turkey slice, tomatoes, spinach leaves, avocado
name: smoked turkey avocado brie sandwiches

steps: Place all ingredients in rice cooker. Start cooking cycle. After cycle is complete, wait an additional 10 minutes to allow the polenta to absorb all the liquid. Stir well before serving. If you like firmer polenta, let it stand for 5 minutes prior to serving.
ingredients: cornmeal, gruyere, creme fraiche, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: creamy polenta

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: lard, white rice, garlic cloves, onion, tomatoes, taco seasoning, cayenne, chicken broth, tomato sauce, water
name: fluffster s spanish rice

steps: In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepperpreparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper
ingredients: brussels sprout, shallots, butter, apple cider vinegar, sugar, water, salt and pepper
name: sauteed brussels sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: golden grahams cereal, white chocolate wafers, cashew nuts, butter
name: clodhoppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place apple cinnamon cheerios over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: pretzel sticks, rice chex, apple cinnamon cheerios, caramels, water
name: caramel apple snack mix

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream and orange juice until blended. Chill until partially set. Fold in oranges. Pour into two 6 cup ring molds coated with cooking spray. Refrigerate overnight or until firm. Just before serving, unmold.
ingredients: sugar-free orange gelatin, boiling water, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, low-fat sour cream, orange zest, light whipped topping, graham cracker crust
name: velvety orange gelatin pie

steps: Sprinkle salt in bottom of crock. Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, sugar, spices, and lime juice. Daily, sprinkle just a little salt into crock and stir. On the 4th or 5th day, pack into hot sterile pint jars. Process in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, jalapenos, garlic cloves, lime, juice of, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper
name: katie s hot salsa

steps: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water, butter, salt, and cumin to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook, covered, until liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat. Add lime juice and cilantro. Fluff with a fork until combined. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, long grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth, salt, lime, juice and zest of, fresh cilantro
name: cilantro and lime rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: egg, milk, salt, cheddar cheese, bacon, onions, cream cheese, butter, flour
name: miniature bacon cheese quiche

steps: Mix cereal, pretzels and peanuts. Heat oleo, sugar and honey in saucepan, boil, stir and cook 5 minutes. Add vanilla. Pour cooked mixture over dry ingredients and stir. Bake at 250 for 1 hour stirring every 15 minutes.
ingredients: crispix cereal, miniature pretzel twists, pecan halves, butter, honey
name: honey glazed pretzel crisp mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Stir first three ingredients together. In another bowl whisk together the flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt. Regular salt will work as well. Mix wet and dry ingredients together and pour into a greased 9x9 square pan. Bake for 35 minutes at 350, until tester comes out clean.
ingredients: cooked sweet potato, vegetable oil, maple syrup, orange juice, salt, all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, cinnamon
name: sunset drop biscuits vegan

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, lemon juice, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon rinds, lemon
ingredients: pearl barley, lemons, juice of, lemon, honey, water
name: refreshing lemon barley water

steps: Place burrito meat in crock pot. Cover, and cook on low for 8 hours. When done, the meat should shred easily with a fork.
ingredients: chuck roast, taco seasoning, mexican-style diced tomatoes, mild chiles, onion
name: quick and easy crock pot burrito meat

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, curry powder, sharp cheddar cheese
name: broccoli cheddar cheese with chicken casserole

steps: Mix all ingredients except steak in a 13x9x2 inch glass baking dish. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least two hours, turning occasionally. Preheat grill or broiler to medium high heat. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on a platter and serve.
ingredients: sweet paprika, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, flank steaks
name: flank steak with smoked paprika rub

steps: Cream shortening and the sugars. Add egg and pineapple. Stir in vanilla. Sift flour, then measure it. To the flour, add salt, soda, and baking powder. Add dry mixture to the wet mixture. Drop by rounded tsps. Onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes at 350f, or until done.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, crushed pineapple, coconut
name: pineapple coconut drop soft cookies

steps: In a mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add in the eggs, buttermilk, melted butter, yogurt and vanilla and mix until smooth. Pour approximately cup of batter onto a preheated griddle. Cook for 8-10 minutes or the top is nice and bubbly. Turn and brown the other side. Serve with warm maple syrup.
ingredients: baking soda, flour, salt, skim milk, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, nonfat sour cream
name: dee s applesauce sour cream pancakes

steps: Melt chocolate and butter over low heat. Stir in sugar and salt. Gradually stir in cream. Cook and stir over medium heat for 3 - 4 minutes until mixture is thick and sugar is completely dissolved, stirring after 3 minutes. Stir in vanilla. Let cool before refrigerating.
ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, unsalted butter, whole milk, heavy whipping cream, granulated sugar, vanilla extract
name: hot fudge sauce
