steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, heavy cream, sour cream, dried beef, dried onion flakes, green pepper, pecans, unsalted butter, salt
name: chip beef dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sesame seeds, baking powder, paprika, salt, chicken thighs, butter
name: judith comfort s crispy oven fried chicken

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, just until the filling is warm, and the bread is lightly toasted.
ingredients: goat cheese, dijon mustard, whole wheat bread, tomatoes
name: open faced goat cheese sandwich

steps: Place cheese, mayonnaise, pimento stuffed olives, butter, flour, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Mix together the cheese, mayonnaise, pimento stuffed olives, butter, flour, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Mix together the cheese, mayonnaise, pimento stuffed olives, butter, flour, salt and
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, pimento stuffed olive, bread
name: cream cheese and olive party sandwiches

steps: Spray a nonstick skillet with non-fat cooking spray. On medium heat, saute onion and pepper for about 10 minutes. Stir in chopped broccoli. Pour in the lemon juice and wine. Add the tarragon. Cover and cook over low heat for about 15 minutes. Prepare tortellini according to package directions while veggies are cooking. Stir the olive oil and sun-dried tomatoes with the veggie mixture. Serve over prepared tortellini.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, bacon, cheese-filled egg tortellini, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese
name: balsamic tortellini

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add chicken, saute 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pan, keep warm. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in pan. Add onion, saute for 5 minutes or until browned. Add apple and marjoram, saute for 5 more minutes. Add the chicken and cider, bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until chicken is done.
ingredients: canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, golden delicious apple, shallots, dried thyme leaves, chicken broth, apple cider, salt, pepper
name: braised chicken and apples

steps: Heat oven to 425. Heat oven to 425. Place chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: roasting chickens, fat-free italian salad dressing, citrus ponzu soy sauce, extra virgin olive oil, baking potatoes
name: italian oven roasted whole chicken

steps: Place kebabs on a grill rack coated with cooking spray, and grill 2 minutes on each side or until kebabs are done.
ingredients: scallops, beer, garlic cloves, ground black pepper, chili flakes, onion, skewers
name: beer and scallop kebabs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. In large bowl, beat egg whites until slightly stiff. Gradually add sugar and cream of tartar and continue to beat. Add vanilla and salt and continue beating until whites stand in stiff peaks. Spray 9 x 9- inch glass baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Spread meringue over entire bottom and sides of dish to form a crust. Bake in 350 degrees fahrenheit oven for 45 minutes. Remove and cool. After crust has cooled, prepare pudding mix according to package directions and fold in sliced bananas. Pour pudding mixture into crust and sprinkle ground graham crackers on top. Chill and serve.
ingredients: nonfat milk, instant vanilla pudding, light whipped topping, firm banana, graham cracker crumbs
name: banana delight dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: white flour, whole wheat flour, salt, baking powder, canola oil, water
name: pipin hot bakery whole wheat tortillas

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large bowl, beat flour, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, vanilla, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, chocolate chips, dried strawberries
name: chocolate covered strawberry cookies

steps: In a large saucepan, combine beans and 6 cups of the water. Bring to a boil and reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. Drain and rinse beans. In slow cooker, combine smoked sausage, onion, carrot, basil, oregano, bay leaves. Stir in drained beans and remaining 6 cups of water. Cover and cook on low heat for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 4 to 5 hours. Discard bay leaves. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: smoked sausage, onion, olive oil, tomatoes, hot water, pasta shells, chicken bouillon cubes, kidney beans
name: italian smoked sausage bean soup

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in large frying pan. Cook onions until softened. Add peppers and cook until soft. Add tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Simmer on low for 10 minutes. Add to spaghetti.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell pepper, bananas, pineapple juice, oranges, juice of, limes, juice of, fresh cilantro, habanero peppers, cooked pasta
name: pasta from hell

steps: Heat oil in skillet on med, add onions, cook until soft. Add celery, cook until crisp tender. Increase heat to med hi, add peas. Cook until peas are heated through. Stir in celery leaves, salt and pepper.
ingredients: cauliflower, water, salt, frozen tiny peas, plain low-fat yogurt, garlic, ground turmeric, ground cumin, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper
name: low fat peas and cauliflower in spicy yellow yogurt sauce

steps: In a large bowl, whisk mayonnaise, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw mix, coleslaw
ingredients: cilantro, rice vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt, coleslaw
name: mexican coleslaw sans mayo

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: butter, yellow cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, seasoning salt, creamed corn, half-and-half, extra large egg
name: the ultimate fluffy cornbread

steps: Score honey mustard ham with mustard glaze crock pot
ingredients: ham, whole cloves, honey, spicy brown mustard, orange juice
name: baked honey mustard ham

steps: Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Add onion, basil, garlic and pepper flakes. Cook until onion is tender about 7 minutes. Add chicken and saute, stirring often. Mix in uncooked spinach. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Heat until spinach is heated through. Place fettucini in bowl and toss with some of pan dripping. Add chicken and toss with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: dungeness crab, fresh mushrooms, fresh spinach, fettuccine, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, heavy cream, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, lemon zest, salt and pepper
name: crab mushroom spinach fettuccine

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In medium bowl, combine eggs, butter or margarine, flour, garlic salt, parsley flakes and onion salt. Separate crescent dough into 4 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal. Cut each rectangle crosswise into 8 strips. Dip each strip in egg mixture. Coat with crushed onions. Place on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake in for 8 to 12 minutes until golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheets.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, corn oil, italian rolls, kosher salt, dried oregano, fresh parsley
name: bob chinn s garlic rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, blackberry jam, sweet milk, self rising flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: easy blackberry jam pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: potatoes, garlic cloves, butter, milk, salt and black pepper, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs
name: baked italian mashed potato casserole

steps: Spray 13 x 9 pan with cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut cinnamon rolls in half. Place in pan in 1 layer. Pour butter evenly over cinnamon. Pour ice cream evenly. Bake for 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Turn pan over onto serving platter.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, sugar, ground cinnamon, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla
name: tiny cinnamon rolls

steps: Place lime wedge on glass rim of 3 glasses to moisten them. Dip the rims into the salt to lightly coat the edges of the glasses. Place the glasses in the freezer to chill. Place the ice, water, limeade concentrate and lime juice in the container of a blender. Process until combined and slushy. Pour into the prepared glasses. Garnish each glass with a lime slice, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lime wedge, salt, tequila, fresh lime juice, triple sec, powdered sugar, ice
name: frosted margaritas

steps: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spoon into serving dishes. Cover and chill. Garnish with almonds. Prep time includes refrigeration time.
ingredients: amarula cream liqueur, ice cream, coffee, chocolate, chocolate syrup, cream, maraschino cherries
name: amarula finale

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Baste while baking and be careful that sauce does not burn.
ingredients: dry mustard, white wine vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, dried thyme, dried oregano, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: honey glazed chicken breasts

steps: Heat the oil in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the mushrooms, flat side down, and cook until the underside is browned, about 4 minutes. Turn the mushroom an cook until tender, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and season with salt and pepper. Wipe out the skillet with moist paper towels. Add the butter and melt over medium heat. Placed the mushroom cap on one slice of bread, spread with the pesto, and sprinkle with the cheese. Top with the remaining bread and place the sandwich in the skillet. Cook, turning once, until both sides of the sandwich are golden brown, about 5 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: portabella mushrooms, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, green onions, red bell peppers, eggs, egg substitute
name: grilled portobello omelette

steps: In a small bowl, cream together the peanut butter, butter, and cream cheese with an electric mixer on medium-low speed until smooth and light. Blend in the vanilla. Beat in the sugar, a little at a time, until smooth and of desired spreading consistency. Gently fold in the oreos. Use frosting as desired.
ingredients: peanut butter, butter, crisco, vanilla, salt, powdered sugar, heavy cream
name: peanut butter frosting extra rich

steps: In a medium saucepan, cook the chicken pieces, madras curry powder, salt, egg, cream, flour, sesame seeds, butter. Add the chicken pieces, madras curry powder, salt, egg, cream, flour, sesame seeds, butter. Add the
ingredients: chicken pieces, madras curry powder, salt, egg, cream, flour, sesame seeds, butter
name: chicken mombasa

steps: Sprinkle sardine fillets over the eggs. Bake for 20 minutes, until eggs are set.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, sardine fillets, onions, ketchup, mayonnaise, pimientos
name: sardine stuffed eggs huevos picantes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, milk, ground beef, eggs, onion, salt, pepper, sage
name: snow top meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: tiny new potatoes, onion, bell pepper, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: roasted potatoes and peppers

steps: Heat grill to medium high. In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: plain yogurt, fresh parsley, lemon juice, paprika, garlic, salt, beef steaks, mayonnaise
name: grilled steak with garlic yogurt marinade

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Slice cheese stacks in half and scoop out inside pulp. Combine cheese stacks with cream cheese and garlic. Mix with a mixer for several minutes until smooth. Place mixture in a small bowl and sprinkle with fresh ground pepper. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream cheese with tomato and basil, provolone cheese, garlic & herb spreadable cheese, swiss cheese, dill dip, colby-monterey jack cheese, crackers
name: cheese stacks

steps: Combine walnut pieces, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, iceberg lettuce, roquefort cheese, avocado, roma tomato. Cover and let stand 10 minutes. Refrigerate unused portion.
ingredients: walnut pieces, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, iceberg lettuce, roquefort cheese, avocado, roma tomato
name: french wedge

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice.
ingredients: pork side ribs, meat tenderizer, onion, fresh garlic, barbecue sauce, ketchup, prepared yellow mustard, honey, brown sugar, cayenne pepper
name: so easy fall off the bone ribs

steps: Preheat a lightly-oiled or sprayed, non-stick waffle iron. In a medium bowl mix together the ingredients well. Pack half of the mixture into the hot waffle iron. Allow to cook 10-12 minutes, or till well-browned and crispy. Serve immediately and repeat with the second half of the batter. Serve with ketchup or applesauce.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, sweet white onion, yellow squash, mushroom, salt and pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh spinach, eggs
name: paleo breakfast veggie hash with eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix chile peppers and cream cheese. Stir in chopped turkey. Place the rolled tortillas, seam-side down, in single layer in the prepared baking dish. In a medium bowl, combine the salsa and beans. Spoon the mixture over the enchiladas. Sprinkle the top with cheese. Bake 20 minutes or til bubbly and lightly browned.
ingredients: brown rice, taco seasoning, enchilada sauce, corn tortillas, pinto beans, green onions, cheddar cheese, canned diced green chiles, fritos corn chips
name: enchilada bake

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: smart balance butter spread, fresh shiitake mushrooms, shallot, garlic clove, fresh green beans, lemon juice, white wine, salt and pepper
name: lemony green beans with shiitake mushrooms

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the spice rub. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a 12 inch skillet, over relatively high heat, and brown pork, turning every 30 seconds for 4 minutes. Stir together brown sugar, garlic, and tabasco and pat onto top of the tenderloin. Place pork in roasting pan and cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, salt, ground cumin, chili powder, ground coriander, cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, ground cinnamon, brown sugar
name: barbados pork roast

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges.
ingredients: onions, butter, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, thin pizza crust, roasted garlic, blue cheese, sun-dried tomatoes
name: blue cheese and caramelised onion pizza

steps: Heat oil in l skillet over medium high heat until oil is shimmering and then add the orzo. Toast, stirring frequently, until it starts to turn golden brown. Stir in broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until orzo is tender and broth is absorbed. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Uncover and stir in butter, salt, peper and parsley.
ingredients: orzo pasta, fat free chicken broth, olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, boneless skinless chicken breast, salt & pepper, fresh parsley, frozen spinach, parmesan cheese
name: weeknight orzo dinner

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread peaches in a well greased 13x9 baking dish. Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, beating until a batter forms. Pour over peaches. Drizzle margarine over top of mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving.
ingredients: fresh peaches, granulated sugar, orange juice concentrate, peach jam, fresh peach, triple sec, brandy
name: fresh peach sauce

steps: Boil potatoes for 20 minutes. In the meantime mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl. Peel potatoes and chop into bite size pieces. Add chopped potatoes to mixture in bowl and carefully combine until everything is mixed up. Either chill in fridge or serve at once.
ingredients: potatoes, celery, red onion, hard-cooked eggs, sweet pickles, sweet pickle juice, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt, ground black pepper
name: summertime potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Blend cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, eggs, vegetable oil, water, nonstick cooking spray, powdered sugar, lemon juice
name: lemon velvet cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake potatoes for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, gorgonzola, pecans, extra virgin olive oil, baby arugula, salt and pepper
name: crushed heirloom potatoes

steps: Combine lemon juice, soy sauce, pickled ginger, red pepper flakes, fresh ahi tuna, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds, sesame seeds
ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, wasabi paste, pickled ginger, red pepper flakes, fresh ahi tuna
name: the cat s meow dipping sauce for seared ahi

steps: In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in drippings for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: olive oil, bacon, garlic cloves, dried chili pepper flakes, white wine, pasta, water, passata, ricotta cheese, flat leaf parsley
name: one pot pasta with bacon tomato and ricotta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake in 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, olive oil, chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, mixed vegetables, shredded cheddar cheese
name: super easy chicken casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg yolks, flour, baking powder, chocolate shavings, nuts, egg whites
name: chocolate nut bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain chicken according to package directions. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned. Sprinkle with flour and stir while cooking for 1 more minute. Reduce heat, slowly add the milk and cook for about 5 minutes or until milk is slightly thickened. Remove from heat, add one cup cheese, corn, salsa and green chilies. Add in hot pasta and mix well. Place in lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, green chili peppers, provolone cheese, eggs
name: southwest stuffed chicken breasts

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the eggs. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: eggplant, cumin, garlic clove, olive oil, lemon, salt, black pepper, fresh coriander
name: zahluk tunesian and moroccan eggplant puree spread

steps: Put butter on one side of each piece of bread. Put bacon on the other side of each sandwich and top with bacon. Spread cheese mixture evenly on each sandwich and top with bacon. Spread cheese mixture
ingredients: bread, butter, bacon, american cheese, tomatoes
name: grilled b c t

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomatoes, parsley, dried basil, dried oregano, cannellini beans, salt, pepper, pasta
name: pasta and white beans in light tomato sauce

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8-10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: ground chicken, lemongrass, garlic cloves, spring onions, lime juice, coriander leaves, sweet chili sauce, fish sauce, egg, coconut milk
name: baked thai chicken cakes

steps: Whisk together 2 vinegars, shallot, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil until blended. Add the yellow pear and cherry tomatoes and toss. Add fresh basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning.
ingredients: sherry wine vinegar, shallot, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, yellow pear tomatoes, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves
name: yellow pear and cherry tomato salad

steps: In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, and celery. Stir and cook until potatoes are soft. Add liquefied potatoes, cooked cream corn, bay leaf, and paprika, stir. Add green onions, stir.
ingredients: russet potatoes, water, onions, bay leaf, half-and-half, salt, pepper, butter, smoked sausage
name: irish potato soup

steps: Heat oil in large pot or dutch oven over medium heat. Add onion, and cook 10 to 15 minutes, or until soft and beginning to brown. Add garlic, and cook 1 minute, or until fragrant. Stir in kale and 2 cups water. Cover, and cook 30 minutes, or until kale is tender. Season with salt and pepper. If making ahead, cool, and store in airtight container. Just before serving, reheat kale mixture, then drizzle with vinegar, and sprinkle with almonds.
ingredients: apple cider vinegar, salt, olive oil, kale
name: kale chips

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place bread on pan and put into oven for approximately 6 minutes leave oven on. Remove from oven and let bread cool slightly. Then add to food processor along with spices ground until desired consistantcy. Return crumbs to oven, spreading evenly, for approximately 5-6 minutes. Or until lightly toasted. Add parmesan cheese and stir until evenly mixed.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, all-purpose flour, ground cumin, ground pepper
name: lacy parmesan crisps

steps: Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: hass avocadoes, lime, juice of, red onion, tomatoes, garlic clove, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, ground cumin, kosher salt, black pepper
name: guac and roll

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add cumin seeds, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until just tender, about 3-5 minutes. Add cayenne pepper, bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium. Cover. Cook 4 minutes. Remove from heat
ingredients: peanut oil, whole cumin seed, brown mustard seeds, sugar snap pea, salt, fresh thyme, cayenne pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh lemon juice
name: sugar snap peas with cumin and thyme

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: white fish fillets, onion, garlic, fresh ginger, fresh lemon rind, tamarind paste, light soy sauce, peanut oil
name: baked fish with spices

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: rice, milk, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, butter, celery, onion, frozen broccoli, salt
name: eleanor s broccoli rice supreme

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry tomatoes until tender, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put feta cheese in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until feta cheese is soft. Add feta cheese and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until feta cheese is soft. Serve feta cheese with onions on top.
ingredients: dry lentils, sun-dried tomato, sun-dried tomato olive oil, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dried thyme, feta cheese
name: lentils with sun dried tomatoes and feta

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, sugar, instant coffee, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt
name: world s best and easiest brownies

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, shallots, fresh garlic cloves, asparagus spears, artichoke hearts, butter, white wine, olive oil
name: bow tie pasta and veggie scampi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: vanilla cake mix, butter, cream cheese, condensed milk, chocolate candy bars
name: lunch box cheese cakes

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, turn to coat. Place in the refrigerator and marinate 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill to desired doneness, about 6 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on platter and serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, ground black pepper, flank steaks
name: easy marinated flank steak

steps: In a small bowl whisk together first five ingredients and set aside. Crush tuna with a motar and pestle, then spread evenly in a pie plate. Coat the tuna steaks with the crushed seeds. In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: tuna steaks, soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, vegetable oil
name: broiled tuna teriyaki

steps: In medium mixing bowl combine chicken, green leaf lettuce, purple cabbage, carrot, celery, red pepper, snap peas, bean sprouts, asian-style dressing, wonton wrapper. Mix mayo, yogurt, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Toss to mix. Refrigerate salad for 1-2 hours. Split croissants and divide chicken evenly. Sprinkle with black pepper before serving.
ingredients: cooked chicken, green leaf lettuce, purple cabbage, carrot, celery, red pepper, snap peas, bean sprouts, asian-style dressing, wonton wrapper
name: dulcet s chinese chicken salad

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedgepreparation:Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together
ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, garlic cloves, chili powder, lime juice, tequila, salt and pepper
name: chili lime grilled chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake muffins for 12-15 minutes or until muffins are lightly browned and seem set to the touch. Remove from muffin pan immediately and allow to cook on rack. Store in refrigerator.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, flax seed, water, soymilk, canola oil, sugar, vanilla extract
name: flaxjacks

steps: In a large serving bowl put the mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, avocado, red onion, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro, fresh cilantro
ingredients: sun-dried tomato vinaigrette dressing, black beans, cumin, fresh corn kernels, smoked mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, avocado, red onion, fresh cilantro
name: black bean mozzarella salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Toss corn and oil to coat and spread out on a large baking sheet. Bake, stirring once, until some kernels begin to brown, about 20 minute. Combine garlic, rosemary, and beef. Brown beef on all sides, then add shallot, red wine vinegar, and balsamic vinegar. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove beef with tongs and place in a bowl quickly saut arugula in remaining juices for approximately 5 seconds. Remove beef with tongs and place in a bowl quickly saut arugula in remaining juices
ingredients: champagne vinegar, shallot, salt & freshly ground black pepper, white corn, extra virgin olive oil, arugula, cherry tomatoes
name: arugula fresh corn and tomato salad

steps: Place the eggplants in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the eggplants are tender. Drain the eggplants, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the eggplants into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature.
ingredients: eggplants, lemon, juice of, olive oil, garlic cloves, black-eyed peas, sugar, salt and pepper
name: ethiopian eggplant salad

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make lavender hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: whole milk, dried lavender, bittersweet chocolate, dutch-processed cocoa powder, sugar, kosher salt, pure vanilla extract
name: lavender hot chocolate

steps: Place the croissants in a large frying pan over medium to high heat. Fry on one side until golden, turn over and fry the other side until golden, about two minutes per side. Fry on one side until golden, turn over and fry the other side until golden, about two minutes per
ingredients: croissants, heavy cream, milk, eggs, grand marnier, sugar, cinnamon, orange zest, sliced almonds, dried tart cherry
name: christmas morning french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean.
ingredients: bananas, egg, oil, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, flour, twix candy bar
name: twix n banana muffins

steps: Cook orzo in salted water 12 min, to al dente. Drain well, but do not rinse. Transfer to a serving bowl. Drizzle with oil, and season with salt and pepper. Toss with zest and parsley, and serve.
ingredients: salt, orzo pasta, butter, parmesan cheese, lemon zest, lemon juice, fresh parsley
name: orzo with lemon and parsley

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the first five ingredients. Mix well. Transfer to a greased 9-inch square baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 40-45 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: hot dog, butter, condensed tomato soup, brown sugar, water, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, onion, green bell pepper
name: jazzed up saucy franks hot dogs

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. Mix 2 tbls sugar with the cinnamon in small bowl and set aside. Mix remaining ingredients to a soft dough. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls into cinnamon-sugar mixture. Shape each into a ball. Place on baking sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: butter, sugar, currants, plain flour, desiccated coconut, baking powder
name: korendekager currant biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place chopped cornstarch in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add eggs and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: cornstarch, coconut, sugar, egg, salt, margarine
name: sequilhos de coco coconut and cornstarch cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour
name: buttery pound cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, egg yolks, half-and-half cream, fresh lemon juice, yellow food coloring, butter, lemon rind
name: lemon meringue pie filling microwave

steps: Cook the linguini according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, melt the butter over medium high heat. Add the mushrooms and cook until softened and browned, about 10 minutes. Add the garlic and saute 2 minutes more. Add the sage and saute 2 minutes more. Add salt and fresh ground black pepper to taste, stir, and remove from heat. Drain the cooked pasta and pour into a large pasta bowl. Add the 2 tablespoons of olive oil and toss. Add the mushroom mixture and toss again. Season with more salt and pepper if needed. Top with the grated parmesan cheese and offer more to pass at the table. Serve immediately.
ingredients: linguine, onion, olive oil, asparagus, cream, prosciutto, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: linguini with prosciutto and asparagus

steps: In a large bowl, combine flour, cheese, sugar, both powders, and italian seasoning. In a medium bowl, add milk, oil, and egg, mixing well. Stir into wet bowl into dry bowl, until moistened. Pour into a greased 9x5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted near centre comes out clean. When you remove from oven, spread margarine over top with paper towel. Cool for 10 minutes in pan. Remove to wire rack and cool for 10 more minutes, then enjoy.
ingredients: low-carb bread, mayonnaise, garlic, parmesan cheese, pine nuts, red pepper flakes
name: low carb garlic cheesebread yes low carb

steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water to cover. Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 8-10 minutes, depending on the size of the potatoes cubes. Meanwhile, fry bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned and crisp. Remove bacon from the skillet to drain on paper towels. Add the potatoes to the bacon grease in the skillet and fry until tender, stirring often. Drain excess grease. When the potatoes are done, drain the water out of pot and mash. Mix in the buttermilk until you get your desired consistency. Crumble in the bacon and stir in the onions. You can also stir in between 1-2 tablespoons of the bacon grease if you like. Mix together and serve.
ingredients: bacon, onions, potatoes, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, butter, spring onion
name: slow cooked bacon cheese potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13x9 inch baking dish. Combine mushroom soup, milk, chopped onion and mustard in medium bowl until well blended. Spread sauerkraut in prepared baking dish. Top with noodles. Spoon soup mixture evenly over noodles. Cover with sausage. Top with shredded swiss. Combine bread crumbs and butter in a small bowl. Sprinkle over swiss. Cover dish tightly with foil. Bake until noodles are tender, about 1 hour.
ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, onion, sauerkraut, kielbasa, breadcrumbs, milk, mustard, noodles, swiss cheese, butter
name: polish reuben casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Combine butter and shortening in large bowl. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan.
ingredients: real butter, sugar, eggs, flour, milk, flavoring
name: best ever butter pound cake

steps: Place ham in crock pot, cover and bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sweet onion, garlic, cabbage, ham, potatoes, white wine, dried parsley, salt and pepper
name: leftover ham cabbage casserole

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: boneless pork chop, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup, water, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, cooked rice
name: 20 minute pork chops mornay

steps: Combine cranberries, water, sugar, pecans, bananas, fruit cocktail in light syrup, whipping cream, vanilla. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip.
ingredients: cranberries, water, sugar, pecans, bananas, fruit cocktail in light syrup, whipping cream, vanilla
name: cranberry salad a k a thanksgiving pink stuff

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla, grand marnier, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, quick oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: mike s grand marnier chocolate chip cookies

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except cheese and breadcrumbs. Once mixed, add cheese and breadcrumbs, mix until even. Coat a roasting pan or high sided pan with extra virgin olive oil. Roll meat mixture into balls about the size of a golfball and line oiled pan with them. Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes or until done.
ingredients: bread, ground beef, eggs, garlic cloves, pecorino cheese, fresh italian parsley, salt, pepper, olive oil
name: marios meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours.
ingredients: chocolate cookie pie crust, vanilla ice cream, caramel topping, hot fudge topping, pecans, whipped topping
name: hot fudge caramel ice cream pie

steps: Heat oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them
ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, hungarian paprika, potatoes, green pepper, tomatoes, salt and pepper, water
name: hungarian paprika potatoes paprikas krumpli

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve with a swirl of cream and chopped mint.
ingredients: butter, leeks, frozen peas, fresh spinach, chicken stock, dried savory, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plain yogurt
name: spinach and pea soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: strawberries, red food coloring, sugar, 9-inch baked pie crust, cornstarch, sweetened whipped cream, water
name: glazed fresh strawberry pie

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, water, salt, eggs, orange extract, orange zest, orange liqueur, chocolate curls, orange rind twists
name: orange scented chocolate mousse

steps: Spray a non-stick 9 or 10 inch omelet pan with cooking spray. Place over medium high heat, add butter. When butter is melted add the prepared vegetables and basil. Cook stirring often just until spinach is wilted. Whisk together the eggs and ricotta cheese. Pour egg mixture over cooked vegetables, cook until almost set, lifting edges frequently to allow uncooked portions to run to bottom of pan. When almost set, reduce heat, cover and allow to cook covered for 1 to 2 minutes. Invert onto a large plate and slip back into pan to finish cooking, top with grated parmesan cheese. Cut in half and serve on warmed plates.
ingredients: frozen peas, ricotta cheese, lemon juice, mint, baby spinach leaves
name: pea ricotta mint and spinach sandwich filling

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out
ingredients: sesame seeds, sunflower seeds, coconut, nuts, sultana, butter, honey, sugar
name: new zealand birdseed bar

steps: Place the couscous in a large bowl. Bring 2 cups of lightly salted water to a boil. Pour the water over couscous and cover with plastic wrap. Let sit for 10 min. Uncover and fluff with a fork. Meanwhile heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and zucchini and cook until lightly browned. Add the zucchini and onion, along with the remaining ingredients to the couscous and mix well. Season with aditional salt and freshly ground pepper if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, red bell peppers, dried thyme, salt, fresh black pepper, vegetable broth, couscous
name: red bell pepper couscous

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a small bowl combine the french baguette, cream cheese spread, pesto sauce, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, marinated artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: french baguette, cream cheese spread, pesto sauce, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, marinated artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, baby spinach leaves
name: antipasto loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an oven safe serving dish with non-stick cooking spray. Using an electric mixer, blend the cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in green chilies, jalapeno peppers, and mexican and mozzarella cheeses. Spoon this mixture into the prepared baking dish. Mix together the panko and parmesan cheese and sprinkle it over the cream cheese mixture. Spray the panko and parmesan with a quick spray of non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and the topping is lightly browned.
ingredients: jalapeno peppers, hot sauce, butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, celery rib, monterey jack cheese, blue cheese
name: buffalo chicken jalapeno poppers

steps: Heat oven to 350 c. Place tuna in casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: tuna in water, frozen artichoke heart, light mayonnaise, garlic salt, dill pickle relish, ground black pepper, cheese, whole wheat english muffins
name: tuna artichoke melts

steps: Cook beans in a large pot of salted water until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain and transfer to a bowl. While the beans are boiling, cook bacon in a large pot of salted water until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain bacon on paper towels. Add mayonnaise to skillet and saute 30 seconds. Remove from heat and cool slightly. Stir vinegar into shallot mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Pour dressing over green beans and toss until coated. Crumble bacon over.
ingredients: sugar, white vinegar, mayonnaise, onions, green beans, bacon
name: marilyn s special green beans

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: spinach fettuccine, extra virgin olive oil, bell peppers, onions, garlic cloves, medium shrimp, cayenne pepper
name: garlicky peppers and shrimp

steps: Place tomato sauce in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: cheese tortellini, italian-style diced tomatoes, alfredo sauce, cooked chicken
name: creamy chicken tomato tortellini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, long grain rice, cornstarch, cold water, boneless skinless chicken breast, canola oil, orange marmalade, dried apricot, chinese five spice powder, reduced sodium soy sauce
name: apricot orange chicken

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, green onions, feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, fresh tomatoes
name: awesome bow tie pasta salad

steps: Melt lime juice, salt, cayenne pepper, pork chops, onion powder. Add pork chops to marinade. Cover and bake for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning
ingredients: lime juice, salt, cayenne pepper, pork chops, onion
name: chops and onions

steps: In a large pot, combine broth, cauliflower, carrots, and onions. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 7 to 10 minutes, until vegetables are tender. Puree in a blender or food processor. Return to pan. Add milk and heat thoroughly, but do not boil. Stir in nutmeg and pepper.
ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower, onion, garlic clove, vegetable stock, potatoes, celery, dried marjoram, reduced-fat milk, fresh parsley
name: low fat broccoli and cauliflower soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325c. Butter 20cm square cake tin. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, unsweetened chocolate squares, sugar, eggs, flour, vanilla, salt, nuts
name: brownies fudgy style

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more.
ingredients: russet potatoes, kosher salt, mayonnaise, dill relish, eggs, celery ribs, prepared mustard, fresh ground black pepper
name: old fashioned potato salad adapted from a recipe courtesy of bob

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter the sides and bottom of a 10-inch springform pan and set aside. In the top of a double boiler, combine the butter, chocolate and coffee and melt slowly, stirring occasionally, until smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar and vanilla until frothy. Whisk the eggs into the melted chocolate until combined. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour and cool on a wire rack until it reaches room temperature. Remove the sides of the pan, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight, before serving.
ingredients: soy flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, egg, vegetable oil, splenda sugar substitute, baking soda, vanilla, salt, sour cream, strawberry
name: easy diabetic chocolate cake

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add spinach and cook and stir until wilted. Stir in the coconut and finely chopped peanuts. Heat through. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: millet, dried apricot, vegetable stock, lemon, juice of, salt & pepper, baby spinach leaves, pine nuts
name: millet with spinach and pine nuts

steps: Combine first 6 ingredients in a shallow bowl. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs, coating well. In 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish, arrange chicken. Bake uncovered 20 minutes. Pour pasta sauce over chicken, then bread crumbs, coating well. In 13 x 9-inch glass
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, egg, milk, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, lemon pepper seasoning
name: parmesan breaded chicken strips

steps: Combine blue cheese, coleslaw mix, black pepper, mustard, sea salt, ground black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper
ingredients: walnut pieces, apple, ranch salad dressing, blue cheese, coleslaw mix, black pepper
name: blue cheese ranch walnut and apple cole slaw

steps: Preheat oven to 375f in a large bowl, gently toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. Set aside. In a medium bowl, toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. In a medium bowl, toss together berries, sugar and flour then transfer to an
ingredients: blackberries, blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, pure maple syrup, pecans, walnuts, pitted dates, ground cinnamon
name: raw mixed berry crisp

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Spread both cans drained peaches into the baking pan. Mix together flour, white and brown sugar, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon in a large bowl until well combined. Add in cold butter pieces and mix until the consistancy of peas. Sprinkle the crumbs over the peaches in the baking dish. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. Cool slightly then serve warm with ice cream.
ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, egg, butter, vanilla ice cream, cinnamon
name: fresh peach cobbler with cinnamon ice cream

steps: Saute the green chile in the oil until tender. Add the chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until well blended.
ingredients: rump roast, onion, taco seasoning mix, dried oregano leaves, garlic powder, diced green chilies, tomato sauce
name: crock pot green chile burrito taco filling

steps: Place cabbage and ham in casserole and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Remove from casserole and set aside. Add chicken to casserole and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Add chicken to casserole and cook until tender
ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, cooked chicken, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, evaporated milk, colby cheese, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: chicken ham casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: cream of celery soup, water, butter, kielbasa, long grain rice, sliced mushrooms, frozen peas, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper
name: cheesy kielbasa and peas skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: granulated sugar, milk, clove, eggs, flour, butter, cinnamon
name: amish bob andy pie

steps: In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, passata, anchovy fillets, pitted black olives, capers, black pepper
name: sicilian tomato sauce

steps: Whip butter with mixer. Continue mixing at low speed and add 1 cup powdered sugar, walnuts, then the flour, a few tablespoons at a time. Add vanilla. Drop cookie batter, by teaspoonfull quantities, on ungreased cookie sheet. The dough is fairly stiff so just roll the dough in little balls and then press down with a glass to shape. Bake 15-20 minutes at 350. Remove from pan. Sprinkle with a little powdered sugar.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, flour, vanilla, pecans
name: butter finger cookies

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, dijon mustard, shallot, garlic clove, fresh parsley, red wine vinegar, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: string beans in vinaigrette sauce

steps: Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Toss occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Season with salt
ingredients: frozen corn, boiling potatoes, white wine vinegar, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil, red onion, cherry tomatoes
name: potato corn and tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Set the salmon on a foil-lined baking sheet skin side down. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the honey mustard and 1 teaspoon of the thyme. In another small bowl, mix the panko with the remaining 1 teaspoon of thyme, 4 teaspoons of olive oil, parsley, and paprika. Add salt and pepper. Using a small spoon, spread the mustard mixture on the salmon. Top with the bread crumb mixture. Roast the salmon for 12-14 minutes or until it is almost completely firm to the touch and flakes when poked with a fork. Serve at once.
ingredients: salmon, onion, lemon, juice of, eggs, matzo meal, parsley, salt and pepper, sour cream
name: dee berger s grandmother s salmon loaf

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Stir together the butter, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, black pepper, hot sauce, garlic and salt. Pour half of mixture into a large baking dish or pan. Layer half the shrimp over the sauce and top shrimp with half the lemon slices. Form another layer with remaining shrimp and lemon slices and pour remaining sauce over the top. Bake uncovered for about 20 minutes, stirring mixture twice, until shrimp are pink. Pour off sauce into individual serving dishes. Serve with shrimp and plenty of bread for sopping up the spicy butter sauce.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, shrimp, whipping cream, garlic, black pepper, madeira wine
name: cajun ponchartrain sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Mix the butter and margarine together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: butter, light muscovado sugar, eggs, bananas, pecans, raisins, buttermilk, plain flour, bicarbonate of soda, icing sugar
name: banana loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees farenheit. In large bowl, beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add sour cream, lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, ready-made pie crust, cream of tartar, sugar
name: creamy lemon meringue pie

steps: Thaw berries according to package directions. Peel, pit and crush peaches. Measure thawed berries and add enough crushed peaches to make 4 cups fruit. Place in kettle, add lemon juice and sugar, mixing throughly. Bring to a full rolling boil over high heat and let boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, add pectin, stirring vigorously. Stir and skim alternately for about 5 minutes. Ladle quickly into hot sterilized jars. Seal 5 minutes in boiling water bath using 2 piece lids.
ingredients: rhubarb, water, sugar, lemon juice, peach pie filling, peach jell-o
name: peach rhubarb jam

steps: Cook fettuccine as directed on package. Drain well and return the pasta to the pot. Add the cream and mustard to the pasta in the pot. Cook over medium heat, mixing well, about 2 minutes or until hot. Add chicken and red peppers and heat through.
ingredients: fresh fettuccine, broccoli florets, fat-free honey-dijon salad dressing, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, garlic, cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, ground pepper
name: ww dijon chicken fettuccine

steps: In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onions, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy.
ingredients: unsalted butter, yellow onions, flour, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken stock, heavy cream
name: ina gartens homemade gravy

steps: Combine the icing sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add butter and milk. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan.
ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, milk, butter, chocolate squares, salt, vanilla
name: grandma s creamy fudge icing

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: corned beef brisket, french bread, baby swiss cheese, sauerkraut, thousand island dressing, olive oil
name: toasted reuben sub sandwich

steps: In a double-boiler melt chocolate. Remove from heat and add the condensed milk, vanilla, salt, and nuts. Stir until smooth. Turn into wax paper lined 8 inch square pan and chill in fridge. Store in cool place in an airtight container.
ingredients: condensed milk, sugar, butter, vanilla essence
name: microwave fudge

steps: Melt the butter in a pot. Take off the heat and add golden syrup. Stir until golden syrup is dissolved. Stir in sugar, rolled oats and flour. In a small bowl or cup, dissolve baking soda in water and add to mixture. Mix evenly. Put teaspoon lots onto a greased oven tray. Bake at 170 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: yeast, water, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baking powder, sugar, solid shortening, buttermilk
name: basic biscuits from paula deen

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Saut chicken portions in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and put in a casserole dish. Heat remaining oil. Add onion and garlic, and cook for 3 minutes. Add peppers and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add tinned tomatoes and herbs and simmer for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over the chicken and bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, red wine vinegar, roasted red peppers, parmesan cheese, parsley sprig
name: chicken with roasted red pepper sauce

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the bacon, celery, onion, water, black-eyed peas, long-grain rice, fresh parsley, dried thyme, celery leaves. Cook over medium-high heat 35 to 45 minutes or until tender. Remove and discard. Add greens, seasoned salt, and remining ingredients. Remove and
ingredients: bacon, celery, onion, water, black-eyed peas, long-grain rice, fresh parsley, dried thyme, celery leaves
name: quick hoppin john

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, dark chocolate, granulated sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, jack daniels whiskey, pecan halves
name: jack daniel s chocolate pecan torte

steps: In a large bowl, combine salad dressing, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots, parmesan cheese
ingredients: salad dressing, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, parmesan cheese, sugar, onion, bacon, cauliflower, broccoli, baby carrots
name: cauliflower summer salad

steps: Heat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Place tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: olive, monterey jack cheese, salsa, cilantro, green onions, flour tortillas, cooking spray, cooked chicken, sour cream
name: quesadillas the pampered chef

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Stir in coconut. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool.
ingredients: cake mix, eggs, water, crisco, chocolate chips
name: cake mix cookie bars

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. And line a baking sheet with foil. Lightly coat foil with nonstick cooking spray. On a floured board roll out pizza crust into an 15x11-inch rectangle. Divide into four equal pieces and lay one slice of cheese on each section of crust. Top each with equal amounts of chilies and chicken strips. Starting at long end of dough, roll up each piece tucking and sealing ends. On a piece of wax paper mix tortilla chips and taco seasoning. Brush rolls with melted butter and roll in crushed chips mixture, pressing to adhere. Transfer to prepared baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Meanwhile, in a small bowl mix salsa and ranch dressing. Remove from oven and serve with salsa mixture for dipping.
ingredients: onion, shortening, tomatoes, kernel corn, chili with beans, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese
name: mexicalli casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Drain artichokes in colander and rinse a bit to remove brine. Mix gently with garlic and olive oil in a bowl.
