Pour artichoke mixture in a metal roasting pan and roast for about one hour, tossing a few times if desired. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, and add lemon juice and butter.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, cream cheese, garlic clove, artichoke hearts, roasted red pepper, crackers
name: roasted pepper and artichoke spread

steps: Toast bread and crumble finely. Combine crumbs with sausage and sage. Form into balls about the size of golfballs. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes. Drain and set aside. In saucepan, heat applesauce and red hots until candy is melted completely. Add sauce to sausage balls and keep warm in a fondue pot or crockpot. Serve with toothpicks.
ingredients: soft breadcrumbs, apple, dried sage, black pepper, salt, paprika, ground red pepper, ground nutmeg, lean ground turkey, nonstick spray coating
name: homemade turkey apple sausage

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese, hot pepper flakes, salt and pepper
name: spaghetti with fresh tomato and basil sauce

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top.
ingredients: red kidney beans, coconut milk, garlic clove, salt & pepper, rice, onion, meat
name: belizean traditional beans and rice

steps: In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: of fresh mint, peppermint tea bags, boiling water, apple juice, fresh lime juice, apple
name: applemint iced tea

steps: In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the beans, broth, salsa, and cumin. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat bean mixture in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions.
ingredients: black beans, red onion, green bell pepper, mexicorn, cider vinegar, brown sugar, water
name: traci s black bean salsa

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Add butter, onion, cherry tomatoes, curry powder, chickpeas, lemon, sugar, water, salt and black pepper. Stir until blended. Cook about five minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, onion, cherry tomatoes, curry powder, chickpeas, lemon, sugar, water, salt and black pepper
name: bombay spiced chickpeas tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: applesauce, lemon juice, lemon, rind of, light brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, butter, salt, pie shells, sweetened whipped cream
name: marlborough pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper. Add pecans and toss well. Drizzle honey and oil over spiced nuts and mix well so they are evenly coated. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar.
ingredients: pecans, honey, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, sea salt
name: caramelized pecans raw foods

steps: Add 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and 1/2 cup of guinness stout and
ingredients: bananas, guinness stout, brown sugar, cream
name: bob s bananas in guinness cream

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together cranberries, orange marmalade, water, cinnamon-swirl bread, eggs, whole milk, granulated sugar, pure vanilla extract, caramel sauce, caramel-swirl ice cream. In a small saucepan, heat the milk with the butter just until steaming. Gradually whisk into the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream. Pour over the bread mixture. Let stand for 5 minutes. Press gently to moisten the bread evenly. Sprinkle with cinnamon to taste. Bake at 350 degrees f for about 30 minutes or just until puffed and a knife inserted in the centre comes out clean. Broil for about 2 minutes or until golden and crusty.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, orange marmalade, water, cinnamon-swirl bread, eggs, whole milk, granulated sugar, pure vanilla extract, caramel sauce, caramel-swirl ice cream
name: cranberry bread pudding with caramel ice cream

steps: Spread the can of pineapple on the bottom of a large cake pan. Open 1 bag of pineapple and pour over pineapple. Open 1 bag cake mix and pour over cake mix. Srinkle brown sugar over mixture and then pour butter over mix. Pop in 350 oven for 45 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, yellow cake mix, blueberries, sugar, butter, pecans
name: easy pineapple blueberry crunch dump cake

steps: Whisk together sesame oil, soy sauce, rice vinegar, honey and ginger in a medium bowl until the sesame oil is dissolved. Place salmon in a zip bag and add 3 tablespoons of the sauce and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Preheat broiler and spray a baking dish with cooking spray. Transfer the salmon to the pan skinned side down and broil until cooked through. Drizzle with remaining sauce and garnish with toasted sesame seeds.
ingredients: toasted sesame oil, soy sauce, rice vinegar, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, lime, honey, salmon fillets, sesame seeds
name: sesame roasted salmon skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, cream of tartar, vegetable shortening, whole milk, butter, honey
name: church s honey biscuits

steps: Using a large knife, shred the cabbage. Place in a large bowl with the carrot, apple and green onions. Whisk the mayonnaise, vinegar and oil. Season. Toss with the salad and serve.
ingredients: red cabbage, green cabbage, white wine vinegar, shallots, sugar, whole black peppercorns, bay leaf, extra virgin olive oil
name: insalata di cavalo rosso e verde red and green cabbage salad

steps: In a large frying pan, place the butter and scallions. Let it cook for about 2 minutes and add the fish in the pan and let the fish get a bit brown on each side. Then add the orange and the zest in the pan cover and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the paprika and mix very carefully without breaking the fish too much, until the paprika has dissolved. Then add the cream to the pan and stir it carefully until well blended. Add salt and pepper to taste. Let it simmer and serve warm.
ingredients: veal cutlets, all-purpose flour, margarine, olive oil, orange juice, orange, dry marsala wine, fresh parsley, pepper
name: low fat orange veal marsala

steps: Sprinkle flour tortillas with butter and margarine. Bake in preheated 400 degree f oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Brush tops with butter or margarine. Bake in preheated 400 degree f oven for
ingredients: flour tortillas, mayonnaise, yellow mustard, cheese, meat, lettuce leaves
name: pinwheel roll ups

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine butter, flour, milk, cream cheese, salt, pepper, cheese, onion, celery, onion and potatoes. Cover and bake at 400 degrees for 45-50 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, flour, milk, cream cheese, salt, pepper, cheese, onions
name: stove top scalloped potatoes skillet

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Stir in the milk unitl the mixture forms a thick batter. Drop the batter on top of the chicken a tablespoonful at a time. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. In a small bowl,
ingredients: buttermilk baking mix, milk, pure maple syrup, water, whipped cream
name: maple stewed dumplings

steps: Spray or grease small baking dish. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until cheese is set.
ingredients: vegetable oil, flour, goat cheese, eggs, hazelnuts, mayonnaise
name: hazelnut crusted goat cheese nibblers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and set aside. Bake 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Combine mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: white fish fillets, egg white, water, corn flake crumbs, lemon pepper, fresh parsley, low-fat margarine
name: crispy baked fish herbs

steps: In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: spinach fettuccine, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, low-fat butter, crushed red pepper flakes, ground black pepper
name: lightened up creamy spinach fettucine

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: ground sausage, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, frozen hash brown potatoes, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: our favorite breakfast pizza

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, onions, kielbasa, pam cooking spray
name: oven baked kielbasa and potatoes

steps: Heat the eggplant in a 350 degree oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Cool, then holding it by the stem, carefully peel the skin away and remove the stem. Puree with the tahini, garlic, and salt. Stir into the heated stock, then bring to a simmer. Partially cover, then simmer for 30 minutes. Remove from heat and press through a sieve, discarding solids. When ready to serve, heat the soup, then beat the egg with the lemon juice and stir through the simmering soup to form long egg strands. Simmer for another minute, then ladle into bowls and top with handfuls of fresh chopped parsley.
ingredients: eggplants, lemon juice, tahini, garlic cloves, salt, parsley, black pepper, scallion, olive oil
name: baba ganouj baba ghanoush

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Place a large, heavy skillet or roasting pan in the oven to heat. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Put the flour on a plate. When the potatoes are dry, roll them in the flour to coat. Remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the oil and potatoes. Roast, shaking the pan occasionally until the potatoes are golden brown all over, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the garlic, sage and butter. Return to the oven for one minute. Season generously with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: butter, kosher salt, dried thyme, hot sauce, russet potatoes
name: roasted thyme potato slices

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry.
ingredients: white cake mix, cherry pie filling, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, almond extract, almonds
name: cherry vanilla cake

steps: In a bowl, cream the butter and sugar, add the egg and beat well, and stir in the flour and milk. Pour the mixture evenly into a greased 6-8 cup casserole dish. Combine the passionfruit syrup, water and melted butter together, and pour over the pudding mixture. Bake in a preheated oven at 180c for 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, ground ginger, soft brown sugar, white sugar, butter, golden syrup, milk, boiling water
name: ginger and toffee self saucing pudding

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: baby carrots, honey, butter, cinnamon, ground cardamom, cilantro, salt and pepper
name: simply delicious honey spiced carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: flour, crisco, salt, margarine, egg, vinegar, cold water
name: nanny s never fail pie crust 5 star family favorite

steps: In an ungreased 2 qt baking dish, combine potatoes with sauce mix. Boiling water and butter. Stir in milk, ham, and beans. Bake, uncovered, in a 400 degree oven for 35 minutes or until potatoes are tender, stirring occassionaly. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: smoked ham, flour, cream of mushroom soup, milk, potatoes, carrot, onion, salt and pepper
name: scalloped potatoes and ham

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray 13x9 dish with cooking spray. Slice potatoes fairly thin and place in dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss to coat. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: small red potatoes, olive oil, fresh thyme, black pepper, artichokes, yellow onion, feta cheese
name: roasted potatoes with artichokes and feta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, almond extract, flour, cherry pie filling
name: cherry pie squares

steps: Preheat grill to medium high heat, and place corn on grill rack coated with cooking spray, cover and grill for 10 minutes, or until lightly charred, turning occasionally. Place corn on serving plate and brush with hoisin orange butter.
ingredients: butter, hoisin sauce, orange peel, chili-garlic sauce, white corn, fresh cilantro
name: grilled corn with hoisin orange butter

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the mandarin orange sections on top and serve.
ingredients: mandarin oranges in light syrup, olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, black pepper, romaine lettuce, baby spinach, red cabbage
name: mixed green and mandarin orange salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days.
ingredients: cake flour, baking powder, kosher salt, unsalted butter, whole milk ricotta cheese, granulated sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract
name: ricotta pound cake

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: fresh green beans, salt water, peanut oil, garlic clove, cumin, paprika, clove, almonds
name: loubia

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, cayenne, salt, coriander, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, egg white, canola oil, pecan halves
name: sweet hot spiced nuts

steps: Put all ingredients except cheese in crockpot and cook on low for 6 hours. Use two forks to shred the chicken into chunks. Add cheese and stir. Serve immediately in tacos or use as a filling for enchiladas. You can also use chicken breasts, but it turns out drier and not as tasty.
ingredients: ground beef, ground pork, taco seasoning mix, green pepper, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, bow tie pasta, monterey jack cheese, sour cream
name: bow tie taco casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, mushroom, onions, gruyere cheese, small shrimp, butter, eggs, heavy cream, white pepper, deep dish pie shells
name: cheese shrimp mushroom quiche

steps: Heat oven to 425f. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the asparagus with all the other ingredients on the baking sheet until combined. Roast for 10 to 12 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mayonnaise, grainy mustard, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic clove, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, asparagus
name: mustard and mayonnaise glazed asparagus grilled

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle rice over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Combine soup and water. Pour carefully over the rice. Lay the chicken pieces over the rice without overlapping. Sprinkle the sliced scallions and grated cheese over the top. Cover dish with foil. Bake in preheated oven 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer.
ingredients: cooked rice, half-and-half cream, water, salt and pepper, butter, egg yolks, egg whites, parmesan cheese, green onion
name: creamy rice and parmesan spoon bake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving.
ingredients: water, butter, milk, instant potato flakes, croutons, celery, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, cheese, scallion
name: baked potato stuffing

steps: Cream shortening and sugar well. Add beaten eggs and molasses, mixing well. Mix together flour, salt and cinnamon, then add to creamed mixture. Bake at 350 in greased jelly roll pan for 20-25 minutes. Cool and frost with thin powdered sugar butter icing.
ingredients: shortening, egg, sugar, milk, flour, cocoa, salt, baking soda, vanilla, marshmallow cream
name: devil dogs

steps: Mix cream cheese, butter and vanilla. Stir in sugars and fold in chips and toffee bits. Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Form into a ball and roll in copped pecans. Serve with graham crackers or apple slices.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, vanilla, icing sugar, brown sugar, semisweet mini chocolate chips, skor english toffee bits
name: skor cheese ball

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: light bread, light vanilla soymilk, liquid egg substitute, reduced-fat peanut butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, brown sugar
name: hg s pb n chocolate bread pudding bonanza

steps: Heat large pan over medium heat. Add oil and pork, cook 3 minutes each side. In a bowl combine sauce, honey, water and ginger. Pour over pork. Bring to the boil, add bok choy and green onions. Cover with a lid and reduce heat. Simmer 7 minutes till pork cooked through and bok choy is tender. Top with coriander to serve.
ingredients: pork spareribs, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, sweet chili sauce, soy sauce, garlic, barbecue sauce, honey, white vinegar, white sugar
name: slow cooked sticky pork spareribs

steps: Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy.
ingredients: ground veal, egg, salt, black pepper, parsley sprig, beef top round steak, leek, cranberry sauce, beef stock
name: rulle plse danish stuffed beef rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Brown meat and drain fat. Follow taco mix preparation directions, make sure all water gets absorbed. Add cheese to meat and stir until meat sticks together and cheese is melted. On a 13-inch baking stone or large size pizza pan, arrange rolls with points outside and bases together. It helps to arrange a square with 4 of the rolls, and then arrange the rest of the rolls in a circle around the square with points facing out. Spoon taco mix over rolls, fill in and fold points over taco mix, pinch to seal. Bake for 11-13 minutes. Serve with lettuce, tomato, peppers, sour cream, taco sauce, or any taco toppings of your choosing. Can be sliced like a pie or cut into squares.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, lettuce, chopped tomato, tomato sauce, velveeta mexican cheese
name: tasty taco pie

steps: Heat oil in non-stick skillet. Cook onion until translucent. Add pepper and tomatoes. Cover and simmer about 10 minutes. Add capers, olives, parsley. Put flounder fillet on top and spoon some juices over it. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer about 5 minutes, until done.
ingredients: sea salt, capellini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, roma tomatoes, salt & fresh ground pepper, arugula
name: capellini with tomato and arugula rocket

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl, mash the bananas, stir in oats, dates, oil and vanilla. Mix well and allow to sit for 15 minutes. Drop by tspfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes. In combining the ingredients, i personally use my food processor. I just toss everything in and let it mix.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, quick-cooking oatmeal, creamy peanut butter, egg, milk, sugar-free chocolate syrup, bananas, fat-free whipped topping, mascarpone cheese
name: banana split cookies recipe

steps: Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: avocados, red onions, grape tomatoes, jalapeno, hot sauce, garlic salt, lime
name: easy fresh guacamole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: peanut butter, shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, sugar
name: grandma s e z peanut butter cookies

steps: Cook the sandwiches according to the package directions. Drain, rinse, and drain again. In a large bowl, combine the sandwiches and the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover, and chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: imitation crabmeat, miracle whip, celery, red onions, salt and pepper, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves
name: fake crab salad sandwiches

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, condensed milk, water, unsweetened baking chocolate, peanut butter, vanilla, peanuts, salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 238. Remove from the heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: sugar, condensed milk, water, unsweetened baking chocolate, peanut butter, vanilla, peanuts, salt
name: mackinac island peanut butter fudge

steps: In a medium bowl mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl mix sugar, cream cheese, and eggs until light and fluffy. Mix mashed bananas and chai into cream cheese mixture. Add flour mixture and mix until smooth. Pour mixture into a greased 9x5 inch loaf pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree f oven for 60 minutes. Cool on rack. Remove from pan after 10 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, cooking oil, water
name: chapati east african bread

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until cooked through. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, lemon juice, garlic clove, cornstarch, chicken broth, corn syrup, lemon zest, canola oil, broccoli florets, red pepper
name: homebasic lemon chicken

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl mix the cormeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, non-fat vanilla yogurt, whole fruit jam, canola oil, egg substitute, skim milkpreparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In
ingredients: cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, fat
name: cornmeal griddle cakes pre 1940 s

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic cloves, cooked chicken breasts, reduced-fat cream cheese, green onions, salted peanuts, baby spinach, sweet and sour sauce, rice crackers
name: sesame chicken dip

steps: In a large bowl, combine the sugar, cinnamon, brown sugar, pecans. Add 2 tablespoons of each sugar to the mix. If the grapes are not as sweet as you desire, add the remaining sugar. If the grapes are sweet, you can leave it out. Cut the grapes in half and add to the dressing, stirring gently to coat the grapes. Refrigerate covered until chilled. Serve in parfait cups and garnish with mint for a beautiful fancy dessert.
ingredients: seedless grapes, fat free cream cheese, fat free sour cream, brown sugar, pecans
name: grape salad

steps: In a large pot, saute onion in oil over medium-high heat until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: onion, garlic clove, tomato paste, stir fry vegetables, cannellini beans, phyllo pastry, dried herbs, cooking spray
name: veggie bean strudel

steps: Place the raspberries in a large bowl and mix well. Cover and bake at 350 for 20 minutes. In a large skillet, combine the raspberries in a large bowl and mix well. In a large skillet, combine the raspberries in a large
ingredients: frozen unsweetened raspberries, condensed beef broth, raspberry jelly, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: raspberry gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine bosc pear, cantaloupes, cheddar cheese, red bell peppers, raisins, seedless grapes, bamboo skewer, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, toothpick, tooth
ingredients: bosc pear, cantaloupes, cheddar cheese, red bell peppers, raisins, seedless grapes, bamboo skewer, toothpick
name: fruit gobbler turkey centerpiece

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree. Brown the cubed meat. Mix rest of ingredients together with it in an oven safe pan. Place in oven for 1 hour. After 1 hour taste juice. If you add more water you may want to add a little more onion soup. Serve over rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: pork loin, oil, butter, salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, lipton onion soup mix, white wine, water, egg noodles
name: baked pork stroganoff

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine mayo, buttermilk, dill, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, carrots, cucumber, green pepper, mayonnaise, sweetened condensed milk, vinegar, sugar
name: vicky s macaroni salad

steps: In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce, garlic powderpreparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black
ingredients: rice, bacon, eggs, meat, green onions, fresh bean sprout, mushrooms, salt, black pepper, soy sauce
name: fried rice chow fun

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or
ingredients: salmon fillets, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, horseradish, fresh herbs, salt & pepper
name: seared salmon with mustard vinaigrette

steps: Put the baguette, butter, tomatoes, parsley in a large bowl and whisk until well mixed. Add the butter, tomato, parsley and salt. Mix well. Place the baguette, butter, tomatoes, parsley in a large bowl and whisk until well mixed. Place the baguette, butter, tomatoes, parsley in a large
ingredients: baguette, butter, tomatoes, parsley
name: tomato toast

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt and pepper, olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, white wine
name: honey dijon pork chops

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, then drain again. In a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Heat butter and oil in large skillet over medium heat. Saute chicken and garlic until chicken is no longer pink inside,. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside,. Stir in cooked pasta.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, crushed red pepper flakes, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, pesto sauce
name: chicken pesto pasta

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the water and milk. When bubbles just begin to break the surface, slowly add the grits, whisking constantly. Cook, stirring frequently and scraping the bottom of the pan, until thickened and cooked, about 7 minutes. Add the cheese and butter and stir just until melted. Remove from the heat. Add salt to taste and hot pepper sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mild cheddar cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, flour, sea salt, cayenne pepper, paprika, dried mustard
name: spicy cheese straws

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours.
ingredients: cool whip, heavy cream, unsweetened cocoa powder, instant coffee, white sugar, kahlua, chocolate sprinkles, wafer cookies
name: el torito s kahlua mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: cornmeal, dry yeast, sugar, salt, baking powder, flour, baking soda, eggs, buttermilk, oil
name: nee s angel cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: butter, flour, cornstarch, powdered sugar, salt, vanilla
name: light fluffy shortbead cookies

steps: Mix together all ingredients until blended. Chill for 45 minutes to 1 hour. If using bamboo skewers, soak them for 35 minutes to an hour. Oil your hands, and divide meat into 24 portions. Take one portion and shape into an elongated patty like a torpedo and run a skewer through it. Set on waxed paper until time to cook. Repeat with remaining meat portions. Grill for 6 minutes until cooked through.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, fresh parsley, salt, pepper
name: kofta ground beef kabobs

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: bell peppers, plain low-fat yogurt, garlic clove, salt, pepper, kalamata olives, jalapenos, honey
name: stuffed baby peppers with yogurt and floral honey

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: potatoes, spinach, cheese, onion, garlic, bacon, eggs, salt, milk, self rising flour
name: self crusting quiche

steps: In a large saucepan heat water until boiling. Stir tea bags in water for 2 hours. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill.
ingredients: tea bags, ice cube, water, sugar, lemon
name: ruth s secret sweet iced tea

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper slices. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until onion is softened. Add garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes or until garlic is softened. Add chicken and stir to coat. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.
ingredients: somen noodles, extra virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, broccoli, carrot, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, chicken broth, garlic cloves
name: chicken teriyaki with noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and bake 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Combine mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: bluefish, lemon wedges, prepared mayonnaise, salt, pepper
name: baked bluefish

steps: Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low.
ingredients: refried beans, scallion, chili powder, cumin, garlic, corn tortillas, corn, green chilies, tomatoes, cheddar cheese
name: enchilada casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: sirloin steaks, red bell peppers, fresh mushrooms, cooked bow tie pasta, frozen asparagus cuts, low-fat alfredo sauce, parmesan cheese, fresh ground pepper
name: beef and bows alfredo

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add onion, beef roast, water, au jus mix, seasoned pepper. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour and then low 6 hours. Slice and serve.
ingredients: onion, beef roast, water, au jus mix, seasoned pepper
name: lulu s french dip roast crock pot

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saute until just opaque in the center, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer fish to platter. Add parsley and crushed pepper to same skillet and saute for one minute. Add tomatoes, olives and garlic. Saute about two minutes until tomatoes soften and get juicy. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Spoon over fish and serve hot.
ingredients: sea bass, fennel bulbs, extra virgin olive oil, pernod, garlic clove, star anise, pitted black olives, dill, salt, pepper
name: mediterranean sea bass with fennel and pernod

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
ingredients: hamburger meat, onions, yellow mustard, sugar, apple cider vinegar, chili powder, catsup, salt
name: pool hall coney sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients in 1-quart casserole. Bake until tomatoes are soft, about 30 minutes. Season to taste. Cool to room temperature before serving.
ingredients: plum tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, lemon, juice of, olive oil, salt
name: tomato and basil relish

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, butter, chicken
name: uncle hugo s chicken

steps: Place potatoes in the dutch oven and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until potatoes can be easily pierced with a fork. Return potatoes to the dutch oven and cover with water. Cover and
ingredients: vegetable oil, red potatoes, boneless skinless chicken breast half, red bell pepper, green beans, garlic salt, pepper
name: one pan potatoes green beans chicken and peppers too

steps: In a crockpot place the onions, bell pepper on the bottom. Add the sweet potatoes, peas and canned tomatoes, sprinkle with the thyme and the hot sauce, tuck the bay leaf into the juices. Place the leftover pork roast on top and cover with the leftover gravy. Cook on low for about 6 hours, or on high for 3 hours. Just until the flavors are melded and the onions and bell peppers are cooked. Serve with hot crusty bread and a salad. This can be done on top of the stove or baked as a casserole also.
ingredients: venison, onion, worcestershire sauce, ketchup, water, vinegar, dry mustard, salt, sugar, paprika
name: sweet and sour venison stew

steps: Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbspreparation:Mix chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, chicken broth, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered
ingredients: cooked chicken, chicken stock, chutney, cream of chicken soup mix, milk, pasta
name: supa quick chicken n chutney pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired.
ingredients: graham crackers, unsalted butter, white chocolate, soft cream cheese, mascarpone cheese, strawberries
name: strawberry white chocolate cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, season-all salt, onion powder, pre-shredded mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese
name: spaghetti stuff

steps: Place stew meat in crockpot. Add tomatoe juice, vegatables, soup starter, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, hot sauce, parmesan cheese, vegetable beef soup mixpreparation:Place stew meat in crockpot. Add tomatoe juice,
ingredients: ground beef, green bell pepper, crushed tomatoes, mixed vegetables, beef broth, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, fusilli
name: slow cooker vegetable beef soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: pear, unsalted butter, eggs, cream, salt & pepper, gruyere cheese
name: pear and gruyere omelet

steps: In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until translucent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: butter, onion, frozen chopped spinach, crabmeat, parmesan cheese
name: crab rockefeller

steps: Put chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in the saucepan. Put the saucepan on the burner and turn on the stove to low. Stir and stir until the mixture is melted and smooth. Remove saucepan from heat. Turn off the burner and quickly add the chow mein noodles and the peanuts. Mix and stir until they are evenly coated. Cover the cookie sheets with wax paper. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the wax paper-covered cookie sheets. Put the cookie sheets into the refrigerator to cool the candies. When they are cool, take them off the waxed paper. Put them in plastic bags. Keep them in the refrigerator to cool the candies. Place them in plastic bags. When they
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, butter, peanut butter, chow mein noodles, salted peanuts
name: peanut butter chocolate clusters

steps: In a large bowl combine flour and salt. Mix together the wet ingredients and pour into well. Mix well. Turn out onto a floured board and knead until firm, shiny and elastic. At this point cover and chill for 1 hour, up to 24 hours. When ready to use follow instructions for manual pasta machine or cut into manageable pieces and roll out to desired thickness, cut into desired shape.
ingredients: chestnut flour, all-purpose flour, eggs, salt, water
name: chestnut pasta

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan with a lid and fry the onion and sausages until starting to brown. Add the potato slices and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden. Season with salt and pepper. Add the mustard, if using, to the stock, then pour into the pan. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and cook for 10 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Preheat the grill to medium. Scatter the cheese over the top of the potatoes and put the pan under the grill for 5 minutes until the cheese is bubbling and golden. Serve with steamed vegetables.
ingredients: pork sausage, mashed potatoes, egg, salt
name: swedish sausage potato cakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f grease a standard 12-muffin pan or line with paper cups. Thoroughly mix the flour, baking powder, salt and huckleberries together in a large bowl. Set aside. In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk or cream, sugar, butter, vanilla. Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix together with a few light strokes just until just blended. Do not overmix. The batter should not be smooth. Divide the batter among the muffin cups. Bake for 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in 1 or 2 of the muffins comes out clean. Let cool for a few minutes, and serve warm.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, sour cream, salt and pepper, green chili, black olives, cheddar cheese
name: spud muffins two ways

steps: In a large pot of boiling water, combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days.
ingredients: jumbo shrimp, dijon mustard, olive oil, fresh orange juice, hot sauce, orange zest, mango, green onions, red bell pepper
name: south seas shrimp and mango

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large saucepan, add carrots. Add water to cover. Bring to a boil. Cook for 25 minutes or until carrots are tender. Drain and cool slightly. Process carrots in a food processor until smooth. Pour carrots into a mixing bowl. Add in remaining ingredients. Stir to combine. Transfer mixture into a greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
ingredients: baby carrots, red onion, olive oil, light brown sugar, kosher salt, pecans
name: sugar grilled baby carrots and onions with pecans

steps: Heat oven to 375. Lay the sweet potatoes out in a single layer on a roasting tray. Drizzle the oil, salt and pepper over the potatoes. Roast for 25 to 30 minutes in oven or until tender. In a saucepan reduce the vinegar by half, then add honey, marmelade and ginger. Stir to combine. When potatoes are roasted, remove and toss to coat with marmelade mixture.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, milk, butter, ground nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: balsamic mashed sweet potatoes

steps: Brown sausage in skillet, stirring until browned and crumbled. Then drain. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Pour mixture into a greased 9x13 casserole dish. Regfrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: country sausage, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, stale bread, cheddar cheese, onions
name: breakfast sausage and egg casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 350f and bake another 35 to 40 minutes or until a knife inserted 1-inch from the edge comes out clean. Cool before cutting. Garnish with whipped cream. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, eggs, brown sugar, cinnamon, powdered ginger, ground nutmeg, salt, cooked pumpkin, soymilk
name: pumpkin pie and dairy free too

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: spicy sausage, pasta sauce, rotel tomatoes & chilies, minced garlic cloves, parmesan cheese
name: spicy pasta sauce

steps: Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oilpreparation:Mix chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal,
ingredients: chocolate chips, white almond bark, miniature marshmallows, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, red maraschino cherries, green maraschino cherries, flaked coconut, oil
name: chocolate pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice.
ingredients: molasses, vinegar, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, spareribs
name: plantation ribs

steps: In a large serving bowl put the sweet corn and black bean salad in a large mixing bowl. Mix the dressing ingredients together and let it marinate at room temperature for at least 30 minutes. Chop green onions, tomatoes and parsly and add to bowl. Combine this with the beans. Whisk dressing ingredients and gently add dressing to bean mixture. Add salt and pepper.
ingredients: red onion, frozen corn, black beans, limes, juice of, honey, cilantro, cumin, cayenne, salt & fresh ground pepper
name: sweet corn and black bean salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat an egg in a mixing bowl. Add in ground beef, bread crumbs, garlic powder and onion powder and mix together. Add in almost all of the cup of catalina until the ground beef rolls into a ball. Place meat mixture into a greased bread pan and then add the remaining catalina dressing on top of meat mixture. Bake for an hour and a half.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, stove top stuffing mix, water, dried oregano leaves, roasted red pepper, feta cheese
name: marvelous mini meatloaves mediterranean style

steps: Preparation. Slice chicken into small bite-size pieces, pour boiling water on them for removing smell and extra fat, and drain. Slice onion. Boil green peas roughly. Recipe. Put 1 cup water, seasoning, chicken and onion in the pan and cook them. Turn the heat down after boiling soup up. Cook it for 2 or 3 minutes. Spread the beaten egg over the onion and meat in the pan. Sprinkle green peas on egg and cook until the egg hardens partially. Put the hot rice in each donburi. And place egg and chicken mix on top of the rice.
ingredients: chicken, green onions, tiny peas, dashi, eggs, soy sauce, granulated sugar, ajinomoto, mirin, nori
name: oyako donburi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Heat oil in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: scalloped potatoes mix, diced tomatoes, water, oregano leaves, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese
name: pizza potato casserole

steps: Combine the rice, salt, and water in a large, heavy saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium high heat. Cover and reduce heat to low, and simmer until the water has been absorbed, about 15 minutes. Add the rice, salt, and water in a large, heavy saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium high heat. Cover and reduce heat to low, and simmer until the water has been absorbed, about 15
ingredients: long grain rice, water, raisins, milk, sugar, eggs, cornstarch, vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon
name: rj s rice pudding

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. And line a baking sheet with foil. Lightly coat foil with nonstick cooking spray. On a floured board roll out drumsticks into an 15x11-inch rectangle. Divide into four equal pieces and lay one slice of cheese on each section of drumstick. Top each with equal amounts of chilies and chicken strips. Starting at long end of dough, roll up each piece tucking and sealing ends. On a piece of wax paper mix tortilla chips and taco seasoning. Brush rolls with melted butter and roll in crushed chips mixture, pressing to adhere. Transfer to prepared baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Meanwhile, in a small bowl mix salsa and ranch dressing. Remove from oven and serve with salsa mixture for dipping.
ingredients: buttermilk, red pepper sauce, cornmeal, taco seasoning mix, chicken drumsticks, vegetable oil, salsa
name: betty crocker s spicy mexicali drumsticks

steps: Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people.
ingredients: olive oil, white wine vinegar, blueberry juice, lime juice, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh blueberries, raspberries, vegetable oil
name: pan seared chicken with blueberry sauce

steps: In a large saucepan, sauté the tchorba and garlic in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the tchorba to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped tchorba and garlic. You can serve the tchorba cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives.
ingredients: soup bones, ground beef, salt, pepper, fresh parsley, olive oil, paprika, rice, garlic cloves, vinegar
name: tchorba toptsita

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place the fish fillets in a baking pan coated with cooking spray. Salt and pepper to taste. Combine the tomatoes, artichoke hearts, olives, and feta cheese. Top the fish with the mixture. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until the fish flakes easily.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, italian stewed tomatoes, green olives, black olives, lemon, dry white wine, black pepper, tilapia fillets
name: spanish tilapia

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, american cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, poblano peppers, tomatoes, heavy cream, garlic, salt
name: qdoba queso dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, add all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with french fried onions and bake an additional 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: onion, paprika, fresh ground black pepper, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, butter, cream of chicken soup, light processed cheese, light sour cream, cooking spray, corn flakes
name: hash brown casserole cooking light

steps: In large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in corn. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 400 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: bacon grease, cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, milk
name: okie cornbread

steps: In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers.
ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon sticks, cranberry juice, orange juice, lemon juice
name: citrus cranberry tea

steps: Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning
ingredients: pork chops, butter, apple cider, dijon mustard, heavy cream, salt and pepper, parsley, egg noodles
name: cider pork chops

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy 4-quart saucepan over med-high heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer.
ingredients: yellow split peas, chicken broth, cold water, ham bone, onions, leek, butter, fresh chives, salt and black pepper, whipping cream
name: yellow split pea soup

steps: In a small mixing bowl, combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Take breadsticks and cut them in half lengthwise. In a small microwave pyrex bowl, melt butter in microwave. Take each halved breadstick and dip into butter then roll in cinnamon mixture. Twist each strip 2 or 3 times and place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 18 minutes. Let cool on wire racks. Makes 16 toasted sticks.
ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter, bread
name: cinnamon sugar toast strips

steps: In a heavy frying pan over medium heat, saut onions and 1 pound kohlrabi in butter until well coated with the butter. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover tightly and cook, stirring occasionally, until kohlrabi is tender, about 25 minutes. Sprinkle with flour and turn to mix. Gradually add milk and cook and gently stir mixture until milk thickens to a smooth sauce. Correct seasoning, adding salt and pepper generously. Stir in parsley. Makes 4 servings. Womans day home cooking around the world.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, white pepper, shortening, sauerkraut
name: zelniky

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan.
ingredients: fresh parsley, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, asparagus, salt & pepper, of fresh mint, fresh lemon juice
name: asparagus with olive oil herbs

steps: In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onions. Stir gently until coated. Sprinkle brown sugar over onions. Cook, turning frequently, about 5 minutes or until golden and glazed.
ingredients: pickling onions, olive oil, white vinegar, sugar, cloves, bay leaf, salt
name: glazed onions

steps: Heat 2 t olive oil in a skillet that you can eventually place under the broiler. Add onion to skillet and cook until soft, about 4 minutes. Add 1 t olive oil and heat. Add eggs seasoned with salt, pepper, parsley and cheese. Cook until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Gently place the rounds of tomato on the egg mixture. Cover and cook over low heat until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Cover and cook over low heat until bottom
ingredients: olive oil, leeks, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh parsley, eggs, salt and pepper, parsley
name: leek and sun dried tomato frittata

steps: For sauce, in a small bowl stir together soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame oil. Set aside. Place a steamer basket in a 12 inch skillet. Add enough water to come just below bottom of basket and bring to a boil. Place broccoli in steamer basket and reduce heat to medium low. Cover and steam for 4 minutes. Add sweet peppers. Cover and steam for 3 to 4 minutes more or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Transfer vegetables to a serving bowl. Drizzle sauce over vegetables and toss gently to coat.
ingredients: bell peppers, ground chicken, salsa, peanut butter, soy sauce, gingerroot, lime juice, peanuts
name: thai style chicken stuffed bell peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, butter, feta cheese, chives
name: feta and chive muffins

steps: Dissolve jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Put oranges and pineapple with their juice in jell-o. Pour mixture into a 9x13 cake pan. Refrigerate until set. Beat cream cheese and sugar. Fold in cool whip. Spread over jell-o. Garnish with nuts.
ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, orange gelatin, tapioca pudding, water, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, cool whip
name: tapioca orange salad

steps: In a small bowl, combine maple syrup, cajun seasoning, garlic powder, mahi mahi fillets, lemon wedge, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon z
ingredients: maple syrup, cajun seasoning, garlic powder, mahi mahi fillets
name: cajun maple mahi mahi

steps: Heat a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add bok choy leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over bok choy.
ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, bok choy, cornstarch, chicken broth
name: garlic a choy

steps: Mix all ingredients except chicken in a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Add chicken and leave to marinate at least one hour, preferably longer. Grill chicken on the bbq, hotplate or in the griller until golden brown and cooked through. Ususlly you would expect 12 thigh fillets to feed 4 to 6 people- in my family the kids eat 4 each so this recipe serves 3.
ingredients: chicken thighs, vegetable oil, sugar, garlic cloves, soy sauce, black pepper
name: mouan ang cambodian grilled chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: ground almonds, flour, fresh parsley, seafood seasoning, salt, black pepper, shrimp, egg white, corn oil, lemon
name: almond crusted shrimp

steps: In a large pot, add vegetables, soup mix, bouillon cube and cover with water. Season as desired. Boil rapidly for ten minutes. Lower heat and simmer until vegetables are tender.
ingredients: cabbage, yellow onion, green bell peppers, celery, carrots, mushrooms, vegetable soup mix, low-sodium v8 juice, mexican-style tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil
name: cabbage soup

steps: Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar.
ingredients: pork, salt, chili powder, vinegar, garlic, oregano, ground cumin
name: chorizo

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, pineapple-orange juice concentrate, brown sugar, butter, salt, black pepper
name: secret ingredient sweet potatoes

steps: In a 1-qt. Microwave-safe casserole,, mash the beans with a fork. Stir in the salsa, chili powder, cumin, and salt, if desired. Stir to mix well. Stir in the cheese. Cover with the casserole lid, and microwave on high power for 3 to 4 minutes until heated through. Remove from the microwave. Stir to mix in the melted cheese. Spread the sour cream on top. Sprinkle with the chives. Serve warm with tortilla chips. Cover and refrigerate leftovers, which will keep 4 to 5 days.
ingredients: processed cheese, granulated garlic, diced green chilies, jalapeno, green pepper, red peppers
name: chi chi s chile con queso

steps: Mix water, sure-jell and red pepper jelly together. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Stir and bring to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Boil for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Quickly skim off foam with a large metal spoon. Pour into jelly glasses and seal. If you want to try to make it sugar free i think it would work, just make sure to get the sugar free pectin otherwise it will not set. If i try it anytime soon, i will post and let you know how it turns out.
