ingredients: granulated sugar, red peppers, white vinegar, liquid pectin
name: red or green pepper jelly

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, butter, water, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, nestle toll house baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, nuts
name: nestle chewy cocoa brownies

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the chicken stock cubes and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, mushrooms, chicken stock cube, white wine, heavy cream, olive oil
name: white wine and garlic mushroom cream sauce

steps: In a large buttered saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, and corn syrup. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares.
ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, cornflour, instant malted milk powder, milk, heavy cream, instant coffee powder
name: fudgie wudgies

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: chicken wings, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, unsalted butter, thai red curry paste, lime, honey, soy sauce, cilantro leaf
name: ultimate chicken wings with curry lime butter

steps: In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt the butter. Add the garlic and cook, stirring about 15 seconds. Stir in the flour using wire whisk until the flour is absorbed. Add the broth and half and half. Continue to cook and stir with whisk until no lumps remain. Add a pinch of nutmeg then the chopped spinach and salt. Cook, stirring occasionally just until the spinach is wilted about 3 minutes. Serve with a smile.
ingredients: spinach, chicken broth, shallot, butter, sour cream, fresh lemon juice, sugar, nutmeg, sliced almonds
name: creamed spinach with sour cream

steps: Beat egg yolks and sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat until smooth. Add the egg yolks, sugar, water, vanilla extract, hot cocoa, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt. Fold in the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15
ingredients: egg yolks, egg white, sugar, water, vanilla extract
name: papos de anjo angel s chins

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat melt the butter, add old bay, minced onion, lemon juice, crabmeat, light cream, parsley, and stir thoroughly. Add the flour, stirring constantly, and then gradually add the light cream, continuing to stir. Add the crabmeat and let simmer for about 15 minutes. Do not allow the soup to boil. Serve garnished with a dash of old bay and parsley flakes.
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, celery, cream of celery soup, unflavored gelatin, crab, green onion
name: michele s crab spread

steps: Combine the ketchup, tomato paste, yellow mustard, celery seeds, black pepper, dried onion in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks.
ingredients: ketchup, tomato paste, yellow mustard, celery seeds, black pepper, dried onion
name: mountain view linda s parisian burger sauce

steps: Mix all dry ingredients together in a bowl. In another bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: flour, butter, egg yolks, white vinegar, water
name: easy strudel

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, butter, brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, nestl toll house butterscotch flavored morsels, nuts
name: nestle chewy butterscotch brownies

steps: Rinse mussels in cold water and discard any broken or open mussels. Saute onion, garlic, celery and bay leaf in the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat for 1 minute. Add the mussels, wine, and cook for about 4-5 minutes until the mussels open. Shake the pot occasionally while cooking. Serve in soup plates, garnished with lemon peel, parsley, broth and crusty bread for dipping. Serves 4 as an appetizer or 2 as a main course.
ingredients: mussels, wine, butter, green peppercorns in brine, lemon rind, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: peppered herb mussels

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Place pork chops on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Insert a meat thermometer in the thickest part. Bake at 425 degrees for about 25-35 minutes, or until the thermometer registers 160 degrees. Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with mango chutney.
ingredients: lard, pork, white onion, marjoram, fresh thyme sprigs, bay leaves, peppercorns, orange, milk, sea salt
name: carnitas caseras home cooked carnitas

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: duncan hines yellow cake mix, light brown sugar, semi-sweet chocolate bit, walnuts, oil, egg
name: chocolate chip cookies nirvana

steps: In blender, combine whole milk, sugar, instant espresso powder, semi-sweet chocolate chips, egg whites. Cover and process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. In small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: whole milk, sugar, instant espresso powder, semi-sweet chocolate chips, egg whites
name: wow that was easy chocolate mousse

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place bread in bottom of 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven, while preheating. Place eggs in blender and beat on high. Add flour, milk, salt and pepper. Mix together for 30 seconds. Pour mixture into dish with melted butter. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: bread, butter, cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper
name: souffle juliette

steps: In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: milk, heavy cream, instant lemon pudding mix, sugar
name: frozen pudding

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, brie cheese, black pepper, nutmeg, cooked lobster meat. Pour into the prepared dish and bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes. You may want to broil the top to make a brown top.
ingredients: kosher salt, elbow macaroni, whole milk, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, white cheddar cheese, brie cheese, fresh ground black pepper, nutmeg, cooked lobster meat
name: ultimate lobster mac and cheese

steps: To prepare each slice of bread, spread 1 teaspoon of the olive oil on one side of each slice of bread. Place 2 slices cheese, three to four spinach leaves and 1 tablespoon cooked bacon between unbuttered sides of two bread slices. Place one sandwich in a large frypan or on a griddle. Cook over medium high heat for 3 to 4 minutes on eaach side or till the cheese is melted and the bread is golden brown. If necessary to prevent overbrowning, reduce to medium or brush on extra margarine, butter or olive oil. Repeat for remaining sandwiches.
ingredients: focaccia bread, extra virgin olive oil, mortadella, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves
name: warm mortadella on focaccia

steps: Boil tuna for 10 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: tuna fish, dry pasta, cream of mushroom soup, green peas, shredded cheddar cheese
name: bachelors tuna casserole

steps: In a large pitcher combine limeade and apple juice. Shake vigorously. Add ginger ale. Put ice in glasses, pour in mixture. Top with maraschino cherries.
ingredients: maraschino cherry, mint leaf, frozen orange juice concentrate, club soda
name: easy orange fizz

steps: Combine water, unflavored gelatin, white sugar, milk, almond extract, fruit cocktail, lychees, mandarin oranges, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries, maraschino cherries,
ingredients: water, unflavored gelatin, white sugar, milk, almond extract, fruit cocktail, lychees, mandarin oranges, maraschino cherries
name: almond float asian dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, pure maple syrup, soy sauce, ketchup, dijon mustard, orange zest, curry powder, ground coriander, worcestershire sauce, garlic
name: maple roasted pork tenderloin

steps: Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add flour and whisk until well blended. Add onion and broccoli, simmer on low heat for 10 minutes. Add tuna, corn, salt, and pepper. Simmer until thickens and broccoli is tender - approximately 10 minutes. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper before serving. Serve with baguette or garlic bread, if desired.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, hot water, salt, milk, crabmeat, cream-style corn, parsley
name: grammie miller s corn n crab or tuna chowder

steps: Cook the macaroni according to package directions, adding the macaroni when you put the dry pasta into the boiling water. Drain and rinse. While pasta is draining, melt margarine in the pot and then add the flour, garlic powder & salt. Stir constantly until thick and turning a dark butter color. Add the milk and stir until it starts to thicken, then slowly, a bit at a time, add the cheese, stirring constantly. When everything is melted together and smooth, add the macaroni and ham in and mix well. Serve or bake in an oven proof dish for 20 minutes at 375 for a crispy top.
ingredients: wagon wheel macaroni, margarine, flour, milk, cocktail franks, american cheese, white pepper
name: wagon wheels and wieners

steps: Combine the cereal, nuts, raisins and banana chips. In saucepan, combine vanilla pudding and honey. Bring to a boil and boil 30 seconds. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter. Mix well. Pour over the cereal mix and combine until coated. Put on cookie sheet to cool.
ingredients: cereal, mixed dried fruit, dry roasted peanuts, pretzel stick, coconut, honey, ground cinnamon
name: texas cowpoke trail mix

steps: Heat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Dot top with butter. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers.
ingredients: brie cheese, dried cherries, toasted sliced almonds, brown sugar, puff pastry, egg
name: sharon s baked brie

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, milk, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper
name: quick and easy alfredo sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Slightly salt and pepper pork. Brown pork chops in cast iron skillet. Place chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning.
ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, green chili salsa, honey, garlic cloves, cumin, cayenne pepper, salt, chili powder, lime juice
name: spicy cuban pork chops maya style

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: fresh green beans, red onion, pecans, butter, brown sugar, orange juice, dijon mustard, salt
name: nutty onion green beans

steps: In lg skillet or dutch oven, saute onions in butter until tender and golden brown, about 25 minute remove with a slotted spoon. Add flour, salt and pepper to skillet. Stir until smooth. Gradually stir in milk until blended. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 min or until thickened. Reduce heat to med. Return onions to the pan. Heat through.
ingredients: butter, salt, pepper, catsup, honey, onions
name: amber onions

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat pork chops dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear chops in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down, about 8 minutes. Return pork chops to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt & fresh ground pepper, garlic, pickled peppers, pepperoncini peppers
name: soprano s pork chops with vinegar peppers

steps: Combine the first 5 ingredients in a heavy pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. When it comes to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, reduce heat and simmer until it comes to the softball stage or 236f on a candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, allspice, margarine, and vanilla. Cool, then beat until thick and mixture looses its gloss. Pour into buttered square dish and let cool before cutting.
ingredients: sugar, milk, light cream, corn syrup, salt, butter, vanilla, candied cherry
name: opera fudge

steps: Add butter mixture to boiling water. Reduce heat to medium, stirring constantly, or until mixture thickens. Remove from heat. Add butter mixture to boiling water. Reduce
ingredients: sugar, water, chocolate chips, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla
name: velvet chocolate sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: parsnips, potatoes, heavy cream, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper, nutmeg, white cheddar cheese
name: white cheddar parsnips and potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bottom of pan and arrange mushrooms in baking dish. Next take the chicken and stretch it out, dont tear though. Next, take your slice of ham and place it on the chicken, then your cheese on your ham. Take the small end of the chicken and gently roll the chicken tucking in the sides. Place the chicken on the mushrooms. Season lightly with salt and pepper. Next, mix all ingredients of the sauce together and pour over the chicken. Bake for 40-45 min or until chicken is done and juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, ham, swiss cheese, mushroom soup, sour cream, sliced mushrooms
name: easy chicken cordon bleu with mushroom sauce

steps: In a food processor or blender, mix all the herbs, garlic and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil and blend. Add zest. Pour marinade over olives. They can be served immediately but will improve with a day to marinate.
ingredients: kalamata olive, olive oil, anisette, lemon
name: kalamata olives with lemon and anisette

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, garlic salt, paprika, fresh parsley, chicken broth, parsley flakes, chicken broth, parsley flakes, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken broth, chicken
ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, evaporated milk, garlic salt, paprika, fresh parsley
name: easy crock pot chicken bake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, low-fat milk, eggs, butter, corn
name: cornbread with corn

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: butter, zucchini, onion, stove top stuffing mix, cheese, chicken, barbecue sauce
name: easy cheesy stuffed chicken

steps: In a large skillet, cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning once halfway through cooking. Remove from skillet. Keep warm. For sauce, add green onion to skillet. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in coconut milk mixture. Cook and stir until bubbly. To serve, spoon the sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts.
ingredients: ground chicken, fresh breadcrumb, scallions, ground coriander, fresh cilantro, sweet chili sauce, fresh lemon juice, oil
name: thai chicken meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: non-fat soymilk, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, allspice, egg, whole wheat bread, apples, cranberries
name: heather s apple cranberry bread pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and spray a 10 x 15 inch pan with cooking spray. Place the cauliflower in a large bowl, drizzle with oil and toss to coat. Spread the cauliflower in prepared pan and sprinkle with any remaining crumbs. Bake 18 to 20 minutes, until lightly browned.
ingredients: cauliflower, white bread, dried thyme, dried basil, dried marjoram, salt, pepper, olive oil, garlic
name: barking cauliflower

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 baking dish. Mix bisquick, milk, mustard and egg until blended. Pour half into the dish. Top with ham and half of the cheese. Pour remaining batter over ham. Sprinkle top with paprika, if desired. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut into 9 squares, then cut each square diagonally.
ingredients: granny smith apples, honey dijon mustard, white cheddar cheese, raisin bread
name: apple and cheddar tea sandwiches

steps: Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy.
ingredients: saltine crackers, water, ground beef, grape jelly, chili sauce, lemon, juice of, salt & pepper
name: aunt bea s famous swedish meatballs

steps: Combine cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese, cream cheese
ingredients: mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, onion, cooked bacon, sweet red pepper, green pepper, dried oregano, garlic powder, round sourdough loaf, cracker
name: warm savory cheese spread

steps: Place ingredients in bread machine in order as listed. Run on dough cycle. Shape rolls and place on lightly greased baking pan. Cover with cloth and let rise in warm place for 1 hour. Bake at 375 for 10-15 minute.
ingredients: active dry yeast, milk, sugar, butter, salt, flour
name: sweet milk dinner rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: lime juice, soy sauce, stir-fry sauce, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, minced garlic cloves, pork tenderloin
name: indonesian pork tenderloin

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cook corn mixture in a large skillet until done. Drain and return to skillet. Add eggs and chilies to corn mixture. Cook, stirring gently, until eggs are thickened, but still moist. Do not stir constantly. Microwave tortillas about 10 seconds each until soft. Spoon corn mixture down centers of warm tortillas. Top each with picante sauce and cheese. Fold opposite sides over filling. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mexican-style corn, flour, diced green chilies, sugar, salt, cumin, chili powder, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk
name: mexi corn pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onion, seasoning salt, salad seasoning
name: grandpa s fried potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Mix in lemon juice just before serving.
ingredients: chicken, onion, butter, curry powder, flour, chicken stock, half-and-half cream
name: kip met kerriesaus baked chicken with curry sauce

steps: Boil water. Add to large teapot with 5-6 teabags and fresh mint. Steep until cool. Add to orange juice. Add sugar to taste. Add squeeze of lemon juice.
ingredients: water, sugar, frozen lemonade, apple juice, cranberry juice, orange juice, strong black tea
name: holiday fruit and tea punch

steps: 1 thaw frozen peas in a collendar. 2 melt the margarine in a saucepan. 3 add the flour and blend. 4 add the salmon, peas, salt and pepper and warm through. 5 as the salmon is warming, toast the bread. 7 after toasted, spoon salmon mixture over the toast.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, green onions, milk, salmon, salt, pepper, bread
name: creamed salmon on toast

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow.
ingredients: warm water, light olive oil, bread flour, dried thyme, salt, bread machine yeast, jalapeno jack cheese, garlic cloves
name: roasted garlic jack bread bread machine

steps: Heat sandwiches, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until hot and cheese topping melts and bread is toasted. Spread mixture on 6 slices of bread. Place remaining bread slices, cheese side up, over the chicken filling. Place sandwiches in single layer on large baking sheet. Torefrigerate for later baking, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate now. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Heat sandwiches, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until hot and cheese topping melts and bread is toasted. Tore
ingredients: eggs, sweet pickle relish, celery, celery seed, mayonnaise, ranch dressing, salt and pepper, lettuce leaves, bread
name: egg salad sandwiches sandwich

steps: Heat water on a frying pan and fry chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style chinese style ch
ingredients: water, instant rice, butter, egg, onion, soy sauce
name: chinese style fried rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brownie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Dot top with butter. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers.
ingredients: brownie mix, eggs, oil, water, sour cream, coconut pecan frosting, semi-sweet chocolate chips, pecans
name: coconut pecan sour cream brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, mix cream cheese, butter, sour cream, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, mushrooms, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, sour cream, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: cream cheese with garlic and herbs, heavy cream, boneless skinless chicken breasts, unsalted butter, flour, salt, pepper
name: herb garlic cream cheese chicken

steps: Heat all but cornflakes and peanut butter to boiling stirring constantly. Take off heat and stir in peanut butter until melted. Stir in cornflakes. Spread in greased pan. Cut when cool.
ingredients: unpopped popcorn, butter, miniature marshmallow, powdered sugar, light corn syrup, water, food coloring
name: chewy popcorn balls

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add beef flank steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill beef, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, vegetable oil, honey, garlic, onion, dijon mustard, tabasco sauce
name: frozen orange juice marinade for beef

steps: Put the bagels in a greased 13x9 inch baking dish. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and vanilla. Pour egg mixture evenly over the bagels. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight. Remove from refrigerator 20 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve with maple syrup, if desired.
ingredients: bagels, laughing cow cheese, eggs, milk, vanilla, maple syrup, pecans, cinnamon sugar
name: bagel french toast casserole

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan and cook the onion, garlic and potatoes for 5 minutes until lightly golden. Add the leek and cayenne and cook for a further 1 minute. Add the stock, bring to the boil and simmer for 20 minutes until the potatoes are very soft and beginning to break up into the soup. Using a potato masher, roughly mash the potatoes into the soup. Stir in the chorizo and simmer gently for 5 minutes until the orange coloured oil from the chorizo rises to the surface of the soup. Check the seasoning, ladle into bowls and garnish with a sprig of flat leaf parsley. Serve with lots of crusty bread for mopping up.
ingredients: butter, onions, all-purpose flour, potatoes, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, polish sausage
name: hearty potato and sausage chowder

steps: Heat the oil in a medium size pan, melt the butter in the oil and then saute onions until transparent. Add garlic and the chicken. Stir until meat turns white. Add carrots, basil, and chicken stock, and simmer for 30 minutes or until the carrots are tender. Add pasta and simmer for an additional 15 minutes. After the soup has been poured into a bowl, add one tablespoon of lemon juice to each serving.
ingredients: chicken breast, french onion soup, apricot halves, apricot nectar, cornflour, pepper, oil, pasta
name: fantastic apricot chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Season chicken with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Wrap each chicken breast in 1 strip of bacon and place in a 9x13x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, mix the sour cream and soup. Spoon mixture over the chicken and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: chicken, garlic powder, salt and pepper, green onions, tomato soup, cream of mushroom soup
name: sonny s chicken stuff

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Thicken pan juices for sauce, removing fat.
ingredients: lamb loin chops, salt and pepper, dijon mustard, dried rosemary
name: rosemary mustard lamb chops

steps: Place the macaroni on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for 20 minutes.
ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, hamburger, green pepper, green onion, whole kernel corn, tomato paste, water, salt, black pepper
name: western macaroni

steps: Preheat oven to 375f in a large bowl, gently toss together strawberries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. Set aside. In a medium bowl, toss together strawberries, sugar and flour then transfer to an ungreased baking dish. Bake until top is golden brown and berries and their juices are bubbly, about 30 minutes. Let cool then spoon into dishes and serve with yogurt or ice cream on top.
ingredients: strawberries, raw sugar, half-and-half, mint leaves, fresh basil, cracked black pepper, ground cinnamon, ground cardamom, salt
name: curly locks special strawberries sugar and cream for 1

steps: Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Add thinly sliced beef and cook with the pepper mix another 5 minutes set aside and keep warm. For cheese sauce, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir in black pepper, cheese, chipotle peppers, and adobo sauce. Divide steaks and pepper-and-onion mixture among 4 baguette slices. Top with cheese sauce and remaining 4 bread slices.
ingredients: green onion, sun-dried tomato, basil, sweet corn, simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, raw shrimp, chipotle paste, seasoned pepper, butter, goat cheese
name: potato and chipotle shrimp appetizer

steps: Steam beans for 5 minutes. Add pepper strips. Steam 5-6 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender-crisp. Combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Transfer beans and peppers to a serving dish. Pour dressing over and toss to combine. Serve immediately, or chill to serve as a salad.
ingredients: red bell pepper, green bell pepper, orange bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green onion
name: fresh vegetable medley

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy.
ingredients: self-rising flour, butter, brown sugar, molasses, egg, vanilla extract, white chocolate chips
name: white chocolate chip butterscotch cookies

steps: Mix the eggs, sugar, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, walnuts, vanilla, apples, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, walnuts, vanilla, apples
name: libby s applenut pudding from u i

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add taco seasoning mix, water, corn, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, egg noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat
ingredients: onion, ground beef, taco seasoning mix, water, corn, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, egg noodles
name: taco stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Dredge fish in flour, then egg, then nuts. Place on oiled baking sheet. Bake 20 minutes until golden brown. Make the salsa as far ahead as possible to allow time for flavors to meld. Combine all salsa ingredients and refrigerate. Serve over fish.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, egg, macadamia nuts, ground lemon myrtle, fillets, oil
name: barramundi with macadamia and lemon myrtle crust

steps: Place kahlua, stolichnaya vodka, whipping cream, ice, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry in a glass. Pour into a chilled cocktail shaker. Add all the ingredients to the shaker. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Strain mixture into a chilled cocktail shaker. Pour into chilled cocktail shaker. Pour into chilled cocktail
ingredients: kahlua, stolichnaya vodka, whipping cream, ice, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry
name: cat s meow cocktail

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cook, covered, for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
ingredients: rice, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, beef broth, ground cumin, tomato paste, frozen green pea, carrot
name: 20 minute mexican rice

steps: Combine peanut butter, honey, powdered milk, powdered sugar, raisins, peanuts, peanut butter worms, and peanut butter. Bake for 30 minuites. Remove from the oven. While still warm roll puffs in the powdered sugar. Roll in the sugar again when puffs are cool
ingredients: smooth peanut butter, honey, powdered milk, powdered sugar, raisins, peanuts
name: candy peanut butter worms

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: cauliflower, sour cream, butter, salt, pepper
name: mock mashed potatoes cauliflower

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny.
ingredients: sliced mushrooms, bacon, onion, red pepper, diced tomato, eggs, salt and pepper, cheese
name: aussie breakfast egg mess

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: tahini, lemons, minced garlic clove, cumin, coriander, cayenne pepper, fresh ground pepper, water, cucumbers
name: cucumber salad with tahini dressing

steps: Combine all ingredients except vodka in food processor. Process, stopping occasionally to scrape down the sides, until the mixture is smooth and well blended. Refrigerate, covered, up to 2 weeks. Remove from the refrigerator about 1 hour before serving and stir in the vodka when softened. Serve with bread, crackers or in pastry tartlets.
ingredients: vegan cream cheese, vodka, lemon juice, fresh dill, salt, cucumber, radishes, celery, belgian endive, fresh chives
name: crudits with vodka lemon cream cheese

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, basil leaf, garlic, pepper, salt, olive oil, red wine vinegar, tomatoes, zucchini, elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for 2 hours. Just before serving add bacon.
ingredients: fresh basil leaf, garlic, pepper, salt, olive oil, red wine vinegar, tomatoes, zucchini, elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese
name: macaroni salad with basil dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the raspberry white chocolate pudding in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the raspberry white chocolate pudding. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: cool whip, milk, chocolate pudding, liquor, vodka, fresh raspberry
name: raspberry white chocolate pudding shot

steps: In a small bowl combine first 5 ingredients. Core cabbage, cutting out a good size cavity and then place the seasoned butter in the cavity. Wrap cabbage with heavy duty aluminum foil. Place cabbage, cored end up, on top rack of grill, close lid and smoke until soft. Unwrap cabbage and discard any blackened leaves and then cut the cabbage into wedges.
ingredients: cabbage, butter, cumin seed, dried red chilies, onion, carrot, desiccated coconut, salt, lemon juice
name: spiced cabbage with coconut

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix wet and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 400 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: brewed coffee, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, egg whites, fat free sour cream, rum
name: rum coffee muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on a cookie sheet. Place fish on the foil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with pesto, tomatoes and then cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until fish flakes with fork. To prevent wasting the rest of the pesto in the jar, i make one recipe for dinner and freeze the ingredients to have another day. Just place each of the ingredients in its own quart-size freezer bag, then place all in a gallon-size freezer bag along with directions and freeze. When ready to make, just thaw completely and follow the above directions to prepare.
ingredients: puff pastry, cherry tomatoes, bocconcini, pesto sauce
name: super easy appetizer tomato and pesto crostini

steps: Put the cherries in a large bowl and mix with the lemon and zest of the cherries. Mix with the lemon and zest of the cherries. Mix with the lemon and zest
ingredients: cherries, cider vinegar, lemon, zest of, star anise, cinnamon stick, cloves, vanilla essence, water, dark brown sugar
name: pickled cherries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: egg, chili sauce, milk, worcestershire sauce, onions, bell peppers, ground beef, salt and pepper, garlic powder, saltine crackers
name: 13 crackers meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: potatoes, boneless beef round steak, condensed cream of chicken soup, water, onion soup mix, pepper, garlic powder
name: round steak supper

steps: Cook pasta until half done. Drain. Return pasta to the pot. Add cheese. Toss and serve.
ingredients: penne, broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, pancetta, garlic cloves, chili flakes, parsley, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli pasta

steps: In a large skillet brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, green pepper, catsup, water, worcestershire sauce, salt, red pepper sauce, hamburger buns
name: awesome sloppy joes

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, bacon, onion, salt, sugar
name: crispy fried sweet potatoes

steps: Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced barley and bring to a boil. Cook until barley is tender, about 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley.
ingredients: beef stock, onion, pearl barley, beef, carrots, potatoes, celery ribs, dried rosemary
name: beef soup with barley

steps: Heat the coconut in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and red pepper flakes. Stir fry 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink and opaque. Add cilantro. Toss well and transfer to serving plates. Top each serving with 1 tablespoon toasted coconut and 1 tablespoon chopped peanuts. Garnish with lime wedges.
ingredients: vegetable oil, flour, salt, ground ginger, pepper, egg whites, unsweetened coconut, large shrimp
name: deep fried coconut shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Arrange pepper polenta cakes in single layer on greased baking tray. Sprinkle pepper polenta slices with salt, bake until soft and golden. Turn heat up to 515 and place pizza stone in oven. Roll out pizza dough on cornmeal coated paddle, lightly coat with oil. Sprinkle pizza with mozzarella and arrange eggplant in a spoke pattern. Sprinkle with tomatoes and dot with pesto. Bake 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: skim milk, polenta, garlic clove, cheddar cheese, red peppers, basil, olive oil
name: roast pepper polenta cakes

steps: Heat grill pan and have something heavy near by to weigh down the lid. Lighty oil pan and add panini. Press down on top with another pan or heavy plate, cook untill ightly browned. Flip and cook other side. Enoy. Add whatever additions.
ingredients: provolone cheese, sweet red pepper, onion, salt and pepper, ground beef, onion rolls
name: sweet red pepper provolone burgers

steps: In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, apples, raisins. Combine lemon juice and honey. Add to apple mixture. Chill. Just before serving, stir in sunflower kernels if desired.
ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, peanut butter, ground cinnamon, skim milk, apples
name: cottage cheese and apple snacks

steps: Place the hummus in a food processor and process until smooth. Add the yogurt and lemon juice. Process until smooth and well blended. Transfer to a tightly covered container and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving to allow the flavors to develop. Stored tightly covered in the refrigerator, hummus will keep for up to 3 days. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: garlic cloves, plain low-fat yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, paprika, pepper, chickpeas, fresh parsley
name: super healthy hummus

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter along with olive oil. Saute garlic and pepper flakes in olive oil in a large saucepan for 30 seconds over medium heat. Add orzo, stirring 2 minutes to coat with oil to prevent sticking. Season with salt to taste.
ingredients: orzo pasta, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, butter, basil leaves, garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, capers
name: basil butter orzo

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Put liners in muffin cups. Whisk together butter, brown sugar, milk, and egg in a bowl until combined well. Whisk together flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl. Add milk mixture and stir until just combined. Fold in blueberries gently. Divide batter among muffin cups and bake until golden brown and a wooden pick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, whole buttermilk, butter, eggs, fresh blueberries
name: blueberry cornmeal muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: chinese cabbage, sugar, white vinegar, soy sauce, salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil
name: stir fried spiced cabbage la pai ts ai

steps: With mixer on low speed blend, butter, eggs and water. By hand stir in cake mix. Add coconut and nuts. Chill dough for approximately 1 hour before placing on parchment lined baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with hand. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet.
ingredients: coconut fat, eggs, salt, icing sugar, cocoa, coffee, rum, lemon peel, butter cookies, nuts
name: german fridge cake

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add onion, basil, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until just tender, about 3-5 minutes. Add orange juice, bring to boil. Stir in snap peas and carrots. Reduce heat to medium. Cover. Cook 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Add parsley and zest. Transfer to serving bowl.
ingredients: frozen carrots, butter, chicken broth, sugar, salt, pepper, sugar snap pea, ground cumin
name: carrots with sugar snap peas

steps: In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender.
ingredients: butter, russet potato, red onion, flour, salt, pepper, milk, parsley
name: skillet scalloped potatoes

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning mix, salsa, cream cheese, taco shells, lettuce, chopped tomato, green onion, sour cream, cheddar cheese
name: creamy beef tacos

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat until onion starts to soften and brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add hot dogs, salt and pepper to taste, and any seasonings you are using. Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until hot dogs are browning. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, salt, potatoes, cayenne pepper, egg
name: potato and onion hash with a fried egg for one

steps: In small saucepan bring milk and cinnamon just to a boil. Stir in couscous. Remove pan from heat. Cover and allow to stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle salmon over top and serve.
ingredients: dark sesame oil, onion, evaporated skim milk, fat-free chicken broth, coconut extract, couscous, salmon, scallions, fresh ginger
name: high calcium salmon couscous

steps: Place the pinto beans, ham hock, garlic cloves, onion, red bell peppers, salt, black pepper, chili powder, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder, chili powder,
ingredients: dried pinto beans, ham hock, garlic cloves, onion, red bell peppers, salt, black pepper, chili powder
name: pioneer woman s campfire beans

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add the garlic and ginger, stir fry for 30 seconds. Add the mushrooms, celery and sesame oil and stir fry for 30 seconds. Add the shrimp, soy sauce and red pepper flakes, stir fry til shrimp are pink and cooked through, 3-4 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: canola oil, carrot, garlic cloves, sugar snap peas, mixed mushrooms, shrimp, flour, hoisin sauce, soy sauce
name: hoisin shrimp stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, low fat sweetened condensed milk, unsweetened cocoa, egg whites, all-purpose flour, baking powder, vanilla extract, cooking spray
name: moist low fat chocolate brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a mixing bowl, cream sugar and shortening together. Add eggs and almond extract and mix well. Combine flour, soda, powder and salt and gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in coconut and cherries, this will take a bit because the dough is very stiff. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto greased or non stick cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown. Cool on racks.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, sweetened flaked coconut, egg whites, almond extract, almonds
name: soft coconut macaroons

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, vanilla, unsweetened applesauce, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins, raisins,
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, egg, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, nuts, semi-sweet chocolate chips, shortening
name: cinnamon toffee bars

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small mixing bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: pie crusts, caramel candies, flour, lemon juice, jonathan apples, caramel ice cream topping, pecans
name: easy caramel apple pie

steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the middle, set aside. Mix the rest of the ingredients together in another medium sized bowl. Pour it in the middle of the dry ingredients, and stir just until it is mixed together. If you overstir it, it will become a tough piece of crap. Preheat an oven to 350 degrees and wait 2 minutes. Grease a loaf pan. Bake for about 45 minutes, until the crust is brown and if you stick a toothpick inside it will come out clean.
ingredients: self raising flour, butter, caster sugar, eggs, salt, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, lemon, milk
name: lakeland lemon cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, add all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with cheese, and ham. In a bowl, beat eggs, half-and-half, salt and mustard well. Pour over ham. Sprinkle with pepper and bacon if desired. Cover. At this point it can be refrigerated and baked in the morning. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes covered,. Uncover and bake additional 15 minutes or longer until edges are golden brown and knife inserted in center comes out clean. Cool slightly and cut around the hash brown patties to serve.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, ham, onion, cooking oil, eggs, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, fresh chives
name: morning mix up

steps: In a large salad serving bowl, toss together the feta, lemon juice, honey, and oil. In a smaller mixing bowl, mix together the feta, lemon juice, honey, and oil. Drizzle dressing over salad. Toss. Sprinkle chopped nuts over the top.
ingredients: lemon juice, honey, spinach leaves, seedless watermelon, blueberries, seedless cucumber, red onion, feta cheese
name: watermelon blueberry and spinach salad with feta

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: lentils, water, bay leaf, oil, wine vinegar, onion, carrot, pimientos, dried basil, garlic powder
name: lentil salad italiano

steps: Cook beans in a 5-quart pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest.
ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, olive oil, lemon juice, toasted almonds, salt, black pepper
name: green beans and almonds

steps: Heat a bit of oil in a large and fry the chicken until done. Shred or cut into bite-sized pieces, if desired. Remove from skillet and set aside. Add the can of soup, water, paprika, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Add the broccoli, mushrooms, and rice inches reduce heat to low and add chicken back in the skillet. Cover and cook until the rice is done, anywhere from 5-10 minutes. Let rest a few minutes.
ingredients: mayonnaise, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen broccoli cuts, velveeta cheese, rice
name: creamy chicken broccoli skillet

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian breadcrumbs, salt and pepper, egg, olive oil, monterey jack cheese, salsa
name: barbara s salsa chicken

steps: Put chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in the saucepan. Put the saucepan on the burner and turn on the stove to low. Stir and stir until the mixture is melted and smooth. Remove from heat. Turn off the burner and quickly add the chow mein noodles and the peanuts. Mix and stir until they are evenly coated. Cover the cookie sheets with wax paper. Drop the candy by teaspoonfuls onto the wax paper-covered cookie sheets. Put the cookie sheets into the refrigerator to cool the candies. When they are cool, take them off the waxed paper. Put them in plastic bags. Keep them in the refrigerator.
ingredients: butterscotch chips, chocolate chips, chow mein noodles, nuts
name: noodle candy

steps: Cook beef and drain fat. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix well. Serve with tortilla chips. Cover tightly and refridgerate leftovers no more than 2 days. Do not reheat. Mix well before serving cold.
ingredients: ground beef, lettuce, catalina dressing, onion, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: catalina taco salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: vegetable oil, frozen hash brown potatoes, green peppers, onion, eggs, milk, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese
name: hash browns frittata

steps: In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the chocolate and butterscotch chips. Stir until smooth. Stir in granola and walnuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto waxed paper-lined baking sheets. Refrigerate for 15 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: white chocolate, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, walnuts, cashews
name: nut clusters

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. Brush
ingredients: mackerel, white vinegar, onions, mustard seeds, celery seed, turmeric, salt, water
name: soused mackerel

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, flour, vanilla, egg, margarine, white bread
name: two easy peach cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, red onion, bacon, balsamic vinaigrette, low fat mozzarella
name: balsamic roasted brussels sprouts

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, sweet onion, tomatoes, vegetable stock, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil, garlic
name: tomato basil soup

steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the peppers in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, almonds, honey, sherry wine vinegar, fresh parsley
name: roasted bell peppers with honey and almonds

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease four 9 x 5-in loaf pans. Cream butter, sugar and eggs. Mix sour cream and soda in a separate bowl. Let stand until foamy. Add vanilla, bananas, salt and flour. Mix well. Place in 4 prepared loaf pans. Bake for 50 minutes or until cake tests done.
ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, whole wheat flour, baking soda, mashed banana, nonfat sour cream
name: fat free almost banana bread

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook onion and garlic in olive oil and teaspoon of butter until softened. Add risotto and stir until rice has absorbed all the oil and butter. Add vermouth and cook for another minute or two. Stir in chicken broth and whipping cream, mix well and bring to a boil over high heat. Remove, cover and place in the oven for 18-20 minutes remove from oven and stir in butter and parmesan. Drizzle lightly with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkle with a little more parmesan and fresh cracked pepper.
ingredients: beef broth, onion, butter, arborio rice, gorgonzola, heavy cream, walnuts, walnut halves, parmesan cheese, parsley
name: risotto with gorgonzola and walnuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake in a preheated oven of 375 f for 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: cooking spray, bananas, dark brown sugar, ground cinnamon, refrigerated pie crusts, ice cream
name: banana empanadas

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad.
ingredients: egg, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, garlic cloves, lea & perrins worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, olive oil, dry mustard, tabasco sauce
name: blender caesar salad dressing

steps: Heat butter in skillet. Add butter, garlic, onion soup mix, tomato puree, brown sugar, soy sauce, white vinegar, chili sauce, spareribs. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 45 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: butter, garlic, onion soup mix, tomato puree, brown sugar, soy sauce, white vinegar, chili sauce, spareribs
name: chinese style spareribs

steps: In a large saucepan combine the chocolate, cream, butter and butter and heat over moderate heat, stirring, until chocolate is completely melted. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and a pinch of salt. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Keep in an airtight container, chilled, for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: dark chocolate, unsalted butter, heavy cream, brandy
name: big batch rich chocolate truffles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and line large cookie sheets with parchment paper. In a large bowl, add the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and raisins. Stirring to blend well. Stir in the raisins and nuts. Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on baking sheets and bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until edges are browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack.
ingredients: quark, milk, oil, sugar, vanilla powder, salt, flour, baking powder, raisins, egg white
name: raisin vanilla plaits

steps: Place meatballs in crock pot. In a medium sized bowl mix together all remaining ingredients. Microwave on high for approximately 3 minutes or until boiling. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour.
ingredients: milk, ground beef, salt, pepper, quick-cooking oats, water, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, white sugar
name: baked bbq meatballs

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 3-4 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir together. Top with cheese, sour cream, or tortilla chips, if desired.
ingredients: dried pinto beans, boneless chicken breast, low sodium chicken broth, sweet corn, diced tomatoes with green chilies, green chilies, cumin, salsa, cilantro
name: slow cooker southwestern chicken and beans

steps: Combine mascarpone, powdered sugar, and raspberry essence in a medium bowl. Beat until creamy. Spread mixture evenly onto crust. Chill thoroughly in the refridgerator for at least 1 hour. Arrange sliced fruit over pie before serving.
ingredients: fresh raspberry, mascarpone cheese, sugar, vanilla essence
name: mascarpone dessert with raspberry puree

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, chili sauce, orange marmalade, dijon mustard, honey, butter, dark brown sugar, garlic powder
name: honey orange glazed chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: baby spinach, garlic scape, parmesan cheese, olive oil, butter, salt, fresh ground pepper, pasta
name: spinach garlic scapes pasta

steps: Melt butter in a large skilloet over medium heat, tilting pan to coat completely. Add carrots and cook for 1 minute. Add sugar and stir to combine, cook for 1 minute. Add chicken broth, grated ginger, raisins, salt and pepper and cook for 20 minutes or until carrots are tender when pierced with a fork. Serve warm. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: baby carrots, salt, butter, honey, brown sugar, lemon, juice of, fresh ground black pepper
name: simple honey glazed carrots
