steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Brown well on all sides and remove to baking dish. Add red curry and turmeric to skillet. Cook until fragrant and dissolved. Add coconut milk, fish sauce, lime juice and sugar. Stirring, bring sauce to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour curry sauce over chicken and bake 40-45 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve with jasmine rice or rice noodles with sauce spooned over top.
ingredients: fryer chickens, oyster sauce, garlic, black pepper, soy sauce, sugar, sea salt, lemongrass
name: supatra s thai chicken gai yang

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix all ingredients except onions and cheese together. Coat 9x11 casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Place the onions in a single layer in the casserole and pour chicken broth mixture evenly over all the onions. Cover onions and bake for 1 hour. After hour, remove and sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven uncovered and bake 5 more minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: margarine, dark corn syrup, water, white pearl onion
name: quick glazed onions

steps: In a plastic container with a lid, combine all ingredients. Seal and place in freezer until frozen solid. Take out of freezer and let thaw. Drink when it has thawed and is slushy. Or put in blender and blend until slushy. Garnish with fresh cranberries, zest of a lime or an orange slice.
ingredients: ice, vodka, grand marnier, orange juice, orange slice
name: that orange thing

steps: Heat grill. In a large skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly.
ingredients: shoulder lamb chops, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, apple juice, chicken stock, maple syrup, lemon juice, granny smith apple, prunes, salt and fresh pepper
name: maple and apple braised lamb shoulder chops

steps: Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, butter, parmesan cheese, salt
name: amazing simple pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, egg yolk, vanilla extract, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: chewy choco chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, shrimp, salt, lemon juice, dry white wine, butter, flat leaf parsley
name: another shrimp scampi

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving.
ingredients: cooked turkey, onion, green beans, condensed cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, shredded cheddar cheese, mashed potatoes
name: turkey potato casserole

steps: In a saucepan, place chopped celery and water and cover. Bring to a boil and boil for about 20 minutes or until celery is tender but not mushy. In a separate large saucepan, make a thin white sauce with the butter, flour, milk and salt and pepper. When creamy, add undrained celery and peanut butter. Stir together well. When soup is well blended and creamy, taste. Add more salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: butter, celery, onion, chunky peanut butter, chicken broth, frozen corn, light cream
name: peanut butter corn chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Stir well. In a 1-cup measure, dissolve coffee granules in coffee liqueur and whiskey. Add enough milk to measure 1 cup. Whisk egg in a bowl with coffee-milk mixture. Whisk in melted butter. Gently stir liquid into dry ingredients just until moistened. Spoon into muffin tin. Bake at 375 for 25 minutes, or until the top springs back when gently touched.
ingredients: extra strong coffee, cream, sugar, cornstarch, egg, whipped cream
name: coffee cream kaffeecreme

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: water, milk, olive oil, sugar, salt, fresh rosemary, parmesan cheese, bread flour, yeast, sun-dried tomato
name: rosemary tomato parmesan bread

steps: Place pita sandwich on top of 1 slice of toast, then cover with other one. Press down and cut the sandwich diagonally. Place pita sandwich on top of 1 slice of toast, then cover with other one. Place
ingredients: whole wheat pita bread, low-fat cream cheese, spinach, ranch dressing, turkey breast
name: pita sandwich with turkey

steps: Melt butter in a ramekin or baking dish. Add eggs. Sprinkle with cheese. Season with pepper. Bake at 350 degrees f about 10 minutes, or until eggs are as done as desired.
ingredients: butter, bacon, green onions, eggs, light sour cream, feta cheese, cracked black pepper, toast
name: feta bacon scrambled eggs for 1

steps: Put water in pot add potatoes. Cook potatoes until a little soft. Add vegetables and cook until desired texture of veges. Olive oil or butter can be spread on top. Salt and pepper to desired taste. Since i am always watching my weight i do not put butter or olive oil on top only salt and pepper.
ingredients: zucchini, water, salt, pepper, pesto sauce
name: mashed not potatoes squash

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cucumbers, salt, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sugar, sesame oil, scallions, fresh gingerroot
name: chinese cucumber salad

steps: Mix all ingredients except steak in a 13x9x2 inch glass baking dish. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least two hours, turning occasionally. Preheat grill or broiler to medium high heat. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on a platter and serve.
ingredients: extra firm tofu, salt and pepper, flour, olive oil, garlic, margarine, soy sauce, white wine, sugar, green onion
name: tofu garlic steak

steps: Heat oven to 350c. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. Bake,
ingredients: chicken breasts, walnuts, chili peppers, garlic, yoghurt, olive oil, dried bread
name: cherkez chicken

steps: In a large soup pot, saute the onions in oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth.
ingredients: refried beans, jalapenos, hot pepper sauce, garlic powder, romaine lettuce hearts, tomatoes, lime, juice of, salt, extra virgin olive oil
name: extra spicy refried beans with lettuce tomato and lime

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, combine breadcrumbs, egg, cream of mushroom soup, fresh mushrooms, onion, black pepper, salt, ketchup, breadcrumbs. Mix well together and pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Place peg s old canadian salmon loaf on top and bake until biscuits are done.
ingredients: pink salmon, egg, cream of mushroom soup, fresh mushrooms, onion, black pepper, salt, ketchup, breadcrumbs
name: peg s old canadian salmon loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, mayonnaise, garlic clove, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted red pepper
name: 3 in 1 italian dip

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, all-purpose flour, half-and-half, ground nutmeg, salt, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: garlic alfredo sauce

steps: Bring 4 quarts of salted water to a boil in a large saucepan. Remove any torn or discolored outer leaves from the spouts and then trim and cut out cores. Add sprouts to the boiling water and blanch for 3-5 minutes. Drain and fince with cold water until cool enough to handle. Separate brussels sprouts into leaves and blot dry with paper towels. In a skilled cook bacon over medium heat for 5-10 minutes or until crisp. Remove and drain on paper towels. Discard all but 1 tablespoon of the bacon drippings. Reduce heat to medium low and add sprout leaves, bacon pieces, thyme, salt and pepper. Saute for 2-5 minutes, tossing gently or until heated through.
ingredients: bacon, bacon drippings, brussels sprouts, olive oil, salt, granulated garlic, chervil
name: sauteed brussels sprouts with chervil

steps: Place steaks in a plastic ziplock bag, or plastic container. In a small bowl, whisk together all the remaining ingredients. Pour over steaks. Turn to coat evenly. Chill for at least 6 hours. Turning occasionally to redistribute marinade. After marinating, heat grill on med-high. Remove steaks from marinade and place on hot grill. Grill for about 4 minutes on each side or to desired doneness.
ingredients: porterhouse steaks, brown sugar, fresh gingerroot, garlic cloves, dried tarragon, soy sauce, red wine vinegar
name: marinade for steak porterhouse sirloin or any beef cuts

steps: In a small saucepan heat water to simmer. Add in honey and stir til combined, turn off heat. Add in cinnamon and soy sauce stirring til incorporated. In a 9x12 casserole dish put frozen spinach, baby carrots in first. Place chicken on top of vegetables. Pour sauce over top of chicken and veggies. Put onion slices and butter pats on top. Cook in 350 oven for 45 minutes or until juices run clear from chicken. Check chicken at 20 min mark and baste with juices.
ingredients: soy sauce, plum jam, honey, garlic, boneless chicken breast halves
name: plum delicious chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line 12 muffin tins with paper or foil liners. In a nonstick skillet, melt the butter with the brown sugar over moderately high heat. Add the banana slices and cook, turning once, until caramelized, about 3 minutes. The bananas shold be softened and sticky. Remove from the heat and let cool. In a large bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and vanilla. Stack the toasted bread, slice off the crusts and cut the bread into 4 triangles. Add the bread to the custard and let soack unti the custard is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the cooled caramelized bananas and the chocolate. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin cups. Bake the puddings until puffy and golden, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: vanilla wafers, fresh raspberry, bananas, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, cold water, instant white chocolate pudding and pie filling mix, whipping cream
name: raspberry banana white chocolate pudding pie

steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. While the pasta is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warm. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve.
ingredients: pasta, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, oregano, marjoram, thyme, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: spaghetti alla checca

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, oats, eggs, unsweetened applesauce, bananas, fresh blueberries
name: healthy blueberry banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: instant coffee granules, hot water, chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, sour cream, vegetable oil, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, whipping cream
name: mocha chip bundt cake

steps: Place all fruit in serving container. Pour lemon pudding powder onto fruit and stir. Add can of pineapple with liquid. Refridgerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: pineapple, papaya, seedless grapes, apple, pecans, banana, lime juice, lime
name: fresh pineapple fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs, coating well. In 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish, arrange chicken. Bake uncovered 20 minutes. Pour pasta sauce over chicken, then top with cheese. Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. To serve, arrange chicken and sauce on rolls.
ingredients: chicken breast fillet, egg, milk, salt & pepper, breadcrumbs, oil, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: chicken parmesan

steps: Heat oven to 350°F. Place pizza dough, greek salad dressing, boneless chicken breast, spinach dip, english cucumber, red pepper, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vinaigrette, cooked spaghetti, dressing, feta cheese, vina
ingredients: pizza dough, greek salad dressing, boneless chicken breast, spinach dip, english cucumber, red pepper, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese
name: greek salad pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, all-purpose flour, beef broth, potato pierogies, frozen mixed vegetables, salt, black pepper, italian seasoning, cheddar cheese
name: pierogi beef skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: rye bread, water, salt, caraway seed, sour cream, egg yolk
name: rye bread soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place the turtle trifle on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Drizzle with white balsamic vinegar and serve with crusty bread and an assortment of crackers.
ingredients: mascarpone cheese, whipping cream, vanilla extract, pecan pie, chocolate fudge topping, caramel topping, pecans
name: turtle trifle

steps: Cook lobster until tender. While lobster are cooking, combine olive oil, rice wine vinegar, wine if using, mustard, salt and pepper in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When lobster are tender peel or not. Dice lobsters. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave.
ingredients: lobsters, fennel bulbs, tomatoes, arugula, white truffle oil, extra virgin olive oil, white balsamic vinegar, lemon, fresh tarragon, salt and pepper
name: warm lobster salad with arugula and truffle oil

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: medium pasta shells, spreadable cheese with garlic and herbs, milk, lemon peel, lemon juice, zucchini, smoked salmon, fresh chives
name: pasta with smoked salmon lemon cream

steps: In a 4-quart saucepan, combine the cranberries, water and sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add fresh and dried cranberries and cook until dried berries soften and fresh berries begin to pop, stirring often. Remove from heat and stir in marmalade, juice, orange zest and allspice. Cool completely. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Can be made 3 days ahead.
ingredients: frozen cranberries, fresh orange juice, sugar, liquid honey, cinnamon stick, whole cloves
name: favorite cranberry sauce

steps: Put the passion fruit in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour brandy over the passion fruit. Pour brandy into a glass filled with crushed ice. Pour brand
ingredients: pinot grigio wine, brandy, passion fruit nectar, sugar, plums, plum
name: steamy passion

steps: In large saucepan, over medium heat, combine shrimp, vegetable oil, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, orange marmalade, hoisin sauce, bibb lettuce, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber, cucumber
ingredients: shrimp, vegetable oil, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and pepper, orange marmalade, hoisin sauce, bibb lettuce, cucumber
name: gump shrimp wraps

steps: Put puff pastry, swiss cheese, slivered almonds in a large bowl. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 to 45 minutes or until center is firm. Reheats nicely.
ingredients: puff pastry, cooked ham, swiss cheese, slivered almonds
name: ham and swiss spirals

steps: Brown pork chops in skillet, over low heat, on both sides and pour off drippings. Combine water, vinegar, brown sugar, and seasonings. Mix well and pour over the chops. Add the spricots and prunes and cover. Continue cooking for about 40 minutes or until chops are tender. Remove from skillet to a serving platter and set aside. Add water slowly to cornstarch in small cup, stirring to blend. Gradually add this to the skillet and stir until thickened and well combined. About 5 minutes. Pour over the chops and serve.
ingredients: pork loin, salt, onion, frozen orange juice concentrate, brown sugar, allspice, lemon juice, water, sweet potatoes in syrup, orange
name: orange pork chop skillet for 2

steps: Preheat oven to 275f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: hamburger bun, hamburger patty, cheese, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, pickled jalapeno peppers, mayonnaise, yellow onion, bacon
name: jalapeno bacon burger

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the sausage and jalapenos, breaking up the meat and cooking until it is no longer pink. Drain the fat. Add the cornbread. Fold in the pumpkin, broth, cranberries, and sage. For drier stuffing, omit the broth.
ingredients: black japonica, white bread, black bread, onion, celery, chicken broth, celery top, eggs, rubbed sage
name: black japonica stuffing

steps: Place chicken strips on skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, chicken breast fillets, wooden skewers, sesame seeds, fresh thyme leaves, salt, chili oil, lemon, mixed salad green, pita bread. Place chicken strips on skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, chicken breast fillets, wooden skewers, sesame seeds, fresh thyme leaves, salt, chili oil
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, chicken breast fillets, wooden skewers, sesame seeds, fresh thyme leaves, salt, chili oil, lemon, mixed salad green, pita bread
name: chicken skewers with zathar thyme and sesame marinade

steps: Heat butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, large shrimp, salt, fresh ground pepper, dry white wine, lemon juice, fresh parsley, parsley sprig
name: shrimp garlic w white wine

steps: In a 2 to 3 quart pan, combine butter, onion, flour, milk, crushed tomatoes, herbs, salt and pepper. Stir occasionally over medium heat until onion is limp and slightly tinged with brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in flour to coat onion. Gradually stir in broth, and bring to a boil on high heat. Add potato and carrots. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in basil. Ladle into bowl and offer cheese to add to taste.
ingredients: fresh basil, onion, butter, paprika, garlic cloves, cream cheese, cream of tomato soup, milk, stewed tomatoes
name: hearty cream of tomato basil soup

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan forced. Place salmon in a baking dish and pour over stock and season, cover with foil and bake for 10 to 15 minutes o until just cooked through. Remove from oven and cool salmon in stock for 10 minutes. Remove the salmon from the stock. Add sour cream, cucumber, wine and tarragon to stock and whisk to combine, season and transfer to a jug. Meanwhile steam potato over a saucepan of simmering water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender. Place salmon and potato on plates and top salmon with cucumber sauce and tarragon leaves and drizzle oil over potatoes and season and serve.
ingredients: lebanese cucumbers, smoked salmon, light sour cream, garlic clove, mint, dill, lime juice, salt & pepper
name: smoked salmon cucumber cups

steps: In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, onion, garlic, lime and lemon juices, cayenne, tandoori paste, and sugar and puree. In a gallon size zip top bag, put pieces of selected meat and pour in marinade. Seal bag, removing as much air as possible. Allow steak to marinate for at least 1 hour in refrigerator. Then grill or broil selected meat to doneness.
ingredients: olive oil, tomato sauce, red wine vinegar, black pepper, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, fresh cilantro, fresh garlic cloves, hot sauce, shrimp
name: fantastic marinade for grilled shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: pizza dough, butter, chocolate hazelnut spread, semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate chips, white chocolate chips, hazelnuts
name: chocolate pizza

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, onion, celery, salad dressing, sugar, prepared mustard, vinegar, salt, milk
name: amish potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Put peaches in 9x12 baking dish with the margarine. Place in oven. Meanwhile, in small bowl, mix sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt. Pour over melted margarine and peaches. Do not stir. Place back in 350 degree oven and bake 1 hour or until golden brown.
ingredients: sugar, flour, milk, baking powder, peaches
name: libba s peach cobbler

steps: In a medium saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer, stirring occasionally until the sugar dissolves. Add lemon peel and lemon juice, stir and remove from heat. Let cool completely, then strain into a clean pitcher. In a blender, puree the pint of strawberries and add to the lemon juice. Stir well and refrigerate. In a blender,
ingredients: strawberry, seedless oranges, fresh lime juice, splenda granular, sparkling water, ice cube
name: strawberry citrus refreshers

steps: Add all ingredients to the bread machine in the order listed. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. Bake at
ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, vegetable oil, bread flour, salt
name: softest ever bread machine bread

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: fresh spinach, olive oil, pine nuts, garlic clove, raisins, salt, pepper
name: spinaci alla romana

steps: In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and saute 1 minute. Add mushrooms and saute 3 minutes, until mushrooms release juice. Add broccoli and rosemary and cook 3 to 5 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, button mushrooms, broccoli, fresh rosemary, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: garlic spiked broccoli and mushrooms with rosemary

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: vegetable oil, green bell pepper, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast, chunky salsa, sliced ripe olives, corn tortillas, monterey jack cheese, sour cream
name: spicy chicken enchilada casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut pumpkin cinnamon rolls in half crosswise to create 2 short round rolls. Press each half roll into one muffin cup, forming it into a cup shape. Mix together cinnamon roll dough, fresh blueberries, blueberry preserves, lemon peel, pecans, milk, and salt. Bake 12 minutes at 350 degrees until golden brown. Cool for 10 minutes in the muffin tin, then remove and place on wire rack. Drizzle icing over rolls.
ingredients: pizza dough, unsweetened applesauce, pumpkin butter, dried cranberries, flax seeds, powdered sugar, orange juice
name: almost no fat harvest pumpkin cinnamon rolls

steps: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan. Add the jalapeno, corn and onion. Saute until the vegetables are tender. Stir in the sour cream. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Cook
ingredients: long-grain rice, sour cream, jalapeno peppers, cheddar cheese
name: jalapeo rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Pour the olive oil into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the olive oil and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Serve warm.
ingredients: chickpeas, bay leaves, egg yolks, olive oil, red wine vinegar, onions, garlic cloves, parsley, capers, salt
name: libyan marinated chickpeas

steps: Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, light italian dressing, french bread, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese
name: italian chicken sandwiches

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, brown ground sirloin or quickly stir fry chicken strips until no longer pink. Use a drop of vegetable is necessary. Remove with a slotted spoon. Season the meat with one of the seasoning packets from the noodles. Set aside. In the same skillet, combine water, vegetables, noodles, ginger and remaining seasoning packet. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and simmer 3 minutes until noodles are tender, stirring occasionally. Return meat to skillet. Stir in green onion.
ingredients: ground beef, oriental-flavor instant ramen noodles, water, frozen oriental-style vegetables, ground ginger, onion
name: oriental beef noodle toss

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and use muffin pan, lined with paper liners. In a small bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, salt, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, egg, plain yogurt, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, lemon extract, beating until smooth. Add flour mixture, beating just until smooth. Scoop batter into prepared pan. Bake in preheated oven for 22 to 25 minutes or until tops of cupcakes spring back when lightly touched. Let cool in pan on rack for 10 minutes. Remove from pan and let cool completely on rack. Top cooled cupcakes with your favorite icing.
ingredients: eggs, egg whites, granulated sugar, lemons, fresh lemon juice, fresh orange juice, pie crusts, icing sugar
name: french lemon tart lightened up version

steps: Cook potatoes until tender and mash them. Cook broccoli until tender. Dot casserole dish with butter or mushroom. Add broccoli. Top the broccoli with the mushroom soup and grated cheese. Add the mashed potatoes on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Bake in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, eggs, onion, milk, bacon, butter, salt, pepper
name: koshie potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Remove seeds from chilies. Slice open the chilies and line a 9x13 casserole with half of them. Cover chilies with half of the cheddar and half of the jack cheese. Use the rest of the chilies on top of the cheeses. Beat the egg whites till stiff peak. Beat the yolks and add flour, milk, salt and. Pepper. Fold in whites and pour over top of chilies and cheese. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Top with the remaining cheeses. Top with salsa, if desired.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, eggs, flour, half-and-half cream, green chilies, picante sauce
name: chile relleno torta

steps: Melt butter in small sauce pan. Add flour, milk, salt and pepper. Boil until thick and then remove from heat. Add salmon and slighty beaten egg yolks. Beat egg whites until stiff and fold inches. Pour into greased souffle dish or other deep baking dish. Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: sausage, eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt, cheese, hash browns, flour, green pepper
name: breakfast souffle

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. Add parmesan cheese and stir well. Add parmesan cheese
ingredients: chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, beef bouillon cubes, italian seasoning, minced garlic clove, olive oil, parmesan cheese, pepper, red pepper flakes
name: darthlaurie s indispensable basic pasta sauce

steps: Combine all ingredients to tortilla. I spread the french onion dip. Put the meats, cheese, lettuce, tomato, bacon bits, salsa. Roll up and slice in half. Serve with tortilla chips and more salsa cold.
ingredients: 10-inch flour tortillas, mixed cheeses, lettuce, cooked bacon, salsa, turkey
name: mexi club wrap

steps: In a large mixing bowl, add butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, cocoa, baking powder, salt, oats, nuts. Beat until light and fluffy. Add in the walnuts. Mix until well blended. Add in the oats. Stir well to mix. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of dough 2-inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 10-14 minutes or until a light golden brown. Cool for 1 minute, then transfer to cooling rack.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, cocoa, baking powder, salt, oats, nuts
name: chewy oatmeal brownies

steps: Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Stir to mix well. Cover and cook on low 6-9 hours. Cook rice as directed. Serve chicken a la king over a mound of rice.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, evaporated skim milk, hot water, dried parsley flakes, black pepper, onion, frozen whole kernel corn, raw potatoes, cooked chicken breasts, frozen peas
name: calico chicken chowder crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350, wrap garlic in foil, roast about 1 hour. Peel and put in a small bowl, and mash. Cook potatoes in pot of boiling water until tender, about 20 minutes, drain. Heat oil in pot over medium heat, add garlic and shallots. Saute 2 minutes. Add to potatoes, mash potatoes with garlic and shallots, add the butter, cheese and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: red potatoes, milk, garlic & herb spreadable cheese, butter
name: garlic herb mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix nuts, pineapple, and coconut in large bowl. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt and add to nut mixture. Mix well until mixture is completely coated with flour. Beat eggs until foamy and add vanilla to eggs. Pour egg mixture into dry mixture and stir until combined. Divide evenly between two 9 x 5 greased loaf pans and bake for 60-70 minutes or until centers test done. Remove from pans and cool completely on racks. Wrap in foil or plastic wrap and refrigerate.
ingredients: macadamia nuts, water, sea salt, lemon, juice of, pine nuts
name: macadamia pine nut cheese

steps: In a saucepan, brown the broccoli in oil about 4 minutes at medium heat. Add remaining veggies and keep cooking 1 minute. Add chicken stock and pesto. Bring to boil and let simmer until the broccoli is tender, 2 to 3 minutes. Add pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, celery ribs, chicken stock, broccoli, cannellini beans, evaporated milk, salt and pepper
name: yummy broccoli veggie soup

steps: In a small bowl, combine eggs, half-and-half, brown sugar, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans, vanilla extract, french bread, butter, maple syrup, pecans, brown sugar, pecans,
ingredients: cooked ham, pineapple preserves, apricot preserves, dark brown sugar, pecan halves, maraschino cherry
name: golden praline ham

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: sugar, milk, flour, cocoa, light corn syrup, butter, vanilla, pecans
name: mackinac island butter pecan fudge

steps: In a saucepan, heat stock, orange zest, orange juice, tarragon, oil, and vinegar. Simmer 2 to 3 minutes, then chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours. Just before serving, arrange salad greens, turkey, and grapefruit in a serving dish. Pour dressing on salad and toss well. Garnish with tarragon sprigs.
ingredients: orange roughy fillets, tarragon, paprika, kosher salt, olive oil
name: orange roughy with tarragon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread diane on chops. Sprinkle lemon juice, horseradish, mustard, dressing and wine. Bake in preheated 350f oven for 1 hour or until done.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, fresh parsley, garlic, salt, pepper
name: pork chops diane

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, salt and pepper, creole seasoning, olive oil, red onion, light brown sugar, rum, cider vinegar
name: voodoo chicken with sweet and sour onions robin miller

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: oats, salt, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, peanut butter, peanut butter chips
name: ez peanut butter bars

steps: Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, hot sauce, bleu cheese salad dressing, prepared pizza crust, mozzarella cheese
name: buffalo chicken pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine brown sugar, margarine, milk, smooth peanut butter, cocoa, icing sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, baking powder, salt, crunchy peanut butter. Spread in a greased 7x11-inch greased baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until it is set in the center. Cool completely and cut in squares.
ingredients: brown sugar, margarine, milk, smooth peanut butter, cocoa, icing sugar, vanilla extract
name: chocolate peanut butter icing

steps: Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through.
ingredients: olive oil, sea scallops, cilantro, garlic clove, fresh lime juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper, crusty bread
name: sauted scallops with lime

steps: In a large skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add chicken breasts and cook until lightly browned, about 20 minutes. Remove chicken to a warm serving platter. Stir flour into pan drippings in skillet, cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken broth, half and half. Stir and cook until the sauce thickens and bubbbles, add in mustard, capers and frozen peas. Return chicken to skillet, cover and heat for 10 minutes. Garnish with tomatoes and sprinkle with parsley. We typically serve with tortolini or other pasta and cover with extra dijon sauce.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mayonnaise, sour cream, stone ground dijon mustard, garlic powder, panko breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: panko mustard chicken ala moi

steps: Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, pepper, cream-style cottage cheese, cream cheese, medium noodlespreparation:Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Stir in tomato sauce,
ingredients: ground beef, chili sauce, fine egg noodles, onion, onion soup, water
name: onion noodle burger skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 190 degrees c. Bring the stock to the boil. Place couscous in a bowl and pour the boiling stock over. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and leave to steam for 10 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork, and add all ingredients except the tomatoes. Season to taste with the salt and pepper. Slice a top off each tomato, and using a teaspoon, hollow out, remove and discard seeds. Fill each tomato with couscous mix, and replace top as a lid. Place stuffed tomatoes on a baking tray and bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: whole wheat couscous, frozen green pea, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, feta cheese, of fresh mint, salt and black pepper
name: couscous with sun dried tomatoes feta cheese and mint

steps: Place the lettuce in the center of a salad plate, add bacon, onion, buttermilk, sour cream, ranch dressing mix, fresh basil, garlic, iceberg lettuce, basil, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce, lettuce,
ingredients: bacon, onion, buttermilk, sour cream, ranch dressing mix, fresh basil, garlic, iceberg lettuce, basil
name: lettuce wedge salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine eggs, cream, chives, salt and pepper in bowl and blend well. Sprinkle shredded cheese into bottom of baked pie shell. Pour egg mixture over top of cheese and sprinkle with the bacon. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
ingredients: unbaked pie shell, cooked bacon, eggs, half-and-half cream, dried thyme, white pepper, gruyere cheese, white cheddar cheese
name: bacon and double cheese quiche

steps: Whisk together sugar, cocoa, water, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a saucepan over medium heat. Add milk and cook, stirring, until hot. Add vanilla and stir. Pour chocolate into serving cups and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and nutmeg and serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: milk, apple pie spice, dark chocolate, sugar, cinnamon sticks, heavy cream
name: sugar and spice hot chocolate

steps: Heat oil in a large pan. Saute onions and garlic till translucent. Add remaining ingredients except for butter just to heat through. Stir in pasta. Place into a large pasta bowl. Top with butter while hot. Garnish with pepper flakes to taste.
ingredients: angel hair pasta, sour cream, le seuer peas, baby carrots, white chicken meat, butter, water, milk
name: easy creamy pasta anyway you like it

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: pecans, cambozola cheese, cream cheese, fresh ground pepper, dried apricot halves, fresh parsley
name: dried apricots with blue cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, and crushed pineapple. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, sugar, salt, vanilla, cranberries, crushed pineapple in juice, salad oil, eggs
name: cranberry pineapple cake

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable
ingredients: onion, green pepper, boneless pork chops, cream of mushroom soup, soy sauce, salt and pepper, aluminum foil
name: grilled pork chops packets

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: peanut butter, light brown sugar, egg, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: jilldo s peanut butter truffle cookies

steps: Combine all ingredients in blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Press fruit mixture through a fine-mesh strainer over a bowl to extract juices. Discard solids and pour mixture into 3-ounce paper or plastic drink cups or pop molds. Cover cups with foil. Cut a slit in the foil and insert wooden sticks. Freeze several hours or overnight until pops are firm. Remove from cups or molds to serve.
ingredients: frozen strawberries, water, pineapple sherbet, frozen orange juice concentrate
name: blender fruit pops

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or to your own preference.
ingredients: greek yogurt, dijon mustard, fresh dill, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, salmon fillets
name: roasted salmon with herbed yogurt

steps: Place deep fried clams in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until clams are tender, about 12 minutes. Add egg, milk, salt, butter, flour, clam, oil, and simmer until clams are tender, about 12 minutes. Add egg, milk, salt, butter, flour, clam, oil,
ingredients: egg, milk, salt, butter, flour, clam, oil
name: new england deep fried clams

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: butter, honey, eggs, banana, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans
name: honey banana bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, lemon slices, brown sugar, tangerine peel, tangerine juice, margarine
name: tangerine sweet potatoes

steps: In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated.
ingredients: pickling cucumber, green bell pepper, red onion, salt, honey, cider vinegar, fresh dill sprigs, mustard seeds
name: sweet dill cucumber crisps

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, cornstarch, crushed red pepper flakes, orange juice, heinz 57 steak sauce, orange marmalade, slivered almonds, steamed rice, orange zest
name: chicken l orange

steps: In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, butter, lemon, rind of, salt
name: lemon dessert sauce

steps: In a large roasting pan toss korean bean paste, water, bean paste, garlic, dashi, hot pepper paste, zucchini, potato, fresh mushrooms, onion, soft tofu. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the water, then the spinach. Bring the soup to a boil, then lower the flame. Place a tight-fitting lid on the pot and simmer for 10 minutes. Bring the soup to
ingredients: water, bean paste, garlic, dashi, hot pepper paste, zucchini, potato, fresh mushrooms, onion, soft tofu
name: korean bean paste soup chigae

steps: Boil eggplants until soft. Saute onion, chopped shrimp, and celery in butter or oil. Combine with eggplant. Put in baking pan and sprinkle with bread crumbs or cracker crumbs. Bake approximately 30 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: eggplants, salt, olive oil, basil leaves, feta
name: eggplant aubergine and feta rolls

steps: In a ziploc bag add all ingrients except butter. Marinate 6-8 hours. Remove bag 30 minutes before cooking. Melt butter in heavy bottom skillet. Sear steaks until desired doneness. 5 minutes each side for rare, 10 minutes each side for well done.
ingredients: filet mignon steaks, olive oil, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, butter, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard
name: marinated filet mignon with flavored butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour the dried garbanzo beans into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the garbanzo beans and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Serve warm.
ingredients: dried garbanzo beans, cayenne, salt, paprika, garlic salt
name: chick nuts roasted chickpeas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: salmon fillets, sesame seeds, sesame oil, red onion, salt, pepper, ginger, butter, rice vinegar, coconut milk
name: sesame crusted wild salmon

steps: Place roast and onion in crock pot sprayed with pam. Add cornstarch and water. Turn crock pot on high for 1 hour and then cook on low for 5-6 hours. Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and add last 15 minutes of cooking time which will help make the gravy. Remove loin onto a serving plate. This recipe will go well with rice, potatoes or noodles.
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, cranberry sauce, sugar, orange juice, dry mustard, ground cloves, cornstarch, cold water, salt and pepper
name: crock pot cranberry pork roast

steps: Slice the mangoes in half or into thirds or whatever size you desire to thread on the skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the mangoes and discard the marinade. Thread mangoes on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat.
ingredients: salad dressing, smooth peanut butter, chicken broth, honey, light soy sauce, garlic powder, tabasco sauce, avocados, mangoes, skewer
name: bbq mango avocado skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3
ingredients: vegetable crackers, parmesan cheese, milk, salmon fillets, olive oil, butter, white sauce mix, water, dijon mustard, salt and pepper
name: crusted fish with wine mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: cauliflower, low-fat margarine, all-purpose flour, red pepper, salt, pepper, skim milk, low-fat cheddar cheese, green chilies, fresh breadcrumb
name: zippy cauliflower

steps: Combine gelatin, sugar, kool-aid and kool-aid in a large bowl. Add sugar and kool-aid and mix well. Refrigerate 2 hours or overnight.
ingredients: gelatin, boiling water, water, sugar, kool-aid
name: homemade jello regular and sugar free

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a plastic bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake to coat chicken with flour mixture. Melt butter in casserole dish or skillet. Brown chicken on all sides. Mix in sour cream, broth, mushrooms and paprika. If skillet is not oven proof, transfer to a casserole dish. Cover and bake 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, vegetable oil, butter, onion, paprika, salt, chicken stock, sour cream, flour
name: sour cream chicken paprika

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high. Spread butter on corn. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Top with ice cubes. Center corn inside 1 reynolds hot bag, large size. Double fold ends to form packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Grill 15-20 minutes, covered, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Cut open top of foil bag, carefully, using a sharp knife. Allow steam to escape, fold back foil.
ingredients: fresh corn, butter, chili powder, hot pepper sauce, salt
name: chili corn on the cob

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve.
ingredients: chicken pieces, dry white wine, fresh lemon rind, lemon juice, tomato paste, olive oil, paprika, hot pepper sauce, salt, garlic cloves
name: portuguese barbecued chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray large baking sheet with nonstick spray. Toss onion and next 5 ingredients together on prepared baking sheet. Spread in single layer. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake vegetables until tender and brown around edges, stirring occasionally, about 35 minutes. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: zucchini, olive oil, onion, couscous, chicken stock, basil leaves, feta cheese, salt and pepper
name: moroccan zucchini

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce.
ingredients: flat iron steaks, extra virgin olive oil, fresh coarse ground black pepper, kosher salt, butter, onion, mushroom, garlic clove, balsamic vinegar, fresh parsley
name: flat iron steak with balsamic reduction

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add mustard to skillet. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with
ingredients: mustard seeds, mustard powder, water, balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, sugar, salt, garlic clove
name: balsamic mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Place the beef on a sheet pan and pat the outside dry with a paper towel. Spread the butter on with your hands. Sprinkle evenly with the salt and pepper. Roast in the oven for exactly 22 minutes for rare and 25 minutes for medium-rare. Remove the beef from the oven, cover it tightly with aluminum foil, and allow it to rest at room temperature for 20 minutes. Remove the strings and slice the fillet thickly.
ingredients: butter, flour, milk, fresh ground pepper, dried beef
name: creamed chipped beef sos

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease bottom and side of a 9-inch pie plate. Sprinkle vegetable mix into pie plate. In medium bowl, stir remaining ingredients until blended. Pour over vegetable mixture. Bake uncovered 35 to 40 minutes in preheated oven or until a knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: broccoli, onion, yellow bell peppers, cheddar cheese, bisquick, milk, salt, pepper, eggs
name: impossibly easy vegetable pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 2 quart casserole dish. Scrub potatoes, chop into halves or quarters, depending on size of potato. Place in casserole dish. Cut butter into pats. Place randomly around top of potatoes. Sprinkle with parsley. Sprinkle with garlic. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 10 minutes. Stir. Cover. Continue baking at 375 for about an hour, or until the potatoes are tender, stirring a couple more times during baking.
ingredients: red potatoes, margarine, garlic salt, dried parsley
name: potatoes mccallum

steps: Preheat oven to 500f melt butter with oil in heavy large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in garlic, shallot, and dried crushed red pepper. Add crabs. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon chopped thyme and 1 tablespoon chopped parsley over crabs. Stir to combine. Place skillet in oven and roast crabs until heated through, stirring once, about 12 minutes. Using tongs, transfer crabs to platter. Add orange juice and peel to same skillet. Boil until sauce is reduced by about half, about 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over crabs. Sprinkle with remaining 1 tablespoon thyme and 1 tablespoon parsley and serve.
ingredients: onion, butter, flour, chicken broth, half-and-half, dungeness crabmeat, salt, parsley
name: red lobster dungeness crab bisque

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Dump meat into a large mixing bowl. Salt and pepper. Add all of the other ingredients to the bowl and mix by hand. Put mixture in a well greased pan or dish and form into a loaf. Place dish on top oven rack and cook for 1-1 hours, checking periodically.
ingredients: ground beef, olive oil, recaito, sazon goya with coriander and annatto, adobo seasoning, hot sauce, discos, oil
name: easy pastelillos

steps: Mix soup, water, rice, onion powder and black pepper in 2-qt shallow baking dish. Top with chicken. Sprinkle chicken with additional pepper & salt. Cover and bake at 375 for 45 min or until chicken is no longer pink and rice is done. Uncover and sprinkle cheese over chicken.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, long-grain white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, frozen mixed vegetables, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cheddar cheese
name: cheesy chicken and rice casserole

steps: Put meatballs in crock pot. In a medium sized bowl mix together all remaining ingredients. Microwave on high for approximately 3 minutes or until boiling. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour. Cook on low for 3 hours,
ingredients: ground beef, egg, soft breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, vinegar
name: busy day meatballs

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita.
ingredients: ground pork, paprika, salt and pepper, flour tortillas, frozen corn, cilantro, lime, juice of, monterey jack cheese
name: pork soft tacos

steps: In a large non stick skillet, heat oil over med high heat, and cook tuna steaks 3-4 minutes per side, until golden and just cooked through. Transfer tuna to serving plates. Add honey glaze to hot skillet and simmer one minute, then pour over tuna. Serve with jasmine rice.
ingredients: wasabi powder, water, rice vinegar, mayonnaise, garlic clove, soy sauce, vegetable oil, tuna steaks
name: wasabi grilled tuna

steps: In small bowl, combine butter, salt, pepper, rosemary. Let stand at room temperture for 2 hours. Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute chicken breasts until lightly browned. Remove from skillet. Salt and pepper the chicken. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Add butter, salt, pepper, rosemary. Cook
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, salt and pepper, rosemary, frozen orange juice concentrate, dry white wine, mint sauce
name: baked chicken breasts rosemary

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: buttermilk, old fashioned oats, honey, vegetable oil, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda
name: honey wheat muffins

steps: Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add pork. Cook 4 minutes on each side or until done. Garnish with sliced green onions, if desired.
ingredients: pork mince, chinese cabbage, water chestnuts, onion, fresh coriander, sambal oelek, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, spring roll wrappers, deep frying oil
name: pork spring rolls

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the garlic and stir. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the mixture boils, then turn the heat down to medium-high. Cook, stirring, until the mixture boils, then turn the heat down to medium-high. Stir in the salt and pepper. Taste and add more salt, pepper and lime juice to taste.
ingredients: tomatoes, red onion, red bell pepper, vegetable stock, olive oil, fresh sage, salt and pepper
name: roasted tomato pepper and red onion soup

steps: Cook fettuccine as directed on package. Drain. Return to saucepan. Stir together butter, mascarpone and basil. Toss with mascarpone and basil. Top with mascarpone and basil and remaining asagio cheese.
ingredients: fresh fettuccine, heavy cream, mascarpone cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh basil leaf, nutmeg
name: fettuccine with mascarpone and basil

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: self-raising flour, salt, baking soda, milk, egg, sugar, butter, vanilla
name: pikelets australian pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: pumpkin, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, salt, unbaked pie shells
name: perfect pumpkin pie

steps: Wash the beetroot well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Strain and cool beetroot and remove skins. Slice beetroot into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon beetroot into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place.
ingredients: beetroots, brown sugar, cornflour, butter, vinegar, orange juice, water, orange rind
name: beetroot with orange sauce

steps: Cook pasta according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add garlic. Stir fry 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, water, soy sauce, sugar, creamy peanut butter
name: thai peanut sauce

steps: Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepperpreparation:Mix spinach, chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey,
ingredients: chorizo sausage, cortland apples, olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, honey, baby spinach, pecans, salt and pepper
name: spinach salad with chorizo and apples

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of short ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the slabs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove slabs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place slabs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the slabs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: beef short ribs, chili sauce, coca-cola, worcestershire sauce, black pepper, celery salt, hot sauce
name: clara s short ribs

steps: Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, carrots, onion, oil, vegetable stock cube, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, eggs, cucumber
name: japanese style potato salad

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, milk
name: simple pie crust

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat eggs in a bowl. Combine cheeses, bread crumbs and spices in a separate bowl. Dip chicken pieces in egg, then bread crumb mixture, then egg, then bread crumb mixture again. Place chicken on a hoagie roll with marinara and mozzarella for a chicken parmesan sub. Also great for dipping with marinara or ranch.
ingredients: white bread, half-and-half, ground chicken, egg, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, cooking oil
name: italian style chicken cutlets

steps: In a stew or dutch-oven pot, saute meat and chopped onions until brown. Pour off any grease. Add to browned meat& onions all of the remaining ingredients. Stir and bring to boil, then turn down to medium-low or simmer and put lid on pot. Simmer 20 minutes or until noodles are done. Simmer 20 minutes or until
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic, paprika, elbow macaroni, frozen corn, chopped tomato, tomato sauce, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: the best goulash

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all of the dry ingredients together. Mix all of the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: vegan butter, sugar, vanilla, unsweetened applesauce, brown rice flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, non-dairy chocolate chips
name: egg free wheat free dairy free chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an o
ingredients: squash blossoms, herb cheese spread, chopped tomato, herbs, green onions, vinegar
name: zucchini blossoms with boursin and fresh tomato vinaigrette

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and parsley. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fiddleheads, butter, garlic cloves, lemon, juice of
name: garlicky fiddlehead ferns

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, eggs, vanilla extract, egg, butter, brown sugar, dark rum. Add to liquid mixture. Beat until smooth. Cover and let stand one hour or more in a warm place. Batter will be light and bubbly. Stir down batter. Bake on greased griddle.
ingredients: plantain, flour, baking powder, milk, vanilla, egg, butter, brown sugar, dark rum
name: plantain pancakes with rum sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
