Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus, cherry tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, orange juice, garlic, parmesan cheese, table salt, black pepper
name: ww balsamic asparagus and cherry tomato salad

steps: Cook ground beef while boiling patatoes. Boil til soft and mash mixing with butter and milk. When finished with ground beef put in non greased 9x7 pan. Layer on top of ground beef both cans of soup, and then corn, then mix cheese in with potatoes and layer on top. Bake in oven 375 for 45 minute.
ingredients: vegetarian ground beef, potatoes, mushrooms, onion, carrots, canned corn, salt, milk, pepper, butter
name: vegetarian shepherd s pie

steps: Boil eggs, shell and cut in half lengthwise. In small bowl mash the yolks with a fork. Stir in the sour cream, mayonnaise and the mustard. Stir in the lemon zest, lemon juice and cayenne pepper. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide mixture and spoon into egg halves. Garnish with fresh parsley or thyme. If not eating immediately, cover well and refrigerate.
ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, tarragon-infused champagne vinegar, dry mustard, dijon mustard, cayenne, curry powder, salt and pepper
name: blue smoke deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: green pepper, red pepper, diced onion, chicken broth, peas and carrots, cooked chicken breasts, diced tomatoes with green chilies, light cheese, spaghetti
name: spicy spaghetti chicken casserole

steps: Heat olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lime, juice of, olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, fresh gingerroot, curry powder, diced tomatoes
name: curried chicken or tofu

steps: In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread.
ingredients: smoked sausage, red peppers, velveeta cheese, milk, broccoli florets, cooked rice
name: smoked sausage with broccoli and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a non-stick skillet brown meat with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, lasagna noodles, pasta sauce, water, baby spinach, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese
name: ninja 3 in 1 hearty skillet lasagna

steps: Place shrimp, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, dried basil, dried chili pepper flakes, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, wooden skewers in plastic bag. Add shrimp. Marinate at least 1 hour. I usually let it marinate a few hours. Place shrimp, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, dried basil, dried chili pepper flakes, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, wooden skewers in plastic bag. Marinate at
ingredients: tiger shrimp, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, dried basil, dried chili pepper flakes, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, wooden skewers
name: grilled garlic jumbo shrimp and cherry tomato skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease, spray, or placed liners in muffin tins to hold 24 muffins. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add milk, eggs, oil, and almond extract. Whisk until smooth. Gently stir in poppyseeds. Fill muffin tins and bake for 25- 30 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, margarine, light corn syrup, almond extract, egg, egg white, all-purpose flour, poppy seeds, baking soda, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: poppy seed almond cookies

steps: Cut steak into bite size pieces. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in heavy skillet. Add beef and brown. Sprinkle with flour and cook an additional minute. Add water, wine, soup mix and bouillon and stir. Transfer to casserole dish with lid and bake at 325f for 3 hours. Ensure it does not go dry by adding wine or water. Fry mushrooms in pan with 1 tbsp olive oil. Add mushrooms to mixture and return to oven for an hour. Cook noodles as directed. Remove mixture from oven and stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.
ingredients: boneless round steak, oil, fresh mushrooms, water, onion soup mix, sour cream, flour
name: quickie beef stroganoff

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: butter, lemon-pepper seasoning, fennel seed, salt, halibut, large shrimp
name: mixed seafood grill

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add flank steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill beef, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: rump roast, vegetable oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic, ground pepper
name: marinated roast beef

steps: In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want.
ingredients: ground beef, kidney beans, pizza sauce, italian stewed tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, pepperoni, green pepper, pizza seasoning, mozzarella cheese
name: pepperoni pizza chili

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add almond extract and vanilla. Add flour and mix until incorporated. Drop by tablespoons on prepared baking sheets. Make an indent with your thumb in the center of each cookie. Fill with jam and three chocolate chips. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes or until lightly firm. Cookies should still be pale in color.
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, banana, salt, vanilla, milk chocolate chips
name: banana chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Spray cookie sheets with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl, sift together flour, ginger, baking soda, allspice, and salt. In large bowl, cream together sugar and margarine until well-blended. Stir in applesauce and molasses. Add flour mixture to oatmeal mixture. Mix until well blended. Drop dough by rounded tablespoons 1 inch apart onto prepared cookie sheets. Flatten each slightly with moistened finger. Bake 11-14 minutes, or until firm. Watch carefully at end of baking, to prevent overbrowning.
ingredients: flour, ground ginger, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, margarine, sugar, egg, molasses
name: simple gingersnaps

steps: Heat oven to 350f place jalapenos in deep dish plate and microwave 1 minute to soften. Whisk in beef brisket and bacon until smooth. Stir in cooked chicken. Bake 20 mins or until mixture is heated through. Stir. Serve with crackers or veggies or whatever you like.
ingredients: jalapenos, cream cheese, beef brisket, bacon
name: atomic buffalo bites

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large wedges. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
ingredients: pepperoni, eggs, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, green pepper, onion, tomatoes, mushroom, olive
name: pizza pizzazz

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the tomato juice, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, low-sodium tomato juice, fresh basil leaf, low-fat milk, salt, cracked black pepper, reduced-fat cream cheese, basil leaves, french baguettes. Stir in the tomato juice, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, low-sodium tomato juice, fresh basil leaf, low-fat milk, salt, cracked black pepper, reduced-fat cream cheese, basil leaves, french baguettes. Stir in the tomato juice, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, low-sodium tomato juice, fresh basil leaf, low-fat milk, salt, cracked black pepper,
ingredients: tomatoes, low-sodium tomato juice, fresh basil leaf, low-fat milk, salt, cracked black pepper, reduced-fat cream cheese, basil leaves, french baguettes
name: light tasty tomato basil soup

steps: Mix all the ingredients together. Bake at 350 for about 40 minutes or until center is set. Once out of the oven, i usually let it sit for 5 or 10 minutes. To serve, either cut into wedges, or squares, depending on what type of dish you used.
ingredients: flat bread, tzatziki, baby spinach, feta cheese, ground lamb, cumin, coriander, scallions, tomatoes, onion
name: not your typical lamb burger

steps: Slice bread in half long ways and lightly butter center. Heat in 350f oven for 10 minutes. While bread warms, heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and saut briskly, cooking through, for approximately 4-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. In a bowl, toss lettuce with dressing. To assemble sandwich, place cooked shrimp on one half of toasted bread, then top with dressed lettuce and grated parmesan cheese. Top with other half of bread and slice into 4 to 6 portions.
ingredients: cooked chicken, carrot, celery, egg, cheddar cheese, dill pickle relish, onion, mayonnaise
name: pilgrim s sandwich spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Put the ginger snap cookies in a large zip lock bag and crush the cookies with a rolling pin until they are pulverized. Put the crushed cookies in a layer in the 9 x 13 pan to form the bottom crust. In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese until light. Add the condensed milk and mix. Add eggs, canned pumpkin, spices and salt. Blend in the nuts if desired. Mix all together and pour carefully on top of the cookie crust in the pan. Bake 30 - 40 minutes at 350. Cool, chill, and serve. May be topped with whipped topping and more nuts for looks but is fine the way it is.
ingredients: gingersnap cookies, butter, cream cheese, sour cream, brandy, sugar, eggs, fresh ginger, salt
name: ginger brandy cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius lightly grease a round 20cm cake tin. Melt the butter in the microwave or over low heat. Set aside. Sift the cocoa into a large mixing bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients, including the butter. Mix thoroughly. Pour into cake pan. Bake for 50 minute.
ingredients: butter, eggs, milk, sweetened condensed milk, unsweetened dried shredded coconut, all-purpose flour, baking powder
name: coconut kisses bundt cake

steps: Mix egg, water, flour, sugar and butter together in a bowl. Add lemon to mixture and mix well. Pour filling into a pie crust and top with second pie crust. Cut air vents in top crust. Bake at 500 degrees for 5 minutes, then reduce heat to 400 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes, until it bubbles in the center.
ingredients: lemon, eggs, sugar, butter, unbaked pie shell
name: lemon pie in a blender

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the apples, lemon juice, orange zest, cinnamon sticks, red delicious apples, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes, fresh pineapple
ingredients: apple juice, lemon juice, orange zest, cinnamon sticks, red delicious apples, fresh pineapple, orange, seedless grapes
name: fresh fruit cocktail

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: cranberry juice, frozen limeade concentrate, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, orange-infused vodka, orange liqueur, ice cube, limes
name: cosmo fruit punch

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and cook the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and cook about 2 minutes. Season calamari rings with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet. Saute, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Transfer to a colander to drain a bit. Place the lemon juice, olive oil, capers, and lemon zest into a clean glass jar with a lid. Shake to combine, taste, and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl, pour dressing over top and gently toss to coat with dressing. Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: tomatoes, capers, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar, water, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: sliced tomato salad with capers and basil

steps: Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn. Stir until beginning to dry and brown, about 8 minutes. Transfer to small bowl. Add oil to skillet. Heat over medium-high heat. Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic. Saut until peppers are tender, about 8 minutes. Mix in cilantro and chili powder, then corn. Stir until heated through, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic clove, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, tomato puree, cannellini beans, salt and pepper
name: bell pepper bean stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: dried beef, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lean bacon, all-purpose flour, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, red onion, sour cream, cooked pasta
name: continental chicken

steps: In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, margarine, milk, cocoa, vanilla, peanut butter, quick oats
name: microwave no bake oatmeal cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown.
ingredients: cream cheese, chili sauce, baby shrimp, parsley, tortilla chips
name: shrimp cream cheese dip

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Melt flour in a 13 x 9 baking pan. Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper in a bag. Shake chicken pieces, one at a time, in bag to coat with flour mixture. Place chicken skin side down in baking pan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes. Turn chicken. Bake 30 minutes longer.
ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, liquid shortening
name: easy and crispy oven fried chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, egg, mozzarella cheese, cottage cheese, spaghetti sauce
name: baked pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together all ingredients from ground beef through pizza sauce. Separate the halves of the hamburger buns, placing each half face-up on a baking sheet. Spread the meat mixture on each of the hamburger buns. Top each with a slice of mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
ingredients: meat, breadcrumbs, onion, soy sauce, italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cheese slices
name: my cheese burgers

steps: Place the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup.
ingredients: butter, french bread, eggs, vanilla, sugar, milk
name: baked cinnamon sugar french toast

steps: In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream together. Gently fold in the cheese, pasta and rest of ingredients. One at a time, in that order. In a nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until the edges start to brown. Flip the frittata by sliding it onto a large plate or tray then carefully inverting it back into the pan. Continue to cook for 5 to 6 minutes more. Remove from pan then cut into wedges and serve. This is delicious served warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: swiss chard, garlic cloves, onion, olive oil, egg whites, eggs, fresh basil, salt, black pepper, tomatoes
name: swiss chard and tomato frittata

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, bacon, brown sugar, butter, soy sauce, garlic
name: green bean roll ups

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, butter, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic salt
name: fresh green beans

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: broccoli floret, water, thyme, orange, butter, honey, ginger
name: orange ginger broccoli

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the barley, tomatoes, onion, garlic clove, fresh basil, salt, pepper, chicken stock, tomato paste, fresh basil, plain low-fat yogurt. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the barley, tomatoes, onion, garlic clove, fresh basil, salt, pepper, chicken stock, tomato paste. Just before serving
ingredients: pearl barley, tomatoes, onion, garlic clove, fresh basil leaves, fresh oregano
name: tomato herb soup with barley

steps: Place coconut milk, coconut milk, ice cube, pineapple, cinnamon, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherrypreparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries.
ingredients: banana, coconut milk, ice cube, pineapple, cinnamon, honey
name: banana coconut smoothie

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large saute pan over medium heat. When hot, add shrimp and saute for about 1 minute. Add garlic, and continue to saute shrimp until pink and cooked through. Add shrimp and garlic to bowl of tacos de camarones al mojo de aj, and toss well. May be served hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, serrano chilies, butter, garlic, shrimp, fresh cilantro, kosher salt, corn tortillas, limes
name: garlicky shrimp cilantro tacos tacos de camarones al mojo de aj

steps: Toast the bread and keep while preparing the eggs. Combine the eggs, water, tabasco and salt in a bowl and whisk until smooth. In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, stirring with a spatula until the eggs are gently scrambled. Spread the soft goat cheese equally over the slices of toast. Add the scrambled eggs on top of the goat cheese and cut each of the toast slices in half. Garnish with sun dried tomatoes, basil leaves, and drizzle of pesto.
ingredients: eggplant, salt, tomatoes, fresh basil, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: eggplant aubergine bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and sugar together until creamy. Beat in egg and vanilla. Add flour gradually and beat well. Stir in 1 cup morsels. Press on bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 30-33 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Immediately sprinkle with the remaining chocolate chips and let sit for 5 minutes or so until the chips become shiny. Then spread evenly over top. Cool completely in the pan and then cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, icing sugar, cornstarch, all-purpose flour, vanilla, salt
name: shortbread puffs also called melting moments

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: unsalted butter, yellow onions, sweet corn, salt, cayenne, garlic, fresh jalapeno, goat cheese, milk
name: corn con queso

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Serve.
ingredients: round loaf italian bread, sharp cheddar cheese, cream cheese, green onion, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, green chilies, ham
name: apache cheese bread

steps: Pour the white chocolate mocha syrup into 2 cups. Fill the tall cup with ice. Add the chocolate syrup, milk, sugar then fill the cup to the top with coffee and mix with the cross blade until smooth. Pour mixture into 2 cups. Add the white chocolate mocha syrup, milk, sugar then fill the cup to the top with coffee and mix with the cross blade until smooth. Add
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, vanilla, instant espresso, white chocolate
name: white chocolate mocha syrup recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour, baking soda, ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, cinnamon oil, margarine
name: cinnamon sticks cookies

steps: In a large skillet heat the pan on medium heat. Add the butter and melt. Be careful not to burn the butter. Next add the oil. Saute the carrots, stirring frequently until they start to turn golden and are crisp-tender about 10-12 minutes. Do not allow the skillet to turn dry- adding a little apple juice if necessary. When the carrots are crisp-tender add the remaining apple juice and saute mixture until liquid is absorbed. Finally, stir in the lemon juice, chives, toasted almonds, salt and white pepper.
ingredients: carrot, butter, dried dill weed, salt and pepper, tequila
name: x rated carrots with tequila

steps: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until crispy. Drain well on paper towels. In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise and sour cream. Mix-in tomatoes just before serving. Serve with toasted bagel rounds or pita triangles.
ingredients: mayonnaise, sour cream, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, green onions, cheddar cheese, bread
name: scrumptious hot cheesy bacon dip

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, dry white wine, chicken broth, cannellini beans, escarole, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: escarole with white beans

steps: Heat 2 cups of water to boiling. Add shrimp. And cook 1 to 2 minutes, or until tender. Drain and rinse quickly under cold water until cooled. Mix shrimp, dressing, old bay seasoning, bay leaf in bowl. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours. Before serving put one shrimp on top of cracker, add fresh dill for garnish.
ingredients: ritz crackers, crabmeat, shrimp, fat-free cream cheese, mayonnaise, dill weed, onion
name: seafood on a cracker appetizers

steps: Cook cauliflower till very tender and separate and chop into tiny pieces. Beat the eggs. Add bisquick, cheese, garlic powder and cauliflower until blended. Heat oil to coat and large frying pan. Drop spoonfuls of cauliflower mixture into the pan allowing room for patties to spread. Cook till brown on both sides and drain on plate covered with paper towels. Sprinkle with additional parmesan cheese if desired. Serve these as an appetizer or a side dish with zucchini sticks, stuffed mushrooms, etc.
ingredients: frozen cauliflower, butter, sour cream, parmesan cheese, parsley
name: twice baked mock potatoes cauliflower

steps: Toast the bread and keep while preparing the eggs. Combine the eggs, water, tabasco and salt in a bowl and whisk until smooth. In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, stirring with a spatula until the eggs are gently scrambled. Spread the soft goat cheese equally over the slices of toast. Add the scrambled eggs on top of the goat cheese and cut each of the toast slices in half. Garnish with sun dried tomatoes, basil leaves, and drizzle of pesto.
ingredients: french bread, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: kona k s too easy bruschetta

steps: Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until tender-crisp. Drain. Put cauliflower in an oven-safe casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder. Pour over cauliflower. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: cauliflower, carrot, peas, pineapple, coconut milk, chickpeas, green curry paste, chicken stock
name: cauliflower and chickpea curry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from oven and let stand 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let stand
ingredients: bread, bacon, turkey slices, gruyere cheese, butter, cranberry sauce, dijon mustard, mayonnaise
name: grilled holiday croque monsieur

steps: In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy.
ingredients: water, cornstarch, chicken broth, chicken bouillon cubes, beef gravy, ground sage
name: kentucky fried chicken gravy clone

steps: Place mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lime juice, lemongrass and sugar. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint.
ingredients: mangoes, dark rum, lime juice, orange liqueur, sugar, ice cubes, mango, lime slice
name: mango daiquiri

steps: In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chops. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice.
ingredients: pork chops, salt, pepper, oil, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, low sodium chicken broth, hoisin sauce, red wine vinegar, red pepper flakes
name: pan sauteed pork chops with garlic hoisin sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and bake for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, yellow cornmeal, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, eggs, pumpkin, milk, vegetable oil
name: pumpkin corn muffins

steps: Add ground beef, onions, potatoes, sage, salt, curry powder, chili powder, ketchup, water, hamburger bun. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add ground beef, onions, potatoes, sage, salt, curry powder, chili powder, ketchup, water, hamburger bun. Add ground beef, onions, potatoes, sage, salt, curry powder, chili powder, ketchup,
ingredients: ground beef, onions, potatoes, sage, salt, curry powder, chili powder, ketchup, water, hamburger bun
name: barnwell school chiliburgers

steps: Spray a bundt pan or an angel food cake pan with nonstick cooking spray. Place the rolls in the pan, sprinkle the whole package of butterscotch pudding mix over the rolls, sprinkle the brown sugar over the pudding mix, pour the butter over the brown sugar, and top with the pecans. Cover and place in the refrigerator overnight, or let rise for 4-5 hours before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake the rolls for 20-25 minutes. Let cool.
ingredients: frozen dinner rolls, butterscotch pudding, brown sugar, pecans, butter
name: butterscotch bundt rolls

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add zucchini, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, salt, vegetable broth, garlic cloves, fresh lime juice, black pepper, fresh oregano
name: garlic lime zucchini

steps: In a large skillet, heat the oil and gently fry the pork and green beans for 5 mins until soft. Add the chopped tomatoes and vegetable stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and cook out for 35-40 mins stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, in a saucepan fry the pork and green beans until crispy.
ingredients: vegetable oil, white onion, frozen peas, ground pork, paprika, ground cumin, chicken stock, greek yogurt, salt and pepper
name: lightly spiced pork and green beans

steps: Pour apple juice, vodka, brown sugar, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, tea bags into crock pot. Add apple juice, vodka, brown sugar, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, tea bags. Cover & cook on low 7-8 hrs, medium for 6 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Remove cinnamon and cloves. Serve hot.
ingredients: apple juice, vodka, brown sugar, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, tea bags
name: spiked crock pot apple punch

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place sliced apples in an 8 x 8 inch baking dish. Sprinkle water over apples. Mix rest of ingredients in a bowl until you get a crumble. Spread crumble mixture over apples. Bake uncovered about 40 minutes.
ingredients: green apples, water, lemon juice, cinnamon, flour, brown sugar, peanut butter, margarine
name: peanut butter apple crisp

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, scallion, sesame seeds, soy sauce, sesame oil, red pepper flakes, sugar and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant. Add rice vinegar and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant. Add sesame oil and cook, stirring occasionally, until fragrant.
ingredients: red chili paste, garlic cloves, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, scallions, sugar
name: kochujang sauce

steps: Place eggplant slices on a greased or sprayed baking sheet. Brush with olive oil. Bake at 400 f for ten minutes. Whisk remaining ingredients together. Turn eggplant slices over and brush with glaze. Bake for 5 minutes more.
ingredients: eggplants, plain flour, rice flour, baking powder, soda water, limes, pepper, salt, oil
name: vietnamese salt and pepper eggplant

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Mix in a large bowl, the flax seed and warm water. Let the flax seed set. In a separate bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. Return to the bowl with the flaxseed in it. Combine yogurt, vanilla, margarine and blueberries with the flaxseed. Stir the two mixtures together just until combined. Bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes.
ingredients: vanilla-flavored soymilk, basmati rice, salt, light brown sugar, golden raisin, almonds, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground cardamom, rose water
name: creamy cardamom rice pudding vegan

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: baking apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, oats, raisins, butter, sugar-free caramel topping, nonstick cooking spray
name: caramel oatmeal baked apple

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In large mixing bowl, cream butter with sugar, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla. Gradually blend dry mixture into wet mixture. Stir in nuts and chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon of dough per cookie onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f. Gradually blend
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, macadamia nuts
name: ghirardelli chocolate chip cookie bar

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Line a baking pan with foil. Place the chicken wings in a single layer on the tray. Salt and pepper them lightly. Bake the wings for about 30 minutes until they are just beginning to brown and get crisp. While the wings are baking, combine the peanut butter, soy sauce, honey, garlic, and the hot peppers in a small saucepan. Heat the mixture over low heat, stirring until well blended and spreadable. Spoon or brush the peanut sauce generously over the wings. Return the wings to the oven for 10- 15 minutes until the sauce is set. Remove the wings from the oven and sprinkle immediately with the chopped peanuts and cilantro. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, sugar, garlic powder, paprika, onion powder, dried chives, chicken wings, oil
name: baked hot wings

steps: Prepare a medium-hot charcoal fire or preheat the broiler. Place on grill or under the broiler the slices of bread. Grill or broil, turning once, until golden brown, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from the heat and rub the surface with 2 large cloves of garlic. Brush with 3-4 t of the olive oil. Combine the tomatoes, basil leaves, salt and pepper in bowl. Divide the tomato among the brushetta and serve immediately.
ingredients: italian bread, olive oil, roasted sweet red peppers, garlic cloves, tomatoes, fresh basil, onion, balsamic vinegar
name: bruschetta with roasted sweet red peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Using a baking sheet with a lip, melt butter. Mix seasoning into the butter, and then toss in almonds. Bake seasoned nuts for about 10-12 minutes, stirring once, until toasted and fragrant. Remove from heat and serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, ground rosemary, salt, cayenne pepper, walnut halves
name: rosemary walnuts

steps: Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add butter and peanut butter. Stir around a few times and let cool slightly. Then add vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares.
ingredients: sugar, salt, white corn syrup, peanut butter, whole milk, butter, vanilla extract
name: the best peanut butter fudge ever

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedge. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cooked penne, chopped tomatoes, olive oil, garlic clove, onion, habanero pepper, fresh thyme, lime, juice of, salt and pepper
name: habanero grilled chicken on a bed of pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cherry-cranberry pie filling, butter, egg, apple
name: cherry cranberry apple muffins

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into puddingkuchen custard cake. Place this custard inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, milk, butter, fruit
name: puddingkuchen custard bake

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic, dried oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled.
ingredients: french bread, margarine, tomato sauce, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes, garlic powder, oregano, mozzarella cheese, italian sausage
name: jan s pizza bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine cake mix, water and almond extract in large mixing bowl. Beat at low speed with mixer until moistened. Beat at medium speed for one minute. Line medium muffin pans with paper baking cups. Fill muffin cups two-thirds full. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown, cracked and dry. Remove from muffin pans. Cool completely. Frost with frosting.
ingredients: egg whites, sugar, flour, salt, cream of tartar, almond extract
name: angel food cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference.
ingredients: mustard powder, salt, fresh ground black pepper, salmon fillets, unsalted butter, cedar planks, olive oil, butter, chives
name: cedar planked salmon

steps: Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute.
ingredients: apples, white sugar, lemon juice, old-fashioned oatmeal, brown sugar, flour, butter, ground cinnamon, salt
name: easy apple oatmeal crisp

steps: Melt butter over low heat in large saucepan. Add flour, heat until bubbly. Add milk and light cream. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add cheese, salt and parsley. Toss with fettuccine.
ingredients: fettuccine pasta, butter, cognac, whipping cream, tomato sauce, prosciutto, sliced mushrooms, salt and pepper
name: fettuccine a la ferrari

steps: In a large bowl combine kale, udon noodles, toasted sesame oil, tamari, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted sesame seeds, toasted
ingredients: kale, udon noodles, toasted sesame oil, tamari, toasted sesame seeds
name: sesame noodles with kale

steps: Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once.
ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, parmesan cheese, puree, low-fat plain yogurt, margarine, salt, fresh ground pepper, chives
name: sneaky chef parmesan mashed potatoes

steps: In heavy saucepan, combine marshmallows, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, butterscotch chips. Cook and stir on medium-high heat until melted. Remove from heat. Stir in cheerios, raisins, and coconut. Drop by bite size pieces onto wax paper. Let stand for 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, mini marshmallows, peanut butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, salted peanuts
name: peanutty cereal squares

steps: Put apple juice, strawberry sorbet, ice cubes in a blender. Blend until smoothie reaches desired consistency. The blender may need to be jiggled at the beginning as there is no liquid in the bottom. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately.
ingredients: apple juice, strawberry, frozen raspberries, raspberry sorbet, ice cube
name: raspberry revolution smoothie nordstrom

steps: In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium-high heat and add garlic, rosemary and red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring constantly, until the garlic starts to brown, about 1 minute. Add chickpeas and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Let cool slightly. Transfer soup to a blender. Cover loosely, and puree until just smooth. Return to the saucepan and stir in lemon juice and sea salt to taste. Serve, garnished with a fresh rosemary sprig, or an additional drizzling of olive oil.
ingredients: cumin seeds, chili flakes, olive oil, red onion, split red lentils, vegetable stock, chopped tomatoes, chickpeas, cilantro, greek yogurt
name: red lentil chickpea garbanzo chili soup

steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees f. Grease a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Combine the frozen french fries, hot sauce, butter, white vinegar, blue cheese, ranch dressing, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack cheese, cheese sauce, hamburger meat, monterey jack
ingredients: frozen french fries, hot sauce, butter, white vinegar, blue cheese, ranch dressing
name: buffalo fries

steps: In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: butter, onion, all-purpose flour, chicken stock, broccoli, pepper, cayenne pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, salt
name: favourite broccoli cheese soup

steps: Preheat oven 400f. Slice tomatoes in half, set aside. Pour the olive oil onto a large baking sheet and spread it around the sheet. Sprinkle evenly the garlic, herbs, sugar, salt and pepper over the oil. Place the tomatoes cut side down onto the baking sheet. Roast for about 30-40 minutes, or until the skins start to lift from the tomatoes. Allow to cool. Remove the skins and put the sauce into a large bowl and break up the flesh with a fork. Reheat sauce if using immediately.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, ricotta cheese, flat leaf parsley, fresh basil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs
name: roasted ricotta tomatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, onion, garlic and saute 5-7 minutes or until tender. Stir in chicken broth and cream cheese and cook, stirring constantly, 2-3 minutes or until cream cheese melts. Stir in fish fillets, lemon juice and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes or until mixture is hot.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, green onions, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, fresh parsley, salt, lemon rind, pepper, fish fillets
name: fish fillets with mushroom lemon sauce

steps: In a dutch oven, cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix seasoning, italian dressing and miracle whip in large bowl. Add frozen spinach, egg, cheese, salt & pepper. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: chicken broth, orzo pasta, frozen chopped spinach, egg, cheese, salt & pepper
name: easy stracciatella italian soup

steps: Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, white wine vinegar, chicken breastspreparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil,
ingredients: fresh basil leaf, garlic clove, fresh mint leaves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried oregano, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, white wine vinegar, chicken breasts
name: carrabba s chicken gratella

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: new york strip steaks, black peppercorns, lime pepper, kosher salt
name: peppered new york strip steak

steps: Boil chicken breasts for 20 to 30 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: tortilla chips, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fat-free cream of chicken soup, nonfat sour cream, skim milk, green chilies, cheddar cheese, onion, garlic powder
name: lower fat chicken chalupa casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat potatoes evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Bake at 325 degrees f. until done, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, fish fillets, olive oil, salt and black pepper, tomatoes, green onions, garlic cloves, capers, basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil
name: barbecued fish with crisp potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 8x8 inch sqare baking pan. In a large bowl, stir together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. In another large bowl, beat together the milk, eggs, and butter. Add the cornmeal-flour mixture and stir until just combined. Stir in the pork rinds. Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in the pan and cut into 9 squares.
ingredients: self-rising cornmeal, self rising flour, sugar, marjoram, thyme, celery seed, eggs, milk, butter
name: herbed cornbread

steps: Heat the sesame oil in a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari.
ingredients: fresh spinach, vegetable oil, sesame seeds, dark sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce
name: korean greens

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: butter, frozen chopped spinach, eggs, parmesan cheese, onion, breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese
name: mediterranean spinach patties

steps: Place the peppers whole into a saucepan. Cover to approximately half way with water. Bring to the boil and cook for 10 minutes. Remove peppers onto a board and cut out the seeds and stem. Place into a blender or food-processor and process for 20 or 30 seconds. Add the olive oil and process for another 30 seconds or until mixture is smooth. Add the vinegar and mix for 3 seconds. Season to taste. Delicious spread on thickly sliced bread or drizzled over salads.
ingredients: sweet red pepper, roasted red pepper, red wine vinegar, garlic, olive oil, fresh chives, salt, white pepper
name: roasted red pepper and chive dressing

steps: Preheat the broiler. Brush a baking sheet with oil. Lay the fish on the baking sheet in a single layer. Brush with 1 t of oil and season with salt and pepper. Combine the tomatoes and garlic in a small bowl. Stir in the remaining t oil. Season with salt and pepper. Broil the fish for 4 minutes. Turn over with a spatula, top with the tomato mixture, and continue to broil for another 4 to 5 minutes. Check doneness by inserting a knife between layers of the flesh. The meat should be just translucent. Spoon pan juices back over the fish and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: swordfish steaks, salt, pepper, olive oil, green onion, parsley, chopped tomato, lime wedge
name: baked swordfish manzanillo

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: mahi mahi fillets, tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, fresh basil, fresh garlic, paprika, salt and pepper, parchment paper
name: tomato basil mahi mahi

steps: In a medium size glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips.
ingredients: tomatoes, green peppers, serrano peppers, jalapeno peppers, hot peppers, white vinegar, onion, brown sugar, salt, garlic cloves
name: salsa for canning

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet red pepper, fresh sage leaves, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper
name: decorative baked potatoes with sage red pepper

steps: Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add orange jello to boiling liquid
ingredients: orange jell-o, orange juice, cream cheese, mandarin oranges, cool whip
name: creamy mandarin orange salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, unsweetened vanilla almond breeze, unsweetened applesauce, dried apricot, raisins, blueberries, walnuts, cinnamon, salt
name: daniel fast baked oatmeal

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: bread, garlic clove, lemon juice, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, four cheese blend
name: best garlic cheese bread you will ever make

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Bake for about 45 minutes or until cheese is bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar, and continue to bake until cheese is bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar,
ingredients: ground beef, green beans, cheddar cheese soup, frozen tater tots, cheddar cheese
name: cheesy tater tots casserole

steps: Place 2 cups garbanzo beans in a food processor. Press for 30 seconds, add olive oil, lime juice, salt. Continue pressing until smooth hummus consistency. Heat a skillet and add ragu sauce until warm. Assemble the hummus by placing garbanzo dip first, ragu sauce, crispy garbanzo beans on top. Sprinkle cilantro, lime, feta cheese, salt and pepper. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: garbanzo beans, black beans, garlic, parsley, basil, cilantro, rag pasta sauce, feta cheese, cream cheese
name: happy humus ragu

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan.
ingredients: swiss chocolate cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, chocolate fudge topping, cool whip, heath candy bars
name: chocolate thunder cake

steps: Combine apple cider vinegar, water, sugar, celery seed, salt, cabbage, apple, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried tart cherry, apple juice, dried
ingredients: bacon, cider vinegar, water, sugar, celery seed, salt, cabbage, apple
name: mom s hot skillet bacon cole slaw with apples

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa powder, baking powder, splenda sugar substitute, butter, water, eggpreparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate
ingredients: soy flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, splenda sugar substitute, butter, water, egg
name: low carb 3 minute chocolate cake

steps: Preheat the oven to 350f. Place the nutty sweet potato salad in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, five-spice powder, walnuts, currants, table salt, black pepper
name: nutty sweet potato salad

steps: Combine water and sugar in small bowl or food processor until well blended. Taste and adjust seasonings accordingly. Add more water to thin the sauce if necessary. Use immediately or cover and refrigerate until ready to use. Stir in cilantro just before serving. Stored properly, this sauce keeps for 4 to 5 days.
ingredients: water, sugar, apple cider vinegar, cornstarch, ketchup, garlic clove, crushed red pepper flakes
name: sweet and sour dipping sauce lumpia dipping sauce

steps: In medium bowl, combine dry ingredients. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Using a fork, stir in buttermilk until dough just comes together. Fill each well with 1 tablespoon dough. Bake 4-6 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, kosher salt, sugar, unsalted butter, fresh thyme leaves, whole milk, mayonnaise
name: thyme biscuits

steps: Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Ingredients. Spread on a parchemin lined pan. Broil until nice and golden about half an hour.
ingredients: carrots, potatoes, milk, butter, ground nutmeg, salt, black pepper
name: golden whipped potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: quinoa, water, granny smith apple, raisins, almonds, cinnamon, soy margarine, maple syrup
name: apple cinnamon quinoa cereal

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients together, and toss until all vegetables are coated with olive oil and spices. Spread vegetables into pan. Bake 45 minutes, removing from the oven and stirring twice during cooking. For crisper vegetables, cut cooking time a few minutes shorter. Switch oven setting to broiler. Place pan under the broiler for 7-10 minutes, sliding out and stirring vegetables once or twice.
ingredients: red potatoes, carrots, parsnips, red onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme, salt & pepper, white truffle oil
name: roasted root vegetables with truffle oil thyme

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add onion and saute for 1 minute. Add mushrooms and saute for 1 minute. Add sliced mushrooms and saute for 1 minute. Add sliced mushrooms
ingredients: chunk light tuna, portabella mushroom caps, olive oil, butter, red bell pepper, carrot, onion, cajun seasoning, soft breadcrumbs, mexican blend cheese
name: creole tuna portabella melts

steps: Place rhubarb in a bowl and cover with boiling water for about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, with a mixer, mix sugar, egg, butter and flour until smooth. Strain rhubarb well. With wooden spoon, add strawberries and rhubarb to batter and mix. Pour into uncooked pie shell. Mix topping ingredients with a fork, and sprinkle over uncooked pie. Bake at 375 for 50 minutes or until set. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: rhubarb, white sugar, butter, egg, flour, pie shell, brown sugar
name: irene s rhubarb custard pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat oven to 350 degrees
ingredients: mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese, egg, lean ground meat, onion, cream-style corn, taco seasoning mix
name: taco mashed potato casserole

steps: Heat oil in skillet. Add onion and soy meat to pan. Once onion is brown or wilted add beans, sauce, tomatoes, and chili powder. Bring to a boil, then let simmer over med-low heat for 15 minutes to let thicken. Add garlic and stir. Add tobasco to taste. Turn off heat and let sit for 2-5 minutes.
ingredients: hot dogs, chili with beans, diced tomatoes with green chilies, onion, garlic powder, cayenne, cumin, yellow mustard, cheese
name: chili dog stew

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: olive oil, button mushrooms, red wine vinegar, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, black peppercorns, coriander seed, salt
name: greek marinated mushrooms

steps: Place the halibut fillets on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the halibut fillets in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the halibut fillets. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side.
ingredients: halibut fillets, mayonnaise, jalapeno, monterey jack cheese, jalapeno juice
name: baked halibut with jalapenos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, dry milk, egg, warm water
name: native american fry bread

steps: Place carrots, potatoes, onions and garlic. Trim fat from brisket and sprinkle with salt, black pepper and thyme. Place brisket on top of vegetables. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: carrots, potatoes, celery, salt, black pepper, chopped tomatoes, onion, ground beef
name: slow cooker buried treasure

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges.
ingredients: mozzarella cheese, butter, mayonnaise, green onions, mushroom stems and pieces, olives, french bread
name: olive onion cheese bread

steps: Saut onion, garlic and green pepper in oil in a large skillet until soft, then push to sides of pan. In the center of the skillet, pour in the couscous. Add the water to the couscous, stirring gently. Top this mixture with tomato wedges and the cooked green peppers. Cover pan for 3 minutes. Add a little water and cook longer, if needed. Couscous should be light and fluffy.
ingredients: couscous, water, frozen peas, cumin seed, turmeric, olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: aromatic couscous in minutes

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: broccoli, ice water, olive oil, pine nuts, seasoning salt, garlic cloves
name: blanched vegetables back to basic s

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a saucepan over medium heat, boil the squash and onion in salted water for 5 minutes. Drain well. Combine the squash, chicken soup, and sour cream. Toss the stuffing mix with butter, sage, and onion powder. Butter a 2 quart casserole dish. Layer half the stuffing in the bottom. Sprinkle half the cheese over the stuffing. Spread the squash over the cheese and top with remaining cheese and then the remaining stuffing. Bake for 30-40 minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, onion, cream soup, plain yogurt, carrot, fresh oregano, cooked chicken, cheese, butter, herbed croutons
name: summer squash bake

steps: Mix all. Pour into a heatproof dish and top with breadcrumbs or cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 15 to 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or thin slices of french bread.
ingredients: tuna fish, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and black pepper
name: tuna dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine ingredients in a large zip-top plastic bag. Place salmon on a grill rack or broiler pan coated with cooking spray, and cook for 6 minutes on each side or until the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Baste salmon occasionally with the reserved marinade.
ingredients: cooking spray, aluminum foil, salmon, dijon mustard, garlic powder, dill
name: low fat salmon dijon

steps: Beat eggs add water and flour and make a batter. Combine with cheese, flowers, salt and pepper. Heat olive oil in a pan. Poor the mixture in the pan or take spoonfuls of batter and drop into the oil. When the bottom side of the omelet is golden brown turn it over the cooked on the other side4.
ingredients: asparagus, eggs, water, flour, salt, pepper, cheese, olive oil
name: omelet with wild aspargus

steps: In a small bowl, combine apricots, preserves, cranberries, and almonds. Using a sharp knife, cut the brie horizontally creating two equals thick slices. Spread fruit mixture onto the cut center of brie. Top with other half of brie. Heat at 300 degrees until just warm.
ingredients: frozen puff pastry, brie cheese, toasted almond, apricot preserves
name: baked brie in puff pastry with apricot or raspberry preserves

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock.
ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic clove, curry powder, salt, pepper, chicken broth, water, pumpkin puree, unsweetened coconut milk
name: coconut curried pumpkin soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Put the ginger snap cookies in a large zip lock bag and crush the cookies with a rolling pin until they are pulverized. Put the crushed cookies in a layer in the 9 x 13 pan to form the bottom crust. In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese until light. Add the condensed milk and mix. Add eggs, canned pumpkin, spices and salt. Blend in the nuts if desired. Mix all together and pour carefully on top of the cookie crust in the pan. Bake 30 - 40 minutes at 350. Cool, chill, and serve. May be topped with whipped topping and more nuts for looks but is fine the way it is.
ingredients: gingersnap cookies, part-skim ricotta cheese, canned pumpkin puree, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, pumpkin pie spice, whipped topping
name: pumpkin cheesecake cups

steps: Cook ravioli according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add ravioli, squash, tomatoes, thyme and pepper. Sstir 4-5 minutes, until squash is tender. Add the cooked ravioli to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people.
ingredients: cheese ravioli, marinated artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, grape tomatoes, pepperoni slices, red onion, green olives, fresh basil leaf, red wine and vinegar salad dressing, baby spinach
name: mini ravioli antipasto salad

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: green beans, brown sugar, butter, garlic powder, pepper, worcestershire sauce
name: sherry halt s green beans

steps: In a small bowl whisk together the rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour, eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red ch
ingredients: eggplants, rice vinegar, sugar, spring onions, red chile, minced chicken, light soya sauce, white pepper powder, cornflour
name: steamed eggplant with minced chicken in rice vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat okra dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear okra in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until onions break down, about 8 minutes. Return okra to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh okra, tomato sauce, plum tomatoes, garlic, pepper, lemon, juice of, salt, water
name: bamieh sephardic style okra
