steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: butter, mushroom, flour, pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, cream, port wine, fresh parsley
name: chicken oporto

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place chops in a 9x13 pan. Pour undiluted tomato soup over chops. Pour peas with liquid over soup. Place onions over all. Salt and pepper to taste. Do not stir. Cover with foil tightly and bake 1 hour 15 minutes or until meat falls off the bone. Serve over mashed potatoes.
ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, carrots, celery rib, onion, seasoning salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk
name: best and easiest pork chops ever

steps: In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Add a tiny dollop of red caviar. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: red potatoes, salt and pepper, heavy cream, boursin cheese, fresh chives
name: boursin cheese potatoes

steps: Heat vegetable oil in large non-stick skillet. Rub pork chops with salt and pepper. Place half of the chopped cilantro, red onions, half the cumin, half the chili powder, and salt and pepper in bottom of crock pot. Place the pork chops on top. Place chopped tomatoes, remaining cilantro, remaining cumin, remaining chili powder, and salt and pepper on top of pork chops. Cook on high for 3-4 hours.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, boneless pork loin chops, salsa, fresh lime juice, fresh cilantro
name: ww southwestern pork chops 4 pts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted.
ingredients: onion, potatoes, salt, black pepper, pork and beans, tomato soup, bacon, american cheese, ground beef
name: little league casserole

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, marinated artichoke, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil, salt, coarse black pepper, rotini pasta, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: quick and easy pasta toss

steps: Melt butter or margarine. If desired add garlic. Brown pork chops on both sides arrange in bottom of a casserole dish. Put drained potatoes in skillet and stir to coat in pork chop drippings. Layer potatoes over pork chops season to taste. Pour creamed corn evenly over potatoes. Cover and bake at 350f for 30-90 minutes.
ingredients: center-cut pork chops, flour, chinese five spice powder, salt, pepper, oil, port wine, apple juice
name: dusty candy pork chops

steps: In a large pot, combine the tomato paste, water, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegars, mustard, cunnamon, cumin, cloves and mace. Whisk well and add the brown sugar. Cook over medium heat for 20 minutes or so, until the flavours marry. Remove from the heat and cool for 10 minutes, then pour into glass bottles with tight fitting lids. Store in sealed containers in the refrigerator.
ingredients: tomato paste, water, vinegar, dry mustard, cinnamon, salt, clove, allspice, cayenne pepper, brown sugar
name: gg s homemade ketchup

steps: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Whisk eggs and hot sauce in a small bowl. Add to hot skillet and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Top with cheese and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves. Top with remaining bagel halves and serve.
ingredients: eggs, salt, milk, fresh tarragon, paprika, monterey jack cheese, asiago cheese, asiago cheese bagels
name: panera saint louis bread co s asiago bagel breakfast bake

steps: Heat the oil and add the garlic, chili paste, and tomato paste. Fry until garlic is golden brown. Add the broth, sugar, peanut butter, and hoisin sauce, and whisk to dissolve the peanut butter. Bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Garnish with the ground peanuts.
ingredients: garlic cloves, red chilies, peanuts, lime, juice of, fish sauce, sugar, water
name: spicy cambodian dipping sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter or oil an ovenproof baking pan large enought to accommodate the chicken pieces. Wash chicken and pat dry with paper towels. Place chicken in greased baking dish. In a cup or small bowl, combine the sour cream, tabasco sauce, celery salt, and pepper. Spread this cream mixture evenly over the chicken. Cover baking dish with foil or a tight-fitting lid and back 50 minutes to 1 hour. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, liquid hot pepper sauce, cider vinegar, yellow cornmeal, cayenne pepper, salt, chicken tenders, low-fat ranch dressing
name: baked fiery chicken strips

steps: Heat oil, then scramble eggs until set. Add tomatoes and mix with eggs for 1 minute to steam. Add milk, cornmeal, paprika, salt, pepper, chili sauce. Mix in leftover rice. Cover and let steam for 1 minute. Cover and let steam for
ingredients: canola oil, green tomatoes, milk, cornmeal, paprika, salt
name: another fried green tomato recipe

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: cantaloupe, fresh ginger, tabasco sauce, cream cheese, lime, juice of, peaches, honeydew melon, mint
name: chilled cantaloupe peach soup with ginger mint

steps: Cook beef, fennel seed, brown sugar, white onion, grand marnier, garlic clove, butter, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion
ingredients: ground beef, fennel seed, brown sugar, white onion, grand marnier, garlic clove, butter
name: special beef breakfast sausage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In 4 quart saucepan, heat soup, milk, thyme, pepper, chicken and vegetables to boiling over med-high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil and stir 3-5 minutes. Spread in ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Seperate dough into 8 biscuits. Place evenly over hot chicken mixture. Bake 35-40 minutes or until biscuits are golden brown and no longer doughy on bottom. After 20 minutes, cover with foil if necessary to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoning, new potatoes, cooked chicken, frozen mixed vegetables, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cheddar cheese
name: chicken pot pie bubble bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f in large casserole dish, combine rice, tumeric, cinnamon, salt, sugar. Stir to distribute spices even. Pour boiling water over rice, add butter, stir to mix, and add 2 lemon slices, thickly sliced, on top. Make sure there are no seeds in lemon slices. Cover dish and put in oven, bake for 25 to 35 minutes until water is absorbed and rice is tender. You can also make this with brown rice, just increase amount of water to 6 cups and increase cooking time to 45 to 60 minutes.
ingredients: yellow lentils, basmati rice, water, salt, cumin seeds, oil
name: very tasty yellow moong dal yellow lentils and rice khichdi

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Add eggs, strawberries, milk, vanilla, powdered sugar, maple syrup and mix until just combined. Fold in nuts and pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan. Bake for 1 hour or until center tests done.
ingredients: cinnamon raisin bread, strawberries, honey, mint leaf, mascarpone cheese, butter
name: strawberry dessert bruschetta over mascarpone raisin bread

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: chicken, sour cream, dry breadcrumbs, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, cayenne pepper, thyme
name: oven fried creole chicken

steps: In a large pot, saute tomatoes in oil over medium-high heat until the tomatoes are soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained tomatoes, bay leaves and enough water to cover tomatoes. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until tomatoes are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if tomatoes start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, olive oil, garlic cloves, whole tomatoes, black beans, cayenne pepper, fresh cilantro
name: black beans and tomatoes hot and spicy

steps: Mix egg, water, salt and pepper. Dust each cutlet lightly with flour. Then dredge first in egg mixture, then in breadcrumbs. Cover and set aside in refrigerator. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saut cutlets, being careful not to overcook. And please. Do not poke around on these cutlets with a fork. It will only make the meat tough.
ingredients: veal cutlets, flour, eggs, plain breadcrumbs, olive oil, salt and pepper, nutmeg, lemon slice
name: wienerschnitzel

steps: Heat oil over med-high heat. Add balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, cider vinegar, sugar, habanero peppers, fresh mint leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Season with
ingredients: balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, cider vinegar, sugar, habanero peppers, fresh mint leaves
name: mint habanero sauce

steps: Mix the water with the two sugars. Simmer for 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in maple flavoring. This may form crystals but can be reheated. Does not need to be refrigerated.
ingredients: water, white sugar, brown sugar, vodka, almond extract, vanilla extract
name: amaretto

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onion, sugar, dried oregano, whipping cream, frozen chopped spinach, fresh basil, milk, parmesan cheese
name: tomato and spinach soup

steps: Bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Meanwhile, heat a small amount of soy sauce in a large saut pan, add the onions and garlic, and saut until opaque. Add beef and saut, turning often with tongs, for 7 to 10 minutes. Stir together the oil, vinegar, and ginger and add to the saut mixture. Blanch broccoli in the boiling water. Add to the meat mixture and keep warm. Prepare soba noodles according to package directions. Drain, toss with the beef and broccoli, and serve.
ingredients: soy sauce, red wine vinegar, vegetable oil, cornstarch, garlic, beef steaks, water, water chestnuts, green pepper
name: beef and pepper stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese melts. Top each pepper with a jalapeno omelet.
ingredients: cilantro leaves, jalapenos, red onion, salt, ground black pepper, eggs, cooking spray
name: cilantro red onion and jalapeno omelet

steps: Put in sterilized jars, cover and process in a boiling water bath for ten minutes to seal. Put in sterilized jars, cover and process in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes to seal. Put in sterilized jars, cover and process in a boiling water bath
ingredients: pumpkin puree, orange marmalade, fresh ginger, lemon juice
name: pumpkin marmalade

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: tempeh, vegan mayonnaise, celery, pickle, onion, parsley, mustard, soy sauce, garlic clove
name: vegan chicken salad

steps: Rinse lentils, discarding and stones, or blemished lentils. Drain. Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until hot. Add onion and bell pepper, cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Add cumin and ground red pepper and stir 1 minute. Pour in the 4 cups of water and the lentils. Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 20 minutes. Stir in salt and simmer 10 minutes more or until lentils are tender. Stir in lemon juice and serve.
ingredients: red lentil, wheat berries, chickpeas, onion, celery, carrot, green bell peppers, tomato paste, dried hot red chili pepper, salt
name: kurdish spicy lentil soup

steps: Preheat oven to 200f. In a large bowl of an electric mixer, beat egg whites until foamy. With the mixer on high speed, beat in salt. Then gradually add sugar, about a tableshppon at a time, beating well after each addition, until whites fold stiff, glossy peaks. Add vanilla and beat for 1 minute. Fold in dates and walnuts. Drop meringue mixture by rounded teaspoonfulls onto well-greased cooking sheets, spacing cookies about 1 inch apart. Bake in a 200f oven for 1 hour or until outside is dry and set. Cookies should not turn brown. Let cool on baking sheets for about 5 minutes, then transfer to racks and let cool completely. Store airtight.
ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, egg yolks, vanilla, flour, water, dates, brown sugar, egg whites
name: date meringue bars

steps: In a small bowl, combine soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, worcestershire sauce and black pepper. Rub mixture onto ribs. Layer ribs and onions in a dutch oven and pour cola over all. Cover and bake at 250f for 4 hours. Remove pan from oven and pour off cola juices. Add bbq sauce, cover and return to oven for 1 hour more. Remove bbq sauce, cover and return to oven for 1 hour more. Remove bbq sauce, cover and return to oven for 1 hour
ingredients: pork baby back ribs, barbecue sauce, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: twice cooked baby back ribs

steps: Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version.
ingredients: new potato, green beans, bacon, mixed salad greens, cooked chicken breasts, honey mustard dressing
name: honey chicken bacon salad

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, saute the oyster mushrooms slightly and remove the tough stems. Saut carrots, onions, and mushrooms for 3 minutes. Add broth, beans and quinoa. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: water, brown basmati rice, pearl barley, olive oil, oyster mushroom, vegetable broth, parmesan cheese, ground pepper
name: oyster mushroom and barley risotto

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in onion and saute until golden. Add in sliced cabbage, cider vinegar, sugar, celery seeds and black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt.
ingredients: red cabbage, bacon, brown sugar, flour, water, cider vinegar, salt and pepper, onion
name: german sweet sour cabbage

steps: Cook potatoes until tender, peel and grate. Heat the butter with soup and chicken stock. Blend in sour cream, onion, and most of the cheese. Mix with the potatoes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Spread into a 9x13 baking dish. Mix the bread crumbs with the melted butter and then place on top of the potatoe mixture. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Bake for 45 min at 350 degrees or until bubbly.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, bacon, gruyere
name: cheese rosti

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium heat, cook the chicken and garlic in oil for 4 to 5 minutes or until heated through. Whisk in cream and taco seasoning until blended. Cook until heated through, do not boil. Stir in parmesan cheese. Drain pasta, toss with chicken mixture.
ingredients: penne pasta, cooked chicken, garlic, olive oil, heavy cream, taco seasoning, parmesan cheese
name: chicken taco pasta

steps: Place pork tenderloin in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours, or until meat is cooked and tender.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, barbecue sauce, onion, garlic cloves, hot sauce, salt and pepper
name: couldn t be easier bbq pork tenderloin crock pot

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add cauliflower, garlic, onion, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika
ingredients: cauliflower florets, garlic cloves, olive oil, apple juice, parsley, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt
name: cauliflower with paprika garlic sauce

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter or margarine to skillet. Cover and simmer chops for 10-15 minutes. Serve with sauce poured over top.
ingredients: melba toast, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, dried thyme, sugar, mayonnaise, boneless pork chops
name: crunchy pork chops

steps: In large bowl beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon full onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: flour, salt, butter, icing sugar, vanilla, mini chocolate chips
name: mini chip butter crisps

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, vegetable oil, water, egg, fruity pebbles cereal
name: fruity cookie crispies

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: cream cheese, cumin, all purpose greek seasoning, cayenne pepper, 10-inch flour tortillas, spicy bulk sausage, monterey jack cheese, green chilies, frozen corn, salt
name: sausage and corn quesadillas

steps: In a large skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until they are soft and golden brown. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately.
ingredients: ground beef, cheddar cheese, onion soup mix, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls
name: mini crescent burgers

steps: Mix spelt flour, vegetable oil, salt, baking soda, cream of tartar, water and baking soda in a large bowl. Cover loosely with plastic wrap and let rise for 5 minutes. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes.
ingredients: spelt flour, vegetable oil, salt, baking soda, cream of tartar, water
name: spelt bread

steps: Heat oven to 350c. Line moulds with a slice of ham so the ends stick out over the top. Break an egg into each hollow, top with tomato and scatter with chives, parmesan, salt and pepper. Bake for 18 minutes or until egg is set. Remove from oven and leave to cool for 5 minutes. Run a knife around each mould to loosen ham. Cool on rack.
ingredients: stuffed green olives, ham, cheddar cheese, puff pastry, egg yolk
name: empanadas with ham cheese and olives

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprout, red onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes
name: roasted sliced brussels sprouts with garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, onion powder, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, butter, french-fried onions
name: yummy mashed potato bake

steps: Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking.
ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, ritz cracker, butter, poppy seed, cooked rice
name: church chicken casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, vegetable oil, parmesan cheese, chili powder, seasoning salt, garlic powder
name: chili bows

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: green beans, olive oil, garlic cloves, pine nuts, kosher salt, pepper
name: green beans with garlic and pine nuts

steps: Roast meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls.
ingredients: beef roast, beer, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, onion salt, dry mustard, seasoning salt, paprika, pepper
name: beer marinated beef roast

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Tear 2 pita breads into chip-size pieces and brush with oil. Sprinkle with lime zest and chilli flakes. Bake for 10 mins until crisp. Sprinkle with salt if you like.
ingredients: ground cumin, paprika, kosher salt, ground red pepper, whole wheat pita bread, cooking spray
name: spicy whole wheat pita chips

steps: Place fish on a broiler rack that has been coated with a non-stick cooking spray. Brush tops of fish with 3 tablespoons of the butter or margarine. Pour over the fish. Broil 5 minutes longer or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: smoked fish fillet, cream cheese, lemon juice, onions, parsley
name: smoked fish pate

steps: Mix all ingredients except barbecue sauce in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust barbecue sauce in flour. Dip barbecue sauce into batter. Fry barbecue sauce in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain barbecue sauce on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: barbecue sauce, olive oil, sesame seeds, garlic powder, whole wheat tortillas
name: baked barbecue tortilla chips

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can put this in an omelette and top with mo
ingredients: zucchini, potato, cumin, red pepper flakes, caraway seed, salt, lemon juice, garlic cloves, olive oil
name: zucchini potato mash

steps: Combine all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size.
ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, white sugar, dark brown sugar, evaporated milk, butter, pecan halves
name: easy pralines

steps: Mix butter, corn syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, wooden sticks, tart apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, dried tart cherry. Cover and cook over medium heat until sugar is dissolved and apples are glazed. Reduce heat and simmer 3-5 minutes longer or until sugar is dissolved and apples are glazed.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, light corn syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, wooden sticks, tart apples
name: kittencal s caramel apples

steps: Place one tortilla down. Spread the ranch on it in a thin layer. Place half of cheese and one sliced mushroom. Place tortilla on top. Bake at 350f for 6 minutes on cookie sheet. Enjoy.
ingredients: flour tortilla, olive oil, mozzarella cheese, pizza sauce
name: crispy tortilla pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs, coating well. In 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish, arrange chicken. Bake uncovered 20 minutes. Pour pasta sauce over chicken, then bread crumbs, coating well. Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. To serve, arrange chicken and sauce on rolls.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, paprika, alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, tomatoes
name: chicken parmesan alfredo

steps: In a resealable storage bag thoroughly combine all ingredients except the pepper, beef steak, olive oil, garlic clove, sugar, mirin, soy sauce, buckwheat groats. Seal bag, turn to coat. Place in the refrigerator and marinate 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill to desired doneness, about 6 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on platter and serve.
ingredients: black pepper, beef steak, olive oil, garlic clove, sugar, mirin, soy sauce, buckwheat groats
name: bite sized pepper steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: sweet italian sausage links, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, olive oil, sweet onions, garlic, salt, ground black pepper, hoagie rolls
name: italian sausage and pepper heroes

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve.
ingredients: butter, linguica sausage, salt, water, rice
name: portuguese sausage rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together butter and sugar. Add almond extract and vanilla. Add flour and mix until incorporated. Drop by tablespoons on prepared baking sheets. Make an indent with your thumb in the center of each cookie. Fill with jam and three chocolate chips. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes or until lightly firm. Cookies should still be pale in color.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, egg white, almonds, raspberry jam
name: thumb cookies

steps: Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, pork, shallots, green beans, snow peas, char siu sauce, water, walnuts, fresh egg noodles
name: char siu pork stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together celery, onion, olive oil, potatoes, bratwursts, green beans, cream of chicken soup, milk, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup
ingredients: celery, onion, olive oil, potatoes, bratwursts, green beans, cream of chicken soup, milk
name: delicious brat casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: pie crusts, kiwi fruits, ground almonds, sugar, eggs, cream, orange flower water
name: kiwifruit tart

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Peel, core and slice apples. Place in a well greased 8x8-inch baking pan. Mix cake mix, oats, sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Melt butter and pour over the top of the dry cake mixture and mix until crumbly. Sprinkle this over apples. Bake 35-40 minutes until golden.
ingredients: flour tortillas, apple pie filling, cheddar cheese, sugar, cinnamon, red-hot candies
name: apple mexi crisp with a twist

steps: Place roast in crock pot. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic salt. Pour chili verde over roast. Cover, and cook on low for 8-10 hours. After 6 hours of cooking, you may need to shred the chicken using 2 forks. Stir and continue cooking. May need to add all or part of the reserved liquid if it looks too dry.
ingredients: boneless pork roast, onion, green chili salsa, diced green chilies, ground cumin, garlic, lime, juice of, cilantro
name: crock pot chili verde

steps: Mix sugar, water and salt in a small saucepan. Heat to boil, then boil gently for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Use one shot per can of coke over ice for never fail syrup. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, white karo, water, salt, maple flavoring, butter flavoring
name: never fail syrup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Preheat oven
ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, frozen peas, margarine, cooked ham, whole milk, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, black pepper
name: leftover ham stuff

steps: Place fish fillets in bottom of greased baking dish in one layer. Mix soup with sherry, salt, pepper, and basil. Spread this over fish fillets. Sprinkle parmesan cheese over top. Bake at 350 f for 20-30 minutes until fish flakes. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
ingredients: red snapper fillet, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, egg, butter, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: snapper parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Spray a small baking sheet with nonstick spray coating. Set aside. Open the biscuit carton, and separate the biscuits. Place them on the baking sheet in a single layer without crowding together. With a small spoon, spread the tomato sauce on the biscuits, dividing the mixture evenly. Top with the ham and cheese, dividing evenly. Bake in the center of the oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden. Serve hot.
ingredients: butter, ham, cheddar cheese, plain yogurt, eggs, green onions, fresh parsley
name: ham and cheese breakfast puffs

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in a roaster and cook for 5-6 hours, or until chicken is tender. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: cooked chicken, green pepper, maui onion, garlic clove, cream of chicken soup, pineapple chunks in juice, peanut oil, soy sauce, cooked rice, macadamia nuts
name: hula chicken

steps: Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the shallot sauce over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley.
ingredients: butter, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, garlic cloves, beef broth, sirloin steaks, salt, pepper
name: super easy sirloin steak bits

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and bake for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, canned pumpkin, apples, flour, salt, baking soda, pumpkin pie spice, chocolate chips
name: pumpkin chocolate muffins

steps: In a large bowl, combine condensed milk, peppermint extract, food color and water. Blend well. Gradually fold in whipped cream. Add chocolate chips and mix well. Pour into a 9x5-inch freezer container. Cover and freeze at least 6 hours.
ingredients: heavy cream, water, vanilla extract, mint extract, salt, green food coloring, egg yolks, splenda sugar substitute, sugar-free chocolate
name: low carb mint chocolate chip ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, eggs, sour cream, milk, bacon
name: tojasos krumpli egg and sour cream potatoes

steps: Combine all the marinade ingredients. Marinate halibut filets for three hours. Combine all sauce ingredients and set aside. Grill halibut filets on medium-high heat 5 minutes per side, or to your liking. Serve immediately with sauce on the side.
ingredients: halibut fillets, mayonnaise, cilantro, garlic cloves, lime zest, lime juice, cumin
name: grilled halibut with cilantro cream

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: skim milk, jasmine rice, sugar, vanilla, egg yolks, low-fat cream cheese, white chocolate chips, fresh raspberry
name: white chocolate jasmine rice pudding

steps: Mix all ingredients except the powdered sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes. Optional sometimes i add walnuts to the mix as well as put some in the bottom of the bundt pan before pouring in the cake mixture it gives it a nice crunchy topping. Pour into well greased bundt pan and bake at 350f for 45 minutes. Let cool for 15-20 mins before removing from bundt pan. While cooling i sometimes mix some of the powdered sugar and some extra sherry poke holes in cake with a chopstick and drizzle while still in pan. Turn out pan onto cooling rack and dust lightly with powdered sugar.
ingredients: duncan hines yellow cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, crisco cooking oil, dry sherry, eggs, cinnamon, brown sugar
name: sherry pound cake

steps: In a large saute pan, combine carrots, water, and 1 tablespoon of the butter. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes or until carrots are nearly tender, stirring to glaze carrots. Just before serving, sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: carrots, mandarin orange segments, green seedless grape, low-fat orange yogurt, cider vinegar, ground ginger
name: mandarin orange carrot slaw

steps: Sift together dry ingredients and set aside. Mix together beaten egg yolk, sour cream, milk, butter, banana. Add to flour mixture, mixing well. Fold in egg white which has been whipped until stiff. Pour into oiled waffle iron and bake until brown.
ingredients: skim milk, banana, vanilla extract, almond extract
name: banana breakfast shake

steps: Combine the water and apple juice in a small pan. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Add the camomile tea, cinnamon, clove and ginger. Let simmer gently for 10 minutes to infuse flavours. Strain into a heated teapot and serve immediately. Garnish with the orange slices.
ingredients: dried apples, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, cold water, honey
name: turkish apple tea

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: granny smith apples, flour, cinnamon, sugar, butter, walnuts, tart shells
name: apple crumble tarts

steps: Put cinna raisin rice pudding in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled.
ingredients: water, salt, long grain rice, reduced-fat milk, splenda granular, ground cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract
name: cinna raisin rice pudding

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: flour, chicken, butter, oil, half-and-half
name: shaker fried chicken

steps: Place steaks and bell peppers on grill over medium, ash-covered coals. Grill, uncovered, 14 to 16 minutes until steaks are medium rare to medium doneness and peppers are tender, turning occasionally. Meanwhile, combine butter, green onion and garlic in small bowl. Stir with fork until uniformly blended. Top each steak with 2 tablespoons of butter mixture. Combine bell peppers with 2 tablespoons butter mixture in medium bowl. Toss. Serve steaks with bell peppers. Season with salt and pepper, as desired.
ingredients: beef t-bone steaks, steak sauce, fresh thyme, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, salt
name: peppered t bone steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking sheets with parchment or a silpat. Cream butter, sugars, peanut butter, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add eggs one at a time. Stir in the flour until incorporated. Stir in peanut butter chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto prepared sheets. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until set. And brown around the edges. Remove from oven and cool on pan 5 minutes. Remove from pan to finish cooling.
ingredients: butter, sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, unsifted flour, baking soda, peanut butter chips
name: reese s original peanut butter chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to high. Cut potatoes and spread out on a cookie sheet. Coat potatoes with extra-virgin olive oil, dried herbs and steak seasoning or, salt and pepper. Spread potatoes to the corners of the cookie sheet. Cook potatoes in very hot oven 25 minutes. Turn potatoes once, half way in the cooking process. Serve fries hot from the oven.
ingredients: russet potatoes, olive oil, onion, garlic, butter, salt and pepper
name: classic lyonnaise potatoes

steps: In a medium bowl combine the crust ingredients, mix well. Press firmly into the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Refrigerate crust for 20-30 minutes. In another medium bowl, combine filling ingredients, and blend at low speed for 30 seconds, and then on medium high speed 2 minutes or until light and fluffy. Spread over crust. In a medium saucepan, melt chocolate chips over low heat, stirring constantly until smooth. Stir in peanut butter, blend well. Stir in peanuts. Spread over filling. Refrigerate at least 4 hours, store leftovers in the refrigerator as well.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, milk chocolate frosting, peanut butter chips, peanuts
name: peanut chocolate fudge

steps: In a large heavy skillet with lid, heat oil over medium-low heat. Add the shrimp. Cook, stirring, for 10 to 15 seconds. Add the rice wine. Add the scallions. Add the ginger. Add the scall
ingredients: raw shrimp, water chestnuts, scallions, rice wine, fresh ginger, salt & freshly ground black pepper, egg white, cornstarch, oil
name: lotus flowers

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the pomelo fruit, fresh raspberry, roasted cashews, honey, lime juice, fresh mint leaves, lime zest. Set pan over medium-high heat and bring to boil. Boil 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture reduces to 2 tablespoons. Strain mixture though fine sieve to remove zest. Place melon in bowl, toss with ginger-lime mixture. Let sit for 15 minutes. You can drain the sauce or serve it with the melon. Garnish with mint.
ingredients: pomelo fruit, fresh raspberry, roasted cashews, honey, lime juice, fresh mint leaves, lime zest
name: pomelo fruit platter

steps: Cover with lid and cook for 1 hour at 200 degrees with the lid on then for another half and hour with the lid off.
ingredients: fresh sauerkraut, bacon, garlic, dry white wine, juniper berries, whole black peppercorn, cloves, unsmoked bacon, sausages
name: choucroute garni

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat pork chops dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear chops in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down, about 8 minutes. Return pork chops to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: plum tomato, red onion, red wine vinegar, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh basil, salt and pepper, pork chops
name: grilled italian pork chops

steps: Place cranberries in food processor. Cover and process until finely chopped. Transfer to a large bowl. Stir in marshmallows and sugar. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Just before serving, stir in the apples, grapes, walnuts and salt. Fold in the whipped cream.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, mini marshmallows, red apples, seedless grapes, pineapple tidbits, pecans, frozen whipped topping, shredded coconut
name: holiday ambrosia fruit fluff

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Lightly grease a 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Melt butter in skillet. Saute celery and onion till tender, about 3 minutes. In large mixing bowl, combine cornbread, bread, celery and onions, sage and black pepper. Stir broth and beaten eggs into cornbread mixture. Blend well. Stir in chopped boiled eggs. Pour into prepared baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: cornbread stuffing mix, onion, celery, sausages, butter, chicken broth, pecans, sage, salt & pepper
name: cornbread sausage stuffing

steps: Blend together corn syrup, sugar, water, and cream of tartar. Stir, dissolving the sugar. Without stirring, cook until the hard ball stage. Remove from burner. Add peppermint oil, blend well. Divide into 2 porions. In one half, add red coloring. Pour over greased platters. Let cool. When cool enough to touch, pull each apart seperatly. Form into ropes and twist red with white candy mixtures. Cut into desired lengths and shapes.
ingredients: powdered sugar, sugar, light corn syrup, water, cinnamon oil, red food coloring
name: hot cinnamon candy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour.
ingredients: fresh peaches, earth balance margarine, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, vanilla ice cream, granola cereal, caramel sauce
name: bobby flay s grilled peach cobbler a la mode

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, flour, salt, baking powder, chocolate chips, nuts
name: conga bars

steps: Mix together first 8 ingredients in a bowl. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Grill over medium-high heat for 10-12 minutes or until done, turning once. Just before taking off the grill, place cheese slice on each patty. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, etc.
ingredients: ground beef, ritz crackers, ketchup, egg, onion soup mix, garlic, worcestershire sauce, butter, sliced mushrooms, onion
name: world s best burgers

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or
ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, sour cream, butter, cheddar cheese
name: corn casserole paula deen

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 2 quart baking dish with cooking spray, set aside. In a large bowl mix together broccoli, soup, one cup of cheese, garlic powder, pepper, salt, milk, 1 cup of french onions, and soy sauce. Pour into baking dish, sprinkle remaining cheese over top. Bake for 25 minutes or until cheese is lightly browned. Sprinkle with rest of french fried onions and bake until onions are browned and cheese is bubbly, about 10 more minutes.
ingredients: frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese with vegetables, seasoned croutons
name: creamy vegetable casserole

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: olive oil, shallots, onion, bacon, garlic clove, pasta, egg yolks, heavy cream, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper
name: rich carbonara sauce

steps: Place the turkey drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take turkey drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them. In a small bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the remaining
ingredients: chili powder, ground cumin, salt, pepper, turkey drumsticks, barbecue sauce, lime zest
name: roasted turkey drumsticks

steps: Line an 8-in. Square pan wih foil and coatwith cooking spray. Set aside. In a heavy saucepan over low heat, mel chocolatechips with milk. Stir until smooth. Remove from the hear. Cool for 2 minutes. Stir in vanilla. Fold in the marshmallows and graham crackers. Pour into the prepared pan. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until firm. Lif out pan and remove foil.
ingredients: sweetened flaked coconut, miniature marshmallows, graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, walnuts, candied cherries
name: marshmallow log

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix cornstarch, sugar, cherries, peaches, butter, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, milk, baking powder, salt
ingredients: cornstarch, sugar, cherries, peaches, all-purpose flour, baking powder, unsalted butter, buttermilk, cinnamon
name: summertime cherry peach cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Flour an ungreased cookie sheet. Place oil & sugar, eggs & vanilla in large bowl. Mix well. Gradually add flour once cup at a time. Blend in nuts. When dough feels smooth roll dough into small balls. Place small balls on cookie sheet. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Place a walnut piece on top. Bake 10 15 minutes. Cookies should be off-white.
ingredients: eggs, crisco, sugar, vegetable oil, lemon juice, vanilla, baking powder, flour
name: taaralikus sephardic cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, whole wheat bread, white cheddar cheese, apples
name: griddled cheddar apple dippers

steps: Combine margarine, mustard, honey and spices. Dip pretzels in sauce and place in a 13x9 baking dish, pour remaining sauce over chicken. Bake covered at 375 for 1 hour. I usually bake uncovered for the last 30 minutes and turn the chicken as it browns. Serve over rice.
ingredients: miniature pretzel twists, margarine, yellow mustard, honey, garlic salt, onion powder
name: glazed honey mustard pretzels

steps: Heat the olive oil in a medium sized skillet. In a small bowl, beat the eggs and whites, salt, and pepper. Saute the onion and bell peppers about 5 minutes. Slowly pour the mixture from the bowl into the skillet and sprinkle with cheese. Gently stir until the mixture becomes slightly firm. Then turn over the frittata and cook the other side about 2 minutes longer. After taking the frittata from the skillet, cut it in half, and roll it like a burrito. Serve with salsa.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, eggs, green onions, russet potatoes, white onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, tabasco sauce, salt, black pepper
name: rosabelle s potato frittata

steps: Bring the water almost to a boil and add the cubes. Dissolve cubes. Once it has reached a boil pour in egg noodles. Cook for 5 minutes and then add vegall, cream of soup, dill weed, bay leaf, salt, pepper, celery salt. Continue cooking for 5 minutes. Serve with a nice grilled cheese sandwich. Ps will thicken upon standing.
ingredients: chicken broth, noodles, cream of chicken soup, cream of celery soup, canned chicken breast meat, velveeta cheese, salt and pepper
name: amish chicken noodle soup

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. After 6 hours of cooking, you may need to shred the chicken using 2 forks. Stir and continue cooking. May need to add all or part of the reserved liquid if it looks too dry. Place chicken pieces in crockpot.
ingredients: green bell peppers, onion, chicken thighs, chicken drumsticks, chili powder, dried oregano, salsa, ketchup, ground cumin, salt
name: mexicali chicken slow cooker

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: pumpkin, eggs, sugar, molasses, salt, ginger, cinnamon, clove, evaporated milk
name: tennessee pumpkin pie

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Stir together chips and nuts in small bowl. Unroll dough to form 8 triangles. Lightly sprinkle 1 heaping tablespoon chip mixture on top of each. Gently press into dough. Starting at shortest side of triangle, roll dough to opposite point. Place rolls, point side down, on ungreased cookie sheet. Curve into crescent shape. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Sprinkle with powdered sugar.
ingredients: pillsbury refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, creamy peanut butter, sugar, miniature semisweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate peanut butter roll ups

steps: Cook pasta per package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water, then drain again. In a large bowl, mix pasta, chicken, tomatoes, bell pepper, zucchini, red onion, basil pesto, cheese soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, spinach, garlic, breaded chicken pattiespreparation:Put the pasta on to boil. While pasta is cooking, mix cottage cheese, cheddar cheese soup, and sour cream together, with a stick blender until creamy. Defrost the chicken and cut up into bite size pieces. Dice the spinach into small bits. Add half a cup of the cheddar cheese and the garlic. By this time the pasta should be done. Drain and add to the mix. Toss it all together, put in a 9x13-inch pan and bake at 350f for about 30 minutes. Some option include adding corn and peas.
ingredients: sun-dried tomato packed in oil, cooked farfalle pasta, chicken, fat-free caesar salad dressing, fresh parmesan cheese, frozen spinach
name: chicken and spinach pasta with sun dried tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Divide the apple mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream.
ingredients: shortcrust pastry, cooking apples, blackberries, sugar, milk, water
name: simple blackberry and apple pie

steps: In a half pint jar, add oats, milk, yogurt, chia seeds, and raspberry jam. Put lid on jar and shake until well combined. Remove lid, add raspberries and stir until mixed throughout. Return lid to jar and refrigerate overnight or as long as 2-3 days. Eat chilled.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, vanilla yogurt, sliced almonds, crushed pineapple in juice, fresh strawberries
name: swiss breakfast parfait

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, yukon gold potatoes, garlic, onion, fresh coarse ground black pepper, chicken broth, olive oil
name: kielbasa potato and onion skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Prepare kasha by washing, poking 2-4 holes into center with sharp knife. Bake whole squash in oven for 60-90 minutes, until soft. When squash is done, cut in half, remove seeds and fibers, and scrape flesh from skin into a bowl, mash but do not puree squash. Melt butter in a large skillet. Add sage leaves and fry until crisp 1-2 minutes. Add leek and salt and continue heating 2-5 minutes until leeks are soft and translucent. Now add squash to skillet and mix until all butter is incorporated.
ingredients: dried mushrooms, buckwheat groats, carrot, onion, salt
name: kasha with vegetables

steps: In a large bowl, combine cabbage, scallions, fresh cilantro, sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, limes, pepper. Toss together the cabbage, scallions, fresh cilantro, sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, limes, pepper. Toss together the cabbage,
ingredients: savoy cabbage, scallions, fresh cilantro, sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, limes, pepper
name: savoy lime and cilantro coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, turnips, parsnips, carrots, honey, olive oil, salt, shallots, cooking spray
name: honey roasted root vegetables

steps: Peel & core the pear. Cut each into 12 pieces & sprinkle with the lemon juice to prevent from browning. Heat the butter & saut the pear pieces over a moderate heat. Add the pine nuts & raisins, cook for 1 minute then add the honey. Immediately after adding the honey stir the apples quickly & frequently so they caramelize evenly. Add the orange-flower water to deglaze the apples. Serve hot --.
ingredients: pears, sugar, honey, crushed pineapple, lemon
name: disappearing pear honey

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: hot pepper sesame oil, sesame oil, onion, green beans, shiro miso, cold water, garlic clove, pure maple syrup, mirin, cornstarch
name: green beans in spicy miso sauce

steps: Mix all ingredients of base together using just a little of the coconut cream to mix the cornflour with first. Cook on low heat till bubbling slowly and then till thickened. Spread cooked mix into 2 medium size pie dishes and refrigerate. Blend all pineapple from can and add juice last with a little mixed with all the cornflour. Cook slowly till thickened and cooked. Spread onto cooled bases covering whiteness. Decorate with lemon slices, pieces of pineapple, strawberry or kiwifruit.
ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, water, butter, cool whip lite, coconut flakes, pie shell
name: pineapple cream pie diabetic friendly

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: deep dish pie shell, egg white, roma tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, green onion, salt & freshly ground black pepper, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise
name: paula deen s tomato pie

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until cranberries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: cranberry juice cocktail, citrus-infused vodka, triple sec, fresh lime juice, fresh cranberries, lime slice
name: crantinis

steps: Melt butter in a large saute pan over medium heat until starting to foam. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute. Add the remaining ingredients except for the salt. Cook for approximately 6 minutes, stirring often until the pea pods are crisp-tender. Season with salt to taste and serve.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, tiny peas, butter, salt, pepper, of fresh mint
name: buttered sugar snaps and green peas

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture. Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the egg mixture, then serve immediately.
ingredients: baguette, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, gorgonzola, honey
name: bruschetta with gorgonzola cheese and honey

steps: Take the chiles and cook them in a hot dry cast-iron skillet until they inflate and start to pop a little. Into the cast-iron skillet, pour water over the chiles, turn off the heat, and allow them to soften and become plumper, which will take about half an hour. Meanwhile, stir the whole chiles in another skillet until they blister and black spots appear. Immediately transfer them to a blender. Place the garlic, moritas and a pinch of salt in the blender, and puree until smooth. It will be a deep red color with lots of seeds.
ingredients: anaheim chilies, tomatillo, chicken broth, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro stem
name: anaheim chile salsa verde

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, shortening, eggs, buttermilk, vanilla, orange extract
name: buttermilk cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large microwave-safe bowl, microwave coffee can or grill bag scalloped potatoes for 4 minutes on high. Stir sour cream, butter, onion, soup, and cheese into potatoes. Spread mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle corn flakes over top. Bake, uncovered, for 45-50 minutes or until bubbly around edges.
ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, flour, dried onion, dried cilantro, basil, vegetable oil, milk, salt, pepper
name: coffee can or grill bag scalloped potatoes

steps: In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, pork stuffing mix, apple pie filling, cheddar cheese, apple pie filling with cinnamon
name: kelly s apple pork chops with stuffing

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, cook the salsa con queso, whole milk, spam, onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, sazon con azafran seasoning, summer sausage, oil. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with ranch dressing on the side for dipping.
ingredients: salsa con queso, whole milk, spam, onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, sazon con azafran seasoning, summer sausage, oil
name: nachos that will make you melt

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: gruyere, carrot, cucumbers, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, baguette, butter, kielbasa, cheese slices
name: kielbasa boats

steps: Cook bibby s yellow squash in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. When done lightly mash mixture. Combine butter, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla, yellow squashpreparation:Combine the butter, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla, yellow squashpreparation:Cook bibby s yellow squash in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. Combine butter, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, vanilla, yellow squashpreparation:Cook bibby s yellow squash in about a tablespoon of butter with seasonings. Combine butter, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon,
ingredients: yellow squash, onion, butter, sugar, salt and pepper, eggs, breadcrumbs, cracker crumb
name: bibby s yellow squash bake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: beef mince, onion, carrots, chopped tomatoes, beef bouillon cube, boiling water, potatoes, cheddar cheese
name: cheesy beef and potato pie

steps: In a large bowl, combine oil, vinegar, garlic, basil, salt, red pepper and black pepper. Add tomatoes and mozzarella and toss until well combined, allowing the cheese to melt slightly. Let mixture marinate at room temperature at least 30 minutes. Cook pasta per package directions. Drain. Place in a large bowl and add the tomato mixture. Toss until well combined, allowing the cheese to melt slightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, plum tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, fresh mozzarella cheese, extra virgin olive oil, capers, salt, fresh ground pepper, garlic clove, fresh parmesan cheese
name: rigatoni caprese

steps: Cook beef casserole according to package directions, drain. Saute onion and green pepper in butter, set aside. Cream together cream cheese and sour cream, add cottage cheese, mix well. Mix tomato sauce and tomato paste, set aside. Butter a 4-quart casserole. Pour noodle mix into casserole. Spread beef mix over noodles. Spread tomato mix over beef mix. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour.
ingredients: ground sirloin, garlic cloves, brown onion, tomato sauce, dry basil, spinach fettuccine, sharp cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, milk
name: three layer beef casserole

steps: Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the shallot sauce over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh parsley, green onion, breadcrumbs, fresh basil, boneless sirloin steaks, fresh ground pepper
name: garlic stuffed sirloin steak

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy skillet over medium high heat. Saute shrimp for 2 minutes or just until opaque. Reduce heat and add garlic and salt. Saute for 1 minute until garlic is soft. Remove from heat and toss with orange zest. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: medium shrimp, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, onions, red pepper flakes, fresh lemon juice, salt, parsley
name: spicy cold garlic shrimp

steps: Heat oil in 8 inch skillet. Add water, cover, and heat in microwave for 4 minutes on high. Remove broccoli from microwave, add water, cover, and heat in microwave for 4 minutes on high. Remove broccoli from microwave, add water, cover,
ingredients: seedless watermelon, reduced-fat feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, arugula, salt, toasted almonds
name: peppery greens with watermelon

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix together the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: canola oil, sweet onions, sweet potatoes, water, golden raisin, light brown sugar, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, cayenne pepper
name: spicy sweet potato casserole

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Store in
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, honey, milk, orange peel, ground cinnamon, ice cube
name: iced mexican chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: egg whites, salt, raspberry gelatin powder, sugar, white vinegar, miniature chocolate chip
name: raspberry meringue kisses

steps: Preheat oven to 400f, grease a 15 x 10 inch baking pan. Mix together butter, oats, sugar, corn syrup, vanilla and salt. Press into prepared pan and bake 15 to 18 minutes until the mixture is brown and bubbly. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle on the chocolate, set aside for 10 minutes, then spread the chocolate over the base. Sprinkle on nuts, cool on a wire rack, then cut into squares.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, whipping cream, vanilla bean, sugar, tahini, strawberry, cantaloupe, pistachios
name: summer fruits with tahini ganache

steps: In casserole dish, mix together sauerkraut and chopped onion. Place sliced kielbasa over mixture. Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 35-40 minutes.
ingredients: smoked bacon, onion, carrot, sauerkraut, dry white wine, chicken stock, caraway seed, juniper berries, kielbasa
name: sauerkraut with polish sausage

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add chicken, turning to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until just cooked through, 25 to 30 minutes. If chicken has a skin, turn oven to broil. Broil chicken about 2 inches from the heat until skin is crisp, about 2 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: butter, cream, white wine, italian cheese blend, pasta, italian salad dressing, chicken breasts, lemon juice, lemons
name: chicken lemonada
