steps: Put stock in a pan with the celery, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots, carrots,
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, leeks, onions, carrots, celery, parsley, dried marjoram, dried whole thyme, bay leaves, cold water
name: vegetable broth

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, dry sherry, black bean sauce, gingerroot, brown sugar, garlic clove, sesame oil
name: really the best pork tenderloin

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a skillet, warm honey with chipotle powder and cinnamon over low heat, then add the nuts and stir to coat evenly. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, then spread nuts evenly in a single layer on the sheet. Bake in preheated oven until nuts are fragrant. Allow to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine sugar and salt. Add the warm pecans, and toss to coat evenly. Spread out on fresh sheet of waxed paper and let dry completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: egg white, pecan halves, sugar, dried chipotle powder
name: chipotle glazed pecans

steps: Preheat oven to 400f and spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Combine all ingredients except sausage in a large zipper type plastic bag, mixing well. Place ingredients from bag into prepared pan, bake uncovered for 30 minutes. Add sausage to vegetables mixing well. Bake for 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden browned.
ingredients: italian sausage, onion, carrot, bell pepper, all-purpose flour, milk, worcestershire sauce, ground sage, white beans
name: hearty sausage and bean casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place pork chops on a roasting rack set in a roasting pan and bake for about 1 hour, or until meat thermometer reaches 155 degrees. Remove from oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: olive oil, roast, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaves, pancetta, brown ale
name: pot roasted pork in beer

steps: Heat 2 tbsps. of olive oil on high in a heavy skillet. Add the sweet pepper and onion and garlic and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all.
ingredients: green tomatoes, onion, vegetable oil, white vinegar, water, sugar, caraway seed, salt, hot pepper flakes
name: grilled green tomatoes onions

steps: In a saucepan, combine the pumpkin, stock or water, ginger, and lemongrass. Cover, bring to a boil, reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer until the pumpkin is very tender, about 12 minutes. Add the scallions and cook briefly. Transfer the contents of the saucepan to a blender or food processor and process until the soup is partially pured. Pour in half of the coconut cream and process until smooth. Taste and adjust the seasoning and squeeze in lime or lemon juice. If using the kaffir lime leaves, fold them in half and, using a sharp knife, trim away the hard central rib. Cut the leaves into threadlike shreds. Ladle the soup into bowls, add the remaining coconut cream, forming a swirl on top of each bowl, and garnish with the lime leaf or zest.
ingredients: sunflower oil, onion, ginger, red chile, coriander, pumpkin, vegetable stock, coconut milk, garlic
name: easy thai pumpkin soup

steps: Place popcorn in a large bowl and mix well. Add cinnamon and mix well. Cover and chill at least 3 hours.
ingredients: popped popcorn, butter, sugar, cinnamon
name: delicious cinnamon popcorn

steps: Combine olive oil, garlic, tomato and celery in 1 quart casserole. Cover and microwave on high 2 minutes. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired.
ingredients: linguine, frozen peas, garlic, italian seasoning, pepper, olive oil, prosciutto, parmesan cheese
name: prosciutto pasta toss

steps: Heat oil in a large, heavy pan until it is very hot. Add the popcorn and cover with lid. Reduce the heat. Shake the pan occasionally so all the corn will cook and it will not brown. When the popping sound stops, remove pan from the heat and let cool slightly. Discard any kernels that have not popped. Add the chili powder. Shake the pan again and again to make sure that all of the corn is covered with chili powder. Transfer to a bowl.
ingredients: popcorn, canola oil, unsalted butter, white truffle oil, salt
name: white truffle popcorn

steps: Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all.
ingredients: russet potatoes, mayonnaise, dill pickle, scallions, fresh parsley, salt, pepper
name: delicious potato salad with dill pickle

steps: In large heavy saucepan, cook bacon until crisp. Add onion and celety cooking until soft, but not brown. Stir in flour and them slowly adding in chicken stock. Add potatoes and simmer 10 minutes or until tender. Add milk and cream corn. Simmer about 10 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Do not boil.
ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, onions, ham, celery, whole kernel corn, butter, salt, ground black pepper, chicken bouillon cubes, evaporated milk
name: slow cooker corn chowder

steps: Heat 2 teaspoons of oil over high heat and add 4 rashers of bacon and cook for 2-3 minutes or until crip and then set aside. Heat another 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan and add chopped brown onion and garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add potatoes, 2 sprigs thyme, chicken stock and water and bring to the boil and then reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes. Blend until smooth and stir through cream. Divide into serving bowls and top with crispy bacon to serve.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, rindless bacon, onions, extra virgin olive oil, bay leaves, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt & pepper
name: sweet potato bacon and onion soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips
name: the best chocolate chip cookies ever

steps: Cream butter & sugar. Mix in egg. Mix in flour, cream of tartar, baking soda till well combined. Drop tablespoon size balls in sugar, roll to coat. Place 12 cookies on a parchment lined cookie sheet, do not flatten. Bake at 350 for 10 - 15 minutes. Slide parchment with cookies onto wire rack to cool. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: white sugar, brown sugar, egg, butter, flour, quick-cooking rolled oats, coconut, baking powder, baking soda
name: mona s mother s mother s best friends favorite cookies

steps: Combine shrimp, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas, peas
ingredients: medium shrimp, frozen peas, red onion, ranch dressing, lettuce
name: easy shrimp and pea salad

steps: In an oblong dish, layer first lettuce then cauliflower. Spread mayonnaise over cauliflower, then make a layer of chopped onion. Spread bacon over the onion, then make a layer of parmesan cheese. Last, spread the sugar over the cheese. Refrigerate overnight, then toss before serving.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, cauliflower florets, red onion, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, bacon bits
name: cauliflower low cal layer salad

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whippreparation:In a nonmetallic bowl, combine the strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin
ingredients: fresh strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange, mini marshmallows, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whip
name: kelly s salad

steps: Mix together all ingredients. Store in airtight container. When ready to make dressing, combine 1 cup of mayonnaise, 1 cup buttermilk, and 1 tablespoon dry dressing mix. Whisk well
ingredients: tarragon, chervil, chives, parsley, thyme
name: fines herbes seasoning mix recipe make your own

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. To a mixing bowl, add red potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper. Toss to coat potatoes. Place on a baking sheet. Cook potatoes until largest potatoes are soft, about 25-30 minutes. While potatoes are cooking use a mixer to whip the butter, shredded parmesan, chopped garlic, chopped basil and salt and pepper. Add the roasted potatoes to bowl and smash potatoes to a coarse mash.
ingredients: new potato, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, honey, red onion, of fresh mint, feta, black pepper
name: crushed new potatoes with mint feta

steps: Put the pasta on to boil. While pasta is cooking, mix cottage cheese, cheddar cheese soup, and sour cream together, with a stick blender until creamy. Defrost the chicken and cut up into bite size pieces. Dice the spinach into small bits. Add half a cup of the cheddar cheese and the garlic. By this time the pasta should be done. Drain and add to the mix. Toss it all together, put in a 9x13-inch pan and bake at 350f for about 30 minutes. Some option include adding corn and peas.
ingredients: penne pasta, fresh spinach, bacon, garlic, butter, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese
name: spinach and garlic penne pasta with bacon

steps: Mix together the olive oil, brown onion, cheese, chives, white bread, butter, cheese, eggs, milk, flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Bake for 5 minutes or until the bread is golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, brown onion, cheese, chives, white bread
name: cheesy chive and onion toasties jaffles

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the flour, and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the flour is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomato paste, sugar, thyme, bay leaf, no-salt-added diced tomatoes, nonfat milk, greek yogurt
name: wh winter tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f on ungreased cookie sheets, place cookie dough pieces 2 inches apart. Into side of each piece of dough, insert wooden stick 1 inch, overlapping wooden sticks as necessary. Bake 12 to 16 minutes or until edges are light golden brown. Cool 2 minutes. Remove from cookie sheets. Cool completely, about 10 minutes. Spread frosting on one side of each cookie. Decorate with candies. Tie 18 inches of red ribbon into bow around each stick next to cookie.
ingredients: corn flakes, marshmallows, butter, vanilla, green food coloring, red cinnamon candies
name: holly wreaths

steps: Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives.
ingredients: olive oil, mushrooms, diced tomatoes, black beans, dry basil, salt and pepper, ziti pasta, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, scallions
name: anne marie s pasta with beans

steps: In a large bowl combine flour and salt. Make a well. Mix together the wet ingredients and pour into well. Mix well. Turn out onto a floured board and knead until firm, shiny and elastic. At this point cover and chill for 1 hour, up to 24 hours. When ready to use follow instructions for manual pasta machine or cut into manageable pieces and roll out to desired thickness, cut into desired shape.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, water, eggs, egg yolk, olive oil, salt
name: pasta dough 1

steps: Preheat oven to 325f begin cooking marzetti noodles according to package directions. Have marzetti sauce ready. Remove marzetti from heat, drain in collander, and return directly to pot. Add marzetti sauce to marzetti sauce mixture. Spread marzetti sauce over top, then spread remaining marzetti sauce over top. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground chuck, yellow onion, green bell pepper, pasta sauce, hot sauce, mild cheddar cheese, egg noodles
name: marzetti noodle bake casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease bottom only of 13x9x2 pan with shortening. Do not flour. Beat cake mix, sour cream, oil, almond extract and egg whites in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in chopped cherries and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until cake springs back when touched lightly in center. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Spread frosting over top of cake. Store loosely covered at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, chocolate, eggs, sugar, grand marnier, ground almonds, cornstarch, blackberries, icing sugar
name: blackberry chocolate cake

steps: Place the drumsticks in a large mixing bowl and mix well. Add the ground cumin, paprika, chili powder, dark brown sugar, cracked black pepper, dried oregano, chicken drumsticks, canola oil, bananas. Mix well to coat evenly. Bake at 350 for an hour.
ingredients: ground cumin, paprika, chili powder, dark brown sugar, cracked black pepper, dried oregano, chicken drumsticks, canola oil, bananas
name: african spice rubbed drumsticks with banana boats

steps: Preheat the oven to 400. Place fish fillets in a greased 9x13 dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine lime juice, sour cream and parsley, stir well. Pour over fish. Sprinkle with lime rind. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till flakes easy with fork. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes till fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, pepper, dried onion flakes, garlic clove, olive oil, ground cumin, fresh cilantro, limes, margarine
name: cilantro lime fish

steps: In small saucepan, combine the coffee, milk, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into cups or mugs. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes at 175c.
ingredients: brewed coffee, milk, instant malted milk powder, coffee ice cream, sugar
name: coffee malted

steps: Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread evenly into an wax paper lined 8x8 pan. Chill and pop out of pan. Peel off wax paper and cut into 1-inch squares.
ingredients: butter, sweetened condensed milk, kahlua, instant coffee granules, semisweet chocolate morsels, pecans, vanilla extract
name: the best kahlua and coffee fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: summer squash, garlic powder, salt, pepper, mexican blend cheese, butter, olive oil
name: cheesy summer squash spears

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a small bowl, soak the apricots in brandy for 5 minutes. Blend flour, brown sugar, salt and butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add oats and almonds and toss. In a 9 inch glass pie dish, toss together apples, apricots and brandy. Sprinkle oat mixture evenly over top and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until apples are tender and topping is browned.
ingredients: tart apples, lemon, juice of, flour, rolled oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, butter
name: my mom s apple crisp

steps: In saute pan, saute garlic with oil until brown. Add broccoli and tomatoes and stir. Cool for 1 minute, then add wine and broth. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and cook 20 - 25 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cheese.
ingredients: italian sausage, crushed red pepper flakes, white onion, bacon, minced garlic cloves, water, chicken bouillon cubes, heavy cream, potatoes, fresh kale
name: zuppa toscana

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until water boils. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Then, microwave at high 7-10
ingredients: sodium-free chicken stock, dry sherry, onions, fresh thyme, dried rosemary, celery seed, pepper, rice, cooked chicken, fresh parsley
name: low sodium chicken rice soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: red bell pepper, green onions, butter, light cream cheese, light sour cream, salt, ground black pepper, whole kernel corn, bacon, potato chips
name: corn with bacon casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix the flour, baking soda, and salt together. In a large bowl cream the butter and sugar together with a mixer set at medium speed. Beat in the eggs and vanilla until just mixed together. Add the flour mixture, chocolate chips, and pecans. Mix in at low speed until just mixed together. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons 2 inch apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes depending on your oven. Bake until the cookie is golden. Wait 1 minute and transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: pecan halves, butter, bacon, sugar, salt
name: ellie s roasted bacon pecans

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine the egg, parmesan cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pork sausage,
ingredients: angel hair pasta, egg, parmesan cheese, pork sausage, onion, tomato sauce, sour cream, italian seasoning, part-skim mozzarella cheese
name: mama s angel hair pie spaghetti pie for two

steps: In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops.
ingredients: onion, lemon juice, dry mustard, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, pork chops
name: deviled pork chops

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add apricots, pine nuts and pine nuts. Add pine nuts and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl.
ingredients: olive oil, salt, dried apricots, pine nuts, garlic cloves, broccoli rabe
name: broccoli rabe with apricots and pine nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired.
ingredients: cream cheese, icing sugar, whipping cream, vanilla, graham cracker crumbs, white sugar, butter, cherry pie filling
name: unbaked cherry cheesecake

steps: Place green beans in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are tender. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Remove from heat. Add parsley and salt to taste and toss.
ingredients: water, green beans, caesar salad dressing, dried cranberries
name: caesar green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place quinoa, chicken broth, frozen baby lima beans, heavy cream, hot chili sauce, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, parmesan cheese, orange juice, parmesan cheese, orange juice, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: quinoa, chicken broth, frozen baby lima beans, heavy cream, hot chili sauce, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh lemon juice, parmesan cheese, orange juice
name: peruvian quinoa

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook chicken until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add chicken and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: rice pilaf mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic, olive oil, marsala wine, honey, worcestershire sauce, apple, thyme
name: chicken with apple rice pilaf

steps: Combine garlic, salt, fresh mint leaves, onion, pine nuts, cumin, pepper, lite olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon
ingredients: garlic, salt, fresh mint leaves, onion, pine nuts, cumin, pepper, lite olive oil, fresh lemon juice
name: mint chutney

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl whisk together flour, cornmeal, brown sugar blend, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice, pumpkin puree, fat free greek yogurt, egg whitepreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In another bowl whisk together egg whites, yogurt and pumpkin puree. Add to dry ingredients and whisk until all are blended. Pour into greased pan and bake for about 35-45 minutes or until tooth pick comes out clean. Let rest 10 minutes in pan before cutting and serving.
ingredients: flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking soda, salt, plain nonfat yogurt, eggs, whole kernel corn, jalapeno pepper
name: low fat cornbread

steps: Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cuke. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle.
ingredients: garlic clove, salt, sour cream, white vinegar, black pepper, cucumbers, paprika
name: jolean s cukes in sour cream

steps: In a large bowl, combine granulated sugar, lemon, water, strawberries, low-fat yogurt and mix well. Stir in yogurt, marshmallows and nuts. Spread half of mixture in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Layer half of the strawberries and half of the blueberries on top. Layer with remaining yogurt mixture and end with rest of berries on top. Cover and freeze for at least 2 hours. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: granulated sugar, lemon, water, strawberries, low-fat yogurt
name: yummy strawberry yogurt ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Pound out the chicken breasts to flatten. Season each with a little southwest seasoning. Cook the chicken in a skillet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray over medium-low heat until no longer pink. Place each breast onto a baking sheet and top each breast with 2 tablespoon of barbeque sauce, 2 tablespoon cheese, 2 tablespoon rotel tomatoes, green onions and 1 tablespoon of bacon bits. Place into the oven and bake until the cheese has melted. Place into the
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, barbecue sauce, crisp bacon, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend
name: chili s monterey chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Saut chicken portions in 1 tablespoon of olive oil until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and put in a casserole dish. Heat remaining oil. Add onion and garlic, and cook for 3 minutes. Add tinned tomatoes and herbs and simmer for 5 minutes. Spoon sauce over the chicken and bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken tenderloins, garlic, season-all salt, plain flour, apricot nectar
name: simply chicken in apricot sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: instant coffee powder, milk, flour, baking powder, egg, oil, sugar, walnuts, maple syrup
name: coffee maple walnut muffins new zealand

steps: In a large serving bowl put the romaine lettuce, avocado, green onions, cherry tomatoes, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing, italian dressing
ingredients: romaine lettuce, avocado, green onions, cherry tomatoes, italian salad kit
name: vegetarian salad

steps: Spread mixture evenly over cut sides of muffin halves. Sprinkle evenly with cheese. Broil 5 inches from heat 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lump crabmeat, hardboiled egg, onion, green pepper, mayonnaise, breadcrumbs, butter, parsley flakes, tabasco sauce
name: baked deviled crab

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the garlic. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: baking potatoes, garlic, milk, butter, fresh rosemary, fresh chives, fresh parsley, sour cream, salt, white pepper
name: country herb mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, golden syrup, plain flour, bicarbonate of soda, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cloves
name: go nuts about my gingernuts

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, wal
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, walnuts
name: condensed milk fudge

steps: Heat skillet fryer with hot oil. Mix flour, cornmeal, beer, salt pepper and seasonings until a batter consistency. Coat filets with batter. Deep fry til golden brown. Approx 3 minutes per side.
ingredients: trout, cornmeal, butter, salt & pepper
name: pan fried trout

steps: Place the lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, low-fat cheddar cheese, non-fat tortilla chips, light ranch salad dressing, salsa, lean ground beef. Mix well. Serve at once. You may top the salad with roasted chicken pieces that you have diced, but that is optional.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, low-fat cheddar cheese, non-fat tortilla chips, light ranch salad dressing, salsa, lean ground beef
name: bucket salad

steps: Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, black beans, taco seasoning, diced tomatoes, taco shells, cheese, corn
name: beef bean oven tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an 8 inch square baking pan. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, sugar, vanilla, whole wheat flour, unbleached white flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, walnuts, fresh blueberries, orange rind, salt, low-fat granolapreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an 8 inch square baking pan. In
ingredients: frozen blueberries, sugar, cornstarch, fresh blueberries, orange rind, salt, low-fat granola
name: blueberry breakfast crisp

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, pecans
name: gourmet girl s famous decadent rich and gooey saucepan brownies

steps: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over chickpea mixture, toss gently, and chill. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: olives, orange peel, lemon peel, red chili pepper flakes, fennel seed, extra virgin olive oil, almonds, chickpeas, smoked paprika, salt and pepper
name: trio of spanish nibbles olives almonds chickpeas

steps: Preheat oven to 400-425. Spray cooking dish with spray if using fat free dressing. Put all ingredients into large zip bag and toss. Put in dish and bake for 15 minute then toss and bake. 20-25 min cooking time. Keep your eye on them. The thinner the slice the faster it cooks. Check in and toss to keep from over drying and baking. If you use a fattier dressing then it is less checking time.
ingredients: red potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, dried parsley, dried basil, garlic powder, onion powder
name: stove top roasted red potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and sauté for 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until shrimp are done.
ingredients: king prawns, zucchini, taco seasoning mix, lemon juice, vegetable oil, fresh chives
name: mexican prawn shrimp kebabs

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: boiling water, salt, carrots, margarine, sugar substitute, lemon juice, parsley
name: sweet carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add apricot almond and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle almonds over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, vanilla, apricot preserves, egg whites, almond extract, powdered sugar, slivered almonds
name: apricot almond bars

steps: Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisk constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: cornmeal mix, milk, oil, egg, green chilies, whole kernel corn
name: caney fork cornbread cakes

steps: In a large bowl, mix the dried italian salad dressing mix, garlic & herb salad dressing mix, red wine vinegar, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, dill, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, lemon zest, lemon, juice of, ouzo, fennel seed, salt & pepper. Place all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag. Mix well. Add chicken breasts. For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes. For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer. Heat up grill to medium high. Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 minutes per side.
ingredients: dried italian salad dressing mix, garlic & herb salad dressing mix, red wine vinegar, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: gourmet marinade for chicken

steps: Boil peanuts until just tender, about 3 minutes. Add cilantro leaves and toss to combine.
ingredients: asian-style dressing, fresh cilantro, fresh ginger, baby spinach leaves, red peppers, chicken, honey-roasted peanuts, mango
name: asian chicken salad with roasted peanuts

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: sweet italian sausage link, onion, green peppers, italian tomato soup, water, noodles
name: sausage and peppers italiano

steps: Combine chicken tenders, salt and pepper, eggs, milk, dijon mustard, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, olive oil, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan
ingredients: chicken tenders, salt and pepper, eggs, milk, dijon mustard, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, olive oil
name: parmesan chicken tenders

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars.
ingredients: margarine, unsweetened chocolate squares, flour, sugar, walnuts, baking powder, salt, eggs, powdered sugar
name: chocolate pixies

steps: Cut roast in half and place in a 3 quart or larger crock pot. Add pickles with juice, chili sauce and garlic. Cover and cook on low 7 to 9 hours or until beef is tender. Discard pickles. Return meat to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount.
ingredients: beef roast, dill pickles, chili sauce, garlic cloves
name: crock pot dilly beef for sandwiches

steps: Boil water and sugar until water is dissolved. Simmer for five more minutes without stirring. Pour in a 9 by 9 inch pan. Freeze for two hours. Stir every hour from outside in, until it is slushy. Process in food processor. Return to freezer. Stir every hour from outside in, until
ingredients: water, sugar, fresh strawberries, light rum, lime zest, lime juice, orange liqueur
name: strawberry daiquiri sorbet

steps: In a small bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-7 hours. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade.
ingredients: vegetable oil, honey, soy sauce, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, onions, mushroom
name: honey chicken kabobs

steps: Heat olive oil in pan over medium heat and saute garlic 1 minute. Add beans and turn to coat with oil. Add lemon juice, salt& pepper and mix. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, garlic, slivered almonds, lemon juice, salt
name: green beans with garlic almonds

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper, medium shrimp, lemon juice, dry sherry, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, parsley
name: shrimp with garlic sauce

steps: Line a 13x9x2 baking pan with foil, lighty spray with pam cooking spray or butter. Melt margarine in a large pot on low heat. Add marshmallows and stir constantly until melted. Remove from heat. Add cereal quickly to the melted marshmallow mixture, stir until smooth. Press into the ready greased baking pan with a buttered spatula. Set aside and cool. Cut into bars or you can use a shamrock cookie cutter.
ingredients: red potatoes, cauliflower, brussels sprouts, apples, cheddar cheese, flour, stout beer, frozen apple juice concentrate, dijon mustard
name: st patrick s day fondue

steps: Cook the mirj s faux crab salad according to the package directions. Drain, rinse, and drain again. In a large bowl, combine the mirj s faux crab salad and the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover, and chill for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: imitation crabmeat, scallion, pasta, chunky salsa, chickpeas, salt and pepper
name: mirj s faux crab salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow baking pan, toss the slivered almonds with the olive oil. Spread almonds so that they are in a single layer. In small bowl, combine parmesan cheese with garlic salt and sprinkle over the almonds. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Stir once while baking.
ingredients: garlic cloves, hearts of palm, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, scallion, salt, mixed greens
name: ensalada de palmitos hearts of palm salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Melt butter in microwave safe bowl. Stir together milk, sugar, bisquick, vanilla and butter. Pour batter in 9 x 9 inch glass dish. Pour cherry pie filling in and press down gently with spoon so that most of the filling is covered with your batter. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Important - as soon as the cobbler is done cooking place on towel inside refrigerator and cool for at least 4 hours. This step is very important for your crust to turn out buttery.
ingredients: fruit, cornstarch, cold water, bisquick, milk, butter, sugar
name: bisquick fruit cobbler

steps: Heat grill to medium-high, cook shrimp for 2 to 3 minutes a side, basting with reserved sauce. Cook the shrimp until opaque. Be careful not to overcook.
ingredients: shrimp, ketchup, fresh lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce
name: ww 3 points shrimp with key lime cocktail sauce

steps: In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: chicken breasts, onion, celery, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, paprika, salt and pepper
name: chunky chicken salad

steps: In a saucepan, bring first three ingredients to a second boil. Remove from heat, stir well, cover& refrigerate until chilled. Cream together next six ingredients. Blend in the cold date mixture. Pour into a greased 13x9 cake pan. Top with chocolate chips& nuts, then sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: unblanched whole almonds, dark cooking chocolate, egg whites, salt, caster sugar, pitted dates
name: chocolate and almond torte

steps: Heat contact grill for 5 minutes. Wash chops and pat dry. In a small container, thoroughly mix the seasonings together. Drizzle half the oil over the chops, sprinkle with half the seasoning mix. Turn chops over and repeat with oil and remaining seasoning mix. Place on heated grill and cook until meat thermometer inserted in center reads 160 degrees. Serve immediately.
ingredients: boneless pork roast, garlic, virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, rosemary, sage
name: herbed roast pork

steps: In a half pint jar, add oats, skim milk, pomegranate seeds, blueberries, sugar, sliced almonds. Put lid on jar and shake until well combined. Remove lid, add raspberries and stir until mixed throughout. Return lid to jar and refrigerate overnight or as long as 2-3 days. Eat chilled.
ingredients: quick oats, skim milk, pomegranate seeds, blueberries, sugar, sliced almonds
name: pomegranate and blueberry oatmeal

steps: Place sweet potato chunks on the stove in a steamer basket. Steam until tender but not overcooked, about 5 minutes. Set aside. Place broccoli and beans in steamer basket and steam until broccoli is tender but not overcooked, about 4 minutes. Combine remaining ingredients and stir until blended. Add to bowl and toss until vegetables are evenly coated. Serve immediately if serving warm. Or chill and serve cold.
ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, water, fresh lime juice, coconut rum, dijon mustard, salt, sweet potatoes, apple, celery, dried currant
name: temptin sweet potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease cookie sheet, or spray with cooking spray. Unroll dough, place on cookie sheet. Starting at center, press out dough into 13x9-inch rectangle. Bake 7 minutes. Top with pepperoni and cheese. Bake 8-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Cool 2 minutes. Cut pizza in half lengthwise, then cut into 16 strips. Serve with pizza sauce for dipping.
ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce, italian seasoning
name: pillsbury pizza triangles

steps: Put 1/4 cup of hot chocolate in a large bowl. Add 1/4 cup of hot chocolate to the hot chocolate mixture. Add
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, egg yolks, sugar, salt, heavy cream, whole milk, vanilla extract
name: no bake chocolate pts de crme

steps: Combine whole wheat flour, oats, brown sugar, baking soda, butter, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mincemeat, mince
ingredients: whole wheat flour, oats, brown sugar, baking soda, butter, mincemeat
name: christmas mincemeat squares

steps: Cut steak into 4 servings-size pieces. Sprinkle with herb pepper or garlic pepper. In a 10-inch skillet cook steaks in hot butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or to desired doneness, turning once. Remove steak from pan. Cover and keep warm. For mushroom glaze, carefully add beef broth and hoisin, teriyaki, or worcestershire sauce to skillet. Cook until bubbly, scraping brown bits from bottom skillet. Stir in onoin wedges and sliced mushrooms. Cook over medium-high about 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender and the glaze is reduced to half its volume. Transfer warm steak to dinner plates and spoon glaze on steaks.
ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, garlic pepper seasoning, margarine, beef broth, hoisin sauce, onion, fresh mushrooms
name: one pan steak and mushrooms

steps: In an extra large skillet, place the oil and heat it on medium until it is hot. Add the mushrooms, shallots, garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Saute the ingredients for 2 to 3 minutes or until the mushrooms are slightly cooked. Add the wine and stir it. Cook the ingredients for 1 minute. Add the basil and stir. Add the pasta, salt and pepper. Mix the ingredients together thoroughly so that the pasta is well coated. Add more oil if the pasta seems dry. Place the pasta on a serving plate. Sprinkle the goat cheese on top.
ingredients: spinach fettuccine, olive oil, shallots, crabmeat, butter, fresh tomatoes, heavy cream, chablis, dried parsley, parmesan cheese
name: al lewis spinach fettuccine with crab sauce

steps: Saute onion and garlic in olive oil until tender. In large dutch oven place all ingedients mixing well. Bring to boil. Reduce to low and simmer for 2-hours. Stirring occasionally.
ingredients: onion, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil, lean pork sausage, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, oregano
name: anna s spaghetti sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Line 9 inch pie pan with pastry. In large bowl combine all filling ingredients except butter and toss lightly. Spoon filling into crust lined pan. Cut butter into small pieces and dot top of filling. Top with second crust, seal edges, and flute. Cut 4 slits in top of crust. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to
ingredients: pie crust, fresh rhubarb, sugar, half-and-half, egg yolks, salt, flour, egg whites
name: big grandma s rhubarb cream pie

steps: Cook the macaroni according to directions. Stir cottage cheese with milk until smooth. In a seperate bowl, beat the egg, then beat the oil into it. Add salt and garlic to the cheese mixture. Now mix this with the cooked and drained macaroni, pour it in a baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs, and bake at 350 till set, about 25 minutes.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, vegetable oil, serrano ham, leek, cream, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper, gruyere cheese, breadcrumbs, chives
name: macaroni with gruyere cheese serrano ham and leeks recipe

steps: In a large pot pour in the beer, vinegar, salt, and lemon and bring to a rapid boil. Place a steamer rack in the bottom of the pot and cover with a layer of shrimp. Sprinkle the old bay seasoning over the layer and repeat until all of the shrimp have turned a bright red. Cover tightly and let steam for 10 minutes until all of the shrimp have turned a bright red. Remove the shrimp and allow to cool slightly.
ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, lemon juice, hot sauce, beer, old bay seasoning, extra-large shrimp
name: beer steamed shrimp with garlic butter

steps: Place ingredients in muffin cups in order as listed. Run on dough cycle. Shape rolls and place on lightly greased baking pan. Cover with cloth and let rise in warm place for 1 hour. Bake at 375 for 10 - 15 minute.
ingredients: water, egg, all-purpose flour, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, salt, olive oil, active dry yeast
name: country rolls

steps: Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: braeburn apples, granny smith apples, brown sugar, lemon rind, fresh lemon juice, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract, salt, creme fraiche
name: rustic applesauce

steps: Heat oil in pan over medium heat. Add onion and saute 2-3 minutes. Add bay leaf and saute 2-3 minutes. Add sausage and saute 2-3 minutes. Add bay leaf and
ingredients: vegetable oil, smoked sausage, onions, caraway seeds, bay leaf, sauerkraut, dry white wine
name: quick choucroute garnie

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: egg yolks, egg white, caster sugar, plain flour, cornflour, milk, vanilla essence
name: confectioner s custard

steps: In a medium bowl, whisk together the lime juice, olive oil, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & pepper. Season with salt and pepper generously, and add chicken, making sure it is well-coated with the marinade. Marinate chicken, covered in fridge for at least 3 hours and preferably overnight. Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper and roast for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear when you prick it with a fork.
ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, garlic, good seasonings italian salad dressing mix, balsamic vinegar
name: easy italian garlic chicken

steps: Heat 2 t olive oil in a skillet that you can eventually place under the broiler. Add onion to skillet and cook until soft, about 4 minutes. Add 1 t olive oil and heat. Add eggs seasoned with salt, pepper, parsley and cheese. Cook until bottom of frittata begins to solidify. Gently place the rounds of tomato on the egg mixture. Cover and cook over low heat until bottom of frittata firms, about 5 minutes. Finish by placing under preheated broiler for a minute or two until lightly browned. Cut into triangles.
ingredients: eggs, herbs, whole milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, unsalted butter, onion, extra-dry vermouth, tomatoes
name: garden herb and onion frittata

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Mix parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, green onion, and hot sauce in a small bowl. Spread parmesan mixture evenly over fillets and sprinkle with paprika. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork and topping is puffed and light golden.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, parmesan cheese, yellow cornmeal, flour, paprika, black pepper, salt, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: southwest style tilapia

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Place potatoes, onions, eggs, flour, salt, baking powder, pepper, butter in a large mixing bowl and whisk until smooth. Add the flour mixture and whisk until smooth. Add the onion mixture and whisk until smooth. Add the potato mixture and whisk until smooth. Add the potato mixture and
ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, flour, salt, baking powder, pepper, butter
name: individual potato pudding once a month cooking

steps: Put chicken in roaster. Combine ingredients and pour over. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Baste and cook 30 minutes longer uncovered.
ingredients: tomato soup, vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, ground ginger, garlic powder, chicken parts
name: oriental baked chicken

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the chickpea flour, garlic, ginger paste, cumin, coriander powder, ajwain, chili powder, salt, water and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the chicken pieces and cook for another 5 minutes.
ingredients: chickpea flour, garlic, ginger paste, cumin, coriander powder, ajwain, chili powder, salt, water
name: pakoras spicy batter dipped fried veggies

steps: Heat large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, tomato sauce, pickled jalapeno peppers, salt, cooked chicken, corn tortillas, guacamole, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream, sour cream
ingredients: onion, oil, tomato sauce, pickled jalapeno peppers, salt, cooked chicken, corn tortillas, guacamole, sour cream
name: mexican flag tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut jalapenos in half lengthwise and scrape out seeds. In a bowl, combine cheeses and onion and mix well. Wrap bacon slices around each half, cover as much of the surface as possible. Brush bacon surface with bbq sauce. Secure with toothpicks and pop into oven for 1 hr.
ingredients: cream cheese, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomato, fresh basil leaves, kosher salt, jalapeno peppers, bacon
name: smokin jalapeno poppers

steps: In a medium saucepan combine squash, onions, carrots, broth, and salt. Simmer, uncovered, until squash is very tender, about 40 minutes. Puree soup in a blender or food processor with the butter. Whisk cream into soup. Serve in wide, shallow bowls with a dollop of sour cream if desired.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, apple, cauliflower, butternut squash, vegetable stock, garam masala, dried chili pepper flakes, salt and pepper, low-fat sour cream
name: butternut squash cauliflower soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, cream cheese, flour, lemon, zest of, vanilla, eggs, whipping cream
name: bundt pan cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking,
ingredients: cod fish fillets, parsley, onion, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs
name: cod baked in mayonnaise

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f or grill to medium-high. Sprinkle both sides of steak with garlic powder and pepper. Cut in thin strips. Combine steak strips and pepper strips with teriyaki sauce. Center one-fourth of the steak mixture on each sheet of foil. Bring up foil sides. Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside. Repeat to make four packets. Bake 12 to 15 minutes on a cookie sheet in oven or grill 7 to 9 minutes in covered grill. Serve immediately over rice. Makes 4 servings.
ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, garlic powder, black pepper, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, light teriyaki sauce, cooked rice
name: pepper steak in a packet

steps: Heat the oil in a large heavy pot. Add the onions, mince the garlic and saute for some minutes until lightly browned. Add the potatoes and carrots and saute for another 10 minutes. Add the broth, cover and let simmer for about 35-40 minutes or until all veggies are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Puree soup using a hand held blender until it has the desired consistency-i like it to be still chunky. Serve with some warm bread of your choice.
ingredients: carrot, water, orange marmalade, curry powder, salt
name: orange curry carrots

steps: Put chinese cabbage in roaster. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Bake 30 minutes longer uncovered.
ingredients: pot stickers, vegetable oil, chinese cabbage, shiitake mushrooms, green onions, soy sauce, water, sugar, ground red pepper, mustard
name: pot stickers with chinese cabbage

steps: Mash the cucumbers, using a wooden spoon or fork. Melt the butter slowly in a heavy based pan, then add the sugar, eggs, lemon rind and juice. Cook for 10 minutes. Beat the eggs with a wooden spoon, then gradually beat in 3 tablespoons of the lemon mixture,. Pour onto the remaining lemon mixture, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. But do not boil. Pour into hot sterilized jars and seal.
ingredients: eggs, caster sugar, lemon, rind of, lemon juice, butter
name: homemade lemon curd

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease a baking sheet. In a bowl, mix the sugar mixture, cheese and apples together. In another larger bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, butter, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk, buttermilk,
ingredients: sugar, butter, velveeta cheese, self rising flour, canned sliced apples
name: gina s apple joy

steps: Cut or trim beef if needed. Place all ingredients in crock pot. Stir to combine. Cover. Turn on high for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: flank steak, cornstarch, olive oil, minced ginger, garlic, soy sauce, water, brown sugar, green onions
name: emily s mongolian beef in the crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Pour the olive oil into an ovenproof pan. Stir the garlic, cumin, and cayenne pepper into the olive oil and mix well. Add the garbanzo beans and toss to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until garbanzo beans turn golden, about 30 minutes, shaking every 10 minutes. Remove from oven, and sprinkle with feta cheese and thyme. Bake in preheated
ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, cayenne pepper, paprika, frozen peas, garlic, chili flakes, cumin
name: chicken breasts with spicy mashed peas

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place cleaned asparagus spears in pan sprinkle with oil. Randomly place lemon curd on asparagus. Sprinkle garlic and ginger over the spear and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, tossing half way through. Give or take depends on the thickness of the spears. Be sure to serve with all the goodness from the pan.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, mushrooms, shallots, salt, fresh ground black pepper, cilantro
name: asparagus and mushroom saute with cilantro

steps: Heat oil in 8 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt.
ingredients: collard greens, butter, salt, black pepper, lemon juice
name: creole collard greens

steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange the pears cut side up in an 8-inch square glass baking dish. Whisk the apple juice and sugar in a small heavy saucepan over medium-high heat until the sugar dissolves. Whisk in the butter. Pour the sauce over the pears. Bake until the pears are crisp-tender and beginning to brown, basting occasionally with the juices, about 35 minutes. Spoon the pears onto plates. Top with ice cream. Drizzle with any juices and serve. The pears can also be served frozen. To do so, cool the pears, then place them in the freezer until frozen solid, about 8 hours.
ingredients: pears, water, maple syrup, dark brown sugar, maple flavoring, butter, pecans
name: baked pears with maple nut sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the parsnip, carrot, onion, celery, pear, sodium-free vegetable broth, evaporated skim milk, curry powder, fresh ground white pepper, nutmeg. Add curry powder, salt and pepper to the soup and puree it. Fold in steamed coconut milk and serve immediately.
ingredients: parsnip, carrot, onion, celery, pear, sodium-free vegetable broth, evaporated skim milk, curry powder, fresh ground white pepper, nutmeg
name: curried parsnip and pear soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, crackers, plum tomatoes, lettuce, parmesan cheese in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce.
ingredients: turkey, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, crackers, plum tomatoes, lettuce, parmesan cheese
name: turkey club appetizers

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute squash until browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes. Sa
ingredients: yellow squash, light brown sugar, eggs, butter, saltines, onion, half-and-half, vanilla extract, salt
name: battletown yellow squash

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, butter, honey
name: grandma s honey muffins

steps: In a food processor or blender, mix all the herbs, garlic and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil and pulse until finely chopped. Add the olives and parsley and pulse again until just combined. With the processor running, add the mayonnaise, lemon juice and salt and pulse until just combined. With the processor running,
ingredients: jumbo black olives, garlic, olive oil, italian seasoning, red chili pepper
name: garlic stuffed olives

steps: Dissolve yeast in water, in a large bowl. Add half the flour, and the sugar, salt, and shortening. Blend at low speed, then beat 2 minutes at med speed. Mix in remaining flour by hand. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 20 minutes. Bake at 325 for about 45 minutes, until golden brown and done.
ingredients: active dry yeast, milk, shortening, sugar, salt, eggs, all-purpose flour, butter
name: english batter buns

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake well until sugar is dissolved. Add oil. Cover and shake well. Let stand at least half an hour before using. Shake well just before pouring onto salad greens. Refrigerate unused portion.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, prepared mustard, salt, vinegar, water, butter, miracle whip
name: aunt isse s salad dressing

steps: Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened.
ingredients: egg, dry breadcrumbs, onions, salt, pepper, lean ground beef
name: basic meatlballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large cast-iron skillet, heat 3 tb olive oil over medium heat. Put rabbit in the skillet and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, until nicely browned. In a small bowl, toss the garlic with 1 tb olive oil to coat completely. Transfer rabbit to a baking dish and sprinkle with garlic, olives, and thyme. Bake, uncovered, for about an hour, or until the garlic cloves are golden brown and the rabbit is browned on the outside and opaque throughout. Drizzle the remaining 1 tb olive oil in an abstract pattern on a serving platter and arrange rabbit on top. Scoop the garlic cloves and olives from the baking dish and sprinkle over the rabbit. Serve immediately.
ingredients: rabbit, kosher salt, white pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, coriander seed, black peppercorns, new mexico chile powder
name: whole roasted rabbit with garlic rosemary and coriander

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: hamburger, condensed cream of broccoli soup, del monte zesty jalapeno pepper diced tomato, macaroni, mild cheddar cheese
name: beefy macaroni casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, apricot jam, light soy sauce, water
