name: apricot glazed chicken

steps: Mix all these ingredients together with a whisk and dump them into a ziploc to save. Should be good in the pantry for 6 months. When making the brownies, preheat oven to 350f. Add eggs, oil and vanilla and mix with a fork til just blended. Do not overmix. Pour into a silicone or buttered 9x9 pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, powdered sugar
name: bangor big fat fudge brownies

steps: Mix all ingredients except bread and butter in a medium bowl. Place bread on the griddle or skillet. Dip each side of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on the
ingredients: smoked haddock, milk, all-purpose flour, cheese, egg, salt, pepper, wheat toast
name: arbroath toasties

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, unsweetened orange juice, water, lemon juice, sugar, cinnamon. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: cranberries, unsweetened orange juice, water, lemon juice, sugar, cinnamon
name: kittencal s cranberry sauce

steps: Place rhubarb in a bowl and cover with boiling water for about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, with a mixer, mix sugar, egg, butter and flour until smooth. Strain rhubarb well. With wooden spoon, add strawberries and rhubarb to batter and mix. Pour into uncooked pie shell. Mix topping ingredients with a fork, and sprinkle over uncooked pie. Bake at 375 for 50 minutes or until set. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: eggs, sour cream, butter, orange zest, salt, rhubarb, baking apples, sugar, all-purpose flour
name: apple rhubarb pie

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well with electric beater until sugar is dissolved. Add cabbage, carrot and onion mixture and toss well. Cover and chill at least 2 hours, preferably over night, before serving. To make things even easier i usually just buy the pre packaged cole slaw bags in the produce dept. They have the carrots and cabbage already chopped. I just chop them up smaller and use that instead of cutting up my own fresh ingredients.
ingredients: tarragon vinegar, vegetable oil, onion, miracle whip, sugar, carrots, cabbage
name: copycat kfc coleslaw the real thing

steps: Cover bacon with paper towel and microwave 2-3 minutes to crisp. Cool. Rinse bacon and cauliflower. Drain well. Break or chop florets into bite sized pieces. Place florets in bowl. Add celery and onion to the other vegetables. In bowl mix sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, and salt. Pour dressing over vegetables. Crumble bacon over the top. Toss to mix well. Serve at once, or refrigerate up to 24 hours before serving.
ingredients: reduced-fat mayonnaise, sugar, turkey bacon, iceberg lettuce, romaine lettuce, low-fat swiss cheese, red onion
name: swiss and bacon salad

steps: Combine flour, salt and pepper and dredge pork chops in the mixture. Melt butter in large skillet and brown pork chops on each side. Remove chops from skillet. Saute onions, garlic and mushrooms in same skillet. Add leftover flour that was used to coat chops, then add milk, wine and thyme. Simmer until mixture starts to thicken. Return chops to pan and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes or until chops are done.
ingredients: pork chops, salt, pepper, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, onions, beer, beef broth, cornstarch, water
name: pork chops in onion gravy

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the pinto beans in oil over medium-high heat until the pinto beans are tender, about 5 minutes. Add the pinto beans, salt, pepper, garlic powder, water, onion powder, cayenne pepper, pinto beans, water. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: pinto beans, salt, garlic cloves, onion
name: easy quick and tasty basic beans crockpot

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add shrimp. Season with grill seasoning or salt & pepper. Cook shrimp 3 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: shrimp, jalapeno, garlic, olive oil, chambord raspberry liquor, baguette
name: sweet spicy shrimp chambord shrimp

steps: Cook eggs in simmering water for 15 minutes and cool. Cut hard boiled eggs in half lengthwise. Transfer yolks to small bowl and mash with fork. Mix in sour cream, mayonnaise, and mustard. Stir in lemon zest, lemon juice, and cayenne pepper. Add salt to your taste. Spoon yolk mixture into whites. Sprinkle generously with chopped parsley. Cover loosely and refrigerate.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, sugar, cider vinegar, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, paprika, parsley
name: sweet sour deviled eggs

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn kernels, milk, eggs, salt, butter, onion, serrano chilies, cotija cheese, paprika, and cook for about 5 minutes. Add corn mixture and cook for another 5 minutes. Add
ingredients: corn kernels, milk, eggs, salt, butter, onion, serrano chilies, cotija cheese
name: humitas seasoned corn puree

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, cherry juice, orange extract, all-purpose flour, maraschino cherry, flaked coconut
name: festive chewy cherry cookies

steps: Place fried rice in a wok or frying pan. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and ham. Let sit 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally. The less you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. The more you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and
ingredients: cooked white rice, sesame oil, celery, carrots, onion, garlic, frozen peas, ham, eggs, soya sauce
name: take out fried rice

steps: Heat oven to 350. In large oven proof non-stick skillet sprayed heavily with cooking spray add onion and cook till translucent. In paper bag add flour, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Add meat pieces and shake. Add meat to pan with onions. Brown 3 to 4 mins on each side or till just starting to brown. Add all of the remaining ingredients to pan. Be sure to sprinkle the seasonings evenly over meat and vegetables. Do not stir. Cover and place in oven and cook for 1 hour or till very tender.
ingredients: swiss steak, flour, celery, carrot, onion, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, thyme, cooking oil
name: oven swiss steak

steps: Combine sugar, honey, coconut extract, low-fat plain yogurt, crushed pineapple with yogurt. Pour into pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Serve immediately.
ingredients: grapefruit, sugar, honey, coconut extract, low-fat plain yogurt, crushed pineapple with juice
name: grapefruit pina colada freeze

steps: Heat oven to 180c. Line 2 baking trays with a non-stick baking paper. Place cream cheese, butter and parmesan food processor and process until smooth and creamy and when finsihed transfer mix to a large bowl. Add the flour and poppy seeds, and using a metal spoon, stir until just combined. Roll dough into a 4cm-diameter log. Wrap log in baking paper and place on a tray and place in the freezer for 20 minutes or until firm. Use a small sharp knife to cut the biscuit log crossways into 1cm-thick slices. Place biscuits, about 3cm apart allowing room for spreading, on prepared trays. Bake in preheated oven, swapping trays halfway through cooking, for 20 minutes or until light golden and cooked through. Remove from oven and set aside on the trays for 30 minutes to cool completely.
ingredients: cooked chicken, ritz crackers, poppy seed, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, butter
name: poppy seed chicken

steps: In a saucepan, combine the pumpkin, stock or water, ginger, lemongrass, scallions, coconut cream, salt, white pepper, lime, kaffir lime leaves, toss well. Cover, bring to a boil, reduce the heat to medium-low, and simmer until the pumpkin is very tender, about 12 minutes. Add the scallions and cook briefly. Transfer the contents of the saucepan to a blender or food processor and process until the soup is partially pured. Pour in half of the coconut cream and process until smooth. Taste and adjust the seasoning and squeeze in lime or lemon juice. If using the kaffir lime leaves, fold them in half and, using a sharp knife, trim away the hard central rib. Cut the leaves into threadlike shreds. Ladle the soup into bowls, add the remaining coconut cream, forming a swirl on top of each bowl, and garnish with the lime leaf or zest.
ingredients: pumpkin puree, coconut milk, thai red curry paste, maple syrup, unsalted butter, coarse salt
name: mashed thai red curry pumpkin

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, sugar, dried basil, salt, pepper, soft breadcrumbs, butter, blue cheese
name: blue cheese broiled tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a little oil in frying pan and brown stew meat along with onions and carrots. Remove from pan. Layer sliced potatoes, onion, carrot and meat in a 3 pint casserole, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock. Brush the potatoes with 1 tbsp melted butter. Cover and bake for 1 hour. Remove the hot pot from the oven. Uncover and brush the potatoes again with melted butter or dripping. Return to the oven for a further 30 minutes, uncovered, to brown the potatoes. Serve garnished with parsley.
ingredients: condensed beef broth, short rib of beef, onions, carrots, parsnips, potatoes, fresh parsley
name: simmered dinner

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add beef and onion. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, refried beans, green chilies, black olives, enchilada sauce, chili with beans, corn tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: beefy bean enchiladas

steps: Melt the butter, add the egg yolks and sugar. Beat with a fork. Add the dry ingredients and milk to the egg mixture. Stifly beat the egg whites, fold into the mix and blend well. Pour into an oven dish about 35x20cm- the mixture should be about 3cm deep. Bake at 160c for 45-60mins. It is lovely with cinnamon sprinkled on top before cooking.
ingredients: milk, cornstarch, salt, sugar, butter, vanilla
name: microwave blancmange

steps: Place the broccoli florets, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, dried onion flakes, instant rice, milk, cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, dried onion flakes, instant rice, milk, cheese
name: yet another broccoli rice casserole husband approved

steps: Saute onion in a large skillet adding garlic and cilantro during the last minute or two. Add meat and seasonings and stir well. Allow to saute for a minute or two, letting the meat absorb some of the flavors. When it seems that it is really dry and the mixture is starting to stick add the tomatoes and liquid and scrape all the browned bits from the bottom. Tons of flavor there. Add sugar if using. Reduce heat to simmer and cook for 20 minutes or so. When you are ready to use the mixture return heat to high and cook off almost all the liquid so that your filling is not runny or wet. Use to fill tortillas or in a casserole.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, tomato sauce, salsa, taco seasoning mix, ground cumin, garlic cloves, chili powder, hot sauce
name: salsa chicken burrito filling

steps: Place butter in baking dish. Combine cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butterpreparation:Place cracker crumbs,
ingredients: butter flavored cracker, garlic salt, eggs, pork chops, butter
name: famous pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter and flour a 9-inch tart pan with high sides, line bottom with parchment paper. Finely grind almonds with 2 tablespoons of sugar in food processor. Mix yolks, 2 tablespoons sugar, lemon zest, cinnamon and a pinch of salt in a bowl until thick and smooth. Add almond mixture, stir. Separately beat egg whites until soft peaks form, then gradually add 4 tablespoons sugar, beating until egg whites are stiff but not dry. Fold half of egg whites gently into almond mixture, then add other half and finish folding in gently. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, about 30-35 minutes. Cool on rack, turn out onto serving platter.
ingredients: skim milk, flour, sugar, salt, yeast, butter, eggs, lemons, zest of, cinnamon, almonds
name: almond butter yeast cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake in a preheated oven for 20 minutes.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, onion, savory, butter, salt, pepper, moose heart
name: stuffed moose heart

steps: Heat oil in skillet. Crumble turkey and cook over medium-high heat until no longer pink. Stir in all remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: chili seasoning mix, ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce
name: pammie s 1 2 3 4 chili

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: pasta, butter, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper
name: light er alfredo sauce with pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon together. Combine with sliced apples and noodles. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream.
ingredients: noodles, apples, cinnamon, brown sugar, butter
name: apples and noodles

steps: Line an 8-in. Square pan wih foil and coatwith cooking spray. Set aside. In a heavy saucepan over low heat, melt margarine. Add marshmallows. Stir until melted and well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Add cereal, peanuts and raisins, then chocolate chips, stirring until thoroughly coated. Using lightly-buttered spatula, press into buttered 3. 5 l pan. Cool. Cut into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, granulated sugar, heavy cream, semisweet chips, marshmallow cream
name: frozen smores pops

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: baguette, olive oil, cream cheese, fresh dill, prepared horseradish, kosher salt, black pepper, smoked salmon
name: super simple smoked salmon crostini

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, or until onion is soft. Add garlic and cook for 5 minutes, or until onion is soft. Add tomato and cook for 5 minutes, or until onion is soft. Add tomato and cook for 5 minutes, or until onion is
ingredients: cider vinegar, water, italian salad dressing mix, olive oil, small red potato, zucchini, yellow squash, red onion
name: gourmet grilled vegetable salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine all dry ingredients, except chocolate chips, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients. Stir just until evenly mixed. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes.
ingredients: pumpkin, vegetable oil, sugar, flour, cinnamon, cloves, baking soda
name: my mom s pumpkin bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes
ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, milk, unflavored gelatin, cold water, egg whites, cream, butter, brown sugar, graham crackers
name: amish graham cracker fluff

steps: Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake at 400f for about 25 minutes or till chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, flour, crushed red pepper flakes, chili powder, paprika, eggs, rice krispies, vegetable oil
name: extra crispy chicken poppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: chocolate, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, instant coffee powder, sugar, butter, egg, ground hazelnuts
name: mokka chocolate pretzels

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, egg, orange peel, nestl toll house premier white morsels
name: white chip orange cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately.
ingredients: dark brown sugar, margarine, crunchy peanut butter, maple syrup, egg yolk, flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder, sugar
name: yummy maple peanut butter cookies

steps: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries.
ingredients: chocolate chips, maple syrup, firm tofu, extra firm tofu, prepared graham cracker crusts, whipped cream
name: chocolate silk pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. In large bowl mix teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, minced garlic, sesame seeds, garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, maple syrup. Place chicken in sauce and toss to coat. Pour chicken and sauce into a large disposable baking pan. Bake for 1 hour, tossing every 20 minutes. The liquid will gradually evaporate the longer you cook it. After 1 hour, increase the oven temperature to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Turn wings to coat evenly and cook for an additional 45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken wings, maple syrup, soy sauce, ginger, ground red pepper, ketchup, dry mustard, garlic powder
name: oriental hot wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, whole wheat pastry flour, baking soda, unsweetened dried shredded coconut, cinnamon, semisweet mini chocolate chips, fat free greek yogurt, agave nectar, unsweetened applesauce, vanilla extract
name: guilt free chocolate chip cookie

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Lightly grease muffin cups or spray with cooking spray. Place orange pieces in blender and blend until finely chopped. Add margarine, eggs, and milk and blend until well mixed. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Make a well in center and add orange mixture, stirring just until moistened. Fold in blueberries. Fill muffin cups and bake for 22-25 minutes or until golden. Cool 10 minutes in pan before removing.
ingredients: eggs, sour cream, sugar, marmalade, butter, baking powder, vanilla, flour
name: my orange marmalade muffins

steps: Put raspberry coffee in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into an ice tray and freeze. Make additional raspberry coffee. Add milk and sugar to hot coffee, if desired. You can throw everything in the blender at this point if you like a smooth consistency like i do, or you can just put the cubes in a tall glass and pour in the freshly brewed coffee.
ingredients: ground coffee, splenda brown sugar blend, raspberry extract, water, splenda sugar substitute, cool whip free
name: raspberry coffee diabetic

steps: Place tuna steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, plum sauce, light soy sauce, ground ginger, vegetable oil, tuna steaks, peppercorn
name: peppered tuna with mushroom sauce

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add shrimp, onion, garlic, vegetable oil, fish sauce, lime, juice of, fresh ground pepper, sea salt, sugar. Cook until shrimp are coated. Sprinkle on spices to taste. Sprinkle on flour. Turn and coat shrimp. Add enough water to make gravy. Add vinegar. Serve over rice.
ingredients: large shrimp, wooden skewer, onion, garlic, vegetable oil, fish sauce, lime, juice of, fresh ground pepper, sea salt, sugar
name: vietnamese grilled shrimp tom cang nuong

steps: Mix eggs, green onions, seasoning salt, stuffed green olive, mayonnaise, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, bread, lettuce, tomatoes. Serve on a good quality bread. Of course you can adjust the amount of ingredients to your preference.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, green onions, seasoning salt, stuffed green olive, mayonnaise, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, bread, lettuce, tomatoes
name: kittencal s egg or tuna and olive salad sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an oven safe serving dish with non-stick cooking spray. Using an electric mixer, blend the cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in green chilies, jalapeno peppers, and mexican blend cheese and mozzarella cheese. Spoon this mixture into the prepared baking dish. Mix together the panko and parmesan cheese and sprinkle it over the cream cheese mixture. Spray the panko and parmesan with a quick spray of non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and the topping is lightly browned.
ingredients: cream cheese, meat, green onions, jalapeno jelly, salt, pepper, butter flavored cracker
name: jenn s cream cheese dip

steps: In large pot, boil peeled, and rinsed potatoes, diced with salt added to water. 15 to 20 minutes later, drain well and place in same pot. Beat on medium speed mixer until all lumps are gone from potatoes. Add butter and mix for a minute. Finally, add warmed milk slowly, over low fire, adding a little at a time until right consistency. Stir well over low fire just until hot once more.
ingredients: red potatoes, water, fat, salt, pepper, heavy whipping cream, milk, butter
name: my cream potatoes

steps: Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute chicken breasts until lightly browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return chicken breasts to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, carrot, celery, great northern beans, salt, pepper, dried rosemary, fat-free italian salad dressing
name: rosemary chicken with white beans crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, brown sugar, butter, egg, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate pieces, pecans
name: golden chocolate treasure cookies

steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: ground chuck, egg, italian style breadcrumbs, water, catsup, worcestershire sauce, instant minced onion, cream of mushroom soup, butter, flour
name: stove top salisbury steak

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Grease and sugar two 9 x 5 loaf pans. Set aside. Beat eggs in small bowl. Mix oil and sugar. Add thawed strawberries and mix. Pour into loaf pans. Bake for 1 hour or until tests clean.
ingredients: dried dates, baking soda, apples, crystallized ginger, ground ginger, boiling water, butter, caster sugar, egg, self raising flour
name: apple and date loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick.
ingredients: ciabatta, mayonnaise, chipotle chiles in adobo, grilled chicken breasts, hass avocado, tomatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: dan s favorite supersized southwestern chicken sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: apples, sugar, milk, eggs, flour, salt, nutmeg
name: apple custard

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, butter, raisins, cinnamon
name: grandma b s coffee cake

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: russet potatoes, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, red onion, salt and pepper
name: creamy dreamy mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes.
ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, egg white, oil, walnuts, cinnamon, baking soda, salt
name: light autumn apple cake

steps: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries.
ingredients: chocolate ice cream, maraschino cherries, slivered almonds, chocolate crumb crusts, whipped topping
name: cherry nut chocolate pie

steps: Preheat skillet to 350f. Spray skillet with vegetable spray. Add ground beef and onions and cook until beef is no longer pink. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Cover and reduce heat to simmer for 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, beans in chili sauce, dark red kidney beans, crushed tomatoes, chili powder, elbow macaroni, water, cheese
name: skillet chili mac

steps: Heat 2 tablespoons reserved oil in a large skillet, over medium heat. Saute garlic for 1 to 2 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle both sides of the fish with salt and pepper. Place fish in the skillet. Cover, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Add the spinach and sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Add the spinach and
ingredients: lemon juice, instant coffee powder, butter, onion powder, sea salt, catfish fillets
name: grilled catfish with coffee butter

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, eggs, parmesan cheese
name: yellow spaghetti

steps: Boil the tomatillos and jalapenos in salted water until just tender, about 10 minutes, then drain. Place in blender or food processor with cilantro, onion and garlic and blend until smooth. Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Pour sauce in and stir for 5 minutes. Add broth and salt, return to a boil, then simmer for 8 to 10 minutes until thickened.
ingredients: tomatillo, jalapeno peppers, onion, garlic cloves, cilantro, chicken broth, vegetable oil
name: taco bell style green sauce

steps: In a large bowl, combine vodka, tomato juice, bouillon, fresh lime juice, pickapeppa sauce, worcestershire sauce, hot red pepper sauce, salt, lemon pepper seasoning, celery rib. Simmer over low heat for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until meat is tender. Serve over hot cooked rice or noodles.
ingredients: vodka, tomato juice, bouillon, fresh lime juice, pickapeppa sauce, worcestershire sauce, hot red pepper sauce, salt, lemon pepper seasoning, celery rib
name: creole bloody mary

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: beef sirloin, garlic cloves, vegetable oil cooking spray, green onions, bok choy, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, low-fat beef broth, tomatoes, salt & pepper
name: beef and garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour.
ingredients: butter, bananas, ground cinnamon, coconut milk, coconut
name: coconut baked bananas or plantains

steps: Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding lemon juice, salt, pepper and parmesan cheese.
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, lemon, rind of, heavy cream, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, flat leaf parsley, salt and pepper, lemon, juice of
name: rigatoni with lemon parmesan cream

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: kraft macaroni and cheese, milk, butter, ground beef, diced tomatoes, whole kernel corn, white onion, celery, taco seasoning, sour cream
name: skillet taco mac n cheese

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, teriyaki sauce, garlic, pita bread rounds, romaine lettuce leaves, tomatoes, bean sprouts
name: teriyaki chicken pitas

steps: Combine cheeses in bowl. Brush top side of each slice of bread with melted butter. Flip 4 slices over, sprinkle with cheese, and compact cheese lightly with hand. Cover with remaining bread slices, buttered side up. Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat for 1 minute. Place 2 sandwiches in pan and weight with round cake pan, pressing lightly. Leave cake pan on top and cook until first side is golden brown, 3-5 minutes. Flip sandwiches, press again with cake pan, and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: multigrain bread, sharp cheddar cheese, apple butter, butter
name: grilled cheesy apple sandwiches

steps: Preheat your oven to 350. Rinse the barley in cold water and drain. In a medium skillet, heat the butter and brown the pine nuts, be careful, they burn easily so watch them. Remove with a slotted spoon and reserve. Saute the scallions and barley until the barley is lightly toasted. Remove from the heat and stir in the nuts, parsley, salt and pepper- spoon this mixture into an ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Heat the broth to boiling and pour over the barley mixture. Stir to blend well, bake, uncovered, for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, long-grain rice, chicken broth, pine nuts
name: rice pilaf with pine nuts

steps: Layer fruit salad ingredients in order as listed in air tight container. Mix salad dressing ingredients together. Put salad dressing on top of layered fruit. Do not mix. Refrigerate overnight. Do not unseal until ready to serve. Mix just before serving.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, navel oranges, golden delicious apples, green seedless grapes, mayonnaise, sour cream, mild cheddar cheese
name: overnight layered fruit salad

steps: Mix limeade, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, margarita
ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, margarita mix concentrate, cold water, squirt soda, ice, salt, lime slice
name: juanita punch non alcholic

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, mushrooms, onion, green peppercorns in brine, chicken broth, whipping cream, dry sherry, dijon mustard
name: gg s chicken in creamy dijon sherry sauce

steps: In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, celery ribs, vegetable broth, creamed corn, bay leaf, paprika, green onion toppreparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, onion, frozen mixed vegetables, ham, creamed corn, chicken broth, fat free cream cheese, skim milk, salt and pepper
name: creamed vegetable soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350, wrap cauliflower in foil, roast about 1 hour. Peel and put in a small bowl, and mash. Cook cauliflower in pot of boiling water until tender, about 20 minutes, drain. Heat oil in pot over medium heat, add garlic and shallots. Saute 2 minutes. Add to potatoes, mash potatoes with garlic and shallots, add the butter, cheese and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: head cauliflower, vegan cream cheese, nutritional yeast, garlic, vegan chicken broth, fresh ground black pepper, chives, vegan margarine
name: garlicky mashed cauliflower potatoes

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic, lemon zest, sun-dried tomatoes, basil, capers, salt and freshly ground black pepper, halibut fillet, and cook over medium heat. Add the basil to the pasta and serve a small bundle alongside your entree or serve as a delicate first course.
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon zest, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, fresh basil, capers, salt & freshly ground black pepper, halibut fillet
name: grilled lemon basil halibut

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: broccoli florets, red pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cheddar cheese, black pepper, french-fried onions
name: broccoli bake

steps: Combine all ingredients except oil in food processor. Blend till combined. While machine is running slowly pour in oil in thin steady stream. Continue to add oil until mayonnaise reaches desired thickness. Do not over beat.
ingredients: garlic, egg yolk, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, olive oil, vegetable oil
name: aioli

steps: In a large sauce pan. Add the onion, tomatoes, dried red chilies, coriander seeds, turmeric, green chilies, garlic cloves, sunflower oil, fresh coriander leaves. Bring to a slight boil. Add shrimp and fresh or frozen but thawed broccoli florets. Take some of the excess sauce and pour into a bowl. Whisk and return to pan. Bring to full boil and stir constantly. As soon as thickening begins, remove from heat and serve over white rice. You may also use one of them premade asian vegetable medleys in this recipe and pour sauce over it. Can be used for beef, chicken or pork as well.
ingredients: panir, onion, tomatoes, dried red chilies, coriander seeds, turmeric, green chilies, garlic cloves, sunflower oil, fresh coriander leaves
name: hot chilli paneer

steps: In a medium bowl, combine the gluten free breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, garlic, oregano, basil, milk, turkey breast cutlets, olive oil. Slowly whisk in the olive oil to thoroughly combine. Place the turkey cutlets in a shallow dish and pour the liquid over top. Cover and place in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. Preheat the grill or oven broiler. Place the breasts directly on the grill, or on a roasting rack beneath the broiler. Cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the turkey is fully done. Turn the breasts frequently to prevent burning.
ingredients: gluten free breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, garlic, oregano, basil, milk, turkey breast cutlets, olive oil
name: breaded turkey breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve warm.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, pastrami, russian salad dressing, sauerkraut, swiss cheese
name: reuben roll

steps: Combine margarine, cream cheese, powdered sugar, salt, vanilla, coconut, chocolate chips, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraffin wax, paraff
ingredients: margarine, cream cheese, powdered sugar, salt, vanilla, coconut, chocolate chips, paraffin wax
name: coconut easter eggs

steps: Mix bread crumbs, parsley, salt and garlic. Dip chicken strips into egg and then coat with bread crumbs. Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5-6 minutes or until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink inside. Serve with your choice of sauces.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, parmesan cheese, parsley, lemon zest, boneless skinless chicken breast, salt, pepper, reduced-calorie mayonnaise
name: ww 4 points lemon crumb chicken

steps: Spread chilis on bottom of 8x8 baking dish. Mix eggs with garlic powder and pepper. Pour over chilis. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 25 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes, cut into squares. Serve on crackers.
ingredients: cheese, green chilies, bacon, onion, egg
name: cheese javelina

steps: Place shrimp in a medium bowl, add pineapple, jalapeno, cilantro, salt and pepper and cook for 5 minutes. Add shrimp and cook gently for 3-4 minutes. Dont overcook or shrimp will be tough and rubbery. Serve over cooked jasmine rice.
ingredients: pineapple, jalapeno, cilantro, salt and pepper, medium shrimp, curry powder, salt, olive oil
name: curried shrimp with pineapple salsa

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: boneless beef chuck roast, garlic powder, onion powder, salt & pepper, barbecue sauce
name: slow cooker barbecue beef

steps: Combine butter, splenda brown sugar blend, splenda granular, unsweetened applesauce, ground cinnamon, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, baking soda, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, instant
ingredients: butter, splenda brown sugar blend, splenda granular, unsweetened applesauce, ground cinnamon, instant apple and cinnamon oatmeal, eggs, baking soda, all-purpose flour
name: apple cinnamon oatmeal bread

steps: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat until hot. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, making sure that tomato mixture covers it completely. Cook 15 to 20 minutes until sauce is thickened and chicken is cooked through. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: condensed chicken broth, salsa, orange rind, meat-filled tortellini, frozen corn, evaporated milk, salt, fresh cilantro
name: southwest tortellini chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Slice potatoes into 12 wedges each. Place all the potatoes into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and cumin over potatoes, drizzle oil over seasonings and toss the potatoes until all are coated. Spread potatoes onto baking sheet in a single layer. Bake for 10, remove from oven and turn. Place back into oven and cook for 10 more minutes, then turn again. Return to oven and continue cooking until golden brown -- probably 5 - 10 more minutes. Each serving size is 12 wedges.
ingredients: ground cumin, salt, paprika, olive oil, pita bread
name: spiced pita cumin crisps

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: pizza crusts, pizza sauce, cheddar cheese, meatballs, dried italian seasoning
name: meatball pizza

steps: In 4 or 5-quart sauce pot, cook sliced scottish swede and onion over medium-high heat 5 minutes. Stirring frequently or until browned. Add apples and cook stirring frequently about 1 minute. Stir in sauerkraut, chicken broth and caraway seeds. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until apples are tender and flavors blended.
ingredients: rutabaga, onion, oil, bacon drippings, sweet apples, seasoning, nutmeg
name: special scottish swede

steps: Place plum orange jam in a non-reactive saucepan and bring to a boil, stirring. Boil hard for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Take off the heat, stir in the pectin and ladle into hot sterilized jars. Seal and process in a hot water bath for 10 minutes. Place hot jars on a towel on your counter and let cool overnight. Check seals.
ingredients: blue plums, orange, rind of, sugar, lemon juice, liquid fruit pectin
name: microwave plum orange jam

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center.
ingredients: chicken breast halves, oil, cream of broccoli soup, milk, cheddar cheese, rice
name: easy cheesy chicken breasts

steps: Heat the oil in a large, heavy pan until it is very hot. Add the popcorn and cover with lid. Reduce the heat. Shake the pan occasionally so all the corn will cook and it will not brown. When the popping sound stops, remove pan from the heat and let cool slightly. Discard any kernels that have not popped. Add the chili powder. Shake the pan again and again to make sure that all of the corn is covered with chili powder. Transfer to a bowl. Add lime juice just before serving.
ingredients: vegetable oil, popcorn, butter, pecorino romano cheese, ground pepper
name: cacio e pepe popcorn

steps: In a large skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until onions are soft and golden brown. Prepare gravy and keep warm. Grill or fry hamburgers to desired degree of doneness. Cook french fries in the oven according to package directions. Right before the burgers and fries are done, toast the bread. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Cut each burger into bite-size pieces and place on top of fries. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately.
ingredients: brown sugar, lemon juice, onion, salt, pepper, hamburger, pork sausage links
name: smoky link burgers

steps: Melt butter over low heat in large saucepan. Add flour, heat until bubbly. Add milk and light cream. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, reduce heat
ingredients: butter, heavy whipping cream, parmesan cheese, nutmeg, salt & pepper
name: ron s favorite alfredo sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool completely. Remove
ingredients: plain flour, sugar, eggs, coconut milk, baking powder, green food coloring, desiccated coconut, salt
name: putu ayu indonesian steamed coconut cupcakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the bread cubes in two greased 6-oz. Custard cups. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and creamer. Pour over the bread. Sprinkle with the caramel pieces, nuts, and cinnamon and dot with butter. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown. Cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: french bread, milk, sugar, eggs, vanilla, butter, cinnamon, heavy whipping cream, white chocolate, brandy
name: bread pudding with white chocolate brandy sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place the polenta on a baking sheet spray top side with cooking spray. Bake for 5 minutes. Remove from oven. Place all your goodies on the polenta. Bake again for 5 minutes. Remove
ingredients: water, polenta, salt, spaghetti sauce, sliced mushrooms, garlic cloves, nutritional yeast
name: easy mushroom garlic polenta pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Add hot water to stuffing mix. Stir till blended. Set aside. Saute italian sausage in a large nonstick skillet over med-high heat until nicely browned. Add vegetables to skillet, saute until crisp tender. Drain any oil in skillet. Cover with tomato sauce. Cover with prepared stuffing. Bake 25 minutes or until heated throughout.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, evaporated milk, eggs, cheddar cheese, red pepper, green onions, onion powder, garlic powder, italian bread
name: suppertime sausage bake

steps: In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops.
ingredients: pork chops, onions, condensed tomato soup, beef bouillon cube, water, salt, pepper
name: pork chops in tomato and onion gravy

steps: Place cucumbers and onions in a bowl. Combine rest of ingredients in a measuring cup. Stir well. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Chill for 4 hours.
ingredients: distilled white vinegar, superfine sugar, sambal oelek, fresh coriander, cucumbers
name: cucumber vinegar sauce

steps: In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, margarine, milk and peanut butter. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool.
ingredients: sugar, margarine, milk, peanut butter, vanilla, rolled oats
name: peanut butter no bake cookies

steps: 2-3 hours before your guests arrive, peel, core, and cut the peach into bite-sized chunks on a ridged cutting board to catch any juices. Place pineapple chunks into a large clear glass punch bowl or bowle pitcher, pouring in any of the pineapple juices. Peel mango and cut into small cnunks and add to the pineapple. Pour the madeira and 1 bottle of white wine over the fruit. Cover and chill until the guests arrive. When the guests arrive, add the remaining wine and the champagne and serve.
ingredients: peaches, sugar, riesling wine, champagne
name: pfirsichbowle german sparkling peach wine punch

steps: Place chicken in a baking dish. Mix sour cream and soups. Pour over chicken. Mix cracker crumbs and melted margarine. Sprinkle on top of casserole. Bake in 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, cream of celery soup, milk, canned chicken, french-fried onions, wide egg noodles
name: amy s chicken casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: butter, vanilla, sugar, flour, eggs, baking powder, milk, salt
name: original girl scout cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip.
ingredients: pizza dough, butter, garlic salt, parmesan cheese
name: tsr version of little caesars crazy bread by todd wilbur

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread pork chops on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: pork loin chops, dijon mustard, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, cooking spray
name: air fried pork chops

steps: In small saucepan bring milk and cinnamon just to a boil. Stir in couscous. Remove pan from heat. Cover and allow to stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle pear over top and serve.
ingredients: low-fat milk, honey, ground cinnamon, couscous, fruit bits, pecans
name: hot breakfast couscous

steps: Heat oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Add lamb. Cook until tender, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer lamb to platter, cover, and roast lamb chops to desired doneness, about 10 minutes for medium-rare. Transfer lamb to platter, cover, and
ingredients: lamb steaks, garlic clove, salt, pepper, flour, eggs, breadcrumbs, shortening
name: breaded lamb steaks

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, toast sandwiches for 4 - 5 minutes on each side or until bread is lightly browned and cheese is melted.
ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, cooked ham, green onion, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce
name: ham and cheese bites

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together.
ingredients: bread, miracle whip, chicken breast, lettuce, crisp bacon, fresh tomatoes, american cheese, basil
name: victory s triple decker club sandwich

steps: Melt chocolate in microwave on high for 60 seconds. Stir and continue to cook on high for another 30 seconds or until chocolate is completely melted. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Add powdered sugar and continue beating until well blended. Stir in chocolate, vanilla and extract flavouring. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll into cocoa, powdered sugar, nuts or dip into melted chocolate. Store in refrigerator. Alternative. Use white chocolate in place of semi-sweet chips and follow same directions.
ingredients: chocolate wafers, cocoa nibs, sugar, unsalted butter, heavy cream, bittersweet chocolate, dark rum
name: chocolate truffle tart with chocolate nib crust

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add eggs, milk, salt, pepper, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny.
ingredients: butter, stale bread, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, ham
name: breakfast in a pan

steps: Place the pork in a large pot with water to cover. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain well. Place the pork in a wok and sear the pork until browned. Add the reserved liquid and cook over medium until it glazes. Add the reserved liquid and
ingredients: pork spareribs, flour, salt, fat, garlic cloves, ground ginger, soy sauce, lemon juice
name: hong kong ribs

steps: Cook threadgills san antonio squash casserole and bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, yellow onions, yellow squash, velveeta cheese, cream of celery soup, green chili, breadcrumbs
name: threadgills san antonio squash casserole

steps: In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint.
ingredients: jasmine tea, fresh mint leaves, water, lemon juice, honey, cold water
name: green jasmine mint iced tea with lemon

steps: In large heavy saucepan melt butter. Stir in flour. Gradually whisk in half & half and chicken broth. Add corn, milk, and butter. Simmer about 10 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Do not boil.
ingredients: bacon, onion, creamed corn, fat-free evaporated milk, potato, salt, pepper, sugar
name: creamy corn bacon chowder for two

steps: Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and cream in blender. Blend at medium speed for 30 seconds. Fold into whipped topping. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer.
ingredients: strawberry, heavy whipping cream, sweetened condensed milk, sugar, lemon juice, graham cracker pie crust
name: no bake berries and cream pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground ginger, ground cloves, salt, lemon juice, sliced almonds
name: not too sweet sweet potatoes

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add beef broth, orzo pasta, whole kernel corn, green chilies, olive oil, extra lean beef, bell pepper, fresh cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: beef broth, orzo pasta, whole kernel corn, green chilies, olive oil, extra lean beef, bell pepper, fresh cilantro
name: cilantro orzo and beef

steps: Mix ingredients together until smooth. Place in freezer for 4-5 hours or until frozen.
ingredients: graham cracker crust, marshmallows, milk, vanilla, salt, peppermint extract, red food coloring, whipping cream, peppermint candies
name: pink peppermint pie

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tabbouleh until tender. Add eggs, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, tabbouleh, salt, pepper, feta cheese, fresh oregano, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabbouleh, tabboule
ingredients: eggs, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, tabbouleh, salt, pepper, feta cheese, fresh oregano
name: tabbouleh scramble

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Fill greased muffin tins two-thirds full with batter. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: dry active yeast, water, sugar, evaporated milk, butter, eggs, flour, salt
name: thanksgiving for 10 mom s rolls

steps: In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: margarine, peanut butter, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic powder, dry mustard, ground ginger, toasted rice cereal, pretzels, sliced almonds
name: orient express snack mix

steps: Preheat oven to 280f. In large baking dish place down 2 long pieces aluminum foil, criss cross. Put meat on foil pour bbq sauce on top drizzle honey over it. Sprinkle with garlic. Place onions all over. Salt and pepper it. Wrap up foil and seal it well. Cook for about 6 hours.
ingredients: country-style pork ribs, salt, ground black pepper, light brown sugar, garlic cloves, onion, apple juice, barbecue sauce
name: slow cooker country style ribs

steps: In large saucepan heat olive oil and saute garlic. Add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Add pasta and cook until desired tenderness. Add beans and heat. Add spinach. The heat should cook the spinach. Add seasonings. Ladle into bowls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: chicken broth, onion, frozen chopped spinach, hot italian sausage, fennel seed, parmesan cheese
name: italian spinach and sausage soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 deg. In saucepan, combine milk and lemon juice. Mix well. Mixture should thicken. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, frozen lemonade concentrate, seedless raspberry preserves, frozen whipped topping, prepared graham cracker crusts
name: raspberry lemonade pie

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the spinach and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Remove with a slotted spoon and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve.
ingredients: sweet onion, italian plums, mushroom, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt & pepper, fresh spinach, sliced almonds
name: spinach el greco

steps: Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: orzo pasta, olive oil, onion, celery rib, garlic, spinach leaves, reduced-sodium chicken broth, red wine vinegar, asiago cheese, fresh ground pepper
name: orzo with spinach and asiago cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Remove chicken from marinade and discard marinade. Arrange chicken breasts in a shallow baking pan. Season with salt and pepper and roast for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear when you prick it with a fork.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic clove, chicken broth, lemon juice, salt & pepper
name: lemon garlic chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine nectarines, sugar, butter, lemon, juice of, sliced almonds, vanilla ice cream, and ice cream in large mixing bowl. Beat at low speed with mixer until moistened. Beat at medium speed for one minute. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown, cracked and dry. Remove from muffin pans. Cool completely. Frost with frosting.
ingredients: nectarines, sugar, butter, lemon, juice of, sliced almonds, vanilla ice cream
name: warm nectarines with almonds and vanilla ice cream sweden

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Seperate the heathside sandwich dough into the 8 triangles. Spread the mustard on the dough. Put 1 piece of meat and 1 piece of cheese on each roll, folding the meat over the cheese to copy the heathside triangle. Roll up the heathside sandwich, wide to narrow, and place on a cookie sheet with the point of the heathside on the bottom. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm.
ingredients: ham, cheddar cheese, sweet pickle relish, onion, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, rye rolls
name: heathside sandwiches

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until softened and starting to brown, about 10 minutes. In food processor combine sour cream, cream cheese, onion mixture, parsley, salt and pepper. Refrigerate for at least one hour. Serve with chips, pita or vegetables.
ingredients: cream cheese spread, garlic powder, fresh basil, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, black olives, wheat thins sun-dried tomato and basil crackers
name: garlicky tomato basil dip

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix corn, butter, eggs, flour, salt, milk, salt and pepper. Add cornstarch and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven.
ingredients: fresh corn, butter, eggs, flour, salt, milk, sugar
name: diane s corn pudding

steps: Boil a large pot of water enough to cover the spagetti squash. Cut the spaghetti squash into 4 pieces. Season with whatever you want, i used garlic salt and onion powder. Once boiling add the squash, onions, garlic and butter. Cook for 20 min covered. Remove and separate spaghetti from the skin.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, butter, salt, pepper
name: simple spaghetti squash microwave

steps: In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, sweet onion, italian dressing, oregano, artificial sweetener. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread.
ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, sweet onion, italian dressing, oregano, artificial sweetener
name: mozzarella tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, toffee pieces, pecans
name: nickey s chocolate chip pecan cookies

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add rice. Lightly saute it stirring frequently about 3 to 5 minutes. In a large bowl combine rice with all the other ingredients except for the lettuce, toss in the peanut sauce till coated. Season with salt and pepper if you wish. Each person takes a lettuce leaf or a portion of one, spoons the misture in it and then wrap like a cabbage roll and eat and enjoy.
ingredients: black beans, chives, instant brown rice, fat-free italian salad dressing, low-fat feta, lettuce leaves
name: mediterranean black bean lettuce wraps

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: tomatoes, coarse salt, fresh ground pepper, extra virgin olive oil, lemon thyme leaves
name: tomatoes with lemon thyme

steps: Heat oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees f. Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper. Stir egg into dry ingredients. Gradually mix in one beer until a thin batter is formed. You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped. Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil. Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown. Drain on paper towels, and serve warm.
ingredients: shallot, olive oil, sugar, fish sauce, water, fresh ground black pepper, halibut fillets, scallions, cilantro
name: caramelized black pepper fish

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. In a large bowl combine the graham cracker pie crust, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, gingersnap cookie, pecans, whipped topping, instant vanilla flavor pudding and pie filling, half-and-halfpreparation:Preheat oven to 425f. In a large bowl combine the graham cracker pie crust, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, gingersnap cookie, pecans,
ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, gingersnap cookie, pecans, whipped topping, instant vanilla flavor pudding and pie filling, half-and-half
name: autumn pumpkin gingersnap pie

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: salt, spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, dried bay leaves, onion, fresh ground pepper, chicken broth, crushed tomatoes, flat leaf parsley
name: pasta with bacon tomato sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Tear 2 pita breads into chip-size pieces and brush with oil. Sprinkle with lime zest and chilli flakes. Bake for 10 mins until crisp. Sprinkle with salt if you like.
ingredients: pita bread, ground sumac, extra virgin olive oil, romaine lettuce, chopped tomatoes, fresh parsley, green onion, of fresh mint, salt, cucumber
name: fattoush

steps: In a blender, blend watermelon, powdered sugar, lemonade concentrate, mint sprig until smooth. Press through fine sieve, discarding seeds. Freeze in 13 x 9 inch metal cake pan until solid, about 2 hours. Break up and puree. Freeze in airtight container until firm, about 1 hour.
ingredients: watermelon, powdered sugar, frozen lemonade concentrate, mint sprig
name: watermelon slushie

steps: Combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: avocados, cherry tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, black beans, olive oil, limes, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: mediterranean avocado and black bean salad

steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: honey, garlic cloves, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper, chicken breast halves, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: honey and spice glazed chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, potatoes, red onions, roasted red pepper, portabella mushrooms, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper, sesame oil
name: earth sea and fire salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except casserole. Bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.
ingredients: onion, diced green chilies, green enchilada sauce, chicken broth, chili powder, cumin, bell pepper, chicken breasts, corn tortillas, velveeta cheese
name: wanted dead or alive killer tex mex casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 30-40 minutes. When using a glass casserole, bake in 325 degree oven for 45-60 minutes. When using a glass casserole, bake in 325 degree oven for
ingredients: italian sausage, cabbage, sharp cheddar cheese, sour cream, salt, pepper
name: comforting cabbage and sausage casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, karo syrup, vanilla, baking soda, crunchy cheetos cheese-flavored snacks
name: richys exceptional cheeto dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet.
