Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti, zucchini, garlic cloves, reduced-fat feta cheese, mint leaf, lemon juice, dried rosemary, dried sage, pine nuts
name: spaghetti with feta zucchini and mint

steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Bake for about 45 minutes, until the crust is brown and if you stick a toothpick inside it will come out clean.
ingredients: breadcrumbs, flour, baking powder, eggs, sugar, lemon rind, lemon juice, water, oleo
name: grandmother s sugar cake

steps: In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: butter, sugar, cornstarch, water, lemon juice
name: lemon dessert sauce

steps: In a large bowl, combine the warm water, flour, salt, sugar, active dry yeast, cornmeal, and yeast mixture. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: potato water, salt, white flour, dry yeast, sugar
name: everlasting yeast

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll pizza slices into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked pizza crust, sausage, bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, sausage patty, eggs, milk, salt and pepper, cheese
name: a bit different breakfast pizza

steps: Cut the mozzarella into 12 slices. Place each slice on one half of a bread slice and fold the other half over the top. Press edges together to seal. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk. Spread the breadcrumbs in another shallow bowl. Dip the cheese pockets into the egg mixture, allowing excess to drip back in the bowl. Dredge in the breadcrumbs, tuning to coat evenly and completely. In a large, heavy frying pan, heat both oils over medium-high heat until hot but not smoking. Working in batches, fry the pockets, turning once, until deep golden brown--about 4 minutes each side. Drain on paper towels. Sprinkle with sage. Serve hot with marinara sauce in dipping cups.
ingredients: white bread, mozzarella cheese, whole milk, all-purpose flour, egg, salt and pepper, olive oil
name: mozzarella in carrozza nigella lawson

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, butter, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, green onions, cooked ham, salt and pepper, seasoned bread crumbs
name: heavenly potatoes and ham

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: caramels, milk, unsalted butter, german chocolate cake mix, pecans, chocolate chips
name: tortoise bars

steps: In a skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until they are soft and golden brown. Prepare gravy and keep warm. Grill or fry burgers to desired degree of doneness. Cook french fries in the oven according to package directions. Right before the burgers and fries are done, toast the bread. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately.
ingredients: ground chuck, cooking spray, seasoned pepper, beef gravy, cooked white rice
name: easy burgers with rice gravy

steps: Combine raw shrimp, sea scallops, vegetable oil, lemon juice, soy sauce, garlic cloves, crystallized ginger, onion powder, pineapple chunks, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini, zucchini
ingredients: raw shrimp, sea scallops, vegetable oil, lemon juice, soy sauce, garlic cloves, crystallized ginger, onion powder, pineapple chunks, zucchini
name: shrimp scallop kabobs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the potatoes and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the potatoes evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, brussels sprouts, garlic cloves, salt, pepper
name: pan roasted brussels sprouts with potatoes ww

steps: In a medium bowl combine the first 6 ingredients together. In a small bowl mix together the mayonnaise and yellow mustard until well combined. Add to the mixture in the ham mixture. Mix to combine. Season with black pepper to taste. Cover and chill a minimum of 2 or more hours before using.
ingredients: cooked ham, mayonnaise, celery, green onions, dijon mustard, green olives, parsley, salt and fresh pepper, tabasco sauce
name: tasty ham olive spread

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add garlic, white vinegar, canola oil, chili peppers, dried oregano, ground cumin, salt, flank steakspreparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add garlic, white vinegar, canola oil, chili peppers, dried oregano, ground cumin, salt, flank steakspreparation:In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the
ingredients: garlic cloves, white vinegar, canola oil, chili peppers, dried oregano, ground cumin, salt, flank steaks
name: garlic chile flank steak

steps: Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice.
ingredients: butter, onion, celery, chicken broth, herb seasoned stuffing mix, cooked wild rice, tangerines, tangerine peel, fresh cranberries, poultry seasoning
name: tangerine dressing

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add wing pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone.
ingredients: chicken wings, oil, hot sauce, butter
name: hot chicken wings

steps: Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add pork, stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind and basil leaves, toss well. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: red curry paste, unsweetened coconut milk, clam juice, large shrimp, fresh cilantro, lime, salt and pepper, jasmine rice
name: red shrimp curry

steps: Cook and drain ground beef in large pot. Add raw beef, macaroni, hot water, spaghetti sauce, olive, oregano, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cheesepreparation:Cook and drain ground beef in large pot. Add raw macaroni, water, sauce, olives and seasonings. Bring to boil, then cover and simmer until noodles are tender, about 25 minutes. Remove from heat, add cheese. Cover and let stand to melt, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, tomato sauce, cumin, salt, oregano, cinnamon, baby spinach
name: quick greek stew

steps: Boil and drain noodles. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the topping. Pour into greased rectangular pan. Mix topping and spread in an even layer over kugel. Bake at 350 for 1 hour.
ingredients: eggs, sour cream, butter, vanilla extract, lemon juice, sugar, golden raisin, apples, wide egg noodles, cinnamon
name: apple noodle kugel

steps: In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain well. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, garlic salt, onion, butter, cream cheese, sour cream, cheese
name: vicki s gourmet potatoes

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the onion gently for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 mins until soft. Add the stock or water to loosen. Stir in the parsley and seasoning. Serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, spring onion, chile, garlic clove, turmeric, ground coriander, ground cumin, eggs, coriander
name: nigella s masala omelett

steps: Place chicken breasts in plastic zippered bag with salsa or picante sauce. Zip shut and refrigerate 1 hour. Place on barbecue grill and cook for 5 minutes on each side. Top with cheese and close top of grill until cheese melts. Spread bottoms of each hamburger bun with avocado mixture. Top with lettuce, tomato, chicken breasts and top of buns.
ingredients: chicken, salsa, chicken broth, onion, green pepper, ripe olives, chili powder, minute rice, cheddar cheese
name: tex mex skillet

steps: Combine the butter, leg of lamb, salt and pepper, cornstarch, ground ginger, dry cider, clear honey, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rosemary, rose
ingredients: butter, leg of lamb, salt and pepper, cornstarch, ground ginger, dry cider, clear honey, rosemary
name: crock pot honeyed lamb

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, boiling water, unsweetened pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, frozen lemonade concentrate, water, amaretto, vanilla, almond extract
name: amaretto punch slush

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: tomatoes, fresh basil, fresh oregano, garlic cloves, olive oil, halibut fillets
name: tomato basil topped halibut

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, cream margarine, sugar and vanilla essence with electric beater. Add eggs and egg whites, one at a time, continue beating between additions. Blend in yoghurt, polenta, coconut, orange rind and orange juice. Beat well for further 2 minutes. Pour into greased ring pan. Bake in a moderately slow oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until cooked when tested and golden brown.
ingredients: currants, sultana, madeira wine, ricotta cheese, sugar, polenta, milk, orange, rind of, orange juice
name: polenta ricotta cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together sugar and butter. Add eggs which have been slightly beaten. Add salt and flour. Add vanilla. Mix well. Form into fancy shapes by using a cookie press. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, cream cheese, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, pecans, powdered sugar
name: danish wedding cookies

steps: Mix everything except bread, crabmeat, egg, salt, old bay seasoning, baking powder, parsley, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, oil. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm.
ingredients: bread, crabmeat, egg, salt, old bay seasoning, baking powder, parsley, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, oil
name: old bay crab cakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Using electric mixer, beat first 5 ingredients in a medium bowl until fluffy. Line large baking sheet with foil. Place yams on sheet, bake until tender, 1 hour 10 minutes. Slit each lengthwise. Spoon 1 tbs of butter into each. Pass remaining butter separately.
ingredients: yams, brown sugar, cornstarch, orange zest, ground cinnamon, apricot juice, canned apricots, butter, pecans
name: apricot yams

steps: Melt cream cheese and peanut butter in microwave for 1-2 minutes at 30-second intervals. Stir in cocoa until creamy. Combine together in a mixing bowl and whisk in cream and sweetener. Spread on wax paper, cover with another sheet of wax paper. Freeze, then cut into pieces, and keep chilled.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, cocoa, peppermint extract, heavy cream, splenda sugar substitute
name: low carb chocolate mints choco peanut cups

steps: Whisk together oil, vinegar, lemon juice, rosemary, salt and pepper in a small jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake to combine. Dressing can be made several days in advance and refrigerated, shake well before using. Combine remaining ingredients in a large salad bowl. Chill until serving time. To serve, add dressing and toss lightly to combine. Add additional freshly ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, orange juice, pecans, honey, salt and pepper, mixed greens, pear, pomegranate seeds, feta cheese
name: baby mixed greens with apple pear pecans and feta

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: italian dressing, ranch dressing, boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil
name: italian ranch chicken

steps: In a large sauce pan, combine rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until rhubarb is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top.
ingredients: sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, egg, milk, rhubarb, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert
name: rhubarb pizza

steps: Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices.
ingredients: dijon mustard, honey, rice wine vinegar, lime juice, garlic clove, onion powder, salt, oil
name: honey mustard lime dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, carrots, potatoes, onion soup mix, butter, water
name: chicken in a bag

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, vegetable oil
name: best basic waffle

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Fry onion, garlic, mushrooms and leek in a pan in the olive oil until softened. Rinse and drain mixed vegetables and sprinkle over some olive oil. Combine the parmesan and the grated parsnip in a bowl and put aside. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy.
ingredients: mixed vegetables, sliced water chestnuts, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, onion, butter, fine dry breadcrumb
name: mixed vegetable casserole

steps: Heat oven to 450 degrees. Lay a 12-inch square piece of foil on the counter and put the garlic on it. Sprinkle the thyme and rosemary over the garlic. Pour the oil over the garlic and herbs. Draw up the edges of the foil and make a sealed packet. Bake 20 minutes. While the garlic is baking, cook pasta according to package directions. Two minutes before pasta is done add the zucchini to the cooking pasta, cook 2 minutes. Drain zucchini and pasta. Open the foil and mash the garlic lightly with a spoon. Toss mashed garlic with the pasta and zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: summer squash, grape tomatoes, red onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, pasta, butter, parmesan cheese, basil leaves, salt
name: pasta with roasted summer vegetables and basil

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Make into loaf. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Serve.
ingredients: ground beef, garlic powder, butter, french bread, sour cream, cheddar cheese
name: easy cheeseburger bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray corn with nonstick spray. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees.
ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, paprika, cayenne, corn
name: grilled corn with spicy chili butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain spinach well before using. Mix spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese and garlic powder in a large bowl. Spoon dip into a oven-safe dish and bake until bubbly and heated through. Serve warm with crackers, fresh bread, toasted bread or with a spoon.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, garlic, romano cheese, parmesan cheese, frozen spinach, heavy whipping cream, sour cream, mozzarella cheese
name: trinka s spinach artichoke dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: onion, garlic clove, butter, olive oil, frozen cauliflower, salt, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese
name: baked cauliflower

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each truffle off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until truffle oil is slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: truffle, fresh thyme sprigs, peppercorns, light olive oil
name: truffle oil with peppercorns and thyme

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cut chicken breasts in half to butterfly them into cutlets. Sprinkle with some salt and pepper melt margarine in skillet and brown chicken in margarine and transfer to a 9x13 pan. Pour soup and sour cream into same skillet and whisk until smooth and warm. Place ham on top of chicken and top with a slice of swiss cheese. Pour soup mixture over top and bake uncovered for 40 minutes.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, reduced-sodium chicken broth, balsamic vinegar, black pepper, cooked ham, part-skim mozzarella cheese, salad greens, cooking spray
name: new chicken cordon bleu

steps: Cook and drain spaghetti as directed on package. While spaghetti is cooking, cook bacon in a a skillet, stirring frequently, until crisp. Remove bacon from pan with slotted spoon and drain. Drain fat from skillet, reserving 1 tablespoon in the pan. Cook onion and garlic in bacon fat over medium heat about 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until onion is tender. Stir in spaghetti, chicken, cheese and whipping cream. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Toss with bacon.
ingredients: spaghetti, bacon, onion, garlic clove, cooked chicken, parmesan cheese, whipping cream
name: chicken carbonara deluxe

steps: Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Put the onions in a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through.
ingredients: small onion, butter, salt, sugar, balsamic vinegar
name: sweet and sour onions with balsamic vinegar

steps: Put corn, water, salt and sugar in a large pot. Bring to boil then boil 2 minutes. Let cool. Then bag, corn and liquid together. Freeze with bags standing up. About 2 cups of this frozen, will serve 3 people. You can freeze whatever amount you want.
ingredients: ears of corn, eggs, all-purpose flour, paprika, sugar, baking powder, salt, fat
name: southern corn fritters

steps: Sift flour, sugar, salt, sugar, oil, milk, milk powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking
ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, oil, milk
name: my no roll pie crust

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: margarine, egg, hamburger bun, pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, pizza sauce
name: pizza eggburger

steps: Place the garlic, chillies and cilantro in a food processor and whizz until finely chopped. Add the garbanzos and whizz until well blended. With the motor running, squeeze in the lime juice and drizzle in the olive oil to make a fairly coarse paste. Season well to taste and spoon into a serving bowl. Meanwhile, mix together the olive oil, garlic and parsley and season. Heat one side of the pita breads under a hot broiler for about 1 minute until well browned. Turn over the bread, then use a knife to slash the softer surface 4-5 times without cutting through the bread. Brush with the herb and oil mixture and return to the broiler until bubbling and toasted. When cool, break into pieces and serve with the hummus.
ingredients: garlic, garbanzo beans, lime juice, salt, olive oil, fresh cilantro, jalapeno peppers
name: cilantro jalapeno hummus

steps: Preheat oven 350 or 400. Cut french bread in half. Bake bread in oven for 3 minutes. Pull out of oven and top with sauce, cheese, pizza toppings and italian seasoning. Bake in oven until heated thoroughly and cheese is melted.
ingredients: french baguette, olive oil, roasted red peppers, fresh mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper
name: mozzarella and roasted red pepper toasts

steps: Place macaroni in a large 9 x 13 baking dish. Bake for 45 minutes at 325 degrees.
ingredients: macaroni, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cheddar cheese, celery salt, worcestershire sauce, ham, corn flake crumbs
name: irene stewart s ham macaroni casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread dijon on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, whole wheat panko, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, fresh tarragon, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dijon mustard, egg, all-purpose flour
name: crunchy baked pork chops

steps: In a large saucepan, cover potatoes with 2 inches salted water. Bring to a simmer and cook until potatoes are just tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain thoroughly. In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Add potatoes and garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook, mashing potatoes slightly, until golden brown in spots, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a serving dish and keep warm. Add bacon to skillet. Cook until bacon is browned, about 3 minutes. Add green beans and cook, stirring occasionally, until bright green and crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Add to potatoes along with lemon juice to taste. Season with salt and pepper and toss gently to combine.
ingredients: bacon, onion, potatoes, water, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, milk, frozen green beans, pepper, parsley
name: potato green bean and bacon chowder

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares.
ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, butter, rice krispies
name: easy frozen peanut butter rice krispie treat bars

steps: In the bowl of a mixer, blend gluten free mix ingredients, xanthan gum, sugar, salt, and milk powder. Add the water and beat on medium speed for 1 minute. Remove dough from mixer and form a ball. Divide into 6 or 8 parts and roll out each piece very thin until it forms a 10 to 12 round. Roll all the pieces, separating them with plastic wrap or wax paper before cooking. Heat a griddle to medium-hot or hot and cook each tortilla about 1 minute per side.
ingredients: tapioca starch, rice flour, sorghum flour, buckwheat flour, sweet rice flour, baking powder, xanthan gum, water
name: buckwheat wraps tortillas gluten free

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the tomato juice, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, nonfat chicken broth, garlic, sesame seeds, boneless skinless chicken breasts, egg, soy sauce, lemon, juice of, lime, juice of, caster sugarpreparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the tomato juice, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, nonfat chicken broth, garlic, sesame seeds, boneless skinless chicken breasts, egg, soy sauce, lemon, juice of, lime, juice of, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime, lime
ingredients: tomato juice, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, nonfat chicken broth, garlic, sesame seeds, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: slow cooker chicken sesame

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package. Remove from heat. Remove from
ingredients: bow tie pasta, cooked chicken, frozen peas, cream of chicken soup, low-fat milk, dried rosemary, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: bow ties with chicken and peas

steps: Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a
ingredients: chicken breast, lemon, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, onion, serrano pepper, curry powder, thai red curry paste, salt and pepper, cilantro
name: thai curry chicken breast saute

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together all vegetables and celery seed. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Toss together the vegetables and dressing until thoroughly combined. Taste and correct seasoning. Refrigerate 30 minutes to let flavors blend. Serve.
ingredients: celeriac, lemon, juice of, granny smith apple, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, parsley
name: celeriac coleslaw

steps: In a large skillet, saute pecan rice in 3 tablespoons butter until tender. Drain and set aside. In a saucepan, melt the remaining butter, stir in flour, salt and pepper until smooth. Gradually stir in milk. Bring to a boil, cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Pour over vegetables. Toss to coat. Pour into an ungreased 2 quart baking dish sprinkle with cheese and pecans. Bake, uncovered at 350f for 20-25 minutes, or until heated through.
ingredients: butter, long-grain white rice, chicken broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, pecans, fresh parsley
name: parmesan pecan rice

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place chicken in a single layer in a shallow non-reactive pan. Pour marinade over, cover and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight. To cook, drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken over medium-hot coals and grill 6-7 minutes per side, until internal temperature is 165 degrees fahrenheit. While chicken is grilling, place reserved marinade in a saucepan over medium heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 8 minutes, or until chicken has finished cooking. Spoon sauce over chicken and serve.
ingredients: chicken thighs, dijon mustard, olive oil, balsamic glaze, red pepper, red onions, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh rosemary, artichoke hearts
name: mustard chicken with roasted vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, white chocolate
name: soft and chewy chocolate bites

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Beat butter, egg yolks, vanilla, chocolate squares, powdered sugar, egg whites, mint chocolate chip ice cream on high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, one tablespoonful at a time, while continuing to beat until stiff peaks form. Drop by spoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with crushed peppermint candies. Bake for 20 minutes, or until meringues are firm and their bottoms are very lightly browned. Cool to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, egg yolks, vanilla, chocolate squares, powdered sugar, egg whites, mint chocolate chip ice cream
name: peppermint bon bon

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste.
ingredients: spinach, green onions, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, water, italian seasoning, hot green peppers, salt and black pepper
name: spinach dish

steps: Combine low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube and mix until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings.
ingredients: low-fat strawberry yogurt, cherry powdered drink mix, strawberries, ice cube
name: berrylicious smoothie

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, extra virgin olive oil, flour, chicken broth, lemons, juice of, salt and pepper
name: easy lemon chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil.
ingredients: whipping cream, liqueur, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla extract
name: chocolate fondue l afrique

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: onion, dried thyme, ground coriander, curry powder, pumpkin, potatoes, tomatoes, tomato paste, red lentil, frozen peas
name: shannon s pumpkin lentil and herb curry

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onions width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, sweet onion, egg white
name: just like fried onion rings

steps: Mix 1 stick melted butter and 2 cups graham cracker crumbs, and 2 tablespoons sugar. Press into pan and chill 30 minutes. Combine 2 cups powdered sugar, 2 sticks room temp butter, 2 eggs. Beat 15 mins and spread in a layer on crumb shell. Spread over mixture pineapple, sliced bananas. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with crushed nuts and decorate top with maraschino cherries.
ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, low-fat milk, vanilla, bananas, crushed pineapple, cool whip lite, pecans
name: diabetic banana split pie

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker. Add in the next 6 ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. During the last 15 minutes, stir in the rice. Remove chicken from slow cooker. Place cooked rice on each individual plate. Top with chicken. Spoon any remaining juices over chicken.
ingredients: chicken thighs, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, yellow rice, cream of chicken soup
name: chicken yellow rice

steps: Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the shallot sauce over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley.
ingredients: boneless sirloin steaks, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, shallot
name: sirloin steaks with shallot mustard sauce

steps: In top of double boiler, melt butter, peanut butter and butterscotch chips. Remove from stove and cool until bottom of pan is touchable. Add marshmallows and nuts. Mix together. Place in a buttered pan and refrigerate.
ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, peanut butter, vanilla, crisp rice cereal, peanuts, chocolate chips
name: peanut butter chocolate crispy squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, egg, unsweetened chocolate squares, milk, vanilla, salt, flour
name: chocolate cookies fannie farmer

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 2 loaf pans with non stick coating. In a large bowl, mix flour, splenda, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl mix together the eggs and egg whites, canola oil, and the grated zucchini. Stir the liquid mixture into the flour mixture. The dough will be somewhat thick. Stir until the flour mixture is just moistened. Spread evenly into the loaf pans. Bake 50 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, flour, baking powder, garlic powder, salt, onion, zucchini
name: zucchini puffs

steps: In a large saucepan, combine butter, flour, beef broth, currant jelly, madeira wine, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green onions, green
ingredients: butter, flour, beef broth, currant jelly, madeira wine
name: madeira game sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference.
ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic cloves, gingerroot, dijon mustard, brown sugar, horseradish
name: deep fork cedar plank salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Thinly slice apples and cover the slices with lemon juice, sugar and cinnamon. Beat yolks till creamy and thick. Add potato starch and salt and beat well. Add apple slices and mix to coat slices. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites till they stand in peaks. Fold whites into apple mixture. Coat casserole dish with the oil and place casserole in oven to warm the dish. After a few minutes, pour the apple mixture into the warm dish and bake about 35 minutes until custard is set. Serve immediately. If ramekins are used, they should be baked in a water bath and checked for doneness after about twenty to twenty five minutes.
ingredients: cortland apples, sugar, oil, flour, egg, baking powder, vanilla extract, cinnamon
name: malky s apple kugel

steps: Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until combined. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Bake at 350 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, self rising flour, oleo, milk, coconut, vanilla
name: makes its own crust coconut pie

steps: In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: vanilla ice cream, pistachio pudding mix, butter, milk, oreo cookies, cool whip
name: oreo salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender.
ingredients: vegetable oil, pippin apples, pork chops, fresh sage, dry cider, red currant jelly, creme fraiche, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: pan fried pork chops with glazed apples cider and cream sauce

steps: Combine self rising flour, oats, milk, butter, vanilla, sugar, natural-style peanut butter, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter, peanut butter
ingredients: self rising flour, oats, milk, butter, vanilla, sugar, natural-style peanut butter, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: oatmeal delight

steps: Sprinkle chicken with salt& pepper.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, black pepper, olive oil, sweet onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, italian-style diced tomatoes, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil
name: tomato and balsamic chicken

steps: Drain whiskey. Remove from heat, add peaches, water, honey, ground cloves, ground nutmeg, whiskey and serve warm or cold.
ingredients: peaches, water, honey, ground cloves, ground nutmeg, whiskey
name: peach butter with whiskey

steps: Preheat oven 425 degrees f. Combine all ingredients and knead ten times. Let stand for ten minutes. Put dough on a cookie sheet and roll or press out. Top with toppings. Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges are golden.
ingredients: yeast, brown sugar, warm water, salt, olive oil, flour
name: perfect pizza crust

steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve.
ingredients: spaghetti, virgin olive oil, garlic, hot pepper flakes, salt, chicken broth, flat leaf parsley, romano cheese
name: spaghetti with garlic hot pepper and parsley

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, scallions, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper to taste. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature.
ingredients: small potatoes, garlic cloves, rosemary, parsley, sage, mint, olive oil, lemon, brine, salt and pepper
name: scandinavian potato salad

steps: Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add mushrooms all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes.
ingredients: cauliflower florets, onion, fresh mushrooms, salt, ground black pepper, virgin olive oil, nonstick cooking spray
name: cauliflower with mushrooms and onions

steps: In a saucepan, bring the water to a boil and add the berry. Stir in the lemon zest. Remove from the heat, cover, and let stand for 30 minutes. Return the pan to the heat, bring to a boil, and mix in the lemon zest. Return the pan to the heat, bring to a boil, and mix in the lemon
ingredients: couscous, unsweetened apple juice, currant juice, cinnamon stick, mixed berry, lemon zest, lime zest, mint leaf, low-fat plain yogurt, honey
name: mixed berry couscous

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: fresh parsley, fresh basil, garlic cloves, shallot, butter, shrimp, salt, fresh ground black pepper, white rum
name: buttery garlic garden herb grilled jumbo shrimp

steps: With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, purple onion, capers, frozen peas, curry powder, salt, pepper
name: easter egg salad

steps: Place noodles in saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until noodles are tender. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cut green beans, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, oregano, black pepper, spiral shaped pasta
name: skillet green beans and noodles

steps: Place lime slices in a heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired.
ingredients: lime slices, coarse sugar, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, tequila, frozen limeade concentrate, blue curacao, ice cubes
name: simple blue lagoon margaritas

steps: Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook bacon, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until bacon is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until bacon is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley.
ingredients: shell macaroni, ground chuck, egg, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, parsley flakes, fresh garlic cloves, salt and pepper, spaghetti sauce
name: stuffed shells meat stuffed

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and two sugars until well combined. Beat in vanilla pudding mix. Add eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in vanilla extract. In another small bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just incorporated. Fold in m&ms and white chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon size cookie dough onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, egg, sugar, instant pudding mix, flour, baking powder
name: instant pudding biscuits cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Add the bacon-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, onion, cheese crackers, sugar, salt, sour cream, seasoned croutons, butter
name: scalloped tomato casserole

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and fennel and cook 5 to 6 minutes until golden. Add red onion, celery and chicken. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, sweet potatoes, scallions, garlic clove, pimientos, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, eggs, manchego cheese
name: smoky sweet potato hash with baked eggs and manchego

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Cover your pie crust with foil and press into the shell. Hold the foil down with a layer of dried beans. Bake 6 minutes and remove the foil. Put 1 cup of cheese in the partially baked crust. Spread on half the chilis. Repeat with the remaining cheese and chilis. Beat 4 eggs with the cream and hot pepper sauce and nutmeg. Pour over the chilis and bake for 15 minutes or until puffy and browned.
ingredients: green chilies, eggs, milk, sharp cheddar cheese
name: chile rellenos squares

steps: Add coconut, white sugar, corn syrup, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda, macadamia nuts, butter
ingredients: flaked coconut, white sugar, corn syrup, macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, baking soda
name: coconut brittle

steps: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Whisk eggs and hot sauce in a small bowl. Add to hot skillet and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves. Top with cheese and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves and serve.
ingredients: bread, white bread, butter, tomatoes, ham, vegemite, lettuce leaf, cream cheese spread
name: vegemite triple decker sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: peanut oil, garlic cloves, unsalted peanuts, dried ancho chile powder, cayenne pepper, salt
name: spicy fried chili peanuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: cherries, flour, baking powder, salt, egg, sugar, milk, butter, vanilla
name: cherry time cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Line a round cake pan with waxed paper. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the biscuits. Separate the dough into 10 biscuits, and cut each one into quarters. Place biscuit pieces, a few at a time in the sugar mixture and roll to coat. Arrange in a single layer in the lined pan, and sprinkle top with any remaining sugar mixture. Bake 20 to 25 minutes, until golden brown. Carefully turn upside down onto a serving plate, remove waxed paper and cut into wedges or pull apart.
ingredients: egg, sugar, potato starch, lemons, zest of, lemon juice, vanilla extract, salt, vegetable oil
name: lemon thins

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: dried lentils, water, anaheim chili, white onion, butter, minced ginger, garlic, berbere, black pepper
name: lentils of doom

steps: In a crockpot place the onions, bell pepper on the bottom. Add the sweet potatoes, peas and canned tomatoes, sprinkle with the thyme and the hot sauce, tuck the bay leaf into the juices. Place the leftover pork roast on top and cover with the leftover gravy. Cook on low for about 6 hours, or on high for 3 hours. Just until the flavors are melded and the onions and bell peppers are cooked. Serve with hot crusty bread and a salad. This can be done on top of the stove or baked as a casserole also.
ingredients: kielbasa, baby sweet corn cobs, shrimp, tiny new potatoes, old bay seasoning, seafood cocktail sauce, butter
name: beaufort stew low country boil

steps: Heat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: garlic, asparagus, salt, pepper, shiitake mushroom caps, red onion, cherry tomatoes, red pepper, red wine vinegar, olive oil
name: roasted asparagus shiitake salad

steps: Puree strawberries in food processor, in batches, until smooth. Transfer to a large pitcher. Add undiluted lemonade concentrate and lemon juice stir until combined. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. Serve in tall ice filled glasses and garnish with a strawberry slice.
ingredients: lemon juice, frozen strawberries, honey, water
name: strawberry lemonade

steps: Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from carrot. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat.
ingredients: carrot, turnip, eggs, garlic clove, onion, apple, scallion, yoghurt, dried herbs, salt and pepper
name: turnip apple carrot salad with eggs

steps: Place pork steaks in crock pot. Add onions and cook until they are tender. Place pork and onions in crockpot, and add remaining ingredients. Cook on low until pork is tender, about 8 hours. With a large spoon, stir the mix, breaking the pork into large shreds by pressing the meat cubes against the side of the crockpot.
ingredients: pork steaks, salt, pepper, hominy, chicken broth, onion, garlic cloves, green chili peppers, chili powder, ground cumin
name: crock pot texas pozole mexican pork and hominy soup

steps: Melt butter, sugar, butter, fruit jam, icing and sugar in a large bowl. Add icing and sugar. Bake for 10 minutes or until browned. Remove from oven and let cool for 5 minutes. Place on greased baking trays. Place on greased baking
ingredients: plain flour, caster sugar, butter, fruit jam, icing, cherries
name: empire biscuits a k a cookies to non brits

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: mashed potatoes, onion, skim milk, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, canola oil, vegetable bouillon cube, salt and pepper
name: leftover mashed potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In 12x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars.
ingredients: chocolate frosting, butter, graham cracker crumbs, chocolate chips, graham crackers
name: frosting thumbprint cookies

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: wasabi paste, tamari, vegetable oil, scallions, tuna in water, flour tortillas, baby spinach
name: wassup tuna salad pinwheels

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Place chicken pieces in 13x9-inch baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Arrange onion slices over top. In small saucepan, combine ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and liquid smoke. Heat over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until sugar dissolves. Pour over chicken. Bake chicken 1 hour or until juices run clear. Discard onion slices. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: oven cooking bag, flour, barbecue sauce, orange juice, skinless chicken pieces
name: sunshine barbecue chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion powder, honey mustard, garlic powder, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, brown sugar, olive oil, swiss cheese, hamburger buns
name: missouri burger

steps: Heat oven to 425. Remove chicken from bag and reserve marinade. Arrange chicken in a shallow baking dish coated with cooking spray. Pour reserved marinade over chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 425 for 20 minutes, baste chicken with marinade. Bake an additional 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: chicken thighs, sugar, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, fresh ginger
name: rainbow s shoyu chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel onions and cut in half crosswise. Place onions, cut sides down, in an 8 inch baking dish, drizzle with water. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Combine honey and remaining ingredients. Turn onions over. Brush half of the honey mixture over the onions. Bake, uncovered, an additional 30 minutes or until tender, basting with remaining honey mixture after 15 minutes.
ingredients: baby onions, chicken stock, salt, pepper, brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, parsley
name: italian baby onions

steps: Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, saltpreparation:Beat together margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar
ingredients: margarine, onion, broccoli florets, eggs, cream of broccoli soup mix, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, whole milk, white pepper, salt
name: broccoli two cheese frittata

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the scrubbed potatoes and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the broccoli for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, sunflower oil, panch phoron, garlic cloves, onion, coriander leaves
name: bengali potatoes

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat add olive oil and onions. Cook until tender. Stir in garlic and cook stirring until golden. Stir in mussels, wine and broth and let simmer for 2-5 minutes. Pour into bowls to serve.
ingredients: mussels, tomatoes, red bell pepper, cilantro, balsamic vinegar, butter, white wine
name: mussels in half shells with cilantro and tomato

steps: Heat oil in a frypan over medium heat. Cook shrimp and chicken rice paper rolls for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until rice paper is golden and crispy, and shrimp is tender. Drain on absorbent paper. Sprinkle shrimp with sesame seeds, and serve with steamed asian greens drizzled with oyster sauce and steamed jasmine rice.
ingredients: prawns, chicken, sweet peppers, celery, green onions, mushrooms, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, rice paper
name: shrimp and chicken rice paper rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Prepare pizza doughroll out on lightly floured surface and place on lightly oiled pizza pan. Toss the mushrooms with the 1 tbl of olive oil. Top pizza dough with the mushrooms, garlic and oregano. Drop dollops of ricotta, drizzle with olive oil, kosher salt and fresh ground pepper. Top with fresh basil leaves. Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over basil leaves. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until crust is done and cheese is melted.
ingredients: pasta, portabella mushrooms, cremini mushrooms, fresh basil leaf, garlic, extra virgin olive oil, sherry wine, soy sauce, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: wild mushroom and basil pasta

steps: Mix all ingredients except the white rice, raisins, vanilla, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, ground cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the white rice, raisins, vanilla, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, ground cinnamon
ingredients: cooked white rice, raisins, vanilla, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, sugar, ground cinnamon
name: my best caramel rice pudding

steps: Place pork butt, apple cider, kosher salt, liquid smoke in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours.
ingredients: pork butt, apple cider, kosher salt, liquid smoke
name: kalua pig crock pot

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saut the shallots until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the lettuce, chicken broth. Thyme, and sugar and simmer covered over low heat for about 5 minutes, until the lettuce is tender. Add the peas and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add the lemon zest, salt, and pepper, and serve immediately.
ingredients: lettuce leaves, peas, sugar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter
name: ma leetle petit pois

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, eggs, white cake mix with pudding, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: cheryl s bar cookies from a white cake mix weight watchers 4

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedgepreparation:Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salsa, lime wedgepreparation:
ingredients: fresh parsley, lime zest, dry white wine, pepper, lime juice, chicken breast halves
name: grilled lime chicken

steps: In a blender, puree 2 cans of black beans and set aside. Under medium heat, saut onion and garlic for about five minutes in a medium size pot. Add salt, pepper& splash of dry sherry. Add puree black beans, 2 cans of whole beans, cumin, chili powder, bay leaves, cilantro and more salt and pepper if needed. Lower heat and let simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: rotel tomatoes & chilies, vegetable broth, vegetarian refried beans, black beans, corn, fresh cilantro, corn tortilla strips, monterey jack cheese
name: creamy tortilla soup vegetarian

steps: Melt butter in a 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat. Add brown sugar, allspice and nutmeg and stir until sugar dissolves. Add banana liqueur and bring sauce to simmer. Add bananas and cook for 1 minute on each side, carefully spooning sauce over bananas as they are cooking. Remove bananas from pan to a serving dish. Bring sauce to a simmer and carefully add the rum. If the sauce is very hot, the alcohol will flame on its own. If not, using stick flame, carefully ignite and continue cooking until flame dies out, approximately 1 to 2 minutes. If sauce is too thin, cook for 1 to 2 minutes until it is syrupy in consistency. Immediately spoon the sauce over bananas and serve.
ingredients: bananas, sugar-free maple syrup, fat-free frozen yogurt, fat-free whipped topping
name: easy bananas foster a la mode

steps: Wtih processor running, drop garlic through feed tube and mince. Scrape down sides of work bowl. Add chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice. Process until mixture is smooth. Add roasted peppers. Process until peppers are finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer hummus to small bowl.
ingredients: garlic cloves, salt, chickpeas, fresh lemon juice, tomatoes, fresh parsley, cayenne pepper, olive oil
name: whole grain hummus

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Fill each tortilla with meat, fold in half. Dip the folded tortilla in the beaten egg and fry on a skillet in oil. Brown on both sides. Arrange the tortillas in an oven proof dish. Cover the tortillas with the tomato sauce, garlic, jalapenos and cheese. Season with salt & pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until hot through. Serve with black beans and rice.
ingredients: corn tortillas, olive oil, tomato sauce, chihuahua cheese, red onion, cilantro, salt
name: jen s chilaquiles

steps: Heat water to a boil in a large saucepa. Add asparagus. Cook just until tender, about 5 minutes, depending on size. Drain well, shaking to remove all water. Transfer to a serving bowl. Lightly toss with butter, vinegar, lemon zest, and salt to taste.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, orange juice, orange zest, cornstarch, fresh gingerroot, slivered almonds
name: asparagus with orange ginger sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: light brown sugar, granulated sugar, butter flavor shortening, butter, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: heidi s favorite chocolate chip cookies

steps: Mix sugar, cream cheese and vanilla with mixer until smooth. Spread into a deep pie dish. Spread caramel topping on top, then sprinkle with toffee bits and nuts. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Just before serving, core and cut apples into wedges and arrange around the edge of the pie dish, alternating red and green slices. Just before serving, core and cut apples into wedges and arrange around the edge of the pie dish, alternating
ingredients: cinnamon sugar, lemon wedge, apple cider, caramel ice cream topping, sparkling grape juice, maraschino cherries
name: caramel apple punch

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, cheeses, black pepper, salt, parsley and paprika in shallow bowl. Set aside. Combine butter and garlic in a 9-inch pie pan. Dip 1 chicken breast at a time into butter mixture. Place into breadcrumb mixture, turning to coat evenly. Place chicken breasts into ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Drizzle with any remaining butter mixture. Bake for 25-35 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned and juices run clear when pierced with a fork.
ingredients: chicken breast, butter, pecorino romano cheese, italian style breadcrumbs
name: pecorino romano chicken breast

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: olive oil, butter, onions, salt, black pepper, chicken broth, scotch whisky
name: braised onion slices

steps: Preheat oven to 400c. Take each roll and hollow out a space just big enough for the goat cheese. Brush the insides with the oil and bake for 5 mins until crispy. Spoon the polenta into the rolls and place the cheese on top. Depending on the cheese you use you may have to remove the top and bottom rind. Decorate each roll with a sprig of thyme and cover to roll in foil leaving the cheese exposed. Cook for 15 mins removing the foil for the last 5.
