Carefully break an egg into each roll. Season with black pepper and sprinkle with chives, then cheese. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the eggs are set. Sprinkle with extra chives and serve.
ingredients: egg roll wraps, firm tofu, frozen spinach, fat-free cheddar cheese, onion, white rice, fresh cilantro, fat-free vegetarian refried beans, chipotle peppers
name: low low fat southwestern egg rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season beef with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: beef steaks, onions, mushroom, potatoes, heavy cream, bovril powder, butter, flour
name: polish steak

steps: Cook cheesesteaks according to directions and drain off fat, then add avocado, lime juice, coarse salt, hoagie rolls, tomatoes, steak-ums, chili powder, monterey jack pepper cheese, hot sauce. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes, then serve.
ingredients: avocados, lime juice, coarse salt, hoagie rolls, tomatoes, steak-ums, chili powder, monterey jack pepper cheese, hot sauce
name: tex mex cheesesteaks

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove pork from marinade and pat dry with a paper towel. Mix honey and brown sugar on a plate. Roll pork in honey mixture and then roll in the sesame seeds. Roast in a shallow pan for 20 to 30 minutes or until meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part registers 160 degrees. Suggested to serve over rice.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, molasses, fresh spearmint, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, water, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, hot pepper, vegetable oil
name: asian mint pork tenderloin

steps: Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add parsley, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, red wine vinegar, olive oil. Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add parsley, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, red wine vinegar,
ingredients: parsley, garlic cloves, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, red wine vinegar, olive oil
name: chimichurri argentine parsley garlic sauce for grilled meats

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: olive oil, hot italian sausage, onion, carrots, parsnips, celery ribs, italian seasoning, brown lentils, chicken broth, spinach leaves
name: lentil soup with italian sausage

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Butter 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Alternate adding milk in 2 additions and fold in flour in 3 additions. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipped cream.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, rhubarb
name: special rhubarb cake

steps: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cup water, sugar and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then decrease heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup through sieve placed over large measuring cup, discarding solids. Whisk in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Pour into molds and freeze until solid, for at least 4 hours. If you are using an ice pop kit, follow the manufacturers instructions.
ingredients: superfine sugar, fresh lemon juice, water, strawberry, sparkling water, cracked ice, mint sprig
name: strawberry lemon crush

steps: Combine all ingredients in a 4-quart crockpot. Cover and cook on low-heat for 6-8 hours or high-heat for 4 hours. Add corn and mushrooms, if using about 30 min before serving. I usually sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top of each serving.
ingredients: frozen meatballs, barbecue sauce, maple syrup, pineapple, green pepper, garlic cloves
name: crock pot maple barbecued meatballs

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, green chilies, salt and pepper
name: easy breakfast casserole

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan on medium-high heat. Add onions. Cook 3 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring frequently. Whisk in flour until blended. Add broth and milk. Cook on medium-high heat 2 minutes or until heated through, stirring frequently. Add velveeta and broccoli. Cook and stir 5 minutes or until velveeta is melted and broccoli is heated through.
ingredients: butter, flour, half-and-half cream, velveeta cheese, salt, black pepper, sugar, paprika
name: velveeta cheese sauce for cauliflower and broccoli

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Bake in 350f oven uncovered for 30-35 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of crust with foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or
ingredients: corned beef, baked beans in tomato sauce, onion, mashed potatoes, cheese
name: ellie s corned beef pie

steps: Place the beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute onion in oil for 3 minutes. Add the beans. Saute for 5 minutes or until tender. Add the tomato, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook 1 minute longer or until heated through.
ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, diced tomatoes, black olives, dried oregano, frozen french-cut green beans, feta cheese
name: great greek green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spread the chopped walnuts in an 8 inch square baking pan and bake for 10-12 minutes or until roasted, stirring occasionally. Stir in the coffee liqueur, brown sugar, and vanilla. Set aside. Reduce oven to 325f. Remove the top rind off the brie. Place the brie in a shallow baking dish. Top with the walnut mixture. Bake for about 8-10 minutes or until soft and heated through. Serve immediately with assorted crackers and pear slices.
ingredients: butter, granny smith apple, walnuts, nutmeg, cinnamon, sugar, eggs, water, brie cheese
name: apple walnut and brie omelette for two

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Spray baking tray with non-stick spray. Place asparagus stalks on baking tray. Drizzle with olive oil. Add salt, pepper and garlic powder. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until stalks are tender. Sprinkle on sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, eggs, sesame seeds, asparagus spears, pancetta, vegetable oil, sea salt
name: sesame pancetta wrapped asparagus

steps: Heat oven to 425. Grease 12-inch pizza pan. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Unroll dough and press in pan. In small bowl, combine oil and garlic. Drizzle over dough. In small bowl, combine cheese, oregano and basil. Sprinkle over oil. Bake at 425 for 13 to 16 minutes or until crust is deep golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic clove, dried basil, dried oregano, salt, red pepper flakes, mozzarella cheese, tomatoes
name: broiled tomato and mozzarella cheese fans

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cook chicken and cube. Chop onion and slice tomatoes. Roll pizza crust onto cookie sheet as directed on can. Combine pizza sauce with chipotle and adobo sauce. Spoon pizza sauce onto crust. Top with cheese, onion, chicken and tomatoes. Cook for 15-20 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is completely melted.
ingredients: butter, worcestershire sauce, paprika, chipotle chiles in adobo, dry mustard, garlic, lemon pepper, chicken, water
name: chicken with wild west sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: fresh basil, olive oil, cider vinegar, salt, sugar, pepper, fresh asparagus, tomatoes
name: tomato topped asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour, or until cheese is bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar, and continue to bake until cheese is bubbling and tater tots are all heated through. Remove from oven, top with desired amount of shredded cheddar, and continue to bake until cheese is bubbling
ingredients: frozen tater tots, cooked turkey sausage, cream cheese, half-and-half cream, eggs, paprika, salt, black pepper, colby-monterey jack cheese
name: breakfast tater tot casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool and chop. Stir in butter, milk, salt and pepper. Remove the garlic from the oven, and cut in half. Squeeze the softened cloves into the potatoes. Blend potatoes with an electric mixer until desired consistency is achieved.
ingredients: russet potatoes, fat-free margarine, fresh garlic, nonfat milk, salt, ground black pepper
name: copycat chevys garlic mashed potatoes fat free version

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate
ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, eggs, vanilla, flaked coconut, salt, white bread, butter
name: coconut french toast

steps: In a large container, combine cucumbers and onions. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Pour over cucumber mixture. Mix well. Cover and chill overnight. May be refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: cucumbers, white onions, bell peppers, white vinegar, water, salt, black pepper, garlic powder
name: pickled cucumber slices

steps: Mix ingredients together and pour into small paper cups. Freeze. Place a plastic spoon or popsicle stick in each cup when yogurt mixture is half frozen. To serve, turn cup upside-down and run hot water over it until the popsicle slips out. Keep the cups to use as a holder.
ingredients: fresh blueberries, vanilla yogurt, milk, sugar
name: blueberry popsicles

steps: Combine all ingredients except the meat in a medium bowl. Place the meat in a shallow glass or ceramic dish in one layer. Pour marinade over and turn meat to coat well. Marinate at room temperature for at least 2 hours. Drain meat. Thread on 6 skewers and grill 10 to 12 minutes, turning to cook all sides.
ingredients: lamb loin chops, onion, garlic cloves, ginger, carrots, dark soy sauce, chinese five spice powder, pineapple chunks, mange-touts peas
name: spicy chinese new zealand lamb

steps: Toast the bread in toaster. In a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat, melt the butter. Carefully break egg into the skillet. Fry egg to desired doneness. Spread marmalade over slices of toast. Place one slice bread, marmalade side up, on a dish. Add the egg. Place second slice of bread over the egg, marmalade side down.
ingredients: orange juice, egg, ham slices, cinnamon raisin bread, powdered sugar, orange marmalade
name: grilled breakfast sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add chicken mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: cooked chicken, macaroni, milk, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cheese, onion
name: overnight macaroni casserole

steps: Place pork loin in slow cooker and cook on low for 8 hours. Remove pork from cooker and cook on low for 8 hours. Remove pork
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, dried apricot, orange zest, fresh orange juice, shallot, cider vinegar, mustard powder, salt, fresh ginger, boneless pork loin roast
name: zesty pork roast

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium low and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: shallot, vegetable oil, white mushrooms, dry white wine, heavy cream, fresh thyme, coarse grain mustard, pork chops
name: pork chops in mustard mushroom sauce

steps: Place fettuccine in bowl and toss with some of pan dripping. Add chicken and saute, stirring often. Mix in uncooked spinach. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Heat until spinach is heated through. Place fettuccine in bowl and toss with some of pan dripping.
ingredients: fettuccine, broccoli florets, bell pepper, onion, oil, boneless chicken breast, cream of mushroom soup, water, basil, cheddar cheese
name: fettuccine with pepper sauce

steps: In a large cast iron skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high. Add pumpkin, fresh ricotta, beans, garlic clove, fresh sage, egg, fresh lasagna noodles, light cream, white wine, coarse grain mustard, salt and pepper. Bring to boil, then simmer over very low heat for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season to taste.
ingredients: pumpkin, fresh ricotta, beans, garlic clove, fresh sage, egg, fresh lasagna noodles, light cream, white wine, coarse grain mustard
name: pumpkin bean cannelloni with cream sauce

steps: Wash and dry chicken. Place in slow cooker. Cover. Cook on high 1 hour reduce heat to low, cook 6-7 hours.
ingredients: chicken breast fillets, teriyaki sauce, garlic clove, cooking spray, red onion, chicken stock, udon noodles, snow peas, bean sprouts, red thai chile
name: teriyaki chicken noodles 21 day wonder diet day 20

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with chives, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice
ingredients: eggs, jalapenos, mayonnaise, sour cream, chives, ground cumin, lime juice, salt and pepper, fresh cilantro
name: mexican slowboats deviled eggs

steps: Preheat griddle to just above medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, butter, french bread, eggs, milk, vanilla extract, sour cream, strawberry, kiwi
name: new orleans french toast casserole

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lemon juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken.
ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry white wine, garlic, cream of chicken soup, frozen broccoli, thyme, pepper, linguine
name: quick chicken and veggie saute

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, pineapple
ingredients: pineapple juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, flank steaks
name: grilled pineapple flank steak

steps: Combine cheese, tomatoes, vegetable oil, plain yogurt, dry mustard, mixed herbs, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh herb. Mix well. Pour over tomatoes and celery. Serve.
ingredients: caerphilly cheese, tomatoes, vegetable oil, plain yogurt, dry mustard, mixed herbs, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh herb
name: caerphilly and tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add lemon juice and lemon peel. Mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: milk, vanilla flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, frozen lemonade concentrate, cool whip topping, graham cracker pie crust, lemon
name: creamy lemon pie

steps: In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir hot tea until sugar is dissolved. Add 4 cups cold water and lemon juice. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon.
ingredients: boiling water, of fresh mint, tea bags, fresh lemon juice, sugar, cold water, ice, mint
name: fabulous mint tea

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Combine butter and sugar in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Stir together flour and baking powder in small bowl. Gradually add flour mixture alternately with milk to butter mixture, beating at low speed until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan.
ingredients: plantains, unsalted butter, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract, brown sugar
name: sweet plantains

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: carrots, chicken broth, zucchini, salt, pepper, of fresh mint
name: minted zucchini and carrots

steps: Heat the olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. Place the salmon fillets in the skillet, and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until. Golden, and just cooked through. Transfer salmon onto plates. Add honey glaze to skillet and simmer, stirring, for 1 minute. Pour the honey-soy glaze over the salmon, and serve.
ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, honey, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, dill
name: honey dijon dill salmon marinade

steps: Melt chocolate and set aside. In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours.
ingredients: heavy cream, instant coffee granules, nutella, whipped cream
name: nutella mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake 35 minutes.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, sliced mushrooms, swiss cheese, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, dry sherry, parmesan cheese
name: swiss chicken bake

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: wild rice, old-fashioned oatmeal, dried cherries, salt, milk, brown sugar
name: minnesota breakfast cereal of wild rice and oatmeal

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 2 quart casserole dish. Scrub potatoes, chop into halves or quarters, depending on size of potato. Place in casserole dish. Cut butter into pats. Place randomly around top of potatoes. Sprinkle with parsley. Sprinkle with garlic. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 10 minutes. Stir. Cover. Continue baking at 375 for about an hour, or until the potatoes are tender, stirring a couple more times during baking.
ingredients: small red potatoes, butter, fresh basil, shallots, garlic cloves
name: stove top baby red potatoes with basil shallots and garlic

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip chicken in butter, coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or till tender.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, saltine crackers, parmesan cheese, paprika, pepper, eagle brand condensed milk, butter
name: condensed milk chicken parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Bake for 30 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, flour, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, almond extract, vanilla
name: dos leches cake

steps: Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add cinnamon and mix well. Pour into a 9x13 dish. Put into refrigerator to set. In saucepan, mix juice, flour, butter and eggs. Cook and stir, on med, bring to a boil. Boil for 1 minute. Allow to cool, while jello sets. Mix the cooled cooked mixture with the whipped topping. Spread over the jello.
ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, red cinnamon candies, boiling water, applesauce, salt, lemon juice, nuts, cream cheese, milk, mayonnaise
name: cinnamon swirl salad

steps: In a small heavy saucepan, combine powdered milk, icing sugar, coconut, rice bubbles, sultana, copha, vanilla. Beat the egg whites until stiff. Gradually beat in the sugar until the mixture is thick& light colored. Pour the egg mizture into a punchbowl that is sitting in crushed ice. Blend in the milk and the beaten cream slowly pour in the bourbon& cognac. Fold in the egg whites. Sprinkle the punch with the 2 tbsp of dark rum.
ingredients: powdered milk, icing sugar, coconut, rice bubbles, sultana, copha, vanilla
name: tania s white christmas

steps: In a large skillet, heat the oil and garlic over medium heat. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 7 - 10 minutes. Season with black pepper. Add white wine and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove chicken to a platter. Saute tomatoes in the skillet until tender. Place tomatoes over the chicken and cover with pan drippings.
ingredients: chicken, flour, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, dry white wine, lemon, parsley
name: chicken in white wine poulet scarpariello

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and two sugars until well combined. Beat in vanilla pudding mix. Add eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in vanilla extract. In another small bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just incorporated. Fold in m&ms and white chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon size cookie dough onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until just turning golden brown. Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: shortening, granulated sugar, egg yolks, flour, baking powder, salt, milk, unsweetened kool-aid powdered drink mix
name: kool aid cookies

steps: Pour the hot coffee into a heatproof 10-ounce glass. Add the ice cubes and stir until coffee is chilled. Add the ice cream and top with the whipped cream. Taste and add sugar, if desired. Serve with a long-handled spoon and a straw.
ingredients: strong coffee, orange liqueur, bittersweet hot cocoa, vanilla, miniature marshmallow, whipped cream, orange peel, chocolate syrup
name: soothing orange mocha coffee

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, bocconcini, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaf, country bread, garlic, arugula leaf
name: cherry tomato bocconcini and basil bruschetta

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add mushrooms, butter, onions, red wine, tomato puree, presunto, walnuts, tabasco sauce, thyme, seasoning and cook until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes on medium heat. Add garlic and saute for one minute. Add sliced portobello mushrooms and saute until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes on medium heat. Add sliced portobello mushrooms and saute until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes on
ingredients: small mushrooms, butter, onions, red wine, tomato puree, presunto, walnuts, tabasco sauce, thyme, seasoning
name: cogumelos vila vicosa

steps: In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, garlic, bacon, scallion, milk, sour cream, salt, black pepper
name: bacon scallion mashed potatoes like applebee s

steps: Toss popcorn, nuts, apricots and raisins. Blend corn syrup, brown sugar, vanilla and salt. Pour over popcorn mixture. Bake at 250 for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: granulated sugar, light corn syrup, flavoring, food coloring
name: quick and easy hard candy microwave

steps: Boil eggplants until soft. Saute onion, chopped shrimp, and celery in butter or oil. Combine with eggplant. Put in baking pan and sprinkle with bread crumbs or cracker crumbs. Bake approximately 30 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: eggplant, onion, tomatoes, garlic cloves, vinegar, vegetable oil, salt, pepper
name: baklazhanovaya ikra eggplant aubergine caviar

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix all ingredients except onions and cheese together. Coat 9x11 casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Place the onions in a single layer in the casserole and pour chicken broth mixture evenly over all the onions. Cover onions and bake for 1 hour. After hour, remove and sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven uncovered and bake 5 more minutes or until cheese is melted. Return to oven uncovered
ingredients: onions, water, salt, honey
name: russian cough and sore throat syrup

steps: Whisk together all ingredients in blender until smoothie reaches desired consistency. The blender may need to be jiggled at the beginning as there is no liquid in the bottom.
ingredients: grapefruit juice, orange juice, water, firm bananas, strawberries
name: citrus fruit smoothie

steps: Cream together butter, sugar and honey. Then add flour and baking soda to make dough. Roll the dough into small balls and place on a baking sheet. Use a cookie press or the bottom of a drinking glass dipped in sugar to flatten the dough balls. Pre-heat an oven to 300f. Bake cookies for about 10 minutes. When cookies are light brown, remove from oven and place on a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, baking soda, salt, sour cream, nuts
name: st nikolaas koekjes santa claus cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, orange zest, orange juice, bourbon, flour, butter, salt
name: bourbon sweet potatoes

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: jumbo shrimp, fresh parsley, olive oil, fresh lemon rind, garlic
name: shrimp appetizers

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake tilapia fillets in single layer on foil lined baking sheet with sides. Brush butter mixture over fish. Tuck under any thin edges. Bake at 400 degrees f for 10 minutes per inch of thickness or about 8 minutes until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Place on serving platter. Top with additional salsa if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: salsa verde doritos, chili powder, cumin, chipotle pepper, salt, garlic powder, tilapia fillet, lime, juice of, eggs
name: chipotle and dorito crusted tilapia

steps: Heat 2 tbs oil in small skillet, hold tortilia with tongs, dip one at a time in oil, for ten seconds, or until limp. Line a 10x6x2 inch baking dish with the tortilias. Keep warm. In same skillet add 2tbs oil and cook onion and garlic till tender. Stir in tomatoes, green chillies, and salt. Simmer 10 min. Pour over tortilias. Beat eggs and cook in skillet till set, put on top, and grate cheese on top. Put in oven just long enough for cheese to melt. Serve warm.
ingredients: unsalted butter, dried breadcrumbs, tomatoes, eggs, marjoram, tabasco sauce, heavy cream, bacon, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: farmers market shirred eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, pecans, tabasco sauce, lemon juice, camembert cheese
name: camembert aux noix

steps: In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops.
ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, water, flour, chicken broth, browning sauce
name: pork chops in onion n garlic gravy

steps: In a medium bowl, combine pineapple chunks in juice, peach slices in juice, kiwi, strawberry, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, cool whip lite. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork.
ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, peach slices in juice, kiwi, strawberry, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, cool whip lite
name: fruit salsa parfaits

steps: Heat up a frying pan. When the pan is hot, spoon the mixture in heaped spoonfuls into the pan. Cook in batches for about 3 minutes each side, or until both sides are golden brown. Remove from the pan, and continue cooking in batches.
ingredients: tuna fish, onion, eggs, ground pepper, matzo meal, water, salt, carrots, celery
name: passover tuna gefilte fish

steps: Add all ingredients except milk, water, sour cream, butter, sugar, salt, bread flour, baking soda, chives, active dry yeast. Bake at 350 degrees f. for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: milk, water, sour cream, butter, sugar, salt, bread flour, baking soda, chives, active dry yeast
name: sour cream chive bread bread machine

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a small, heavy saucepan, combine first 4 ingredients. Over medium heat, stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to a boil. Boil 2 minutes. Add pecans and stir until they are coated with the mixture, about 1 minute. Transfer pecans to the cookie sheet, spreading evenly into a single layer. Bake until pecans are just starting to brown, about 13 minutes. Transfer to another cookie sheet that is lined with wax paper. Separate the pecans and cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: unsalted butter, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce, black pepper, kosher salt, cayenne pepper sauce, pecan halves
name: gg s roasted spicy pecans

steps: Wash, dry and slice mushrooms. Cook in butter till tender. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly.
ingredients: butter-flavored cooking spray, sliced mushrooms, onion, garlic, water, salt, ground red pepper, couscous
name: mushroom couscous

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pour
ingredients: chicken wings, dark soy sauce, hoisin sauce, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, rice wine, toasted sesame oil, chili bean paste, sugar
name: chinese barbecued chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: spice cake mix, canned pumpkin, eggs, oil, butterscotch chips, flour
name: pumpkin butterscotch chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly brush both sides of the zucchini with olive oil and place on a foil-lined baking sheet. Mix cheese and herbs together in a small bowl and sprinkle over the zucchini. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Bake for 15 minutes and place under the broiler for the last 3-5 minutes, until cheese is crispy and browned.
ingredients: zucchini, tomatoes, red onion, olive oil, garlic powder, salt and pepper, dried basil, parmesan cheese
name: zucchini onions tomatoes with parmesan cheese

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and saut 1 minute. Add lemon juice, lemon herb seasoning, salt and pepper. Stir to coat shrimp. Saut until shrimp are bright pink and cooked through, about 3 minutes more. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Yields about 3 ounces of shrimp per serving.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, cajun seasoning, salt, black pepper, tilapia fillets, olive oil, lemon wedge
name: weight watchers cajun fish 4 points

steps: Cook tuna until tender but not brown. Add mayonnaise, garlic, tarragon, garlic, mayonnaise, tuna steaks. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, basil, thyme, tarragon, garlic, mayonnaise, tuna steaks
name: grilled tuna with aioli

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place pizza dough on a lightly greased pizza pan and press out to 12 inches. Evenly distribute alfredo sauce. Evenly distribute crab meat. Evenly distribute cheddar and motzarella cheeses. Top with the old bay seasoning, onions, bacon and mushrooms. Bake on the lowest rack for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: pasta, butter, onion, garlic cloves, dry white wine, salt & pepper, flour, milk, crabmeat
name: crab pasta in a creamy garlic white wine sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on wire rack.
ingredients: spice cake mix, egg whites, quick-cooking oats, vegetable oil, raisins
name: easy oatmeal raisin cookies

steps: Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice.
ingredients: garlic, shallots, white wine, sherry wine, black beans, chicken broth, chili powder, cilantro, salt and pepper
name: mexican black bean sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter, shredded hash brown potatoes, sausage links, onion, green pepper, eggs, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving.
ingredients: butter, shredded hash brown potatoes, sausage links, onion, green pepper, eggs, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese
name: camper s breakfast hash

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, macadamia nuts, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, whole wheat bread, butter, powdered sugar. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: bananas, eggs, macadamia nuts, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, whole wheat bread, butter, powdered sugar
name: macadamia banana french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, self-rising flour, applesauce, pam cooking spray
name: low calorie tata cake

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Bake for
ingredients: tomatoes, salt, pepper, scallions, parsley, prepared mustard, vinegar, sugar, sour cream
name: swedish tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. Bake in pre
ingredients: brown sugar, bananas, whole wheat flour, ground flax seeds, salt, eggs, oil, baking soda, walnuts
name: healthier banana bread lower fat flax ww flour less sugar

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: beer, bratwursts, thousand island dressing, buns, swiss cheese, sauerkraut
name: reuben brats

steps: Mix soy sauce with brown sugar, pepper and olive oil, pour into shallow pan. Put steak into sauce and spoon a little sauce over top. Marinate 30 minutes and turn several times. Heat a large heavy skillet. Add butter and when very hot, add the steak to skillet. Cook over high heat until charred on other side. Serve immediately on a well heated platter.
ingredients: porterhouse steaks, soy sauce, brown sugar, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, butter
name: porterhouse steak for one or two

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy pot. Add onion and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add cauliflower and stir to coat with the curry paste. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums.
ingredients: olive oil, green onion, garlic cloves, curry, ground cumin, head cauliflower, diced tomato, cooked lentils, paprika
name: buddha s happy belly curried lentils cauliflower and tomatoes

steps: In a large skillet, saute butter, white vinegar, tabasco sauce, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, salt, raw cashews. Add cashews, and cook 3-5 minutes or until browned. Remove cashews, and drain on paper towels. Place in a bowl. Combine salt, cayenne, and chili powder in a small bowl. Sprinkle over warm cashews, tossing to coat.
ingredients: unsalted butter, white vinegar, tabasco sauce, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, salt, raw cashews
name: cajun cashews

steps: In electric skillet set at 300 degrees, cook butter, sugar, dates and egg until gooey and thickened. About 7-10 min. Add pecans and vanilla. Then add rice krispies. Mix well. Cool until slightly warm. Form into balls & roll in powdered sugar. Makes 50-60 small balls.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, light corn syrup, dates, nuts, vanilla
name: date candy ii

steps: In a large pot of salted boiling water, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: garlic cloves, thai chiles, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, southeast asian fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar, black pepper, fresh basil
name: chicken holy basil

steps: Heat oil in skillet. Preheat oven 375. Sprinkle salt and pepper on cube steaks. Coat cube steaks with flour. Cook cube steaks in skillet until both sides are brown. Transfer to baking dish. Cook onion in skillet that you used for cube steaks until tender. Place onion on the cube steaks. Mix beef stew seasoning with 2 cups hot water or hot beef broth. Pour over cube steak. Add the other 2 cups of water to the pan until cube steaks are just covered. Cover pan with aluminum foil and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: cube steaks, salt and pepper, rice, beef broth, consomme, water
name: cubed steak and rice

steps: Preheat oven to 425f degrees. Heat the oil and butter in large roasting dish. Remove outer skins off the onions but keep them whole. Add the onions to the dish and toss them in the oil and butter mixture over a medium heat until lightly sauteed. Add the thyme and seasoning and roast for 45-50 minutes, basting regularly.
ingredients: unsalted butter, olive oil, onions, dry white wine, honey, thyme
name: onions and thyme

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: flour, milk, egg, baking powder, salt
name: fried chicken livers iii

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, green beans, onion, chicken stock
name: romano beans

steps: Put the red radishes in a bowl. Add the sesame oil, butter, prepared horseradish, worcestershire sauce, red radishes, green onion, salt, cayenne. Mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, butter,
ingredients: neufchatel cheese, butter, prepared horseradish, worcestershire sauce, red radishes, green onion, salt
name: red radish cheese spread

steps: Heat oven to 375. Mix breadcrumbs, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, picante sauce. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
ingredients: buttermilk, taco seasoning mix, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, pepper, chicken, butter
name: spicy picnic chicken

steps: Heat oil in frying pan and add fish cooking about 2 minutes on each side, depending on thickness, over medium-high heat,. Season with salt and pepper during cooking. Serve with lemon juice.
ingredients: egg, milk, flour, cayenne pepper, parmesan cheese, pollock fillets, corn flakes
name: spicy fried pollock

steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, salt, egg, plain yogurt, raisins
name: yoghurt raisin bread

steps: Add all ingredients except flour to your bread machine in the order listed. Use dough cycle only. Remove dough from bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with cornmeal. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
ingredients: bread flour, salt, active dry yeast, warm water
name: failproof french bread bread machine

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium-high heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. Remove cover, add garlic, green chiles and broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for 30 minutes. Stir in salsa. Remove from heat. Gently fold in cubed cheddar cheese. Serve immediately over beds of rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, onion, garlic, salt, black pepper, french rolls
name: chicken and pepper sandwich

steps: Cook seafood linguine according to package directions. Meanwhile, combine crabmeat, linguine, garlic, dried oregano, butter, tomatoes, whipping cream, green onion, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan
ingredients: imitation crabmeat, linguine, garlic, dried oregano, butter, tomatoes, whipping cream, green onion, swiss cheese, parmesan cheese
name: seafood linguine

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, romaine lettuce, artichoke heart, red onion, pimiento, olive oil, red wine vinegar, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese
name: pasta house salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the braised pork loin chops and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the braised pork loin chops well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork sausage links, olive oil, shallots, chicken stock, red wine, parmesan cheese, butter, parsley
name: sausages braised in white wine

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Peel the potatoes if the skin is too tough, otherwise just scrub and rinse them. Cut the potatoes into thin slices. Put the potatoes in a baking dish. Slightly fan out the slices. Drizzle the potatoes with melted butter and sprinkle with herbs and salt. Bake the potatoes for about 50 minutes. Remove the potatoes from the oven, sprinkle with parmesan and cheddar cheese. Bake the potatoes for another 10-15 minutes. Bake the potatoes for
ingredients: potatoes, salt, butter, fresh herbs, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese
name: microwave sliced baked potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix up with an electric mixer. Add the liquids and mix smooth. Place 2 tablespoons of batter in the bottom of each of the greased muffin cups. Add 1 tablespoon of crunchy style peanut butter. Add the remaining bit of batter and bake for approx. 25 minutes or until a tooth pick comes out clean.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, eggs, buttermilk, baking soda, cornmeal, gluten-free flour, xanthan gum, salt
name: gluten free buttermilk cornbread muffins from the baking beautie

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add chicken broth, quinoa, canola oil, onion, jalapeno, smoked paprika, chile powder, swiss chard, garbanzo beans, fresh lime juice. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add chicken broth, quinoa, canola oil, onion, jalapeno, smoked paprika, chile powder, swiss chard, garbanzo beans, fresh
ingredients: chicken broth, quinoa, canola oil, onion, jalapeno, smoked paprika, chile powder, swiss chard, garbanzo beans, fresh lime juice
name: spicy swiss chard

steps: With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, celery top, vidalia onion, celery seed, black pepper, garlic salt, dried mustard, champagne vinegar
name: jenn s egg salad

steps: In large saucepan, combine sugar& corn syrup. Stir. Occasionally, bring to a boil over medium heat. And boil 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in peanut butter until smooth. Pour over cereal, stir to coat well. Press evenly into 9 inch square pan coated. With shortening or cooking spray. Cool completely. Invert pan on cutting board. And cut into bars.
ingredients: sugar, corn syrup, smooth peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips
name: chocolate covered peanut butter krispies

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion. Cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until onion has softened. Add anchovies and rosemary. Stir to combine, then cover, reduce heat to low and cook for 20 minutes or until onion and garlic are very soft. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Preheat grill to high. Split baguette in half lengthways and cut widthways into 8cm pieces. Toast under grill until golden brown. Top with garlic and onion and serve.
ingredients: garlic, duck fat, quatre-epices, black pepper
name: ail ou echalotes confits garlic or shallot confit

steps: In a mixing bowl, using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until well blended. Add ketchup, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce and beat again until well incorporated. Add onions and mix well using a fork. Adjust tabasco sauce to taste. Divide mixture equally into 2 serving bowls. Add crab to one bowl and mix well using a fork. Add shrimp to the other bowl and mix well using a fork. Serve with potato chips or vegetable crackers. Refrigerate any unused portions.
ingredients: crabmeat, garlic, pickled jalapeno pepper, jalapeno jack cheese, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, mayonnaise, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: hot jalapeno crab dip

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 30 seconds or until onion softens. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until onion softens. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: napa cabbage, kosher salt, sesame seeds, sambal oelek, fresh garlic, dark sesame oil
name: shang kimchi summer or raw kimchi

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Mix in pineapple sections with the juice. Add the sherbet icecream by spoonfuls. Stir until melted. Pour into serving size dessert cups. Chill well.
ingredients: lemon gelatin, boiling water, crushed pineapple, orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges
name: tropical sunshine gelatin salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: bananas, white sugar, egg, baking soda, baking powder, all-purpose flour, butter, salt, nuts, chocolate chips
name: easy banana muffins

steps: In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: fresh green beans, bacon, shallot, garlic, flour, chicken stock, salt, pepper, cooking sherry
name: bacon smothered green beans

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add beef. Stir-fry green onions and ginger 1 minute. Stir-fry 4 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: brown sugar, ketchup, spicy brown mustard, teriyaki sauce, worcestershire sauce, water, liver, oil, onion
name: beef liver and onions marinated

steps: Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastrypreparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream,
ingredients: au gratin potatoes, boiling water, frozen peas and carrots, cooked ham, condensed cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces, milk, sour cream, diced pimentos, pie pastry
name: au gratin ham pot pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring constantly until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Cover with remaining potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned.
ingredients: butter, onions, eggs, salt, paprika, flour, milk, pepper, cracker crumb
name: eggs fairlee

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: frozen spinach, cream cheese, monterey jack cheese, green onion, garlic cloves, white corn tortillas, green enchilada sauce, sour cream, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: spinach and cream cheese enchiladas

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, mustard seeds, red wine vinegar, sugar, red onion, green beans
name: green beans with red onion and mustard vinaigrette

steps: Place chocolate chips, egg and vanilla in blender and blend for 30 seconds. Remove center of blender lid and while machine is running, slowly pour heated cream into the chocolate mixture. Blend until well mixed and chocolate chips are melted. Pour into parfait or wine glasses and refrigerate until set. Can serve with a garnish of sweetened whipped cream.
ingredients: cream cheese, caster sugar, cream, eggs, boiling water, dark chocolate, chocolate, brandy
name: toblerone chocolate mousse

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons
ingredients: milk, bittersweet chocolate, instant coffee powder, ground nutmeg, orange rind
name: classic spanish hot chocolate drink

steps: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, over medium high heat. Add the cinnamon stick, cardamom and cloves. Saute until the spices are aromatic, about 1 minute, then scoop out with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the rice to the pan and cook, stirring until the rice is evenly coated in oil, and beginning to toast, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the water, sugar, salt and saffron to the pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, then reduce heat to medium low, partially cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes. Fully cover the pan and simmer for about 10 minutes longer, until water is completely absorbed. Take pan off heat and let stand 5 minutes without removing lid. Fluff with a fork and stir in the pistachios just before serving.
ingredients: butter, basmati rice, turmeric, bay leaf, green cardamom pods, cloves, fennel seed, salt, boiling water
name: easy pilau rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f and grease a large baking tin, approximately 9 x 12 inches. Melt the butter or margarine over low heat in a small saucepan. Add the flour and stir until smooth. Add the vanilla, sugar and eggs and stir constantly for 5 or so minute. Remove from heat and stir in nuts. Set aside. Mix brownie ingredients together in a large bowl. Spread into baking pan. Spread topping over. Bake for 35-40 minute be careful not to overbake. Cool and cut into bars.
ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, corn syrup, kahlua, vanilla extract, eggs, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, deep dish pie shell
name: pecan pie with kahlua and chocolate chips

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, egg noodles, smoked sausage, margarine
name: tomato and smoked sausage casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Mix cornflakes, pecans, sugar, salt, onion powder, black pepper, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 400e toss chicken legs with egg to coat. Combine cornflakes, pecans, sugar, salt, onion powder and pepper in large resealable plastic food storage bag. Add chicken legs two at a time. Shake to coat. Place chicken on foil-lined baking sheet. Drizzle with melted butter. Bake 40 to 45 minutes or until tender.
ingredients: pecans, corn flake crumbs, honey, soy sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: honey pecan chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until softened and starting to brown, about 10 minutes. In food processor combine sour cream, cream cheese, onion mixture, parsley, salt and pepper. Refrigerate for at least one hour. Serve with chips, pita or vegetables.
ingredients: vegetable oil, tomato paste, paprika, ground cumin, sugar, salt, garlic paste, red onion, cilantro
name: restaurant style onion chutney

steps: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, green onion and the onion. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, salt and pepper. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired. Serve on lettuce leaves.
ingredients: wonton wrappers, cucumber, tomatoes, orange, rice vinegar, olive oil, sugar
name: wonton cold salad

steps: Fry the bacon in a large cast-iron skillet until crisp, then drain on paper towels, leaving the fat in the pan. Add the onion and cook until golden and tender, then add the flour and stir, cooking for about 1 minute. Add the sugar, salt, pepper, bean liquid or water, and vinegar, stir, and bring to a rolling boil. Allow to boil for about 3 minutes to thicken the sauce. Add the bacon bits at this time. Add the green beans and cook until heated through, about 7--8 minutes. Transfer the beans and sauce to a serving bowl and top with crumbled bacon.
ingredients: bacon, onion, frozen green beans, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper
name: green beans and bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Butter six muffin cups. In a small saucepan, melt the butter and add the syrup. Remove the crusts from the bread. Flatten each slice with a rolling pin. Brush both sides of each slice with the syrup mixture. Put one slice into each cup and sprinkle the bacon pieces in the cups. Break an egg into each cup and bake until the eggs are set. Start checking after about 5 minutes. Lift the toast cups from the pan and serve immediately, drizzled with additional syrup, if desired.
ingredients: canadian bacon, eggs, cherry tomatoes, crouton, cheddar cheese, parsley
name: bacon egg and cheddar cups ww

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix sugar, cinnamon, paprika, cayenne pepper, egg whites, pecan halves, butter, brown sugar, vanilla extract, salt, pecanspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix
ingredients: pecan halves, butter, brown sugar, vanilla extract, salt
name: brown sugared pecans

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line cookie sheet with foil. Place 40 crackers in one layer on cookie sheet. In saucepan on low heat, combine butter and brown sugar. Heat until blended. Boil 3 minutes. Pour mixture evenly over crackers. Sprinkle cracker centers with chocolate chips. Place in oven until chips melt. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cut while warm. Store on wax paper.
ingredients: flax seed, water, quinoa, sea salt, olive oil, baking powder
name: flax quinoa crackers gluten free

steps: Prehat oven to 400 degrees. Grease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients and mix well. Pour batter in baking pan and bake for 45 minutes. The resulting cornbread should be the consistency of spoon bread and very moist.
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, onion, mexican blend cheese, creamed corn, sour cream, eggs, green chilies, oil, jalapeno peppers
name: moist mexican cornbread

steps: Put butter, sugar, jelly crystals, sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, salt in a small bowl and mix well. Bake at 350 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: butter, jelly crystals, sugar, egg, flour, baking powder
name: jelly crystal biscuits cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all of the dry ingredients together. Mix all of the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: vegan margarine, caster sugar, vanilla essence, egg, plain flour, carob powder
name: carob pinwheels

steps: Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, pie crusts, pecan halves, eggs, light brown sugar, salt, dark corn syrup, lightly sweetened whipped cream
name: bittersweet chocolate pecan pie

steps: Place the tofu on a plate and pat dry with kitchen paper. Slice into 1cm thick slices. Heat the tofu in a non stick frying pan, once oil is hot add the tofu and cook over a medium heat for 5-8minutes either side or until tofu is golden brown. Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, 5 spice powder and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and toss. In the warm tofu. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Serve with steamed tender stem broccoli or stir fried vegetables.
ingredients: tofu, vegetable oil, dark sesame oil, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar
name: tofu bites

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olives and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid is thickened and coats olives, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in lemon slices. Transfer to a shallow dish and marinate, chilled, at least 24 hours. These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: green olives, tomato juice, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, dried basil, oregano leaves
name: red hot green olives

steps: Place the pepper in a bowl with ice water to cover. Let stand for 30 minutes, then drain well in a colander and blot dry with a paper towel. Combine the vinegar and salt in a bowl and stir or whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the onion, tomato, pepper, cayenne, oil, and cilantro and gently toss to mix. Correct the seasoning, adding salt, vinegar, or cayenne. The relish should be highly seasoned. The relish is good now. It will be amazing if you let it stand to ripen for a few hours before serving. Serve the relish the same day you make it. 2 cups is enough to serve 4 to 6.
ingredients: red peppers, green peppers, onions, sugar, salt, celery seed, vinegar, mustard seeds
name: mom barbaras pepper relish

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Lightly spray one side of the foil sheets with non-stick cooking spray. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl, stir to coat. Transfer ingredients to the sprayed side of one sheet of foil, place the other sheet of foil, sprayed side down, on top of the veggies and create a packet by folding and crimping edges tightly to seal. Place packet on the grill and cover with grill lid. Cook about 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender, be sure to turn packet over about halfway through cooking.
ingredients: bell peppers, red onion, mushrooms, broccoli spears, italian salad dressing
name: marinated grilled veggie kebabs

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Whisk together all ingredients in a large bowl. Whisk together all ingredients in a large
ingredients: bacon, onion, green peppers, coleslaw mix, chili powder, salt and pepper, rotel tomatoes & chilies
name: wilted cole slaw

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: penne, tomatoes with onion and garlic, fresh basil, whipping cream, parmesan cheese
name: pasta in tomato cream sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve.
ingredients: chicken breasts, orange juice, honey, dry sherry, lemon juice, fresh herbs, salt
name: chicken with orange juice and fresh herbs

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: ground sausage, mustard powder, salt, eggs, milk, white bread, mild cheddar cheese
name: christmas breakfast sausage casserole

steps: Place balls on cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes.
ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, green onion, black pepper, bacon bits, pimento strips
name: cheesy football

steps: Mix seasonings in small bowl. Coat pork evenly with the rub. Refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 3 hours for extra flavor. Grill over medium heat 25 to 30 minutes or until desired doneness, turning occasionally. Let pork stand 5 minutes before cutting into thin slices. Test kitchen.
ingredients: brown sugar, garlic powder, chili powder, black pepper, dried oregano, salt, pork tenderloin
name: grilled pork tenderloin with texas rub

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine butter, baking potatoes, parmesan cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: butter, baking potatoes, parmesan cheese, seasoning salt, pepper, dried parsley flakes
name: microwave parmesan potatoes

steps: In a small saucepan on high heat, bring the water to a boil. Add the ginger and cayenne pepper and reduce heat. Simmer for 20 minutes and strain. Add sweetener to taste. Drink and be healthy.
ingredients: cold water, ground coffee, sugar, ground ginger
name: qishr yemeni ginger coffee

steps: Mix cereal, pretzels and peanuts. Heat oleo, sugar and honey in saucepan, boil, stir and cook 5 minutes. Add vanilla. Pour cooked mixture over dry ingredients and stir. Bake at 250 for 1 hour stirring every 15 minutes.
ingredients: popped popcorn, miniature shredded wheat cereal, cheerios toasted oat cereal, salted peanuts, butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, vanilla
name: scrabble

steps: In 4-quart crock pot, place frozen meatballs and frozen vegetables. In a bowl, stir together tomatoes, gravy, water and seasonings. Pour over meatballs & vegetables. Cover and cook on low-heat for 6-8 hours or high-heat for 4 hours. Add corn and mushrooms, if using about 30 min before serving. I usually sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top of each serving.
ingredients: meatballs, jellied cranberry sauce, pineapple chunks, brown sugar, chipotle chile
name: crock pot frozen meatballs cranberry chipotle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, rolled oats, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips
name: ultimate oatmeal chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat contact grill for 5 minutes. Remove chops and pat dry. In a small container, thoroughly mix the seasonings together. Drizzle half the oil over the chops, sprinkle with half the seasoning mix. Turn chops over and repeat with oil and remaining seasoning mix. Place on heated grill and cook until meat thermometer inserted in center reads 160 degrees. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, pork loin chops, chicken stock, sugar, wine vinegar, garlic, pepper
name: simple sweet and sour chops
