steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet. Add garlic and saut for 2 minutes. Add drained tomatoes, basil, oregano, chili flakes and salt. Bring to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring frequently and breaking up the tomatoes as they cook. In a medium bowl, toss artichoke quarters, rice and feta together. Pour into a medium oiled casserole dish when tomato sauce is ready, pour over the rice mixture, shaking the dish so the tomato sauce settles. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 20 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, long grain brown rice, chicken stock, salt, feta cheese, of fresh mint, orange zest
name: feta and mint rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt. Add in the oats and raisins. Mix well. Add molasses, sugar, jam, and shortening to the egg. Blend mixture well. Gradually add flour mixture. Drop by tablespoonfuls 3 inches apart onto baking sheet. Bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: oatmeal, carob powder, brown sugar, sea salt, soymilk, blueberries
name: blueberry carob oatmeal

steps: Whisk all vinaigrette ingredients in a small jug. Snap woody ends from asparagus and place in a steamer for 4-5 minutes until they are crisp tender. Then plunge them into ice cold water to stop cooking process. Drain onto small towel and pat dry. Serve as an appetiser, using chives sprinkled on top as a garnish. Drizzle vinaigrette over top.
ingredients: asparagus, balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil, poppy seed
name: asparagus salad with honey poppy seed vinaigrette

steps: In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch tomatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer tomatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter tomatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree tomatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, vegetable stock, stewed tomatoes, maple syrup, pumpkin, white pepper, salt
name: cream of tomato pumpkin soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, bicarbonate of soda, rolled oats, salt, sugar, butter, rice milk
name: yeast free wholemeal bread

steps: Mix brown sugar, soy sauce, barbecue sauce, fresh garlic cloves, green onion, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, wooden skewerpreparation:Slice the chicken breasts in half or into thirds or whatever size you desire to thread on the skewers. In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken strips on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat.
ingredients: boneless chicken, soy sauce, mirin, sake, white sugar, honey, garlic, ginger
name: yakitori chicken skewers

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. In a food processor, combine flour, butter, baking powder, salt and pepper with as much flour as will fit. Pulse, adding the rest of the flour in batches, until all is coarsely chopped. Bake until bubbling, 25-30 minutes. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden, 15-20 minutes more. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden
ingredients: flour, butter, baking powder, salt
name: caribbean dumplings spinners and sinkers

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, chicken bouillon cubes, frozen broccoli florets, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, mild cheddar cheese
name: bring a dish chicken casserole

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Sprinkle with crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, unsalted butter, cooked ham, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, eggs, dried onion flakes, pepper, paprika
name: cheese cheese macaroni and cheese and ham and cheese

steps: Combine all ingredients except vanilla in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla and beat with fork or beaters until thickened. Add
ingredients: sugar, water, egg whites, light corn syrup, salt, vanilla
name: fluffy 7 minute frosting

steps: In a small bowl combine all of the marinade ingredients. Put the steak in a plasic bag. Pour in the marinade. Close the bag and place in a shallow baking pan. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight. Preheat the broiler. Remove steak from bag and discard marinade. Place on broiling pan. Broil for 5-7 minutes on each side.
ingredients: fresh lime juice, fish sauce, hoisin sauce, asian chili sauce, fresh ginger, lime zest, sirloin steaks
name: ginger lime sirloin

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: vegetable oil, shallots, garlic clove, large shrimp, fresh lemongrass, white mushrooms, fish sauce, sugar, salt
name: warm lemongrass shrimp

steps: Place the yogurt, garlic cloves, sea salt, greek yogurt, tahini paste, lemon, ground cumin, olive oil, pita breads in a large bowl. Add the yogurt, garlic cloves, sea salt, greek yogurt, tahini paste, lemon, ground cumin, olive oil, pita breads and mix well. Add the
ingredients: garlic cloves, sea salt, greek yogurt, tahini paste, lemon, ground cumin, olive oil, pita breads
name: cumin tahini yogurt dip

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: yellow tomatoes, light olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh basil, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, sugar
name: yellow tomato pasta sauce

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the butter and saute until the butter is melted. Add the oil and saute until the butter is melted. Add the butter and
ingredients: carrots, sugar, nonfat dry milk powder, unsalted butter, cardamom seed, blanched almond, cashews
name: carrot burfi

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Remove from skillet, using a slotted spoon so as to save liquid in the skillet. Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Return meat to skillet along with tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic clove, tomato soup, water, worcestershire sauce, salt, medium pasta shells, cheddar cheese
name: skillet beef and shells

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh linguine, blackening seasoning, extra virgin olive oil, green onion, light cream, sun-dried tomato, garlic, chicken broth, parmesan cheese
name: light er cajun chicken alfredo

steps: Place salmon skin side down on grill for 15-20 minutes. You may also broil salmon or chicken for 20-30 minutes. Place salmon skin side down on grill for 15-20 minutes. Place salmon skin side down
ingredients: pure maple syrup, grainy mustard, salmon fillets, lemons, cedar planks
name: maple planked salmon with grilled lemon

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 13 x 9 baking dish. Spread pineapple with juice evenly in dish. Spread banana pie filling over pineapple. Sprinkle dry cake mix over cherries, then spread pecans over cake mix. Cut margarine into thin slices and place over pecans. Bake for 50 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, water, pineapple juice, banana, crushed pineapple, lemon juice
name: pineapple banana cake filling

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: fusilli, alfredo sauce, spinach, bell pepper, parmesan cheese, white wine
name: florentine pasta bake

steps: Spread peanut butter evenly onto one side of each slice of bread snd drizzle honey over the peanut butter. Cut each banana in half lengthwise and then cut in half crosswise. Arrange 2 banana pieces on 4 of the prepared bread slices. Top with remaining bread slices, peanut butter-sides down. In a shallow bowl combine eggs, milk, and cinnamon. Carefully dip sandwiches into egg mixture, coating both sides. Melt butter in a large skillet or on a large griddle over medium-low heat. Cook sandwiches in hot butter about 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan heat fruit preserves over medium-low heat until melted, stirring frequently. To serve, cut warm sandwiches in half crosswise. Drizzle with warm fruit preserves.
ingredients: bread, jelly, peanut butter, banana, butter
name: grilled peanut butter and jelly and banana sandwich

steps: Cook broccoli until tender in the amount of water called for on the package, drain. Mix together soup mix, cream cheese, sour cream and water chestnuts. Add drained broccoli and stir well. Place in lightly buttered casserole dish and top with grated cheese and cracker crums. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until hot throughout and bubbly.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, mayonnaise, velveeta cheese, ritz cracker
name: ritzy broccoli casserole

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook macaroni according to package directions. Cook onion in vegetable oil. Add in ground beef and cook until meat is browned. Stir in tomatoes, macaroni, and spices. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer, stirring often for 10min. Uncover and boil if not thick enough.
ingredients: tomato juice, water, onion, macaroni, salt and pepper
name: affordable basic restaurant style tomato and macaroni soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut turkey into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: chicken stuffing mix, bread, cooked turkey breast, turkey gravy
name: hot roasted turkey mountain

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: swiss chard, onion, garlic cloves, navy beans, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: traditional swiss chard and beans from vegweb com

steps: Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: quick-cooking grits, water, butter, velveeta cheese, pickled jalapeno pepper, eggs, milk, salt, black pepper, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: jalapeno cheese grits

steps: Mix all ingredients in a large bowl. Pour dressing over the salad and serve.
ingredients: red onion, oranges, salt, oregano, vegetable oil, orange juice, lemon juice, black olives, black pepper, lettuce leaf
name: onion and orange salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Grease cookie sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a small bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together cinnamon, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, flour, baking soda, nuts, cinnamon, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, shortening, eggs, lemon
ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, shortening, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla, flour, baking soda, nuts, cinnamon
name: cinnamon swirl cookies

steps: Rinse & dry fish well. Cut lemon in half and squeeze, rubbing juice into fish, inside & out refrigerate for about an hour then rub with vegetable oil and place in a shallow baking dish. In a blender, mix thoroughly soy sauce, corn oil, white wine, garlic, sugar and ginger. Pour over fish. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes until the fish flakes easily and juices are opaque. Baste frequently with sauce. Garnish & serve.
ingredients: red snapper, fresh ginger, green onions, sherry wine, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil
name: steamed fish with ginger and onions

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: fritos corn chips, onion, chili, american cheese
name: frito chili casserole

steps: Cook 8 oz feta pasta until al dente. In a pan over medium heat, soften 2 tsp minced garlic in 2 tbsp olive oil. Add 4 oz sliced roasted red peppers and 6 oz baby spinach. Cook until spinach wilts. Add pasta to skillet, sprinkle with 4 oz fat-free feta, and toss.
ingredients: pumpkin seeds, garlic cloves, dried chipotle powder, salt, cilantro leaf, lime juice, olive oil, lime zest, feta cheese, farfalle pasta
name: farfalle with feta and chipotle

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, milk, vanilla flavoring, pecans. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares.
ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, peanut butter, vanilla flavoring, pecans
name: easiest chocolate peanut butter fudge

steps: In a large saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas, scallions, salt and pepper. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later.
ingredients: low-fat chicken broth, splenda sugar substitute, egg whites, fresh spinach, green onions
name: low fat egg drop soup my way

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place mvc s bbq sauce on a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: ground pork, red potatoes, yellow onion, greek yogurt, hidden valley original ranch dips mix, black pepper, frozen corn, frozen peas, fresh spinach, frozen pizza dough
name: mvc s bbq sauce

steps: In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add curry, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork and add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: butter, onion, dried currant, dried apricot, salt, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, cinnamon sticks, israeli couscous, fresh cilantro
name: fruited israeli couscous

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat oil briefly, and add garlic. Saute 15 seconds, being careful not to let it brown. Add pureed tomatoes, oregano, salt, pepper, onion, garlic, oregano, thyme, red wine. Bring sauce to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Makes 13 servings.
ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, onion, garlic, tomato paste, dry oregano, cabernet sauvignon wine, salt, ground black pepper
name: mediterranean sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375-400f. Remove fibrous end pieces of the asparagus. Lay asparagus across shallow baking dish and add oil, salt, lemon juice, and pepper. Roll and toss to coat well. Arrange the oiled asparagus in the pan so they do not overlap. Bake in oven 20 minutes.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, olive oil, sugar, white balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes
name: easy marinated asparagus

steps: Heat oil in large pan, add bacon, onion and garlic, cook, stirring until onion is soft. Add vegetables and cook, stirring, about 5 mins or until any liquid is evaporated. Cool. Combine vegetable mixture with sifted flour and remaining ingredients in a medium bowl. Mix well. Spread mixture into prepared pan. Bake in moderate oven for about 30 mins or until firm.
ingredients: baking potatoes, bacon, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, egg, salt
name: cheesy bacon baked potatoes

steps: Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add pork, stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add corn and peas to wok, cook for 5 minutes. Add fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind and basil leaves, toss well. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: coconut milk, red curry paste, soy sauce, granulated sugar, natural-style peanut butter, kosher salt
name: thai peanut stir fry sauce easy

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the buttermilk, egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon rind, vanilla, buttermilk, whipped cream, strawberry jam. Bring to a boil. Add the buttermilk, egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon rind, vanilla, buttermilk, whipped cream, strawberry jam. Add the buttermilk, egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon rind,
ingredients: egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon rind, vanilla, buttermilk, whipped cream, strawberry jam
name: buttermilk soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl combine soy sauce, vinegar, brown sugar, garlic powder and black pepper. Stir or whisk until well blended. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, white wine, salt, pepper
name: easy chicken and asparagus

steps: Place the chicken in crock pot and sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder and pepper. Top with soup. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hour longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, dry onion soup mix, sour cream, onion, garlic cloves
name: the creamiest crock pot chicken

steps: In a large pot, over medium heat, put half of the oil. Add the leeks and cook until they are tender. Add the broth, the potato, the corn and the celery. Cover and let cook until the vegetable are tenders. Meanwhile, in a frying pan, saut the mushrooms in the rest of the oil. Season to taste. Cream the soup with a blender. Put the soup in bowls. Make a nest of mushrooms over and serve piping hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, yellow potatoes, leek, tomato sauce, chicken broth, salt and pepper, queso fresco
name: leek and potato soup sopa de papa y poro

steps: Heat oven to 425. Press biscuits onto bottom of baking dish, sealing all areas to make solid crust. Sprinkle with cooked sausage, then the shredded mozzarella cheese. Mix eggs, milk, salt, and pepper together. Bake 15 minutes or until firmly set in center.
ingredients: bacon, eggs, bread, milk, cheddar cheese, margarine
name: bacon breakfast casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done.
ingredients: chicken breasts, bacon, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, skim milk, breadcrumbs
name: chicken cordon bacon a variation of cordon bleu

steps: In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, garlic cloves, soy sauce, brown sugar, chicken broth, cornstarch
name: san francisco pork chops or chicken breasts

steps: In a large saucepan or stock pot, bring mixture to a boil, then simmer, uncovered, for about 30 to 45 minutes. Stir frequently until slightly thickened. Pour into hot, sterilized jars and seal.
ingredients: vinegar, ground cloves, cinnamon, celery seed, dried onion flakes, water, tomato paste, pepper, artificial sweetener
name: diabetic ketchup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprout, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, parsley, kosher salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, lemon zest
name: mediterranean brussels sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, egg, vanilla, apple, walnuts
name: norwegian apple pie torte

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: bacon, margarine, garlic clove, onion, green pepper, baked beans, smoked sausage, half & half light cream
name: confederate bean soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Combine cream cheese, sugar and eggs in a small bowl. Beat until fluffy. Place crust on baking sheet. Pour mixture into crust. Bake 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven. Cool. Spread blueberry filling on top. Garnish with whipped topping. Chill 3 hours.
ingredients: graham wafers, vanilla pudding mix, cool whip, blueberry pie filling
name: fake blueberry cheesecake

steps: Spread almonds in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake in a 350 oven for about 10 minutes or until nuts are lightly toasted and fragrant. Meanwhile, in a med saucepan melt butter over med heat until sizzling. Remove from heat. Stir in rosemary, sugar, salt and red pepper. Add almonds to butter mixture and toss to coat. Cool slightly before serving. If desired seal cooled nuts in an airtight container and store for up to 1 month in refrigerator or up to 3 months in freezer.
ingredients: flour, egg, salt, fine dry breadcrumb, ground almonds, pickerel fillets, butter, sliced almonds, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: double almond pickerel fillets

steps: Heat oil on high heat in a large nonstick pan. Toss meatballs in flour, add to pan, and sear on all sides. Reduce heat to low and add garlic. Cook and stir for about 1 min. Add tomato, mushrooms, marsala wine, and italian seasoning one at a time, allowing about 1-2 min between each for liquid to evaporate. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure liquid has not evaporated away. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure
ingredients: california-blend frozen vegetables, meatballs, cheese tortellini, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, creole seasoning
name: meatball tortellini

steps: Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan. Stir in salt and pepper. Cook 2 minutes. Remove pan from burner, add milk, stir and return to stove over medium high heat. Cook, stirring constanly, until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly, adding more milk if the sauce becomes too thick. Season with salt and pepper, add chopped egg and mix.
ingredients: salted butter, egg yolks, salt, red chili pepper, lemon juice, cream, red radishes
name: radish cream sauce india

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degree f. In a large skillet, heat oil and butter over a medium heat. Lightly sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brown well on all sides and remove to baking dish. Add red curry and turmeric to skillet. Cook until fragrant and dissolved. Add coconut milk, fish sauce, lime juice and sugar. Stirring, bring sauce to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour curry sauce over chicken and bake 40-45 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve with jasmine rice or rice noodles with sauce spooned over top.
ingredients: chicken breasts, sweet chili sauce, fresh cilantro, garlic clove, fresh lemon rind, sour cream
name: thai chicken patties

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add beef, onion, garlic clove, tomato paste, water, salt, sugar, basil, oregano, pepper. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add beef, onion, garlic clove, tomato paste, water, salt
ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic clove, tomato paste, water, salt, sugar, basil, oregano, pepper
name: hurry spaghetti supper

steps: Add olive oil to medium heat. Once oil is hot add onions and salt. Once onions are sauted, add ginger and garlic paste fry for 1 minute. Add in tomatoes and cook until it becomes like a gravy. Add in chickpeas in and add 4 cups water and all spices. Let this boil until chickpeas are soft and smash some of chickpeas. Once water thickens this dish is ready to serve --.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, ginger, curry powder, diced tomatoes, salt, black beans, chickpeas, fresh cilantro, fresh lemon juice
name: curried chickpeas and black beans low fat

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the grapefruit peel, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil
ingredients: honey, grapefruit peel, grapefruit juice, salt, ground nutmeg, salad oil, poppy seeds
name: grapefruit poppy seed dressing

steps: Brown pork chops in oil if desired. I never do this step. Place chops in crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for 6 hours. Remove the chops carefully as they will fall apart quite easily. Combine cornstarch and cold water. Gradually stir cornstarch into the sauce in crock pot. Put the chops back into the crock pot and cook 20 to 30 minutes longer until sauce thickens. Serve over rice, if desired.
ingredients: boneless pork chops, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, dijon-style mustard, thyme, garlic clove, black pepper, potatoes, onion
name: manuel s crock pot pork chops and potatoes in mustard sauce

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, milk, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, baguette, prosciutto, salt, pepper
name: eggs in baguette

steps: Boil anchovy fillets, onions and garlic, dash of salt, till onions are soft. Cover and chill for about an hour to blend the flavors.
ingredients: anchovy fillets, potatoes, yellow onion, heavy cream, dill
name: jansson s temptation

steps: Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. Dust shrimp in flour. Dip shrimp into batter. Fry shrimp in deep fryer set at 375 degrees or in a skillet with 2 inches of vegetable oil, until golden brown. Drain shrimp on paper towels or on brown grocery bags from the market. Serve with french fries and cole slaw or creamy cucumber salad. Also serve with cocktail sauce and tartar sauce.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, garlic, medium shrimp, tequila, fresh lime juice, crushed red pepper flakes
name: tequila shrimp

steps: Mix together the mango, peanut oil, curry powder, mint leaves, chicken broth, lime juice and curry powder. Pour over hot rice.
ingredients: mango, peanut oil, curry powder, mint leaves, chicken broth, lime juice
name: curried mango sauce

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture just begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: butter, molasses, milk, sugar, cornmeal, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground ginger, eggs, vanilla
name: indian pudding microwave

steps: Cook the asparagus in a small amount of water until crisp tender, about 4 minutes. Drain well and place in a large bowl. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine the dressing ingredients and mix well. Pour dressing over salad and toss. Chill before serving.
ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, chicken, walnuts, sliced almonds, light mayonnaise, asparagus spear, romaine lettuce
name: spring asparagus chicken salad

steps: Place in oven for shortening to melt. When melted, remove muffin pan from oven and swirl the melted shortening in the cups. Drop batter by spoonfuls into prepared muffin cups. Bake 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: yeast, warm water, sugar, lard, egg, salt, flour
name: overnight buns

steps: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, hersheys chocolate syrup, whipping cream, graham cracker pie crusts
name: chocolate ice cream pie

steps: Put apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool.
ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, apple cider, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cloves
name: applesauce apple butter

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: country bread, tomato paste, chili paste, cooked ham, jarlsberg cheese, orange marmalade, blue cheese
name: grilled cheese sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Bake 15-20 minutes.
ingredients: aluminum foil, pure olive oil, potatoes, zucchini, cremini mushrooms, tilapia fillets, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese
name: grilled tilapia packets with mushrooms zucchini and potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: garlic cloves, flat leaf parsley, fresh basil leaf, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, baguette
name: herb garlic bread

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: rib roast, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red wine, beef broth
name: rib roast au jus

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: flour tortilla, cooked chicken, refried beans, onion, bell pepper, raw mushrooms, butter, cheddar cheese
name: full meal quesadilla

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: sweetened flaked coconut, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract
name: coconut shortbread john ash co restaurant santa rosa

steps: Put the dill horseradish pickle in a large bowl. Sprinkle with mustard, onion, dill, pickle and eggs add to potatoes stirring in and season with salt and pepper. Adding more mayonnaise to the creaminess you desire. Serve room temperature or chilled.
ingredients: red potatoes, vinaigrette, sour cream, mayonnaise, horseradish, bacon, sweet pickle relish, green onions, fresh dill, salt and pepper
name: potato salad with dill horseradish pickle

steps: Heat oven to 350f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: milk, yellow cornmeal, salt, sugar, eggs, butter
name: jefferson s spoon bread

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired.
ingredients: water, sugar-free orange gelatin, low fat cottage cheese, fat free cream cheese, cool whip free
name: cheesecake jello

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel and dice the potatoes. I have a vegetable chopper from williams-sonoma and this step only takes 5 minutes. Parboil the potatoes 5 minutes in salty water. Either spray a large baking dish with oil or rub it lightly with butter. Drain and then toss the potatoes in the baking dish with the butter, thyme, nutmeg, more salt and pepper. Mix almost all the cheese throughout the potatoes and pour the half & half evenly over all. Top the dish with the reserved cheese. Bake for one hour or until the cheese is nicely melted, bubbling and turning a caramel color.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, egg, whipping cream, salt, ground nutmeg, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: sweet potatoes au gratin

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place in the fridge for a minimum of 24 hours. When ready to grill, remove from fridge and save marinade for basting if desired. Turn the grill to high heat. Sear both sides for about 5 minutes on each side. Reduce grill temperature to medium heat and finish cooking the lamb. You may baste the lamb with the leftover marinade if desired.
ingredients: leg of lamb, olive oil, dry white wine, thyme, oregano, salt, pepper, rosemary, garlic, mint leaves
name: greek grilled leg of lamb

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately. Serve warm and garnish with maple syrup and fresh fruit if desired.
ingredients: sourdough bread, mozzarella cheese, provolone cheese, cheddar cheese, deli turkey, deli ham, pepperoni, genoa salami, pepperoncini pepper, butter
name: panini sandwiches

steps: Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, flour, unsweetened baking cocoa, baking soda, salt, sugar, brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla
name: double dark chocolate cookies

steps: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Pour sauce over chicken in crock pot, and heat on low approximately 4 hours until chicken is tender and falling apart. Sprinkle with parsley flakes. Serve over pasta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cream of mushroom soup, light sour cream, onion soup mix, crushed red pepper flakes, button mushrooms, garlic powder, onion, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce
name: low fat crock pot chicken stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the cheese mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: bread, milk, eggs, dry mustard, salt, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, chile
name: cheese and chili souffle

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, ground cinnamon, salt, egg, chunky applesauce, brown sugar, skim milk, oil, bran flakes
name: cinnamon applesauce bread

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, light brown sugar, walnuts, vanilla
name: cookie nut crust

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, raspberry preserves, pecans
name: raspberry pecan waffles

steps: Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments.
ingredients: avocados, jalapenos, cilantro, tomatillo, red onion, garlic clove, lime juice, salt and pepper
name: denise s guacamole

steps: In a large bowl, combine shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, cream cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish, onion, garlic
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, mayonnaise, lemon juice, shrimp, green onions, seasoning salt, horseradish
name: sherry s stupendous shrimp butter

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Saute 2 minutes until transparent. Add kielbasa and pierogi. Saute 3 minutes until slightly browned. Add peas. Cook 3 minutes longer until hot.
ingredients: butter, cabbage, sweet onion, kielbasa, potato and cheddar pierogies, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: skillet pierogies kielbasa and cabbage casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine cream cheese, sour cream, country ham, onion and garlic powder, place in a baking dish. Saute butter, pecans and worcestershire sauce and sprinkle over baking dish. Refrigerate until serving time. Bake for 20 minutes. Serve hot with crackers or raw vegetables.
ingredients: bread, philadelphia cream cheese, sour cream, tasty cheese, ham, capsicums
name: ham cobb dip

steps: Place rice in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley.
ingredients: rice, water, beer, paprika, onion powder, garlic salt, oregano, parsley, dried lemon peel
name: inspired rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a small bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until well combined. Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla. In another bowl, with a whisk, mix flour, salt, and chocolate bars. Add dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix together. Spread the mixture in an 8-inch square buttered pan. Bake for about 45 minutes. Put the pan on a wire rack and spread the caramel sauce on the cake while it is still hot. Let the cake cool in the pan.
ingredients: caramels, evaporated milk, german chocolate cake mix, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate cake caramel bars

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set.
ingredients: cranberries, pecans, sugar, lemon jell-o gelatin, celery, hot water, crushed pineapple
name: awesome our family cranberry salad

steps: Pre-heat oven to 375f. Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: yellow onions, water, salt, butter, flour, milk, garlic, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: cheese onions

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl.
ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cream cheese, pears
name: robyn s jello

steps: Place cucumbers and onion in a bowl. Combine rest of ingredients in a measuring cup. Stir well. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Chill for 4 hours.
ingredients: mayonnaise, sugar, apple cider vinegar, salt, garlic powder, dried spearmint, cucumbers
name: creamy minty cucumbers

steps: Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute chicken breasts until lightly browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return mushrooms to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast, spinach, wine, linguine, cornstarch, chicken broth, butter, cooking oil
name: chicken ala maria

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes.
ingredients: puff pastry, egg, water, apple pie filling
name: easiest apple strudel

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well.
ingredients: turkey gravy, turkey sausage, turkey breast, celery, thin pizza crust, part-skim mozzarella cheese, thyme, sage, black pepper
name: thanksgiving pizza

steps: Cook noodles in boiling water and salt in dutch oven for 10-12 min, stirring occasionally, until tender but firm. Drain well. Turn into large bowl. Add remaining 6 ingredients. Toss until well coated.
ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, margarine, garlic cloves, garlic powder, dried chives
name: the best garlic chives noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large skillet, cook flageolet beans, onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, prosciutto, bouquet garni, chicken stock, tomatoes, white bread. Cover with the flageolet bean mixture and sprinkle over some olive oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until brown and crispy.
ingredients: flageolet beans, onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, prosciutto, bouquet garni, chicken stock, tomatoes, white bread
name: flageolet bean casserole

steps: In a large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, unsalted butter, turmeric, ground cumin, hot sauce, curry powder, ground cinnamon, plain low-fat yogurt, fresh spinach
name: spinach borani

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl. Toss to coat. Spread in a single layer on prepared baking sheet. Roast cauliflower until tender and lightly caramelized, turning cauliflower over once, 35 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: cauliflower, baby carrots, lemon juice, vegetable oil, fresh parsley, cumin, salt, cayenne pepper
name: cumin marinated cauliflower and carrot salad

steps: Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks.
ingredients: cider vinegar, whole cloves, black peppercorns, bay leaves, salt, dry mustard, sugar
name: sharp dark mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray. Combine herbs and crumbs, then mix with melted butter. Brush dijon on salmon fillets. Pat herb mix onto fillets. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or to your own preference.
ingredients: salmon fillets, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, tarragon, panko breadcrumbs
name: baked salmon delight

steps: Heat 2 cups water to boil. Add egg and cook for 5 minutes. Add milk and stir well. Cook for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let sit for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let sit for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let
ingredients: egg, cooked white rice, summer savory, parmesan cheese, dry breadcrumbs, oil
name: herbed rice puffs

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: cabbage, apples, onion, salt and pepper, dark brown sugar
name: cabbage with apples

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place bread on pan and put into oven for approximately 6 minutes leave oven on. Remove from oven and let bread cool slightly. Then add to food processor along with spices ground until desired consistantcy. Return crumbs to oven, spreading evenly, for approximately 5-6 minutes. Or until lightly toasted. Remove from oven and let cool. Add parmesan cheese and stir until evenly mixed.
ingredients: italian bread, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic powder, paprika
name: parmesan toasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: potatoes, bay leaf, fresh thyme sprig, salt, pepper, olive oil, butter
name: accordion potatoes

steps: In a medium saucepan, bring 2 cups water to a boil. Stir in the olive oil and then the couscous, cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff the couscous with a fork, add the almonds and toss. Serve the couscous alongside the kebabs.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon juice, tandoori paste, low-fat plain yogurt, garlic clove, fresh coriander, onion, olive oil, black pepper
name: tandoori chicken kebabs

steps: Preheat mason jars and snap lids. Combine strawberries and raspberries and fruit pectin in a large deep stainless steel saucepan. Whisk in fruit pectin. If using sweetener, measure splenda or sugar and set aside. Stirring constantly, bring fruit mixture to a boil over high heat. If using, add sweetener or sugar, and return mixture to a boil, stirring frequently. Boil 3 minutes. Remove form heat. Skim foam. Ladle into hot jars.
ingredients: diet 7-up, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, strawberries, lemon juice
name: no sugar strawberry jam

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel and dice the potatoes. I have a vegetable chopper from williams-sonoma and this step only takes 5 minutes. Parboil the potatoes 5 minutes in salty water. Either spray a large baking dish with oil or rub it lightly with butter. Drain and then toss the potatoes in the baking dish with the butter, thyme, nutmeg, more salt and pepper. Mix almost all the cheese throughout the potatoes and pour the half & half evenly over all. Top the dish with the reserved cheese. Bake for one hour or until the cheese is nicely melted, bubbling and turning a caramel color.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt & pepper, half-and-half, cooking spray, swiss cheese, butter
name: onion potato gratin

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes. Bake
ingredients: butter, large shrimp, sugar snap peas, salt, pepper, cherry tomatoes, garlic, parsley, lemon peel, lemon
name: shrimp and sugar snap pea saute

steps: In a small bowl combine raisins, oatmeal, rice krispies, peanuts, dried cranberries, butter, peanut butter, marshmallows, peanuts, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried cranberries, dried
ingredients: raisins, oatmeal, rice krispies, peanuts, dried cranberries, butter, peanut butter, marshmallows
name: cranberry nut energy bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 13 x 9 baking dish. Spread pecans with juice evenly in dish. Spread cherry pie filling over pineapple. Sprinkle dry cake mix over cherries, then spread pecans over cake mix. Cut margarine into thin slices and place over pecans. Bake for 50 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: pecans, dates, candied cherry, candied pineapple, baking powder, salt, flour, sugar, eggs
name: individual fruitcakes

steps: In a medium saucepan heat coconut milk, curry paste, peanut butter, sugar, and fish sauce until they come to a very small boil. Set aside and cool adding cornstarch to thicken. While the sauce is cooling, stir fry 1 chopped onion and 1 t minced garlic. Cut up chicken into small pieces and stir fry with the onion and garlic until chicken is cooked through. Combine the garlic, onion and chicken with the sauce and heat. Spoon the chicken peanut curry over rice and enjoy.
ingredients: garlic clove, onion, butter, chicken fillet, peanut butter, curry powder, chicken stock
name: easy chicken satay peanut curry

steps: Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through.
ingredients: scallops, onion, butter, flour, milk, salt, pepper, garlic, bay leaf
name: scallop bisque

steps: Heat oil in large pot or dutch oven over medium heat. Add onion, and cook 10 to 15 minutes, or until soft and beginning to brown. Add garlic, and cook 1 minute, or until fragrant. Stir in kale and 2 cups water. Cover, and cook 30 minutes, or until kale is tender. Season with salt and pepper. If making ahead, cool, and store in airtight container. Just before serving, reheat kale mixture, then drizzle with vinegar, and sprinkle with almonds.
ingredients: onion, parsnip, corn oil, water, ginger, kale
name: kale and parsnips

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Sprinkle olive oil over the base of the baking dish. Lay cutlets in the dish, rubbing them with the oil. Cover cutlets with crushed garlic, mustard and rosemary, then season with the salt and pepper. Place in the oven and cook for 25-30 minutes, turning once, until the cutlets ar browned and crispy. If desired, serve on a bed of couscous with your favourite steamed vegetables.
ingredients: greek yogurt, garlic cloves, lemon, lamb cutlets, black pepper, salt
name: lamb cutlets mediterranean style

steps: Put zucchini in a medium sauce pan, put enough water in pan to just cover the zucchini. Turn heat to high and boil the zucchini for about 5 minutes. Drain and place in serving bowl. Meanwhile, in a small saute pan, over medium heat, melt butter, add sugar, pineapple juice and the ginger. Bring mixture to a light boil and stir until sugar has melted and incorporated into all the other ingredients. Pour mixture over the zucchini and toss gently.
ingredients: zucchini, lemon juice, sugar, pineapple juice
name: zucchini pineapple

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Pour sauce in and stir for 5 minutes. Add broth and salt, return to a boil, then simmer for 8 to 10 minutes until thickened.
ingredients: tomatillo, onion, fresh cilantro, fresh jalapeno pepper, salt, sour cream, avocados
name: green sauce

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: salt, garlic powder, pepper, spicy brown mustard, boneless pork chops, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil
name: spicy brown mustard pork chops

steps: In a large pot or dutch oven heat oil over medium-high heat. Add london particular soup pea ham soup. Add bacon, onion, celery, dried split peas, chicken stock, plain yogurt, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and add london particular soup pea ham soup. Reduce heat and add london special soup pea ham soup. Add bacon,
ingredients: butter, streaky bacon, onion, carrot, celery, dried split peas, chicken stock, plain yogurt
name: london particular soup pea ham soup

steps: Mix all ingredients together, cut up large pieces of turkey in the patties. Bake on the preheated grill for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: cooked turkey, turkey stuffing, turkey gravy, breadcrumbs, oil
name: turkey and dressing patties with gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, cinnamon, pecans, eggs, canola oil, mashed bananas, vanilla extract
name: magnificent moist banana bread

steps: Place the chicken in crock pot and sprinkle with onion powder, cumin, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, cumin powder, c
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, onion, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese soup, chili powder, cream of chicken soup, rotel tomatoes
name: chili cheesy creamy chickey crock pot

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix flour mix, millet flour, xanthan gum, salt, sugar, and yeast in a large bowl with an electric mixer at medium speed. Add water and 1 teaspoon oil and mix until just combined, scraping down side of bowl occasionally. Mixture will be thin and more like a batter than a dough. Increase speed to high and beat until smooth, about 2 minutes. Spoon batter into center of pan and use wet offset spatula to spread to edges of pan in a thin layer. Loosely cover pan with an oiled sheet of plastic and let stand in a warm place until doubled in bulk, about 40 minutes. Bake pizza crust until golden, about 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cover crust with toppings of your choice. Bake until toppings are heated through, about 6 minutes. Transfer pizza on pan to a rack to cool slightly, about 3 minutes.
ingredients: oil, polenta, cold water, boiling water, eggs, mozzarella cheese
name: polenta pizza crust gluten free yeast free

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a dutch oven, brown hamburger meat. Drain off fat. In the dutch oven, top meat with all of the sliced onions, then the potatoes. Salt the potatoes. Top with shredded cheese. Combine soup and soup can of water in a bowl and blend with spoon until smooth. Bake covered at 350 for about an hour.
ingredients: bacon, hard-boiled eggs, potatoes, cream of chicken soup, milk, salt and pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, dried onion flakes
name: betty s quick supper casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast. In a small bowl combine the feta and the chopped olives, then stuff of mixture into each pocket. In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 tbs. Olive oil on medium to high heat. Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 tbs. Olive oil and bake for 18 minutes. In a bowl mix tomato, kosher salt, onion, garlic, basil and parley. When chicken is 5 minutes from being finished, put the remaining olive oil in the skillet, add tomato mix and heat through. Serve chicken with tomato mix on top.
ingredients: chicken thigh fillet, paprika, olive oil, garlic cloves, brandy, chicken stock, bay leaf, flat leaf parsley
name: spanish garlic chicken

steps: In electric frying pan or large skillet saute onions and peppers until onions soften. Add corned beef. Continue to cook until cubes fall apart. Add frozen hash browns. Add seasoning if desired. Cook, stirring often until potatoes are done and start to brown.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, diced tomatoes, rice, chili powder, salt, ground cumin, pepper
name: texas hash stove top

steps: Place the couscous in a large bowl and cover with plastic wrap. Bring 2 cups of lightly salted water to a boil. Pour the water over couscous and cover with plastic wrap. Let sit for 10 min. Uncover and fluff with a fork. Meanwhile heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and zucchini and cook until lightly browned. Add the zucchini and onion, along with the remaining ingredients to the couscous and mix well. Season with aditional salt and freshly ground pepper if desired.
ingredients: red capsicums, zucchini, sun-dried tomatoes, fresh parsley, walnuts, couscous, olive oil, lemon juice
name: couscous with zucchini tomato

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, yellow squash and onion with the butter and garlic. Add oregano and tomato sauce. Simmer for 5 - 7 minutes. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: italian sausage, flour, zucchini, onion, butter, parmesan cheese, cottage cheese, eggs, garlic salt, mozzarella cheese
name: zucchini sausage bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: self raising flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, dates, walnuts, egg, milk
name: date and walnut loaf fat free

steps: Beat pudding mix and milk 2 minutes. Blend in condensed milk until smooth. Stir in vanilla and fold in most of cool whip. Layer wafers, bananas, and pudding mixture in glass serving bowl. Top with bananas, wafers, and remaining cool whip. Serve chilled.
ingredients: vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, cool whip, vanilla wafers, bananas
name: my best banana pudding dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil.
ingredients: oreo cookies, butter, ice cream, chocolate syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, cool whip
name: rich and gooey ice cream cake

steps: Mix bread crumbs, parsley, salt and garlic. Dip chicken breasts in melted butter then dredge in bread crumb mixture. Place on baking sheet or casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray. Pour lemon over the chicken then remaining butter. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, italian style breadcrumbs, eggs, salt and pepper, oil, garlic
name: breaded breast of chicken chicken cutlets

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: dry white wine, onion, shallot, mushroom, vegetable stock, chicken giblets, water, cornstarch, salt and pepper
name: roast turkey pan gravy

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, soy sauce, garlic, ground cumin, sugar, black pepper
name: charcoal grilled chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add butter lettuce and sauté until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the mayonnaise and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the bacon and sauté until fragrant, about 5 minutes
ingredients: bacon, mayonnaise, white wine vinegar, vegetable oil, roquefort cheese, butter lettuce, dried cherries
name: butter lettuce salad with bacon dried cherries and roquefort vi

steps: Combine the marinade ingredients in a large non-reactive bowl or one gallon food storage bag. Add the marinade ingredients in a large non-reactive bowl or one gallon food storage bag. Add the marinade ingredients in a large non-reactive bowl
ingredients: kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, dry white wine, rosemary sprig, garlic cloves, olive oil, fine dry breadcrumbs, capers, lemon, juice of
name: simple marinade and rub for fish

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Add onion and cook until soft, but not browned. Add peppers, zucchini, garlic and water. Reduce heat to low and simmer 10 to 15 minutes. Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes, until the mixture is thick and shiny.
ingredients: tomatoes with juice, sweet peppers, onion, garlic clove, olive oil, dried oregano, dried basil, fresh ground black pepper
name: peperonata

steps: Brown rice with caramelized onions and cranberries in a medium mixing bowl. Add rice and broth to crock pot and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed. Add cranberry sauce, cloves and sugar to crock pot and mix well. Add cranberry sauce, cloves and sugar to crock
ingredients: long-grain rice, chicken stock, onions, brown sugar, butter, orange-flavored craisins
name: rice with caramelized onions and cranberries

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions, garlic, tomatoes, onion soup mix, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks.
ingredients: green olives, pork blade steaks, pepper, garlic, tomatoes, onion soup mix, water, thyme leaves
name: pork steaks with peppers

steps: In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, onion, ketchup, mustard, brown sugar, pork and beans
name: kossman pork and beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Sift flour with sugar, soda salt and cinnamon into a large bowl or food processor by pulsing 3-4 times. Mix in shortening and knead thoroughly. Shape into balls using 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on ungreased baking sheets and make a depression in the top with the thumb. Press a blanched whole or sliced almond into the center of each cookie. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Makes six dozen.
ingredients: almond bark, peanut butter, dry roasted peanuts, miniature marshmallows, rice krispies
name: almond bark cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper.
