Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, unbaked pastry shells, eggs, milk, onion, sweet red pepper, green pepper
name: christmas morning pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: vanilla wafer cookies, cream cheese, sugar, eggs, lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling
name: bite sized cherry cheesecakes

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, self raising flour, salt, rolled oats, dried apricot, shredded coconut, blanched almond
name: biscuits with apricot and coconut

steps: Mix together yogurt, milk mixture, milk powder, yogurt starter, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt, yogurt,
ingredients: whole milk, low-fat milk, powdered milk, yogurt starter
name: homemade greek balkan style yogurt

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: sun-dried tomato alfredo sauce, frozen cheese ravioli, rotel tomatoes & chilies, garlic, italian seasoning, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese
name: spicy crock pot alfredo ravioli

steps: In a microwave safe bowl mix, sugar, cocoa, milk and margarine. Microwave until boiling. Add oats, coconut, chocolate chips and vanilla. Drop tbsp sized cookies on a waxed paper covered cookie sheet. Chill in fridge until firm.
ingredients: refrigerated brownie bar dough, flaked coconut, condensed milk, semisweet chocolate morsel
name: macaroon brownie bars

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: turkey, hardboiled egg, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, onions, salt & pepper
name: turkey buns

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Bake in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground turkey, onion, cabbage, mushroom, carrot, potatoes, healthy request cream of mushroom soup, skim milk, dried parsley flakes, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: vegetable soup casserole

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet or saute pan over medium heat. Saute mushrooms, spinach, basil, salt, pepper and garlic until mushrooms are tender and spinach is heated through. Pour in wine and reduce heat to low. Simmer 1 minute. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve.
ingredients: butter, portabella mushrooms, salt, garlic clove, lemon juice, pepper, multi-grain bread, tomatoes, arugula leaves
name: portabella sandwich with garlic and lemon

steps: Dissolve yeast, sugar and salt in water. Add flour and stir with a wooden spoon until blended. Do not knead -- it will be lumpy. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour. Oil a cookie sheet with olive oil. Oil hands and remove dough from bowl and divide into 2 rounds and place on cookie sheet. Sprinkle dough with cornmeal. Let rise 1 hour. Preheat oven to 425 degrees and brush dough with melted butter. Bake for 10 min then reduce heat to 375 degrees and bake an additional 15 minutes. When finished baking, brush again with melted butter.
ingredients: water, flour, sugar, salt, yeast
name: easy french bread extra large

steps: Combine first 5 ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring gently until sugar dissolves. Add pecans. Cover and cook without stirring to soft ball stage or until candy thermometer reads 235f. Remove from heat and stir in baking soda. Beat with a wooden spoon just until the mixture starts to thicken. Working rapidly, drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased wax paper. Let stand until firm. Working rapidly, drop by tablespoonfuls
ingredients: sugar, buttermilk, baking soda, butter, pecans
name: louisiana pecan pralines

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Combine ingredients in medium-sized bowl just til all is moistened. Drop heaping tbls. Of dough onto ungreased baking sheet making 10 mounds. Melt butter with rest of ingredients, and spoon on top of each biscuit. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits.
ingredients: butter, sharp cheddar cheese, red pepper flakes, all-purpose flour, salt, poppy seed
name: cocktail cheese biscuits

steps: Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze.
ingredients: meaux mustard, maple syrup, extra virgin olive oil, fresh tarragon, pears, boneless skinless chicken breasts, chicken stock, salt and pepper
name: maple and pear chicken breasts

steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a medium bowl, combine hot water, kosher salt, brown sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, jamaican jerk spice, roasting chickens. Mix well and set aside.
ingredients: hot water, kosher salt, brown sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, jamaican jerk spice, roasting chickens
name: jamaican jerk brine for chicken pork

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, hot water, puree, wholemeal self-rising flour, walnuts, pitted dates, slivered almondspreparation:Set oven at 180dg c. Grease and line a 200mm bar tin. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Mix bi-carb and water. Stir bi-carb mixture into all other ingredients and mix well. Place in pan and sprinkle with the slivered almonds. Bake for 45 minutes or until a skewer comes out clean. Cool on rack and cut into bars. Serve warm with whipped cream or cold.
ingredients: boiling water, baking soda, dates, granulated sugar, shortening, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, vanilla
name: self iced date cake

steps: Combine the basil, garlic, walnuts, parmesan cheese, garlic and olive oil in a bowl and mix well. Arrange the baguette slices in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Broil the slices until light brown. Turn the slices and spread with the mayonnaise mixture. Return to under the broiler and broil until light brown and heated through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh basil leaves, walnuts, parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, virgin olive oil
name: mom s pesto

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Truss your chicken. Brush with butter salt and pepper. Place chicken breast up in dutch oven. Cook, uncovered until thighs test done. Add rest of ingredients, cover and bake until veggies are tender., about 30 minutes. Remove chicken to a serving platter, surround with vegetables. Serve with rice.
ingredients: onion, red potatoes, salt, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh cilantro leaves, tomatillos, pickled jalapeno pepper
name: pollo pulqueros chicken tomatillo and jalapeno stew

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray 13x9 dish with cooking spray. Slice potatoes fairly thin and place in dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss to coat. Sprinkle italian seasoning and parmesan cheese on top. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: ranch dressing, cheddar cheese, bacon bits, small red potatoes, fresh parsley
name: roasted red potatoes with bacon and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Place chicken on a foil-lined baking sheet and bake for 35 minutes.
ingredients: chicken thighs, honey, lemon juice, yogurt, of fresh mint, salt and pepper
name: minty yogurt chicken

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, butter, sugar, and vanilla. Beat in vanilla. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Cover and chill until serving.
ingredients: pie crusts, cherry pie filling, cream cheese, eggs, sugar, vanilla, sour cream
name: cherry jublee pie

steps: Combine chickpeas, tahini, garlic cloves, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, paprika, coriander in a food processor, and process until smooth. Combine tomato, fresh lemon juice, paprika, coriander in a small bowl. Place chickpeas, tahini, garlic cloves, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, paprika, coriander in a small bowl. Place chickpeas, tahini, garlic cloves, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice
ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, garlic cloves, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, paprika, coriander
name: the best basic hummus recipe

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: yellow miso, mirin, dry white wine, wasabi powder, rice vinegar, flank steak, cooking spray
name: wasabi miso marinated flank steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: white sugar, chile powder, chili powder, garlic powder, unsalted butter, honey, kosher salt, peanuts
name: chipotle honey roasted peanuts

steps: In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. Remove from heat
ingredients: peanut oil, eggs, basmati rice, tomatoes, light soy sauce, sesame oil, white pepper, spring onion
name: egg fried rice easy

steps: In a saucepan, combine the gelatin, butterscotch, peanut butter and chocolate pieces. Bring to a boil then reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes or until the gelatin has softened slightly. Add more water if necessary. Remove lemon slices. Mash with a potato masher or use a food mill for a smoother consistency. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, mashed banana, fruit juice, applesauce
name: baby s easy fruit snacks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Blend sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl, set aside. Spray 10 inch tube or bunt pan with non stick spray. Dust pan with the sugar, cinnamon mixture. Blend cake mix, applesauce and egg beaters, and pour into pan. Bake.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, unsweetened applesauce, crushed pineapple, egg whites, fat-free cool whip
name: weight watcher sunshine cake 2pts

steps: Preheat the oven to 180c. Combine the chopped figs, hazelnuts, orange zest and allspice. Using an apple corer, remove the apple cores. Place the apples in a baking dish and loosely press the fig mixture into the centre of the apples. Combine the sugar, butter and orange juice and drizzle it over the apples. Bake the apples for 25 minutes or until tender, then set aside for 10 minutes for the sauce to thicken slightly. Serve with the sauce spooned over the apples with cream or icecream.
ingredients: dried fig, tart apples, orange, juice and rind of, lemon, juice and rind of, water, sugar, salt
name: fig apple jam

steps: Mix together the tomato soup, brown sugar, lemon juice, onion, lean ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, carrot, salt and pepper. Pour over meatballs in crock pot. Cook on low for 3 hours, stirring every half hour. Serve with rice once the sauce is hot.
ingredients: tomato soup, brown sugar, lemon juice, onion, lean ground beef, egg, breadcrumbs, carrot, salt and pepper
name: secret sauce meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Chop up potatoes. Put in microwave for 2 minutes while chopping rest of veggies. Place all veggies in bowl. Add oil, vinegar and garlic, and toss to coat. Spread out in roasting pan and cook for about an hour.
ingredients: veal round roast, vegetable oil, lemon juice, mustard, ground nutmeg, garlic clove, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, onion, chicken broth
name: veal roast with vegetables

steps: In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve.
ingredients: soft fresh goat cheese, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, lemon peel, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil, french baguettes, smoked salmon, lemon
name: smoked salmon and goat cheese toasts

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the prawns, salt and cumin. Stir to combine. Stir in prawns, salt and cumin. Stir in
ingredients: raw shrimp, garlic cloves, olive oil, ground cumin, ground ginger, paprika, cayenne pepper, fresh coriander, lemons
name: tunisian grilled prawns

steps: Boil eggs, shell and cut in half lengthwise. Mix in the olive oil, mayonnaise, and dijon mustard. Stir in the celery, fresh tarragon, capers and the shallots. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide and spoon the mixture into the egg halves. Garnish each egg half with 1 or 2 slices of celery. If not eating immediately, cover well and refrigerate.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, peppercorn, capers, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, kosher salt, sugar
name: deviled eggs with capers

steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, oil, milk, vanilla, bananas, raisins
name: banana raisin bread

steps: Cook water chestnuts in a small amount of water until crisp-tender. Drain and rinse in cold water. Place in a serving bowl. Add the peas, water chestnuts, onions and cheese. In a small bowl, combine the salad dressing, bacon and pepper. Mix well. Pour over salad and toss to coat. Chill until serving.
ingredients: vegetable broth, snow peas, sesame oil, sliced water chestnuts
name: stir fry snow peas water chestnuts

steps: In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken.
ingredients: boneless chicken, tandoori spice mix, lemon juice, jalapeno, curry leaves, red food coloring, red chili paste, oil
name: pakistani or desi style spicy chili chicken

steps: Heat oven to 190c. Take each date and place it on top of the dates. Bake for 5 mins until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
ingredients: dates, bacon, goat cheese, unsalted almonds
name: bacon wrapped dates stuffed with almonds and goat cheese

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Slightly salt and pepper pork. Brown pork chops in cast iron skillet. Place chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning.
ingredients: pork chops, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, white vinegar, orange juice, brown sugar, ground ginger, mandarin oranges
name: mandarin orange pork chops

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add blue cheese and seared grapes. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry blue cheese. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry blue cheese until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: bread, mild cheddar cheese, blue cheese, grapes, ham
name: grilled blue cheese sandwich with seared grapes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place chips on a foil-lined baking sheet. Top with extra lean ground beef, salsa, tostitos scoops, shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream. Heat until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, salsa, tostitos scoops, shredded cheddar cheese, sour cream
name: nacho s in a cup

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian salad dressing.
ingredients: spam, sour cream, ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, olive oil, tomatoes, garlic clove, romaine lettuce leaves
name: bridge club salad

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly. Gradually add remaining milk and half and half, followed by remaining ingredients, except vanilla and almond extract. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until completely heated. Stir in vanilla and almond extract. Serve with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg if desired.
ingredients: milk, half-and-half, sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, bourbon, marshmallows
name: tennessee hot chocolate

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: garlic, tarragon, marjoram, mustard powder, salt, pepper, olive oil, red wine vinegar
name: garlic herb salad dressing

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: small red potatoes, butter, buttermilk, gorgonzola, salt, pepper
name: mashed red potatoes with gorgonzola cheese

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first 7 ingredients. Add the steaks. Seal the bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steaks, uncovered, over medium-hot heat for 8-10 minutes or desired doneness.
ingredients: fresh ground pepper, dried thyme, salt, garlic salt, lemon pepper, cayenne pepper, dried parsley flakes, rib eye steaks, olive oil
name: peppered rib eye steaks

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add pasta, asparagus, potatoes, of fresh mint, vegetable stock, unsalted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Saute pasta, asparagus, potatoes, of fresh mint, vegetable stock, unsalted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Saute pasta,
ingredients: pasta, asparagus, potatoes, of fresh mint, vegetable stock, unsalted butter, onion, salt and pepper
name: stelline in zuppa di asparagi e menta

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve.
ingredients: chicken parts, orange juice concentrate, butter, ground ginger, cooked rice, salt and pepper
name: easy orange chicken with rice

steps: In a bowl, combine the butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, stirring well after each addition. Stir in vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt. Gradually add to butter mixture. Stir until moistened. Transfer to a greased 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, sugar, nonfat milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, salt, almonds
name: fudgy cocoa drops

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: bacon fat, idaho potatoes, bacon, onion, salt and pepper, fresh parsley
name: old fashioned home fried potatoes

steps: In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve.
ingredients: canned salmon, onion, cornmeal, flour, egg, mayonnaise
name: southern fried salmon patties

steps: In a small saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until translucent and beginning to brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Add the honey, hot pepper sauce and chili powder and simmer for 1 minute. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice and set aside. Preheat a grill or large grill pan to medium-high. Rub the chicken with the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt. Grill until well marked, about 7 minutes. Flip and cook until the bottoms are well marked and the chicken is cooked through, another 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and brush with the reserved honey glaze. Cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, grill the pineapple until well marked on one side, about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve with the chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, celery, onion, green pepper, creole seasoning, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, shrimp, minute rice
name: 30 minute jambalaya skillet

steps: In blender or food processor, puree the first 6 ingredients until smooth. Pour into serving bowl. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon shrimp mixture over the orzo. Toss.
ingredients: unsalted butter, green bell pepper, onions, fresh parsley, cajun seasoning, raw shrimp, heavy whipping cream, angel hair pasta
name: creamy shrimp pasta

steps: Slice patty into 8 equal patties. Spray non-stick skillet with cooking spray and fry patty melt over medium heat until lightly browned on each side. Remove patties from skillet and saut sliced onion in skillet until lightly browned. Add vegetable broth cover skillet. Steam onions until tender. Assemble sandwiches by placing 1 slice of redi-burger and 1 slice of cheese on slice of rye bread. Top with onions and another slice of rye bread. Lightly butter outside surfaces of bread and fry in skillet over medium heat until both sides of bread are toasted and cheese has melted. Serve immediately.
ingredients: american cheese, swiss cheese, ground beef, onions, butter, rye bread
name: patty melt

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl, and whisk together well. Can also be blended in the food processor. Coat all sides of roast well and rub inches. Allow to macerate for an hour or so. Roast meat as you normally would. Be prepared to fill the house with an aroma thick and delicious enough to eat.
ingredients: boneless bottom round roast, water, white vinegar, ketchup, sugar, onion powder, pickling spices, ginger snaps, cheesecloth, cotton string
name: not your grandmother s sauerbraten

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: pumpkin, self-raising flour, rosemary, parmesan cheese, milk, vegetable oil, walnuts
name: pumpkin parmesan and walnut scone loaf

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Dredge chicken in flour and shake of excess. Dip in egg, allowing excess to drip off. Saut in skillet a few pieces at a time, turn once, browning on both sides. Arrange chicken in a buttered, shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, oregano and cheese. Cover with foil, bake 15 minutes. Remove foil, baking until browned, about 15-20 minutes. Remove foil, bake until browned, about 15-20 minutes. Remove
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, salt and pepper, prosciutto, olive oil
name: chicken prosciutto bundles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a plastic bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake to coat chicken with flour mixture. Melt butter in casserole dish or skillet. Brown chicken on all sides. Mix in sour cream, broth, mushrooms and paprika. If skillet is not oven proof, transfer to a casserole dish. Cover and bake 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.
ingredients: chicken pieces, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, sour cream, lemon juice, dill weed, paprika
name: sour cream dill chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, margarine, cocoa, sugar, eggs, vanilla, nuts
name: mama s brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f until done, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: flour, cornmeal, onion salt, pepper, butter, cod, parmesan cheese
name: baked caught fish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder, vanilla extract, eggs, andes mint baking chips, all-purpose flour with a spatula. Bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder, vanilla extract, eggs, andes mint baking chips, all-purpose flour
name: andes crme de menthe cookies andes mint cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 200 c. Line a baking dish with non stick baking paper. Place parsnips, salt, pepper and oil in baking dish. Toss to combine. Roast for 30 minutes, pour over syrup. Roast for another 15 - 20 minutes till cooked through and golden.
ingredients: parsnip, lemon juice, butter, water, double cream, salt and pepper
name: creamed parsnips

steps: In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients. Add the cooked rice, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh breadcrumb and fry on both sides until golden brown. Drain on paper towels to absorb excess oil.
ingredients: cooked rice, all-purpose flour, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh breadcrumb
name: rice croquettes

steps: Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, phyllo pastry sheets, corn, parmesan cheese, parsley, eggs, whole milk, cooking spray
name: corn and bacon filo tart from new zealand

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread melted butter evenly in bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. Evenly layer crumbs, then coconut and finally chips. Pour condensed milk over all. Sprinkle with peanuts. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are light brown. Cool on wire rack. Chill until set and cut into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, cream cheese, sugar, orange juice, orange rind, baking powder, eggs
name: orange crunch bars

steps: Heat oven to 375. Mix crumbs, taco seasonings and butter. Dip nuggets into egg, then into crumbs, coating evenly. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake 10-15 minutes til chicken is done and coating is crisp. Serve with sour cream, if desired.
ingredients: sour cream, green chili salsa, fresh cilantro, taco seasoning mix, boneless chicken breast halves
name: taco chicken skewers

steps: Add beef stock, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, kaffir lime leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm
ingredients: beef stock, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, kaffir lime leaves, green chilies, fish sauce, palm sugar, dumplings, coriander leaves
name: beef and dumpling soup

steps: Place beans in pressure cooker and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, smoked bacon, salt, water
name: fresh green beans pressure cooker

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Sautee onions in butter, margarine or oil over medium heat, until soft. Place chicken breasts in casserole dish and season with salt, pepper and garlic. Pour mushrooms and sauteed onions over chicken. Cover with bbq sauce. Cover dish with lid or aluminum foil. Bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: roasting chickens, onions, butter, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, paprika, ketchup, salt and pepper
name: brown sugar bbq chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, coconut, chocolate chips, nuts, butterscotch chips, sweetened condensed milk
name: hello dolly cookie bars

steps: In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, egg, buttermilk, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cooking oil, salt
name: tsr version of ihop buttermilk pancakes by todd wilbur

steps: In a medium saucepan cook cranberry glazed carrots, covered, in a small amount of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Remove carrots from pan. In the same saucepan combine butter, brown sugar, and salt. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until glazed.
ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, cranberry sauce
name: cranberry glazed baby carrots

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Drain fat. Stir in seasoning mix and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: ground turkey, taco seasoning, water, lettuce, black olives, cheese, refried beans, whole wheat tortillas, guacamole
name: tasty tacos

steps: Rinse the rice under cold water. In med saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Add jasmine rice and all ingredients. Cover and reduce heat to simmer. Cook for 15 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: jasmine rice, water, salt, lemongrass, lemon verbena leaf
name: adventurous spirit lemon infused rice

steps: In a small skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. Slowly stir in the broth, stirring constantly until thickened. Add chicken, salt, and pepper. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Stir in the milk unitl the mixture forms a thick batter. Drop the batter on top of the chicken a tablespoonful at a time. Cover and cook on low, 15 minutes or until the dumplings are cooked through.
ingredients: onion, butter, paprika, chicken pieces, water, sour cream, salt, flour, eggs, milk
name: chicken paprikas chicken and dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, brewed coffee, eggs, whipped cream
name: melitta mocha fudge cake 1996 canadian flourless gluten fre

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour 8x8 baking pan and set aside. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder and salt in mixing bowl and set aside. Place margarine and sugar in large bowl of mixer and cream until smooth. Add honey and eggs and beat to blend, scraping bottom and sides of bowl frequently. Beat in half of the milk. Beat in half of the flour mixture. Repeat with remaining milk and flour mixture. With mixer at lowest speed, continue to mix for 4 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in oven 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: yeast, water, butter, molasses, honey, salt, whole wheat flour, white flour
name: wholesome homemade honey whole wheat bread

steps: In a small mixing bowl, combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Take breadsticks and cut them in half lengthwise. In a small microwave pyrex bowl, melt butter in microwave. Take each halved breadstick and dip into butter then roll in cinnamon mixture. Twist each strip 2 or 3 times and place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 18 minutes. Let cool on wire racks. Makes 16 toasted sticks.
ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, bread, butter
name: cinnamon toast deluxe

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine spinach, cheeses, and seasonings. Lift up skin of each chicken breast and divide mixture evenly among them. Be careful not to tear skins. Smooth skin over stuffing. Tuck skin edges underneath to form a neat package. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving.
ingredients: phyllo dough, frozen chopped spinach, part-skim mozzarella cheese, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, fat-free cottage cheese, eggs, dried parsley, salt, egg whites, nonfat milk
name: spinach cheese phyllo squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the biscuit and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the biscuit and chocolate chips in the pan. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: biscuit, cream, condensed milk, chocolate bar
name: ice cream slice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days.
ingredients: ricotta cheese, egg yolk, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, fresh ground pepper, vegetable oil
name: ricotta parmesan pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: soy margarine, sugar, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, vanilla extract, mashed bananas, dark chocolate chips, water
name: moist banana chocolate chip muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 525 degrees. Add salt to milk. Cut fillets into serving pieces, dip into milk, then in the bread crumbs, cheese and thyme. Arrange fish in well-greased dish and pour butter over evenly. Bake on top rack 12 minutes. Garnish with paprika. Serve with lemon slices.
ingredients: haddock fillet, salt-free lemon pepper, apples, onions, lemons, tomatoes, soft margarine, summer savory
name: micmac baked haddock fillets

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: dry yeast, bread flour, whole wheat flour, dried basil, dried oregano, salt, water
name: herbed pita bread no fat no sugar

steps: Place jello in 1 c hot water. Let stand for 5 minutes, then add 1 c cold water. Using mixer add the vanilla pudding, mix on slow speed. Fold in coolwhip, fruit. Chill. You can also use strawberries& strawberry jello.
ingredients: orange jell-o, instant vanilla pudding, cold water, cool whip
name: orange dreamsicle jello

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve with noodles or rice.
ingredients: vegetable oil, scallions, fresh ginger, fresh coarse ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, lime, tamari, honey, rotisserie-cooked chicken, napa cabbage
name: millionaire rotisserie chicken salad

steps: Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set.
ingredients: cream cheese, cucumber, onion, green food coloring
name: the moon is made of green cheese spread

steps: In a saucepan, heat steel cut oats, dried tart cherry, tangerine peel, ground cinnamon, salt, ground nutmeg, milk, butter, turbinado sugar, toasted hazelnuts. Add steaming cooked oats and top with fresh berries. Each person stirs their bowl to enjoy the hidden surprise waiting underneath.
ingredients: steel cut oats, dried tart cherry, tangerine peel, ground cinnamon, salt, ground nutmeg, milk, butter, turbinado sugar, toasted hazelnuts
name: cherry and tangerine oatmeal

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 15x10 inch cookie sheet with edges. In a skillet cook ground beef till pea size and brown and drain. In a large bowl mix remaining ingredients and spread in the prepared pan, including hamburger. Bake 20 minutes to 25 minutes or until golden brown, and toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes cut into any size square desired and dip into your favorite sauce. Children love the original ketchup. Serve warm. These freeze very well and thaw in the microwave quickly.
ingredients: lean ground beef, chunky salsa, tortilla chips, chili powder, salt, hamburger buns, monterey jack cheese, sour cream, tomatoes, lettuce
name: cha cha burgers

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, bacon, onion, green bell pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper
name: christmas morning crock pot breakfast

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock.
ingredients: pumpkin, potato, onion, green bell pepper, celery, bay leaves, dried thyme, curry powder, chicken stock powder, water
name: jd s pumpkin soup

steps: In a small bowl, combine lemons, orange, fresh coriander, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, lemon juice, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest,
ingredients: lemons, orange, fresh coriander, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot
name: lemony rub

steps: Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Stir to mix well. Cover and cook on low 6-9 hours. Cook rice as directed. Serve chicken a la king over a mound of rice.
ingredients: pineapple slices in syrup, chicken parts, chicken broth, vinegar, brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic clove, green pepper, cornstarch, water
name: island crock pot chicken

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the shrimp. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once.
ingredients: butter, creole seasoning, ground red pepper, paprika, large raw shrimp, salt, pepper, nonstick cooking spray
name: grilled shrimp kabobs with creole butter

steps: Place lamb in pan sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed sauteed
ingredients: dried thyme, ground cumin, ground coriander, paprika, coarse salt, pepper, lamb chops, extra virgin olive oil, arugula
name: spice rubbed lamb chops pan sauteed

steps: Place tomatoes in a saucepan and crush with your hands. Warm tomatoes over medium heat and add the rest of the ingredients and stir to incorporate. Bring the sauce to just under a boil and allow to cook for about an hour to thicken. Adjust seasonings. If not using right away, store in a glass jar in the refrigerator for up to one week. Freezes nicely for up to 3 months.
ingredients: tomato sauce, tomato paste, basil, greek oregano, garlic salt, onion powder, parsley
name: my very own basic but yummy pizza sauce

steps: Put bacon in a casserole dish and bake for 1 hour at 350.
ingredients: bacon, onion, brown sugar, jack daniels whiskey, baked beans, spicy brown mustard, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke
name: best evah baked beans

steps: Spray a large skillet with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat on stove. Add chicken to skillet and cook until browned on all sides. Combine remaining ingredients except rice and add to skillet. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 5-10 minutes. If mixture is too thick after simmering, add milk to desired thickness. Serve over warm white rice.
ingredients: rice, frozen peas, chicken breast tenders, cooking oil, stir-fry sauce, sliced almonds
name: fast chicken and rice

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: chicken, onion, butter, seasoning salt, black pepper, garlic powder, accent seasoning
name: mouth watering baked chicken

steps: Bring water to a boil and add rice. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Whisk milk and egg together, then whisk in sugar and vanilla. Stir into the hot cooked rice and then stir in raisins. Pour rice mixture into a small greased casserole dish and bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes. Serve warm or chilled.
ingredients: short-grain rice, water, milk, salt, vanilla bean, sugar
name: milk rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a shallow dish, combine biscuit mix, pecans, paprika, salt, poultry seasoning, rubbed sage, broiler-fryer chickens, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a shallow dish, combine biscuit mix, pecans, paprika, salt, poultry seasoning, rubbed sage, broiler-fryer chickens, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat
ingredients: dry sherry, egg white, cornflour, boneless chicken breasts, oil, spring onions, green pepper, bamboo shoots, soy sauce, unsalted cashews
name: chicken with cashew nuts

steps: In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the gorgonzola mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: carrots, butter, gorgonzola, salt, pepper
name: carrots with goronzola cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken.
ingredients: frozen chicken nibbles, liquid honey, dijon mustard, grainy mustard, curry powder
name: honey dijon mustard curry chicken nibbles

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion and carrots. Cook 7 minutes. Then add turkey, thyme and salt. Cook until thickened. Stir in tomato paste and broth, bring to boil. Reduce and simmer until thickened. Transfer to a 2 quart baking dish and top with favorite prepared mashed potatoes. Bake 15 minutes in oven.
ingredients: ground beef, cream of celery soup, milk, onion, salt, pepper, celery, mashed potatoes
name: joan s weeknight shepherd s pie

steps: Cook the pasta in boiling water to the desired degree of doneness. Drain, but do not rinse. Return to the pot. Toss in the remaining ingredients and warm over low heat until the butter and cheese melts. Serve immediately as a side dish or entre.
ingredients: broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, anchovy fillets, fresh chili pepper, linguine, butter, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli with linguine

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Rub salmon with salt and pepper. Place salmon in 2-quart shallow baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork. Whisk balsamic vinegar, cornstarch, orange juice and brown sugar in medium saucepan. Add chicken broth and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer, stirring until the mixture thickens. Arrange salmon on serving platter and serve with sauce. Serve over hot white rice, if desired.
ingredients: red salmon, oats, fat-free ricotta cheese, egg whites, fresh chives, fresh dill, fresh cilantro, kosher salt, pepper
name: very healthy salmon cakes patties

steps: In a saucepan, combine the tapioca and milk. Set aside for 5 minutes. Add the brown sugar, salt and egg yolks, mix well. Cook on low heat. Stirring often, for 15 to 20 minutes, until the mixture begins to bubble and thicken. The tiny pearls of tapioca will become more visible as the cook. Remove from the heat and stir in the butter until it melts. Add the vanilla. The pudding will continue to thicken as it cools. Pour equal amounts into 4 serving cups. Chill for about an hour until cold.
ingredients: egg, milk, italian cheese blend, butter, tapioca starch, self-rising flour
name: chipas argentinean cheese bread

steps: Mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts, butter, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, apple. Bake at 350 degrees for about 1 hour or until toothpick test comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts, butter, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, apple
name: apple loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place 2 tablespoons butter in each of two 9-inch pie plates. Heat in oven until melted. Stir together bisquick, milk and eggs. Arrange half of the peach slices in each pie plate. Divide batter evenly between pie plates. Stir together sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle over batter. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until puffed and golden brown. High altitude no changes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, ground cinnamon, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, peaches
name: golden peach muffins

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add minced garlic and lightly saute just until fragrant. Stir in the flour and stir for about one minute. This will be thick. Slowly pour in the milk. Add salt, pepper, oregano and nutmeg. Stir until creamy and thick. Turn off the heat and stir in nutritional yeast. Serve over your choice of pasta.
ingredients: heavy cream, butter, flour, parmesan cheese, fontina cheese, garlic, salt, black pepper
name: olive garden alfredo sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through.
ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, monterey jack cheese, cream cheese, small curd cottage cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder
name: baked eggs and cheese

steps: Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add ginger and red curry paste and stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add curry coriander and onion, saute 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, simmer until liquid evaporates. Remove from heat. Add ginger and red curry paste and stir fry for 1-2 minutes. Add the chopped sweet potato and chicken stock and cook for 15 minutes. Add the coconut cream and bring back to a simmer. Blend with a hand held blender until smooth. Divide between bowls and decorate with coriander leaves.
ingredients: fresh ginger, red onion, chili-garlic sauce, fish sauce, lime zest, lime juice, brown sugar, ground coriander, cumin
name: do it yourself red curry paste

steps: In medium mixing bowl with mixer on low. Cream graham cracker crust, milk, marshmallows, chocolate bars with almonds, whipping creampreparation:In medium mixing bowl with mixer on low. Cream graham cracker crust, milk, marshmallows, chocolate bars
ingredients: prepared graham cracker crust, milk, marshmallows, chocolate bars with almonds, whipping cream
name: no bake hershey s bar pie

steps: Tear the lettuce into small bite sized pieces and place in the bottom of 9x12 inch cake pan. Layer the rest of the ingredients in the order given, do not cook peas. Add the sugar to the mayonnaise and spread over the top as you would frosting. Top with grated cheese. Cover and refrigerate for 8 to 10 hours. Bacon bits can be used for bacon.
ingredients: lettuce, light cream, malt vinegar, dry mustard, sugar, egg yolk, salt, chives
name: lettuce salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, garlic, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, italian bread
name: molly s artichoke bread

steps: This recipe can also be made with white chocolate. Simply substitute white chocolate and leave out the coffee. Beat the cream, pulverized peppermints and sugar untill stiff peaks form. Pipe or spoon onto a parchment paper lined baking sheet, sprinkle with the crushed peppermints, and freeze until firm, about 20 minutes. Heat the milk and salt for the hot chocolate in a saucepan over medium heat until steam begins to rise. Whisk in the remaining ingredients until smooth. Ladle into mugs and top with a rosette of frozen whipped cream. Doubling the whipped cream will give you quite a few rosettes to keep in the freezer until needed. Store them in an airtight container and try to use them within 2 or 3 weeks.
ingredients: heavy cream, milk chocolate, smooth peanut butter, golden syrup, toffee pieces, chocolate ice cream, vanilla ice cream, salted peanuts
name: hot chocolate peanut butter fudge passion sundae

steps: Place the cake in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Remove from refrigerator and let cool.
ingredients: vanilla icing, candy sprinkles, vodka, cranberry juice, champagne, cherries
name: birthday cake martini the fruity version

steps: In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated.
ingredients: tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, rice vinegar, sugar, fresh dill, seasoning salt
name: dilled cucumber and tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat an 8 x 8-inch pan with oil or nonstick spray. Dice the potatoes and put them aside. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the milk, celery soup, eggs, onion powder, salt and pepper until smooth. Stir in the tuna, cheese, and diced potatoes, then pour the mixture into the prepared pan. It should come nearly to the top. Bake for 55 to 60 mniutes, or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean. The edges should be golden brown.
ingredients: butter, flour, dry mustard, milk, lemon juice, tuna, macaroni, cheddar cheese, fresh ground pepper, salt
name: easy macaroni tuna bake

steps: Heat oven to 180 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add almond oil, sliced almonds, sugar, water, and 1 tbsp butter. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until almond oil is just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the almonds. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve with cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: almond oil, sliced almonds, sugar, water
name: almond brittle croccante

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: onion, thyme leaves, uncooked rice, ham fat, tomato paste, pigeon peas, water, cooking oil, salt, pepper
name: nassau peas and rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 12 cup muffin tin with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix together flour, bran flakes, baking soda, baking powder and salt. In a medium bowl, combine applesauce, banana and shredded apple. Add sugar and egg to wet ingredients. Add wet ingredients to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Fill muffin tins and bake for about 25 minutes or until tests clean.
ingredients: oat bran, brown sugar, cinnamon, baking powder, raisins, skim milk, frozen apple juice concentrate, egg whites, canola oil, apple
name: oat bran apple cinnamon muffins

steps: Combine the meatballs, soup, milk and nutmeg in a large skillet. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15 minute. Stir in the sour cream, cover and heat for 2 or 3 minute more. Sprinkle with parsley if desired and serve warm.
ingredients: cream of chicken soup, milk, nutmeg, sour cream, parsley
name: saucy meatballs

steps: Heat butter in a frying pan over medium heat and add rice. Stir rice around for a few minutes to absorb the butter and get a little nutty tasting. Stir rosemary into rice. Add chicken broth. Bring broth to a boil, reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until rice is cooked. Add white wine and parmesan cheese and heat through. Salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: water, chicken broth, salt, saffron threads, short-grain brown rice, unsalted butter, parmesan cheese
name: saffron parmesan rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown.
ingredients: sourdough bread, butter, parsley, fresh garlic, mayonnaise, lemon juice, romano cheese
name: the fish market s cheezy garlic bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread the brie cheese over the top of the brie. Bake for 15 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: peach, butter, egg, sugar, cream, salt, brie cheese, french bread
name: peach brie french toast

steps: Mix all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook
ingredients: pork tenderloin, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice, mango, red bell pepper, orange juice, cornstarch, hot pepper sauce, green onion
name: caribbean pork and mango stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 450f grease 10-12 inch round pizza pan. Roll out the dough to fit the your pizza pan or you can just press the dough in the pan. Bake for 10 minutes and remove from oven. Let your oven cool down to 400f spread the crust with mustard and then layer on the tomato slices. Sprinkle the thyme, salt and pepper on top of the tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and bake at 400f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, onions, salt, pepper, butter, flour, milk
name: tomato dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: butter, crunchy peanut butter, sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: the world s greatest peanut butter cookies

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and shortening in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, salt, baking powder, lard, egg, vinegar, cold water
name: favorite pie crust

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. I prefer to use a mixing spoon over an electric mixer since the dough will be very stiff. On an ungreased cookie sheet, shape dough into round balls and then slightly press the dough down with the bottom of a cup. Bake for 8-9 minutes. Allow to cool and remove from cookie sheet. Makes around 24 cookies. Once cooled, frost with a buttercream frosting. Store in a sealed container.
ingredients: egg, margarine, mayonnaise, sugar, flour
name: gloria s lofthouse sugar cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion soup mix, hot water, orange marmalade, mandarin oranges, pineapple chunks, russian salad dressing
name: mel s russian chicken dish

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Line baking sheets with parchment or a silpat. Cream butter, fudge brownie mix, butter, cream cheese, egg, powdered sugar, creamy peanut butter, chocolate fudge frosting. Add eggs one at a time. Stir in peanut butter chips. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto prepared sheets. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until set. And brown around the edges. Remove from oven and cool on pan 5 minutes. Remove from pan to finish cooling.
ingredients: fudge brownie mix, butter, cream cheese, egg, powdered sugar, creamy peanut butter, chocolate fudge frosting
name: bake off contest peanut butter brownie cookies

steps: In a saucepan over low heat, bring the black grapes, cornstarch, lemon, juice of 2 cups of water to a boil. Simmer until the grapes are soft. Add the rest of the water. Bring to a boil again and remove from heat. Mix the cornstarch and a bit of water separately. Add to the saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve with a bit of granulated sugar sprinkled on top.
ingredients: seedless black grapes, cornstarch, lemon, juice of, sugar, whipped cream
name: grape pudding crema fredda di uva nera

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrots, ice cube, pickled jalapeno peppers, onions, oil, white vinegar, salt
name: carrot jalapeno marinade

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Fill each steak with meat, fold in half. Dip the folded steak in the beaten egg and fry on a skillet in oil. Brown on both sides. Arrange the steak in an oven proof dish. Cover the steak with the tomato sauce, garlic, jalapenos and cheese. Season with salt & pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until hot through. Serve with black beans and rice.
ingredients: steak, rotel tomatoes, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, bell pepper, onion, jalapeno, salt and pepper, seasoning salt
name: spanish steak or spanish chicken

steps: Combine miracle whip with sugar in a large bowl. Mix well with electric beater until sugar is dissolved. Add cabbage, carrot and onion mixture and toss well. Cover and chill at least 2 hours, preferably over night, before serving. To make things even easier i usually just buy the pre packaged cole slaw bags in the produce dept. They have the carrots and cabbage already chopped. I just chop them up smaller and use that instead of cutting up my own fresh ingredients.
ingredients: fat-free miracle whip, sugar, cabbage, carrot, onions
name: kfc fat free coleslaw

steps: In a large skillet melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook about 15 minutes or until onion gets soft and starts to brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium-low heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Keep warm in the oven until remaining quesadillas are cooked. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: american cheese, salsa, skim milk, cilantro, ground cumin, parsley, white pepper, chili powder, adobo seasoning
name: queso

steps: Drain oysters, reserving the liquid. Mix oyster liquid, eggs, hot sauce and milk. Mix cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, baking powder. Saute oysters in butter until edges curl. Remove from heat and let cool. Dip oysters first in liquid, then dredge in cornmeal mixture. Fry oysters in hot pepper oil for three minutes over medium heat, turning once, they are done when golden brown. Remove, drain on paper towels.
ingredients: oysters, butter, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, pecorino romano cheese, parsley
name: charbroiled oysters from dragos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, salt, butter, pepper, ginger, cinnamon, cayenne, brown sugar, raisins
name: spicy mashed sweet potatoes with raisins

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, white pearl onion, chicken broth, ground mustard, parsley, cumin, salt
name: cherry tomato and onion saute

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cover and bring to
ingredients: potato, butter, salt, olive oil, onion, ground beef, pepper, egg, gruyere cheese
name: batata merhiya algerian mashed potatoes layered with beef

steps: Heat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Dot top with butter. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers.
ingredients: walnuts, unsalted butter, italian bread, brie cheese, fresh pear
name: buttery brie and pear bites

steps: Combine the lemon juice, sugar, cognac, triple sec, maraschino cherries, and lime sherbet in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour into a glass jar and store in the refrigerator. For the lemonade, combine the lemon juice, sugar, cognac, triple sec, maraschino cherries, and lime sherbet in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Pour into
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, sugar, cognac, triple sec, maraschino cherries
name: sidecar cocktails

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add turkey burgers and cook 4 to 6 minutes per side, until cooked through. Serve the cheese-stuffed burgers with this meal and refrigerate remaining burgers until ready to use. Serve burgers on rolls.
ingredients: ground turkey breast, herbed goat cheese, low-fat mayonnaise, lemon, zest of, whole wheat hamburger buns, roasted red peppers, arugula leaves
name: goat cheese turkey burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, water, mozzarella cheese, eggs, tuna fish, fine salt, milk, ground mustard, paprika, capsicums
name: macaroni pie

steps: Boil yams in water, on stove, until soft. After yams are cool to touch, peel them, cut into thick chunks and put aside in 8 x 8 glass dish. Put rest of ingredients in deep non-stick saucepan. Cook over medium-high until the alcohol has boiled off -stir constantly-this should take about 3-4 minutes. Pour mixture over set aside yams. Bake at 350 f until dish is bubbly. Let sit a few minutes before serving.
ingredients: yams, brown sugar, sugar, vanilla, dark karo syrup, butter, cinnamon
name: easy stove top candied sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, peanut butter, eggs, grape jelly
name: peanut butter n jelly bars
