steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onions until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, brown lentils, salt
name: lentils with fried onions

steps: In a small saucepan, combine water and agar-agar flakes and bring to a boil. Gently simmer until agar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes. Add espresso and stir until dissolved. Cool slightly. In a food processor or blender, blend tofu, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla, salt and cooled espresso mixture until completely smooth. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight until firm. Serve topped with non-dairy topping.
ingredients: silken tofu, semisweet vegan chocolate chips, agave nectar, vanilla extract, sea salt
name: decadent chocolate frosting or mousse vegan

steps: Preheat oven to 350 c. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, or until the scallops turn golden brown.
ingredients: scallops, plain breadcrumbs, butter, honey, vegetable oil
name: baked scallops in honey and butter

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a med saute pan spray with non stick cooking spray. Saute onions about 2-3 minutes until translucent. Add tilapia filets on top of sauteed onions. Add chopped garlic on each filet. Add tomato slices or chopped tomatoes. Place pan with topped filets in the oven. Bake 12-15 minutes until fish is white.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, white wine, onion, green pepper, tomatoes, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, garlic powder, parmesan cheese
name: veggie topped tilapia

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, unsweetened baking cocoa, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, milk, vegetable oil, instant coffee granules, egg, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: marvelous mocha muffins

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the sugar and continue stirring until the onions are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add flour and cook for 3 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the hummus with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast hummus under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve hummus on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: butter, onion, brown sugar, chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, olive oil
name: caramelised onion hummus

steps: Place brisket on top of brisket and place in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 10-12 hours or until brisket is tender. Remove brisket from crock pot and place in crock pot
ingredients: beef brisket, salt, carrot, onion, ketchup, fresh coarse ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, lemon juice
name: texan crock pot roast

steps: Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheesepreparation:Brown meat, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom
ingredients: hamburger, spaghetti sauce, cottage cheese, noodles, cheddar cheese
name: electric skillet lasagna

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. In a small mixing bowl, beat the eggs with a splash of water. On a plate combine breadcrumbs and thyme. Then on another plate combine flour with a pinch of salt and pepper. Lay ham strips on work surface, top each slice with cheese then place chicken chink toward the end of the strip. Rollup lightly, and coat with flour, eggs and breadcrumbs. Cook for 20 mins or until done.
ingredients: cream of celery soup, sour cream, milk, boneless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, deli ham, swiss cheese, frozen mixed vegetables, seasoned stuffing mix, butter
name: itsa chicken cordon bleu casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl. Toss to coat. Roast carrots until tender and lightly caramelized, turning carrots over once, 35 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: multigrain bread, onion, carrots, zucchini, brown lentils, eggs, ground coriander, ground cumin, corn kernel
name: lentil carrot and cumin loaf

steps: In a large skillet melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook about 15 minutes or until onion gets soft and starts to brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium-low heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Keep warm in the oven until remaining quesadillas are cooked. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: hamburger meat, onions, green onion, garlic, picante sauce, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, corn tortillas, cheese
name: queso beef enchiladas

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and
ingredients: fresh green beans, soy sauce, garlic clove, chili-garlic sauce, honey, canola oil
name: sweet and spicy green beans

steps: In a lrg saucepan, combine cranberry juice cocktail, grand marnier, fresh lime juice, lime zest, sparkling wine. Pour in 100ml sparkling white wine. Top with cranberry and lime mixture. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cranberry juice cocktail, grand marnier, fresh lime juice, lime zest, sparkling wine
name: champagne cosmopolitan

steps: In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon.
ingredients: tea bags, mint, lemon, orange, ginger, honey
name: south african rooibos redbush iced tea

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: biscuits, cooked chicken breast, cream of chicken soup, shredded cheddar cheese, frozen mixed vegetables, herbes de provence, onion powder, garlic cloves, black pepper
name: chicken pot pie cupcakes

steps: Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 1 hour until soft. Slice potatoes in half lengthwise. Scoop out insides, leaving a firm shell. Place potato pulp, cheddar cheese, milk, ham, sour cream, onion salt, pepper, and butter in a mixing bowl. Beat at high speed until smooth. Fill potato shells with mixture. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 20 to 30 minutes. Garnish with paprika or parsley.
ingredients: potatoes, jalapeno peppers, sour cream, plain yogurt, cream cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, bacon bits, butter, milk, swiss cheese
name: twice baked jalapeo potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, wheat bran, low-fat mayonnaise, warm water, honey, salt
name: low fat honey wheat pie crust

steps: Mix the mustard seeds and spices in a bowl, pour the vinegar on top and leave to soak overnight. Place the mixture in a mortar and pound to a paste. Gradually work in the molasses. The finished mustard should resemble a stiff paste, so add extra vinegar if necessary. Store the mustard in sterilized jars in the fridge. Use within 4 weeks.
ingredients: dry mustard, white vinegar, turmeric, salt, italian spices, sugar, eggs
name: that mustard

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Place kumara in a baking dish and drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Sprinkle on a pinch of salt. Roast for 25 minutes or until soft. Set aside to cool. Divide lettuce, tomato halves and radish slices between two chilled plates. Top each with half of the cooled kumara. Sprinkle on crumbled feta and pine nuts. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: kumara, oil, sugar, sea salt
name: sugar glazed kumara sweet potato

steps: Mix the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Add milk, butter, sugar, salt, baking soda and mix well. Bake at 375 degrees f until done.
ingredients: sourdough starter, evaporated milk, butter, sugar, salt, white bread flour, wheat flakes, flax seed meal, oatmeal, potato flakes
name: sourdough three grain bread abm

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, water, sugar, cloves, orange juice, lemon juice, cinnamon. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: frozen yeast dinner roll dough, vanilla pudding mix, sugar, orange rind, butter, dried cranberries, powdered sugar, fresh orange juice
name: orange cranberry pull apart

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: bacon, onion, double gloucester cheese, chives, table cream, black pepper
name: cheesy bacon and chives dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add flour mixture to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack.
ingredients: flour, chocolate chips, baking powder, ground nutmeg, salt, sugar, eggs, eggnog, vegetable oil
name: chocolate chip eggnog muffins

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad.
ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, instant rice, vegetables
name: holy chicken and rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute italian style burgers with the parmesan cheese and the mayonnaise. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: vegetables, water, parmesan cheese, seasoned bread crumbs, garlic powder, seasoning salt, pepper, butter
name: italian vegetable medley microwave

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain apricot nectar mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot.
ingredients: apricot nectar, lemon juice, water, sugar, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks
name: spiced apricot cider

steps: Sprinkle chicken with salt and lemon-pepper. In a large skillet, cook chicken in oil for 13-15 minutes or until juices run clear. Remove and keep warm. In the same skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until bacon is golden. Place two bacon strips on each chicken breast half. Top with caramelized onions and cheese.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil flavored cooking spray, garlic, chopped tomatoes, white wine, chicken broth, tarragon, marjoram, salt and pepper
name: chicken smothered in garlic

steps: In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: potatoes, mayonnaise, velveeta cheese, onion, salt, pepper, bacon, green olives
name: hot potato casserole

steps: Boil pasta until half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top.
ingredients: milk, elbow macaroni, eggs, sugar, lemon peel, vanilla, nutmeg, seedless raisin, sour cream
name: macaroni pudding

steps: Heat the peanut oil in a wok over medium heat. Add the ginger, garlic, baby bok choy, soy sauce, tapioca starch, water, chili oil and stir fry another 2 minutes. Pour the broth over the vegetables and simmer for 2 minutes. Season with tamari and serve over a bed of brown rice. Yield is estimated as a side dish.
ingredients: peanut oil, ginger, garlic, baby bok choy, soy sauce, tapioca starch, water, chili oil
name: bok choi for selina

steps: In a small mixing bowl, combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. Bake at 425 for 16 minutes, or until golden.
ingredients: spam, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, soda cracker crumbs
name: spam sticks

steps: Place chicken thighs in crock pot and sprinkle with taco seasoning mix. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. After 6 hours of cooking, you may need to shred the chicken using 2 forks. Stir and continue cooking. May need to add all or part of the reserved liquid if it looks too dry.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, tomatoes and green chilies, taco seasoning mix, taco shells, sour cream, cheddar cheese, cheese, cilantro, brown rice, refried beans
name: crock pot taco chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare muffin mix as directed on package, including adding the blueberries. Pour half of the batter into a greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. To prepare the filling, in a separate mixing bowl, beat together cream cheese, almond extract, sugar, lemon juice and egg until smooth. Spread the cream cheese filling over the layer of muffin batter in the pan. Pour the remaining batter on top of the filling. To make the streusel topping stir together melted butter, flour, sugar, chopped nuts and cinnamon. Sprinkle streusel topping over the top of the batter. Bake at 375 degrees f. For 35 to 45 minutes or until toothpick inserted into middle comes out clean. Cool, then refrigerate before serving.
ingredients: light brown sugar, vegetable oil, egg, sour milk, vanilla extract, salt, baking soda, flour, fresh blueberries, nuts
name: blueberry bread

steps: Heat butter, sugar and water in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the candy. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: butterscotch chips, frosting, peanuts, almond brickle chips
name: toffee butterscotch fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, crunchy peanut butter, powdered sugar, crisp rice cereal, almond bark
name: peanut butter and graham bon bons

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and vanilla bean and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: kiwi fruits, sugar, lemon juice, carbonated water
name: kiwi lemonade

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine oats, peaches and sugar. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Beat with a fork or wire whisk until blended. Add to oat mixture, mixing well. Add molasses, sugar, jam, and shortening to the egg. Blend mixture well. Gradually add flour mixture. Drop by tablespoonfuls 3 inches apart onto baking sheet. Bake for 12 minutes.
ingredients: rolled oats, lemon juice, water, milk, vanilla yogurt, peaches in juice, vanilla, brown sugar
name: peaches and cream soaked oatmeal

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Mix cream cheese, sour cream, salsa, tomatoes, green pepper, green onions, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, tortilla chips. Spread half of mixture on one side of each piece of bread. Put cheese slices onto bread and top with remaining bread slices. Place the sandwiches, buttered sides down, on hot griddle. Spread top sides with remaining butter mixture. Cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted. Serve with salsa as a dip.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, salsa, tomatoes, green pepper, green onions, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, tortilla chips
name: mexican plateau

steps: Mix in order given. Bake at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven to cool. Cookies should not be brown but a very light tan. Roll in powdered sugar while still warm. Bake
ingredients: tea bags, water, sugar, frozen lemonade, frozen orange juice, brandy
name: christmas slush

steps: Put the onions in the sterilised jars, and add marinade to cover. Cook at medium-high for 15 minutes. Remove from heat, and add the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Gently put the onions in the sterilised jars, and add marinade to cover.
ingredients: yellow onions, water, olive oil, dark brown sugar, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, tabasco sauce, parsley
name: outrageous onions

steps: Put the rice and oil to fry in a small pan at high heat, stirring from time to time, until golden. At the same time put the water to boil. Add the salt. Turn the heat to low and put the lid loosely on the pan. Let it simmer for 12-15 minutes or until all the liquid has been absorbed and the rice has fluffed. Remove from the heat and let it wait covered for 5-10 minutes. Serve as a side dish to any meat or with beans.
ingredients: calrose rice, water, oil, sea salt
name: puerto rican white rice

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute onions in butter in 12 inch fry pan. Beat eggs in bowl with artichoke hearts, olives, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over onions in pan and cover. Cook over medium heat until the bottom of the omelette is golden brown, carefully lift edge with spatula to check. Lay cheese over half of omelette. Flip other half of omelette over cheese half. Wait about 1 minute. Slide out of pan and serve hot.
ingredients: mayonnaise, capers, onions, cornichons, fresh parsley, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, artichokes, lemon, eggs
name: artichokes parisienne

steps: Place bread slices on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350 f until lightly toasted. Set aside. Mix together sugar, walnuts, and butter. Top each slice of bread with a cheese slice, an apple slice, and one teaspoon of the walnut mixture. Bake until cheese melts.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, miracle whip, cheese, smoked chicken breast, red onion, celery, apple, butter
name: apple autumn sandwich

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, cook pork roast, green chilies, chili powder, oregano, ground cumin, garlic cloves, jalapenos, salt, lime juice, olive oil. Add pork roast, green chilies, chili powder, oregano, ground cumin, garlic cloves, jalapenos, salt, lime juice, olive oil. Add pork roast, green chilies, chili powder, oregano, ground cumin, garlic
ingredients: pork roast, green chilies, chili powder, oregano, ground cumin, garlic cloves, jalapenos, salt, lime juice, olive oil
name: kitchen kouture carnitas

steps: In a large skillet, heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium high heat. Add the rice pieces and cook until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the peas, sausages, cheese, onion, garlic cloves, and saute for 3 minutes. Add the sausages, cheese, onion, garlic cloves, and saute for 3 minutes. Add the sausages, cheese, onion
ingredients: basmati rice, frozen peas, sausages, cheese, onion, garlic cloves
name: cheesy sausage risotto

steps: Heat the oil in a pan and saut the potatoes for 5-6 minutes. Add potatoes, chilli and curry powder. Fry for a further few minutes. Stir in the yoghurt and cook for 2-5 minutes or until the potatoe is done. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: clarified butter, tiny new potatoes, onions, garlic clove, curry powder, salt, black peppercorns, water, lemon juice, cilantro
name: crock pot new potato curry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with butter and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir till the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: dates, boiling water, shortening, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, ground cinnamon, walnuts
name: judy s date muffins

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, cream margarine, sugar and vanilla essence with electric beater. Add eggs and egg whites, one at a time, continue beating between additions. Blend in yoghurt, polenta, coconut, orange rind and orange juice. Beat well for further 2 minutes. Pour into greased ring pan. Bake in a moderately slow oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until cooked when tested and golden brown.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, baking powder, salt, fresh orange juice, orange, zest of, vanilla
name: easy moroccan orange cake

steps: Combine all beef jerky ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: flank steak, seasoning salt, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke
name: excellent beef jerky

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: walnuts, brussels sprout, olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of, salt & fresh ground pepper
name: quick sauteed brussels sprouts with toasted walnuts and lemon

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a small bowl, combine almonds, breadcrumbs and walnuts. Sprinkle over top pie crust. Peel and halve fresh apricots. Spread apricot halves over nut mixture. Sprinkle sugar over apricots. Bake 30 minutes.
ingredients: apricot preserves, orange juice, pears, ice cream, ground cinnamon, cinnamon sticks
name: apricot glazed pears

steps: Place chicken in a bowl and add other ingredients. Mix well. Heat oil approx 2cm in depth. Drop teaspoonfuls of mixture into the hot oil. Deep fry for a few minutes until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. Serve with cucumber mint dip.
ingredients: chicken breasts, tortilla chips, seasoned flour, eggs, oil
name: spicy chicken dippers

steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, curry powder, ground red pepper, vegetable oil, orange juice, light brown sugar, butter
name: brown sugar glazed chicken

steps: In a medium bowl combine the crust ingredients, mix well. Press firmly into the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Refrigerate crust for 20-30 minutes. In another medium bowl, combine filling ingredients, and blend at low speed for 30 seconds, and then on medium high speed 2 minutes or until light and fluffy. Spread over filling. Refrigerate at least 4 hours, store leftovers in the refrigerator as well.
ingredients: mars bars, butter, peanut butter, icing sugar, corn flakes, dark chocolate
name: cornflake choc nut slice

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease or spray a large cookie sheet. Stir together dry ingredients including the sugar. Cut butter into flour mixture. Add raisins, stir to mix well. Beat egg in measuring cup. Add milk to make 1 cup. Stir into flour. Drop roughly tablespoon size scoops on cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, egg, vanilla yogurt, vanilla, milk, sugar
name: featherlight scones

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: fennel bulbs, tomatoes, dry white wine, orange zest, garlic, balsamic vinegar, red pepper flakes, skinless chicken breast halves, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: provencal chicken and fennel

steps: Preheat oven to 350f, grease and flour an 8-inch square cake pan and set aside. Peel, core and chop the apples. In a bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and syrup. Sift flour, ginger and cinnamon, and fold into creamed mixture with the apples. Put mixture into prepared pan, and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until cooked. May be cut into slices, or left as a cake and decorated with whipped cream and sprinkled with cinnamon.
ingredients: granny smith apples, puff pastry, sugar, cinnamon, egg
name: baked apples

steps: Place salmon fillets, in a single layer, in a greased baking pan. Sprinkle each fillet with salt and pepper. In cup combine dijon, butter and honey. Brush mixture on top of each fillet. In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs, pecans and parsley. Mix well. Spoon mixture evenly on top of each fillet. Bake in preheated 450 degree oven, for 10minutes. Garnish with lemon slices.
ingredients: salmon fillets, dijon-style mustard, honey, water, fresh breadcrumb, pecans, parsley, salt and pepper
name: pecan coated salmon fillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Line 9 inch pie pan with pastry. In large bowl combine all filling ingredients except butter and toss lightly. Spoon filling into crust lined pan. Cut 4 slits in top of crust. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Bake
ingredients: pastry for double crust 10 inch pie, sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, fresh blueberries, lemon juice, butter
name: blueberry pie 10 inch

steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan and cook over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, orange, orange zest, grand marnier
name: whole berry cranberry sauce with zing

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until browned stirring often. When done cut into strips. Place back into skillet and add soup, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas. Bring to a boil. Cover, cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until hot. Top with cheese and serve.
ingredients: chorizo sausage, spanish rice, water, chunky salsa, eggs, pepper, flour tortillas
name: mexican skillet eggs and rice

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: pine nuts, fresh basil, extra virgin olive oil, cooked brown rice, tomatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: pine nut stuffed basil tomatoes

steps: Place the beans in a large saucepan with cold water and bring to a boil. Once boiling, add a touch of salt and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain the beans and return to saucepan, add 2 tablespoons butter, chicken stock, brown sugar, chipotle pepper and adobo sauce. Mash the beans along the side of the crockery. Sprinkle with cheese, cover, and cook for 30 more minutes. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, chili powder, chipotle chile in adobo, black pepper, salt, black beans, no-salt-added whole tomatoes, green chilies
name: chipotle black bean chili

steps: Melt butter and while hot, stir in nut butter. Mix well and add vanilla, powdered sugar and rice krispies. Work in with hands until it will form balls. If using paraffin shred on a box grater then add to the chocolate in a double boil and heat till melted and combined. Dip into melted chocolate and paraffin or shortening with toothpick. Cool on waxed paper.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, salt, chocolate sprinkles
name: chocolate nut balls

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center.
ingredients: milk, butter, egg, white flour, baking powder, sugar, salt
name: thank god i m a country boy

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned.
ingredients: light brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, molasses, sweet potatoes, half-and-half, eggs, dry sherry, 9 inch pie shell
name: sweet potato pie iv

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook for about 5 minutes. Add cheddar cheese and cook for another 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Serve with tortilla chips and more salsa cold.
ingredients: deli ham, tortillas, oil, cheddar cheese, lettuce, salsa, sour cream
name: ham taquitos

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, lemon juice and the seasonings. Pour over the fish and onions. Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until fish is tender. Do not overcook or fish will dry out.
ingredients: grouper fillets, pecan halves, bourbon, olive oil, sea salt, black pepper, lime juice, honey
name: sea islands grouper

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium bowl mix water, vegetable oil, lemon juice, salt, honey, oatmeal, wheat germ, bread flour, pecans, fast rising yeast. Let it cool for 5 minutes and take it of the sheet otherwise they might stick to the bottom. If that happens put it back in oven to melt the sticky sugar. Spread on greased baking sheet and bake 7 - 10 minutes until sugar is caramelized
ingredients: water, vegetable oil, lemon juice, salt, honey, oatmeal, wheat germ, bread flour, pecans, fast rising yeast
name: wholesome pecan bread

steps: Preheat the oven to 375. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: sugar, white wine vinegar, chicken broth, chicken breasts, salt, pepper, orange, juice and zest of, orange
name: sweet orange chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together tater tots, mozzarella cheese, seasoning salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, tater tots, mozzarella cheese, seasoning salt
name: kielbasa and tater tot casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, egg, water, parmesan cheese, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, salt and pepper
name: meatloaf no ketchup

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix cooked pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, flour, pepper, paprika, milk, cheese
name: real deal macaroni and cheese

steps: Heat oven to 325 f. Mix together the bananas, buttermilk, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk, vanilla essence, sugar,
ingredients: bananas, vanilla essence, sugar, buttermilk
name: instant banana ice cream james martin recipe

steps: Spray a pie plate with vegetable spray. Press rolls out evenly into a 9-inch pie plate. Bake at 425 for 35-40 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Bake at 425 for 35-40 minutes or until a knife
ingredients: deep dish pie shells, cooked ham, swiss cheese, onions, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper
name: ham cheese pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: small red potatoes, olive oil, garlic, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley
name: roasted garlic herb new potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Using scissors, cut the butter in half. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and marshmallows. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, powdered milk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt
name: bread machine american muffin bread

steps: In large bowl, combine bananas, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, mandarin orange sections, crushed pineapple, flaked coconut, red food coloring. Pour over fruit and gently toss to coat. Sprinkle with coconut and marshmallows.
ingredients: strawberries, bananas, sweetened condensed milk, strawberry yogurt, lemon juice, mandarin orange sections, crushed pineapple, flaked coconut, red food coloring
name: ambrosia freeze

steps: In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. Remove cover,
ingredients: reduced sodium soy sauce, orange juice, brown sugar, garlic cloves, hot pepper sauce, rum extract, ground ginger, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: montego bay chicken low fat

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, margarine, eggs, sour cream, milk, salt and pepper, soft breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: polish potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper with a whisk. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: eggs, turkey, swiss cheese, bread, miracle whip, dried dill, margarine, salt and pepper
name: herbed breakfast sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: egg white, water, dry roasted peanuts, unblanched whole almonds, walnuts, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, salt
name: coated nut mix

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, pinto beans, tomato sauce, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: mexican beef cheese and bean casserole

steps: Heat the oil in a saute pan. Add the onion and saute until golden color. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover and simmer 30 minutes. Cool and then serve in small bowls.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, sea salt, balsamic vinegar, port wine, fresh thyme, muscovado sugar, mustard seeds, red pepper flakes, tomatoes
name: onion jam

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: chicken breasts, soy sauce, garlic, sesame seeds, flour, butter
name: oven baked sesame chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: cornflour, tapioca starch, baking powder, sugar, flaked coconut, egg, butter
name: brazilian corn cookies broinhas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, custard powder, white chocolate
name: custard powder biscuits cookies

steps: In a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and carrot and cook until onion begins to brown, stirring often. Add sauerkraut, mustard, sherry, caraway, and brown sugar. Mix well. Add kielbasa and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Serve mixed with egg noodles, over potatoes, or with chunky rye bread.
ingredients: bratwurst, vegetable oil, sauerkraut, onion, sugar, beer, hot dog buns, spicy brown mustard
name: bratwurst and sauerkraut skillet

steps: Preheat broiler. Spray cookie sheet with oil. Place eggplant cubes on cookie sheet and spray them with oil. Broil eggplant until browned, about 5 minutes, flip them and 5 minutes more. In a medium saucepan, bring vinegar, soy sauce, garlic and if desired, pepper to a boil and simmer for 6 minutes. Add browned eggplant to sauce and cook for 5 minutes more, stir several times. Serve hot with sticky rice.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, olive oil, pesto sauce, eggplants, mushrooms, feta cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, red pepper flakes
name: eggplant aubergine mushroom feta pesto pizza

steps: Place chicken in crockpot. Sprinkle with soup mix and garlic salt. Pour dressing and water over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Skim fat from cooking juices. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: catalina dressing, whole berry cranberry sauce, dry onion soup mix, chicken
name: awesome catalina chicken

steps: In a microwave-safe bowl, melt chocolate and butterscotch chips. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate chips, cheerios toasted oat cereal, dried cherries, walnut pieces
name: chocolate cherry clusters

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, all-purpose flour, baking powder
name: easy no fail cupcakes

steps: Heat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese, lemon juice, crabmeat, green onion, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, paprika, salt, onion powder, pepper. Gently stir in the crabmeat and most of the green onions. Reserve some green onions for garnish. Spoon the mixture into a 1-quart buttered casserole dish. Bake for 20-30 minutes until top is set and mixture is hot. Garnish the top with remaining green onions. Serve dip with tortilla chips or crackers.
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, lemon juice, crabmeat, green onion, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, paprika, salt, onion powder, pepper
name: cold crab dip

steps: Heat oven to 350. Grease 8x8 baking dish. Mix bisquick, milk, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage, sausage,
ingredients: bisquick, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, milk, oregano, parsley flakes
name: sausage cheese appetizer balls

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time.
ingredients: butter, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper, potatoes
name: breaded baked parmesan potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: cornmeal, rolled oats, cracked wheat, barley, water, salt
name: whole grain hot cereal

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas.
ingredients: onion, butter, carrots, broccoli, basil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, chicken bouillon powder
name: fancy vegetable medley

steps: Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Add chocolate chips and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, milk, butter, cocoa, vanilla, chunky peanut butter, quick oats
name: unbaked chocolate chip oatmeal cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, marshmallows, ginger, yogurt
name: alaine s tangy stove top sweet potatoes

steps: In large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add chicken & cook 3-5 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring frequently. Add the broccoli & cook while stirring 3 minutes or until broccoli is crisp tender. Fluff couscous with fork & stir into chicken & broccoli. To serve, portion couscous on plates & top with salsa.
ingredients: chuck roast, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, tomatillos, cilantro, limes, chicken bouillon
name: carne en su jugo meat cooked in it s own juice

steps: Mix together blue cheese, blue cheese, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, fresh lemon juice, celery, walnuts, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, dill pickle, celery seed, d
ingredients: small red potatoes, blue cheese, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, fresh lemon juice, celery, walnuts, dill pickle, celery seed
name: blue cheese and walnut potato salad

steps: Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place spinach on plates. Top with pasta mixture.
ingredients: spaghetti, onion, broccoli florets, medium shrimp, sweet and sour sauce, salt, pepper
name: quick and easy sweet and sour shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken thighs, soya sauce, salt, pepper, cornflour, marmite, maltose, honey, chicken stock
name: marmite chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Sprinkle crystal sugar sprinkles on tops of muffins. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: all-bran cereal, unsweetened applesauce, egg, dates, light brown sugar, margarine, whole wheat flour, baking soda, ground cinnamon, salt
name: applesauce date muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place fish in baking pan. Mix orange juice and butter. Pour half this mixture over the fish. Sprinkle the rind over. Bake for 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange mixture over. Bake another 10 minutes. Pour remaining orange
ingredients: white wine, shallot, butter, whipping cream, lemon, juice of
name: creamy lemon butter sauce for fish and seafood

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add chicken, and stir fry until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, vegetable oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, garlic clove, ground ginger, slivered almonds
name: slow cooked oriental chicken

steps: Wash mashed potatoes in a saucepan over medium heat. Add butter and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with bread and butter or french stick and butter on the side.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, bacon, butter, onion, flour, chicken stock, mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese
name: abby ray s mashed potato soup

steps: Place mustard on a sheet of greaseproof paper. Cut diagonal. Slashes in skin of fish fillets. Press fillets in cornmeal to coat thoroughly. Heat oil in pan, add the coated fish. Cook over medium heat for 3 minutes each side or until cooked. Drain on paper towels. Combine mayonnaise, chives and chili sauce. Serve with fish.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, white fish fillets, chicken stock, onion, grainy mustard, white wine vinegar, salt, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh parsley
name: mustardy fish fillets

steps: Place tea bags, fresh basil leaves in large measuring cup or teapot. Cover with boiling water and steep for 10 minutes. Strain into large pitcher. Stir in lemonade concentrate. Serve over ice.
ingredients: black tea bags, fresh blackberries, fresh basil leaves, boiling water, lemonade, ice, honey
name: blackberry basil iced tea

steps: Place brown rice, buttermilk, egg, honey, unsweetened cocoa, sweet cherries, chocolate shavings, whipped cream. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set.
ingredients: cooked brown rice, buttermilk, egg, honey, unsweetened cocoa, sweet cherries, chocolate shavings, whipped cream
name: rich chocolate cherry brown rice pudding

steps: Pour coffee into a cup. Add chocolate syrup. Add extract. Steam the milk till it is frothy and add to coffee. Spoon a bit of milk foam onto coffee and sprinkle with cocoa powder. Sweeten with sugar if desired.
ingredients: water, peppermint tea bag, chocolate syrup, splenda sugar substitute, non-dairy coffee creamer, whipped cream, ice
name: chocolate peppermint tea

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the egg noodles and sauté for 1 minute. Add the walnuts and sauté for 1 minute. Add the lemon and sauté for 1 minute. Add
ingredients: medium egg noodles, apples, walnuts, golden raisin, lemon, juice of, butter, sugar, eggs, orange juice
name: noodle pudding with apples

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork chops and cook until tender, about 5 minutes on each side.
ingredients: lean pork chops, flour, salt, garlic powder, oil, chicken and rice soup
name: chicken lickin good pork chops

steps: Cook pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, combine broth and flour in medium saucepan. Stir in cream cheese, 2 tbls. Of the parmesan cheese, the nutmeg and pepper. Cook 2 min., stirring constantly with a wire whisk until mixture boils and thickens. Drain pasta. Toss with sauce. Sprinkle with remaining parmesan cheese and parsley.
ingredients: fettuccine, sweet italian sausage, alfredo sauce, fresh parmesan cheese
name: fettuccine and sweet italian sausage alfredo

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: chicken breast, salsa, corn, tortillas, mexican cheese, taco seasoning, sour cream
name: crockpot chicken quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or in a heavy pot on low heat. Pour it evenly into the unbaked pie shell. In a large bowl, mix the eggs, corn syrup, sugar, butter, and vanilla well. Stir in the walnuts. Pour the mixture into the chocolate-lined pie shell and bake until the filling is set, 45 to 50 minutes. Remove to a rack and let cool. The pie may be made ahead several days, or frozen for up to 3 months. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: sugar, flour, eggs, english walnuts, chocolate chips, pure vanilla extract, butter, ready-made pie crust
name: basic kentucky chocolate walnut pie

steps: Combine all ingredients, except the chicken, in a skillet. Cook on high for 3-4 minutes on the stove. Add the chicken. Cover. Cook on high for 3-
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs, garlic clove, fresh ginger, teriyaki sauce, mango
name: mango teriyaki chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, shortening, milk, vanilla, eggs
name: quick yellow cake

steps: Preheat griddle to medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Pour evenly over bread slices, pressing down until some of the liquid is absorbed and bread does not float. Bake 350f for 45 minutes, or until center reaches 160f and bread is golden brown.
ingredients: eggs, skim milk, chunky peanut butter, ground cinnamon, honey, bread, butter, unsweetened applesauce, maple syrup
name: peanut butter french toast

steps: Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime.
ingredients: salmon fillets, green onions, fresh lime juice, teriyaki sauce, thyme, lime
name: teriyaki lime salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, oat bran, baking soda, baking powder, salt, low-fat buttermilk, canola oil
name: whole wheat dinner muffins

steps: Heat oil in wok, add curry paste and stir fry for one minute. Add pork, stir fry until lightly browned. Add coconut milk and one cup water, bring to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add corn and peas to wok, cook for 5 minutes. Add fish sauce, brown sugar, lime rind and basil leaves, toss well. Serve with steamed rice.
ingredients: coconut milk, red curry paste, brown sugar, shrimp, snap peas, bamboo shoot, red bell pepper, thai basil, fish sauce
name: red curry shrimp

steps: Combine marinade ingredients and add lamb. Marinade for 2 hours. Drain lamb and score fat with diamond pattern. Place on a cake rack inside a baking dish, this stops the racks from sitting in fat. Warm the honey and lemon juice together. Brush onto lamb fat and sprinkle with fennel seeds. Bake at 350f for 30 to 40 minutes or as required, basting regularly with the remaining honey and lemon mixture.
ingredients: racks of lamb, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, plain breadcrumbs, parsley, garlic cloves
name: roast rack of lamb with persillade

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin pan with cooking spray. Beat sugar and eggs together until thickened. Add melted butter and almond extract. Beat well. Add flour. Stir in cranberries and pecans. Fill muffin pan. Since these do not raise much fill the cups to the top. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until browned on top and done in center. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, dried cranberries, walnuts, slivered almonds, pretzel nuggets
name: sugared cranberry gorp

steps: Saute bell peppers in 1-2 tablespoons butter or olive oil until bell peppers are tender. Place bell peppers in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until bell peppers are tender, about 5 minutes. Remove bell peppers from heat and set aside.
ingredients: salt, linguine, olive oil, roasted red pepper, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, fresh ground pepper, crushed red pepper flakes
name: garlic linguine with roasted bell peppers

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: broccoli florets, fettuccine, oil, parmesan cheese, sesame seeds, garlic powder
name: broccoli pasta toss

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all ingredients except the cheese together in a bowl. Mold a tbs of meat around a cube of cheese to form a small shaped meatball. Repeat with all of the meat. Spray an edged cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray and place meatballs on the cookie sheet. Bake for 7-10 min or until meat is done and cheese is melted.
ingredients: mincemeat, green onion, ketchup, tasty cheese
name: cheesy meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: meat, yellow onion, egg, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, garlic, salt, black pepper, milk, cilantro
name: amazing homemade meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: small curd cottage cheese, ricotta cheese, sour cream, baking mix, eggs, butter, swiss cheese
name: mini quiches for a crowd

steps: Prehead oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart.
ingredients: popcorn, butter, brown sugar, light corn syrup, baking soda
name: old dutch popcorn twists

steps: Place the prawns in a bowl, cover with water, soak for about 10 seconds, then squeeze out the excess water. Place the drained prawns in a food processor with the prawns, chilli, garlic, coriander, salt and egg. Pulse until well blended. Preheat the oven to 200 degrees celcius. Using lightly floured hands divide the mixture into 12 small cakes. Spray a baking sheet very lightly with oil and arrange the prawns onto the baking sheet, evenly spaced apart. Spray with a little oil and bake for 15-20 minutes, turning half way through, until golden brown and just begining to crisp. Aerve warm with baby lettuce, rocket or watercress leaves and a bowl of sweet chilli sauce.
ingredients: prawns, soda water, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, salt and pepper, egg yolk, oil
name: tempura prawns

steps: In bowl, mix the first 5 ingredients. Place onions in small bowl and chill until ready to use. Grill salmon over medium coals for 10 minutes, turn and grill the other side for 10 minutes. Brush with miso mixture throughout grilling. Place salmon on platter and sprinkle with miso mixture to taste. Combine soy sauce, brown sugar, water and oil. Marinate fish in soy mixture for 2 hours or more. Remove from marinade. Grill for 7 minutes per side.
ingredients: green onions, red miso, egg yolk, sake, sugar, dashi, dark soy sauce, salmon fillets
name: grilled salmon with miso

steps: Heat oil in a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: frozen spinach, toasted sesame oil, garlic cloves, green onion, toasted sesame seeds
name: seasoned spinach with garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees celsius. Place the eggs and sugar in a bowl and whisk to combine. Sift the flour, baking powder and cocoa powder over the egg mixture and fold through with the melted butter. Spoon the mixture into greased large madeleine tins until two-thirds full. Bake for 10 minutes or until the madeleines are set.
ingredients: milk, eggs, cocoa, vanilla extract, caster sugar, gelatin
name: chocolate timbales

steps: In a large saucepan, bring sugar and corn syrup to boil. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. Mix in cereal. Drop by large spoonful onto wax paper. Let cool before removing from wax paper.
ingredients: butter, sugar, light corn syrup, peanut butter, crispy rice cereal
name: peanut butter crispy rice treats

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, evaporated milk, vanilla, pecan halves
name: spiced sugared pecans

steps: In large skillet, add beef, onions and salt. Cook until beef is browned. Add the cooked beef and the rest of the ingredients. Cover and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
ingredients: lean beef, button mushrooms, fat, onion, boiling water, salt and pepper, paprika, cornstarch, cold water, tomato puree
name: german goulash

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In medium saucepan, combine mangoes, lime juice, ground nutmeg, flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, butter, milk. Mix well. Pour batter into greased 20 cm cake tin. Bake 180 c for 1 hour. Cool in tin for 10 minutes.
ingredients: mangoes, lime juice, ground nutmeg, flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, butter, milk
name: mango cobbler

steps: Place mango in a serving dish. In a pot add the lemon juice, lemon juice and honey. Heat gently, no boiling until the sugar is completely dissolved. Do not use juice until it is completely cooled. Strain the juice and pour over the mango wedges. Sprinkle with the lime rind, cover, chill for at least 3 hours. Serve in small bowls with a scoop of ice cream or sherbert and garnish with the sprigs of mint.
ingredients: mango, bananas, lemon juice, orange juice, vanilla ice cream, cinnamon, brown sugar, peanuts
name: mango and banana sundae

steps: Place the flour, yeast, sugar and salt in a small bowl, and mix with an electric mixer. Mix on medium-low speed for 1 minute. Add water, and mix another 12 minutes on medium or second speed. Add the chips and mix for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the chips are well distributed throughout the dough. Take dough out of the bowl and lightly knead into a ball. Let rest for 15-20 minutes. Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cut the dough into 4 portions and knead into the desired form. Place the loaves on a baking pan lined with parchment paper and bake for approximately 20 minutes or until nicely browned.
ingredients: flour, yeast, gluten, water, salt, white chocolate chips
name: club med white chocolate bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream the butter, eggs, vanilla, and water. Add the remaining dry ingredients and stir until the mixture is well blended. Spread batter into a lightly greased 9x12 pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool in pan. Cut into 2-inch squares.
ingredients: orange juice, half-and-half, sugar, corn syrup, grenadine, whipped cream, cherries
name: summer dream from the flying apron cafe

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into pie shell. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: gingersnap cookies, butter, pumpkin pie filling, milk, vanilla ice cream
name: pumpkin blizzard pie

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion. Cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until onion has softened. Add anchovies and rosemary. Stir to combine, then cover, reduce heat to low and cook for 20 minutes or until onion and garlic are very soft. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Preheat grill to high. Split baguette in half lengthways and cut widthways into 8cm pieces. Toast under grill until golden brown. Top with garlic and onion and serve.
ingredients: butter, onions, fresh rosemary, salt, fresh ground black pepper, french baguettes, swiss cheese
name: french onion toasts

steps: In a cast iron skillet over medium high heat cook the zalaata or doggos until blackened. Remove half of the blackened skin and discard. Chop the chilies. Combine the chopped chilies with the remaining ingredients. Let stand 1 hour. Cover and chill salsa for 6 hours.
ingredients: tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, lemon, juice of, coriander
name: saudi salsa zalaata or doggos

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: chicken breasts, cream, butter, milk, flour, salt
name: cream chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: brownie mix, egg substitute, non-fat vanilla yogurt, water, low-fat graham crackers, miniature marshmallow, peanut butter and milk chocolate chips
name: low fat peanut butter s more bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, whipping cream, powdered sugar, flavoring, fresh strawberries
name: sponge cake roll

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer.
ingredients: cream cheese, peanut butter, sugar, milk, whipped cream, chocolate crumb pie shell, chocolate syrup, peanuts
name: no fuss peanut butter pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: ground turkey, onion, fresh breadcrumbs, apple, egg, thyme, flour, vegetable oil
name: apple and turkey meatballs

steps: Place potatoes and onion in pan, barely cover with water and bring to a boil. Turn down to simmer. After 25 minutes, mash potatoes in the pan. Add salt, pepper, parsley and butter. After butter melts, add milk or cream to desired consistency. Cook a few more minutes to get soup back up to temperature. Garnish each serving with chopped green onions.
ingredients: potatoes, celery, carrot, onion, butter, flour, milk, chicken bouillon cubes, parsley
name: idabel s potato soup

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, corn oil, dried split green peas, turmeric, salt, hot green peppers, water
name: atar allecha

steps: Place gruyere and apple in a bowl. Whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, honey and salt and pepper. Pour over gruyere and apple. Mix well, with your hands. Serve.
ingredients: gruyere cheese, celery root, granny smith apples, fresh lemon juice, mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, honey, salt, horseradish
name: apple celery root and gruyere salad
