steps: Place vanilla ice cream, sugar, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge sauce, candy bars, whipped cream, fudge
ingredients: vanilla ice cream, sugar, whipping cream, fudge sauce, candy bars
name: dairy queen blizzard

steps: Place sausage in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks.
ingredients: sausage links, olive oil, ground beef, onion, garlic clove, italian plum tomatoes, tomato paste, dried basil, salt and pepper
name: rogue sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Prepare muffin tin. Sift flours and spice. Stir in sugar. Make well in centre. Place buttermilk, yoghurt, eggs and oil in large jug. Mix well. Pour into flour mixture, stir with wooden spoon until just combined. Spoon into muffin pan and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: frozen mixed berries, sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, cinnamon, nutmeg, nonfat milk, old fashioned oats, splenda sugar substitute, plain fat-free yogurt, almond extract
name: berry crisp weight watchers core recipe

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juicepreparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine apple, raisins, celery, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat
ingredients: unsweetened crushed canned pineapple, tart apples, carrots, raisins, flaked coconut, sugar-free non-fat vanilla yogurt, plain fat-free yogurt, reduced-fat mayonnaise, lemon juice
name: carrot apple salad

steps: Combine apricots and water in a bowl, cover, and let stand overnight, or until soft and well plumped. Combine apricots and their soaking water in saucepan with the orange peel and juice and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the sugar and bring to boil, while stirring. Boil gently, stirring often, until the mixture is thick and shiny and begins to clear the sides of the pan when stirred. While mixture thickens, be sure to stir it continually but gently, so that the fruit does not burn or get squashed. Do not allow the mixture to cook down to a puree. It should retain good-sized bits of apricot. Remove the preserve from heat and stir in almond extract and brandy. Ladle into 3 half-pint canning jars, prepared in usual manner and seal with sterilized 2 piece screw-on lids. Cool and let mellow several weeks or more before serving.
ingredients: prunes, dried apricots, raisins, orange juice, orange zest, desiccated coconut, almonds
name: apricot orange balls

steps: Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan.
ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, salt, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, german sweet chocolate, marshmallow creme, pecans, vanilla extract
name: perfect fudge

steps: Combine all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size.
ingredients: praline liqueur, pecans, butter, sugar, evaporated milk, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla, marshmallow creme
name: praline pecan fudge

steps: Mix together all ingredients in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, smooth cashew butter, tamari, water, black pepper, sage
name: cashew gravy

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red onion, olive oil, celery, garlic, chicken broth, small shell pasta, white beans, carrot, frozen green peas, parmesan cheese
name: jen s soup

steps: In a small bowl or jar, combine dabs of crabmeat, fine soft bread crumbs, dry sherry, chives, dried mustard, salt, bacon. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate 24 hours before using. Place the crab meat in a chilled serving dish. Make a mound of the crab meat. Stir the dressing well. Ladle over the crab meat. Sprinkle with chives. Serve warm.
ingredients: crabmeat, fine soft bread crumbs, dry sherry, chives, dried mustard, salt, bacon
name: crab dabs

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Brush edge with melted butter and parmesan cheese. Top the crust with sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, mozzarella cheese, pizza sauce, italian seasoning, pepperoni, parmesan cheese
name: deep dish pizza bundle

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes with basil oregano and garlic, tomato paste, penne pasta, water, mozzarella cheese, nonstick cooking spray
name: penne pasta casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350. In large oven proof non-stick skillet sprayed heavily with cooking spray add onion and cook till translucent. In paper bag add flour, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Add meat pieces and shake. Add meat to pan with onions. Brown 3 to 4 mins on each side or till just starting to brown. Add all of the remaining ingredients to pan. Be sure to sprinkle the seasonings evenly over meat and vegetables. Do not stir. Cover and place in oven and cook for 1 hour or till very tender.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, garlic salt, black pepper, sirloin steaks, vegetable oil, tomato sauce, dry onion soup mix, sour cream
name: swiss steak monterey

steps: Stir in water, sugar, lemon juice, lemon zest, mint leaves, orange pekoe tea bags, orange pekoe tea bags, orange, zest of, mint leaves, whole cloves, superfine sugar, pink grapefruit juice, ice cube, mint sprigpreparation:Bring water to boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: sugar, water, fresh mint leaves, grapefruit juice, mint sprig
name: grapefruit mint sorbet tasty no ice cream maker needed

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, onion, salt and pepper, dried thyme, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, fresh parsley
name: easy cheddar potato bake

steps: Heat a small amount of vegetable oil in a stock pot, ad d onions and garlic, season thoroughly with salt and lots of pepper, cook until clear, then add meat. Sear well, stirring to make sure all pieces heat evenly. Add tomatoes and appx 4-6 cups of water. Bring to a boil, add carrots. Boil for appx 1 hour, then add potatoes. Add seasonings if desired. Cook, loosely covered, on medium heat for appx 3 hours until meat has fallen apart, tomatoes are completely cooked away, and potatoes have cooked apart. Stir continuously while cooking to keep from burning. Serve over rice.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes, carrot, celery, potato, salt and pepper
name: baltimore hash

steps: Place corn on grill and roast for 12-15 minutes, turning 2 to 3 times durning cooking. As they cook, the ears will steam in the butter. Carefully unwrap the roasted ears and serve.
ingredients: corn on the cob, mayonnaise, queso fresco, chili powder, lime juice, salt & pepper
name: mexican roasted corn on the cob good for a bbq

steps: Place fish sticks on top of grilled cheese sandwich and place on top of fish stick sandwich. Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: frozen fish sticks, bread, cheese, margarine
name: grilled cheese and fish stick sandwich

steps: Wash, peel and cut the potatoes into pieces. Boil in salted water until tender. Mash and add the cheese, sour cream, the milk if needed for creaminess, and salt and pepper. Place in a large pan, top with butter slices and bake at 325 degrees until hot. Broil a few minutes to get the top nice a browned.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream cheese, butter, salt, onion powder, pepper, sharp cheddar cheese
name: bangin mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Wipe mushrooms clean with a damp paper towel and then dry them. Place with the rounded sides down on a baking dish sprayed lightly with nonstick spray. Combine all other ingredients and stir until well mixed. Evenly distribute crab mixture among the mushroom caps. Place in the oven for 10 - 12 minutes, until hot.
ingredients: butter, celery, onion, sliced mushrooms, whole wheat bread, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt and pepper
name: cheesy mushroom bake

steps: Heat olive oil, add zucchini, salt and pepper, cook 3 minutes. Remove zucchini from pan. Add scallops to pan. Cook until no longer opaque. Put with zucchini. Add butter to skillet. Add garlic, green onions and tomato. Bring to a boil. Boil 1 minute. Add zucchini and scallops. Heat through. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, zucchini, onion, beef bouillon granules, water, salt, fresh parmesan cheese
name: simple skillet zucchini squash

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa crock pot chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, taco seasoning mix, cream of chicken soup, salsa, black beans, sour cream, corn
name: salsa crock pot chicken

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add tomato sauce and stir. Lower heat to medium-low. While stirring, add rosemary, basil and oregano. Allow sauce to bubble. Sprinkle with sugar and mix again. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage.
ingredients: sun-dried tomatoes with italian herbs, onion, celery, carrot, garlic cloves, canned whole tomatoes, chablis, dried fennel seed, pepper
name: sun dried tomato marinara sauce

steps: In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries.
ingredients: non-fat strawberry yogurt, triple berry burst cheerios, strawberries, milk, banana
name: berry burst banana smoothie

steps: Place apricot in greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for about 1 hour or until toothpick test comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, double-acting baking powder, salt, vegetable oil, sugar, applesauce, egg whites, bananas, dried apricot
name: low fat banana apricot loaf

steps: Drain the pineapple squeeze the excess juice off and let it drain. Cream the cream cheese in a mixing bowl,. Then mix in the coolwhip, pineapple and sugar. When well mixed pour into the grahm cracker crust. Put in the refrigerator to chill. Total time to mix is 10 miniute and chill varies depending on how cold your fridge is, 30 minute.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, frozen whipped topping, crushed pineapple, graham cracker pie crust, pineapple chunks
name: pineapple dream pie

steps: Spray a 13x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Put drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them. Bake the drumsticks for 30 minutes or until juice run clear.
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, low-fat yogurt, garlic, cumin, ground coriander, chili powder, cornflour, brown sugar
name: spicy yoghurt chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Preheat oven to
ingredients: chicken rice-a-roni, chicken soup base, ground turkey, frozen peas
name: rice a roni turkey casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Cream butter and sugar together till pale and creamy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till smooth. Add remaining ingredients. Stir till well combined. Place heaped tablespoons of mixture on trays. Allow room for spreading. Bake 15 - 17 minutes, then cool for 5 minutes. Transfer to wire rack.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, brown sugar, vanilla essence, eggs, self-raising flour, milo, cereal
name: jessgarfield s milo biscuits

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, ketchup, deli corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, onions, rye cocktail bread
name: crock pot reuben spread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil.
ingredients: salmon fillets, balsamic vinegar, honey, stone ground dijon mustard, sesame oil, sesame seeds
name: oven roasted salmon with balsamic sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips.
ingredients: tortilla chips, salad oil, onion, diced green chilies, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, green bell peppers
name: chile con queso melted cheese dip

steps: Melt butter and marshmallows over low heat. Add jello and stir well to combine. Put popcorn in a large bowl and pour this mixture over, mixing well to be sure to coat all popcorn. When cool enough to handle, butter your hands and form into balls. Wrap balls in plastic wrap to show off the color.
ingredients: butter, mini marshmallows, raspberry gelatin powder, popped popcorn
name: marshmallow popcorn balls

steps: Preheat oven to 375f grease or line a baking sheet. Cut the crusts off of the bread slices, then cut each piece of bread into 3 equal rectangles. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, garlic powder and parsley. Spread a layer of cream cheese mixture on each bread rectangle, and roll up. Wrap a slice of bacon around each of the bread rolls and secure them with toothpicks. Arrange the roll ups on the prepared baking sheet. Bake until the bacon is crisp, approximately 20 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, bacon, onion, velveeta cheese, pizza crusts, garlic powder, pepper, seasoning salt
name: bacon cheeseburger roll up

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions. Stir in soup, tuna and milk. Pour into a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, butter, milk, green onion, margarine, tuna, tomatoes, dried parsley, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: tuna and tomato quickie

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut the stem end from turnips. Rub each with olive oil and wrap tightly in aluminum foil. Bake for approximately 90 minutes or until insides are soft enough to scoop out. Scoop out insides of each turnip, leaving the shell intact. Mash & whip the insides with the sour cream, spices and seasonings. When the insides are a creamy consistency, carefully spoon them back into shells. Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and bake the stuffed turnips for 20-30 minutes until heated thru.
ingredients: turnips, bacon, onion, salt and pepper
name: turnips fried with bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all meatloaf ingredients, except bacon. Press into loaf pan and top with bacon. Bake for 1 hour. Mix sauce and spread over top during last 15 minutes of baking.
ingredients: ground beef, rolled oats, salt, pepper, dry mustard, onion powder, egg, pickle juice, ketchup, brown sugar
name: twosome meat loaf

steps: In medium-sized bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepperpreparation:In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, dried lima beans, hard-
ingredients: dried lima beans, hard-boiled eggs, stuffed green olive, garlic clove, parsley, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, paprika, salt and pepper
name: spanish tapas bean salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Remove from oven and set aside.
ingredients: small red potatoes, cream, cream cheese, chives
name: mashed potatoes w cream cheese chives

steps: Heat oil in a skillet. Slice pork chops horizontally into thirds. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and fry in oil on medium high heat until browned on both sides, 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from pan. Set aside. Add pork chops to pan. Cook, stirring, 1 minute. Combine broth, flour and lemon juice. Add to pork chops in skillet. Cook, stirring, 1 minute, or until liquid is slightly thickened. Return pork to pan. Heat through.
ingredients: fresh ginger, soya sauce, sherry wine, pork fillet, peanut oil, button mushroom, snow peas, red cabbage, water
name: ginger pork with mushrooms and snow peas

steps: Cook noodles as directed on the package. Drain. Mix all remaining ingredients together until well mixed. It may help to heat for a minute in the microwave. Mix noodles and sauce. Serve warm, but these also taste great cold.
ingredients: pasta, peanut butter, tahini, warm water, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, oil, scallion, toasted sesame seeds
name: spicy sesame noodles

steps: Cook pasta in 6-quart pot of boiling water until tender. While pasta is cooking, toss tomatoes with salt and let juices exude. Toss and combine.
ingredients: brie cheese, artichoke hearts, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, basil leaves, black olives, garlic, dry white wine, salt and pepper, penne rigate
name: pasta laramar

steps: Heat broiler to high. Cut the ciabatta into bite-size pieces and spread out in a single layer on a baking sheet. Drizzle over 1 tbsp oil. Broil for 3-4 mins, turning the pieces of bread occasionally, until just golden. Leave to cool. Put the toasted ciabatta in a serving bowl with tomatoes, cucumber, olives and feta. Tear up the basil, then scatter over the salad. Whisk the balsamic and remaining olive oil together and drizzle over, then mix gently to combine.
ingredients: tomatoes, olive oil, spring greens, feta cheese, vinaigrette, balsamic vinegar, honey, pecan halves
name: grilled tomato and feta cheese salad with pecan vinaigrette

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: tomato paste, water, olive oil, cream, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil
name: quick easy creamy tomato pasta sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender.
ingredients: pizza crust, extra virgin olive oil, fresh mozzarella cheese, asparagus, boursin cheese, cracked black pepper
name: shaved asparagus pizza

steps: Melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms and shallots and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook 10 minutes. Add chicken and cook 10 minutes on each side or until tender. Transfer chicken to platter and sprinkle with grated cheese. Top with mushroom mixture. Cook and let stand 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fresh mushrooms, shallots, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese
name: chicken georgia

steps: Mix butter, egg yolk, ground almonds, rum, puff pastry, egg, white sugar. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted comes out clean. Sprinkle powdered sugar or top with fruits
ingredients: unsalted butter, caster sugar, egg yolk, ground almonds, rum, puff pastry, egg, white sugar
name: pithivier

steps: Place chicken in a bowl and add other ingredients. Mix well. Heat oil approx 2cm in depth. Drop teaspoonfuls of mixture into the hot oil. Deep fry for a few minutes until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. Serve with cucumber mint dip.
ingredients: cooked chicken, salt, fresh parsley, lemon juice, flour, baking powder, egg, milk, oil
name: herbed chicken fritters

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, bring vegetables and water to a boil. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Uncover. Cook and stir until liquid is almost absorbed. Add the salad dressing, salt, basil and oregano. Cook and stir until heated through.
ingredients: fresh basil leaves, balsamic vinegar, gorgonzola, olive oil, romaine lettuce, watercress, walnuts
name: california pizza kitchen romaine watercress salad w balsamic b

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, fat-free cheddar cheese, nonfat sour cream, pepper, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, green onions
name: baked salsa chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Spray a large, shallow baking pan with no-stick cooking spray. In a large bowl toss together shredded wheat and walnuts. Set aside. In a small bowl stir together honey, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt, if using. Pour over the dry ingredients and toss thoroughly to combine. Spread evenly in the prepared baking pan and bake for 25-30 minutes, stirring two or three times, until the mixture is lightly toasted. If it seems damp, it will crisp as it cools. Cool completely, then add the dried fruit. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: rolled oats, walnuts, almonds, pecans, sunflower seeds, maple syrup, olive oil, cinnamon, raisins, dried cranberries
name: wholesome nutty granola

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius lightly grease a round 20cm cake tin. Melt the butter in the microwave or over low heat. Set aside. Sift the cocoa into a large mixing bowl. Add the rest of the ingredients, including the butter. Mix thoroughly. Pour into cake pan. Bake for 50 minute.
ingredients: beetroots, self raising flour, brown sugar, cocoa, dark cooking chocolate, pecans, vegetable oil, eggs
name: beetroot chocolate cake

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, toasted sesame oil, pepper, reduced-sodium chicken broth, scallions, sesame seeds, lemon zest, lemon juice, cornstarch
name: sesame chicken with lemon sauce

steps: Place mango chutney on top of lamb chops. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 6 hours or until the meat is tender.
ingredients: lamb chops, five-spice powder, kosher salt, mango chutney
name: lamb chops with mango chutney

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer.
ingredients: chicken, potatoes, onion, fresh rosemary, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper
name: portuguese chicken baked with potatoes and garlic

steps: Combine quinoa, water, vegetable oil, balsamic vinegar, tabasco sauce, currants, cucumbers, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Combine quinoa, water, vegetable oil, balsamic vinegar, tabasco sauce, currants, cucumbers, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Combine quinoa, water, vegetable oil, balsamic vinegar, tabasco sauce, currants, cucumbers, salt &
ingredients: quinoa, water, vegetable oil, balsamic vinegar, tabasco sauce, currants, cucumbers, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: quinoa cucumber and currant salad

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add beef and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: lean stewing beef, beef broth, oil, diced green chilies, v8 vegetable juice, garlic, sharp cheddar cheese
name: bodacious burritos

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray 9-inch square deep-dish pie plate with non-stick oil. In a mixing bowl, combine peaches, sugar, lemon juice, and mint. Mix cornstarch and orange juice. Let rest 15 minutes, then mix into peaches. Pour peach mixture into prepared pie plate. Mix flour with brown sugar and cinnamon. Use a pastry cutter to cut margarine into flour until mixture resembles course crumbs. Sprinkle over peaches. Bake 45 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: peach pie filling, whole berry cranberry sauce, yellow cake mix, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter, pecans
name: cranberry peach cobbler

steps: In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm.
ingredients: quinoa, silken tofu, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh spinach, fresh herbs, salt, black pepper, vegetable oil cooking spray
name: spinach and roasted garlic tart

steps: Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing.
ingredients: bananas, sugar, unsalted butter, non-fat powdered milk, lemon juice, cardamom seed, nuts, coconut flakes
name: banana burfi

steps: Preheat oven to 400c. Grease an oven tray well with vegetable oil. Wash and cut potatoes into wedges. Combine egg white and spices into a large bowl. Mix well. Add potatoes and coat well. Bake potatoes skin side down for 40 minutes or until tender and golden brown. Serve with a relish or as a side.
ingredients: sugar, salt, ground cumin, chili powder, cayenne, prepared polenta, all-purpose flour, canola oil, red bell peppers, fresh basil
name: sweet and hot polenta fries

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings.
ingredients: butter, russet potatoes, whipping cream, whole milk, chives, thyme, salt, ground black pepper
name: potato gratin with cream and fresh herbs

steps: Place chicken breast in slow cooker. Combine whole berry cranberry sauce, reduced-fat thousand island dressing, onion soup mix, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, mushroom stems and piecespreparation:Place chicken breast in slow cooker. Combine whole berry cranberry sauce, reduced-fat thousand island dressing
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, reduced-fat thousand island dressing, onion soup mix, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: crantastic baked chicken breast

steps: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet. Add butter, onion, red bell pepper, potatoes, eggs, cheddar cheese, dry basil leaves, cilantro leaf, salt, pepper. Cook until almost set, stirting often. Stir in pepper mixture and heat through.
ingredients: butter, onion, red bell pepper, potatoes, eggs, cheddar cheese, dry basil leaves, cilantro leaf, salt, pepper
name: cowboy scramble

steps: In a large mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir until combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill until set, 2-3 hours.
ingredients: celery, raw cranberries, orange, sugar, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, orange juice, pecans
name: holiday best cranberry jello salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place honey roasted eggplant slices on a nonstick baking sheet and drizzle the oil over them. Grind the fresh pepper over the eggplant to give them all a light dusting. Sprinkle the just under 1 tsp salt over the cubes. Bake for 30 minutes, give it a stir midway thru.
ingredients: baby eggplants, thai green chili, honey, extra virgin olive oil, salt & fresh ground pepper
name: honey roasted eggplant with chiles

steps: In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, cocoa powder
name: grandma s frosting

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly brush both sides of the zucchini with olive oil and place on a foil-lined baking sheet. Mix cheese and herbs together in a small bowl and sprinkle over the zucchini. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Bake for 15 minutes and place under the broiler for the last 3-5 minutes, until cheese is crispy and browned.
ingredients: linguine, butter, garlic, zucchini, parmesan cheese
name: linguine meets zucchini

steps: Cook fettuccini in a large saucepan of boiling water until dente and drain well. Heat a dash of oil in a frying pan and quickly cook the bacon pieces until crisp and golden, set aside. Add the beans and pepper to the pan and cook until tender. Pour in the pasta sauce, add the bacon and cook, stirring until hot. Toss through the well drained fettuccini with basil leaves. Serve with grated parmesan cheese on the side.
ingredients: fettuccine, frozen peas, light cream cheese spread, reduced-fat caesar salad dressing, flour, nonfat milk, smoked ham, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese
name: fettuccine carbonara healthy version

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
ingredients: garlic, brown sugar, cracked black pepper, lemongrass, fish sauce, dark sesame oil, rice wine, center-cut pork chops, cilantro
name: lemongrass pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add eggs,, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan.
ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, oil, water, sweetened condensed milk, caramel ice cream topping, frozen whipped topping, heath candy bars
name: heavenly chocolate cake

steps: Place the millet in a bowl and add the feta cheese cubes. Cut the millet in half if necessary, to make them bite-sized. Add the black olives, parsley, and lettuce. Combine dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over millet mixture, toss gently, and chill. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: millet, water, english cucumber, reduced-fat feta cheese, white beans, ground red chili pepper, dried dill, salt and pepper
name: cucumber millet bean salad with feta

steps: Toast bread in toaster to desired level. Put butter on one slice and mayo on the other. Put cheese in between slices of bread. Wrap a moist papertowel around sandwich and put in microwave for 20 sec. Enjoy.
ingredients: bacon, egg, american cheese, bread, garlic salt, mayonnaise
name: fried egg bacon cheese sandwich

steps: Add water to a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Simmer, uncovered, for about 5-10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed and the fruit softened.
ingredients: water, salt, yellow cornmeal, flour, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, condensed milk
name: jamaican cornmeal porridge

steps: Preheat oven to 325c. Mix together butter, sugar, eggs, orange rind, fresh orange juice, flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts, orange, juice ofpreparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Mix together butter, sugar, eggs, orange r
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, orange rind, fresh orange juice, flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts, orange, juice of
name: fantastic orange loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: ground chuck, breadcrumbs, onion, carrot, egg whites, salt, rubbed sage, pepper, picante sauce
name: picante meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeno peppers and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving.
ingredients: long grain brown rice, reduced-sodium chicken broth, carrot, zucchini, sunflower seeds, sliced almonds, red pepper flakes, olive oil, fresh parsley
name: health nut brown rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Grease 2 cookie sheets. Sift together pistachio nut, water, canola oil, brown rice syrup, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder, brown
ingredients: pistachio nut, water, canola oil, brown rice syrup, brown rice flour, amaranth flour, baking powder, baking soda, chinese five spice powder
name: pistachio 5 spice cookies

steps: Melt 1 stick butter in a jelly roll pan. Spread in pan - 1 cup of graham cracker crumbs. 1 cup of shredded coconut. 6 oz of butterscotch chips. 6 oz. Of chocolate chips. Drizzle one can of sweet condensed milk on top. Add 1 cup of chopped walnuts on top. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. Remove and let cool and then cut into squares.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, flour, baking powder, sweetened condensed milk, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, sweetened flaked coconut, walnuts
name: chocolate butterscotch graham cookies

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken, lemon juice, olive oil, black pepper, salt
name: lemon pepper mesquite grilled chicken southwest

steps: Place all the ingredients except apples in a medium saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring once or twice. Remove from heat and let sit, covered, for 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in maple syrup and flaxseed oil, if using. Sprinkle one tablespoon nuts over each serving, if desired.
ingredients: old-fashioned oatmeal, water, salt, apple, lemon juice, milk, butter
name: grandma louise s oatmeal with grated apples

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: canola oil, chili powder, cumin, salt, carrots, fresh cilantro, lime juice
name: chili roasted carrots

steps: Combine all ingredients except fillets. Spread on bottom of casserole dish. Place fish on top and cover casserole. Bake at 400 f 10 to 15 minutes or until fish is done. Serve with leek mixture spread over fillets.
ingredients: catfish fillets, salt and pepper, butter, dijon mustard, dry vermouth, fresh parsley, onion, mayonnaise, tabasco sauce, lemons
name: baked catfish dijon

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and sauté for about 5 minutes. Add garlic and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add onion and sauté for another 5 minutes. Add garlic
ingredients: pork chops, garlic powder, salt, pepper, accent seasoning, beer, cream of celery soup
name: pork chops with beer

steps: Heat 1 tbsp margarine and saut vegetables lightly. Remove from pan. Melt 3 tbsp margarine. Whisk in 3 tbsp flour and seasonings. Cook for about one minute, stirring frequently. Slowly add hot soy milk, stirring with a whisk to prevent lumps. Add vegetables back in. Cook until thick, stirring constantly.
ingredients: mushroom, broth, low-fat evaporated milk, olive oil, salt, pepper, paprika
name: simple mushroom soup

steps: Combine bisquick, milk, first old bay seasoning, and cheese. Beat with a wooden spoon for about 30 seconds. Spoon onto a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake in oven at 450 degrees for 8-10 munutes. Melt butter. Add garlic powder, parsley and last old bay seasoning to melted butter. Brush on hot buscuits. May use more or less seasoning for taste.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, cheddar cheese, white wine, butter, garlic powder, dried parsley flakes, salt
name: cheddar bay biscuits red lobster recipes

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, salt, light corn syrup, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla
name: velvety caramels

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, green beans, basil, honey, lemon, zest of, salt, pepper, fresh lemon juice, yellow bell pepper
name: basil lemon green beans

steps: Add boiling water to tea, steep 5 minutes. Strain. Make a syrup by boiling the sugar, cloves and water. Add this syrup and fruit juices to the tea. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: boiling water, green tea bags, sugar, lemon juice, pumpkin pie spice, unsweetened apple juice, cranberry juice
name: spiced green tea

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place the chicken, with the skins on, in a single layer in a shallow roasting dish and set aside. Heat the oil in a small saucepan and gently fry the green onions and garlic for about 2 minutes, until softened, but not browned. Add the honey, orange juice, orange segments and soy sauce to the pan, stirring well and cook until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour the sauce over the chicken and bake, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, basting once or twice until the chicken is cooked.
ingredients: orange juice, brown sugar, liquid honey, mustard, boneless skinless chicken breasts, curry powder, salt, black pepper, corn flakes
name: oven fried orange and curry chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, maple syrup, butter, fresh thyme
name: maple syrup baked sweet potato

steps: Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired.
ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, kidney beans, water, taco seasoning, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese, green onion
name: stove top tamale pie

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, walnut halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla, walnuts, wal
ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, maple syrup, corn syrup, milk, butter, walnuts
name: mackinac island maple walnut fudge

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: light brown sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, vanilla, powdered sugar
name: easy caramel frosting

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce.
ingredients: lean ground turkey, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, onion, prepared horseradish, dried parsley, ketchup
name: mini turkey meatloaves

steps: Place watermelon slices in heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired.
ingredients: water, sugar, lime juice, watermelon juice, orange juice, ice cube
name: watermelon punch

steps: Heat oil in frying pan over med high heat. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, making sure that tomato mixture covers it completely. Cook 15 to 20 minutes until sauce is thickened and chicken is cooked through. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt, black pepper, italian-style diced tomatoes, marsala wine, mixed peppers, polenta
name: skillet cacciatore

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Seperate the crescent roll dough into the 8 triangles. Spread the mustard on the dough. Put 1 piece of meat and 1 piece of cheese on each roll, folding the meat over the cheese to copy the crescent triangle. Roll up the crescent roll, wide to narrow, and place on a cookie sheet with the point of the crescent on the bottom. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm.
ingredients: ground beef, crescent rolls, barbecue sauce, american cheese, sesame seeds
name: barbecue roll

steps: Cook beef and drain fat. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix well. Serve with tortilla chips. Cover tightly and refridgerate leftovers no more than 2 days. Do not reheat. Mix well before serving cold.
ingredients: ground beef, kidney bean, onion, tomatoes, lettuce, sharp cheddar cheese, catalina dressing, fritos corn chips, taco seasoning
name: cold taco salad

steps: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic and tarragon. Saute until onion is just tender, about 2 minutes. Add yellow squash and zucchini. Saute until crisp-tender, about 8 minutes or less. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: yellow squash, zucchini, butter, salt, water
name: healthy steamed squash

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: olive oil, plum tomatoes, salt, sugar
name: sloooow roasted tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Soften real butter. Combine soft butter and remaining ingredients. Electric mix until smooth. Form 16 balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 20 minutes, stopping at 7 minutes to flatten with fork.
ingredients: butter, soft brown sugar, vanilla essence, plain flour, semolina, ground almonds, almonds, egg white
name: sugee semolina cookies

steps: Cook zucchini in salted water just until tender, drain and cool. Beat eggs and mix all ingredients except butter and bread crumbs. Add zucchini. Pour into a well buttered 2-quart casserole dish. Top with crumbs and dot with butter. Bake uncovered at 325f for 30 minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, lean ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, salsa, ground cumin, salt and pepper
name: zucchini and ground beef casserole

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: tuna fish, green onions, canned diced green chiles, tomatoes, taco shells, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa
name: tuna tacos

steps: Combine first five ingredients in large bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Add milk and peaches, stirring just until blended. Spoon into greased muffin cups. Sprinkle with topping mixture. Bake at 400f for 20-25 minutes or until set and golden.
ingredients: peaches, raspberries, peach brandy, granulated sugar, unflavored gelatin, almond extract, salt, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream, egg whites
name: peach melba mousse

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add in green cabbage, riesling wine, fresh lemon juice, sugar, extra virgin olive oil, onion, granny smith apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Mix to combine and cook until the cabbage if crisp-tender and the liquid is reduced to a glaze. Season with salt and pepper if desired.
ingredients: green cabbage, riesling wine, fresh lemon juice, sugar, extra virgin olive oil, onion, granny smith apples, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: green cabbage and apple saut

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: italian sausage, bell peppers, red potatoes, olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, kalamata olive
name: roasted sausages peppers and potatoes

steps: Combine all ingredients together in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: ground turkey, zucchini, breadcrumbs, chili powder, cumin, green chilies, cheddar cheese, red onion, tomatoes, wheat
name: green chile and cheddar turkey burgers ww

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix dough with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, margarine, milk
name: metis bannock

steps: In a large saucepan, heat 2 cups of stock to boiling over high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of stock. Add scallions, onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat until soft about 5 minutes. Add 3 cups stock and tomato paste. Add vegetables. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15 minutes. Add salt and pepper, cooked big batch vegetable soup.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, celery, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, assorted fresh vegetables
name: big batch vegetable soup

steps: Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, corn flakes
name: easy crispy cornflake potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a pan and saut the potatoes for 5-6 minutes. Add potatoes, chilli and curry powder. Fry for a further few minutes. Stir in the yoghurt and cook for 2-5 minutes or until the potatoe is done. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: canola oil, onion, curry powder, water, simply potatoes shredded hash browns
name: hurry curry potatoes 5fix

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake about 40min. Cool one hour. Put in ice box after first use also can do after cooling before serving. Top with a cool whip or whipped cream if you like.
ingredients: white cake mix, water, vegetable oil, egg whites, fat free reduced-sugar cherry yogurt, frozen fat-free whipped topping
name: black cherry cake

steps: Place chicken pieces in roaster. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Bake 30 minutes longer uncovered.
ingredients: butter, flour, mustard powder, paprika, salt, pepper, chicken
name: sara s mustard chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a skillet, warm honey with pecan halves and cinnamon over low heat, then add the nuts and stir to coat evenly. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, then spread nuts evenly in a single layer on the sheet. Bake in preheated oven until nuts are fragrant. Allow to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine sugar and salt. Add the warm pecans, and toss to coat evenly. Spread out on fresh sheet of waxed paper and let dry completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: pecan halves, cold water, egg white, sugar, cinnamon, salt
name: christmas nuts

steps: In a heavy saucepan over low heat, melt 1 cup of the semisweet chocoalte chips with the unsweetened chocoalte. Remove pan from heat. Add the butter, vanilla, and salt to the melted chocolate and stir until the butter melts and is incorporated into the chocolate. Let stand until the mixture is at room temperature. Using an electric mixer at high speed, whip the chocolate until it holds soft peaks. Fold in the remaining chocolate chips, marshmallows, and nuts. Frost as desired.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, chocolate fudge frosting, miniature marshmallows, mixed nuts
name: rocky road fudge

steps: Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot.
ingredients: spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, mushrooms, capers, garlic, salt, hot pepper flakes, fresh basil
name: mushroom bacon pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, egg, real maple syrup, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar
name: canadian maple cookies

steps: In a large heavy saucepan, stir together all the ingredients except the cherries. Over medium heat, stir together all the ingredients except the cherries. Over medium heat, stir together all
ingredients: bing cherries, sugar, cornstarch, kirsch, vanilla ice cream
name: cherries jubilee fantabulous

steps: Beat egg white until soft peaks are formed. Blend with cottage cheese, whipped cream, salt, vanilla, and sugar. In parfait gasses, alternate spoonfuls of cheese mixture with cornbread. Freeze. Remove from freezer 20 minutes before serving.
ingredients: cottage cheese, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, whipping cream, lemon, zest of, oil
name: sweet cottage cheese latkes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: red potatoes, thick slab bacon, half-and-half, onion, salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, butter
name: bacon hash brown bake

steps: Place the salad in a large bowl and cover with ice water. Cover and refrigerate for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: fresh green beans, herb salad dressing mix, oil, water
name: easy fresh green beans with packaged salad dressing

steps: Heat oil in frying pan, add butter. When oil is hot add prawns sauteeing for two minutes. Remove from heat and drain on paper towel. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey, allowing it to colour slightly. Return prawns to pan to coat in the honey. Discard oil from pan, reheat and slowly add honey
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, minced ginger, prawns, honey, soy sauce, sesame seeds
name: honeyed prawns shrimp

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: frozen lima beans, garlic powder, diced pimentos, salt, sour cream, fresh ground black pepper, fresh chives
name: lima beans smitane

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Combine flour and sugar in a large bowl or food processor. Add margarine and process, or mix together with your fingers, until mixture resembles coarse meal. Add cold water, one tablespoon at a time, and process, or mix, until a manageable dough forms. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 12-inch circle. Press dough into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie pan or removable-bottom tart pan. Prick the bottom all over with a fork, cover dough with foil and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake 10 minutes. Remove beans and foil and bake until crust is golden brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove from oven and cool completely on a wire rack. Yields 8 slices per crust.
ingredients: white flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, beer
name: super fast low fat pizza crust

steps: Combine cornstarch, sugar, salt and pepper in a medium-sized plastic bag. Place chicken pieces one at a time in the bag and shake to coat well. Remove wings to a clean piece of parchment or waxed paper and set aside. Heat 2 inches of oil in a deep-sided skillet to 350 degrees. Fry chicken in batches until crisp and golden brown, turning occasionally, 12-15 minutes. Once fried, place chicken on parchment-lined baking sheet and keep warm in the oven. Melt butter. Add the honey and tabasco chipotle sauce to hot butter and stir until well combined. Transfer to a large bowl. Add the wings and toss to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken tenderloins, cornstarch, canola oil, raspberry preserves, chipotle chiles in adobo, hot sauce, unsalted butter, cilantro, jicama, bleu cheese salad dressing
name: chipotle raspberry boneless chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: cheerios toasted oat cereal, flour, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, applesauce, skim milk, vegetable oil, eggs
name: cheerio applesauce muffins

steps: Whisk together 2 vinegars, shallot, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Slowly whisk in oil until blended. Add the basil sprig and bruise it with the back of a wooden spoon. Let mixture stand at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Discard sprig of basil. Put the tomatoes in a serving bowl. Drizzle with the dressing and add shredded basil. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, tomatoes, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper, olive oil
name: mozzarella tomato and basil salad

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add pumpkin, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, golden vanilla cake mix, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans, butter, whipped cream, vanilla extract, pecans
ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar, pumpkin pie spice, golden vanilla cake mix, pecans, butter, whipped cream
name: praline pumpkin dessert

steps: In a small bowl mix the butter, yogurt, raw sugar, rolled oats, flour, coconut flakes, sultanas, baking powder, honey, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, all-purpose flour, baking soda

name: new zealand trampers mix

steps: Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaisepreparation:Mix together the pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon,
ingredients: mini pita pockets, margarine, onion, cream cheese, bacon, tomatoes, jalapeno peppers
name: stuffed jalapeno pita bites

steps: Cook ravioli, drain, cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add balsamic vinegar to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people.
ingredients: ravioli, unsalted butter, balsamic vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, walnuts, parmesan cheese
name: ravioli with balsamic brown butter

steps: Place chicken in a 4-quart slow cooker. Add in the next 6 ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours. During the last 15 minutes, stir in the rice. Remove chicken from slow cooker. Place chicken in a 4-quart slow cooker. During
ingredients: long grain rice, chicken stock, salt, garlic clove, lemon zest, unsalted butter, fresh italian parsley
name: lemon rice rice cooker

steps: In a pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley.
ingredients: long grain and wild rice blend, ground beef, green peppers, onion, chunky tomato pasta sauce, italian-style diced tomatoes, beef broth
name: stuffed pepper soup

steps: Combine the first 5 ingredients in a heavy pot and bring to a boil over medium high heat. When it comes to a full rolling boil that cannot be stirred down, reduce heat and simmer until it comes to the softball stage or 236f on a candy thermometer. Remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, allspice, margarine, and vanilla. Cool, then beat until thick and mixture looses its gloss. Pour into buttered square dish and let cool before cutting.
ingredients: brown sugar, milk, tahini, vanilla
name: halvah fudge

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve.
ingredients: plum tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, salt, fresh ground black pepper, spaghetti, fresh basil
name: ww 4 pt spaghetti with fresh basil and tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, hot water, sugar, milk, flour, baking powder, salt
name: poor man s pudding

steps: Combine toasted sesame seeds, fresh lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, corn oil, hot sauce. Process till smooth. Add oil and hot sauce. Process till well blended. Let stand 1 hour at room temperature to blend flavors. Serve with your favorite dippers.
ingredients: canned chick-peas, kosher salt, tahini, fresh lemon juice, water, olive oil, truffle oil, garlic clove
name: truffle hummus

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly.
ingredients: unsalted butter, cream cheese, flour, hershey chocolate kisses, egg, instant coffee, cocoa, sugar
name: coffee cup cookies

steps: In oil in a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic about 10 minutes until lightly browned. Add broth and herbs, bring to boil. Stir in tortellini, reduce heat and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir in tomatoes with juice and simmer 5 more minutes. Add chopped spinach and simmer 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with a sprinkling of cheese on top.
ingredients: italian sausage, garlic cloves, chicken broth, beef broth, cheese tortellini, fresh spinach, italian-style diced tomatoes, parmesan cheese
name: sausage and spinach tortellini soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
