Combine butter, bisquick, sugar, milk, whole berry cranberry sauce, chunky applesauce, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple, cooking apple
ingredients: butter, bisquick, sugar, milk, whole berry cranberry sauce, chunky applesauce, cooking apple
name: cranberry apple dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, vanilla, mango
name: mango cream bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In another bowl, beat together the egg, milk, melted butter, and vanilla. Pour the egg mixture into the flour mixture. Stir quickly and just enough to moisten the dry ingredients. Do not overmix - the batter will be lumpy. Stir in the frozen blackberries. Fill greased muffin tins. Bake for 22 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: fresh blackberries, sugar, cornstarch, shortening, vanilla, egg, all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, milk
name: oregon blackberry upside down cake

steps: Fill glass with very hot water to pre-heat, then empty. Pour hot coffee into hot glass until it is about three-quarters full. Drop in two cocktail sugar cubes. Stir until the sugar is thoroughly dissolved. Add full jigger of irish whiskey for proper taste and body. Top with a collar of whipped cream by pouring gently over a spoon. Enjoy it while piping hot.
ingredients: brewed espresso, milk, baileys irish cream, sugar
name: cappuccino with irish cream

steps: Heat the olive oil in a preferably non-stick pan over a low heat, and saut the onions and garlic, until they are softened but not browned, for about 25 minutes. Drain and reserve the oil. And cool. Preheat the oven to 200c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, black pepper
name: charred onion slivers

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, frozen orange juice concentrate, butter, brown sugar, salt, nutmeg, eggs, dried apricot
name: sweet potato and apricot casserole

steps: In a blender, combine cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold water, cold
ingredients: cold water, watermelon, sugar, lime juice
name: watermelon aqua fresca

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole sweet potatoes in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, brown sugar, paprika, ground black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, poultry seasoning, chili powder, cayenne pepper
name: sweet and spicy sweet potatoes

steps: Fill glass with very hot water to pre-heat, then empty. Pour hot coffee into hot glass until it is about three-quarters full. Drop in two cocktail sugar cubes. Stir until the sugar is thoroughly dissolved. Add full jigger of irish whiskey for proper taste and body. Top with a collar of whipped cream by pouring gently over a spoon. Enjoy it while piping hot.
ingredients: creme de cacao, irish whiskey, coffee, whipped cream
name: dad s irish coffee

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, butter, eggs, apple pie spice, vanilla extract, almond extract, icing
name: sugar and spice cake

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Combine the chicken, cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chiles, taco seasoning and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Fill each tortilla with 2 spoonfuls of filling mix. Fold tortillas and place in baking pan seam side down. When the pan is filled, pour enchilada sauce over the top of all the filled tortillas. Cover the pan and bake for 20-40 minutes.
ingredients: mild green chilies, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, chicken breasts, white corn tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: dana s chicken enchiladas

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted.
ingredients: canola oil cooking spray, parsnips, sweet potato, crisp red apples, canola oil, honey, reduced sodium soy sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: honey roasted parsnips with sweet potatoes and apples

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Add the pecans and sage and cook, stirring frequently, until the nuts are toasted and the mushrooms are tender, about 3 minutes. Stir in the peas and chickpeas. Add the vegetable mixture to the orzo mixture. Season with salt.
ingredients: water, bay leaves, salt, black pepper, wild rice, unsalted butter, pecan pieces, cayenne pepper, maple syrup
name: wild rice with spicy pecans

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine all ingredients and knead ten times. Let stand for ten minutes. Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges are golden.
ingredients: gluten flour, salt, sugar, warm water, active dry yeast, olive oil
name: dominick s basic pizza dough

steps: In small saucepan, combine juice, water, lemon juice, honeydew melon. Set pan over medium-high heat and bring to boil. Boil 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until mixture reduces to 2 tablespoons. Strain mixture though fine sieve to remove zest. Place melon in bowl, toss with ginger-lime mixture. Let sit for 15 minutes. You can drain the sauce or serve it with the melon. Garnish with mint.
ingredients: splenda granular, water, lime zest, lime juice, fresh ginger, honeydew melon
name: lime ginger honeydew

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place panini on a baking sheet. Spread pesto evenly over top, sprinkle with cheese. Top with thin tomato slices, radicchio, and remaining english muffin halves. Spray panini with cooking spray. Coat skillet or grill pan with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Top with thin tomato slices, radicchio
ingredients: english muffin, pesto sauce, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese
name: pesto tomato mozzarella english muffin pizza

steps: Sprinkle butter on top of sandwich and sprinkle with cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices, buttered side up. Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat for 1 minute. Place 2 sandwiches in pan and weight with round cake pan, pressing lightly. Leave cake pan on top and cook until first side is golden brown, 3-5 minutes. Flip sandwiches, press again with cake pan, and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining 2 sandwiches.
ingredients: margarine, bread, cheese, monterey jack cheese
name: double decker grilled cheese sandwiches

steps: In a small pot, heat oatmeal, skim milk, and water over medium heat. As oatmeal mixture is warming, add all the other ingredients. Stir thoroughly to combine. Let cook until most of the liquid is absorbed, and the oatmeal reaches yknow an oatmealy consistency. Serve warm.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, oatmeal, light brown sugar, butter, black treacle, ground ginger, mixed spice, egg, baking soda, milk
name: oatmeal gingerbread scottish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine corn, sugar, salt, butter, eggs, and milk. Dissolve cornstarch in water and stir into corn mixture. Pour into a greased 2-quart baking dish. Bake for 1 hour in the 350f oven.
ingredients: frozen corn kernels, eggs, whipping cream, whole milk, sugar, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt
name: sweet corn pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: bananas, vanilla, egg white, unsweetened applesauce, peanut butter, oats, splenda sugar substitute, baking soda, baking powder
name: sugar free gluten free low fat peanut butter banana bread

steps: Place the cole slaw in a large saucepan with cold water and bring to a boil. Once boiling, add a touch of salt and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain the cole slaw and return to saucepan, add 2 tablespoons butter, chicken stock, brown sugar, chipotle pepper and adobo sauce. Mash the cole slaw until combined, i like to leave them slightly lumpy. Season with salt and black pepper and serve.
ingredients: chipotle chiles in adobo, mayonnaise, honey, lime juice, green cabbage, red cabbage, red onion, green onion, carrot, fresh cilantro
name: spicy chipotle cole slaw

steps: Drain pineapple, reserving 1 tablespoon juice. In a large bowl, combine the greens, carrots, pineapple and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk the mayonnaise, sugar and reserved pineapple juice, taste and then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour over salad. Toss to coat.
ingredients: pineapple tidbits, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, cool whip, orange zest, lettuce leaf, pecan halves
name: fluffy fruit salad

steps: In food processor add 1/2 cup of elderberries and 1/2 cup of lemon juice. Bring to a rolling boil that cannot be stirred down. Add the pectin and lemon juice. Remove jars from water bath after 10 minutes and place on counter to cool. Listen for tops of jars to pop and seal. Cool completely. Jam should be good in jars for up to 1 year.
ingredients: elderberries, lemon, juice of, fruit pectin, sugar
name: elderberry jelly

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken pieces on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken pieces. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken.
ingredients: chicken strips, egg, honey, prepared yellow mustard, corn flakes, black pepper, dijon mustard
name: low fat cornflake chicken tenders with honey mustard sauce

steps: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese, chives, spring onion, of fresh mint, salt and black pepper. Spread cream cheese mixture over chives. Cut each into six wedges. Top with cucumbers. Sprinkle with lemon-pepper.
ingredients: cream cheese, cucumber, fresh chives, spring onion, of fresh mint, salt and black pepper
name: cool as a cucumber cheese cucumber and chive sandwich spread

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in large pyrex measuring cup and blend in remaining ingredients except cheese. Place pasta and butter back into saucepan used to cook the pasta in. Cook pasta for two minutes until reheated. Stir constantly. Put cooked pasta into serving bowl topped with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, red onion, soft tofu, water, tamari, dried sweet basil leaves, cooked pasta, fresh parsley
name: creamy tofu pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Preheat
ingredients: sour cream and chives potato mix, ground beef, cheddar cheese, green onion
name: quick and easy baked potato casserole with beef

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. Mix 2 tbls sugar with the cinnamon in small bowl and set aside. Mix remaining ingredients to a soft dough. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls into cinnamon-sugar mixture. Shape each into a ball. Place on baking sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: bisquick, 7-up soda, sour cream, butter
name: 7 up biscuits

steps: Heat oil in skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions.
ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, paprika, butter, cream of chicken soup, milk, ground ginger
name: chicken in creamy ginger sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold water and mix well. Make three holes in mixture for next three liquid ingredients. Pour vanilla into 1st hole, vinegar into 2nd and oil into 3rd. Pour cold water over all. Mix with fork or wire wisk just until well blended. Pour into two 9 inch pans coated with cooking spray. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Cool completely in pans on a wire rack.
ingredients: coconut, self-raising flour, milk, eggs, baking powder, unsalted butter, sugar, water, lemon, juice and rind of
name: coconut syrup cake

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, diced tomatoes, salt, pepper, fresh basil
name: tomato basil pizza sauce

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, tomato sauce, white wine, half-and-half, sun-dried tomato, salt, penne, basil, parmesan cheese
name: pasta with pink sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 9x13 baking dish. Spread pineapple with juice evenly in dish. Spread cherry pie filling over pineapple. Sprinkle dry cake mix over cherries, then spread pecans over cake mix. Cut margarine into thin slices and place over pecans. Bake for 50 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream, if desired.
ingredients: crushed pineapple in juice, cherry pie filling, yellow cake mix, butter, shredded coconut, pecans
name: amazing cherry pineapple crumble

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, vanilla essence, egg, self raising flour, sultana, corn flakes, milk chocolate melts, white chocolate chips
name: chocolate cornflake cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, vanilla, salt
name: lacy oatmeal crisp cookies

steps: Combine tahini, olive oil and garlic in food processor or blender. Blend until pureed. Add remaining ingredients, blend until smooth and creamy consistency. Serve at room temperature, with pita bread, on crackers, as a sandwich spread, or as a dip for raw vegetables. Store in refrigerator. It will keep for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: dried butter beans, garlic cloves, tahini, kosher salt, black pepper, cayenne, olive oil, lemon juice
name: butter bean hummus

steps: Preheat grill to high. Lightly oil grates. Insert two 8-inch-long metal or presoaked wooden skewers through onion slices horizontally. Place prepared skewers and remaining vegetables on one or two rimmed baking sheets. Drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, remove from baking sheets. Arrange on grill. Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and tender, 4 to 8 minutes for squash and 8 to 12 minutes for onions and peppers. Remove skewers, and serve.
ingredients: zucchini, red bell peppers, yellow peppers, italian dressing, parmesan cheese
name: zesty grilled veggies

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Combine all ingredeints except lamb, whisking together in a medium-sized bowl until well blended. With a brush, coat leg of lamb evenly with the mixture. Leave at room temperature on lamb for 2 hours. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 45 minutes. Place lamb on rack in a roasting pan and roast
ingredients: honey, light soy sauce, hot english mustard, garlic, lamb chops, salted butter
name: grilled honey mustard lamb chops or mutton extra yummy

steps: Boil pasta until half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, paprika
name: nanny g s macaroni and cheese

steps: Place the bacon, onion, garlic, sugar, jalapeno pepper, oil, black beans, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper
ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic, sugar, jalapeno pepper, oil, black beans, canned chicken broth, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: bacon refried beans

steps: In a large pot, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onions, carrots, celery, salt, and chili paste. Stirring frequently, saute the vegetables over high heat for 5 minutes. Add in the water, cover the pot, and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until the carrots are soft. Add in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice. Stir to combine. Puree the soup in batches using an electric blender. Reheat soup if necessary and serve hot.
ingredients: butter, carrots, onion, vegetable stock, orange juice, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, salt, plain yogurt, of fresh mint
name: orange carrot soup

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, flour, butter, eggs, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, pecans, brown sugar
name: mamma mia s sweet potatoes

steps: Mix all together in a food processor and pulse until smooth. Pour into a bowl and serve immediately or cover and chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve. If it tastes too much like mayo, add more jalapenos and more jalapeno juice. Its up to you.
ingredients: pancake mix, water, mozzarella cheese, jalapeno peppers, ranch salad dressing
name: jalapeno pancakes

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Add pork chops. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until cooked. Remove pork chop from skillet. Add watr, applesauce, apple, cinnamon to skillet. Stir. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Top with chops. Cover and cook on low heat for 5 minutes
ingredients: pork chops, garlic powder, salt and pepper, cooking oil, applesauce, white wine, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: pork chops with applesauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Place asparagus on a nonstick baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with the salt & pepper. Toss to coat. Bake 10 minutes, then toss again. Sprinkle with the cheese & bake until the cheese melts, about 5 
ingredients: asparagus, flour, milk, salt, pepper, bread
name: libbie s creamed asparagus over toast

steps: Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through.
ingredients: flour, salt, pepper, butter, sea scallops, lemon juice, parsley, lemon wedges
name: pan fried sea scallops with lemon butter

steps: Combine the shortening, water and vanilla. This will take some time to mix up but it will eventually. Add the meringue powder and powdered sugar. Mix well - beat for about 3 minutes. If this is way too stiff you can add a little water at a time. Just remember you want this to be a little thick so you can spread it. Bake at 400 for about 6-10 minutes, the time taken depends on the size of cutters you have used. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheet then transfer to a wire rack before decorating.
ingredients: powdered sugar, crisco shortening, water, vanilla, almond flavoring
name: sugar cookie icing also for cakes

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine all ingredients except for zucchini and milk in a medium bowl, stirring well with a whisk. Place milk in shallow bowl. Dip zucchini slices in milk, and dredge in breadcrumb mixture. Place coated slices on an ovenproof wire rack coated with pam cooking spray. Place rack on a cookie sheet. Bake at 425f for 25 to 30 minutes, or until browned and slightly crisp.
ingredients: zucchini, spinach, sweet corn, cheese, ricotta cheese, feta cheese, dry breadcrumbs, phyllo pastry
name: zucchini sweet corn ricotta quiche

steps: Heat a large saut pan over medium-high heat. Add oil, garlic and ginger. Cook until fragrant but not brown, about 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add bok choy leaves and cook until leaves are wilted but stems are still crunchy, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes. Add sweet chili sauce, stir and let cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, tossing to coat all leaves. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve immediately and spoon leftover sauce in pan over bok choy.
ingredients: mushroom, olive oil, baby bok choy, garlic cloves, chicken broth, pepper
name: baby bok choy saut with mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: small red potatoes, olive oil, garlic, fresh herb, salt and pepper
name: microwave garlic potatoes

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, light corn syrup, evaporated milk, heavy cream, salt, vanilla
name: christmas caramels

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until
ingredients: mahi mahi, olive oil, lemon, juice of, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried dill weed, dried rosemary, salt and pepper
name: annie s melt in your mouth mahi fish

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat add olive oil and onions. Cook until tender. Stir in garlic and cook stirring until golden. Stir in mussels, wine and broth and let simmer for 2-5 minutes. Pour into bowls to serve.
ingredients: mussels, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, red onion, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, salt, pepper
name: mejillones antonio

steps: Put eggs, milk & butter in a large bowl and whisk until combined. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat the remaining butter and oil in a pan. Add almond-coated, chocolate-filled sandwiches and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden. Cut into quarters and serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, milk, bread, butter
name: gypsy toast

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: ground chuck, eggs, plain breadcrumbs, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, brown sugar, cooking spray
name: home sweet home meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all the dry ingredients together. Mix all the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake for 10-12 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: cashews, tahini, agave nectar, vanilla extract, sesame seeds
name: gluten free and vegan sesame truffles

steps: Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended.
ingredients: russet potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, whole milk, butter, fresh chives
name: mashed potato cheese and chive gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain spinach well before using. Mix spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese, garlic powder, salt, white pepper, parsleypreparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Thaw spinch according to package directions. Drain well. Chop up artichoke hearts. Add all ingredients in a medium sized casserole dish. Bake in middle oven rack for 25 to 30 minutes, or until slightly golden and bubbly. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, frozen chopped spinach, neufchatel cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, parmesan cheese, red pepper flakes, garlic powder, salt
name: simple hot spinach artichoke dip

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater tater t
ingredients: tater tots, green onions, broccoli, low-fat cream of mushroom soup, fat free sour cream, fat-free cheddar cheese, bacon
name: baked stuffed broccoli taters

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice.
ingredients: frozen broccoli spears, cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, sharp cheddar cheese, lemon juice, curry powder, breadcrumbs, butter
name: chicken and broccoli hotdish

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix pasta sauce, pasta sauce, frozen spinach, part-skim mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: low-fat cheese ravioli, pasta sauce, frozen spinach, part-skim mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: ravioli bake ww

steps: Combine vermicelli, ghee, honey, sugar, cardamom powder, water, golden raisin, sliced almonds in a medium mixing bowl. Spread the mixture into a nine inch pie pan and shape with fingers or bottom of a spoon to cover the bottom and sides. Bake for 15 minutes in oven at 350 degrees. Let cool. Pour in filling or use in place of graham cracker crusts.
ingredients: vermicelli, ghee, honey, sugar, cardamom powder, water, golden raisin, sliced almonds
name: seviyan vermecilli dessert

steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: russet potatoes, heavy cream, garlic, kosher salt, parmesan cheese
name: creamy garlic mashed potatoes

steps: Place the prawns in a bowl, cover with water, soak for about 10 seconds, then squeeze out the excess water. Place the drained prawns in a food processor with the prawns, chilli, garlic, coriander, salt and egg. Pulse until well blended. Preheat the oven to 200 degrees celcius. Using lightly floured hands divide the mixture into 12 small cakes. Spray a baking sheet very lightly with oil and arrange the prawn cakes onto the baking sheet, evenly spaced apart. Spray with a little oil and bake for 15-20 minutes, turning half way through, until golden brown and just begining to crisp. Aerve warm with baby lettuce, rocket or watercress leaves and a bowl of sweet chilli sauce.
ingredients: red jalapeno chiles, green jalapeno peppers, fresh basil leaves, fresh gingerroot, tiger shrimp, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon wedge
name: jalapeno tiger prawn ginger skewers

steps: Place brisket in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 2-3 hours or until brisket is tender. Discard brisket. Remove brisket. When cool enough to handle, shred brisket. Return brisket to sauce and heat through. Using slotted spoon, fill buns with desired amount.
ingredients: beef brisket, barbecue sauce, onion, garlic cloves, buns, cheddar cheese
name: crock pot beef brisket sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: garlic, sesame seeds, reduced sodium soy sauce, sugar, onion flakes, ginger, pork tenderloin
name: korean pork strips

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, orange, zest of, ground cinnamon, granulated sugar, butter
name: graham cracker crust extraordinaire

steps: Preheat oven to 200f. In a large bowl of an electric mixer, beat egg whites until foamy. With the mixer on high speed, beat in salt. Then gradually add sugar, about a tableshppon at a time, beating well after each addition, until whites fold stiff, glossy peaks. Add vanilla and beat for 1 minute. Fold in dates and walnuts. Drop meringue mixture by rounded teaspoonfulls onto well-greased baking sheets, spacing cookies about 1 inch apart. Bake in a 200f oven for 1 hour or until outside is dry and set. Cookies should not turn brown. Let cool on baking sheets for about 5 minutes, then transfer to racks and let cool completely. Store airtight.
ingredients: white sugar, milk, dates, butter, nuts
name: date candy

steps: Toss scallions in lemon juice. Drain, salt and dredge in flour. Sautee in olive oil until brown. Set scallops aside. Drain off any extra olive oil, keeping only about 1 tablespoon. Add garlic, and shallots and saute until lightly browned. Add remaining ingredients and simmer until slightly thickened. Serve sauce over scallops.
ingredients: sea scallops, olive oil, salt and pepper, lemon juice
name: how scallops are supposed to be made

steps: Put the raspberries, lemon juice and lime wedges in a small glass. Pour the raspberry sauce over the raspberries, lemon juice and lime wedges. Pour the raspberry sauce over the raspberries, lemon juice and lime
ingredients: vodka, liquor, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, raspberries, lime wedges, toothpick
name: raspberry purple hooters cocktails

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the sugar or splenda and cornstarch. Over medium low heat, stir in milk until smooth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the lemon juice, zest and vanilla. Place the pan in a bowl of ice water and stir for 2 minutes to cool. Fold in whipped topping and food coloring if using. Spoon into dessert dishes, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving. Garnish with additional whipped topping if desired.
ingredients: midori melon liqueur, unflavored gelatin, honeydew melon, sugar, lemon, heavy cream, sweetened whipped cream, melon ball
name: midori honeydew mousse

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet and saut the shallots for 3-4 minutes. Remove the shallots and brown the pork from all sides. Add the brandy and let stand 2-3 minutes, turning the pork to avoid burning. Then add the juices, cover with the lid and let simmer in very low heat. After 1. 5 hour add the shallots, salt and pepper. 10 minutes before the meat is done. Put the plums.
ingredients: pork loin, prunes, salt, pepper, ginger, flour, prune juice, water, salt and pepper, red currant jelly
name: danish roast pork with prunes flaskesteg med svesker

steps: Put shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like.
ingredients: large shrimp, water, seasoned bread crumbs, fresh parsley, lemon, butter, garlic, romano cheese
name: shrimp francesca

steps: In a large saucepan bring the chicken stock to the boil and gradually add the polenta. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring often. When thick remove from the heat and stir in the herbs and cheese. Pour the mixture into a lined 19cmx19cm pan and leave to cool to room temperature. Once it is cool place in the fridge overnight. The next day slice the polenta in half horizontally and lay the salami, sun-dried tomatoes and pepper on the bottom half. Replace the top half and bake at 200c for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, leeks, water, reduced-sodium chicken broth, bay leaf, polenta, parmesan cheese
name: soft polenta with leeks

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the chicken fillet, reduced-fat peanut butter, low sodium soy sauce, water, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low
ingredients: chicken breast fillet, reduced-fat peanut butter, low sodium soy sauce, water, sesame seeds
name: ww peanut chicken 3 points

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit. On a cookie sheet pan place strips of bacon and bake until crisp. Remove bacon set aside. Drain the fat and discard, leaving just a touch. Place potatoes on pan and make small indents with the back of a spoon. Crack eggs into each indent. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve with the bacon.
ingredients: bacon, eggs, half-and-half, flour, fresh dill, salt, pepper, chives
name: norwegian bacon and egg cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, combine tuna, celery, onion, cheese, olives, mayonnaise, pepper, hamburger buns. Spread tuna mixture evenly among 4 buns. Wrap sandwiches loosely in aluminum foil. Place sandwich slices on a baking sheet into a pre-heated 350 oven for 15-20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Unwrap and serve immediately.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, tuna in water, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, prepared mustard, salt, whipped cream cheese, hamburger buns
name: hot tuna sandwich

steps: Cook beef and broccoli salad according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add broccoli, onion, marinated artichoke hearts, chicken rice-a-roni, mayonnaise, cherry tomatoes. Mix together broccoli, onion, marinated artichoke hearts, chicken rice-a-roni, mayonnaise, cherry tomatoes. Add broccoli, onion, marinated artichoke
ingredients: cooked beef, fresh broccoli, green onions, marinated artichoke hearts, chicken rice-a-roni, mayonnaise, cherry tomatoes
name: so good beef and broccoli salad

steps: Heat milk and sugar to rolling boil, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Add chocolate, stirring until melted. Beat over heat until smooth. Remove from heat. Blend in butter, vanilla, and salt.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, powdered sugar, evaporated milk, vanilla
name: gramma connie s hot fudge sauce

steps: Heat oil in large high sided pan over medium heat. Salt and pepper each chop, put in hot oil. Cook about 3 minutes on each side or until nicely browned. To the pan add the orange juice, zest, onion, and white wine. Reduce heat to low cover and cook for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes remove pork chops from pan. Put them on a serving platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Add the cream of mushroom soup to the pan and whisk constantly over medium heat until the sauce is thickened. Pour over chops.
ingredients: orange roughy, butter, onion, orange juice, lemon juice, garlic salt, lemon pepper seasoning, parsley flakes
name: citrus orange roughy

steps: Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is completely set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip
name: pink jello mold

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Set aside. Crumble chicken into large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients and mix well with hands. Shape into two oblong loaves. Place on baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: chicken thigh, brownberry herb stuffing mix, parmesan cheese, egg, onion, salt, pepper, ketchup
name: chicken loaf ii

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: plain yogurt, pumpkin puree, dark brown sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves, nutmeg, egg yolks, salt, pie shell
name: alton brown s yogurt pumpkin pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Coat a large baking sheet with butter flavored cooking spray. In a medium bowl, combine apples, brown sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon. Toss to coat apples. Place wonton wrappers on a flat surface. Drop apple mixture by teaspoonfuls onto center of each wrapper. Moisten edges of wrapper with wet fingers, fold over one corner to make a triangle and press sides together to seal. Transfer filled wrappers to prepared baking sheet and coat surface with cooking spray. Bake until wontons are golden brown, about 15 minutes. Place wontons on individual plates and sift with powdered sugar. Serve with ice cream on the side.
ingredients: apple juice, cornstarch, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, apples
name: cinnamon apple topping

steps: Mix the dark rum, white rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine, lime juice, lime wedge, tequila, lime wedge, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot sauce, lime wedge, cointreau liqueur, hot
ingredients: dark rum, white rum, almond flavored liqueur, triple sec, orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine
name: tommy mai tai

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: cider vinegar, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, dried parsley, garlic powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese, olive oil
name: vinaigrette dressing for a crowd

steps: In a medium, heavy saucepan over low heat, melt 1 cup of the semisweet chocoalte chips with the unsweetened chocoalte. Remove pan from heat. Add the butter, vanilla, and salt to the melted chocolate and stir until the butter melts and is incorporated into the chocolate. Let stand until the mixture is at room temperature. Using an electric mixer at high speed, whip the chocolate until it holds soft peaks. Fold in the remaining chocolate chips, marshmallows, and nuts. Frost as desired.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, chocolate fudge frosting, mini marshmallows, mixed nuts
name: quick and easy rocky road fudge

steps: Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4 ingredients. Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Stir in basil and next 4
ingredients: bow tie pasta, avocados, bacon, fresh basil, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, ground black pepper, salt, pecorino romano cheese
name: avocado basil pasta

steps: Place beef in pressure cooker. Cover with lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: chuck roast, onion, baby carrots, brown gravy mix, beef stock, garlic powder, black pepper
name: easy pressure cooker roast with gravy

steps: In a medium mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir until combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill until set, 2-3 hours.
ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, hot water, cold water, whole berry cranberry sauce, celery, walnuts, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, sugar, cool whip
name: paxton raspberry salad cranberry sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, peanut butter, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, nuts
name: peanut butter cookies for a crowd

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, melt whole wheat pasta in milk in med saucepan over low heat. Add tuna mixture on top. Mix well. Once pasta is cooked, drain and pour tuna mix on top. Mix well and serve.
ingredients: whole wheat pasta, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, capers, kalamata olive, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh lemon juice, black pepper, tuna
name: pasta with tuna and black olive vinaigrette

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus, saute 1 minute. Add broth. Cover. Lower heat. Cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain. Season with salt, pepper and soy sauce. Serve immediately.
ingredients: oil, green asparagus, smoked tofu, five-spice powder, black pepper, seasoning, apple cider vinegar, light sesame oil
name: smoked tofu and asparagus toss

steps: In large heavy saucepan, cook bacon until crisp. Add onion and celety cooking until soft, but not brown. Stir in flour and them slowly adding in chicken stock. Add potatoes and simmer 10 minutes or until tender. Add milk and cream corn. Simmer 10 minutes or until tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Do not boil.
ingredients: water, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, milk, dried onion flakes, curry powder, cheddar cheese, fresh parsley, cooked bacon
name: ramen corn chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together oats, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in gingersnap cookies. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set.
ingredients: quick oats, light almond milk, lemon curd, gingersnap cookie
name: the original lemon curd oatmeal

steps: Mix potato slices with butter. Place slightly overlapping in foil-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time.
ingredients: potatoes, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter, olive oil, salt & pepper
name: crispy potato bites

steps: In a 1-qt. Microwave-safe casserole,, mash the beans with a fork. Stir in the salsa, chili powder, cumin, and salt, if desired. Stir to mix well. Stir in the cheese. Cover with the casserole lid, and microwave on high power for 3 to 4 minutes until heated through. Remove from the microwave. Stir to mix in the melted cheese. Spread the sour cream on top. Sprinkle with the chives. Serve warm with tortilla chips. Cover and refrigerate leftovers, which will keep 4 to 5 days.
ingredients: fat free tortillas, low fat mozzarella, low-fat cheddar cheese, salsa, low-fat sour cream
name: microwave mexican pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, salt, sugar, peppermint candy
name: peppermint meringue cookies

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated.
ingredients: oranges, almond syrup, gin, pink grapefruit juice, angostura bitters
name: orange blossom

steps: In a small saucepan combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in butter. Stir in vanilla. Beat until foamy. Remove from heat. Stir in maple flavoring. This may form crystals but can be reheated. Does not need to be refrigerated.
ingredients: water, erythritol, unsalted butter, coconut oil, maple extract, vanilla extract, xanthan gum, cinnamon
name: low carb syrup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat a rimmed cookie sheet with the pam. Spread chickpeas on baking sheet. Mix the seasonings and sprinkle it on the chickpeas, toss to coat. Roast on the bottom rack of the oven, shaking pan every 15 minutes or so, until brown and crunchy, about 45 to 50 minutes. Store in a tight lidded container.
ingredients: dried garbanzo beans, vegetable stock, yellow onion, bay leaf
name: chickpeas

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, salt, chili flakes, ground black pepper, dried thyme, zucchini, eggs
name: sweet potato and zucchini hash

steps: Place potato in colander. In pot, bring next 3 ingredients and enough salted water to cover, to a boil. Cook 20 minutes. Pour over potato to drain. Discard rosemary. Return potatoes and potato to pot and stir in butter and broth. Using hand masher, mash mixture until smooth. Stir in peppers and serve.
ingredients: potato, garlic cloves, cream, butter, frozen spinach, feta
name: spinach mash with garlic and fetta

steps: In a heavy saucepan, open all cans and mix together. Add onion and white chicken chili mix to taste. Stir well. Simmer for 45 minutes, stirring frequently. Sprinkle cheese on top when serving.
ingredients: great northern beans, white meat chicken, chicken stock, salsa, carrot, celery, taco seasoning, masa harina flour, salt, colby-monterey jack cheese
name: super easy white chicken chili

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, garlic powder, seasoning salt, ground pepper, olive oil, alfredo sauce, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: chicken breasts alfredo no breading

steps: Place ribs on grill grate, skirt side down, cover and slow cook until brown. Turn and cook the second side until brown and ribs are done. Place ribs on grill grate, skirt side down, cover and slow cook until brown. Place ribs on grill grate
ingredients: baby back ribs, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, honey, ginger
name: island ribs

steps: In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnutpreparation:In a large bowl, combine pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black
ingredients: medium pasta shells, nonfat plain yogurt, honey, frozen orange juice concentrate, mandarin oranges, red seedless grapes, green seedless grape, apple, celery, black walnut
name: pasta and black walnut fruit salad

steps: In 4-quart crock pot, place frozen meatballs and frozen vegetables. In a bowl, stir together tomatoes, gravy, water and seasonings. Pour over meatballs & vegetables. Cover and cook on low-heat for 6-8 hours or high-heat for 4 hours. Add corn and mushrooms, if using about 30 min before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti sauce, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, dried italian seasoning, frozen meatballs, spaghetti, parmesan cheese, olive oil
name: slow simmered spaghetti and meatballs crock pot

steps: In skillet, brown chops in hot oil, for 5 minuts on each side. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Put chops on serving platter. Spoon sauve over.
ingredients: egg, prepared mustard, garlic, dry breadcrumbs, boneless pork loin chops, vegetable oil
name: tangy breaded pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Soften corn tortillas in the microwave for 30 seconds. In a small bowl mix cottage cheese, cream cheese, mozzerella, cheddar, and chicken broth. Spray a square baking dish with cooking spray, then spread a few tables spoons of chili onto the bottom. Place one layer of corn tortillas on top. Layer about a third the jar of chili onto tortillas. Top with half the cheese mixture. Repeat layer begining with 3 more tortillas, another third of the chili, and the rest of the cheese. Top with the final layer of tortillas. Cover with remaining chili and sprinkle more cheese on top. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until fully cooked, at 350 on a rack to allow grease to drip off. Cool completely. Mix all other ingredients. Coat wings or toss in sauce and marinade at least 2 hours. Bake 15 minutes at 350 on a rack. Serve as they are, out of the oven or coat them again in sauce.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, cream cheese, milk, canned chipotle chiles, salt and pepper, paprika
name: chicken chipotle

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, garlic, cream of chicken soup, frozen mixed vegetables
name: inside out chicken pot pie

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips.
ingredients: avocado, mango, jalapeno, red onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, lime, juice of, tuna steaks, vegetable oil, salt and pepper
name: seared tuna and salsa

steps: Cook broccoli until tender in the amount of water called for on the package, drain. Mix together soup mix, cream cheese, sour cream and water chestnuts. Add drained broccoli and stir well. Place in lightly buttered casserole dish and top with grated cheese and cracker crums. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until hot throughout and bubbly.
ingredients: frozen broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, cheese sauce, onion, mushrooms, ritz crackers, butter
name: broccoli casserole with a kick

steps: In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender.
ingredients: white potatoes, garlic salt, mozzarella cheese, dried oregano, salami, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, roasted red peppers, green olives, sour cream
name: italian inspired potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium. Add onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Whisk eggs and hot sauce in a small bowl. Add to hot skillet and cook until eggs set, about 2 minutes. Top with cheese and cook until melted, about 1 minute. Place egg mixture evenly over 4 bagel halves. Top with remaining bagel halves and serve.
ingredients: cucumber, carrot, dill weed, fresh chives, mayonnaise, bagels, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, cooked turkey breast
name: turkey bagel sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut baked potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish.
ingredients: potatoes, cream of mushroom soup, green pepper, milk, onion, salt
name: nancy s potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Press mixture firmly into a greased 19cmx29cm rectangular slice pan. Bake in a 350 degree f oven for 20 minutes. Whilst baking make the icing by sifting together the icing sugar and cocoa. Stir in the butter and enough milk to make it spreadable. Remove the slice from the oven and spread with the icing while still hot. Cool in pan. Cut into bars or squares to serve.
ingredients: butter, eggs, sugar, sweetened coconut, lime peel, bittersweet chocolate
name: coconut peaks

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the rice flour, soy flour, potato starch, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my rice flour, soy flour, potato starch, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my soy flour, soy flour, potato starch, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my soy flour, soy flour, potato starch,
ingredients: rice flour, soy flour, potato starch, salt, baking powder, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, milk
name: gluten free rice and soy waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celcius. Put the chopped apples into a large bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice. Combine the nuts, sultanas, sugar, flour, salt and baking powder and mix well. Stir this mixture into the apples. Add in the vanilla essence and mix again. Pour the mixture into a lightly oiled cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned on top. Serve hot or cold. For a moister cake. Add to the ingredients a little fruit juice or water.
ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, butter, vanilla, eggs, cooking apple
name: kerry apple cake

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Mix flour and corn. Then add sugar, milk, salt and butter. Add eggs and mix well. Pour corn mixture into a greased 1 quart casserole dish. Place casserole into a larger pan and fill the larger pan half way up with hot water. Bake for 1 hour in the 325f oven.
ingredients: cream cheese, eggs, sugar, frozen sweet corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, milk, margarine, salt, ground nutmeg
name: slow cooker corn pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip.
ingredients: round sourdough loaf, monterey jack cheese, butter, green onion, poppy seeds, garlic powder
name: yummy party bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium saucepan, melt chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just incorporated. Add cooled chocolate and mix until uniform in color. Add flour and stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, unsalted butter, white sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, salt, walnuts
name: katharine hepburn s brownies

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the sugar, water, orange juice, and orance zest. Stir to combine. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the figs and cook for about 2 minutes or until soft, turn once. Add in curacao and stir to mix. Cool and serve in sherbert dishes.
ingredients: orange, black mission fig, sugar, red wine, thyme, cheesecloth, water
name: fig compote

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place salmon on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide spinach and tomatoes among serving plates. Top with salmon, goat cheese, and pecans, and drizzle with vinaigrette.
ingredients: salmon fillets, pepper, mandarin oranges, sea salt, pineapple chunk, celery, slivered almonds, mayonnaise
name: island style salmon salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: russet potatoes, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, beer, cream
name: beer cheese fried potatoes

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the cucumbers, lard, flour, garlic clove, paprika, vinegar, salt, pepper, sour cream and cook for about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 5 minutes.
ingredients: cucumbers, lard, flour, garlic clove, paprika, vinegar, salt, pepper, sour cream
name: north croatian cucumber stew cuspajz od krastavaca

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: ground beef, italian sausage, mozzarella cheese, red pasta sauce, french bread
name: aunt esta s hot degos

steps: Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large mixing bowl until well blended. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Serve plain or with pie filling of choice.
ingredients: cream cheese, pumpkin pie mix, granulated sugar, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust
name: no bake pumpkin cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly grease a 12 cup muffin pan. In a medium saucepan with enough water to cover, boil squash 20 minutes, or until tender. Remove from heat, drain, and puree in a food processor. In a large bowl, thoroughly mix together flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pumpkin pie spice. In a medium bowl, thoroughly mix together milk, egg and applesauce. Stir in squash. Fold the squash mixture into the flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into the greased muffin pan, filling cups about full. Bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, vegetable oil, eggs, yellow squash, zucchini, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: savory squash muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Chop yellow squash and onion into small, uniform pieces. Add the squash and onion to a medium sized pot and cook in the butter over medium heat until soft and mushy. Season cooked mixture to taste. Beat the egg with a fork and add it to the squash mixture. Add one cup of shredded cheese to the mixture and stir until melted and mixed. Pour mixture into casserole dish and top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 min or until cheese lightly browned.
ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, cornbread muffins, milk, onion powder, butter, sage, cream of chicken soup, salt and pepper
name: corny yellow squash casserole

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add garlic and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, floridanative s artichoke hearts, cannellini beans, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, onion, dried thyme, chicken broth, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, croutonpreparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent,
ingredients: marinated artichoke hearts, cannellini beans, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, onion, dried thyme, chicken broth, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, crouton
name: floridanative s artichoke white bean soup

steps: Mix ww, whole almond, sunflower seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried
ingredients: whole almond, sunflower seeds, honey, kosher salt, vanilla, dried tart cherry, dried apricot, sesame seeds
name: snack mix ww

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda, salt, egg, oil, sugar, milk, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, kalamata olivepreparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin t
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, egg, oil, sugar, milk, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, kalamata olive
name: sun dried tomato olive muffins

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag.
