Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Heat grill. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade. Discard marinade. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: beer, brown sugar, grainy mustard, white vinegar, vegemite, rosemary
name: beer marinated steaks

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray pan with nonstick cooking spray. Arrange fillets in a single layer in the prepared baking dish, and sprinkle with parsley. Bake in pre-heated oven 10-15 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: orange roughy fillet, butter, dried basil, lemon, juice of, parmesan cheese
name: orange roughy fillets with lemon basil butter

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: cake flour, cornstarch, baking powder, egg white, cold water
name: lacy tempura batter

steps: In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins, vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberriespreparation:In a large saucepan, combine corn
ingredients: cornstarch, salt, whole milk, sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, unsalted butter, vanilla, cinnamon, raisins
name: blanca s rich and creamy vanilla pudding

steps: In a small saucepan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, chili powder, fiesta nacho cheese soup, chicken, taco shells, lettuce, chopped tomato. Cook 10-12 minutes on each side or until oil is melted. Remove from heat. Remove from
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, chili powder, fiesta nacho cheese soup, chicken, taco shells, lettuce, chopped tomato
name: chicken nacho tacos

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place chestnut puree in oven and bake for 5 minutes.
ingredients: pie crust, butter, caster sugar, chestnut puree, chocolate, brandy
name: chocolate and chestnut pie

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Place bread slices on a baking sheet and bake for 1-2 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-2 minutes. Remove from oven and let
ingredients: bread, garlic, butter, salt
name: ultimate instant garlic toast

steps: Mix bread crumbs, parsley, salt and garlic. Dip chicken strips into egg and then coat with bread crumbs. Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5-6 minutes or until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink inside. Serve with a squeeze of lemon, spaghetti sauce, or parmesan cheese.
ingredients: chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, yoghurt, olive oil, lemon wedge
name: parmesan crumbed chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook spinach in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: frozen spinach, french-fried onions, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup, cracker crumb, butter
name: nanny s spinach casserole

steps: Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl, stirring with a whisk. Add oil, whisking until well blended. Cook balsamic vinaigrette in boiling water for 4 minutes. Add onion and celery and cook an additional 1 minute. Drain well. Add balsamic vinegar mixture to vinaigrette. Toss well to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: salt, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, pepper, olive oil, minced garlic clove, scallion, parsley
name: house balsamic vinaigrette

steps: In a 3-4 qt pot, saute the onion and carrot in a little olive oil until the onion is translucent. Add the sausage and brown a bit. Add the rest of the ingredients. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve with crusty bread and a green salad.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, cabbage and carrot coleslaw mix, red beans, diced tomatoes, low-fat kielbasa, low sodium chicken broth, water, pepper
name: simple cabbage sausage soup

steps: Preheat oven 350f. Grease or use non-stick cooking spray and prepare 13x9 inches pan. Reserve 1 cup dry cake mix for topping. Crust - combine remaining cake mix, butter and egg, press into bottom of pan. Prepare filling - combine pie mix, 2 eggs and evaporated milk, mix well and pour over crust. Topping - combine dry mix, sugar, cinnamon and cut in butter to crumble mixture. Sprinkle over filling. Bake 350 for 50-60 minutes or until set. Serve with dollip of whip cream.
ingredients: pumpkin, evaporated milk, pumpkin pie spice, yellow cake mix, butter, eggs, sugar, walnuts
name: great pumpkin dessert

steps: Combine tahini, olive oil and garlic in food processor or blender. Blend until pureed. Add remaining ingredients, blend until smooth and creamy consistency. Serve at room temperature, with pita bread, on crackers, as a sandwich spread, or as a dip for raw vegetables. Store in refrigerator. It will keep for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: fava beans, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, tahini
name: hummus fava bean style

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: water, canola oil, egg, whole wheat flour, vital wheat gluten, honey, salt, instant yeast
name: 100 whole wheat burger hot dog buns

steps: Mix together the first three ingredients and spread into a 9x13 inch dish. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes and cool. Beat together cream cheese and one cup of sugar. Stir in cool whip and spread on cooled pretzel crust. Dissolve jell-o in boiling water. Stir in strawberries and let set for ten minutes. Pour on top of cheese mixture and chill to the jell-o is set.
ingredients: unsalted pretzels, sugar, butter, philadelphia cream cheese, cool whip, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, crushed pineapple
name: strawberry jello pretzel salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. Should be 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, low-fat cheese, butter, milk
name: quick cheese biscuits oamc

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease and flour a 9x13 size pan. Put all the ingredients into one large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: unsweetened crushed canned pineapple, instant lemon pudding mix, frozen whipped topping, graham cracker crust
name: pineapple fluff pie

steps: In a small saucepan heat water to simmer. Add in honey and stir until combined, turn off heat. Add in cinnamon and soy sauce stirring til incorporated. In a 9x12 casserole dish put frozen spinach, baby carrots in first. Place chicken on top of vegetables. Pour sauce over top of chicken and veggies. Put onion slices and butter pats on top. Cook in 350 oven for 45 minutes or until juices run clear from chicken. Check chicken at 20 min mark and baste with juices.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cornstarch, soy sauce, ginger, pineapple chunks in juice, sweet and sour sauce, canola oil, snow peas, almonds
name: cantonese sweet and sour chicken

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: whole wheat bread, butter, garlic powder, dried parsley, honey ham deli meat, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, red onions
name: rockin grilled ham and cheese

steps: Heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives.
ingredients: plum tomatoes, red onion, olive oil, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, feta cheese, corkscrew macaroni
name: plum tomato feta pasta

steps: Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve.
ingredients: leek, garlic, crushed tomatoes, carrot, red chile, chicken stock, worcestershire sauce, butter beans, green beans, parsley
name: spicy tomato and bean soup

steps: Put cranberries into a colander, rinse with cold water. Throw away any berries that are dried out or mushy. Bring water to a boil and put cranberries into boiling water. Cook over medium heat until the berries pop. Ladle cranberries into food mill and sieve. Pour prepared fruit back into pot, add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual.
ingredients: onion, dried cranberries, thyme, balsamic vinegar, apple juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: tyler florence s cranberry onion jam

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: butter, seasoning salt, hash brown potatoes, half-and-half cream, eggs, pepper, ham, green onion, red bell pepper, cheddar cheese
name: potato ham cheese bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: water, active dry yeast, canola oil, honey, oat bran, whole wheat flour, bread flour, flax seed meal, vital wheat gluten, salt
name: oat bran health bread

steps: Place two small scoops of ice cream in martini or champagne glass. Pour 1 t. Espresso over the ice cream. Drizzle with cold chocolate sauce. Garnish with chocolate curls.
ingredients: water, margarine, flour, salt, eggs, vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup
name: cream puff sundaes

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add tomato sauce, onion and worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Prepare potatoes. Place beef mixture into a casserole dish. Layer the beans over the beef and smooth potatoes over the beans. Sprinkle the cheese over the potatoes and bake uncovered at 375f for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, salt, tomato sauce, cheddar cheese, worcestershire sauce
name: freezer cheesy beef pasta sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Saute shrimp in skillet over medium heat in oil until softened, about 4 minutes. Stir in spinach, cheese, cream cheese, half and half, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into shallow baking dish like a 9 inch quiche dish or pie plate. Bake in the preheated oven until the dip is bubbly and the top is light brown, about 35 minutes.
ingredients: cilantro leaf, scallions, garlic clove, jalapeno, frozen chopped spinach, mayonnaise, goat cheese, fresh lime juice, salt, cooked shrimp
name: creamy shrimp spinach and goat cheese dip

steps: In a small saucepan over moderately low heat, melt 1 stick of the butter. Continue heating, swirling the pan to prevent burning, until the butter turns nut brown. Transfer the butter to a medium bowl. Using an electric mixer on low speed, gradually blend in the powdered sugar and salt alternately with the milk and vanilla, until the frosting is smooth. Beat in the remaining butter, bit by bit. Refrigerate until mixture is cool and thick enough to spread. Keep frosted cake or cupcakes refridgerated, since the frosting has a tendency to soften and drip off the sides if it gets too warm.
ingredients: unsalted butter, milk, white chocolate, vanilla extract, powdered sugar
name: white chocolate buttercream

steps: In a large pitcher combine limeade and apple juice. Shake vigorously. Add ginger ale. Put ice in glasses, pour in mixture. Top with maraschino cherries.
ingredients: apple juice concentrate, water, carbonated beverages, green maraschino cherries
name: green holiday punch

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: grapeseed oil, shallot, brussels sprouts, unsalted shelled pistachio, fresh lemon juice
name: sauteed brussels sprouts with lemon and pistachios

steps: Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: vidalia onions, canola oil, mayonnaise, sour cream, buttermilk, hot pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, blue cheese
name: tangy blue cheese dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together cake mix, egg and butter. Spread into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan. In a separate bowl, mix together powedered sugar, beaten eggs, softened cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth. Spread mixture over bottom layer. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars.
ingredients: red velvet cake mix, eggs, butter, water, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla
name: red velvet bars

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the gelatin, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with gelatin. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: orange gelatin, hot water, orange rind, orange juice, salt, vanilla ice cream, rum flavoring, macaroons, fruit cocktail, 9-inch pie shell
name: jamaican fruit pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange sausage balls in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f.
ingredients: bulk pork sausage, baking mix, granny smith apples, craisins, raisins, pecans
name: sausage balls with apples and craisins

steps: Place the buns on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side.
ingredients: bread, dry onion flakes, garlic, fresh jalapeno peppers, pimientos, black olives, cheddar cheese
name: jalapeno burger buns

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan on medium-high heat. Add chicken and onion. Cook and stir 8 minute or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in flour. Add beans, broth and salad dressing mix. Mix well. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 20 min., stirring occasionally.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, fat-free chicken broth, oregano, chili powder, hominy
name: chilied chicken and hominy soup

steps: Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Remove from
ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, chopped tomatoes, spaghetti, parmesan cheese
name: pasta alla amatriciana

steps: Heat oil in 10 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, shallots, leafy greens, white wine, salt and pepper
name: sauteed greens

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium non-stick skillet, over medium heat, add the first 4 ingredients and cook until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender. Drain if needed. While meat mixture is browning, boil water. In a large bowl add rest of ingredients except shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a greased or sprayed 2-quart baking dish. Cover with lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake until cheese is melted and lightly browned.
ingredients: kielbasa, coconut oil, au gratin potato mix, frozen mixed vegetables, water, shredded cheddar cheese
name: au gratin sausage skillet

steps: Place aubergines in a large bowl. Add olive oil, salt, pepper, pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes, black pepper flakes
ingredients: aubergines, walnuts, garlic, red chili pepper flakes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: betingan makdous stuffed aubergine pickle in olive oil

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: unsweetened coconut, flour, salt, black pepper, egg, vegetable oil, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast
name: coconut chicken on a stick

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic cloves, chicken broth, cream cheese, artichoke hearts, fresh lemon juice, ground red pepper. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic clove, black pepper, french-fried onions
name: rich and creamy artichoke casserole

steps: In a blender, combine cucumbers, lime juice, sugar, salt and 4 cups of cold water. Blend until smooth. Pour mixture into a mesh strainer placed over a pitcher, pressing pulp to release as much liquid as possible. Discard pulp. Add enough ice to fill pitcher. Garnish glasses with cucumber slices and lime wedges.
ingredients: sugar, water, english cucumbers, vodka, cranberry juice, fresh lime juice, ice
name: cucumber cape codder

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Spray 9x13 pan with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange tenderloins in pan and sprinkle with mozzarella. In seperate bowl, mix tomatoes, chicken stuffing, and water. Mix until stuffing is moistened. Spread evenly over chicken. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: tomatoes, sweet onion, olive oil, fresh oregano, fresh basil, fresh parsley, italian bread, parmesan cheese
name: easy bruschetta

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt the margarine. Once liquified, stir in the peanut butter, graham crumbs, and sweetener until well incorporated. Spoon about 2 tablespoons of the peanut mixture into the muffin tins lined with cupcake paper liners. In a different small saucepan on medium heat, melt the chocolate and milk together until completely melted, stirring often. Spoon over top of the peanut butter cups. Garnish with nuts and allow to set in the fridge for 6-8 hours before serving.
ingredients: coconut oil, maple syrup, cocoa powder, peanut butter
name: melt in your mouth peanut butter chocolate bites vegan

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Empty peaches into the bottom of a 13 x 9- inch pan. Cover with the dry cake mix and press down firmly. Cut butter or margarine into small pieces and place on top of cake mix. Sprinkle top with cinnamon. Bake for 45 minutes. Can top with whipped topping if desired.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, margarine, cherry pie filling, crushed pineapple
name: easy fruit crisp dump cake

steps: Whisk all ingredients together. Marinate flank steak in the marinade for at least 3 hours and if possible, overnight. Turn the meat a few times during marination. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill or broil to your liking.
ingredients: ketchup, water, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, bay leaves, pepper, dry basil, flank steaks, french bread
name: tangy flank steak sandwiches

steps: Combine first 3 ingredients in a medium-size heavy saucepan. Gradually whisk in milk and half-and-half. Bring to a boil over medium heat, whisking constantly. Boil, whisking constantly, 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter and vanilla, whisking until smooth. Pour into a bowl. Place plastic wrap directly over warm pudding. Chill 2 hours. Garnish, if desired.
ingredients: smooth peanut butter, light corn syrup, vanilla extract, powdered sugar
name: peanut butter playdough

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon and zest. Add the milk and mix until you have a smooth and lump free batter. Add the egg and vanilla, mix, now add the melted butter and mix again. Heat a non-stick frying. Dip and coat the bread in the batter, fry until light golden.
ingredients: banana, egg, ground cloves, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, vanilla extract, bread
name: easy banana french toast

steps: Drain and reserve liquid from fruit. Add enough water to make two cups of liquid. Pour pudding mix & liquid into a pan. Cook until thickened, stir in dry jello. Cook until thick
ingredients: instant white chocolate pudding and pie filling mix, cool whip, mandarin oranges, granny smith apple, red delicious apple, pineapple
name: fruity salad

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: sauerkraut, onion, butter, butter beans, kielbasa, salt & pepper
name: polish kapusta kielbasa

steps: Place collard greens and ham in crock pot. Slice onions and peppers into rings and place on top of collard greens. Top all with stewed tomatoes. Pour wine over tomatoes. Cook on low 8-10 hours.
ingredients: smoked ham hock, bacon, collard greens, salt, black pepper, water, onion, red wine vinegar, hot pepper sauce
name: crock pot collard greens and ham

steps: Mix all ingredients into a large bowl. Let marinade in the fridge for about one hour. Preheat oven to 350. Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the edges start to brown.
ingredients: firm tofu, tomato sauce, lime juice, onion, dried oregano, garlic powder, coconut extract, salt and pepper
name: caribbean baked tofu cutlets

steps: In a large saucepan, heat water over medium high heat. Once water begins to boil, add the tofu. This will rinse the frying oil off and bring the tofu to room temperature. Boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove tofu from the water and drain the saucepan. Place tofu on a towel to dry. Return the saucepan to the stove and add the vinegar, sugar, and salt to it. Simmer until it reaches a slightly syrupy consistency, stirring often. Remove from heat and add remaining ingrediants. Serve in a small dipping bowl alongside tofu.
ingredients: firm tofu, sherry wine, cornstarch, orange, juice of, orange zest, low sodium soy sauce, sugar, hot sauce, garlic clove, olive oil
name: pan seared orange tofu

steps: Melt chocolate and butter over low heat. Stir in vanilla and walnuts.
ingredients: unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, light corn syrup, light cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla
name: martha stewart s hot fudge sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: green beans, water, bacon grease, onions, dijon mustard, soy sauce, brown sugar, salt
name: deviled green beans

steps: Place the turmeric leaves and water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the tea, turmeric, water, soymilk, lemon, almond oil, agave nectar and bring back to a boil. Remove from the heat and steep, covered, for 5 more minutes. Just before serving, return to a boil and strain into tea cups.
ingredients: turmeric, water, soymilk, lemon, almond oil, agave nectar
name: turmeric tea

steps: Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing.
ingredients: sourdough starter, milk, sugar, salt, oil, flour
name: soft crust sourdough bread

steps: Preheat oven to 300f. Combine first 5 ingredients in a bowl. Mix thoroughly and set aside. Heat oil in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: purple onions, butter, croutons, tomatoes, salt, pepper, basil, monterey jack cheese
name: tomato cheese casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place sprouts, butter, and almonds on a rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Roast, stirring, until golden brown and tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl. Immediately dress with honey and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: butter, garlic clove, lime, zest of, nutmeg, chestnuts, brussels sprouts
name: brussels sprouts with chestnut butter

steps: In a large bowl beat the eggs, milk, and salt. Dip bread in batter. Fry in a frying pan with butter. Add powdered sugar on top. Add the juice of an orange on top.
ingredients: english muffins, eggs, heavy cream, frozen orange juice concentrate, orange zest, cinnamon, brown sugar, butter
name: buena vista french toast for fran dennis

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: beef eye round, bacon, dijon mustard, carrots, mushrooms, sweet onions, baking potatoes, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: beef roast with veggies

steps: Combine lemon juice and gelatin mix. Mix well and pour over prepared base. Refrigerate until consistency of unbeaten egg white, pour over lemon layer. Refrigerate
ingredients: lemon gelatin, sugar, boiling water, cold water, fresh lemon juice, lemon yogurt, whipped topping, lemon rind, lemon zest, graham cracker crust
name: lemon jello fluff pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, green bell pepper, pork and beans, catsup, worcestershire sauce, dark brown sugar, barbecue sauce, tabasco sauce
name: cajun barbecue beans

steps: Place potatoes in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chili powder, cheddar cheese, sour cream, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion, cheddar cheese, chili powder, butter, salt, pepper, onion,
ingredients: potatoes, no-bean chili, cheddar cheese, sour cream
name: chili boats

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat.
ingredients: round steak, cream of mushroom soup, red wine, mushrooms, onion, pepper
name: mushroom steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, cook sausage for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add all other ingredients and stir well. Place in a casserole dish and bake, covered, at 325 for 45 minutes.
ingredients: speckled butterbeans, pork sausage, onion, bell pepper, tomatoes, tomato sauce, salt and pepper
name: sausage bean casserole

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, herbs, and salt. Stir in 1 tablespoon of the butter. Heat a small skillet over medium low heat. Add egg mixture and cook, while stirring, so that the eggs do not set too fast. The eggs will begin to set and form a creamy sauce. Add in the remaining butter, one piece at a time, continuing to stir. Arrange the toasts on serving plates. Once the eggs set spoon them over the toast, season with pepper and the remaining herbs, and serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, sour cream, mozzarella cheese, salt and pepper, butter, fresh basil
name: creamy cheesy scrambled eggs with basil

steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Saute the chicken in hot oil for 5-8 minutes or until no longer pink, stirring constantly. Add the mushrooms, garlic, ginger, and cayenne pepper. Cook 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add in the hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and cooked pasta. Toss to coat. Cook a couple of minutes or until pasta is heated through. Add in the mushrooms, garlic, ginger, and cayenne pepper
ingredients: butter, mushrooms, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, fresh ground pepper, whipping cream, salt, linguine, bel paese cheese, fresh parsley
name: linguine with mushrooms and garlic cream sauce

steps: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach, balsamic vinegar, low sodium chicken broth, chopped tomatoes, whole wheat couscous
name: balsamic chicken with baby spinach

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix tofu, olive oil, soy sauce, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Remove from
ingredients: extra firm tofu, olive oil, soy sauce, old bay seasoning
name: vegan rainbow trout

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the ham in a heavy roasting pan. Mince the garlic in a food processor fitted with the steel blade. Add the chutney, mustard, brown sugar, orange zest, and orange juice and process until smooth. Pour the glaze over the ham and bake for 1 hour, until the ham is fully heated and the glaze is well browned. Serve hot or at room temperature.
ingredients: smoked ham, garlic, mango chutney, dijon mustard, light brown sugar, orange, zest of, orange juice
name: baked country ham

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the prawns, chilli and garlic and cook, stirring, until the prawns are just cooked through. Remove from the heat and stir in the parsley and lemon rind. Combine the linguine with the prawn mixture and toss gently. This is great served with a simple green salad, if desired.
ingredients: king prawns, oil, honey, chili sauce, lemon juice, shallots, fresh parsley, five-spice powder
name: australian chili prawns

steps: Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted.
ingredients: frozen mixed vegetables, corkscrew macaroni, green onions, condensed cheddar cheese soup, milk, dried dill, dried mustard, pepper, salmon
name: easy cheesy salmon pasta bhg

steps: Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh green beans, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, tarragon vinegar, light olive oil, garlic clove, pepper, salt
name: green beans provence

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Put 1 can biscuits on top and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until biscuits are brown on top. Bake uncovered at 375 for 10 minutes. Put 1 can biscuits on top and bake 15-20 minutes longer or until biscuits are brown on
ingredients: ground beef, wide egg noodles, canned corn, cream cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk
name: dobie casserole

steps: In a large saucepan, heat vegetable oil on medium heat. On a large plate, combine flour, cayenne pepper, paprika, and salt. Keep beaten eggs in a separate bowl. Take 1 chicken leg and cover it is flour mixture. Place the chicken leg back into the flour mixture and cover it again in flour. Once oil is hot and ready for frying, place chicken leg into the oil for frying. Repeat steps 5-8 for each chicken leg allowing up to 3 legs to fry at one time. Once legs are fried to a golden brown, remove from oil and place on a double-folded paper towel on a plate. Repeat steps 5-8 for each chicken
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, milk, eggs, flour, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper, paprika, vegetable oil
name: kfc copycat chicken

steps: Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Combine sugar, milk & butter. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow creme, white sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla extractpreparation:Butter side of heavy 3-quart pan. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow creme, white sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla extractpreparation:Butter side of heavy
ingredients: marshmallow creme, white sugar, evaporated milk, butter, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, vanilla extract
name: easy no fail chocolate fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, frozen lemonade, lemon pepper, salt
name: joe s lemonade chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in cinnamon streusel loaf. Bake in preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, oil, vanilla, eggs, butter
name: cinnamon streusel loaf

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until smooth cook and stir over med heat for 2 minutes. Add cheese, parsley, and pepper. Cook, and stir for 1 min, then gradually add broth. Bring to a light boil, and stir 2 minutes.
ingredients: carrot, margarine, velveeta cheese, butter flavored cracker
name: carrots and cheese

steps: Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture evenly between the three piecrusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze for one hour. Top with the strawberry ice cream and smooth to form an even layer. Top with half of the sliced strawberries. Freeze for two hours. Top with the whipped cream and the remaining berries. Serve immediately, or cover and freeze for up to 48 hours before serving. Let the pie sit in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before cutting and serving.
ingredients: white corn syrup, peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, ice cream
name: ice cream pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, baking soda, salt, quick-cooking oats, pecan pieces
name: pecan florentines

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation:In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts halvespreparation
ingredients: real maple syrup, sugar, heavy cream, salt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, walnuts
name: maple nut fudge

steps: In a large saute pan, saute the sprouts in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the sprouts are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the sprouts, onion, vegetable oil, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until
ingredients: fresh bean sprouts, onion, vegetable oil, salt
name: sauteed bean sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a small skillet, saut the green onion in the butter, and stir in the lemon juice. Add the torn apart crabmeat and panko breadcrumbs. In a large baking dish, sprayed with non-stick spray, spread the prawns open to lay flat. Top the prawns equally with the crab mixture. Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until the prawns are done.
ingredients: prawns, low-fat mayonnaise, tomato sauce, ground black pepper, tabasco sauce, lettuce leaves, cherry tomatoes, corn kernels
name: prawn shrimp cocktail

steps: Place all ingredients in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours. Remove chicken from bones and cut into bite-size pieces and return to crockpot. Serve with a slotted spoon on buns. I have also used boneless chicken pieces and cut them up before placing in the crockpot. You just need to adjust cooking time if doing it this way.
ingredients: dry bread, celery, onion, butter, eggs, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, salt
name: crock pot dressing

steps: Spray interior of slow cooker with non stick cooking spray. Place pie filling in slow cooker. In a mixing bowl, combine dry cake mix, and butter, and spoon over filling. Drop walnuts over top. Cover, and cook on low for 3-5 hours, or until a toothpick inserted into center comes out clean.
ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, vanilla, apples, walnuts, cinnamon sugar
name: norwegian apple cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until biscuits are cooked through.
ingredients: ready-to-bake refrigerated buttermilk flaky biscuits, monterey jack cheese, pork sausage, parmesan cheese, eggs, salt and pepper
name: sausage cheese biscuits muffins

steps: Place the chicken in crock pot and sprinkle with garlic powder, onion powder and pepper. Top with soup. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or until chicken juices run clear. Stir in cheese and olives. Cover and cook until cheese is melted. Meanwhile, cook fettuccine according to package directions and drain. Serve chicken on top of fettuccine.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onions, garlic cloves, red bell pepper, alfredo sauce, frozen broccoli florets, fettuccine, olive oil
name: weight watchers crock pot chicken alfredo remake

steps: In a large bowl, whisk mayonnaise, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper. In another bowl not too deep, mix mayonnaise, dill and lemon juice. Soak green tomatoes in the mixture of mayonnaise, then in the mixture of flour flipping them to coat well. Put fish fillets on a greased baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven of 450 f for about 10 minutes or until crispy. Keep cooking under the broiler for about 4 minutes or until crispy. Serve with the mixture of mayonnaise that you set aside.
ingredients: green tomatoes, cajun seasoning, all-purpose flour, eggs, cornmeal, vegetable oil, crawfish tails, remoulade sauce
name: fried green tomatoes with crawfish or shrimp remoulade

steps: Mix everything except crab. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto crab halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm.
ingredients: cream cheese, soy sauce, garlic powder, green onions, crabmeat, wonton wrappers, oil
name: just like the restaurant crab rangoon

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Add butter, sour cream, milk, jack cheese, chilies, and salt to cooked rice. Mix well. Put in a casserole dish, sprinkle top with cheddar cheese, and cook until center is hot.
ingredients: unsalted butter, green chilies, cooked chicken, sharp white cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, eggs, milk, ground cumin
name: palm springs chile con queso casserole

steps: Place beef in slow cooker. Add onions, green chilies, chicken broth, oregano, garlic cloves, hominy, adobo sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheese. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 20 minutes. Soften tortillas in the microwave wrapped in paper towels. Place grated cheese inside each tortilla and roll up. Place tortillas in sauce in skillet and spoon sauce over tortillas. Top with any remaining cheese. Cover and heat on medium for 5 minutes.
ingredients: london broil beef, enchilada sauce, onion, garlic cloves, diced green chilies, ground cumin
name: enchilada meat from the crock pot

steps: In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: noodles, cooked chicken, chicken broth, milk, mushrooms, salt, pepper, margarine, flour, parmesan cheese
name: amish chicken casserole

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and cook the garlic until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and red pepper flakes and cook about 2 minutes. Season calico rings with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet. Saute, stirring, until cooked through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Transfer to a colander to drain a bit. Place the lemon juice, olive oil, capers, and lemon zest into a clean glass jar with a lid. Shake to combine, taste, and season with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh parsley.
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, garlic clove, fresh okra, fresh thyme, vegetable broth
name: calico okra

steps: Place corned beef in crockpot. Add water and stir well. Cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: beef silverside, onion soup mix, onion, tomato ketchup, mustard, water
name: crock pot corned beef

steps: Preheat the oven to 325. Grease a baking sheet with cooking oil spray or a small amount of margarine. Cream margarine and sugar in medium mixing bowl. Add peanuts, vanilla & flour, mix well. Using your fingers roll dough into small balls about 1 inch across. Place the balls on the greased baking sheet. Bake for 35 minuites. Remove from the oven. While still warm roll puffs in the powdered sugar. Roll in the sugar again when puffs are cool.
ingredients: margarine, vanilla extract, water, splenda granular, all-purpose flour, egg white, peanuts
name: sugar free peanut balls

steps: Combine mustard seeds, water, white vinegar, wondra flour, salt, turmeric, garlic powder, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika, paprika
ingredients: ground mustard, water, white vinegar, wondra flour, salt, turmeric, garlic powder, paprika
name: french s classic yellow mustard copycat by todd wilbur

steps: Cook the orzo until tender but firm. Drain in a colander. Rinse under cold water to cool, and drain well. Mix the orzo, zucchini, parsley, and mint in a large bowl with a large spoon. Whisk the remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over the salad and mix with a large spoon.
ingredients: orzo pasta, red bell pepper, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives, fresh basil, fresh basil leaves, hidden valley ranch dressing mix, olive oil, red wine vinegar, sugar
name: mediterranean orzo salad

steps: Heat the oil in a pan add leeks and garlic and cook until soft. Add carrots, pumpkin, stock and water and cook covered until pumpkin is soft. Spoon 2 cups of liquid out, blend or process soup until smooth. Add pepper to your liking. Serve soup in bowls pour a about 1-2 tablespoons of cream over top and serve immediately. Makes about 6-8 servings great for lunches or as a starter.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, celery, ginger, vegetable stock cubes, boiling water, carrot, plain low-fat yogurt
name: carrot and ginger soup ww

steps: In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove and drain on paper towel. Add oil to the drippings and saute onion for 3 minutes. Add rice and fry until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes or until beans are tender. Sprinkle with bacon and serve.
ingredients: dried peruano beans, salt pork, bacon, onion, serranos, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, tequila, cilantro
name: drunken peruano beans with cilantro and bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 450-degrees f. Brush 4 ovenproof plates with olive oil and then sprinkle with kosher salt and white pepper. Divide fish among the four plates, skin side up in the center of the plates. Brush fish with olive oil and then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Press wax paper over fish. Chop herbs in a processor and then pour in three tablespoons olive oil through food tube while the machine is running. Transfer to small bowl or dish and stir in lemon juice, salt and pepper. Set aside. Bake fish for 4 minutes. Remove plates from oven, discard wax papper. Let plates stand for 30 seconds and then spoon 2 tablespoons herb mixture along each piece of fish. Serve with rice pilaf and green vegetables.
ingredients: red snapper fillets, lemon juice, prepared mustard, mayonnaise, green onions, salt and pepper
name: red snapper with mustard sauce

steps: In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: pheasant, paprika, butter, water, instant chicken bouillon, orange marmalade, orange juice, pumpkin pie spice
name: pheasant in orange sauce

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion slices, garlic, and mushrooms. Stir to combine. Pour over meat. Cover slow-cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours. Serve meat and sauce over noodles.
ingredients: butter, button mushrooms, shallots, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, bay leaves, white wine, tomato puree, tomato sauce, fresh thyme
name: garlic mushrooms

steps: Cook tuna in water with a dash of salt. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl with a lid. When pasta is cooked through, drain and rinse in cold water. Add pasta to other ingredients & mix thoroughly. Let sit in fridge for several hours before serving. May be served over a garden salad, baked potato, with crackers. This recipe is versatile & can be tweaked to your taste. Could be made gluten free if use gluten free pasta.
ingredients: tuna, elbow macaroni, hard-boiled egg, vidalia onion, celery, sweet red peppers, mayonnaise, salt and pepper
name: still another tuna pasta salad mom s tuna salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cover celery with salted water, bring to a boil, and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain well. Layer celery, ham and cheese in a well-greased 2-quart casserole. Melt the butter in a skillet over low heat. Stir in flour. Gradually stir in broth and cream. Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth and thick. Add salt and pour mixture over mixture in casserole. Top with bread crumbs. Bake until top is browned and mixture is bubbly, 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: blue cheese, low-fat cream cheese, celery ribs, cayenne pepper
name: buffalo style celery sticks

steps: In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente and drain. Return to the pot and melt in the butter. Toss to coat. Whisk together the eggs, milk, hot sauce, salt, pepper, and mustard. Stir into the pasta and add the cheese. Over low heat continue to stir for 3 minutes or until creamy.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, flour, half-and-half, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, salt
name: stove top cheddar mac

steps: Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well and set aside. Combine next 7 ingredients in a bowl. Stir well. Pour over cabbage mixture. Toss gently. Cover and chill 8 hours.
ingredients: plain nonfat yogurt, light mayonnaise, fresh lemon juice, lemon, rind of, celery seed, green cabbage, carrot, red onion, fresh parsley
name: delicious diet coleslaw

steps: Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also.
ingredients: eggnog, cornstarch, cooked long-grain rice, green glazed cherries, vanilla extract, salt, nutmeg
name: holiday eggnog rice pudding

steps: Combine fruit, orange juice, yogurt, oatmeal, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg and blend until smooth. Pour into 6- 3oz molds or paper cups. Freeze for one hour, place sticks in the middle. Freeze for another 3 hours, until solid. To release pops, dip molds into hot water until pops loosen and slide out. If using paper cups, peel away paper.
ingredients: fruit, orange juice, yogurt, oatmeal, honey
name: dewey s simple fruit smoothie

steps: Place the jalapeno jam in a large bowl and add 1/2 cup of water and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Mix well. Add 1/2 cup of water and 1/2 teaspoon of salt.
ingredients: strawberries, jalapenos, dry pectin, sugar
name: strawberry jalapeno jam microwave recipe

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice, lemon juice, ginger ale. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat.
ingredients: cherry gelatin, sugar, boiling water, pineapple juice, cold water, ginger ale
name: icy holiday punch

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a shallow ovenproof dish. Trim the leeks, cut a slit from the top to bottom and rinse well under cold water. Place the leeks in a saucepan of water, brind to a boil, and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes, until just tender. Remove and drain well using sloted spoon. Arrange in the prepared dish. Beat the eggs with the goat cheese, yogurt, and half the parmesan cheese. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour the cheese and yogurt mixture over the leeks. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining parmesan cheese, and sprinkle over the sauce. Back for 35-40 minutes, until the top is crisp and golden brown.
ingredients: leeks, butter, toasted breadcrumbs, lemon juice, salt
name: leeks with brown butter

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, celery seed, dijon mustard, green bell pepper, garlic, celery seed and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add onion and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add green bell pepper and sauté until fragrant, about 5-6 minutes. Add green
ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, green bell pepper, garlic, celery seed, dijon mustard
name: warm mustard sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix the first 8 ingredients together through the burgers. Pour 1 cup of the enchilada sauce in the bottom of a 13x9 burger dish. Spread enchilada mix over the sauce in the 13x9 burger dish. Pour the remaining sauce over the enchilada mix. Top with remaining 1 cup of cheese. Bake for 1 hour until bubbly. Let sit for 5-10 minutes before serving. Great with crisp torn iceberg lettuce and sour cream.
ingredients: canned tuna, instant nonfat dry milk powder, saltines, onion, green chili pepper, egg, vegetable oil, tomatoes, chili powder, monterey jack cheese
name: spicy texas tuna burgers

steps: Heat the oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Halve the pineapple slices, add to the pan with the juice, tomatoes and kidney beans. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: bell pepper, crushed pineapple, chicken breasts, soy sauce
name: dees pineapple chicken breast

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cover a baking sheet with parchment paper. Wash and cut potatoes into somewhat uniform chunks. Pat dry. Crush and break rosemary and thyme leaves by hand. Put potatoes, olive oil, rosemary and thyme into a container with a lid and shake well to coat the potatoes. Spread potatoes on baking sheet in a single layer. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake 45 - 60 minutes or until nicely brown, stirring and turning occasionally.
ingredients: baking potatoes, olive oil, dried basil, onion salt, garlic powder
name: seasoned baked potatoes

steps: Spray and lightly flour medium baking dish. In another bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Sprinkle on top. Bake in 350f oven for 20-25 minutes, till top is golden.
ingredients: cornstarch, sugar, salt, cranberry juice, beets, orange zest, butter, crushed pineapple
name: red ruby beets

steps: Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onions until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: green lentil, tomatoes, red onion, green chili pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, prepared mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: green lentil salad azifa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Take all ingredients except for olive oil and chicken and combine in small bowl. Vary amount of chili powder depending on desired level of spice. Take chicken and lightly coat both sides with olive oil. Place chicken in oven-safe dish and rub both sides heavily with ingredients previously mixed. Pour a little bit more olive oil into the bottom of the dish, enough so that it is lightly covered. Cook for roughly 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: chicken tenders, flour, garlic powder, thyme, oregano, paprika, salt and pepper, corn flakes, parmesan cheese, buttermilk
name: crazy plates oven fried chicken tenders

steps: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan, over medium high heat. Add the pancetta, red onion, half-and-half, cooked rice, dried sweetened cranberries, pistachio nut, salt, black pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper, paprika, red c
ingredients: pancetta, red onion, half-and-half, cooked rice, dried sweetened cranberries, pistachio nut, salt, black pepper
name: creamy pancetta rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, water, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, baking soda, pecans, cooked bacon
name: bacon brittle

steps: Boil chicken, onions, garlic and bay leaf in broth or water until chicken can be pulled away from bones. I prefer broth for a richer taste. Remove chicken and cool until you can handle it. Add pasta to the chicken and veggies. Simmer until pasta and veggies are cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and stir.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, butter, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, chicken broth, egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, fresh carrot
name: quickie chicken and noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, salt, flour, maraschino cherries
name: cherry cookies

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, combine molasses, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, salt, nutmeg, brown sugar, corn syrup, molasses, walnuts, unbaked pie shells and bake until the filling is set, 45 to 50 minutes. Remove to a rack and let cool. The pie may be made ahead several days, or frozen for up to 3 months. Serve with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: eggs, butter, vanilla extract, salt, nutmeg, brown sugar, corn syrup, molasses, walnuts, unbaked pie shells
name: walnut molasses pie

steps: Combine all ingredients except cooking oil in a pot and let stand for at least 30 minutes. Simmer covered for 1 hour or until meat is tender. Drain and reserve the sauce. Add reserved sauce and cook for a minute or two scraping all browned bits sticking to pan. Pour sauce over meat and serve.
ingredients: roasting chickens, apple cider vinegar, garlic, soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper, bay leaves, whole black peppercorn, brown sugar, coconut milk, salt
name: chicken adobo in coconut milk

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Stir flour, baking soda and salt together. Cut in butter, until mixture resembles crumbs. Pour in sour milk. Knead dough, cut cross at center and bake for 40 minutes.
ingredients: strong white flour, flour, baking powder, caster sugar, unsalted butter, buttermilk, sour cream, cheddar cheese, onions
name: wholemeal soda bread with cheese and onion

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, onion, baked beans, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, mustard
name: quick n easy baked beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook one minute. Add peanuts and stir to combine. Transfer peanuts to baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with chili powder and toss. Cool and then transfer to airtight containers. Store at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: peanut oil, long grain rice, green onion, curry powder, chicken broth, frozen peas, unsalted dry roasted peanuts
name: curried peanut rice

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees, brush wasa bread with peanut butter, honey, wheat germ, wasa bread, and bake for 35 minutes.
ingredients: low-sodium peanut butter, honey, wheat germ, wasa bread
name: veronica s pb h with wheat germ on wasa bread

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: chicken, table salt, buttermilk, onions, flour, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, peppercorn, vegetable shortening, butter
name: claritha s fried chicken

steps: Cook pasta according to package. Rinse with cold water and drain well. Meanwhile, combine tuna, celery, and onion in large bowl. In smaller mixing bowl, combine mayo, parsley, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and dry mustard. Add pasta to tuna mixture. Spoon mayo mixture over tuna and stir until well blended. Refrigerate 3 hours or until chilled.
ingredients: vegetable oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, medium pasta shells, fresh basil, green onion, zucchini, tuna in water, sliced ripe olives
name: creamy tuna pasta salad

steps: In a large bowl, dissolve gelatin and sugar in water. Stir in the apricot nectar, pineapple juice and lemon juice. Freeze in two 2-qt. Freezer containers. Remove from the freezer 2-3 hours before serving. Place contents of one container in a punch bowl. Mash with potato masher. Stir in ginger ale just before serving. Repeat.
ingredients: cherry gelatin, boiling water, sugar, water, pineapple juice, frozen orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale
name: elly may s wedding punch

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: pecan halves, walnut halves, blanched almond, egg white, splenda granular, ground cinnamon
name: sweet and crunchy nuts

steps: Place chicken in a large mixing bowl and add all remaining ingredients. Mix well. Toast your bread of choice and place salad in between toasted bread and serve. I also like to serve it in a lettuce cup with crackers for a little variety.
ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, hard-boiled egg, salt, sugar, fresh ground pepper, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, texas toast thick bread
name: chick fil a chicken salad

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, canola oil, black beans, water, green pepper, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: black bean onion soup

steps: In a saucepan, heat olive oil in a large saucepan. Add leeks, carrots, celery, carrots, butter, plain flour, evaporated skim milk, chicken stock, cooked chicken, flat leaf parsley and stir. Cover saucepan and simmer for 10-15 minutes. Add chicken stock and milk and bring to boil. Reduce heat, add broth, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Puree using blender, food processor, or immersion blender. Add cream and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, leek, celery, carrots, butter, plain flour, evaporated skim milk, chicken stock, cooked chicken, flat leaf parsley
name: cream of chicken leek soup

steps: In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping.
ingredients: pie crust, instant pistachio pudding mix, milk, bananas, fresh lemon, cool whip topping, pistachio nuts
name: easy banana and pistachio pudding pie

steps: In a large skillet, over medium heat, melt the butter, then add the chicken breasts & cook 10 minutes, browning the meat on both sides. Spoon off any fat. In a medium bowl, combine the soup, water & pepper & pour this soup mixture into the skillet with the breasts. Heat to boiling, then add the broccoli & reduce the heat to low. Cover & simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender & the broccoli is done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, olive oil, onion, green pepper, canned mushroom, whole wheat tortillas, low-fat swiss cheese
name: chicken philly cheese wrap

steps: Place pork chops in casserole dish. Cover and bake at 350f for 30-90 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, potatoes, onion, carrots, green peppers, american cheese, salt, pepper
name: pork chops and veggies

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: milk, sour cream, instant vanilla pudding, crushed pineapple with juice, sweetened flaked coconut, lime
name: awesome hawaiian dip

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4.
ingredients: penne pasta, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic cloves, part-skim ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese
name: penne with quick tomato sauce and ricotta cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream the butter, eggs, vanilla, and water. Add the remaining dry ingredients and stir until the mixture is well blended. Spread batter into a lightly greased 9x12 pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool in pan. Cut into 2-inch squares.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, frozen concentrated orange juice, sugar, vanilla, nonfat dry milk powder, water, lemon juice, graham crackers
name: light and dreamy orange bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
