Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder
ingredients: dates, black tea, oil, splenda granular, eggs, vanilla, low-fat milk, self-raising flour, baking powder
name: low calorie sticky date cake pudding

steps: Heat grill or cast-iron griddle over medium-high heat. Add the marinade to the marinade and cook for 10 minutes, or until golden and tender, turning once or twice. Cover and cook for another 10 minutes, or until golden and tender, turning once or twice. Cover and cook for another 10 minutes, or until golden and tender, turning
ingredients: chicken wings, brown sugar, granulated sugar, cornstarch, ground ginger, salt, pepper, water, white vinegar, soya sauce
name: bali wings

steps: Cook ravioli according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add pumpkin, onion, garlic clove, fennel seed, evaporated milk, flour, salt, pepper, solid-pack pumpkin, cheese ravioli, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: green onion, garlic clove, fennel seed, evaporated milk, flour, salt, pepper, solid-pack pumpkin, cheese ravioli, parmesan cheese
name: cheese ravioli with pumpkin sauce

steps: Combine pineapple chunks, dry red wine, lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey, garlic clove, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white onions, yams, firm bananas, white
ingredients: pineapple chunks, dry red wine, lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey, garlic clove, yams, firm bananas, white onions
name: hawaiian fruit kabobs

steps: Place meat on bottom of 9 x 13 pan. Spread veggies over top. Mix sugar, salt and tapioca in small bowl and then sprinkle over all the meat and veggies. Mix v8 and ketchup in small bowl and pour over all. Cover tightly with foil and bake in oven at 250 for about 4-5 hours, no peeking.
ingredients: beef stew meat, salt and pepper, flour, olive oil, onion, beef broth, cold water, potatoes, baby carrots, frozen peas
name: melt in your mouth beef stew

steps: Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until pureed. Remove from heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen kangaroo fillets in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time.
ingredients: macadamia nut oil, macadamias, kangaroo fillets, fresh ground black pepper, red wine, fresh pear, pear juice, red currant jelly
name: pear and red wine glazed kangaroo fillet or beef with macadami

steps: Boil macaroni, drain thoroughly. To the macaroni add the butter, milk and cheese packet mixing well. Add the miracle whip, eggs, pepper, onion, sweet pickles and black pepper. Mix lightly. Sprinkle with paprika, cover and chill several hours or overnight.
ingredients: chicken breasts, elbow macaroni, red grapes, celery ribs, sliced almonds, mayonnaise, sugar, mandarin oranges, romaine leaf
name: creamy chicken macaroni salad

steps: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: onion, water, crunchy peanut butter, tomatoes, spinach, salt, chili powder, honey
name: spinach in peanut sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: margarine, sweetened flaked coconut, white cake mix, egg whites, oil, water, milk, cool whip, coconut
name: prize winning coconut cake

steps: Put the rice in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to high and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to high and bring to a
ingredients: water, kosher salt, long grain white rice, white vinegar
name: cook rice like pasta

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add pancakes, button mushrooms, butter, cooked chicken breast, cream, cheddar cheese, chives, seasoning. Mix together the first four ingredients. Add cream, cheddar cheese, chives, seasoning. Add cheese, chives, seasoning
ingredients: pancakes, button mushrooms, butter, cooked chicken breast, cream, cheddar cheese, chives, seasoning
name: wicklewood s chicken and mushroom pancake pillows gluten free

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl except for cranberry barbecued chicken. Stir until well mixed. Place chicken pieces in bottom of crock pot. Pour liquid mix over chicken pieces. Cook in crock pot on low for 4-6 hours or until meat is cooked and tender.
ingredients: chicken pieces, salt, black pepper, whole berry cranberry sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, vinegar
name: cranberry barbecued chicken

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet over high heat. Salt and pepper steaks to taste. Place steaks in hot skillet and immediately turn down heat to medium high. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side or to your taste. Remove steaks to a platter and cover with foil to keep warm. Remove skillet from heat and add butter and garlic. Return to heat and add mushrooms and saute until done. Add flour and cook for about a minute, decrease heat to medium low, then add wine and broth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly until thick. Remove pan from heat and add rosemary.
ingredients: butter, shallots, black peppercorns, thyme, bay leaf, red wine, port wine, demi-glace, water, cream
name: port marsala or madeira sauce

steps: Combine margarine, mustard, honey and spices. Dip chicken in sauce and place in a 13x9 baking dish, pour remaining sauce over chicken. Bake covered at 375 for 1 hour. I usually bake uncovered for the last 30 minutes and turn the chicken as it browns. Serve over rice.
ingredients: skinless chicken pieces, honey, margarine, prepared mustard, salt, curry powder
name: easy baked honey mustard chicken with curry

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Mix together chocolate, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, mint extract, flour, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, mint extract, flour, andes mints candies
name: fudgy minty brownies

steps: In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and
ingredients: soup bone, cold water, tomatoes, tomato paste, onion, beef bouillon cubes, dried parsley, elbow macaroni, salt and pepper
name: hangover soup

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees celsius. Mix eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, heavy cream, kiwi fruits, apricot preserves, water, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shellspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees celsius. Mix eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, heavy cream, kiwi fruits, apricot preserves, water, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shellspreparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees
ingredients: unbaked pie shell, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla extract, heavy cream, kiwi fruits, apricot preserves, water
name: glazed kiwi tart

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the stock, with the dill added, to a boil. Add rice. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for about 15 to 20 minutes-- just until the rice is tender but still firm. In the bowl with the beaten eggs, slowly stir about 2 cups of the soup in, beating constantly. Once combined, slowly pour this mixture back into the soup-pot. Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes or until the soup has slightly thickened. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Taste and add salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken stock, salt, white pepper, rice, egg yolks, lemon, juice of, parsley
name: beid bi lamoun egg and lemon soup

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: potatoes, milk, unsalted butter, horseradish, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: creamy horseradish mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: gemelli pasta, leek soup mix, milk, imitation crabmeat, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese
name: crab and spinach casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium saucepan over medium heat, slowly cook and stir the mushrooms, parsley and onion in 2 tablespoons butter until tender. Drain and set aside. Separate the dough into 4 rectangles. Cut rectangles in half, forming 8 squares, and arrange on a large baking sheet. Place 1 tablespoon mushroom mixture on each square. Top each square with 1 teaspoon parmesan cheese. Fold the squares into triangles. In a small saucepan, melt remaining butter. Brush triangles with butter and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: butter, garlic, button mushroom, lemon juice, pepper, parsley, crusty bread rolls
name: microwaved garlic mushroom rolls

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet, add 1 cup water and cauliflower, cover and steam 2 minutes. Add broccoli and continue steaming 2 minutes. Add broccoli and
ingredients: broccoli, unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, salt, black pepper
name: lemon butter broccoli spears

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chickpeas, celery, green onions, greek yogurt, fresh coriander, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime. Cook over medium-high heat until chickpeas turn golden brown, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, red chili pepper, cumin seed, chickpeas, greek yogurt, fresh coriander, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime
name: fiery chickpea and yogurt salad

steps: In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise and honey, then pour over apple mixture and toss. Refrigerate for 1 hour, then remove. Serve cold or at room temperature. Garnish with mint sprigs.
ingredients: apple, celery, raisins, lemon juice, low-fat vanilla yogurt, peanut butter
name: chopped apple salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f and grease a 12 cup muffin pan. Toss cereal with sugar, flour, baking soda and salt. In a seperate bowl, whisk oil, egg and buttermilk. Add buttermilk mixture to cereal mixture and stir just until blended. Stir in blueberries and spoon into prepared muffin tin. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until tester inserted in the centre of a muffin comes out clean.
ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, baking soda, cinnamon, unsweetened applesauce, honey, vanilla essence, nonfat milk, egg whites, blueberries
name: blueberry low fat muffins

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, curry powder, chicken stock, frozen petits pois, salt & freshly ground black pepper, low-fat creme fraiche
name: spiced pea soup

steps: In a large bowl, mix the honey, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing mix, cola, ketchup, brown sugar, chicken breasts, salt and pepper. Place chicken in the bowl, and coat with the marinade. Cover, and allow chicken to marinate a maximum of 4 hours in the refrigerator. Preheat the grill for high heat. Oil grill grate. Discard marinade, and place chicken on grate. Cook 6 to 8 minutes on each side, until juices run clear.
ingredients: honey, italian salad dressing, italian salad dressing mix, cola, ketchup, brown sugar, chicken breasts
name: petty s chill and grill chicken marinade

steps: Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over high heat for 15 minutes or until no longer pink in center. Top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Grill pepper rings for two minutes. Place burgers on bun, top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Top with cheese during last
ingredients: ground turkey, feta cheese, olives, dried oregano, black pepper
name: barbecue feta turkey burgers

steps: Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into patties. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted patties with lettuce, tomato, etc.
ingredients: sliced mushrooms, vidalia onions, butter, olive oil, salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes
name: mushroom onion burger steak topper

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the shortening, egg, low-fat milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cake flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: shortening, egg, low-fat milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cake flour, salt, baking powder
name: homemade vanilla wafer cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: french bread, evaporated milk, whole milk, sugar, butter, raisins, vanilla, eggs, instant vanilla pudding
name: noni s bread pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, milk, vanilla extract, butter, dark rum, brown sugar, pecans, self-rising flour
name: rum and sweet potato casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, bacon, red onion, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, tomato sauce, bucatini pasta, pecorino romano cheese
name: bucatini all amatriciana

steps: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add spinach, soy sauce, vinegar and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes until spinach begins to wilt. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, spinach, milk, vegeta, all-purpose flour, eggs
name: spinach sauce

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: skirt steaks, salt, black pepper, olive oil, dry red wine, fresh thyme sprigs, bay leaf, sugar, worcestershire sauce, unsalted butter
name: skirt steak with red wine sauce

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: paprika, southwest seasoning, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, water, soy sauce, lemon juice, sour cream
name: zippy paprika chicken

steps: Place half of the lettuce on each of two salad plates. Scatter the pomegranate seeds, pistachios, and cheese over each plate. Drizzle with the dressing, and serve immediately.
ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, salt, fennel bulbs, parmesan cheese
name: fennel lemon salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until cheese melts. Top with remaining cheese, and bake another 10-12 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: white bread, mayonnaise, butter, tuna, lettuce
name: awesome tuna sandwich

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: kielbasa, beer, brown sugar, dijon mustard, cayenne pepper, apricot jam, powdered ginger, cornstarch
name: blink and it s gone kielbasa appetizer

steps: Heat butter in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated lemon rind, lemon juice, turmeric and salt. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in green onions and cilantro.
ingredients: butter, onion, pearl barley, chicken stock, bay leaf, carrot, red bell pepper, lemon, zest of, salt
name: lemon barley pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Cut potatoes in half and scoop out the insides, leaving the shell intact. Combine the potato with remaining ingredients, except extra cheese. Mash and mix well. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Fill potato skins with mixture and top with the extra cheese. Bake at 425 until cheese melts and is golden brown.
ingredients: potatoes, chicken breast, sour cream, cooked bacon, broccoli, cheese, butter, salt and pepper
name: twice baked potato lasagna

steps: Cook fettuccini according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute the peas, red pepper, carrots, and garlic in 2 tablespoons of the oil until tender. Remove from skillet. Add remaining oil to skillet and saute shrimp until pink in color. Return vegetables to skillet. Mix well. Drain pasta. Place pasta on serving dishes, drizzle with aflredo sauce, and top with shrimp mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, fresh mushrooms, green onions, garlic, diced tomatoes, fresh parsley, white wine, fettuccine, raw shrimp, lemon juice
name: italian shrimp fettuccine

steps: Combine broth, edamame, mushroom, fresh ginger, reduced sodium soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, cilantro, salt and pepper in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the broth, edamame, mushroom, fresh ginger, reduced sodium soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, cilantro, salt and pepper in a large saucepan. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional
ingredients: broth, edamame, mushroom, fresh ginger, reduced sodium soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, cilantro, salt and pepper
name: edamame soup with a twist

steps: In a large skillet over medium high heat, add pork sausage, frozen hash brown potatoes, diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt & pepper. Cook until pork is tender, stirring occassionally. Sprinkle with cheese and remove from heat. Cover and let stand 10-15 minutes over medium high heat, stirring occassionally. Spr
ingredients: pork sausage, frozen hash brown potatoes, diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt & pepper
name: hearty breakfast skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix all ingredients except the cheese together in a bowl. Mold a tbs of meat around a cube of cheese to form a small shaped meatball. Repeat with all of the meat. Spray an edged cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray and place meatballs on the cookie sheet. Bake for 7-10 min or until meat is done and cheese is melted.
ingredients: biscuits, marinara sauce, frozen meatballs, shredded cheddar cheese
name: biscuit wrapped meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cream cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly.
ingredients: margarine, fat free cream cheese, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, huckleberries, ground cinnamon
name: huckleberry or blueberry coffee cake

steps: Heat oil in skillet. Preheat oven 375. Sprinkle salt and pepper on cube steaks. Coat cube steaks with flour. Cook cube steaks in skillet until tender. Place onion on the cube steaks. Mix beef stew seasoning with 2 cups hot water or hot beef broth. Pour over cube steak. Add the other 2 cups of water to the pan until cube steaks are just covered. Cover pan with aluminum foil and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: cube steaks, cream of mushroom soup, onion, water, salt and pepper
name: cube steak w gravy

steps: In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onion, frozen mixed vegetables, italian-style diced tomatoes, beef gravy, mashed potatoes, parmesan cheese, egg
name: spooky shepherd s pie

steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: butter, red bell peppers, onion, chicken broth, kernel corn, ground cumin, sour cream, salt, pepper, pine nuts
name: corn and red pepper soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Add steaks, beef gravy, peas and carrots and blend all ingredients together in the steaks. Pour mixture evenly into a standard pie plate. Bake uncovered for 30 minutes at 350. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over mixture and bake for five more minutes. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over
ingredients: steaks, beef gravy, peas and carrots, simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese
name: shepherd s pie roll ups 5fix

steps: In a large skillet, over medium heat, melt the butter, then add the chicken breasts & cook 10 minutes, browning the meat on both sides. Spoon off any fat. In a medium bowl, combine the soup, water & pepper & pour this soup mixture into the skillet with the breasts. Heat to boiling, then add the broccoli & reduce the heat to low. Cover & simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender & the broccoli is done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen chopped spinach, sliced mushrooms, onion, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, black pepper, chicken gravy, dried thyme leaves
name: chicken breasts florentine

steps: In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm.
ingredients: silver beet, onion, garlic, bacon, red capsicum, curry powder
name: spinach like you have never had

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: onion, garlic, frozen mixed vegetables, cooked chicken, water, milk, cream of chicken soup mix, curry powder, puff pastry
name: creamy chicken curry pie

steps: Heat the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add the eggs, break the yolks with a spatula, and allow the eggs to set. Occasionally lift the edges of the eggs to let the uncooked egg run underneath. This allows more egg to make contact with the pan for faster cooking. When the eggs have cooked, sprinkle with salt and cumin, and serve.
ingredients: sweet peas, olive oil, paprika, cumin, black pepper, salt, ginger, eggs
name: moroccan peas eggs

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion mixture and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, spicy sausage, beef broth, chili beans, cooked rice, cumin, cilantro, fresh parsley
name: spicy bean and sausage gumbo

steps: Preheat oven to 350f unroll dough and separate into 2 long rectangles. Press each into 12x4-inch rectangle, firmly pressing perforations to seal. Spread dressing over each rectangle to edges. Sprinkle each with bacon, cheddar cheese and onions. Starting with one short side, roll up each rectangle. Press edge to seal. With serrated knife, cut each roll into 8 slices. Place cut side down on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 17 minutes or until edges are deep golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheet. Serve warm.
ingredients: flour tortillas, cream cheese, bacon, lettuce
name: bacon pinwheels

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add chicken stock, half-and-half cream, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese,
ingredients: instant potato flakes, chicken stock, half-and-half cream, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, pesto sauce
name: parmesan pesto potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in
ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla, boiling water
name: the best chocolate cake

steps: Combine all ingredients except tortillas, mix well. Divide and spread mixture evenly among tortillas. Roll up tightly, wrap in plastic and refrigerate at least one hour. To serve cut into 12 slices. A nice variation is to add thin slices of ham on top of the spread before rolling.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, turkey, cranberry sauce, cream cheese
name: turkey cranberry pinwheels

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pie crust in a 9-inch tart pan and leave the sides long and free-form. Combine sugar and corn syrup. Add eggs and beat until smooth. Add pecans and vanilla, and teaspoon of melted butter and mix well. Set aside. Toss apples with lemon juice. Spread apples on bottom of pie crust and pour pecan mixture over apples. Fold edges of pie crust over filling. Bake pie until set, about 45 to 50 minutes.
ingredients: apple juice, butter, apples, dried cranberries, chicken flavor stuffing mix, pecans
name: apple cranberry pecan stuffing

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saut the shallots until tender, about 5 minutes. Add the lettuce, chicken broth. Thyme, and sugar and simmer covered over low heat for about 5 minutes, until the lettuce is tender. Add the peas and cook an additional 5 minutes. Add the lemon zest, salt, and pepper, and serve immediately.
ingredients: bacon fat, green cabbage, chicken broth, thyme, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: meme s braised cabbage from virginia willis

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, sweat the onion in butter and salt until translucent. In a large mixing bowl, place a paper bowl in the middle of the bowl. Resting the cob on the bowl in a vertical position remove only the tops of the kernel with a knife, using long smooth downward strokes and rotating the cob as you go. After the cob has been stripped, use the dull backside of your knife to scrape any remaining pulp and milk off the cob. Add the corn and pulp mixture to the saucepan and cook over medium high until the juice from the corn has tightened. Add the rosemary. Sprinkle the corn with the sugar and turmeric. Stir constantly for about 2 minutes. Sprinkle the cornmeal onto the corn, using a whisk to combine well. Add the heavy cream and cook until the corn has softened, about 2 to 3 minutes. Remove the rosemary. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: onion, butter, kosher salt, fresh corn, fresh rosemary, sugar, turmeric, yellow cornmeal, heavy cream, fresh ground black pepper
name: better than grannie s creamed corn

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In large bowl, combine cereal, pretzels, almonds, raisins and cinnamon. Mix well. In small bowl, combine syrup, oil and vanilla. Slowly pour over cereal mixture. Stir will to coat evenly. Spread on 15x10-inch baking ban coated with vegetable cooking spray. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Cool. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: raisins, mini marshmallows, rice krispies, pecans, chocolate chips, light corn syrup, heavy cream
name: rocky road jumbles

steps: Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add cabbage. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, garlic powder, cooked white rice, salt, black pepper, parsley flakes
name: red rice

steps: Spread mixture evenly over cut sides of muffin halves. Sprinkle evenly with cheese. Broil 5 inches from heat 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lump crabmeat, onions, old bay seasoning, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, seafood cocktail sauce
name: crabmeat spread mmmm good

steps: Preheat oven to 400c. Place ricotta, yoghurt, heavy cream, salt and nutmeg in a large bowl and stir to combine. Roll the ricotta in the dry mixture to coat thoroughly then place cheese on a lightly greased baking tray. Bake for 1 hour or until golden. Drizzle with white balsamic vinegar and serve with crusty bread and an assortment of crackers.
ingredients: whole milk, yoghurt, heavy cream, salt, nutmeg
name: homemade rich fresh ricotta cheese

steps: Boil the water in a kettle. Put the other ingredients in a cup. Then pour the water into the cup. Then carefully add a decent amount of chocolate syrup. Stir thoroughly.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, butter, unsweetened cocoa powder, chocolate-flavor nestle nesquik powder, sugar, chocolate sprinkles
name: brigadieros brazilian candy

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Combine first 6 ingredients in a pie plate or shallow dish and stir well. Place egg white in a small shallow bowl, stir well. Dip shrimp in egg white and dredge in stuffing mixture. Place shrimp on large baking sheet coated with cooking spray. Lightly coat shrimp with cooking spray. Bake at 425 for 15 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: white bread, frozen shrimp, garlic, butter, olive oil, gruyere cheese, lemon, zest of, dried dill weed, pepper, mayonnaise
name: shrimp puffs oamc

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Combine the chopped butternut squash, granny smith apples, dried currant, nutmeg, salt and pepper. Pour over apples. Dot with butter. Sprinkle with raisins. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45-60 minutes or until apples are tender. Serve warm over ice cream if desired.
ingredients: butternut squash, granny smith apples, dried currant, nutmeg, salt and pepper, pure maple syrup, butter, fresh lemon juice
name: baked butternut squash with apples and maple syrup

steps: Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add broccoli and stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Add soy sauce, garlic, and lemon juice. Continue to stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground ginger, soy sauce
name: the best fast broccoli

steps: Place all ingredients in a large pan, stir. Turn down heat and simmer uncovered until thickened. This may take up to an hour. Cool slightly, spoon into jars. Close jars, cool completely, then keep refrigerated.
ingredients: lemon, garlic clove, green tomatoes, brown sugar, raisins, candied ginger, salt, cayenne, cider vinegar, red peppers
name: green tomato chutney

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and salad dressing mix until combined. Split pita breads in half, forming two circles. Spread cream cheese mixture over pita circles. Cut each pita into six wedges, then gently cut or pull each wedge apart, to form a total of 64 triangles. Combine parsley, egg white, olive oil, garlic and salt in small bowl. Spoon some of the parsley mixture over rough side of each triangle. Place triangles, parsley side up, in single layer on baking sheets. Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 18 minutes or until edges of triangles are toasted and parsley topping is set. Cool chips on baking sheets on wire racks.
ingredients: pita bread rounds, olive oil, garlic powder, paprika
name: spiced pita triangles

steps: Mix together flour, baking soda, salt, and sugar. Blend in eggs, oil, and milk. Stir in apple, apple, and nuts. Pour batter into greased loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for about 1 hour or until toothpick test comes out clean.
ingredients: apple butter, water, vegetable oil, eggs, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, flour, brown sugar
name: scrumptious apple butter bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: cortland apples, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, whole milk, eggs, canola oil
name: apple muffins

steps: Place rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving.
ingredients: arborio rice, milk, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, vanilla, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: yummy rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Peel the potatoes if the skin is too tough, otherwise just scrub and rinse them. Cut the potatoes into thin slices. Put the potatoes in a baking dish. Slightly fan out the slices. Drizzle the potatoes with melted butter and sprinkle with herbs and salt. Bake the potatoes for about 50 minutes. Remove the potatoes from the oven, sprinkle with parmesan and cheddar cheese. Bake the potatoes for another 10-15 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, parmesan cheese, fresh chives, barbecue seasoning, garlic powder, taco seasoning, creole seasoning
name: choose your own adventure easy toss n bake potatoes

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over high heat and add the brown onion and garlic cloves and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add finely grated ginger and red curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add the chopped sweet potato and chicken stock and cook for 15 minutes. Add the coconut cream and bring back to a simmer. Blend with a hand held blender until smooth. Divide between bowls and decorate with coriander leaves.
ingredients: dried red beans, onion, green peppers, garlic, water, smoked turkey, cooked rice, salt and pepper
name: red bean soup with smoked turkey

steps: Preheat grill. Finely dice the bacon. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes.
ingredients: chicken breasts, streaky bacon, dried chives, dried thyme, dried rosemary, dried sage, ground pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic
name: homemade chicken bacon sausages

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce.
ingredients: molasses, unsalted butter, turkey, turkey bacon, black pepper
name: turkey filet mignon wrapped in turkey bacon

steps: In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot.
ingredients: onion, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, zucchini, stewed tomatoes, whole tomatoes, tomato sauce, mccormick mild chili seasoning, chili beans
name: excellent vegetarian chili

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake 50 to 60 minutes until the french toast is brown and puffed. Sprinkle with cinnamon and brown sugar.
ingredients: french baguette, tart apples, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, walnut pieces
name: apple cheddar walnut toasts

steps: In a small saucepan, heat the oil on medium-high heat until shimmering. Put the chili powder into the oil, and stir into a smooth paste. Allow the mixture to form bubbles around the edges. Pour in the orange juice, and stir into a smooth paste. Add cumin, honey, or lime, if using, and boil, covered, for 5 minutes. Uncover saucepan and boil until the sauce changes from burnt orange, to red-orange, to brick red. The sauce should be reduced by half. This will take 10 minutes or so. Turn heat to low. If using chocolate, stir in while still hot but not bubbling. Serve or refrigerate.
ingredients: water, brown sugar, soy sauce, lime juice, chili
name: spicy lime dipping sauce

steps: Place the couscous in a large microwave-proof bowl and pour over the stock. Leave to stand 2 minutes then fluff up with a fork. Heat a non-stick pan with cooking spray and pour in the oil. Add the broccoli and cook while stirring. Drain and rinse the broccoli and combine with the couscous. Heat the mixture in the microwave. Stir through the broccoli mixture and parsley. Serve.
ingredients: frozen broccoli, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, salt, ground pepper, couscous
name: couscous with broccoli

steps: Place tea bags, mango nectar in large measuring cup or teapot. Cover with boiling water and steep for 10 minutes. Strain into large pitcher. Stir in mango juice. Serve over ice.
ingredients: boiling water, mango nectar, lime, juice of, tea bags
name: iced tea frapee

steps: In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Add a tiny dollop of red caviar. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: ground beef, baking potatoes, cheddar cheese, milk, mayonnaise, onion, garlic salt, salt & pepper, butter
name: beef stuffed potatoes

steps: Saute chicken breasts, butter, salt, onion, mushrooms, paprika, water, flour, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream, dry sherry, sour cream
ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, salt, onion, mushrooms, paprika, water, flour, dry sherry, sour cream
name: chicken stroganoff for beginners

steps: Heat a non-stick wok or skillet over medium-high heat for 30 seconds. Add penne rigate, olive oil, asparagus, sea salt, black pepper, shallot, dry white wine, chicken broth, salmon fillet, fresh tarragon, and serve on lettuce lined plates.
ingredients: penne rigate, olive oil, asparagus, sea salt, black pepper, shallot, dry white wine, chicken broth, salmon fillet, fresh tarragon
name: penne with salmon and asparagus

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, sugar, brown sugar, instant oats, coconut, vegetable oil, eggs, vanilla extract
name: dad s cookies

steps: Whisk together cilantro, lemon juice, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest,
ingredients: fresh corn, plum tomatoes, red onion, fresh cilantro, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper
name: sweet corn tomato salad with fresh cilantro

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet on medium-high heat, add garlic and saute for about a minute. Add tomatoes, jalapenos, cayenne pepper, garlic salt, salt and pepper to taste. Bring to a simmering boil, reduce heat to medium. Stir in tuna and mix thoroughly. Gently stir in great northern beans and heat through. Serve alone or over rice with a salad and garlic toast.
ingredients: olive oil, anchovy fillets, garlic, diced tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, tuna in water, ground black pepper, pasta
name: tuesday s tomato tuna pasta

steps: Pour all the ingredients except the dark rum into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half filled with ice. Top with the dark rum. Garnish with the cherry.
ingredients: dark rum, light rum, coffee liqueur, orange liqueur, pineapple juice, orange juice, lime
name: mai tais

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: margarine, cooked ham, onion, green peppers, condensed cheddar cheese soup, milk, prepared mustard, frozen hash browns
name: ham and cheese hash browns

steps: Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation:Cook curried sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milkpreparation
ingredients: beef sausages, onion, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, sweet paprika, garam masala, sultana, apples, coconut milk
name: sweet curried sausages

steps: Cream together sugar and shortening. Beat in egg. Sift together dry ingredients, and add to shortening mixture. Add vanilla and mix all together. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart and flatten with a fork. Bake at 350 for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, shortening, brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla, egg, walnuts
name: brown sugar walnut cookies

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste.
ingredients: butter, leeks, potatoes, onion, beef stock, salt, half-and-half cream, heavy cream, white pepper, marjoram
name: bavarian potato leek soup

steps: Heat to a boil. Add butter, bacon, half-and-half, onion, butter, flour, chicken broth, milk, bacon, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese
ingredients: fresh broccoli, bacon, half-and-half, onion, butter, flour, chicken broth
name: incredible broccoli soup

steps: Heat oil in a large saute pan. Add the chicken and onion, and cook together until golden. Add the spices and red pepper, and cook for 1 minute. Cover and simmer 20-25 minutes until the chicken is tender. Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: vegetable oil, skinless chicken breast halves, pepper, pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, cornstarch, green onion, brown sugar, fresh ginger, soy sauce
name: pineapple mandarin ginger chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, salt, baking soda, vinegar, vanilla, vegetable oil, cold water
name: gma s wacky chocolate cake

steps: Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add the chicken breasts and brown on both sides. Add the shallots, chicken stock and vinegar. Cover and simmer on low heat until the chicken is no longer pink inside, about 30 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and keep warm. Blend together the cream and cornstarch. Stir into the cooking liquid in the frying pan. Cook until thickened, stirring the sauce to keep it smooth. Stir in the mustard, tarragon, salt and pepper. Arrange the chicken on a serving platter and pour the sauce over it.
ingredients: chicken breasts, salt and pepper, butter, smoked bacon, garlic cloves, lemon, dry white wine, chicken stock, olives, tarragon leaf
name: chicken with tarragon garlic olives

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine mangoes, strawberries, peaches, raspberries, lemon juice, honey, mint, and pistachio. Pour over the strawberries. Place mixture in the fridge for at least 1 hour. Serve cold. Sprinkle with chopped mint or pistachio.
ingredients: mangoes, strawberries, peaches, raspberries, lemon juice, honey, mint
name: mango peach strawberry raspberry salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut 4 pieces of pan fried salmon so that each is just larger than your salmon pieces. On a foil-lined baking sheet, place to four pieces of pan fried salmon and the four pieces of salmon. Be sure they are not touching. Sprinkle each piece of salmon with 1 tablespoon to sliced almonds. Bake for 10 minutes or until pastry is golden brown. Remove pastry from oven and return salmon to oven for another 2-5 minutes or until cooked through. To serve, place a piece of pan fried salmon on a plate. Top with 1 tablespoon of pesto. Top pesto with 2 slices of tomato each. Top the tomatoes with the salmon and serve.
ingredients: salmon, cream cheese, half-and-half, pesto sauce, olive oil, kosher salt, ground black pepper
name: pan fried salmon with cream cheese pesto

steps: Place all the ingredients in a large saucepan and bring to the boil over medium heat. Reduce heat and simmer gently until the chutney has a jam-like consistency and there is no excess liquid on the surface. Stir from time to time to prevent sticking. Spoon into hot sterilized jars and seal down. Label and store for 6-8 weeks before use.
ingredients: tamarillos, apples, onions, pitted dates, malt vinegar, brown sugar, mixed spice
name: tamarillo and date chutney new zealand

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degree f. Put entire stick butter into a 9 x 13 inch pan. Put pan with butter into the oven until butter is melted. Beat the eggs, milk, and salt until frothy. Add flour. Beat until mixed. Pour over melted butter. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with syrup or jelly.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, egg yolks, vanilla, flour
name: mamie eisenhower s favorite spritzboaken

steps: In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the mayonnaise in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the mayonnaise is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: mayonnaise, cider vinegar, pepper, pasta, tuna, peas, celery, red onion, dill
name: creamy tuna twist

steps: Heat oil in a medium sized non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Prepare tortillas in this order, lay tortillas on flat surface, spread 1 tablespoon of salsa on half of tortilla, place half of meatloaf over salsa, top with half of cheese. Fold other half of tortilla over cheese. Repeat with rest of the ingredients for other tortilla. Place both in skillet and lightly brown on both sides, about 10 minutes total, or until desired brownness is reached. Cut each in half. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: flour tortillas, monterey jack pepper cheese, chorizo sausage, scallions, plum tomatoes, jalapeno, white onion, fresh cilantro, coarse salt
name: southwestern chorizo quesadillas

steps: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Add fish and cook 3-4 minutes per side, until browned. Cook 5-7 minutes more, spooning garlic occasionally over fish, until it flakes easily with fork. Fluff zesty tomato garlic fish with a fork and serve with fish.
ingredients: diced tomatoes, lemon juice, garlic salt, olive oil, ground black pepper, cod fish fillets, pine nuts
name: zesty tomato garlic fish

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large pot. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spread out in large shallow containers to cool. Spoon into freezer containers, or bags. Freeze.
ingredients: sweet corn, half-and-half cream, butter, sugar, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: cream style corn for the freezer

steps: Add extra virgin olive oil, chorizo sausages, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, jumbo shrimp, dry white wine, salt, pepper, italian parsley, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt, pepper, italian bread, salt
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, chorizo sausages, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, jumbo shrimp, dry white wine, salt, pepper, italian parsley, italian bread
name: shrimp and chorizo saute

steps: Heat a medium saucepan, sprayed with cooking spray. Cook the shallots until tender. Add the mushrooms, cover and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add the quinoa and broth and bring the liquid to a simmer. Season to taste with salt and pepper and stir in non-fat evaporated milk. Bring back up to a simmer, remove from heat and stir in the dill.
ingredients: white button mushrooms, butter, flour, chicken stock, heavy cream, cognac, salt, white pepper
name: cream of mushroom soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12 cup muffin pan or you can use a mini muffin pan. Combine cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, combine egg whites, onion, milk, parsley, oil and pepper. Add to dry ingredients stirring just until moistened. Spoon into prepared muffin tins. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove and cool on a rack for 5 minutes. Serve immediatlely.
ingredients: hot dog, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, milk, egg, oil
name: pronto puppies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: macaroni, eggs, lean ground beef, onion, pizza sauce, mushrooms, pepperoni slices, mexican cheese
name: macaroni and cheese pizza

steps: Preheat oven to 350f in a small bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, kashi good friends cereal, skim milk, honey, egg whites, unsweetened applesauce, banana, cooking spraypreparation:Spray muffin tin cups with cooking spray and preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, stir together flour, baking powder, salt, kashi good friends cereal, skim milk, honey, egg whites, unsweetened applesauce, banana, cooking spraypreparation:Spray muffin tin cups with cooking spray and preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, stir together flour, baking powder, salt, kashi good friends cereal, skim milk, honey, egg whites, unsweetened applesauce, banana, cooking spraypreparation:Spray muffin tin cups with cooking spray and preheat oven to 400
ingredients: kashi good friends cereal, marshmallow creme, peanut butter, vanilla, chocolate syrup
name: weight watcher treats

steps: Drain and season artichoke hearts with salt and pepper. While working, heat oil over fairly high heat. Dredge artichokes in egg and then bread crumbs. Deep fry about 3-4 minutes, turning frequently, or until golden. Drain on paper towels and serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: artichoke cheese balls

steps: In a small saucepan, melt butter and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly until melted. Stir in sugar, vanilla, salt, and milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook 7 minutes, stirring constantly. Serve warm over ice cream or pound cake. The amount of time will vary with the amount of sauce being reheated.
ingredients: white sugar, cocoa, water, pure vanilla extract, butter, eggs
name: better than sex chocolate sauce

steps: Boil rice until done. Place rice in a baking dish. Add milk, water, butter, sugar. Stir all of it together and bake until done about 1 hr at 350 degrees. The water measurement is done with the can from the milk so 1 cup is a guess. Stir all of
ingredients: whole milk, sugar, white rice, salt, eggs, vanilla
name: it s doris s rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper, frozen potato wedges, bacon, green onions, parmesan cheesepreparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic
ingredients: frozen potatoes au gratin, sharp cheddar cheese, sweet onion, worcestershire sauce, roasted sweet red peppers, ground black pepper, fine dry breadcrumb
name: double cheddar cheese potatoes

steps: Cook macaroni until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large bowl, mix radiatore, broccoli florets, chickpeas, low-fat italian salad dressing, carrot, sun-dried tomato, salt, ground black pepper. Add rest of ingredients and stir. Cover and chill before serving.
ingredients: radiatore, broccoli florets, chickpeas, low-fat italian salad dressing, carrot, sun-dried tomato, salt, ground black pepper
name: wazoo s pick me up pasta salad

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with a slice of lime.
ingredients: midori melon liqueur, gold tequila, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, orange juice, sloe gin
name: traffic light cooler

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the mar
ingredients: celery rib, carrot, onion, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, orange zest, dry sherry, maple syrup, pork tenderloin
name: chinese grilled pork

steps: Melt butter in a skillet. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely coated with butter. Add lemon zest, pepper, and the broth. Simmer uncovered over low heat for about 40 minutes, or until the liquid has absorbed and rice in tender. Remove from heat. Add rice and stir, about 2 minutes, making sure grains are nicely
ingredients: butter, onion, long grain brown rice, chicken stock, lemon juice, lemon zest
name: lemony brown rice pilaf

steps: Dip chicken pieces in cracker crumb mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.
ingredients: cracker crumb, parmesan cheese, chicken breast halves, butter
name: baked chicken parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. In large bowl whisk together egg and spices until frothy. Add potatoes. Toss to coat well. Place on nonstick baking sheet in single layer. Bake until golden brown and crisp. About 20 minutes stirring once during baking.
ingredients: potato, milk, cornstarch, breadcrumbs, oil
name: crispy french fries

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Make a small cut at the top of each fig and push in a little piece of gorgonzola. Wrap each fig in a slice of prosciutto. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes. The cheese will melt and the prosciutto will be crisp. Serve immediately on rocket leaves dressed in olive oil and salt, and finish with a little finely cracked pepper.
ingredients: sugar, vanilla pod, fresh figs, limoncello
name: vanilla fig preserves

steps: Put the marjakeitto in a large bowl and whisk until smooth. Pour the marjakeitto into the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment and beat until smooth. Pour the marjakeitto into the
ingredients: blueberries, water, apple juice, potato flour, cold water, vanilla, sugar
name: finnish berry soup marjakeitto

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Stir in coconut. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool.
ingredients: sugar, oil, eggs, canned pumpkin, butter recipe cake mix, pumpkin pie spice, vanilla frosting, cream cheese
name: pumpkin bars

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 2 small loaf pans, or 1 large one. Stir sugar, butter, eggs, bananas and buttermilk in large bowl. Stir in blueberries, pour into pan. Bake large pan for 75 minutes, smaller pan from 55-60 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes, remove from pan onto wire rack, cool 2 hours before slicing.
ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, milk, butter, flour, salt, baking powder, blueberries
name: rbi s blueberry hot bread

steps: Combine milk, water, dry milk powder, chocolate chips, sugar and cornstarch. Over medium-high heat, bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low. Cook, whisking occasionally, until slightly thickened, 1-2 minutes. Top each serving with whipped topping and a cookie.
ingredients: lowfat chocolate milk, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, semisweet chocolate chunks, vanilla extract
name: the avenue s classic hot chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork and beans, butter beans, tomato soup, ground beef, bacon, onions, brown sugar
name: baked beans don t get any better than this

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees. Finely chop garlic, and sprinkle with salt. Mash into a paste with back of spoon. Place in bowl with thyme, savory and oil. Toss potatoes with garlic mixture. Place on foil lined baking sheet and bake until browned, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: butter, garlic clove, lemon rind, salt and black pepper, potatoes, chervil
name: lemon garlic buttered potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving.
ingredients: oil, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cherry pie filling, pecans
name: cherry pie filling bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately.
ingredients: paprika, dried oregano, dried thyme, garlic clove, coarse sea salt, pork fillets, lemons
name: andalusian pork

steps: Preheat oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart.
ingredients: popped corn, brown sugar, butter, light corn syrup, vanilla, baking soda
name: crackerjacks caramel popcorn better then you remember

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped lavender flowers. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: unsalted butter, superfine sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, dried lavender flowers
name: lavender tea cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, beat eggs slightly with a fork. Add water and oatmeal and let stand until liquid is absorbed stir in remaining ingredients, except meat. Mix well. Add meat, using your hands or a sturdy spoon and mix until well blended. Shape into a loaf in your baking pan. Make an indentation down center of loaf and fill with ketchup. Bake for 1 hour or until loaf is done. Remove from oven and cover with foil--let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving and it will cut nicely.
ingredients: lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, ground beef, corn flakes, frozen whole kernel corn, green bell pepper, eggs, water, ketchup
name: southwestern meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
