ingredients: canned plum tomatoes, canned red kidney beans, unsweetened coconut milk, fresh parsley, green chili peppers, fresh lemon juice, instant potato flakes
name: tropical red beans

steps: In oil in a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic about 10 minutes until lightly browned. Add broth and herbs, bring to boil. Stir in tomatoes with juice and simmer 5 more minutes. Add chopped spinach and simmer 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with a sprinkling of cheese on top.
ingredients: butter, extra virgin olive oil, eggplant, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, crushed tomatoes, chicken broth, ravioli, basil leaves, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: eggplant raviolini soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f in a small saucepan melt butter. Stir in your gingernut biscuits, macadamia nuts, condensed milk, butter, coconut, and golden syrup. Mix well until firm enough to handle. Roll 2 level teaspoons of mixture into balls, toss in coconut. Refrigerate mixture until firm enough to handle. Roll 2 level teaspoons of mixture into balls, toss
ingredients: gingernut biscuits, macadamia nuts, condensed milk, butter, coconut, golden syrup
name: ginger and macadamia nut balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cream butter and sugar together in a medium bowl. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, sugar, vanilla, almond extract, pecans, chocolate chips
name: overnight cookies

steps: Season both sides of the pork chops with the salt and pepper. In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, juice, honey, cornstarch and thyme until smooth. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add seasomed chops. Brown chops for 2 minutes on each side. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add vinegar mixture to skillet. Cover and simmer chops for 10-15 minutes. Serve with sauce poured over top.
ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, salt, pepper, cherry preserves, balsamic vinegar
name: pork chops with cherry preserves sauce

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter along with olive oil. Saute chicken along with orzo for approximately 10 minutes. Add chicken broth and rice, coat evenly and toast together. Add mushrooms and chicken, fold in sour cream. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Simmer covered until rice and pasta is done, about 20 minutes. Simmer covered until rice and pasta
ingredients: olive oil, orzo pasta, chicken broth, garlic powder, onion powder, parsley flakes
name: riceless pilaf

steps: Melt butter in 10-inch skillet. Stir in brown sugar and dates. Remove from heat. Stir in 1 cup coconut and all remaining ingredients until moistened. Let stand 10 minutes. Shape rounded teaspoonfuls into 1-inch balls. Roll in remaining coconut.
ingredients: butter, dark brown sugar, dates, egg, rice krispies, coconut, maraschino cherry, vanilla extract
name: butter dates balls

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: chicken breasts, salt and pepper, prosciutto, spinach, olive oil, parmesan cheese, lemon, chicken broth
name: chicken saltimbocca aka chicken

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large and deep pan. Add the onions and fry gently until they have started to go tender. This took about 5 minutes, stirring often. Add the ketchup, southern comfort and brown sugar and stir until everything is combined with the meat. Bring to a boil and then reduce to a simmer and continue to simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring now and then. Stir in the dijon mustard and then let simmer for another 15 minutes or until the sauce is the thickness you like with a sloppy joe. Serve on buns.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, carrot, celery ribs, bell pepper, sloppy joe sandwich sauce
name: meat veggie sloppy joes oamc

steps: Toast the egg sandwich. In a microwaveable cup roughly the same diameter of the egg, add the egg, a tablespoon of water. Beat the egg, add the bacon. Microwave on high for 1 to 2 minutes while egg is toasting. Assemble the egg sandwich and let stand for a few minutes to melt the cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, eggs, english muffin, garlic, parmesan cheese, marinara sauce, salt, pepper
name: egg sandwich

steps: Put cucumber mixture into a large bowl. Heat to boiling over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil 1 minute, stirring occasionally. Pour cucumber mixture into a large bowl. Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally
ingredients: cucumber, instant minced onion, garlic cloves, mustard seeds, fresh dill, water, cider vinegar, canning salt
name: claussen kosher pickle copycat

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated.
ingredients: green seedless grapes, red seedless grapes, pineapple chunks, mandarin orange segments, bananas, sugar, fruit juice, egg, all-purpose flour, lemon juice
name: grandma s winter fruit medley

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread breadcrumbs on chops. Sprinkle rosemary, salt and pepper. Turn to other side and repeat. Place breadcrumbs on shallow dish. Coat chops on both sides in crumbs. Heat skillet on medium high heat. Drizzle small amount of olive oil. Heat. Brown chops for a couple of minutes on each side. Place chops in oven. Cook for 20 minutes.
ingredients: egg white, dijon mustard, seasoned bread crumbs, garlic powder, ground sage, pork loin chop
name: breaded mustard pork chops

steps: Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding asparagus during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook sausage and onion over medium heat until meat is brown and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in marinara sauce. Heat through. Stir meat sauce and cheeses into the cooked pasta. Transfer to a lightly greased 3-quart rectangular casserole dish. Bake, covered, at 375 for 20-25 degrees or until mixture is heated through.
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, asparagus spear, marinara sauce, sour cream, red wine vinegar, green onion, fresh basil, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: rigatoni and asparagus

steps: Cook the asparagus in a large pot of boiling, salted water until crisp-tender, about 3-4 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water. Place in a decorative bowl and put in the refrigerator until thoroughly chilled. Boil vinegar in a small heavy saucepan over medium heat until reduced by half, about 3 minutes. This will sweeten and concentrate the vinegar. Pour into a large bowl. Whisk in oil, mustard, marjoram and garlic. Season dressing to taste with sea salt and fresh cracked pepper. When ready to serve, add the red peppers and toss with dressing. Sprinkle with nuts and serve.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, soy sauce, brown sugar, olive oil
name: east west asparagus salad

steps: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine oil, butter, onion, scallions and gingerroot and microwave at high power for 2 minutes, or until onion is softened. Stir in rice to coat with oil and butter, add broth and microwave, covered with plastic wrap at high for 5 minutes. Microwave at medium power for 12-15 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Uncover and stir in snow peas. Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes and stir in sesame seeds.
ingredients: peanut oil, fresh ginger, snow peas, soy sauce, dark sesame oil, salt, black pepper
name: snow peas with ginger

steps: Sprinkle with jalapeno peppers. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: milk, flour, salt, pepper, garlic powder, sharp cheddar cheese, jalapeno peppers, potatoes, chopped pimiento
name: jalapeno pimiento potatoes

steps: Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and reserve. Return cooked macaroni to pot, heat through. Add velveeta cheese, hamburger, macaroni noodles, oregano, salt & pepper, tomatoes, tomato paste, onion, bell pepperpreparation:Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and reserve. Return cooked
ingredients: velveeta cheese, hamburger, macaroni noodles, oregano, salt & pepper, tomatoes, tomato paste, onion, bell pepper
name: velveeta goulash

steps: Heat butter in large saucepan. Saut vegetables in butter until tender. Sprinkle with flour, salt and pepper. Stir in well. Add chicken broth and cream. Cook until thick and comes to a slow boil. Stirring frequently. Add wine and correct salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: water, polish sausage, vinegar, salt, pepper, hard-boiled egg, milk, flour
name: easter soup my grandmother called bousch

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until
ingredients: fish fillet, vegetable oil, white wine vinegar, lime, juice of, onion, bell pepper, butter
name: c est si bon smothered fish bake

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saute until just opaque in the center, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer fish to platter. Add parsley and crushed pepper to same skillet and saute for one minute. Add tomatoes, olives and garlic. Saute about two minutes until tomatoes soften and get juicy. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Spoon over fish and serve hot.
ingredients: fresh parsley, fresh cilantro, water, lemon juice, garlic cloves, fish fillets, margarine, onion, celery, bay leaf
name: fish with parsley sauce

steps: Melt half the butter in a 12-cup mold or tube pan. Swirl it around the bottom and up the sides. Press the brown sugar into the bottom and press the pecans into the sugar. Boil the noodles according to the package directions and then drain. Mix with the eggs, the remaining butter, melted, cinnamon, sugar, and salt and pour into the mold. Bake in a preheated 350-degree oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until the top is brown. Let sit for 15 minutes before unmolding. The top will become slightly hard like a praline. Serve cold or at room temperature.
ingredients: medium egg noodles, margarine, brown sugar, pecan halves, eggs, cinnamon, nutmeg, vanilla, sugar
name: sticky bun noodle kugel

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place salmon on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide spinach and tomatoes among serving plates. Top with salmon, goat cheese, and pecans, and drizzle with vinaigrette.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, salmon fillets, salt, pepper, cheese spread, frozen chopped spinach
name: spinach salmon bundles

steps: In a zip-top plastic bag, combine soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, garlic, lemon juice, pepper and oil. Add pork, and turn to coat evenly. Squeeze out as much air as possible, seal, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade.
ingredients: pork, vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, soy sauce, brown sugar, water
name: braised pork in soy sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and baking powder. In a separate bowl, combine yogurt, egg, vanilla, oil and fruit. Stir mixtures together just until combined. Batter will be very thick. Scoop into prepared muffin cups and bake in preheated oven for 25 minutes. This helps the leavening process.
ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, plain yogurt, butter, eggs, cheddar cheese, cooked ham, dried basil
name: ham cheese muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: cranberries, baby carrots, cooking apples, brown sugar, salt, apple cider, margarine
name: thanksgiving carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: flour, butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, water
name: incredible cookie dough

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until crust is done and cheese is melted.
ingredients: mushrooms, olive oil, eggs, dried oregano, salt & freshly ground black pepper, tomato and basil pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: cheese and mushroom pizza omelette

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: bacon, frozen cubed hash brown potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt, pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese
name: country breakfast skillet

steps: Mix first layer and press into 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Combine ingredients for second layer and spread on first layer. Mix pudding and milk. Spread over second layer. Spread remaining cool whip over third layer. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Place in refrigerator until ready to serve.
ingredients: flour, butter, ground nuts, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, instant pistachio pudding mix, milk
name: pistachio torte

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham wafers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars.
ingredients: graham wafers, slivered almonds, brown sugar, butter
name: almond crunch candy

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until the oil is melted. Add the bacon, italian seasoning and parsley and cook, stirring occasionally, until the oil is melted. Add the bacon, italian seasoning and parsley
ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil flavored cooking spray, rindless bacon, brown onion, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley
name: low fat pasta carbonara

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together brown sugar and butter until smooth. Stir in baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, and salt. Add eggs and stir until blended. Stir in oats, flour and raisins. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet, about 2-inches apart. Bake 9-11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from cookie sheet at once and cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, rolled oats, coconut, baking powder, baking soda, raisins
name: coconut oatmeal raisin cookies

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add egg and fry until cooked to your preference. In a nonstick pan, fry ham until warm and lightly brown. Remove from pan and keep warm. On one slice of sourdough bread, layer slice of cheddar cheese, ham, slice of swiss cheese and fried egg. Top with other slice of bread. Brush melted butter on sandwich and place buttered side down in skillet used to fry ham. Brush melted butter on top. After a few minutes, flip sandwich over and fry until golden brown and cheese is melted.
ingredients: butter, eggs, salt, pepper, sourdough bread, ham, monterey jack pepper cheese
name: ham egg and cheese sandwiches

steps: Combine all ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: dried beef, butter, flour, milk, black pepper
name: amish mennonite dried beef gravy mmmmmmmm

steps: Place herbs in a saucepan, add water to cover and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the herbs are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and let stand until just cool enough to handle. Cut each potato in half and place in a warmed serving dish. In a small bowl, whisk together the mustards, the vinegars and the shallot until well blended. While whisking, slowly drizzle in the olive oil to make a thick dressing. Pour the dressing over the warm potatoes, mix gently and serve immediately.
ingredients: tiny new potatoes, shallots, red onion, parsley, horseradish, white wine vinegar, oil, salt and pepper
name: warm potato salad with herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: cooked ham, swiss cheese, bacon, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, onions, skim milk, bisquick, eggs, salt, pepper
name: ham n cheese pie

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared crock pot or stove top and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, dried parsley
name: nif s easy baking powder dumplings crock pot or stove top

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients together. In a large bowl mix all dry ingredients together. In a large bowl mix all
ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg, egg beaters egg substitute, sweet potato, sugar-free maple syrup
name: simple sweet potato or pumpkin muffins low calorie

steps: In a large bowl, combine shrimp, creole seasoning, vegetable oil, andouille sausages. Toss to coat& set aside. In a large skillet, saute onion& garlic in vegetable oil until tender. Add soup, milk, and paprika, and bring to a boil. Add seasoned shrimp and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: large shrimp, creole seasoning, vegetable oil, andouille sausages, onion, green pepper, dried thyme, chicken broth, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar
name: spicy cajun shrimp and sausages

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the dressing, oil, mustard and garlic. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill chicken, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer reads 170.
ingredients: lemon, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, garlic clove, black pepper, mayonnaise, vegetable oil, fresh parmesan cheese
name: creamy caesar salad dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drizzle foil with oil and sprinkle with kosher salt. Place fish on center of foil and sprinkle with dill. Place lemon slices inside fish and rosemary on top. Salt to taste. Fold up edges of foil and add wine. Seal foil pouch and place in oven on 350 for 12 minutes.
ingredients: rainbow trout, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, lemon juice
name: quick grilled trout

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes.
ingredients: egg, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, apples, cinnamon, powdered sugar, oil
name: deep fried apple rings

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. At the top of the loaf, cut a round section and hollow out the bread,. In a food processor, add the mayo, grated parmesan, drained artichokes and garlic cloves. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: eggs, ground beef, parsley, onion, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, artichoke hearts, gruyere cheese
name: tunisia egg loaf with artichokes tajine dartichauts tun

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread bacon mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each sandwich, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread
ingredients: bread, cooked bacon, red onion, processed cheese, margarine
name: special grilled cheese sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together eggs, white sugar, milk, orange liqueur, orange zest, white bread, egg substitute, canola oil, unbleached white flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, pain perdupreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together eggs, white sugar, milk, orange liqueur, orange zest, white bread
ingredients: eggs, white sugar, milk, orange liqueur, orange zest, white bread
name: pain perdu

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Whisk the oil, cumin, garlic powder, chili powder, sea salt, black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, chickpeaspreparation:Preheat an oven to 350 degrees. Whisk the oil, cumin, garlic powder, chili powder, sea salt, black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, chickpeaspreparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Whisk the oil, cumin, garlic powder, chili powder, sea salt, black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, chickpeaspreparation:
ingredients: chickpeas, marinated artichoke hearts, olive oil, ground cumin, garlic clove, lemon, zest of, fresh coriander, red chili pepper, baguette
name: chickpea and chili dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Pour melted butter into a 9x13-in baking dish. Add chicken, skin side down, sprinkle with seasoning salt and garlic. Turn chicken over, season and lay bacon strips on top. Sprinkle with mushrooms. Bake in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. Remove chicken, bacon and mushrooms to a platter and keep warm. Pour juices from baking dish into a small saucepan and whisk together with cream over low heat until thickened. Pour sauce over chicken and serve warm.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, paprika, fresh mushrooms, butter, chicken broth, green onions, garlic clove, salt, pepper, part-skim mozzarella cheese
name: baked chicken and mushrooms

steps: Heat the oil in a large heavy pot. Add the margarine, onions, garlic, chicken broth, carrots, potatoes, italian seasoning, bay leaf, salt and pepper and cook, covered, for 10 minutes or so, until the vegetables are soft but still with some bite. Pour in the stock, bring to the boil and then simmer, covered, for 30 minutes or so, until the vegetables are tender. Pour into a blender and whizz until smooth - do this in batches if you need to. Return to the pan and gently reheat. Season if desired and either stir in the chilli oil or serve garnished with a few drops of the oil.
ingredients: margarine, onions, garlic, chicken broth, carrots, potatoes, italian seasoning, bay leaf, salt and pepper
name: carrot potato soup

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: potatoes, chicken broth, cream cheese, roasted garlic clove, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: roasted garlic make ahead mashed potatoes

steps: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour pineapple juice, cream of coconut, malibu rum, ice cubes, grenadine, pineapple slices, maraschino cherries, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, grenadine, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices,
