pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple slices, pineapple
ingredients: pineapple juice, cream of coconut, malibu rum, ice cubes, grenadine, pineapple slices, maraschino cherries
name: rosie s pina coladas

steps: Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet. Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil. In a small bowl combine. Onion flakes, oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well. Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet. Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes. Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet. Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden. Serve while they ar piping hot.
ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, savoy cabbage, seasoning salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: kittencal s fried potatoes and cabbage

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheets with non-stick cooking spray. Break up cookie dough into large bowl. Let stand 10-15 minutes to soften. Add the peanut butter, brown sugar, vanilla and butterscotch morsels. Mix well. Drop dough by teaspoon, two inches apart onto sheets. Bake 10-13 minutes or until just set and golden at edges. Transfer cookies to rack and let cool.
ingredients: corn syrup, granulated sugar, peanut butter, crispy rice cereal, almond bark, butterscotch chips
name: white chocolate scotcheroos

steps: In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, ricepreparation:In small dish, mix the poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil,
ingredients: poblano chiles, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, roma tomatoes, mushroom, monterey jack cheese, rice
name: chicken stuffed poblano chiles

steps: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce.
ingredients: chicken breasts, balsamic vinegar, fresh cilantro, fresh garlic, fresh mushrooms, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper
name: balsamic chicken breast with cilantro

steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium low and cook 15 minutes or until mixture is slightly thick. Pour into a bowl and allow to cool.
ingredients: water, brown sugar, sugar, cranberries, dijon mustard, prepared horseradish, orange juice
name: jezebel cranberry sauce

steps: Mix all ingredients in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the lime juice. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately.
ingredients: low sodium vegetable broth, arrowroot, fresh lime juice, sugar, peanut oil, sesame oil, fresh cilantro, salt
name: ww 2 points lime cilantro dressing

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, broccoli, salt and pepper, ziti pasta
name: ziti with fresh broccoli sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: pork necks, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, fresh chili pepper, star anise, brown sugar, shaoxing wine, oyster sauce, chinese five spice powder
name: sticky asian pork neck

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Coat 8 muffin cups with pam. Mix sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Dip each marshmallow in melted margarine and roll in sugar mix. Separate dough into triangles. Wrap one triangle around each marshmallow and pinch dough together. Place each one in a muffin cup. Drizzle extra margarine over rolls. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes.
ingredients: crescent roll dough, cocktail smoked sausage links, butter, pecans, honey, brown sugar
name: sweet sausage rolls

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, condensed cream of chicken soup, taco seasoning, sour cream, tortillas
name: slow cooker salsa chicken

steps: In a large heavy skillet, saute the onion, garlic, and zucchini in oil. Discard the garlic. Mix in drained corn, chopped chiles, and salt. Cover tightly and heat through. Mix in cheese and serve. There is also another way to use above ingredients but with a little flour and a cup of either canned or whole milk added to the mixture. Sprinkle with breadcrumbs and bake. 350 degrees for 20-30 minutes. I like this one best.
ingredients: frozen cauliflower, cream cheese with chives, sharp cheddar cheese, bacon, salt and pepper
name: fake potato cauliflower casserole oamc

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place salmon on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide spinach and tomatoes among serving plates. Top with salmon, goat cheese, and pecans, and drizzle with vinaigrette.
ingredients: bacon, green onion, sugar, cider vinegar, chicken stock, salt and pepper, baby spinach leaves, pecans
name: spinach salad with sweet sour bacon dressing

steps: Melt butter in dutch oven. Add rice, onion, and celery. Cook on medium heat till rice is light brown with a nutty aroma stirring often. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Add rest of ingredients, almost over season to taste. Bring to boil on medium heat. Turn off heat. Cover tightly with foil then put lid on top. Bake for 45 minutes then remove from oven and let rest for 15 minutes. Take lid and foil off, fluff with fork and serve.
ingredients: butter, carrots, long grain rice, green onions, chicken stock, fresh parsley, salt, pepper
name: carrot rice pilaf

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add bacon, butter, minced garlic clove, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, romano cheese. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, bacon, butter, minced garlic clove, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, romano cheese
name: the realtor s spaghetti squash italiano

steps: Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, pearl barley, dry white wine, chicken stock, frozen peas, light cream cheese, fresh chives, salt and pepper
name: creamy barley with peas and chives

steps: Combine the olive oil, onion, butter, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. To prepare the dressing, in a small bowl combine the mayonnaise, lime juice, zest, cumin, chili powder, sugar, salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and stir to combine. Cover and allow the slaw to sit for at least 30 minutes, tossing every so often to combine well. Top with raisins before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, button mushrooms, celeriac, fresh flat-leaf parsley, butter, salt & freshly ground black pepper, egg
name: celeriac and mushroom cake

steps: In an 8- or 9-inch flameproof heavy skillet cook onions and garlic in oil over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened. In a bowl whisk together eggs, thyme, rosemary and pepper to taste. Add egg mixture to onion mixture and cook, without stirring, 2 minutes. Add ham and cook, without stirring, 8 minutes, or until edges are set but center is still soft. While frittata is cooking, preheat broiler. Sprinkle cheddar on frittata and broil about 4 inches from heat until cheese is bubbling, about 1 minute. Sprinkle with parsley and cut into wedges.
ingredients: eggs, milk, dijon mustard, crouton, ham, fontina, roasted red pepper, green onion
name: frittata with ham and roasted pepper

steps: Preheat oven to 350f remove the mushroom stems and scrape the gills out with a spoon. Stir the garlic into the oil and brush it all over both sides of the mushroom caps. Place the mushrooms bowl-side-up on a baking sheet and bake for 8 - 10 minutes, or until tender. Take the mushrooms out of the oven and over up to 450f. Top mushrooms with bruschetta and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 5-10 minutes, until the cheese melts.
ingredients: italian bread, cream of mushroom soup, garlic powder, dried italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, green onions
name: mushroom mozzarella bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. For the filling, mix the two filling ingredients in a bowl, then press onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan. Chill to set. For the filling, beat cream cheese on medium speed until fluffy. Beat in sugar until blended, then beat in eggs until blended. Stir in white chocolate, cranberries, zest & vanilla. Pour into prepared crust & bake 45-50 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool in pan for 30 minutes, then refrigerate. Run knife around sides of pan to loosen, then chill 4 hours or more. Remove rim & cut into wedges. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: egg noodles, eggs, farmer cheese, low-fat sour cream, low-fat milk, salt, brown sugar, dried cranberries, cinnamon, butter
name: cranberry noodle kugel

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: water, lemon juice, dried onion flakes, low-sodium worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, dill seed, salt, curry powder, pepper, chicken breasts
name: moist lemon chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving.
ingredients: onion soup mix, olive oil, garlic powder, chicken breast halves, potato, carrots
name: onion roasted chicken and vegetables

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: red potatoes, lemon juice, olive oil, oregano leaves, lemon basil, lemon zest, salt, garlic cloves, chicken broth, feta cheese
name: greek style lemon potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a shallow ovenproof dish. Trim the leeks, cut a slit from the top to bottom and rinse well under cold water. Place the leeks in a saucepan of water, brind to a boil, and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes, until just tender. Remove and drain well using sloted spoon. Arrange in the prepared dish. Beat the eggs with the goat cheese, yogurt, and half the parmesan cheese. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour the cheese and yogurt mixture over the leeks. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining parmesan cheese, and sprinkle over the sauce. Back for 35-40 minutes, until the top is crisp and golden brown.
ingredients: couscous, leeks, cheddar cheese, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: leek cheese couscous cake

steps: Combine all ingredients in crock pot. Cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: lean ham, potatoes, onion, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, healthy request cream of celery soup, black pepper, dried parsley flakes, yellow mustard
name: weight watchers crock pot ham potatoes au grautin

steps: Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh.
ingredients: white vinegar, sugar, prepared mustard, onion, salt, vegetable oil, poppy seed, romaine lettuce, cashew halves, swiss cheese
name: swiss cashew tossed salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: pasta, butternut squash, fresh sage, breadcrumbs, garlic, parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: pasta with roasted butternut squash and sage

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle the garlic salt and onion soup mix over the chicken. Pour salad dressing and water over the chicken. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: butter, italian salad dressing mix, condensed golden mushroom soup, chive & onion cream cheese, white wine, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: slow cooker italian chicken

steps: In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, saute the garlic until aromatic. Add the tomatoes, and saute for another minute or so, then add the broth. Scramble the egg, parmesean cheese, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a serving bowl. When the broth comes to a boil, add the egg mixture while stirring. Remove from heat, place in a bowl, top with fresh ground pepper, and enjoy.
ingredients: garlic, sage leaves, salt, water, ground pepper, eggs, french bread, gruyere cheese
name: french garlic soup

steps: In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries.
ingredients: avocado, milk, ice, vanilla, sugar
name: healthier avocado smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Sprinkle olive oil over the base of the baking dish. Lay cutlets in the dish, rubbing them with the oil. Cover cutlets with crushed garlic, mustard and rosemary, then season with the salt and pepper. Place in the oven and cook for 25-30 minutes, turning once, until the cutlets ar browned and crispy. If desired, serve on a bed of couscous with your favourite steamed vegetables.
ingredients: lamb chops, fresh rosemary, fresh mint leaves, fresh lemon juice, lemons, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: minty manx lamb chops with rosemary

steps: Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all.
ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, salt, fresh cracked pepper
name: lori s simple potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: eggs, honey, sugar, baking soda, cinnamon, flour
name: honey cookies

steps: Mix in order given. Roll into small balls, about 48, and place on lightly greased cookie sheet or parchment paper. Bake at 300 for 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven to cool. Cookies should not be brown but a very light tan. Roll in powdered sugar while still warm. Roll in powdered sugar again when cool. Store in an air tight container.
ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, flour, pecans, white chocolate, candy cane
name: candy cane snowballs

steps: Mix all ingredients except the powdered sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes. Optional sometimes i add walnuts to the mix as well as put some in the bottom of the bundt pan before pouring in the cake mixture it gives it a nice crunchy topping. Pour into well greased bundt pan and bake at 350f for 45 minutes. Let cool for 15-20 mins before removing from bundt pan. While cooling i sometimes mix some of the powdered sugar and some extra sherry poke holes in cake with a chopstick and drizzle while still in pan. Turn out pan onto cooling rack and dust lightly with powdered sugar.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, water, salad oil, cinnamon, nuts, sugar
name: nancy b s cinnamon bundt cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. In large skillet, brown beef and onion then drain. Return meat to pan. Add spaghetti sauce. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl combine mozzarella cheese and sour cream. Pour hot meat into an ungreased 12 x 8 inch dish. Spoon cheese mixture over meat. Unroll crescent roll dough over the top of the mixture. Mix parmesan cheese and butter together, then spread over the top of the dough. Bake 18-25 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: crescent rolls, monterey jack cheese, smoked sausage, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese, eggs
name: pie a la italian

steps: Preheat oven to gas 4 or 180c. Grease with butter an oblong roasting tin, or a wide shallow dish. Peel potatoes and slice thinly into rounds. Finely chop onion. Arrange a layer of potato on base of dish, sprinkle with onion, and salt and pepper. Continue until all is used up, ending with potato. Pour over the stock and milk, then dot with butter. Place in the hot part of the oven for 45-50 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked and the top golden and crunchy. For a change used chopped leek as well as or instead of onion.
ingredients: butter, onions, dried thyme leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, potatoes, vegetable stock, swiss cheese
name: crock pot potatoes boulangere

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Pour chicken and sauce over pasta. Toss gently. Top with grated cheese. Garnish with fresh lemon slices and fresh parsley.
ingredients: capellini, olive oil, fresh parsley, garlic, parmesan cheese, fresh ground pepper
name: angel hair pasta in garlic sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut the stem end from turnips. Rub each with olive oil and wrap tightly in aluminum foil. Bake for approximately 90 minutes or until insides are soft enough to scoop out. Scoop out insides of each turnip, leaving the shell intact. Mash & whip the insides with the sour cream, spices and seasonings. When the insides are a creamy consistency, carefully spoon them back into shells. Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and bake the stuffed turnips for 20-30 minutes until heated thru.
ingredients: unsalted butter, oil, shallot, turnip, orange juice, salt, pepper, orange, zest of
name: turnips with orange

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus spears, grainy mustard, white wine vinegar, caster sugar, light olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: asparagus with grainy mustard dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Stir ingredients in medium mixing bowl until blended. Spoon onto 2 un-greased cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes. Allow the cookies to cool on the pan, or wait 1-2 minutes before moving to cooling racks. Cookies should be soft & chewy.
ingredients: cookie mix, water, raisins, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, sugar
name: easy bake oven raisin chocolate chip cookies

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional.
ingredients: italian bread, italian vegetables, meatballs, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: meatball subs in a pan casserole

steps: Preheat grill on high and sprinkle shrimp with salt on both sides. Grill shrimp for 3 minutes per side, brushing with marinade again before turning. Reduce time for smaller shrimp. Place remaining sauce in a serving dish for dipping. Prep time includes time to marinate but not to soak the skewers.
ingredients: shrimp, ketchup, picante sauce, brown sugar, lemon juice
name: grilled southwest shrimp on skewers

steps: Place shirley s stuffed dates in prepared baking pan and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: dates, peanut butter, almonds, sugar
name: shirley s stuffed dates

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease 9x9 inch baking dish. Combine the artichoke hearts, feta, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, pimientos, and garlic in a bowl. Blend thoroughly. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake in preheated oven until top is bubbly and lightly browned, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove and garnish with tomatoes and green onions.
ingredients: mayonnaise, cream cheese, roasted red peppers, marinated artichokes, garlic powder, italian seasoning, feta cheese, parmesan cheese
name: roasted red pepper feta and artichoke dip

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, butter, salt, pepper, sugar, nutmeg
name: appled sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Butter a 9 x 5 x 3 inch loaf pan. Cream butter with sugar for 6 minutes, until light. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Blend in bananas and lemon juice. Sift together flour, baking soda and salt. Blend into mango mixture along with lemon zest. Turn into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour or until tested done. Remove, cool for 15 minutes and turn out of pan. Cool completely.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, mangoes, lemon juice, raisins
name: fresh mango bread

steps: Heat oil in a nonreactive saucepan and fry the chicken pieces until they are lightly browned. Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 2 minutes over low heat, stirring constantly to make sure that the sugar has dissolved. Allow the marinade to cool and pour it over the chicken. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate it for 24 hours. When ready to grill the chicken pieces, remove them from the marinade, drain them, place them on skewers, and grill over hot coals or under the broiler for 10 minutes, turning once, or until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot with apricot chutney.
ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, sunflower oil, garlic cloves, fresh coriander, caster sugar, ground cumin, ground coriander, light soy sauce, chili pepper, salt and pepper
name: noo s famous spiced green chicken skewers

steps: Add onion to bacon drippings after bacon has been removed. Cook until lightly browned. Add water, diced potatoes, salt and pepper. Cook until potatoes are tender. Add corn, milk, and butter. Simmer until heated through or until ready to serve. Add cooked bacon when ready to serve.
ingredients: onion, butter, potatoes, water, lobster meat, salt, pepper, milk, light cream
name: lobster chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line an 8-inch pie pan or heatproof baking dish with the pie dough. Prick the dough with the tines of a fork. In a second bowl, mix together the apples, cup of the sugar, and teaspoon of the cinnamon. In a second bowl, mix together the flour, cup of the sugar, and the unsalted butter. Work these ingredients together with a fork until you have a crumbly mixture. Fill the pie crust with the apple mixture and smooth over the surface. Spoon the crumble over the apple mixture so that the apples are completely covered. Sprinkle the remaining tablespoon of sugar and teaspoon of cinnamon over the crumble. Bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: apples, maple syrup, butter, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, salt, cinnamon, rolled oats
name: canadian apple maple crumble pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, flour, milk, sharp cheddar cheese
name: basic macaroni and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour 24 minit muffin pan cups. Combine sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix cake mix, water, oil and eggs according to package directions, stir nutmeg into batter. Fill prepared muffing cups two-thirds full. Bake about 12 minutes or until lightly browned and toothpick inserted into centers come out clean. Remove cupcakes from pans. Roll warm cupcakes in sugar mixture until completely coated
ingredients: white sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder, milk
name: simple white cupcakes

steps: Cook rice according to package directions, omiting salt and fat. Stir in sherry and salt. Cover and keep warm. Heat butter and oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add shallots to pan. Saute 2 minutes. Add mushrooms and saute 4 minutes. Stir in rice mixture, parsley and pepper.
ingredients: wild rice, butter, salt, pepper, green onions, vegetable broth, sliced mushrooms, slivered almonds, dried cranberries
name: crock pot wild rice with cranberries

steps: Place the greek spinach in a large bowl. Whisk the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the feta cheese. Mix well. Cook until the feta cheese is melted.
ingredients: red wine vinegar, garlic clove, olive oil, baby spinach, red onion, feta cheese, roasted red peppers, walnuts
name: atkins greek spinach salad

steps: Heat the oil in a deep skillet or wok. Saute the onion and celery 5 minutes. Mix in the pork, soy sauce and sprouts. Cook 2 minutes. Mix the cornstarch with the broth. Add to the skillet, stirring steadily to the boiling point. Cook 3 minutes more. Serve with rice or chow mein noodles.
ingredients: round steak, celery, onion, garlic clove, beef broth, tamari soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, chinese vegetables, cornstarch, chow mein noodles
name: chow mein in the crock pot

steps: In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the mousse mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to mousse mixture. Mix well. Chill overnight or until firm, about three hours.
ingredients: cranberry juice cocktail, raspberry jell-o gelatin, jellied cranberry sauce, heavy cream
name: cranberry mousse

steps: To make the tiramisu at least one day before it is needed and store covered in the fridge. Beat the egg yolks with the sugar until light, then beat in the cheese, beating until smooth. Whisk the whites until stiff but not dry, and then fold these into the mixture. The whites will lose most of their volume and the finished result will be a softer cream rather than a mousse. Mix your chosen spirit with the coffee. Dip the biscuits one at a time into the coffee and arrange half of them in a single layer in a serving dish. Spread half of the cream mixture over them. Now continue with the remaining fingers, pouring on any leftover coffee. Spread the second half of the cream over the top and sprinkle liberally with cocoa powder. Cover and store in the fridge for at least 24 hours.
ingredients: poundcake, brewed coffee, sugar, chocolate syrup, cream cheese, heavy whipping cream, chocolate-covered english toffee bars
name: easy tiramisu dessert

steps: In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon.
ingredients: water, baking soda, family-size tea bags, sugar
name: microwave sweet tea

steps: Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate.
ingredients: 7-up soda, miniature marshmallows, lime jell-o gelatin, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, cool whip, mayonnaise, walnuts
name: 7 up jello

steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, combine cream of chile poblano, onion, garlic cloves, poblano chiles, vegetable oil, vegetable stock, low-fat plain yogurt, monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper. Heat over medium high heat until cheese is melted and bubbling, about 25 minutes. You may prefer to drain both cans if you want less sauce.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, poblano chiles, vegetable oil, vegetable stock, low-fat plain yogurt, monterey jack cheese, salt
name: caldo largo cream of chile poblano

steps: Place flour, sugar, salt, sugar, and shortening in large tupperware or other plastic container with lid. Seal tightly. Shake 3 minutes. Open & make sure mixture is uniform. Add water. Shake 3 more minutes & open to see if mixture is large dough ball of uniform consistency. Roll out on floured surface. Can be frozen for later use.
ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, shortening, cold water, canola oil, milk
name: easy oil pie crust

steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red potatoes, seasoning salt, pepper, garlic powder, olive oil, medium cheddar
name: smooshed potatoes

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: sugar, water, cream of tartar, egg yolks, sweet butter, brandy
name: butter cream frosting from the plaza

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist.
ingredients: vegetable oil, chips, cheddar cheese, eggs
name: easy cheesy chip omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, nutmeg, salt, buttermilk, eggs, butter, stir until just combined. Divide batter between prepared donut pan. Bake until toothpick comes out clean, 7 to 9 minutes. Let donuts cool in pans for 5 minutes then take them out of pan and let cool on a cooling rack.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, ground cinnamon, egg, milk, oil
name: kakes gordos fried dough balls

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the kottbullar balls and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the kottbullar balls evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: potatoes, vegetable bouillon cube, ground almonds, ground flax seeds, salt & pepper, onion, olive oil
name: kottbullar swedish meatless balls vegan

steps: In a large nonstick frying pan, add olive oil and turn on low heat. Let oil warm. Add basil and let oil absorb flavour for 5 minutes. Turn heat to medium. Sprinkle scallops with salt and pepper and add to hot oil. Add butter and cook on each side for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and add to serving dish. Sprinkle with fresh lemon. Place chives over top and serve.
ingredients: sea scallops, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter
name: seared sea scallops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan or 12-cup fluted tube pan with non-stick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl, combine cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk, margarine. Beat to mix well. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour, or until done.
ingredients: white cake mix, eggs, sour cream, almond extract, water, vegetable oil
name: easy almond sour cream layer cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 f. In a medium bowl combine ham, swiss cheese, vidalia onion, tomatoes, mayonnaise and mustard. Arrange bread in a large baking sheet. Top with ham mixture. Bake until heated through, 10 to 13 minutes, or until golden brown and bubbly. Serve immediately at room temperature.
ingredients: vidalia onions, olive oil-flavored vegetable cooking spray, dried thyme, salt, fresh ground pepper, balsamic vinegar
name: roasted vidalias

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line muffin tins with foil. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until set.
ingredients: onion, chopped tomato, dried basil, salt and pepper, egg, water, cheese
name: too yummy to share scramble

steps: Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrotspreparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cay
ingredients: butter, kernel corn, carrots, green pepper, red pepper, salt, oregano, basil, marjoram
name: carrot and corn combo

steps: Preheat the oven to 425f. In a food processor, combine cilantro, scallions, salt and pepper with as much spinach as will fit. Pulse, adding the rest of the spinach in batches, until all is coarsely chopped. Coat an 8-9 inch square baking dish with butter or oil. Lay 4 tortillas in the bottom of dish, overlapping slightly. Layer with half of beans, salsa, spinach mixture and cheese. Repeat with remaining ingredients, ending with cheese and pressing in gently. Cover dish with foil, place on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake until bubbling, 25-30 minutes. Remove foil, and continue baking until golden, 15-20 minutes more. Cool for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: rotini pasta, salsa, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, nonfat cottage cheese, black beans, frozen corn, fresh cilantro
name: mexican pasta vegetable bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and set aside.
ingredients: cooked white rice, zucchini, green onions, eggs, soft breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, pesto sauce, oil, lemon wedge
name: zucchini pesto rice cakes

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, celery, green onions, bacon, mayonnaise, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent. Remove from heat and set aside.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, celery, green onions, bacon, mayonnaise, prepared horseradish, salt, pepper, fresh parsley
name: bacon and egg salad

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops.
ingredients: chicken broth, sour cream, dijon mustard, coarse grain mustard, cornstarch, fresh parsley, boneless pork chops, salt, pepper
name: pork chops with mustard sour cream sauce

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs, half and half, maple syrup and salt until smooth. Pour evenly over the egg yolks and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix the cream mixture into the egg yolks a little at a time. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve. Pour the mixture into 4 ramekins. Place the ramekins in a baking dish and fill the baking dish with hot water until it come halfway up the ramekins. Bake in a preheated 300f oven until set, about 50-60 minutes. Remove from hot water bath and let cool to room temperature.
ingredients: maple syrup, cornstarch, cold water, heavy cream, dark rum, fresh fruit
name: creamy maple fondue from quebec

steps: Heat oil on high heat in a large nonstick pan. Toss short ribs in flour, add to pan, and sear on all sides. Reduce heat to low and add garlic. Cook and stir for about 1 min. Add tomato, mushrooms, marsala wine, and italian seasoning one at a time, allowing about 1-2 min between each for liquid to evaporate. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure liquid has not evaporated away. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure liquid has not evapor
ingredients: round steaks, garlic cloves, fine breadcrumbs, parsley, romano cheese, mozzarella cheese, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, marinara sauce
name: braciola braciole

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: garlic, fresh ginger, scallion, oil, ground turkey, soy sauce, sliced water chestnuts, crushed red pepper flakes, wide egg noodles, boiling water
name: spicy oriental turkey noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl, combine egg noodles, vegetable oil, cooked ham, red onion, dried thyme, salt, white pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar
ingredients: wide egg noodles, vegetable oil, cooked ham, red onion, dried thyme, salt, white pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, extra-sharp cheddar cheese
name: ham noodle stove top casserole pennsylvania dutch style

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan. Add the garlic and onions and cook and stir for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, broth, water, basil and pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Cover and simmer over low heat, about 20 minutes or until rice is cooked, stirring occasionally. Stir in zucchini, heat through 1 minute.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic, basil, canned plum tomatoes, vegetable broth, heavy cream, cooked rice
name: cream of tomato soup with rice and basil

steps: Preheat over 450 degrees. Place asparagus in a roasting pan. Drizzle butter mixture over roasted asparagus, toss well to coat. Srinkle lemon zest over asparagus.
ingredients: butter, sliced almonds, salt, black pepper, asparagus
name: fresh asparagus with buttered almonds

steps: Cook the cheese tortellini, drain and rinse with cold water. Put the cooked tortellini, artichoke pieces, tomatoes, olives, broccoli and salami in separate containers. Add italian dressing to each of the containers and stir to mix. Let the ingredients marinate for 1 hour. The salami should marinate in the fridge. When ready to make up the kabobs, take wooden skewers and thread them with the 6 ingredients. You can vary what you put on the kabobs to make each one slightly different, or you can make each of them the same. To put the salami on the skewers, lightly fold each slice in half and then punch the skewer through the meat. As you finish the kabobs, put them in something like a one-layer cake pan. Cover the pan and chill in the fridge until serving time. You can do a similar kind of kabob using different kinds of fruit.
ingredients: cheese tortellini, pepperoni, black olives, green olives, cheese, italian dressing, toothpick
name: tortellini antipasto kebabs

steps: Spray an 8x8 pan with cooking spray, then place the sliced apples in the pan. Mix the sugar, 2 teaspoons flour and cinnamon together, sprinkle over apples. Pour the water over the apple mixture. Combine the oats, remaining flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda together. Stir in the melted butter and crumble over the apples. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minute. Serve warm with icecream or caramel sauce.
ingredients: apples, cinnamon, whole berry cranberry sauce, quick-cooking oats, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, pecans
name: apple cranberry crunch

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired.
ingredients: vegetable oil, cabbage, boneless pork, chicken broth, soy sauce, gingerroot, green onions, thin egg noodles
name: chinese long soup

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Saut shrimp in butter until caramelized. Add salt to taste. Beat eggs and milk together in small bowl. Sprinkle parmesan in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish. Layer shrimp and tomato quiche in bottom of well greased muffin trays or pie dish.
ingredients: margarine, cheddar cheese, milk, eggs, onion, flour, shrimp, tomatoes
name: shrimp and tomato quiche

steps: Heat oil in wok or heavy saut pan. Add ginger and pork and stir fry until pork begins to develop a crust. Add bok choy and hoisin sauce with splash of rice wine. Toss. Add noodles and green onions and continue stir frying until noodles are heated through. To serve, remove pan from heat. Using tongs, pull all noodles from the pan and then top noodles with pork, onions and bok choy. Serve immediately.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, wide egg noodles, onion, garlic, parmesan cheese
name: my dad s sausage and noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Drain artichoke hearts and puree them in your food processor. Mix pureed artichoke hearts, one cup of mayonnaise, one cup of parmesan cheese and garlic to taste in an oven safe bowl or small casserole dish. Bake in oven at 350f degrees for 25-35 minutes until light golden brown. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving with wheatables vegetable flavored crackers.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, green onions, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, rye cocktail bread
name: artichoke toasts

steps: Place carrots in a saucepan. Add 1 inch of water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and cook for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and set aside. In the same pan, combine butter, brown sugar and salad dressing mix until blended. Add carrots. Cook and stir over medium heat for 5 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and set
ingredients: carrots, raisins, mayonnaise, light cream, cinnamon, garlic powder, sugar
name: a wild guess carrot salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Coat a 10- by 15-inch rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Place the chicken breasts on the baking sheet. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spread the mixture evenly over the chicken breasts. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, or until the topping is golden and no pink remains in the chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dijon mustard, honey, salt, pepper, ritz crackers
name: crispy honey dijon chicken

steps: Combine margarine, evaporated milk, sugar, vanilla, chocolate chips, desiccated coconut, corn flakes, nuts in a large buttered saucepan. Cook over medium heat to 236f, stirring frequently. Remove from heat & add chocolate, marshmallow cream, vanilla & nuts. Beat until chocolate is melted & blended. Pour into pan.
ingredients: margarine, evaporated milk, sugar, vanilla, chocolate chips, desiccated coconut, corn flakes, nuts
name: fudge macaroons

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine the oil and garlic in a large roasting pan and place in the oven for 2 minutes until the garlic starts to sizzle. Remove the pan from the oven and stir in the thyme, salt and pepper. Add the potatoes, onion, carrots, turnips, toss until well coated. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Increase oven temp to 450f, and bake, uncovered for 30 minutes until the veggies are lightly browned and can easily be pierced with a fork.
ingredients: rutabaga, parsnip, turnip, carrot, onion, bacon, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper
name: roasted root vegetable hash

steps: Crumble or mash the blue cheese with the sour cream in a bowl. Mash in the avocados, if they are ripe, a fork should be all you need. Roughly chop the sliced jalapeos and stir them into the mixture along with the finely sliced scallions. Arrange in the center of a plate or dish, dust with paprika, and surround with tortilla chips. Dive in and enjoy.
ingredients: roquefort cheese, sour cream, avocados, green pickled jalapeno pepper, scallions, paprika, blue corn tortilla chips
name: nigella lawson roquamole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix spaghetti sauce, tomatoes and water. Spoon 1 cup onto bottom of 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Layer half the ravioli and 1 cup shredded cheese over sauce mixture. Top with remaining ravioli and sauce mixture. Sprinkle with remaining shredded cheese. Cover. Bake 30 minutes. Uncover. Bake 15 minutes or until ravioli is tender and heated through. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Let stand 10 minutes.
ingredients: frozen cheese ravioli, cooked chicken, fresh mushrooms, green pepper, onion, meatless spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: ravioli chicken casserole

steps: In 4-quart saucepan, melt butter over medium-high heat. Cook onion and garlic in butter 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until tender. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, 1 minute. Stir in broth, broccoli and corn. Heat to boiling over high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. Stir in half-and-half. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until hot.
ingredients: frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, onion powder, garlic powder, milk, pork and beans, cheese spread
name: cheesy bean and vegetable chowder

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook shrimp for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until shrimp is no longer pink in center. Place shrimp on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Roll up and serve.
ingredients: salsa, mangoes, ketchup, taco seasoning, olive oil, raw shrimp, boneless skinless chicken breast, flour tortillas, coleslaw mix, reduced-fat sour cream
name: spicy shrimp or chicken wraps

steps: Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. Return soup to
ingredients: olive oil, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, bottled garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, water, rubbed sage, cannellini beans, tomatoes, black pepper
name: garlicky stewed white beans with mixed peppers

steps: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the flour and stir 1-2 minutes to make a roux. Add the salt, pepper, sugar and chopped egg, mixing well. Gradually add the milk and stir until mixture thickens, about 5 minutes. Stir in lemon juice and serve. This sauce can be used to give an attractive flavour and appearance to foods such as fish, old vegetables, and so on.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, milk
name: basic white sauce bechamel sauce

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all the above ingredients except bacon, mayonnaise, dijon-style mustard, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, blue cheese, lettuce leaves. Spread with filling and roll up. Freeze. Take from freezer, sprinkle with cheese and grill until cooked through.
ingredients: deli ham, bacon, mayonnaise, dijon-style mustard, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, blue cheese, lettuce leaves
name: cobb salad ham roll ups

steps: Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a large nonstick frypan over medium high heat. Add chicken, saute 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pan, keep warm. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in pan. Add onion, saute for 5 minutes or until browned. Add apple and marjoram, saute for 5 more minutes. Add the chicken and cider, bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until chicken is done.
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, apple, balsamic vinegar, honey, gingerroot, boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: broiled chicken with apples and ginger

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, milk, almond flavoring, brown sugar, sliced almonds, dried cherries, apple
name: michigan german baked oatmeal

steps: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, mix evaporated milk, marshmallow cream, butter, sugar and salt, stirring constantly, bring to a full boil. Boil 5 minutes. Remove from heat, add in chocolate chips and vanilla, stir hard until blended. Stir in chopped walnuts. Spread mixture in a buttered 8-inch square pan. Chill until firm. Cut in small squares if desired, top each square with a walnut half.
ingredients: vanilla chips, sweetened condensed milk, butter, maple extract, walnuts
name: vermont maple walnut fudge

steps: Preheat the oven to 425 f. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside. Lay two spring roll wrappers on a clean work surface. Brush wrappers lightly with melted butter. Slice the bananas in half on the diagonal. Place one banana half in the lower third portion of the wrapper and cover with the chocolate. Sprinkle a little salt over the chocolate and top with the remaining banana half. Roll into a tight package. Continue until all bananas and wrappers are rolled. Place the finished banana rolls on the lined baking tray and brush tops and edges with butter. Bake for 5-7 minutes on the baking tray and serve when golden brown.
ingredients: bananas, wooden popsicle sticks, chocolate bars, butter, nuts, coconut, cookie, colored sprinkles, granola cereal
name: chocolate dipped bananas

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Pound out the chicken breasts to flatten. Season each with a little southwest seasoning. Cook the chicken in a skillet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray over medium-low heat until no longer pink. Place each breast onto a baking sheet and top each breast with 2 tablespoon of barbeque sauce, 2 tablespoon cheese, 2 tablespoon rotel tomatoes, green onions and 1 tablespoon of bacon bits. Place into the oven and bake until the cheese has melted. Place into the oven and bake until
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, crisp bacon, barbecue sauce, cheese, plain croissants, salt, pepper, garlic
name: barbecued monterey chicken sandwiches

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: frozen broccoli florets, water, butter, green onions, orange juice, brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, orange peel
name: orange glazed broccoli

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: italian bread, shrimp, salsa, avocados, monterey jack cheese
name: shrimp melts

steps: Wash the beans, cover with cold water, and cook for 1 hour or until the beans are tender. Add more water if necessary.
ingredients: pinto beans, bacon, onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, cumin, dried thyme, chicken broth, bay leaf
name: pinto beans rancheros

steps: In a blender, blend watermelon, lime-flavored seltzer water, splenda sugar substitute, lemon, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemonade concentrate,
ingredients: watermelon, lime-flavored seltzer water, splenda sugar substitute, lemon
name: my watermelon slushy

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Cook ginger, onion, garlic, butter, garlic cloves, cumin, ground ginger, lemon juice, dark brown sugar, water until browned, set aside. Add second tablespoon of olive oil, butter, garlic and spices and saut until fragrant. Add lemon juice and stir until mixed. Add reserved chicken, brown sugar and enough water or wine to create a sauce with the spices and sugar. Simmer about 10 minutes, turning once, until the flavors begin to penetrate the meat. Add more water as needed.
ingredients: ground ginger, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, boneless chicken thighs, cooking spray, dry white wine
name: ginger and spice chicken thighs

steps: Cook beans in a 5-quart pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest.
ingredients: lemons, black pepper, green beans, salt
name: lemon pepper green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges.
ingredients: apples, cider, flour, sugar, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, pie crusts
name: cider apple pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice.
ingredients: egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, shredded cheddar cheese, cooked chicken breasts, milk, white onion, curry powder, sliced ripe olives, salt and pepper
name: cheesy chicken curry casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Empty the canned peaches into a 1 quart baking dish that has been sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix in the cinnamon and brown sugar. Sprinkle with the crumb cake mix and cut butter into 4 equal portions and place on top. Cover and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove cover and continue to cook for an additional 10 minutes or until top is brown. Can be served immediately or is also good room temperature.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, egg, peaches, cream cheese, sugar, cinnamon
name: peaches and cream cake

steps: Heat the coleslaw over low heat until tender. Add cabbage, onion, tomato puree, sugar, salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Gradually add water and vinegar. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens. Stir in remaining ingredients. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
ingredients: polish sausage, vegetable oil, green onions, cabbage, carrots, golden raisin, salt, sugar, vinegar, parsley
name: polish sausage with hot coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Stir together oil and cornstarch in a small bowl until combined. Stack wonton wrappers and halve diagonally. Arrange in single layer on a large baking sheet and lightly brush tops with oil mixture. You might not use all of oil mixture at this time. You just need a light brushing to get the seeds and salt to adhere. Sprinkle evenly with sesame seeds and kosher salt and bake in middle of oven until golden brown, 5 to 6 minutes. Transfer crisps to a rack to cool. Crisps can be made 1 day ahead and kept in an airtight container at room temperature.
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, wonton wrappers, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese
name: wonton cheese crisps

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together vegetable oil, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: vegetable oil, sugar, eggs, vanilla, self-rising flour
name: jeanne s teacakes

steps: Place 3 ingredients into a medium pan. Bring to a boil over low heat. Stirring constantly. Remove from heat -- add vanilla. Pour into a medium bowl. Mix 2 minutes with electric mixer. Cool 10 minutes. Add powdered sugar -- mix until well combined.
ingredients: sugar, powdered milk, hot water, margarine
name: substitute for sweetened condensed milk

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add sugar and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add sugar and cook for 5 minutes,
ingredients: white onions, cooking oil, crushed pineapple, cider vinegar, granulated sugar, brown sugar, salt
name: pineapple onion marmalade

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: margarine, egg whites, oil, brown sugar, white sugar, flour, baking soda, chocolate chips
name: single serve cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, blackstrap molasses, baking soda, flour, allspice, hot water, egg
name: molasses cake

steps: Tear cake into small pieces and cover bottoms of 5 dessert dishes. Mix pudding according to directions on box. Pour over cake. Spread fresh strawberries over pudding mixture. Top with cool whip. Refrigerate if not served immediately.
ingredients: orange cake mix, eggs, oil, water, orange gelatin, vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, vanilla, cool whip
name: creamsicle cake jello cake

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: egg yolks, dry mustard, minced garlic cloves, white wine, saffron thread, cayenne pepper, pastis, olive oil, salt, lemon, juice of
name: rouille french cayenne pepper saffron and garlic mayonnaise

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: frozen french fries, cheddar cheese, green onions with top, half-and-half, butter, salt, paprika
name: grilled au gratin potatoes

steps: In a 4-quart saucepan, over medium-high heat, bring the water, cranberries, sugar, apricots, currants, raisins & vinegar to a boil, stirring often. Reduce heat & simmer, stirring occasionally, until cranberries begin to pop, 5-8 minutes. Meanwhile, peel the tangerines, removing & discarding the peel & white fibers. Discard the seeds, then separate the segments & coarsely chop them. Add the chopped tangerines & the juice to the pan, & simmer to blend flavors, 2-3 minutes. Stir in pecans, then cool to room temperature & serve. Or chill & serve. Can be kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days, or frozen for up to 1 month.
ingredients: water, white sugar, fresh cranberries, apple, cider vinegar, raisins, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground allspice, ground cloves
name: holiday cranberry chutney

steps: In a large saucepan combine the chocolate, cream, butter and peanut butter and heat over moderate heat, stirring, until chocolate is completely melted. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla and a pinch of salt. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Keep in an airtight container, chilled, for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, powdered sugar, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, vanilla, ground walnuts, unsweetened cocoa, coconut, candy sprinkles
name: easy chocolate truffles

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add the onion, mushrooms, carrot, and thyme, and saute until the onion is just translucent, about 4-5 minutes. Add the broth and mashed potatoes. Stir until potatoes are mostly dissolved and broth is smooth. Add the turkey and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, carrots, cooked turkey, zucchini, instant rice, dried thyme, low-fat alfredo sauce, oyster crackers
name: easy and creamy turkey vegetable soup

steps: In a two-quart bowl, mix the first 4 ingredients together. Fold the beaten egg whites in until all are well mixed. Pour into unbaked pie shell of 9inch pan. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. When taken from oven, filling will seem a little shaky, but when cooled, will be creamy. Bake time does not include making pie crust.
ingredients: unbaked pie shells, eggs, white sugar, salt, vanilla extract, egg white, whole milk, ground nutmeg, yellow food coloring
name: grandma s egg custard pie

steps: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add sweet potatoes. Cover and cook over medium heat 5 minutes or until golden. Turn potato slices over. Reduce heat, cover, and cook 5 more minutes. Return potatoes to skillet. Add sugars, pecans, cinnamon, and salt, tossing to coat. Add 2 tablespoons water, stirring to loosen browned particles. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until potatoes and apples are glazed and tender.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, white sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, heavy cream, butter, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans
name: praline sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2-quart baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except the bacon and mix well. Pour into the baking dish and lay the raw strips of bacon on top. Cover and bake for approximately 45 minutes, or until thick and bubbly. Uncover and bake for 5 more minute.
ingredients: great northern beans, butter, cooking apples, brown sugar, white sugar, catsup, cinnamon, molasses, salt
name: apple bean bake

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard.
ingredients: spaghetti, vegetable oil cooking spray, onion, tomatoes, honey, italian herb seasoning, kidney bean, cannellini beans, parmesan cheese
name: chunky spaghetti

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Pour into a 13x9
ingredients: boiling water, kosher gelatin, frozen pound cake, cream cheese, powdered sugar, frozen whipped topping, lemon peel
name: trifling gelatin bites

steps: Mix first four ingredients of bottom layer well. Press mixture in a well greased 9x13 pan. Top with pineapples. Mix remaining ingredients well and pour over pineapples. Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes until slightly browned. Cool completely and cut into squares. Serve cold, frozen or warm.
ingredients: white cake mix, eggs, butter, pecans, powdered sugar, cream cheese, sour cream, lemon, rind of, vanilla extract
name: lemon cheese squares

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place sautéed chicken on a baking sheet lined with baking paper. Bake for 30 minutes or until crispy and lightly browned.
ingredients: vital wheat gluten, baking powder, reduced sodium soy sauce, cold water, vegetarian chicken bouillon cubes, poultry seasoning
name: bebe s vegetarian chicken seitan

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease and dust a bundt cake pan. Combine wet ingredients first, and then add dry ingredients. Bake for 45 - 55 minutes or until the cake tests done with toothpick. Let cool for 10 minutes.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant butterscotch pudding mix, eggs, water, vegetable oil, canned pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice
name: pumpkin bundt cake ii

steps: In a 3-qt casserole, combine chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, sugar snap pea, fresh bean sprout, fresh mushrooms, ginger, noodlespreparation:Combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, and peas in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the bean sprouts, mushrooms, and ginger. Simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the cooked noodles and heat for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: ramen noodles, green cabbage, spam, green onions
name: extra special ramen noodle soup

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool completely. Remove from oven
ingredients: butter, maple syrup, brown sugar, eggs, milk, vanilla, salt
name: baked caramel french toast

steps: Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well.
ingredients: carrots, ground cumin, cumin seed, soft brown sugar, olive oil, fresh ginger, tahini, water, salt, pepper
name: roasted carrot dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Butter a shallow baking dish. Break cauliflower into bite size pieces and cook for about 10 minutes or til still slightly firm. Drain and rinse under cold water. Prepare the sauce by melting butter in a small saucepan. Add garlic& cook over med-low heat, stirring often, for 2 minutes. Stir in breadcrumbs, pepper and nutmeg. Stir constantly until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes. Spoon over cauliflower. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or til cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: crescent roll, butter, american cheese, eggs, milk, onion, head cauliflower, salt
name: cauliflower pie

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground turkey, onion, taco seasoning, water, stewed tomatoes, frozen corn, instant rice, cheddar cheese
name: skillet fiesta dinner

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: butter, eggs, tomatoes, scallions, feta cheese, dried oregano, salt & freshly ground black pepper, pita breads
name: pita stuffed with eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, salt, pepper, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, lemon juice, prepared mustard, soy sauce
name: pineapple baked chicken breasts

steps: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. Heat up a frying pan. When the pan is hot, spoon the mixture in heaped spoonfuls into the pan. Cook in batches for about 3 minutes each side, or until both sides are golden brown. Remove from the pan, and continue cooking in batches.
ingredients: tuna in water, spring onions, soft breadcrumbs, creamed corn, chili powder, parsley, eggs, salsa, cheese
name: mexican tuna loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour two baking pans and set aside. Mash banana and set aside. Combine cake mix and baking soda in the large bowl of an electric mixer. Add the rest of the ingredients and beat on low speed until combined. Beat at medium speed for 4-5 minutes. Divide batter between the two pans and bake 30-35 minutes or until center of cake springs back with lightly tapped. Allow to cool on a wire rack and frost.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, banana, water, oil, eggs, almond extract, chocolate-covered english toffee bars
name: easy banana sheet cake
