steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired.
ingredients: pie pastry, pumpkin, fat-free evaporated milk, eggs, artificial sweetener, vanilla, cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, salt
name: sweet spot sugar free pumpkin pie

steps: Preheat oven to 450f degrees. When lobster is cool enough to handle, split in half lengthwise. Remove dark strip if present. Remove the coral and liver to a medium bowl. To coral, add bread crumbs and butter, salt, pepper and tarragon. Put mixture in cavaties of lobster, drizzle with vegetable oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until browned.
ingredients: pollock fillet, breadcrumbs, lemon juice, butter, paprika
name: very poor man s lobster

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper and oil. Mix well. Pour over spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: brown lentils, fresh parsley, red bell peppers, vegetable stock, fresh spinach, yellow onion, bay leaf, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
name: warm lentil salad with onion peppers and spinach

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Add the pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the feta cheese. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.
ingredients: pine nuts, baby spinach leaves, arugula leaves, cherry tomatoes, pumpkin, feta cheese, salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: pumpkin spinach and feta salad

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, red chilies, spaghetti, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh ground black pepper
name: spaghetti with olive oil garlic and chillies

steps: In a resealable storage bag thoroughly combine all ingredients except the steak, when combined add steak. Seal bag, turn to coat. Place in the refrigerator and marinate 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill to desired doneness, about 6 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on platter and serve.
ingredients: oil, round steaks, onion, sugar snap peas, honey, soy sauce, oyster sauce, cracked black pepper
name: honey and black pepper steak

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Whisk the butter, sugar, salt, eggs, and vanilla together in a bowl. Sift the flour and baking powder into the butter mixture. Stir. Add the buttermilk and mix gently. Scoop out the dought into paper-lined muffin pans. Sprinkle with additional sugar if desired, and bake for 20 to 35 minutes, depending on the size of your muffin pans. This will make 12 standard sized muffins or 6 texas sized muffins.
ingredients: flour, splenda sugar substitute, baking powder, baking soda, salt, fat-free buttermilk, butter, eggs, vanilla, fresh strawberries
name: fabulous strawberry muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees celsius. Bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled.
ingredients: pear, whole grain bread, watercress leaf, stilton cheese
name: locket s savoury

steps: Preheat oven to 200oc. Make a small cut at the top of each fig and push in a little piece of gorgonzola. Wrap each fig in a slice of prosciutto. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes. The cheese will melt and the prosciutto will be crisp. Serve immediately on rocket leaves dressed in olive oil and salt, and finish with a little finely cracked pepper.
ingredients: figs, eggs, ground cinnamon, salt, basil, flour, oil
name: figs stuffed with cinnamoned eggs

steps: Combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: avocados, tart apples, peaches, grapefruit, honey, lemon juice, pecans, lettuce
name: avocado fruit salad

steps: Sprinkle a little lemon juice over the fish. Heat the oil in a very hot skillet. Cook the fish in the skillet for about 4 minutes each side, or until cooked to your liking. Meanwhile, put remaining ingredients in a screw-top jar and shake vigorously. Serve the fish with a little of the sauce drizzled over.
ingredients: swordfish steaks, lemons, juice of, shallots, garlic, coarse grain mustard, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme, fresh ground black pepper
name: lemon thyme swordfish

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, melt butter, and sautee the carrots until soft. Add all remaining ingredients and heat through. Add cooked, drained carrot slices to sauce. Remove from heat and gently to coat.
ingredients: fresh carrots, butter, walnuts, honey, ground black pepper, cinnamon, salt, lemon juice
name: walnut carrots with honey glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: cake flour, baking powder, butter, sugar, egg yolks, milk, vanilla
name: 1928 award winning gold cake

steps: In a medium bowl combine the first 6 ingredients together. In a small bowl mix together the mayonnaise and yellow mustard until well combined. Add to the mixture in the ham mixture. Mix to combine. Season with black pepper to taste. Cover and chill a minimum of 2 or more hours before using.
ingredients: rolls, ham, cheese, green onion top, tomatoes, mustard
name: hot ham sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease 8-inch pie pan. Combine sugar and butter and mix well in a large bowl. Add eggs, then flour, cocoa and vanilla, stirring well after each addition. Stir in pecans. Pour mixture into pie pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until set. Cool and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate, if desired.
ingredients: oreo cookie pie crust, coffee ice cream, hot fudge topping, whipped cream
name: chart house mud pie copycat

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp.
ingredients: gluten-free margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, natural-style peanut butter, baking soda, garbanzo flour, potato starch, tapioca flour
name: absolutely the best gluten free peanut butter cookies

steps: In a small bowl, combine apricots, preserves, cranberries, and almonds. Using a sharp knife, cut the brie horizontally creating two equals thick slices. Spread fruit mixture onto the cut center of brie. Top with other half of brie. Heat at 300 degrees until just warm.
ingredients: brie cheese, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, egg, dried apricots, apricot preserves, dried cranberries, sliced almonds
name: crescent wrapped baked brie with apricots cranberries alm

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, beat eggs until smooth. Add milk to eggs, then the lemon juice and zest. Mix until all ingredients are incorporated and mixture is smooth. Pour into pie shell. Bake at 350 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: plain nonfat yogurt, sugar-free lemon gelatin, fresh lemon rind, ground ginger
name: crustless zesty lemon pie

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. To prepare the sauce, combine
ingredients: broccoli, peanut oil, gingerroot, orange zest, orange juice, tabasco sauce, chives
name: stir fried broccoli with orange and ginger

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Cook broccoli in a pot of boiling water until soft enough to mash with a fork. Drain, then mash broccoli. Thoroughly mix together broccoli and remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Pour mixture into greased 8 x 8 baking pan. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, margarine, flour, water, chicken soup powder, mayonnaise, onion soup mix, eggs, pepper, pine nuts
name: broccoli kugel

steps: Heat oil for deep frying in a frying pan and drop large spoonfuls of the mixture as for small pancakes and fry until golden brown on both sides and cooked in the middle, about 5 minutes. Drain well on paper towels and keep hot until ready to serve. Eat immediately.
ingredients: potatoes, yellow onion, breadcrumbs, flour, salt, white pepper, garlic powder, baking powder, eggs
name: max benny s potato latkes

steps: Place brisket on top of vegetables. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: beef brisket, liquid smoke, celery salt, pepper, salt, onion, dark beer, worcestershire sauce, cornstarch, cold water
name: 4 b s a

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, garlic cloves, olive oil, onion, salt, pepper, sour cream, fresh dill
name: dilled zucchini

steps: Put eggs into 1 quart widemouthed jar. Bring vinegar to boil in non aluminum saucepan and let boil about 10 minutes. Add remaining ingredients to jar and ladle hot vinegar over eggs. Cap tightly. Let cool, then refrigerate at least 3 days before serving. Can be refrigerated up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cider vinegar, white sugar, onion, mustard powder, garlic powder, salt, yellow food coloring
name: mustard pickled eggs

steps: In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: potatoes, chicken breasts, onions, tomato ketchup, coriander leaves, black pepper, light soy sauce, cheddar cheese
name: stuffed baked potato with cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, yellow squash and onion with the butter and garlic. Add oregano and tomato sauce. Simmer for 5 - 7 minutes. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: green zucchini, yellow squash, onion, garlic cloves, italian seasoning, basil, parmesan cheese, margarine
name: italian summer squash

steps: Cream shortening and the sugars. Add egg and pineapple. Stir in vanilla. Sift flour, then measure it. To the flour, add salt, soda, and baking powder. Add dry mixture to the wet mixture. Drop by rounded tsps. Onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes at 350f, or until done.
ingredients: pineapple rings, maple syrup, brown sugar, ground cinnamon
name: maple grilled pineapple

steps: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, green pepper and the onions. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, vinegar, dill, salt and pepper. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: cucumbers, mayonnaise, milk, onion, salt and pepper, basil, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes
name: cool cucumber salad and sooooo easy

steps: In a microwave-safe bowl, combine oil, butter, onion, scallions and gingerroot and microwave at high power for 2 minutes, or until onion is softened. Stir in rice to coat with oil and butter, add broth and microwave, covered with plastic wrap at high for 5 minutes. Microwave at medium power for 12-15 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Uncover and stir in sesame seeds. Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes and stir in sesame seeds.
ingredients: bean sprouts, toasted sesame seeds, garlic, green onion, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, soy sauce, sesame oil
name: sesame bean sprouts

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, egg substitute, molasses, brown sugar, canola oil, lemon rind, plain fat-free yogurt
name: ella grasso s quick whole wheat bread

steps: Cook sausage and onion in large skillet until browned, stirring occasionally, drain if neccessary. Add potato slices, cheese sauce packet, pepper, water, milk and margarine or butter, mixing well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, stir frequently. Stir in veggies and simmer 10-12 minutes more until potatoes and veggies are tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: polish sausage, coleslaw mix, celery ribs, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic salt, rubbed sage, cooked pasta
name: old world sausage skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole sweet potatoes in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, vegetable oil, red onion, garlic cloves, turmeric, red chili pepper, coconut milk, baby spinach, curry paste
name: sweet potato and spinach curry

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, butter, vanilla, nutmegpreparation:In mixing bowl thoroughly stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg
ingredients: flour, self-rising flour, caster sugar, skim milk, vanilla essence, eggs
name: ange s perfect pancakes

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: lean ground turkey, zucchini, portabella mushrooms, egg, breadcrumbs, ranch dressing mix
name: turkey and zucchini meatloaf

steps: Put all ingredients in a stand mixer with a wire whip attachment and whip until butter is lighter in color and the volume has increased. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator. Or, dish it out on parchment paper and roll into a log. Wrap in plastic wrap and foil and it can be frozen for months. Best part is you can just unwrap and slice off what you need and rewrap it and stick it back in the freezer.
ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic, fresh ginger, ground turmeric, ground cardamom, cinnamon stick, clove, ground nutmeg
name: spiced butter niter kebbeh

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add brussels sprouts and 2 tablespoons water. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, green pepper, celery, onion, butter, salt, pepper
name: brussels sprouts with green pepper celery and onions

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden.
ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, milk, blueberries, baking powder, butter, eggs, vanilla
name: jordan marsh blueberry cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, margarine, mint extract, egg, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, mint chocolate chips
name: refreshing mint chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set.
ingredients: unsalted butter, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, salt, bittersweet chocolate
name: secret ingredient chocolate chunk cookies

steps: Mix in order given. Roll into small balls, about 48, and place on lightly greased cookie sheet or parchment paper. Bake at 300 for 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven to cool. Cookies should not be brown but a very light tan. Roll in powdered sugar while still warm. Roll in powdered sugar again when cool. Store in an air tight container.
ingredients: vegetable shortening, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, flour, baking powder, salt, coriander
name: coriander drop cookies

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix gently. Add broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: rotini pasta, light sour cream, parmesan cheese, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, skim milk, garlic, fresh broccoli florets, italian plum tomato, carrot, fresh basil
name: creamy broccoli pasta salad

steps: Combine all of the ingredients, except the coconut, together in a blender. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes. Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan. Let stand about 5 minutes then sprinkle with coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve warm or cool.
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, pecans, cream cheese, powdered sugar, cool whip, milk, instant coconut cream pudding mix, flaked coconut
name: coconut cream dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, margarine, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, cooked spaghetti
name: my chicken parmigiana

steps: Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, rosemary sprigs, ground cinnamon, tabasco sauce, lemon, juice and zest of, lamb steaks, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: lamb chops on the barbecue greek style

steps: Using a food processor, mix together all dry ingredients and pulse 4-5 times to blend. Add remaining ingredients and process until smooth. About 10 seconds. Do not overprocess. Pour onto a hot slightly greased griddle and cook until bubbles appear on the top side. Flip over and brown.
ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, egg, oil, buttermilk
name: buttermilk pancakes ihop style

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees
ingredients: soy sauce, garlic clove, dijon mustard, butter, salt, pepper, cracker crumb, gingerroot, chicken wings
name: sesame wings

steps: In a wide frying pan, cook your corn fritters until crisp. Drain corn drippings, but leave 3 tablespoons of corn drippings in the frying pan. Add zucchini, corn, bell pepper, onion, garlic, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper to the fry pan with the reserved corn drippings. Cook over medium heat stiriring often, until most of the vegetable liquid has evaporated and the vegetables are crisp tender. Add the cooked corn and heat through. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle grated cheese on top. Cooking time does include cooking the corn.
ingredients: corn, red onion, fresh parsley, zucchini, all-purpose flour, salt, fresh ground black pepper, soda water, vegetable oil
name: corn and zucchini fritters

steps: Drain artichoke hearts and chilies. Mix together in glass bowl or pan with mayo. Cover with cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve warm with crackers.
ingredients: artichokes, cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, diced green chilies, parmesan cheese
name: nerdmom s artichoke and green chili dip

steps: In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the broccoli
ingredients: broccoli florets, carrots, red bell pepper, small mushrooms, fresh cilantro, butter, salt and pepper
name: derby vegetables

steps: Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing.
ingredients: non-fat powdered milk, flour, sugar, yeast
name: sourdough feed and starter

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Place all ingredients in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Remove from
ingredients: hamburger, egg, onion, cheddar cheese, simply potatoes shredded hash browns
name: cheeseburger fry pie 5fix

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Combine the beans, sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, tortilla chips in a food processor. Pulse until chunky, but not pureed. The mixture should be moist, but not sticky. Add a little liquid if needed. Grease a baking sheet. Use your hands, a spoon, or an ice-cream scoop to make patties. Drop these onto the baking sheet. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the bottoms are nicely colored and lift easily from the baking sheet. Flip and bake for 15 more. You can also broil these burgers, or cook them in a hot cast iron skillet, or on the grill. They cook a lot faster using these other methods, so just be sure to keep an eye on them.
ingredients: black beans, sugar, ground cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, tortilla chips
name: copycat chili s black beans

steps: In a large pot of boiling water, cook pasta shells for 3 minutes to partly cook them. Drain, rinse with cold water and set pasta aside. In a separate skillet over moderately high heat, add wine, stock, dill and chicken to pot. Bring to a boil and then simmer, stirring occasionally until the liquid is reduced by half again and the sauce has thickened. Add cream and lemon juice to the chicken and bring the liquid back to a boil. Add parmesan to the pasta and salt & pepper if desired. Stir to mix thoroughly and serve immediately.
ingredients: broccoli floret, dry pasta, boneless skinless chicken breast, lemon, juice of, olive oil, garlic, black pepper
name: xakk s lemon broccoli pasta with chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. In a large mixing bowl, mix the sweet sour carrot compote with cumin. Spread this mixture evenly in a baking dish. Pour the crushed tomatoes and any juices over the sweet sour carrot compote. Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes. After this time, reduce oven temperature to 180c, remove foil and bake an additional 30 minutes until the sweet sour carrot compote has thickened and the sauce has thickened.
ingredients: carrots, onion, cider vinegar, honey, cumin seed, turmeric, raisins
name: sweet sour carrot compote with cumin

steps: Mix all together in a food processor and process until smooth. Serve immediately or cover and chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
ingredients: water, long grain white rice, bay leaves, linguica sausage, tomato paste, lima beans, onion, garlic, white pepper, olive oil
name: jagacida portuguese jag

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the potatoes into a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper, hot sauce, sweet paprika, salt
name: werewolves of lundon

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour 10-inch bundt pan. Combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil, and one-cup juice. Beat at medium speed with electric mixer for 2 minutes. Add mandarin oranges in the last 30 seconds. Pour in pan. Bake 38 to 43 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Invert onto plate. Dust with powdered sugar when completely cooled.
ingredients: orange cake mix, oil, apricot nectar, vanilla butternut flavoring, lemon extract, eggs, powdered sugar, lemon juice
name: orange apricot nectar cake

steps: Toast bread in toaster to desired level. Put butter on one slice and mayo on the other. Put cheese in between slices of bread. Wrap a moist papertowel around sandwich and put in microwave for 20 sec. Enjoy.
ingredients: bread, cottage cheese, tomatoes, pepper
name: cottage cheese and tomato on toast

steps: In large saucepan heat olive oil and saute garlic. Add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Add pasta and cook until desired tenderness. Add seasonings. Ladle into bowls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Ladle into bowls and
ingredients: fresh spinach, beef broth, butter, flour, salt, pepper, nutmeg, eggs
name: norwegian spinach soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except mayonnaise, chipotle chile in adobo, cheddar cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, salsapreparation:Preheat oven to 400. Mix
ingredients: mayonnaise, chipotle chile in adobo, cheddar cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, salsa
name: tex mex chicken

steps: Place dumplings in slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours. Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving. Serve with rice, couscous, or over toast as a sos meal.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, chicken broth, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, pepper, garlic salt, pierogi, butter, milk
name: polish chicken and dumplings

steps: Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, potatoes, streaky bacon, whipping cream, nutmeg, parmesan cheese, butter, onion
name: swiss macaroni cheese

steps: In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe.
ingredients: long grain white rice, orange juice, water, salt, butter, sliced almonds, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, orange marmalade, scallions
name: chicken and rice l orange

steps: Combine chicken, green onion, parsley, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, pita breads. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: cooked chicken, green onion, parsley, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, pita breads
name: situ s chicken salad

steps: Mix all marinade ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place in the fridge for a minimum of 24 hours. When ready to grill, remove from fridge and save marinade for basting if desired. Turn the grill to high heat. Sear both sides for about 5 minutes on each side. Reduce grill temperature to medium heat and finish cooking the lamb. You may baste the lamb with the leftover marinade if desired.
ingredients: leg of lamb, olive oil, lemon juice, onion, garlic cloves, worcestershire sauce, ground pepper, dried thyme
name: herb marinated lamb

steps: Combine cabbage and onions. Refrigerate until ready to toss. Brown noodles, almonds and sesame seeds lightly in butter. Set aside. Bring to a boil in a pan the vinegar, oil, sugar and soy sauce, just enough to dissolve the sugar. Cool dressing completely. Combine all ingredients and toss just before serving.
ingredients: napa cabbage, green onion, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, white wine vinegar, canola oil, soy sauce, sugar
name: napa cabbage salad

steps: Preheat oven to 325f butter a 9x13-inch baking pan. Coarsely chop chocolate and place in a large microwave-safe bowl along with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, then stir until chocolate is melted. Let mixture cool to room temperature. Stir in sugar, then eggs and vanilla. Gradually stir in flour, then nuts and chocolate chips, if using. Spread mixture in pan. Bake in center of oven for 30 minutes or until center is set. In heavy saucepan, over medium heat, melt chips and margarine with milk and vanilla. Spread evenly over brownie layer. Cool. Chill 2 hours or until topping is firm. Cut into bars. Store at room temperature.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, salt, eggs, vanilla, flour, walnuts
name: thick and chewy fudge brownies

steps: Cook potatoes in a large pot of salted boiling water until very tender about 15 minutes. Drain potatoes and return to pot. Add cheese and milk mash until smooth adding more milk if necessary. Stir in rosemary. Salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: red potatoes, green onions, basil, oil, salt, pepper, blue cheese
name: bleu cheese potatoes

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute the onions until translucent. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes
ingredients: yellow squash, red onion, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, butter, salt, black pepper
name: poohrona s squash n onions

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: ripe olives, romano cheese, parmesan cheese, anchovy fillets, capers, lemon juice, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil
name: garlic tapenade from enon valley garlic

steps: Mix everything and coat both sides of pork. Lay the coated strips on a parchment covered sheet pan with sides. This worked for me and avoided that messy cleanup. Let marinade room at temp for half an hour. Bake in a 275 oven for about 90 min, turning once. Remove the meat, pour off any grease, put a flat rack on the pan, return meat laying now on the rack. Run the oven up to 450f bake for about 10 minutes more to crisp.
ingredients: country-style pork ribs, cream of mushroom soup, water, soy sauce, honey, instant bouillon granules, garlic, bay leaves, salt, pepper
name: peteys country syle ribs

steps: Brown sausage in skillet and drain well. Grease 13 x 9 inch casserole dish. Line dish with bread, then top with cheese and sausage. In bowl, combine eggs, milk, and seasonings. Beat well and pour into casserole. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, bake casserole at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: bulk sausage, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, white bread, cheddar cheese
name: alabama egg and sausage souffle

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: amaretto flavored coffee creamer, white rice, eggs, raisins, white sugar, ground nutmeg, cinnamon
name: amaretto cream baked rice pudding

steps: In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: toasted oat cereal, crispy rice cereal, dry roasted peanuts, candy-coated chocolates, light corn syrup, white sugar, creamy peanut butter, vanilla extract
name: monkey munch treat from jon kate 8

steps: Beat together eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese, spring onion, butter
ingredients: eggs, soymilk, ham, spring onion, butter, cheddar cheese
name: ham cheese omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place peach cobbler in 9x12 baking dish with the margarine. Place in oven. Meanwhile, in small bowl, mix sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt. Pour over melted margarine and peaches. Do not stir. Place back in 350 degree oven and bake 1 hour or until golden brown.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, buttermilk, baking soda, baking powder, flour, vanilla, pie filling
name: john s birthday cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Add salt to milk. Cut fillets into serving pieces, dip into milk, then in the bread crumbs, cheese and thyme. Arrange fish in well-greased dish and pour butter over evenly. Bake on top rack 12 minutes. Garnish with paprika. Serve with lemon slices.
ingredients: haddock fillet, olive oil, garlic, italian dressing, seasoning salt
name: world s easiest haddock

steps: In a large saucepan, saute the carrots, onion and celery in butter til tender. Stir in flour til blended. Gradually add broth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or til thickened. Stir in chicken, rice, cream and pepper. Heat through.
ingredients: chicken breasts, long grain and wild rice blend, water, dry onion soup mix, butter
name: chicken wild rice

steps: Combine cream cheese, meat, pineapple jam, ritz crackers, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple jam, pineapple
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, meat, pineapple jam, ritz crackers
name: pineapple cheese and ham dip

steps: Mix vinegar, water, white vinegar, dill seed, cucumbers, onion, sugar, dill seed, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers, cucumbers
ingredients: white vinegar, water, kosher salt, garlic cloves, dill flowers, cucumbers
name: nana mae s garlic dill pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through.
ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, frozen vegetables, cheddar cheese, milk, margarine, garlic powder, salt, pepper, meat
name: cheater s pasta

steps: Heat oven to 180 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add pears, sugar, and 4 tbsp water. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until pears are just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the raspberry and pear crumble. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: pears, frozen raspberries, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, quick-cooking rolled oats, butter
name: raspberry and pear crumble

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, dried sage, fresh ground black pepper, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, ground cloves, fresh thyme, egg yolk, ground lean pork
name: renal friendly homemade sausage patties

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Grease and flour bundt pan. Combine butter and shortening in mixer bowl. Add eggs and blend well. Add other ingredients. Beat on medium speed for 10 minutes. Pour into pan. Bake 70 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan 10 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, almond extract, water, flour, ground almonds, baking powder, salt
name: almond pound cake

steps: Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes.
ingredients: old-fashioned oatmeal, peanut butter, vanilla, brown sugar, milk, butter
name: peanut butter oatmeal no bake cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place the chicken skin-side-up in a small roasting tin. Mix together the garlic, thyme and butter and dot over the chicken. Scatter around the red onions and pancetta and drizzle with oil. Roast for 20 minutes until the chicken has cooked through and the onions are softened. Divide the salad between 4 plates and top with the red onions, pancetta and chicken.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, smoked bacon, brown button mushrooms, chicken thighs, double cream, fresh thyme, fresh ground black pepper
name: bone in chicken with bacon thyme

steps: Heat oil in a deep saucepan, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden brown, about 2 minutes on each side. Remove the chicken and add the onions and garlic and cook for 10 to 15 minutes, until chile sauce has completely infused the mixture and the chicken is cooked through. Add the lemon juice and cook another 10 minutes, to allow flavors to meld. Slice breasts to serve.
ingredients: hoisin sauce, apricot jam, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, fresh cilantro, green onion, lemon, rind of
name: hoisin chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all of the ingredients together & pour over pretzels. Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. Remove from oven & stir well to make sure the pretzels are evenly coated. Bake for an additional 10 minutes. Remove & serve.
ingredients: instant yeast, brown sugar, unbleached flour, salt, milk
name: delicious german pretzels

steps: Combine butter, cereal, maple syrup, peach slices, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar, baking powder, milk, sugar
ingredients: butter, cereal, maple syrup, peach slices, milk
name: hot cold cereal bake

steps: Dissolve jell-o in water. Add lemon zest, honey, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon z
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, low-fat vanilla yogurt, honey, lemon zest, fresh blueberries
name: fresh blueberries with lemon cream

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: deep dish pie shell, strawberry, sugar, cornstarch, water, butter, whipping cream
name: fresh strawberry pie ala rose

steps: In large saucepan, combine all ingredients except garnish. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered 20 minutes to blend flavors. Remove spices. Serve hot with cinnamon sticks and sliced apples if desired.
ingredients: spiced rum, dark rum, sparkling apple cider, ground cinnamon, sugar, lemon juice
name: spicy sparkling cider cocktail

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve.
ingredients: bulk italian sausage, celery ribs, onion, green pepper, water, chicken noodle soup mix, condensed cream of chicken soup, long grain rice, dry breadcrumbs, butter
name: baked rice with sausage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, flour, oatmeal, baking soda
name: aggression cookies

steps: In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in blueberries until coated with flour. Put eggs in 4 cup glas measuring cup and add enough milk to measure 2 cups. Add oil and whisk until blended. Make well in center of flour mixture and pour milk mixture. With large spatula, gently fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients just until moistened. Spoon into greased muffin pan. 400f for 30 minutes or until tops are firm to the touch.
ingredients: blueberries, flour, eggs, salt, milk, butter
name: moosbeerpascherln blueberry blini

steps: Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, until the sauce is slightly thickened. During this, you also want to start cooking the pasta. Stir in parsley, milk, and vodka cook until heated through, about 1 minute. Place cooked penne in large serving bowl, add tomato mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: penne pasta, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, crushed tomatoes, salt, vodka, heavy whipping cream, fresh parsley, sweet italian sausage
name: penne with spicy vodka tomato cream sauce

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over low heat. Add the garlic, pine nuts and soaked raisins and cook till the nuts and the garlic are light golden, 3-5 minutes. Increase the heat to medium add the chopped spinach and cook for about 1 minute, stirring to combine evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste, transfer to serving bowl.
ingredients: broccoli florets, bacon, pine nuts, fresh chives
name: broccoli with bacon and pine nuts

steps: Heat contact grill for 5 minutes. Wash chops and pat dry. In a small container, thoroughly mix the seasonings together. Drizzle half the oil over the chops, sprinkle with half the seasoning mix. Turn chops over and repeat with oil and remaining seasoning mix. Place on heated grill and cook until meat thermometer inserted in center reads 160 degrees. Serve immediately.
ingredients: pork chops, margarine, fresh parsley, flour, curry powder, pepper, beef bouillon granules, milk, dry white wine, apple
name: quick curried pork chops

steps: Combine all ingredients except ice cream. Blend well. Add ice cream. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, chocolate chips, milk, vanilla, mini marshmallows, coconut
name: snowballs

steps: Combine garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic, garlic
ingredients: salami, garlic cloves, pizza dough, egg, coarse salt, spicy brown mustard
name: salami garlic knots

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: reduced-sugar chocolate cake mix, chunky peanut butter, non-fat vanilla yogurt, eggs, water
name: schonut cake cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onions width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: flour, egg, seasoning, onions, breadcrumbs
name: oven onion rings

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, buttermilk, vegetable oil, banana, white sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nutspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Stir the eggs, buttermilk, vegetable oil, banana, white sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nuts
ingredients: eggs, buttermilk, vegetable oil, banana, white sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nuts
name: moist banana bread

steps: Mix all ingredients together, except for 2 handfuls of cheese. Pour into a greased casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or so. Recipe can easily be doubled, tripled, etc., but, if using a deep dish, allow extra baking time.
ingredients: buttermilk, yellow cornmeal, salt, pepper, chili powder, onion powder, garlic powder, chicken drumsticks
name: spicy cornbread chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except corn tortillas, oil, green onions, eggs, salt, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, fresh cilantro. Bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.
ingredients: corn tortillas, oil, green onions, eggs, salt, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, fresh cilantro
name: betty crocker s tex mex scrambled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Place bread on pan and put into oven for approximately 6 minutes leave oven on. Remove from oven and let bread cool slightly. Then add to food processor along with spices ground until desired consistantcy. Return crumbs to oven, spreading evenly, for approximately 5-6 minutes. Or until lightly toasted. Remove from oven and let cool. Add parmesan cheese and stir until evenly mixed.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, paprika, salt, margarine, whole wheat pita bread
name: italian pita crisps

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and green chiles and saute until fragrant. Add the kale and saute for 15-20 minutes or until tender, stirring constantly to prevent the greens from scorching. Add the tomatoes and green chiles and salt and pepper to taste, stirring everything together and cooking until heated through--about 1-2 minutes. Serve over rice or combine with blackeyed peas or refried beans and rice to make a tasty and hearty filling for vegetarian wraps.
ingredients: lime juice, sugar, tomatoes, cucumber, green onions, green chili, coriander, of fresh mint, salt
name: indian tomato kachambur

steps: In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce. Cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, rice, tomato sauce, hot water, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, sugar
name: spanish rice and hamburger

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: white bread, butter, garlic powder, italian seasoning, salt
name: cheater s garlic bread

steps: In a bowl, combine sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, milk, nutmeg, vanilla, salt, frozen pie crusts. Pour into pie shell. Cover edges of pastry loosely with foil. Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer or until crust is golden brown and a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, milk, nutmeg, vanilla, salt, frozen pie crusts
name: my mama s sweet potato pie

steps: Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Have ungreased cookie sheets ready. Beat butter, sugar and vanilla together until fluffy. Dissolve coffee in hot water and stir into butter mixture. Sift flour, cocoa and salt into mixture and add nuts. Stir to blend well. Shape into one-inch balls and put on cookie sheets. Bake 15 minutes or until set. Roll in icing sugar while warm. Let cool and roll in icing sugar again before storing in a container with a tight lid.
ingredients: butter, icing sugar, all-purpose flour, salt, amaretto liqueur
name: amaretto snowballs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: butter, green onions, eggs, milk, pepper, brie cheese, bacon, pecans
name: brie bacon omelet treasure trove 10

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, cilantro, chipotle chiles and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent. Add garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent. Add cilantro and cook, stirring occasionally, until cilantro is translucent. Add cilantro and cook, stirring occasionally, until c
ingredients: flank steak, salt and pepper, orange, juice of, garlic, cilantro leaf, chipotle chiles in adobo, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground cumin, ground coriander
name: south american flank steak

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: vegetable oil, basmati rice, cinnamon stick, cloves, cardamom pods, cumin seed, chicken stock
name: simple pilaf

steps: Beat sugar, butter, vanilla and eggs in large bowl, low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl, then at high speed for 5 minutes, scrape occasionally. In separate bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt. Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture alternately with milk on low speed. Spread into pan. Bake in 2 loaf pans for approx 55 minutes at 350 degrees.
ingredients: sugar, self rising flour, eggs, whipping cream, vanilla, oil
name: kentucky pound cake

steps: In a heavy-bottomed pot over medium, fry the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon and drain on paper towels. Saute the onion and garlic in the bacon grease over low heat until soft, about 3 minutes. Add the brussels sprouts and stir them around so that they are coated with the bacon grease. Add the broth and cook, covered, over low heat until the sprouts are easily pierced with a fork, about 12-15 minutes. Stir in the butter just before serving. Garnish each serving with bacon bits.
ingredients: bacon, brussels sprouts, salt, pepper, apple, red wine vinegar
name: brussels sprouts with bacon and apple

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: spice cake mix, vanilla instant pudding mix, sour cream, eggs, corn oil, sugar, ground cinnamon, pecans
name: paula deen s spicy cinnamon cake

steps: Combine brandy, merlot, orange juice, pineapple juice, orange, lemon slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime slice, lime
ingredients: brandy, merlot, orange juice, pineapple juice, orange, lemon, lime
name: sooz s refreshing summer sangria

steps: Combine the coleslaw mix, sugar, salt, pepper, milk, mayonnaise, buttermilk, white vinegar, lemon juice in a large saucepan. Add the coleslaw mix, sugar, salt, pepper, milk, mayonnaise, buttermilk, white vinegar, lemon juice in a large saucepan. Add the coleslaw mix, sugar,
ingredients: coleslaw mix, sugar, salt, pepper, milk, mayonnaise, buttermilk, white vinegar, lemon juice
name: kfc s coleslaw

steps: In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: butter, carrot, onion, flour, paprika, dry mustard, chicken bouillon cubes, milk, water, cheddar cheese
name: canadian cheddar cheese soup

steps: In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese, sour cream, and worcestershire sauce until creamy. Fold in parmesan cheese and chicken. Pour into pie plate sprayed with pam. Liberally sprinkle more parmesan on top. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. Serve hot with crackers.
ingredients: cream cheese, ranch dressing mix, chicken, barbecue sauce
name: bbq chicken ranch dip

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients and simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes until berries pop, stirring often. Reduce heat to medium low, stir in marmalade and cook for 5 more minutes. Set aside to cool, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a glass bowl and refrigerate until chilled. Will keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, water, orange zest, cointreau liqueur
name: cranberry sauce with orange liqueur

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: egg, splenda sugar substitute, cinnamon, plain fat-free yogurt, baking powder, ground flax seeds
name: south beach muffin

steps: In a large saucepan, combine butter, sugar and flour until crumbly. Add apples and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and simmer
ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, apples, brown sugar, butter, rice krispies, cinnamon
name: apple krispies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook pineapple in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the pineapple grease. Add the pineapple to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the pineapple-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, crushed pineapple, lemon juice, cheddar cheese, white bread
name: scalloped pineapple casserole

steps: Heat butter, sugar and water in a 3 quart sauce-pan to a rolling boil. When mix reaches 305 degrees pour onto a greased large cookie sheet. Sprinkle chocolate chips over the candy. As chocolate melts spread with a butter knife. Spread nuts evenly over the pan, shaking lightly until all nuts stick. Cool until hard. Break into pieces. Enjoy.
ingredients: butter, almonds, sugar, water, milk chocolate candy bars
name: almond roca english toffee

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy skillet over medium high heat. Saute shrimp for 2 minutes or just until opaque. Reduce heat and add garlic and salt. Saute for 1 minute until garlic is soft. Remove from heat and toss with orange zest. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, medium shrimp, fresh lemon juice, dry sherry, paprika, fresh flat-leaf parsley
name: spanish garlic shrimp taverna

steps: In a large bowl, combine the turkey, rice, soy sauce, onions, garlic, pepper, water, onion soup mix, vegetables, mayonnaise. Form the meat into 6 patties. Lightly brush a grill pan or skillet with the sesame oil and place over medium-high heat. Add the patties and fry until golden, about 4 minutes. Turn and cook until the other side is golden and the turkey is cooked through, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a bun. Serve immediately.
ingredients: ground turkey, rice, soy sauce, onions, garlic, pepper, water, onion soup mix, vegetables
name: oriental rice hamburger helper

steps: Fry bacon until crisp. Add onion and stir fry for 1 minute. Add mustard and stir fry for 1 minute. Gently separate grains of rice with fork so mixture is fluffy. Add mustard and stir
ingredients: ground beef, water, barbecue sauce, prepared mustard, dried onion flakes, pepper, instant rice, cheddar cheese, dill pickle, bacon
name: angie s bacon cheeseburger rice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh orange juice, chicken stock, rosemary, light brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper
name: chicken in balsamic orange rosemary sauce

steps: Brown ground beef. Stir in onion and green pepper. Cook on medium heat until cabbage is tender. Add the meat mixture to the cabbage and stir well. Stir in the cheese soup until well blended. Cover and cook over low hear for at least 1 hour. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: cabbage, onion, oil, ground beef, salt and pepper, bay leaf, carrots
name: ground beef with cabbage

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, artichoke hearts, tortillas, cooked brown rice, smoked gouda cheese, fat free sour cream, salsa. Stir frequently over medium heat until mixture is warm throughout. Remove from heat before stirring in cheese, sour cream, and cilantro. Serve warm.
ingredients: onion, bell pepper, artichoke hearts, tortillas, cooked brown rice, smoked gouda cheese, fat free sour cream, salsa
name: artichoke fajitas

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and bell pepper. Saut 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in black pepper. Divide onion mixture and turkey evenly among bottom halves of rolls. Top each serving with 1 cheese slice. Cover with top halves of rolls. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
ingredients: country bread, oven-roasted turkey breast, cheese, butter, strawberry preserves
name: sweet and spicy turkey sandwich

steps: Mix and make a soft but not sticky dough. Roll and cut into oblong pieces. Make a cut in the centre. Take an end and pull through the middle. Fry in hot oil until golden brown. Let cool. Sprinkle with icing sugar. Eat with watermelon.
ingredients: vanilla, oil, eggs, sugar, salt, baking powder, flour, poppy seed, egg, milk
name: koulourakia authentic

steps: Preheat oven to 400f, line a roasting pan with parchment. Lay fish fillets in a single layer on the bottom of the dish, then top with scallops and shrimp. Pour the white wine and lemon juice overtop of the seafood. In a bowl, toss butter, cracker crumbs, garlic powder, black pepper and lemon zest. Sprinkle over the seafood. Bake 15 minutes, then turn the broiler to hi and broil 2 minutes, until browned.
ingredients: haddock fillets, plain breadcrumbs, lemon, juice of, light butter, pam cooking spray, salt, pepper, garlic powder, white wine
name: baked haddock or scallops cod

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Thaw spinch according to package directions. Drain well. Chop up artichoke hearts. Add all ingredients in a medium sized casserole dish. Bake in middle oven rack for 25 to 30 minutes, or until slightly golden and bubbly. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, garlic cloves, feta cheese, artichoke hearts, italian cheese blend, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt and pepper
name: spinach artichoke and feta dip

steps: In a medium-size pot, bring water to a boil. Stir in the spices, cover, and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Stir in the pre-brewed coffee. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, heat milk until almost boiling. Strain the coffee through a fine mesh strainer covered with cheesecloth into the milk. Add sweetener, stir, and serve in mugs.
ingredients: water, whole cloves, green cardamom pods, black peppercorns, cinnamon sticks, gingerroot, black tea, milk
name: yogi bhajan s yogi tea

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place chicken in glass baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast halves, dijon mustard, honey, black pepper, green onions, breadcrumbs
name: chicken with dijon

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, water, vegetable oil, white vinegar, vanilla
name: dairy free egg free chocolate cake

steps: Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine brown sugar, shortening, sour milk, baking soda, baking powder, eggs, salt, vanilla, flour. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: brown sugar, shortening, sour milk, baking soda, baking powder, eggs, salt, vanilla, flour
name: xmas cookies

steps: Heat milk and sugar to rolling boil, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Add chocolate, stirring until melted. Beat over heat until smooth. Remove from heat. Blend in butter, vanilla, and salt.
ingredients: sugar, butter, yogurt, fruit juice concentrate, coconut cream
name: passionfruit fudge

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add rice. Lightly saute it stirring frequently about 3 to 5 minutes. In a large bowl combine rice with all the other ingredients except for the rice, toss in the peanut sauce till coated. Season with salt and pepper if you wish. Each person takes a papaya leaf or a portion of one, spoons the misture in it and then wrap like a cabbage roll and eat and enjoy.
ingredients: coconut milk, sugar, vanilla bean, papaya, olive oil, chicken breasts, onion, salt and pepper, rice
name: papaya chicken with vanilla scented coconut milk

steps: Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese.
