ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips
name: tom s chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Sprinkle bacon and cheese into the pie shell. Beat eggs until frothy. Add cream and dressing mix, mixing well. Pour into pie shell covering the cheese. Bake 20 minutes at 400. Reduce heat to 350 and bake 15-20 minutes until center in set. Cool 10 minutes before cutting.
ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, bacon, onions, green peppers, sliced mushrooms, swiss cheese, eggs, half-and-half, dry mustard, lemon pepper
name: rancher s quiche

steps: In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f.
ingredients: butter, crabmeat, salt and pepper, cream, egg yolks, cheese, lemon wedge
name: shreveport crabmeat au gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except black beans, tomato sauce, hot salsa, brown sugar, catsup, smoked sausage. Cover and bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden brown. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.
ingredients: black beans, tomato sauce, hot salsa, brown sugar, catsup, smoked sausage
name: tex mex black bean and smoked sausage casserole

steps: Place broccoli in a steamer basket and set in a saucepan over 1 inch of boiling water. Cover and steam just until tender, approx. 5 minutes. To prepare the sauce, combine the orange juice, honey and ginger in a small saucepan and bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch mixture and return to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook the sauce until thickened, about 1 minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Stir in the lemon juice and the sesame oil. Arrange the broccoli in a serving bowl. Top with the sauce, sprinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: fresh broccoli florets, rice vinegar, honey, sesame oil, soy sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, sesame seeds
name: korean broccoli

steps: Place all ingredients except for pork shoulder in a large saucepan. Add 1/2 cup pineapple juice and 1/2 cup water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Serve with rice.
ingredients: pork shoulder, chunk pineapple, rice, pineapple juice, salt and pepper
name: pork steak and pineapple

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, fresh parsley, green onions, dried dill
name: herb monkey bread

steps: Cook broiled saba with green onion sauce. Add mackerel, salt, green onions, fresh ginger, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugarpreparation:Cook broiled saba with green onion sauce. Add mackerel, salt, green onions, fresh ginger, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugarpreparation:Cook broiled saba with green onion
ingredients: mackerel, salt, green onions, fresh ginger, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugar
name: izakaya sakura broiled saba with green onion sauce

steps: Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to the bite, stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Meanwhile, blend the sun-dried tomatoes and their oil, garlic, salt and pepper, to taste, and basil in a food processor and blend until the tomatoes are finely chopped. Transfer the tomato mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the parmesan. Add the pasta to the pesto and toss to coat, adding enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season the pasta, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: penne pasta, large shrimp, olive oil, roasted red peppers, yellow bell peppers, garlic, pesto sauce, half-and-half cream, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: shrimp roasted pepper penne with pesto cream

steps: In large bowl, combine nectarine slices, berries, sugar, cornstarch and vanilla. Stir until fruit is coated. Pour filling into one of the pie shells and invert the second pie shell over it. Crimp edges and press with fork to seal. Cut holes in top crust so steam can escape. Place a baking sheet on lower rack of oven to catch juices. Set pie on middle rack. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Brush top crust with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar. Bake 15 minutes longer.
ingredients: unbaked pie shell, nectarines, boiling water, sugar, flour, cinnamon, almond extract, heavy cream, salt
name: nectarine pie

steps: Mix dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Cut in butter, and mix with fork until it resembles coarse crumbs. Add raisins and make sure they are evenly dispersed. Add honey and yogurt while mixing. Dish out a spoonful into muffin tray and bake at approximately 425 f degrees for about 15-20 minutes or until golden brown on the top.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, baking powder, white sugar, salt, margarine, buttermilk, raisins
name: best buttermilk raisin scones

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: canned pink salmon, green pepper, onion, dill relish, italian breadcrumbs, egg, black pepper, olive oil
name: fried dilly salmon patties

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist.
ingredients: eggs, cheese, salt and pepper, butter
name: cheese omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a large mixing bowl, combine applesauce, eggs, honey, carrot, pumpkin, whole wheat self-rising flour, cinnamon, mixed spice. Combine dry ingredients. Add to mixing bowl and stir just until moistened. Spoon into 12 well-greased muffin cups. Combine streusel ingredients. Sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 400f for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: applesauce, eggs, honey, carrot, pumpkin, whole wheat self-rising flour, cinnamon, mixed spice
name: pumpkin carrot and spice loaf

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Grease a 9 x 13 pan. Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs, sour cream and vanilla. Mix together flour, baking powder and salt. Add to butter mixture. Spread half the batter in the prepared pan. Sprinkle this with half the filling. Add the rest of the batter and sprinkle with the remaining filling. Bake 35 - 40 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, sour cream, almond flavoring, ground cardamom, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon
name: kermakakku finnish sour cream cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt in separate bowl. Pour wet mixture into dry mixture and combine. Bake for 1 hour depending on size of loaf pan.
ingredients: water, salt, yellow cornmeal, flour, skim milk, banana, coconut extract, cinnamon, equal sugar substitute
name: cornmeal banana porridge

steps: Mix marinade ingredients well in a large ziploc bag. Add chicken thighs and coat. Squeeze out as much air as possible and marinate for 2-3 hours in the fridge. Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat and remove thighs from marinade. Discard marinade. Grill thighs for approximately 7-8 minutes per side or until cooked through.
ingredients: grape jelly, ketchup, onion, white vinegar, dry mustard, skinless chicken thighs
name: delectable chicken thighs with grape jelly sauce

steps: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, mustard seeds, english cucumbers, salt & freshly ground black pepper, red onion, plain yogurt, lemon, garlic clove, fresh dillpour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: mustard seeds, english cucumbers, salt & freshly ground black pepper, red onion, plain yogurt, lemon, garlic clove, fresh dill
name: cucumber raita salad

steps: Cook chicken in fat. Add onions and celery and cook 10 minutes. Gently mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer or place in a buttered 2 qt casserole. Simmer 30 minutes, or bake at 350f for 45.
ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, onions, paprika, caraway seed, button mushrooms, chopped tomatoes, chicken stock, parsley
name: chicken goulash

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, sweet onion, egg, black olives, cheddar cheese, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, salt and pepper. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for 2 - 24hours. If a little dry just before serving add small amount of buttermilk.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, sweet onion, egg, black olives, cheddar cheese, bacon bits, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, salt and pepper
name: macaroni cheese salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese, egg whites, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, bacon bits, onion, garlic powder, pepper, salt, worcestershire saucepreparation:Scramble the egg whites with a little pam. Remove. Dice onion and saute with with a little pam till golden brown. Add the hash browns, cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring once. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder and worcestershire if using. Add the scrambled egg white, cheese and bacon. Divide filling evenly between the tortillas. Roll up and place seam size down in an empty pan and heat on medium till a little brown. Flip over and brown the other side of the tortilla.
ingredients: 8-inch flour tortillas, semi-sweet chocolate chips, fresh raspberry, butter, sugar, cinnamon
name: grilled chocolate raspberry burritos

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside white halves on a plate and transfer yolks to a medium mixing bowl. Mash yolks with mayonnaise, sour cream, tomato paste, shallots, mustard, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper to taste. Spoon filling into egg halves evenly, mounding slightly. Store refrigerated in an airtight container. If you want, for a dinner party and a fancier presentation, use a pasty bag fitted with a star.
ingredients: hard-cooked eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, salt-free cajun seasoning, tabasco sauce, salt, black pepper, fresh italian parsley
name: zydeco ya ya deviled eggs

steps: In a large plastic bag, mix honey, lime juice, chili powder, soy sauce, chicken wings. Add wings. Seal bag and mix to coat. Chill, turning occasionally, at least 1 hour or up to a day. Lift out wings and place in a single layer on racks in 2 broiler pans, each about 10 by 15 inches. Bake in a 450f oven for 15 minutes. Turn the pieces over and continue baking for another 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: chicken wings, lime juice, vegetable oil, cilantro, garlic clove, cumin, salt, oregano, red pepper flakes
name: fajita chicken wings

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Stir together oil & garlic, then using a pastry brush, brush one side of each bread slice with the oil mixture. Place bread slices on a baking sheet & bake about 10 minutes or until tops of bread slices are golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium bowl, toss together eggs, apple, walnuts & salad dressing. Top each toasted bread slice with some of the egg mixture, then serve immediately.
ingredients: garlic clove, bread, cranberry sauce, onion juice, blue cheese
name: thank goodness it s over bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place all ingredients together in kitchenaid mixing bowl. Mix together with kitchenaid until all ingredients are thoroughly mixed. Place in 9 x 9 inch butter-greased glass baking dish. Bake at 350 degrees f for 45 minutes.
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, eggs, milk, hot dogs
name: corndog casserole

steps: In crock pot, combine kielbasa, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, dried red kidney beans, chicken broth, red potatoes, fresh kale, red wine vinegar, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh ground black pepper, fresh
ingredients: kielbasa, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, dried red kidney beans, chicken broth, red potatoes, fresh kale, red wine vinegar, fresh ground black pepper
name: christmas soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans. Sift together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, and pumpkin pie spice. Set aside. In a large bowl, beat together sugar, oil, eggs, and pumpkin. Stir in flour mixture alternately with water. Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans. Bake in the preheated oven for 60 to 70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. For best flavor, store wrapped in plastic wrap at room temperature for a full day before serving.
ingredients: potato, orange juice concentrate, water, orange marmalade, vegetable oil, egg, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt
name: maine potato bread

steps: Combine vanilla, cocoa, light karo syrup and rum in a large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour batter into prepared cups. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: vanilla wafers, powdered sugar, cocoa, light karo syrup, rum, nuts
name: lu s rum or bourbon balls

steps: Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip.
ingredients: sugar-free raspberry gelatin, hot water, whole berry cranberry sauce, pecans, sour cream
name: diabetic cranberry layer salad

steps: Mix ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Serve.
ingredients: fat-free sweetened condensed milk, skim milk, fat-free evaporated milk, vanilla extract, strawberry syrup, tequila
name: tequila rose copycat

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: brown sugar, butter, flour, walnuts
name: crushed walnut icebox cookies

steps: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter until smooth. Add in the sugars. Beat on low for 2 minutes. Add in the milk, syrup, and vanilla. Beat 3-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. Use immediately or store, covered, at room temperature for up to 2 days. Reportedly, the icing tastes better if made the day before because the brown sugar gives the icing a slightly grainy texture that improves if allowed to set overnight.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, salt, light corn syrup, evaporated milk, vanilla
name: easy homemade caramels

steps: Mix strawberries, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon juice, vanilla essence, cream cheese, lemon zest, powdered sugar, strawberry ice cream, lemon
ingredients: frozen strawberries, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar
name: berry good dip

steps: Place potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain and cool slightly. While potatoes are cooking, combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Add potatoes and toss to coat. Season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper.
ingredients: new potatoes, bacon, green pepper, onion, hard-boiled eggs, miracle whip, lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: country bacon potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Set aside half of the cheese. Mix the remaining cheese with the remainder of the ingredients. Spread mixture into an 8x8 or 9x9 baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: butter, flour, low-fat milk, prepared horseradish, hominy, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: baked hominy with cheese

steps: Place the potatoes in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the potatoes into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature.
ingredients: potatoes, water, salt, vegetable oil, cayenne, cumin, fresh lemon juice, ground caraway
name: salatit batata tunisian potato salad

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork tenderloin, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, salt, paprika, brown sugar, lemon juice, onion, water, pork, pimento stuffed olive. Add pork, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. In a large bowl
ingredients: vegetable oil, flour, salt, paprika, brown sugar, lemon juice, onion, water, pork, pimento stuffed olive
name: leftover pork in olive sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place toast on baking sheet. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until shrimp is golden brown. To finish cooking, place toast under broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until shrimp is golden brown. To finish cooking, place toast under
ingredients: white bread, butter, cooked shrimp, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh dill, fish roe, lemon
name: toast with shrimp roe toast skagen

steps: In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries.
ingredients: maraschino cherries, eggs, chocolate milk, sugar, butter, cocoa powder, french bread, semisweet chocolate morsel, sweetened whipped cream, maraschino cherry
name: chocolate cherry bread pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed cream of chicken soup, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: gram s baked chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Slice small slits all over the pork loin. Insert the garlic slivers into the holes. Spread the dijon mustard evenly over the entire loin, using your hands or a spatula. Sprinkle loin with the herbes de provence, the salt and the pepper. Place on a roasting rack set in a roasting pan and bake for about 1 hour, or until meat thermometer reaches 155 degrees. Remove from the oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: garlic cloves, real maple syrup, grainy mustard, extra virgin olive oil, pork loin, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: pork loin with maple mustard glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 inch pan. Cream together both sugars and shortening. Add egg and mix together. Mix in all remaining ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and sugar. Bake for 35 minutes or until toothpic comes out clean.
ingredients: rhubarb, brown sugar, orange juice, self-rising flour, bicarbonate of soda, white chocolate, eggs, unsalted butter, custard
name: rhubarb white chocolate puddings

steps: Remove crescent dough from tube. Do not unroll. Cut into 8 slices. Place on an ungreased baking sheet. Top with green onions. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cheese. Lightly press cheese into slices. Bake at 375 degrees for 14-16 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, green chilies, cheddar cheese, garlic powder, parmesan cheese
name: crescent cheese rolls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: nestl toll house ultimates refrigerated chocolate chip lovers cookie dough, cream cheese, nestl carnation sweetened condensed milk, eggs, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling
name: cherry chocolate chip chunk cheesecake cookie cups

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot.
ingredients: chinese cabbage, salt, green onions, garlic clove, chili powder, gingerroot, light soy sauce, white wine vinegar, white sugar, sesame oil
name: kimchee

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: grouper fillet, buttermilk, egg, saltine crackers, garlic salt, black pepper, hot sauce, canola oil
name: grouper nuggets

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips.
ingredients: garlic, tomatoes, butter, flour, light cream, salt, chili peppers, monterey jack cheese
name: chile con queso dip

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Lightly grease a baking tray. Combine flour, tomato, parsley and a pinch of salt in a bowl. Stir in enough milk to form a soft, not sticky dough. Turn onto a lightly floured surface. Bake 15-20 mins until golden and a skewer inserted at centre comes out clean. Bake 15-20 mins until golden and a skewer inserted at centre
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, butter, egg, fresh parsley
name: parsley dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast halves and mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
ingredients: artichoke hearts, mushrooms, green onion, butter, flour, half-and-half cream, chicken broth, salt, black pepper
name: cream of artichoke and mushroom soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: english muffins, crunchy peanut butter, ground cinnamon, blackberry, raspberries, blueberries, banana
name: banana berry english muffin

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 8x8 inch sqare baking pan. In a large bowl, stir together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. In another large bowl, beat together the milk, eggs, and butter. Add the cornmeal-flour mixture and stir until just combined. Stir in the pork rinds. Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in the pan and cut into 9 squares.
ingredients: baking powder, sugar, bisquick, cornmeal, eggs, milk, butter
name: delicious cornbread

steps: Place the thai carrots, onion, garlic clove, gingerroot, thai red curry paste, salt, silken tofu, mint leaves in a large saucepan. Add 1. 25 litres boiling water and the bouillon powder. Bring to a boil and add the herb stalks. Lower the heat and simmer for 30 minutes until vegetables are tender when pierced with a knife. Remover from the heat and allow to cool slightly. Strain, reserving the stock. Return the mixture to the pan and add the ground almonds and enough of the reserved stock to make a soup-like consistency. Return the mixture to the pan and add the ground almonds and enough of the reserved stock
ingredients: vegetable stock, baby carrots, onion, garlic clove, gingerroot, thai red curry paste, salt, silken tofu, mint leaves
name: creamy thai carrot soup vegan

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. Season both sides of chicken with some salt& pepper and some cinnamon to taste. Saute chicken in oil about 5 minutes per side or until cooked through and no longer pink inside- but still moist. Spoon pineapple mixture over each serving and serve immediately. If you prefer, you may instead grill chicken.
ingredients: chicken pieces, apricot jam, pineapple-mango salsa, taco seasoning, long grain white rice
name: scout s salsa chicken

steps: Place peas in saucepan, cover with water and salt to taste. Boil about 20 minutes until done. Drain. In another saucepan, combine peas, butter, onion, shredded lettuce, salt and pepper to taste, and sugar. Cover and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, until peas are tender. Meanwhile, peel and cut potatoes into quarter inch thick slices. Add potatoes to peas. Add the cream and milk, salt and pepper to taste. Cook about 5 minutes and serve.
ingredients: new potatoes, green peas, salt, sugar, butter, green onions, black pepper, light cream
name: peas and new potatoes in cream

steps: Layer bread cubes in a greased 9x13 pan, followed by a mixture of cheese, beaten eggs, milk, sausage, and seasonings. Set overnight in refrigerator. Start in a cool oven. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, white bread, dry mustard, cheddar cheese, milk, salt, sausage
name: egg sausage souffle

steps: In a large saucepan add rice and water. Cook until the rice in tender. Add milk and simmer 60 min or until the milk is almost cooked out. Remove from heat and add sugar and cinnamon to taste. Place in fridge for 4 hours.
ingredients: white rice, water, whole milk, granulated sugar, orange blossom water, dates, ground cinnamon
name: roz bel laban middle eastern rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, smoked salmon, cream cheese, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and pepper, fresh cilantro, cilantro leaf
name: smoked salmon cream cheese and cilantro stuffed eggs

steps: Place the eggs in a large bowl and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes. Stir in green beans, carrots, seasoned salt, garlic, and white pepper. Cover and cook five minutes on low heat.
ingredients: fresh green beans, olive oil, white potatoes, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, paprika, eggs, salt and pepper
name: creamy potatoes with green beans eggs

steps: Boil cauliflower for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cauliflower head, simply potatoes sour cream and chive mashed potatoes, eggs, parmesan cheese, extra virgin olive oil
name: roasted cauliflower mashed potato bites sp5

steps: Cook pepper and mozzarella pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pepper and mozzarella in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, orange bell pepper, red pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, pasta
name: pepper and mozzarella pasta

steps: In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, stirring with a spatula until smooth. In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, stirring with a spatula until smooth. Spread the soft goat cheese equally over the slices of toast. Add the scrambled eggs on top of the goat cheese and cut each of the toast slices in half. Garnish with sun dried tomatoes, basil leaves, and drizzle of pesto.
ingredients: sausages, portabella mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, fresh tomatoes, eggs, toast
name: aussie all in one brekkie

steps: Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas & marshmallows together. Gently fold in pudding mixture. Lastly, fold in cool whip. Cover and refrigerate.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, pistachio pudding mix, cool whip, bananas, miniature marshmallows, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges
name: pistachio fluff fruit salad

steps: Preheat oven to 200 celcius. Fry onion and chicken in oil for 3-4 minutes. Add the pepper and broccoli and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add the dry soup mix, mustard and water to the pan and bring to the boil, stirring until thickened. Place cooked tagliatelle into a suitable heatproof dish and pour the sauce over the top. Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: tagliatelle pasta noodles, olive oil, yellow onion, garlic cloves, mascarpone cheese, blue cheese, baby rocket, fresh ground black pepper
name: blue cheese arugula rocket tagliatelle

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom
ingredients: flour, water, olive oil, salt, egg
name: unleavened bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread tortilla chips in a single layer over large baking sheet with edges slightly overlapping. Spoon approximately one teaspoonful of black beans onto each corn chip and top with onion, tomato, and cheese. Bake in oven 6 to 8 minutes or until cheese melts and nachos are heated through. Sprinkle with the fresh cilantro. Serve hot.
ingredients: low-fat flour tortillas, reduced sodium black beans, fresh tomato, frozen corn kernels, green onion, garlic cloves, jalapeno chiles, ground cumin, low-fat low-sodium monterey jack cheese, fresh cilantro
name: black bean nachos

steps: Sprinkle salt over prepared cucumbers and onions. Let set for 3 hours. Mix all other ingredients together and let come to a good boil. Drain vegetables and add to vinegar mixture. Bring back to a boil. Put in jars and refrigerate. No need to can, just keep in refrigerator. They will keep indefinetely in refrigerator.
ingredients: cucumbers, sweet onion, green pepper, red sweet pepper, pickling salt, celery seed, white vinegar, white sugar
name: crisp cucumber freezer pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine all ingredients and knead ten times. Let stand for ten minutes. Put dough on a cookie sheet and roll or press out. Top with toppings. Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges are golden.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, fast rise yeast, salt, hot water, olive oil
name: no knead food processor thin crust pizza dough

steps: In a large saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until translucent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, parmesan cheese, butter, green onions, eggs, salt and pepper, seasoned bread crumbs
name: harry potter s gillyweed balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all the dry ingredients together. Mix all the wet ingredients together. Mix everything together. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. Do not over
ingredients: arrowroot, gluten-free flour, gluten free baking powder, vegan margarine, caster sugar, pure vanilla extract, sunflower oil, water, icing
name: gluten free animal cookies

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon pasta mixture over the orzo. Toss.
ingredients: pasta, butter, shrimp, garlic, half-and-half, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, black pepper, red pepper flakes
name: buttery shrimp and pasta

steps: Beat egg yolks with mixer until light in color. Slowly add condensed milk mixing well. Stir while adding lime juice. Pour into prepared pie shell. Set aside and prepare meringue. For meringue, beat egg whites until stiff. Add sugar and vanilla just at the last minute. Top pie with meringue. Brown in 325 degree preheated oven just until peaks brown and the rest is golden in color. Serve cool.
ingredients: egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, lime zest, lime juice, egg whites, 9-inch baked pie crust
name: fluffy lime pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, texas toast thick bread in low flat bowl for easy dipping. Line two cookie sheets with foil and spray with pam. Dip the bread into the egg mixture on both sides and place on cookie sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, flipping them over half way through. Serve with maple syrup, powdered suger, or eat them plain if you are on the go.
ingredients: pumpkin, brown sugar, granulated sugar, molasses, egg yolks, egg whites, flour, milk, pumpkin pie spice
name: pumpkin pie amish recipe delicious

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl stir together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, then vanilla. On low speed gradually add flour mixture and mix just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 12 minutes. Transfer cookies to cooling racks to cool.
ingredients: butter, vanilla extract, equal sugar substitute, eggs, all-purpose flour, oats, fine salt, walnuts, miniature chocolate chip
name: choco chip cookies

steps: Mix the tuna, mayo, onion, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jalapenos, garlic powder, jal
ingredients: bread, american cheese, tuna, mayonnaise, yellow mustard, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic powder, jalapenos
name: spicy tuna melt

steps: In a small bowl, combine navel oranges, lemon, sugar, cinnamon, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, olive oil, salt, carrot, dates. Pour oil and seeds over salad, add herbs and toss to mix. Serve.
ingredients: navel oranges, lemon, sugar, cinnamon, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, olive oil, salt, carrot, dates
name: moroccan carrot salad with oranges and medjool dates

steps: Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute chicken breasts until lightly browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return chicken breasts to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: oil, salt and black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, shallot, garlic cloves, rosemary, honey, dijon mustard, lemon, pine nuts
name: honey rosemary chicken breasts rachael ray

steps: Heat brisket in a large pot over medium heat. Add onions and saute until they are tender. Add sauerkraut, apple juice, water, caraway seed, salt, pepper, and brown sugar, mixing all ingredients thoroughly. Bring pot mixture to a boil. Then reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add sweet and sour brisket pieces to pot, and cook for 30-45 minutes more, simmering, and stirring occasionally, until sauerkraut is tender.
ingredients: sauerkraut, beef brisket, whole tomatoes, dark brown sugar
name: sweet and sour brisket sauerkraut is the secret

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a large, heavy cookie sheet. In a small, heavy saucepan, combine first 4 ingredients. Over medium heat, stir until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to a boil. Boil 2 minutes. Add pecans and stir until they are coated with the mixture, about 1 minute. Transfer pecans to the cookie sheet, spreading evenly into a single layer. Bake until pecans are just starting to brown, about 13 minutes. Transfer to another cookie sheet that is lined with wax paper. Separate the pecans and cool completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: cream cheese, milk, garlic salt, dried beef, fresh ground pepper, green pepper, sour cream, onions, pecans, butter
name: gala pecan spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease and flour a 9x13 size pan. Put all the ingredients into one large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, egg, pineapple, pineapple juice, butter
name: pineapple filling

steps: Melt butter and whisk in flour. Gradually add milk and sour cream. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until thick. Add scotch or bourbon, salmon and parsley. Cook pasta and drain. Combine salmon mixture with pasta. Sprinkle with paprika and parmesan cheese.
ingredients: bisquick, milk, sour cream, dried dill weed, eggs, salmon, swiss cheese
name: easy salmon puff

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium high heat, combine the ground beef and salt and pepper to taste. Saut for 10 minutes, or until well browned. Add egg, green onions, seasoned bread crumbs, prepared mustard, ground beef, beef gravy, water, prepared horseradish, fresh mushrooms. Add ground beef, mix well. Shape into 4 patties. In ungreased skillet, cook patties for 5-6 minutes per side, until no longer pink. Drain. Mix gravy, water and horseradish. Add mishrooms. Pour over patties. Cook, uncovered, for 5 more minutes.
ingredients: english muffin, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, dried beef, worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise
name: chipped beef with english muffins

steps: In a large saute pan over medium-high heat, add the vinegar, water, sugar, white wine vinegar, carrot, onion, white peppercorns, bay leaves, allspice berries, salt and black pepper to taste and toss well. Add the vinegar, water, sugar, white wine vinegar, carrot, onion, white peppercorns, bay leaves, allspice berries, salt and black pepper to taste and toss well
ingredients: water, sugar, white wine vinegar, carrot, onion, white peppercorns, bay leaves, allspice berries
name: swedish 1 2 3 vinegar

steps: Place potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, liquid smoke, cayenne pepper, butter, light cream
name: smokey mashed sweet potatoes

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, eggs, vanilla extract, sugar substitute, egg, water, margarinepreparation:Blend flours, baking powder, and sugar substitute in bowl. Mix in egg, water, and melted margarine. Let batter stand for 10 minutes. Melt 1 teaspoon margarine in a 10-in nonstick skillet over medium heat. Drop batter by the tablespoonful onto hot skillet. Allow pancakes to cook until bubbles form around the pancakes. Thin remaining batter with additional water if necessary. Turn pancakes over with a spatula. Continue cooking until pancakes are done. Place on heated dish and continue cooking until all the pancakes have been prepared.
ingredients: flour, water, baking powder, salt, egg
name: big b s pancakes dairy free diabetic friendly

steps: Place tofu on a plate and pat dry with kitchen paper. Slice into 1cm thick slices. Heat the marinade in a non stick frying pan, once oil is hot add the tofu and cook over a medium heat for 5-8minutes either side or until tofu is golden brown. Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, 5 spice powder and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and toss. In the warm tofu. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Serve with steamed tender stem broccoli or stir fried vegetables.
ingredients: marinade, worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, tabasco sauce, smoked paprika, olive oil, firm tofu
name: charmaine s secret tofu marinade

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: pasta, carrot, broccoli, olive oil, sea salt, monterey jack cheese
name: little veronica s healthy macaroni and cheese casserole

steps: In a heavy-bottomed pot over medium, fry the onion and garlic in the onion mixture until soft, about 3 minutes. Add the brussels sprouts and stir them around so that they are coated with the onion mixture. Add the brussels sprouts and stir them around so that they are coated with the mustard mixture. Add the br
ingredients: brussels sprouts, mustard seeds, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, salt, ground black pepper, chicken stock, dijon mustard, lemon juice
name: brussels sprouts with onion and mustard seeds

steps: Spread mixture evenly over cut sides of muffin halves. Sprinkle evenly with cheese. Broil 5 inches from heat 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve immediately.
ingredients: processed cheese spread, lump crabmeat, butter, mayonnaise, garlic powder, seasoning salt, english muffins
name: broiled crab meltaways

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a large skillet over medium heat melt butter. Add the pecans - saute until lightly browned, about 3 minutes. Add the brown sugar and cook until caramelized. Stir in the paprika, chile powder and cumin. Add the vinegar and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Season with salt. Spread the pecans on a cookie sheet and bake in an oven until crisp, about 3 to 5 minutes.
ingredients: white sugar, salt, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, water, pecan halves
name: spiced pecans or walnuts

steps: Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes.
ingredients: roasting chickens, lemons, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: lemon roasted chicken

steps: In a large bowl, combine the greens, carrots, pineapple and cheese. In a small bowl, whisk the mayonnaise, sugar and reserved pineapple juice, taste and then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour over salad. Toss to coat.
ingredients: brown sugar, pineapple chunks in juice, cider vinegar, spam, green bell pepper, cornstarch, water
name: tahitian supper not really

steps: In a large saucepan or large microwavable bowl, melt butter and marshmallows. Stir until smooth. Remove from heat and stir in the cereal until it is evenly coated. Let the mixture cool for about 15 minutes or so, giving it a stir once in awhile. Butter you hands and then shape the treats into 2 inch balls, pressing gently so they are compact, not loose. Push a stick into each ball and set aside to cool. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or double boiler and stir until smooth. Dip the top of the treat balls into the chocolate and then sprinkle with the candy or sugar sprinkles. Lay on a wax paper lined tray until chocolate is hardened. For bake sales or potlucks, wrap each treat in plastic and tie with curling ribbon.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter flavor shortening, crisp rice cereal, milk duds, water
name: duddy rice krispies treats

steps: Mix first four ingredients in sauce pan. Boil one minute. Remove from heat. Stir in oats. Add remaining ingredients. Drop onto wax paper and let cool.
ingredients: margarine, sugar, milk, quick oatmeal, peanut butter, vanilla, cocoa
name: mom s preacher cookies aka no bake cookies

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time.
ingredients: chitterlings, whole cloves, red chili pepper, egg, water, cracker crumb, oil
name: chitterlings chitlins

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, buttermilk, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, milk chocolate chips
name: buttermilk chocolate chip cookies

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well.
ingredients: instant yeast, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, milk, butter, vanilla, lite olive oil, eggs
name: overnight waffles

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Combine butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, shortening, sugar, short
ingredients: butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, apple pie spice, apple cider, vanilla
name: apple cider pound cake

steps: In a large pot, boil the broth. Stir in the barley. Reduce heat and cover. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the remaining ingredients except the fresh sage. Simmer, covered, for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Stir occasionally. Stir in fresh sage, simmer for 5 minutes. Simmer
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, tomato juice, water, pearl barley, chili powder, salt, pepper
name: barley burger stew for 2

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Cut pork loin ribs into sections of 3 or 4 bones. Mix remaining ingredients well, sprinkle on both sides of ribs and rub into the meat. Seal rib sections in foil with a tablespoon of water in each package, and bake for 2 hours on a cookie sheet in the center of the oven. Open foil carefully as steam escapes. Can be crisped on a hot bbq if desired but will be great just the way it is.
ingredients: rib roast, fennel, prunes, apple, baby carrots, potatoes, onions, salt & pepper, honey mustard, vodka
name: pork loin rib rack of rib for two

steps: Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper. Blend cottage cheese and cream cheese together until fluffy. Spoon noodles into grease 10x6x2 inch baking dish. Spread cheese mixture over noodles. Pour meat sauce on top. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato soup, mushrooms, green pepper, salt, pepper, noodles, cheese
name: beef noodle bake

steps: Place all ingredients in a blender and process until smooth.
ingredients: boiling water, strawberry-flavored tea bags, mango-flavored tea bag, mint leaf, fresh strawberries, frozen mixed berries, sparkling apple cider, sparkling wine
name: merry berry christmas punch

steps: In a large skillet cook chorizo until crispy. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate. Pour off all but 1 tbsp. of fat from skillet and add sliced red onion. Cook, stirring over medium-high heat until just soft, about 5 minutes. Add corn kernels and chorizo and cook briefly to heat through. Fill 12 heated corn tortillas with corn mixture and serve with lime wedges, sour cream and chopped cilantro.
ingredients: chorizo sausage, frozen diced potatoes, onion, eggs, flour tortillas, cheese, salsa
name: huevos chorizo

steps: Put the bananas in a bowl with the rum. Let them soak while you saute the bananas. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the sugar and stir until dissolved. Add the bananas and cook for a few minutes, until tender. Sprinkle the spices over the bananas, then pour the rum and raisins on top. Sprinkle on the almonds and serve. Good with ice cream.
ingredients: bananas, lime, dark rum, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, dark brown sugar, butter
name: tropical baked bananas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, bananas, dark chocolate, egg white. Mix until combined, making sure there are no clumps of flour mixture. Spread batter evenly in pan. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack.
ingredients: plain flour, baking powder, sugar, unsalted butter, milk, vanilla extract, white vinegar, bananas, dark chocolate, egg white
name: banana chocolate surprise cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine mushroom soup, milk, tuna, onions, garlic and cheddar cheese. Toss with cooked pasta. Transfer to greased 9-inch square casserole pan. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered for 30-45 minutes.
ingredients: chunk tuna, rotini pasta, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, garlic, sliced mushrooms, soy sauce
name: fine tuned tuna casserole

steps: In a large saucepan, heat 2 cups of stock to boiling over high heat. Add stock. Reduce heat to lo. Cook, covered, until ww barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, 25-30 minutes. In a large saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon of stock. Add scallions, onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat until soft about 5 minutes. Add 3 cups stock and tomato paste. Add vegetables. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 15 minutes. Add salt and pepper, cooked ww barley and parsley. Cook 5 minutes longer.
ingredients: barley, olive oil, onions, mushrooms, carrots, celery ribs, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, vegetable broth, tomato paste
name: ww barley vegetable soup

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the black beans, sour cream, lemon juice, garlic clove, cumin, red onion, cilantro, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. Please. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: black beans, low-fat sour cream, lemon juice, garlic clove, cumin, red onion, cilantro
name: black bean dip n schmear

steps: Preheat grill to medium high heat. Slice a very thin piece if each steak to cover the hole to hold in the filling, set aside. Slice a small entry along the side of each steak for the filling. Rub each with a touch of olive oil. Season each steak inside and out with salt, pepper and optional rub, set aside. Mix the remaining ingredients together divide into four and fill into the cavity of each steak. Cover the hole with the slice of meat. Grill over direct heat to mark each side of steak then more to indirect heat standing the steaks with the cut side up. Close lid and grill till thermometer registers at 145 degrees. Remove and let rest covered with foil for 10 minutes and it will raise to 155 degrees which is medium.
ingredients: chard leaves, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried fig, pine nuts, salt and pepper, feta cheese
name: rainbow chard with figs garlic pine nuts feta

steps: Combine water and sugar in a small saucepan. Heat on low and stir to dissolve. Do not boil. Combine lemonade, orange juice and grenadine in punch bowl. Add cooled water-sugar mixture. Chill. Just before serving add gingerale. Garnish with fresh strawberries.
ingredients: elderflower heads, water, boiling water, granulated sugar, lemons, white wine vinegar
name: elderflower champagne

steps: Combine the sesame oil, garlic cloves, cumin seeds, sesame oil, crushed red pepper flakes, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: red wine vinegar, kosher salt, broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, cumin seeds, sesame oil, crushed red pepper flakes
name: garlicky sesame cured broccoli salad

steps: Cook wings in honey bbq sauce for 2 hours or low for 4 hours.
ingredients: chili sauce, dark brown sugar, vegetable oil, white vinegar, ketchup, onion, jalapeno peppers, worcestershire sauce, salt, chicken wings
name: chicken wings with jalapeno pepper sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the gingerbread cake mix, vanilla pudding mix, milk, solid pack pumpkin, brown sugar, frozen whipped topping, frozen pound cake, orange liqueur, fresh strawberries, strawberries, white chocolate baking squarepreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, mix together the gingerbread cake mix, vanilla pudding mix, milk, solid pack pumpkin, brown sugar, frozen whipped topping, frozen
ingredients: gingerbread cake mix, vanilla pudding mix, milk, solid pack pumpkin, brown sugar, frozen whipped topping
name: pumpkin gingerbread trifle

steps: Add the lemon juice, lemon rinds and cold water. Stir well to combine. Chill until very cold. Serve over ice.
ingredients: water, sugar, lemon extract, citric acid
name: lemon cooler

steps: Place the potatoes in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, or until thoroughly dry. Cut the potatoes into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature.
ingredients: carrots, potatoes, garlic cloves, sea salt, cumin seeds, olive oil, white wine vinegar, cayenne pepper
name: tunisian ajlouke de carottes salad

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine salt, quinoa, of fresh mint, nonfat vanilla yogurt, orange juice, strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange sections. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Serve immediately or let it sit for a bit to let the flavors meld.
ingredients: salt, quinoa, of fresh mint, nonfat vanilla yogurt, orange juice, strawberries, kiwi fruits, mandarin orange sections
name: minted quinoa fruit salad

steps: Combine all dry ingredients together. Cut in shortening. Add milk and mix. Drop by spoonfuls into simmering soup or stew. Cook 10 minutes uncovered, and 10 minutes covered. Do not take the lid off until the 10 minutes are up.
ingredients: self-raising flour, salt, butter, egg, herbs, milk
name: herb dumplings

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with the flour. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with parmesan cheese. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
ingredients: baby portabella mushrooms, butter, beef base, cream, parmesan cheese
name: quick mushroom supreme

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add eggplant slices and corn casserole and saute until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add eggplant slices and corn casserole and sa
ingredients: eggplant, cream-style corn, cracker crumb, onion, pimientos, eggs, margarine, salt, pepper, cheese
name: eggplant aubergine and corn casserole

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan over high heat and add the sweet potato, onion and garlic cloves and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add finely grated ginger and red curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes. Add the chopped sweet potato and chicken stock and cook for 15 minutes. Add the coconut cream and bring back to a simmer. Blend with a hand held blender until smooth. Divide between bowls and decorate with coriander leaves.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic cloves, curry powder, sweet potatoes, chicken stock, apple, light coconut milk
name: curried sweet potato soup

steps: Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this.
ingredients: vegetable oil, egg, sweet chili sauce, red onions, noodles
name: fried maggi noodles subjected to territorial restrictions

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine puffs ww with water and almond extract in large mixing bowl. Beat at low speed with mixer until moistened. Beat at medium speed for one minute. Line medium muffin pans with paper baking cups. Fill muffin cups two-thirds full. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown, cracked and dry. Remove from muffin pans. Cool completely. Frost with frosting.
ingredients: sugar-free carbonated orange beverage, almond extract, angel food cake mix, cooking spray
name: angel food puffs ww

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, fry bacon for 5-6 minutes on each side or until meat is no longer pink. They may stick a little to the pan due to the bacon.
ingredients: pork sausage, onion, bell pepper, celery, berries, apple, flour, chicken broth, cornbread stuffing mix
name: apple sage and berries stuffing

steps: Place the basil, cheese, mayonnaise and garlic in a bowl and mix well. Arrange the baguette slices in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Broil the slices until light brown. Turn the slices and spread with the mayonnaise mixture. Return to under the broiler and broil until light brown and heated through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh basil, olive oil, pine nuts, garlic clove, parmesan cheese, salt
name: basic pesto

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Cut potato almost in half lengthwise in each potato, almost to the point of cutting it in half. Sprinkle salt and pepper inside the potatos and tuck in the bay leaves, 2 per potato. Put the potatoes in a baking dish and drizzle with olive oil, smearing some on the insides as well as making sure the outsides are well coated. Push the potato halves back together. Sprinkle their outsides with salt and pepper. Bake for about 1 hour. The potatoes are done when you can easily poke a thin-bladed knife right through them. Serve immediately.
ingredients: potatoes, bay leaf, horseradish, sour cream, chives, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil
name: crisp and creamy new potato pie

steps: Toast the egg. In a microwaveable cup roughly the same diameter of the muffin, add the egg, a tablespoon of water. Beat the egg, add the bacon. Microwave on high for 1 to 2 minutes while muffin is toasting. Assemble the muffin and let stand for a few minutes to melt the cheese.
ingredients: egg, ham, english muffin, cheese
name: egg and ham breakfast sandwich

steps: Place honey in a large bowl and mix well. Pour dressing over the fruit and vegetables and mix well. Pour dressing over
ingredients: feta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, honey, fresh ground pepper, green seedless grapes, pear, fresh basil leaves
name: green grapes with feta cheese honey

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray non-stick spray in cassarole pan. Cook pasta and drain. Heat oil in deep skillet. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoniong. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: cooked chicken, bell pepper, onion, zucchini, pasta sauce, basil, italian seasoning
name: italian chicken and zucchini

steps: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic, water, carrots, celery, garlic cloves, tomatoes, caraway seed, coriander seed, sea salt. Cook for 15 to 18 minutes or until edges of crackers are toasted and crackers are set. Cool chips on baking sheets on wire racks.
ingredients: flax seeds, water, carrots, celery, garlic cloves, tomatoes, caraway seed, coriander seed, sea salt
name: igor s crackers raw foods

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: pillsbury sugar cookie dough, chocolate frosting, candy corn, orange decorating icing, black decorating gel, candy-coated chocolates
name: thanksgiving turkey cookies

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the dressing, oil, mustard and garlic. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill chicken, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer reads 170.
ingredients: mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, anchovy fillets, garlic, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, sandwich buns, arugula
name: grilled chicken caesar salad sandwiches

steps: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-low heat. Add pancetta, garlic cloves, rosemary sprigs, extra virgin olive oil, plum tomato, salt, heavy cream, penne pasta
ingredients: pancetta, garlic cloves, rosemary sprigs, extra virgin olive oil, plum tomato, salt, heavy cream, penne pasta
name: umbrella penne

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: blue cornmeal, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, salt, honey, egg, nonfat dry milk powder, water, cooking oil
name: blue cornbread

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, sugar
name: sugared french toast

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray. Slice potatoes into 12 wedges each. Place all the potatoes into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and cumin over potatoes, drizzle oil over seasonings and toss the potatoes until all are coated. Spread potatoes onto baking sheet in a single layer. Bake for 10, remove from oven and turn. Place back into oven and cook for 10 more minutes, then turn again. Return to oven and continue cooking until golden brown -- probably 5 - 10 more minutes. Each serving size is 12 wedges.
ingredients: yukon gold potato, salt, black pepper, mesquite powder, barbecue sauce
name: mesquite steak fries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread sesame seeds in baking pan and toast in oven 5-10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Roll chicken strips in toasted seeds and place in single layer in baking pan. Combine chicken stock, soy sauce, sesame oil and wine. Pour over chicken. Let stand 30 minutes at room temperature. Top with sliced mushrooms and onion rings. Bake 45 minutes. Toss with pasta.
ingredients: penne pasta, vegetable oil, ground chicken, tomato sauce, brown sugar, salt and pepper, pine nuts
name: it doesn t get any yummier than this chicken and pasta bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings.
ingredients: crescent rolls, dry vegetable soup mix, mayonnaise, sour cream, spinach, artichoke hearts, water chestnuts, garlic clove, feta cheese, parmesan cheese
name: grecian party squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chicken on a foil-lined baking sheet and bake for 35 minutes.
ingredients: turmeric, ground coriander, chili powder, garlic, ginger, green onions, lemon juice, salt & pepper, coconut milk, chicken pieces
name: coconut marinated chicken

steps: Cook scrambled eggs in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove to paper towels to drain. Cook and stir eggs in drippings over medium heat for 12 minutes or until tender. Add corn, ham, green onion and bacon. Cook and stir for 3 or 4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Stir in the reserved bacon. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted.
ingredients: egg, butter, bacon bits, corn, ham, green onion
name: rice cooker scrambled eggs

steps: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet or wok. Add asparagus, saute 1 minute. Add broth. Cover. Lower heat. Cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain. Season with salt, pepper and soy sauce. Serve immediately.
ingredients: chicken broth, cornstarch, soy sauce, vegetable oil, asparagus, gingerroot, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes
name: asparagus stir fry

steps: Combine eggs, sugar, salt, milk, vanilla extract in top of double boiler. Gradually whisk in milk, half and half, yolks and vanilla until smooth. Set over simmering water. Stir until firm, about 4 hours. Invert custard onto plates. Top with fresh fruit.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, salt, milk, vanilla extract
name: rich chocolate baked custard

steps: Place coconut milk, cream, lime rind, caster sugar, butter, ground star anise, fruit in a small bowl and stir. Pour coconut milk mixture into a small greased casserole dish and bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes. Serve warm with pouring cream.
ingredients: pudding rice, coconut milk, milk, lime rind, caster sugar, butter, ground star anise, fruit
name: baked coconut rice pudding

steps: In a large saute pan with cover, brown meat in olive oil over med-high heat. Drain any fat or juices that have accumulated in pan. Add onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, and garlic. Saute with meat until onions start to become translucent and veggies are becoming slightly tender. Add whole jar pasta sauce& whole bottle of chili sauce to pan. Stir to combine all ingredients. Bring to low boil, then cover& turn down heat so that sauce is simmering. Simmer for approximately. 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. If sauce has too much liquid, simply remove cover and simmer until the desired amount of liquid has cooked off. Serve over hot cooked spaghetti with sprinkling of parmesan cheese, garlic bread, and green salad.
ingredients: tomato paste, water, salt, sugar, fresh ground black pepper, dried oregano, dried basil, dried garlic flakes
name: mom s super simple pizza sauce

steps: Heat butter over low heat. Add olive oil, and next 5 ingredients. Cook about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add shrimp and let stand for 30 minutes. Serve on large platter with toothpicks.
ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, garlic, dry white wine, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh lemon juice
name: shrimp scampi a lighter version

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use and then form into 6 patties. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Serve on hamburger buns with lettuce, mayo and tomatoes or as desired.
ingredients: hamburger meat, egg, cracker, salt and pepper, oil
name: poor man s chicken fried steak

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, yellow squash and onion with the butter and garlic. Add oregano and tomato sauce. Simmer for 5 - 7 minutes. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: bread, butter, zucchini, onion, garlic salt, egg, cheddar cheese
name: zucchini and cheese casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Soak the raisins in the sherry or orange juice for 20 minutes. Drain. Beat the eggs in a bowl. Gradually beat in the sugar until light and fluffy. Mix in cream, then almonds, cinnamon, nutmeg, and raisins. Spoon into 6 buttered custard cups or ramekins. Set in a pan of warm water. Bake for 25 minutes, or until set and lightly browned on top. Serve warm or ice cold, with whipped cream, if desired.
ingredients: milk, long grain rice, ground cardamom, sugar, almonds, rose water, ground nutmeg, strawberries
name: almond pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, lean ground beef, spaghetti sauce, light cream cheese, parmesan cheese
name: creamy spaghetti

steps: In a 3- to 4-quart pan over very low heat, stir chocolate chips and butter until melted and smooth. Remove from heat and whisk in granulated sugar, eggs, and vanilla until well blended. Stir in flour. Fill six buttered, floured ramekins about halfway. Press a marshmallow into the center of the batter in each ramekin. Spoon remaining batter equally over marshmallows, completely covering. Bake in the center of a 350 regular or 325 convection oven until tops are puffed up and crackly, 12 to 15 minutes. Let cool about 10 minutes, then run a knife along inside of ramekins and invert to release cakes. Place right side up on plates. Sprinkle tops with powdered sugar, if desired. Serve warm.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, whole milk, honey
name: chocolate ganache glaze

steps: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the garlic and saut gently for 2-3 minutes. Add the paprika, cumin and ginger. Stir to combine. Stir in prawns, salt and cilantro. Stir in prawns
ingredients: large shrimp, oil, sesame oil, gingerroot, chinese wine, salt, sugar, fresh cilantro
name: chinese drunken prawns

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown.
ingredients: arborio rice, sweet potatoes, chicken stock, butter, cooked chicken, parmesan cheese, fresh thyme, salt and pepper
name: oven baked sweet potato chicken risotto

steps: Place rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add milk, sugar, rice, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt to the eggs. Pour into buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set.
