ingredients: water, milk, salt, arborio rice, butter, half-and-half, vanilla beans, egg yolks, sugar
name: ultimate rice pudding

steps: Mix dry ingredients. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk slightly in separate bowl. Milk together. Kneed on floured surface. Roll till desired thickness. Cut out with a glass or cookie cutter. Bake 350 for till golden brown.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, crisco, milk
name: pat s biscuits

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Generously grease rectangular baking dish, 13x9x2 inches. Cook beef and onion in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until beef is brown. Drain. Stir in soup, vegetables and milk. Stir bisquick mix and water in baking dish until moistened. Spread evenly. Spread beef mixture over batter. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 30 minutes.
ingredients: water, beef bouillon cubes, white onions, salt, black pepper, all-purpose flour, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese
name: outback steak house walkabout soup

steps: In a covered medium saucepan, cook carrots in small amount of boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender-crisp. Drain. Remove from pan. Keep warm. In same saucepan, over medium heat, melt butter. Stir in brown sugar and mustard until combined. Stir in carrots. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until carrots are glazed. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: dijon mustard, salt, fresh ground black pepper, maple syrup, garlic clove, fresh rosemary leaf, whiskey, water, carrots
name: maple whiskey glazed carrots

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix until well combined. Pour into a 13x9 casserole dish. Bake for 1 hour or until top is slightly golden. Sprinkle top with french fried onions and bake an additional 10 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: frozen shredded hash browns, margarine, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, cheddar cheese, corn flakes
name: best hash browns casserole

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the smashed tomatoes with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled tomatoes in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, olive, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, basil leaves
name: smashed tomato and olive salad

steps: In a small bowl, mix together sweet potatoes, frozen green peas, tomatoes, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro, sweet potatoes, green onions, curry
ingredients: sweet potatoes, frozen green peas, tomatoes, curry powder, coconut milk, cilantro
name: curried sweet potatoes with green peas

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place oil and garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute until garlic is browned. Add onion and zucchini. Toss well with garlic oil, gently stirring. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Turn into a 2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle on cheeses. Cover casserole and let sit for 2 minutes or until cheese melts- serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, onion, olive oil, garlic salt, dried oregano, red pepper flakes, tomato sauce, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese
name: skillet zucchini with italian cheeses

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onion in a skillet and drain. Combine with the rest of the ingredients except the grated cheese. Pour into a 2 qt casserole dish. Top with grated cheese. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: peas, corn, mashed potatoes, butter, salt and pepper, beef tenderloin, olive oil, flour, beef broth
name: nyama na irio steak and irio kenya

steps: Mix the flour, sugar, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk, butter, salt, flour, egg, milk
ingredients: eggs, milk, water, salt, flour, butter
name: flop proof crepes

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large nonstick skillet, brown ground sirloin or quickly stir fry chicken strips until no longer pink. Use a drop of vegetable is necessary. Remove with a slotted spoon. Season the meat with one of the seasoning packets from the noodles. Set aside. In the same skillet, combine water, vegetables, noodles, ginger and remaining seasoning packet. Bring to a boil, reduce heat. Cover and simmer 3 minutes until noodles are tender, stirring occasionally. Return meat to skillet. Stir in green onion.
ingredients: water, salt, fresh chinese noodles, sesame oil, pork loin, scallions, chinese cabbage, chicken broth, pepper, soy sauce
name: pork lo mein soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: unsalted butter, extra virgin olive oil, onion, salt & freshly ground black pepper, whole grain bread, dijon mustard, gruyere cheese, pickles
name: grilled gruyere and sweet onion sandwiches

steps: Heat broiler, with rack set 4 inches from heat. Place chicken on a foil-lined rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, without turning, until opaque throughout, 7 to 9 minutes. Let cool briefly, then flake. Divide chicken and tomatoes among serving plates. Top with chicken, spinach, tomatoes and olives. Top with sliced chicken breast.
ingredients: pecan halves, butter, cinnamon, spinach, cooked chicken breasts, strawberry slices, nectarines, poppy seed salad dressing
name: chicken and strawberry spinach salad

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Chill mixture for 2 hours. Roll into small balls. Place balls on a cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, ground mustard, worcestershire sauce, milk, cheddar cheese
name: crock pot cheddar fondue

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray a baking sheet with non stick baking paper. Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool completely. Remove from oven
ingredients: chocolate liqueur, vodka, malibu rum, half-and-half, chocolate syrup, shredded coconut, cookie, caramel syrup
name: samoa cookie cocktail

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add flour, blending well. Add half of cheese and seasoning. Cook until cheese is melted, stirring constantly. Clean the shrimp and break them in half. Mix with rice and sauce. Place in buttered baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs and cover with remaining cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until crumbs are browned and cheese is melted.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, cayenne, paprika, whole milk, shrimp, frozen peas
name: shrimp and pea wiggle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, whole coriander seed, dried thyme, dried oregano, fresh ground pepper, mushrooms
name: greek style marinated mushrooms

steps: In a small skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. Slowly stir in the broth, heating over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened. Add chicken, salt, and pepper. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small skillet, whisk together the water, and flour until smooth. In a small skillet, whisk together the water, and
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, pepper, dry mustard
name: flour shake and bake for chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until course crumbs develop. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned.
ingredients: unbleached flour, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, sugar, egg, milk, unsalted butter, sharp cheddar cheese
name: cheddar corn muffins

steps: In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients. Stir in the warm water, honey and olive oil until it forms soft dough. Turn out dough onto a floured surface, add more flour if dough is too sticky and knead dough for 5 minutes until smooth and elastic. Cover and let rise for 20 minutes in a warm place. On a floured surface cut dough in half. Roll dough to form a french bread like loaf. Place on a baking sheet lined with nonstick liner. Lightly flour the bottom of loaf and place on liner. Cover again with clean towel and let rise for about 30 minutes. I found this took much longer for me. Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Bake loaves for 30 minutes or until sounds hollow when tapped on bottom.
ingredients: flax seed meal, buckwheat flour, rice flour, baking powder, baking soda, xanthan gum, oil, eggs, soymilk, lemon juice
name: flax bread without yeast gluten sugar or dairy

steps: Heat oven to 400. Parboil bell peppers for 5 minutes. Saut onions and green peppers in skillet until heated thoroughly. Add cooked rice, drained black beans, and tomato sauce and cook for an additional 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in cup of cheese. Spoon mixture into pepper halves and then place in 9 x 13 glass baking dish. Pour hot water in the bottom of the dish and cover with aluminum foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes.
ingredients: green peppers, ground chuck, chili powder, cinnamon, quick-cooking barley, salsa, water, dark raisin
name: stuffed bell peppers picadillo

steps: Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt and pepper. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired.
ingredients: avocados, lime, juice of, tomatoes, onion, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, ground cumin, cayenne pepper
name: guacamole

steps: In a saucepan, heat corn syrup and brandy over medium heat. Bring to a boil. Add water and salt. Add butter and oats. Lower heat and simmer until oats are tender, about 6 to 10 minutes. Place 2 tablespoons of cream and 1 tablespoon of brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon of drained raisins in 4 bowls. Add steaming cooked oats and top with fresh berries. Each person stirs their bowl to enjoy the hidden surprise waiting underneath.
ingredients: cooked oats, hot water, cornstarch, sugar, nutmeg, vanilla, sea salt
name: homemade oat milk

steps: In a small bowl, prepare graham cracker crumbs from mix, according to package directions. Set aside. In medium bowl, prepare cheesecake filling according to package directions. Add the lemon rind and mix well. Spoon half the graham cracker crumbs into 6 parfait glasses. Then layer some cheesecake filling, some cherry pie filling, more crumbs, remaining cheesecake filling and finally the remaining cherry pie filling in each glass. Sprinkle 1 tsp slivered almonds on top of each parfait and chill until serving time.
ingredients: cream cheese, berry yogurt, sugar, lemon juice, whipped cream, blueberries, peaches, strawberries, grapes, sugar cookie
name: mixed fruit parfaits

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Grease 9x 13 pan. Beat everything together. Pour into pan. Bake 30-35 minutes until center tests clean with knife or toothpick.
ingredients: butternut pumpkin, tahini paste, curry powder, polyunsaturated margarine
name: pumpkin savoury style mash

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or overnight until firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Press firmly on bottom of mold to release pop. Store leftover pops in freezer.
ingredients: gelatin, jello gelatin, boiling water, vodka
name: over 21 finger jello shots

steps: Preheat grill to medium high heat. Place salmon fillet in center of foil. Season with garlic salt and brown sugar. Add pieces of butter, then onions. Carefully, pour some beer into foil packet and seal tightly. Grill for 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: brown sugar, sweet butter, dry mustard, green onion, salmon fillets
name: sweetened grilled salmon

steps: For the syrup, bring the water and the sugar to a boil in a medium-sized saucepan. Cook for 5 minutes, until sugar is dissolved. Add the lemon zest. Allow mixture to cool to lukewarm. Pour into a glass jar and store in the refrigerator. For the lemonade, combine the lemon juice, salt, syrup, and ice water in tall pitcher. Stir well and pour into tall, ice filled glasses.
ingredients: sugar, water, lemon juice, cold water
name: perfect lemonade real lemons and sugar

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken thigh fillets, fresh orange juice, honey, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, turmeric, orange, fresh chives
name: spiced orange roast chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In a large mixing bowl, cream your butter and sugars til fluffy and airy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in flour mixture until combined well drop by quarter cup measure on to an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 12 to 13 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from baking sheet and then cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: rolled oats, desiccated coconut, plain flour, brown sugar, sunflower seeds, raisins, butter, golden syrup, bicarbonate of soda, water
name: best ever anzac cookies

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the bacon and brown sugar in a small bowl. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Heat oil in a large non
ingredients: tilapia fillets, bacon, brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper
name: bacon and brown sugar infused tilapia

steps: Cook krab as it is directed on pkg. Rinse and drain well. In a large bowl combine mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, dill weed, salt, pepper, best foods mayonnaise. Mix well cover and chill in ref. For 2-4hours or overnight.
ingredients: imitation crabmeat, celery rib, green onion, lemon juice, dried dill weed, salt, pepper, best foods mayonnaise
name: krab salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Wash and dry fish. Sprinkle both sides with salt and pepper. Place in greased shallow baking dish. Sprinkle cheese on top and cover with sour cream. Bake 25 minutes. Adjust sour cream, sage, salt, pepper to taste as desired.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, sea salt, mayonnaise, potato chips
name: salt and vinegar potato chip fish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: chicken breasts, yogurt, all-purpose flour, curry powder, fine breadcrumbs, water
name: cottage country chicken

steps: Combine all the seasonings in a small bowl and rub evenly over roast. Place meat in a 6-quart slow cooker. Add water. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4-5 hours or until pork is very tender. Remove pork to a large cutting board or platter and let rest for 10-15 minutes
ingredients: chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper, pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, low sodium chicken broth, barbecue sauce, cider vinegar
name: taste of home indoor barbequed pulled pork

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, eggs, butter, small curd cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, diced green chilies, salt
name: green chili frittata

steps: Combine all butter, all-purpose flour, condensed beef broth, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic powder, ground pepper, garlic
ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, condensed beef broth, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, ground pepper
name: basic gravy w o pan drippings

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: head of cabbage, butter, cheez whiz, salt and pepper
name: cheesy cabbage heads

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut, seed, and dice peppers, and place into pan. Add olive oil and to peppers and stir around thoroughly. Add minced garlic and stir thoroughly. Place in oven and cook for hour and a half. Add cream cheese and stir until thoroughly melted and blended. Transfer into serving dish and serve right away or refrigerate.
ingredients: cream cheese, green pepper, onion, egg, vinegar, sugar, salt
name: green pepper dip

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: boneless round steak, dry onion soup mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, mushroom, onion, mashed potatoes
name: slow cooker beef in mushroom gravy

steps: Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired.
ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, oil, water, eggs
name: delicious lemon cake

steps: Place all ingredients in a bowl. It may be easier to warm the yogurt, as it is easier to blend with the other ingredients. Make sure the cucumber is drained well, otherwise your raita will be too watery. Mix well, and add to serving bowl. Sprinkle cumin over the top. Serve on top or on the side of your favorite indian dish, or serve as a dipping sauce with naan bread.
ingredients: cucumbers, red onion, plain nonfat yogurt, garlic, of fresh mint, cayenne
name: cucumber mint raita

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. for 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: flour, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, potatoes, butter
name: parmesan taters

steps: With an electric mixer, blend together butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla and eggs. Add flour, baking soda, and pudding mix and mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Pour into a lightly greased pizza pan. Bake at 350 f for 20 minutes or until done. Remove from oven and cool completely. Once the cookie is cool, you may decorate the cookie using a piping bag or hand held decorator.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, rolled oats, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips, raisins
name: jumbo oatmeal chocolate chip cookies

steps: Place ham in crock pot. Cook on low for 4 to 6 hours. Sprinkle parmesan cheese and ground cloves on top of ham. Pour can of pineapple slices and juice on top. Cover and cook on low for an additional two hours.
ingredients: cooked ham, pineapple, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground allspice, paprika, orange juice
name: spiced pineapple ham slices

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted.
ingredients: eggs, cottage cheese, salt and pepper, butter
name: cottage scrambled eggs

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, saute celery and onion for 6 to 8 minutes or until just tender. Stir in rice and corn. In a small bowl, combine dry milk powder and water. Add milk mixture to the celery mixture. Mix well to combine. Stir cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and lemon pepper into celery mixture. Lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: margarine, vegetables, garlic, sliced mushrooms, salt and pepper, egg noodles, buttermilk, fresh parsley, cheddar cheese
name: vegetable cheese skillet

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, orange zest, cinnamon, orange juice, and honey. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: cranberries, cranberry juice, honey, orange zest, cinnamon sticks, bay leaf, ground cloves, sea salt
name: honey cranberry sauce

steps: Preheat the grill to medium high. Place the prawns, bay leaves, chillies and garlic in one large or two medium sized oven proof serving dishes. Pour the olive oil over the prawns and add a little salt and pepper. Place the dish or dishes under the preheated grill. Cook the prawns until they are pink and cooked through 3-5 minutes. Remove them from under the grill and serve.
ingredients: green shrimp, lite olive oil, ground black pepper, onion powder, chili powder, dried oregano, garlic
name: hot prawns

steps: Heat olive oil in a medium sized heavy skillet. Saute green onions until soft and add the shredded ham and stir until slightly browned. In a large bowl, beat the eggs and heavy cream together by hand. Stir in the onions& ham, broccoli, cheese and seasonings. Pour into a buttered deep-dish pie plate. Bake at 375degrees for 45-50 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Start checking it halfway through the cooking time. Let stand 10 minutes and cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: eggs, cooked turkey bacon, monterey jack cheese, onion, heavy whipping cream, water, frozen chopped broccoli
name: crustless broccoli quiche

steps: Toast your english muffin or bread. Spread with cream cheese. Layer avocado slices. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil. Hot sauce to taste.
ingredients: avocado, salt, pepper, bread, butter
name: creamy avocado toast

steps: Preheat over to 450 degrees f. In a large bowl, whisk together jose margarita chicken wings, lemon pepper, vegetable oil, honey, mustard, garlic and hot sauce. Wash chicken wings and pat dry. Season with salt and pepper. Add wings to the marinade and stir to coat. Transfer to platter and sprinkle with fresh cilantro.
ingredients: chicken wings, lemon pepper, vegetable oil, honey, prepared mustard, fresh lime juice, gold tequila, fresh cilantro, hot sauce
name: margarita chicken wings

steps: Cook the pasta and drain. While the pasta is cooking, in a large skillet, saute parsley, lemon peel and garlic in oil till garlic is tender. Add the drained pasta to the skillet. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Top with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: linguine, butter, fresh lemon juice, basil leaves, garlic salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, chicken
name: lemon basil pasta w chicken

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add rice. Lightly saute it stirring frequently about 3 to 5 minutes. In a large bowl combine rice with all the other ingredients except for the lettuce, toss in the peanut sauce till coated. Season with salt and pepper if you wish. Each person takes a lettuce leaf or a portion of one, spoons the misture in it and then wrap like a cabbage roll and eat and enjoy.
ingredients: rice paper sheets, vermicelli rice noodles, smoked salmon, extra virgin olive oil, capers, mushrooms, cabbage, soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, ground black pepper
name: smoked salmon rice paper wraps

steps: Put cream cheese, vanilla, and sugar in a large bowl. Mix the ingredients in the bowl. Add eggs and mix until there are no remaining lumps. Pour into the pie crust. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, milk, instant vanilla pudding, graham cracker pie crust, cherry pie filling
name: emergency cheesecake

steps: In a covered medium saucepan, cook carrots in small amount of boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes or until tender-crisp. Drain. Remove from pan. Keep warm. In same saucepan, over medium heat, melt butter. Stir in brown sugar and mustard until combined. Stir in carrots. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until carrots are glazed. Sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: baby carrots, butter, garlic clove, jalapeno, rosemary, apricot preserves, brown sugar, dijon mustard, lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: apricot jalapeno glazed carrots

steps: Melt butter or margarine. If desired add garlic. Serve with applesauce.
ingredients: pork fillets, cooking oil, onion, carrot, garlic, orange juice, salt, sugar, white pepper
name: pork fillets

ingredients: cabbage, cheddar cheese, mushroom soup, sour cream, french fried onion rings, salt, pepper
name: cabbage wedge casserole

steps: In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm.
ingredients: fresh spinach, butter, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper
name: spinach with balsamic vinegar

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat
ingredients: boca meatless ground burger, vegan sour cream, vegetable broth, mixed mushrooms, campanelle pasta, water, garlic powder, cumin, paprika, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: vegan mushroom stroganoff

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes.
ingredients: cayenne pepper, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, french onion soup, green pepper, onion, celery, hamburger, kielbasa
name: northern jambalaya

steps: In 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, cook potatoes, covered, in 2 inches boiling water until tender, about 12 minutes. Drain. Meanwhile, in large bowl whisk together vinegar, oil, water and pepper. Mix in apples. Add potatoes, sauerkraut, onions and parsley to apple mixture. Toss gently. Season with salt.
ingredients: olive oil, cumin, salt and pepper, sweet potatoes, red pepper flakes, fresh lime juice, black beans, red onion, fresh cilantro
name: black bean and sweet potato salad

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine instant butterscotch pudding mix, corn muffin mix, milk, eggs, dark molasses, cinnamon, ground ginger, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg, cinnamon, nutmeg,
ingredients: instant butterscotch pudding mix, corn muffin mix, milk, eggs, dark molasses, cinnamon, ground ginger
name: slow cooker indian pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss peas, shallot, oil, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: sugar snap pea, extra virgin olive oil, onion, dried thyme, kosher salt, black pepper, sugar
name: forevermama s roasted sugar snap peas with thyme

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork chops and sauté until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet and let cool for 10 minutes. Remove pork chops from skillet and place on a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: boneless pork chop, bell peppers, onion, barbecue sauce, flour tortillas
name: pork wraps

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as
ingredients: eggs, cornstarch, sugar, salt, pepper, cream-style corn, heavy cream
name: corn souffle microwave

steps: Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, leeks, garlic cloves, russet potatoes, vegetable broth, white beans, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper
name: creamy vegan potato leek soup

steps: Bring vinegar, water and spices to a boil. Add salt, dill seed, cucumbers, onion, salt, dill seed, cucumbers, onion, salt, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, dill seed, d
ingredients: red onion, rice wine vinegar, sugar, coarse salt, whole cloves
name: quick pickled onions

steps: In a small heavy saucepan, combine butter, marshmallows, green food coloring, corn flakes, red cinnamon candies, and mix well. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. Bake at 375 for 8-10 minutes. Combine the marshmallows, green food coloring, corn flakes, red cinnamon candies, and mix well. Combine
ingredients: butter, marshmallows, green food coloring, corn flakes, red cinnamon candies
name: christmas holly wreath clusters

steps: Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also.
ingredients: short-grain white rice, salt, sweetened condensed milk, butter, raisins, vanilla, cinnamon
name: comfort food rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread melted butter evenly in bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. Evenly layer crumbs, then coconut and finally chips. Pour condensed milk over all. Sprinkle with peanuts. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are light brown. Cool on wire rack. Chill until set and cut into pieces.
ingredients: saltine crackers, butter, light brown sugar, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, walnuts
name: crunchie bars

steps: In a large skillet, saute ground beef and onion over medium heat, stirring often, until beef is browned. Add tomato sauce, chili powder, and worcestershire sauce. Bring mixture to a boil, lower heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Add your favorite regular toppings, too. To make the sauce taste as if it came from a new york pushcart, add a little cinnamon. Oregano will give it a greek or italian flavor and a teaspoon of ground cumin will make it an authentic chili dog.
ingredients: lean ground beef, tomato sauce, water, barbecue sauce, dried onion flakes, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic powder, hot pepper sauce
name: michigan hot dog sauce

steps: Mix 2 tablespoons of soup with rest of ingredients. Divide mixture among cabbage leaves. Fold in sides. Roll up and secure with toothpicks. In skillet, place rolls seam side down. Add remaining soup. Cover. Simmer on low 40 minutes. Every 10 minutes, spoon sauce over rolls.
ingredients: cabbage leaves, lean ground beef, onion, fresh parsley, salt, fresh thyme, garlic, cayenne pepper, tomato sauce
name: baked stuffed cabbage

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Combine first 5 ingredients. Spread the meatloaf mixture onto a piece of aluminum foil. Spread into a 16x10 inch rectangle. Drain the thawed broccoli well and spread onto top of meatloaf mixture. Spread the thin ham on top of the broccoli. Arrange the cheese on top of the ham. Roll the meatloaf using the foil to help. Pinch the edges to seal. Place in baking dish. Bake at 350 for 90 minutes.
ingredients: meatloaf mixture, eggs, seasoned bread crumbs, vegetable juice cocktail, parsley, black pepper, salt, onions, ham, mozzarella cheese
name: ham cheese stuffed meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar until thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, milk, rum, salt, nutmeg
name: rum custard

steps: Brown meat with chili powder in large deep skillet. Add chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until meat is no longer pink. Add refried beans and
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, cayenne, chili powder, ground cumin, kosher salt, tomato sauce
name: mexican meat filling

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: olive oil, cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, shallot, oregano, thyme, chili flakes, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: black cherry tomato pasta sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease a cookie sheet. In a large mixing bowl, combine marshmallow creme, peanut butter, milk, popped popcorn, salted peanuts, chocolate. Stir until smooth. Add popcorn and peanuts. Coat evenly. Bake 5 to 7 minutes. Cool on cookie sheet at least 20 minutes. For a festive presentation, stack the balls like a christmas tree and drizzle with chocolate.
ingredients: popped popcorn, sugar, unsweetened chocolate squares, sweetened condensed milk, water, butter, vanilla
name: chocolate popcorn

steps: Place rajas in crock pot. Add to crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for 6 hours. Remove the rajas from crock pot and add to crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for
ingredients: olive oil, poblano chiles, white onion, chicken bouillon, corn kernel, sour cream
name: rajas con crema

steps: In electric frying pan or large skillet saute onions and peppers until onions soften. Add corned beef. Continue to cook until cubes fall apart. Add frozen hash browns. Add seasoning if desired. Cook, stirring often until potatoes are done and start to brown.
ingredients: green bell peppers, red onion, green onion, deli corned beef, frozen hash brown potatoes, seasoning, worcestershire sauce, beef broth, eggs
name: healthy corned beef hash with fried eggs

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until mixture begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: cooked white rice, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, golden raisin, orange, zest of, ground cardamom, ground cinnamon, nutmeg
name: fragrant baked rice pudding

steps: Place brie in a large bowl. Add salt, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar,
ingredients: brie round, fresh basil leaf, roasted red pepper, garlic, salt, pepper, extra virgin olive oil
name: brie with roasted peppers and basil

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine peach halves, pineapple chunks, orange marmalade, margarine, nutmeg, ground cloves, cinnamon stick, lemon juice, crushed pineapple, sugar, pine nutspreparation:Soak peach halves in water overnight. Drain and cut into pieces. Peel citrus fruit and remove white pith. Shred colored peel and chop fruit finely. Add lemon juice and apricots. Add pineapple. Measure fruit and add an equal volume of sugar. Cook until thick, stirring carefully to prevent scorching. Add pine nuts, if desired. Fill sterilized jars, cover and process in a boiling water bath for ten minutes to seal.
ingredients: canned peach halves, pear halves in natural juice, pineapple chunks, orange marmalade, margarine, nutmeg, ground cloves, cinnamon stick
name: hot spiced fruit

steps: Spread mayonnaise evenly on two pieces of the bread. Place a piece of cheese on the bread. Place a slice of ham on top of the cheese. Place
ingredients: white bread, mayonnaise, green leaf lettuce, turkey breast, smoked ham, tomatoes, cooked bacon
name: turkey club sandwich

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: olive oil, chicken thighs, chicken drumsticks, red onion, green capsicum, sweet paprika, chopped tomatoes, ground turmeric, arborio rice, boiling water
name: spanish chicken and rice

steps: In a small mixing bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in milk, cinnamon and salt. Spread entire top of lightly toasted bread with butter mixture. Place on a cookie sheet and broil briefly until mixture bubbles. Cool slightly on a rack. Cut into triangles, and serve warm for breakfast toast. Cover and refrigerate remaining butter mixture for future use.
ingredients: bread, butter, sugar, milk
name: mom s warm milk toast bedtime snack

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold waterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold waterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine cake mix and pudding in a large bowl. Add eggs, oil and water. Start on low speed, then 10 minutes at medium speed once ingredients are throughly mixed. Turn batter into a 10 inch tube pan. Bake 50 minutes at 350 or until toothpick is clean. Cool in pan on rack do not turn upside down. Using a 2 tined fork, poke holes 1 inch apart in the entire cake. Prepare glaze mixing powdered sugar and milk til smooth. Pour glaze over cake immediately and allow to cool in the pan.
ingredients: swiss chocolate cake mix, chocolate instant pudding, cola drink, vegetable oil, eggs
name: cola quick cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350f in large skillet, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey, brown ground turkey
ingredients: onion, red bell pepper, lean ground turkey, sweet potato, baked beans, tomato soup, worcestershire sauce
name: sneaky baked beans

steps: Line bottom of 9x13 pan with frozen peirogie. Spread sauerkraut on top. Add the corned beef. Top with thousand island dressing. Top with provolone cheese. Bake at 350 deg. For 45 minutes.
ingredients: sauerkraut, caraway seed, tomatoes, thousand island dressing, corned beef, swiss cheese, rye bread, butter
name: reuben casserole for two

steps: Combine the condensed milk, chocolate chips, miniature marshmallow, brewed coffee, kahlua, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped cream, whipped
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, miniature marshmallow, brewed coffee, kahlua
name: easy mocha fondue

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla, yellow cake mix, pecans, butter, whipped topping
name: butter pecan sweet potato crunch

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: broccoli florets, onion, butter, mayonnaise, reduced-fat sour cream, garlic powder, sharp cheddar cheese, cracker
name: yummy broccoli bake

steps: Melt carrot raisins in top part of double boiler over boiling water. Add raisins and nuts. Cook for 10 minutes, or until thickened, stirring constantly. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto wax paper. Refrigerate until firm. Makes bout 20 clusters.
ingredients: bread, peanut butter, raisins, carrot
name: carrot raisin pb sandwiches

steps: Roast meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls.
ingredients: chili sauce, ketchup, cola drink, french onion soup mix, beef brisket
name: oven barbecue brisket

steps: Preheat oven to 200. Place tomatoes and peppers, cut side down on a baking rack set onto a baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Spray or brush vegetables with olive oil and continue to roast until tomatoes become a dark red color, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: cooked chicken, cooked rotini, romaine lettuce hearts, cherry tomatoes, red onion, fresh ground black pepper, salt, caesar salad dressing, feta cheese, crouton
name: kittencal s caesar chicken pasta salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Cut zucchini into wedges, like you would steak cut fries. Beat egg with 1 tablespoon water. Mix parmesan cheese with herb seasoning. Dip zucchini into egg, then coat with cheese by pressing slices into mixture. Bake on well greased baking sheet for approximately 15 minutes, or until they reach desired browness. You can also turn them carefully to brown on both sides. I do not turn them when i make them.
ingredients: italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, zucchini, eggs
name: zesty zucchini sticks

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cornstarch, paprika, fish fillet, sweet rice flour, oil and fry until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add cornstarch, paprika, fish fillet, sweet rice flour, oil
ingredients: egg whites, cornstarch, paprika, fish fillet, sweet rice flour, oil
name: gluten free fish chips

steps: Spread 1 t cream cheese mixture on each slice bread. Spread 1 t cream cheese mixture on each slice bread. Spread 1 t cream cheese mixture
ingredients: cream cheese, lemon juice, caster sugar, plain flour, sultana, puff pastry, icing sugar
name: yummy cream cheese rolls

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat sugar, butter, eggs and almond extract on low just until combined. Beat on high for 5 minutes, scraping bowl occasionally. In a separate bowl, combine flour mixture alternately with milk, mixing just until blended. Fold in chocolate chips. Sprinkle pecans in the bottom of a greased and floured 10-in. Tube pan. Carefully pour batter over pecans. Bake at 325 for 1 hour and 40 minutes or until cake tests done. Cool 20 minutes in pan before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: pecans, chocolate cake mix, instant chocolate pudding mix, light rum, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sugar, butter
name: sally s chocolate rum cake

steps: Sieve dry ingredients. Mix in butter with a fork. Use as much milk as required to make a very soft dough. Shape into a thick round. Score into a quarter. Dust with flour. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes at 170 degrees celsius.
ingredients: self raising flour, baking powder, salt, caster sugar, butter, milk, water
name: homemade scones

steps: In a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat add lemon slices. Cook 4 minutes, turning once. Remove lemons. Set aside. Add pea pods and leek to skillet. Stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes or until pea pods are crisp-tender. Stir in dill and reserved lemon slices. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, sugar snap peas, green onions, water, fresh mint leaves, salt and pepper
name: minted sugar snap peas

steps: In a large mixing bowl, add the brown sugar, shortening, and margarine. Beat until fluffy. Add in the vanilla and eggs. Mix until well blended. Add in the flours, and baking powder. Stir to mix. Add in the oats. Stir well to mix. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of dough 2-inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 10-14 minutes or until a light golden brown. Cool for 1 minute, then transfer to cooling rack.
ingredients: margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, peanut butter, vanilla, flour, oat bran, baking powder, baking soda
name: peanut butter oat bran cookies

steps: Mix seasonings together in small dish. Trim fat from steak and rub seasoning mixture on both sides. Place steak on rack of broiler pan. Position pan so that steak is about 3 inches from heat. Broil 10-12 minutes for a steak, turning once during cooking or grill as desired. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli.
ingredients: steaks, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, milk, garlic powder, oil
name: breaded deer steaks

steps: Spray two 6 to 7 oz ramekins with non-stick cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cube bread and measure out 1 cup of cubes, place cubes in prepared ramekins and divided the raisins or blueberries between the two. In a small dish, beat together the milk, egg or egg substitute, stir in brown sugar, cinnamon and vanilla. Mixing well. Pour the mixture evenly over the bread cubes and drizzle with melted butter. Place on a cookie sheet, just in case it cooks over, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a knife inserted near center comes our clean. Serve warm.
ingredients: challah, eggs, whole milk, sugar, vanilla extract, nutmeg, cinnamon, pecans, maple syrup
name: french toast bread pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place dorados de frijoles seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: refried beans, corn tortillas, cotija cheese, lettuce, salsa, sour cream, lime
name: tacos dorados de frijoles

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat, add garlic, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger, ginger
ingredients: peanut oil, ground turkey, fresh ginger, fresh garlic, hoisin sauce, carrot, red bell pepper, cucumber, green onion, iceberg lettuce leaves
name: asian turkey lettuce wraps

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, mild green chilies, mexican-style tomatoes, salt, cumin, oregano. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, onion, green pepper, garlic cloves, mild green chilies, mexican-style tomatoes, salt, cumin, oregano
name: fiesta chicken slow cooker

steps: In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chops. Combine corn starch& cold water until smooth and stir into slow cooker. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice.
ingredients: pork chops, oil, cream of mushroom soup, milk, water, white rice, pepper
name: pork chops rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Drain spinach well before using. Mix spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese and garlic powder in a large bowl. Spoon dip into a oven-safe dish and bake until bubbly and heated through. Serve warm with crackers, fresh bread, toasted bread or with a spoon.
ingredients: frozen spinach, artichoke hearts, light sour cream, cream cheese, light mayonnaise, mozzarella cheese
name: spinach artichoke dip

steps: In a small bowl, combine cheddar cheese, chunky salsa, onion, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter,
ingredients: cheddar cheese, chunky salsa, onion, sour cream, condensed cheddar cheese soup, pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, unseasoned breadcrumbs, butter
name: cheesy salsa potatoes

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cola, ketchup, garlic powder, salt, pepper, cornstarch, cold water
name: cola chicken

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil. Saute vermicelli and onion until golden brown, about 2 to 4 minutes over medium-high heat. Drain off oil. Add rice, stock, water, pepper, and bay leaf. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes. Fluff with fork. Cover and let stand 5-20 minutes. Remove bay leaf. Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.
ingredients: water, long grain rice, butter, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley
name: parmesan buttered rice

steps: Preheat the broiler. Brush the tortillas on both sides with oil and lightly salt. Heat a large saute pan over medium heat and cook the tortillas, 1 at a time, until slightly golden on both sides. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix together the sour cream, lime zest and juice, cumin, and salt and pepper, to taste, until smooth. Pour into a plastic squeeze bottle or sturdy resealable plastic bag and cut small. Arrange the browned tortillas on a baking sheet and sprinkle evenly with cheese. Broil until the cheese bubbles and begins to brown, about for 1 to 2 minutes, being careful not to burn. Slice each quesadilla into 8 wedges and drizzle sour cream decoratively over the top. Sprinkle with cilantro and serve.
ingredients: butter, tomato tortillas, brie cheese, red onions, mango, serrano pepper, sour cream, cilantro
name: brie and mango quesadillas

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over high heat for 15 minutes or until no longer pink in center. Top with cheese during last few minutes of grilling. Grill pepper rings for two minutes. Place burgers on bun, top with pepper rings.
ingredients: ground turkey breast, fat-free refried beans, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, tomato paste, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper
name: mexican turkey burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Prepare muffin tin. Sift flours and spice. Stir in sugar. Make well in centre. Place buttermilk, yoghurt, eggs and oil in large jug. Mix well. Pour into flour mixture, stir with wooden spoon until just combined. Spoon into muffin pan and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: baking mix, milk, sugar, vegetable oil, egg substitute, blueberries
name: low fat baking mix muffins

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, salt, ground ginger, pepper, water, lemon juice, soy sauce, bourbon, ketchuppreparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat
ingredients: turkey wings, cooking oil, flour, green bell pepper, onion, warm water, dried thyme, salt and pepper
name: turkey wings with gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Melt butter in a medium size pot. Add flour stirring until combined. Slowly add milk and continue stirring until sauce has thickened. At this point, add salt, cheese, lemon juice and mix until well combined. Remove pot from heat and add broccoli and tuna. Mix well, pour into a pyrex or glass baking dish. Bake covered for 35 minutes. Remove cover and continue baking for a further 10-20 minutes until nice and bubbly.
ingredients: pie crust, red onion, garlic, broccoli floret, gruyere, eggs, half-and-half, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg
name: broccoli quiche

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Set aside. Crumble fish into large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients and mix well with hands. Shape into two oblong loaves. Place on baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: salmon, soda cracker crumbs, milk, onion, egg, butter, salt, pepper, basil, garlic powder
name: canned fish loaf

steps: Heat oil in frying pan over med high heat. Add chicken, onion, and peppers, cook and stir until chicken is browned. Add water, tomatoes, and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, making sure that tomato mixture covers it completely. Cook 15 to 20 minutes until sauce is thickened and chicken is cooked through. Stir frequently during cooking.
ingredients: refrigerated cheese tortellini, boneless skinless chicken breast, canola oil, meatless spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: chicken tortellini skillet for 2

steps: Mix ingredients in small bowl. Mix dressing ingredients in small bowl. Mix
ingredients: pecans, apple cider, cider vinegar, pure maple syrup, dry mustard, oil, olive oil, greens, granny smith apples, danish blue cheese
name: ill 3 forks restaurant salad

steps: Bring a large pan of lightly salted water to the boil. Peel and cube the potatoes and add to the pan with the garlic. Return to the boil and simmer for 15-20 minutes until tender. Add the coriander and cook for 10 seconds. Drain well, then return to the pan. Set the pan over a gentle flame and stir with a wooden spoon for 1-2 minutes to evaporate any excess water, but be careful not to let the potatoes catch and burn on the bottom of the pan. Turn off the heat and mash well. Add the creme fraiche and some salt and pepper and mash together until smooth and creamy. Serve warm.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, corn kernels, spinach, butter, onion, ground cardamom, salt and pepper, honey, snap peas
name: cardamom mashed sweet potatoes

steps: Place the bacon tomato salad in a large bowl and mix together the yogurt, mayonnaise, milk, garlic clove, salt and pepper. Add the yogurt, mayonnaise, milk, garlic clove, salt and pepper and mix well. Add the yogurt, mayonna
ingredients: plain yogurt, mayonnaise, milk, garlic clove, salt and pepper, tomatoes, avocado, bacon, bibb lettuce
name: bring home the bacon tomato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray shallow baking pan with cooking spray. Pat salmon dry with paper towel. Place salmon skin side down in pan. Brush with 1 tablespoon of the butter and sprinkle with garlic salt. Mix bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, green onions, lemon peel and thyme in small bowl. Stir in remaining 1 tablespoon butter. Press bread crumb mixture evenly on salmon fillets. Bake uncovered 15 to 25 minutes or until salmon flakes easily with fork. Serve immediately in a bed of cooked spinach, rice or pasta.
ingredients: salmon fillets, mayonnaise, lemon juice, horseradish, butter, fresh breadcrumbs
name: horseradish crusted salmon

steps: Toss all ingredients into a pot. Cook over medium heat and bring to slow boil then reduce heat to lower setting and continue cooking for about 15 to 30 min longer. Best if used on ribs or chicken. Can use this sauce if baking or bbq. Usually, depending on the qty i am cooking, i have to double or triple this recipe.
ingredients: spareribs, brown sugar, cornstarch, honey mustard, vinegar, ketchup, water, garlic
name: unbbq d sweet sour garlic spareribs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease with cooking spray an 8x8 square baking dish. Combine the brownie mix, water, egg substitute, powdered sugar in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish. Bake in the preheated oven until the top is dry and the edges start to pull away from the sides of the pan, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: brownie mix, water, egg substitute, powdered sugar
name: brownie crinkles

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve.
ingredients: mackerel, extra virgin olive oil, butter, salt, pepper, lemon juice, fresh flat-leaf parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika
name: mackerel broiled boston or atlantic mackerel

steps: In a blender, puree raspberries, water and wine. Pour into a large saucepan, add the red raspberries, water and wine. Bring just to the boil over a medium heat. Strain into a large bowl, and let cool. Whisk in the lemon juice and yogurt, then chill several hours before serving.
ingredients: red raspberries, orange juice, lemon juice, cornstarch, chablis, orange section, orange rind twists, mint leaf, sour cream
name: scandinavian raspberry soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease or butter a small, shallow casserole dish. In the prepared dish, combine the cream, corn, and pepper. Cut butter in small pieces and put on top of corn. Put the broken saltine pieces on top of casserole. Bake until slightly brown on top.
ingredients: butter, sugar, heavy whipping cream, frozen corn kernels, cream cheese, fresh ground white pepper, butter flavored cracker
name: baked creamy corn with cracker topping

steps: Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add corn. Stir until beginning to dry and brown, about 8 minutes. Transfer to small bowl. Add oil to skillet. Heat over medium-high heat. Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic. Saut until peppers are tender, about 8 minutes. Mix in cilantro and chili powder, then corn. Stir until heated through, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: canola oil, whole kernel corn, onion, garlic, tomatoes, diced green chilies, salt
name: corn with tomatoes and green chiles

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken piece, lemons, juice of, plain yogurt, onion, salt, garlic, minced ginger, coriander, chili powder, red food coloring
name: tandoori style barbecue chicken

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: spice cake mix, apple pie filling, egg, egg whites, caramel ice cream topping
name: caramel apple spice cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool.
ingredients: caster sugar, flour, eggs, cocoa powder, milk, baking powder, semisweet chocolate chunks, butter
name: gooie chocolate muffins cupcakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place italian bread shell on an ungreased baking sheet. Stir together the cream cheese, goat cheese or feta, garlic and black pepper in a small mixing bow. Spread mixture over the bread shell. Place the tomato slices and sweet pepper strips over the cheese mixture. Bake in the preheated oven about 12 minutes or till heated through. Sprinkle with fresh basil.
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, italian bread, plum tomatoes, onion, green peppers, fresh basil, sliced ripe olives, part-skim mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, romano cheese
name: sweet pepper pizza with three cheeses

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch square pan with nonstick spray. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk wet ingredients together. Blend well. Add liquids to dry ingredients, whisking until smooth. Bake 35-40 minutes, or until done. Cool completely. Frost, if desired.
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, sugar, cocoa, milk, butter, vanilla, brown sugar, black coffee
name: self saucing mocha fudge pudding
