steps: Place beef, onion, potatoes, carrots, onion, potato, onion, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato, potato,
ingredients: stewing beef, carrot, onion, potato, salt
name: lobscouse lobscows

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook to 5 minutes or until softened, stirring occasionally. Add carrots, celery, chicken broth, 6 and black pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 8 to 10 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Meanwhile, cook tortellini according to package directions. Drain, transfer to a large serving bowl, and cover to keep warm. Stir ham and cream into carrot mixture and cook over low heat until just heated through. Pour cream mixture over tortellini, add parmesan cheese, and toss to combine.
ingredients: cheese, tortellini, fresh asparagus, ham, low-fat alfredo sauce, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese
name: creamy tortellini with ham and asparagus

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: ground lamb, harissa, fennel seeds, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, ground cinnamon, kosher salt, black pepper, hamburger bun
name: harissa burgers

steps: In a large roasting pan toss asparagus, chicken broth, butter, shallot, garlic, flour, half-and-half, thyme, pepper, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmes
ingredients: asparagus, chicken broth, butter, shallot, garlic, flour, half-and-half, thyme, pepper, parmesan cheese
name: creamy asparagus soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel, core and slice apples into a bowl. Add brown sugar, cinnamon, water and salt. Mix well to coat apples. Place in two ramikins or small au gratin dishes, sprayed with cooking spray. Dot with butter and spread cheese over top. Bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until apples fall.
ingredients: water, cooking apples, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, butter
name: cinnamon crusted baked apples

steps: Combine marshmallows, glace cherries, vanilla extract, cream, condensed milk, crushed pineapple, lemon juice, graham cracker crumb crust. Bake at 160c for 45-60mins. It is lovely with cinnamon sprinkled on top before cooking.
ingredients: marshmallows, glace cherries, vanilla extract, cream, condensed milk, crushed pineapple, lemon juice, graham cracker crumb crust
name: marshmallow fridge tart

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, red chili pepper, fresh gingerroot, garlic clove, shallots, dry linguine, white crab meat, fresh parsley, lime, juice of
name: crab spaghetti

steps: Place beans in a large bowl with all remaining ingredients and toss well to combine. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh gingerroot, red onion, mustard powder, cold water, reduced sodium soy sauce, rice, sesame oil, sugar
name: chinese green bean salad by dr andrew weil

steps: In a medium sauce pan heat coconut milk, curry paste, peanut butter, sugar, and fish sauce until they come to a very small boil. Set aside and cool adding cornstarch to thicken. While the sauce is cooling, stir fry 1 chopped onion and 1 t minced garlic. Cut up chicken into small pieces and stir fry with the onion and garlic until chicken is cooked through. Combine the garlic, onion and chicken with the sauce and heat. Spoon the chicken peanut curry over rice and enjoy.
ingredients: chicken parts, canola oil, diced tomatoes, chunky peanut butter, garlic, gingerroot, soy sauce, red pepper flakes, peanuts, cilantro
name: peanut chicken thai style

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and cornstarch. Stir in strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch
ingredients: sugar, water, strawberry jam, lemon juice, cornstarch, strawberry
name: warm double strawberry sauce

steps: Place the poblano peppers on top of the poblano peppers and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean. Place the poblano peppers on top of the poblano peppers and bake for about 45 minutes or until an inserted knife come out clean
ingredients: lump crabmeat, fat free sour cream, seasoned bread crumbs, roasted red peppers, poblano peppers, parmesan cheese
name: crab stuffed poblano peppers

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add turkey, garlic cloves, green pepper, onion, water, spaghetti sauce, red pepper flakes, spaghetti, parmesan cheese. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Stir-fry frequently. Remove from heat & set aside.
ingredients: ground turkey, garlic cloves, green pepper, onion, water, spaghetti sauce, red pepper flakes, spaghetti, parmesan cheese
name: one pot spaghetti with meat sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 190 degrees. Line a 20cm pie dish with baking paper. Place 1 sheet of pastry over the paper. Trim edges. Place bacon, mushrooms, tomato and onion in pastry case. Season with black pepper. Crack eggs over filling. Top pie with remaining sheet of pastry. Trim and crimp edges. Glaze top of pie with milk. Cut a vent in centre of pie. Bake for 25-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown.
ingredients: shortcrust pastry, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh parsley, capers, tasty cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: traditional egg and bacon pie or what you will

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter a casserole dish or baking pan enough to hold the ingredients. Mix all ingredients together adjust salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a buttered casserole dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, butter, condensed cream of chicken soup, fat free sour cream, onion, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes cereal, canola oil cooking spray
name: makeover monday hash browns casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugar, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add apples. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: apples, fresh cranberries, flour, sugar, quick-cooking oatmeal, pecans, brown sugar, butter
name: cranberry apple casserole crisp

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine butter, sugar, pitted dates, salt, vanilla extract, toasted rice cereal, shredded coconut. Beat at low speed with mixer until moistened. Beat at medium speed for one minute. Line medium muffin pans with paper baking cups. Fill muffin cups two-thirds full. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown, cracked and dry. Remove from muffin pans. Cool completely. Frost with frosting.
ingredients: unsalted butter, sugar, pitted dates, salt, vanilla extract, toasted rice cereal, shredded coconut
name: angel delights

steps: With blender, blend red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, dry mustard, canola oil, fresh sage, fresh dill, salt, pepper. Blend until all ingredients are incorporated. Continue mixing on low speed and add oil slowly until emulsification starts. Change speed to medium and add remaining oil. Adjust seasoning.
ingredients: red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, dry mustard, canola oil, fresh sage, fresh basil, fresh dill, salt, pepper
name: from the field balsamic vinaigrette

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the onion, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: oil, onions, brown sugar, mustard seeds, balsamic vinegar, sweet chili sauce, apple cider vinegar
name: onion jam

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, whisk the sugar, buttermilk, oil, egg, vanilla, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, cream of tartar, sour milk, egg, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg. Add to the buttermilk mixture, stir until the ingredients are just combined. Be careful not to overework the batter, if there are lumps, they will disappear during baking baking. The less you work the batter, the more tender the pies will be. Fill 6 nonstick muffin top cups with the batter. Bake for 10 minutes in the center of the oven. To prevent the pies from getting soggy after baking, remove the cooked muffins from their cups and cool them on a rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: apples, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking soda, cream of tartar, sour milk, egg, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg
name: birds nest pie

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. Place chicken in a casserole dish. Combine all ingredients and pour over chicken. Bake covered for 2 hours. Stir several times while baking. Add chicken and brown. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple tidbits, carrots, teriyaki sauce
name: teriyaki pineapple chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese in bowl with electric mixer on medium, until creamy. Add sugar and beat until well blended. Add egg, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour batter into pie shell. Bake at 325 degrees for 35- 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool completely on wire rack. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.
ingredients: whipped cream, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, vanilla extract, prepared graham cracker crust
name: easy southern lemon icebox pie

steps: Place chicken and rice in crock pot. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hour longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles.
ingredients: chicken tenders, cream of mushroom soup, water, onion soup mix, olive oil, long grain brown rice, thyme, salt and pepper, broccoli floret
name: creamy chicken and rice in a crock pot

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add shrimp and onion. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: artichokes, baby shrimp, parsley, fresh dill, lemon juice, mayonnaise, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: shrimp stuffed artichokes

steps: Heat oil in l skillet over medium high heat until oil is shimmering and then add the orzo. Toast, stirring frequently, until it starts to turn golden brown. Stir in broth and bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until orzo is tender and broth is absorbed. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Uncover and stir in butter, salt, peper and parsley.
ingredients: butter, orzo pasta, canned chicken broth, scallions, button mushrooms, pine nuts, fresh italian parsley, salt and pepper
name: toasted orzo pilaf

steps: Heat oil in pan over medium high heat until a popcorn kernal pops. Add half of shrimp to oil, cook to golden brown both sides. Remove and add second half of shrimp and repeat.
ingredients: peanut oil, jumbo shrimp, fresh gingerroot, soy sauce, lemon, hoisin sauce
name: hoisin glazed shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Combine other ingredients in a second bowl. Blend the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto the baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: biscuit mix, milk, black pepper, salt, asiago cheese, nutmeg, water, sugar
name: asiago scones

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly butter a 9x13 inch pan. Place the butter and brown sugar in a bowl and blend until creamy and light colored. Add the egg yolk, vanilla and flour, blending well after each addition and scraping down the sides of the bowl. Spread into the prepared pan and pat down with your hands or a wide spoon. Bake until golden brown, about 15-20 minutes. Spread the chocolate over the warm batter, and let sit for 3-5 minutes.
ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, egg yolk, vanilla, salt, unsifted all-purpose flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts
name: chocolate toffee squares

steps: Place the pretzel mix in a large mixing bowl and mix until smooth. Pour over the pretzel mix and spread evenly.
ingredients: miniature pretzel twists, mixed nuts, butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, salt
name: sweet toffee pretzel mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spread the chopped walnuts in an 8 inch square baking pan and bake for 10-12 minutes or until roasted, stirring occasionally. Stir in the coffee liqueur, brown sugar, and vanilla. Set aside. Reduce oven to 325f. Remove the top rind off the brie. Place the brie in a shallow baking dish. Top with the walnut mixture. Bake for about 8-10 minutes or until soft and heated through. Serve immediately with assorted crackers and pear slices.
ingredients: walnuts, kahlua, brown sugar, vanilla extract, brie cheese
name: glazed brie

steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees farenheit. In large bowl, beat egg whites until slightly stiff. Gradually add sugar and cream of tartar and continue to beat. Add vanilla and salt and continue beating until whites stand in stiff peaks. Spray 9 x 9- inch glass baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Spread meringue over entire bottom and sides of dish to form a crust. Bake in 300 degrees fahrenheit oven for 45 minutes. Remove and cool. After crust has cooled, prepare pudding mix according to package directions and fold in sliced bananas. Pour pudding mixture into crust and sprinkle ground graham crackers on top. Chill and serve.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, eggs, icing sugar, vanilla, bananas, cool whip
name: banana torte

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, flour, mushroom, salt and pepper, paprika
name: lazy chicken

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in lemon juice, zest, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, caster sugar, lemon rind, butter, vanilla extract, milk, sugar, water, lemon juice
name: easy lemon self saucing pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick.
ingredients: chicken drummettes, oil, taco seasoning mix, flour
name: mexican party wings

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, green chili pepper, ground cumin, red lentils, lime juice, cilantro
name: simple red lentil dhal

steps: Add all ingredients except cous cous to a sauce pan. Bring to boil, stirring occassionally. Allow to boil for 3 minutes. Stir in cous cous and remove from heat. Cover and let sit until tender, fluff with fork occassionally. Serve with a mango slice and enjoy.
ingredients: water, couscous, orange juice, scallion, mango, red bell peppers, fresh cilantro, olive oil, rice wine vinegar, black pepper
name: mango couscous

steps: Wash, core and dice chicken. Place chicken breasts in large bowl & toss with lemon juice. Add cooked chicken bouillon granule, apples, celery, green onions, raisins, cornstarch, ground nutmeg. Fold into rice mixture. If desired, serve over salad greens.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, apple juice, chicken bouillon granule, apples, celery, green onions, raisins, cornstarch, ground nutmeg
name: waldorf chicken

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and cornstarch. Stir in orange juice concentrate until smooth. Add parsnips. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Cool. Store in the refrigerator.
ingredients: parsnips, orange juice, sugar, salt, orange slices
name: parsnips in orange sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place the ham in a heavy roasting pan. Mince the garlic in a food processor fitted with the steel blade. Add the chutney, mustard, brown sugar, orange zest, and orange juice and process until smooth. Pour the glaze over the ham and bake for 1 hour, until the ham is fully heated and the glaze is well browned. Serve hot or at room temperature.
ingredients: smoked ham, brown sugar, crushed pineapple, chipotle chile in adobo, adobo sauce, nutmeg, fresh ginger, cornstarch, salt
name: baked ham glazed with pineapple and chipotle peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place brie on a cookie sheet. Top with brie. Bake for 10 minutes or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is melted.
ingredients: brie round, preserves, crescent rolls, egg
name: shari s baked brie

steps: To make the strawberry-mint syrup, bring the sugar and water to a boil cook until completely dissolved, only about 1 minute. Remove from heat, stir in the strawberry-mint syrup and let sit for about 30 minutes. Strain, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Muddle strawberry-mint syrup with the crushed ice in the bottom of a large pitcher. Add chilled strawberry-mint syrup, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum, rum
ingredients: fresh strawberries, of fresh mint, brown sugar, limes, rum
name: strawberry mojito

steps: In heavy saucepan, combine milk, water, dry milk powder, protein powder, dutch process cocoa, salt, equal sugar substitute. Over medium-high heat, bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low. Cook, whisking occasionally, until slightly thickened, 1-2 minutes. Top each serving with whipped topping and a cookie.
ingredients: nonfat dry milk powder, protein powder, dutch process cocoa, salt, equal sugar substitute
name: high protein hot chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Wash zucchini, leaving skins on, and grate either by hand or in a food processor. Blot zucchini with paper towels to remove as much moisture as possible. Place in an 8 inch square baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Cut butter into small pieces and place evenly over zucchini. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese and bake until zucchini is tender and cheese melts. About 5-10 more minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, flat leaf parsley, of fresh mint, fresh lemon rind, olive oil, minced garlic cloves
name: grilled zucchini mint gremalata

steps: Place potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 20 minutes or until tender. In a large bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Drain potatoes and cut into cubes. Add the mayonnaise mixture and toss gently to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, red onions, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar, honey, orange zest, fresh thyme, sweet potatoes, vegetable oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: warm caramelized onion and sweet potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, milk
name: homemade pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, butter, canola oil, eggs, white sugar, all-purpose white flour, salt, vanilla, walnuts
name: healthy brownies

steps: Place beef and broccoli pieces in a resealable bag. Pour marinade into bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours. Preheat grill. Thread meat and broccoli pieces alternately onto skewers. Grill for about 8 to 10 minutes or until done, turning occasionally.
ingredients: flank steaks, onion, vegetable oil, low sodium beef broth, teriyaki sauce, fresh gingerroot, carrot, fresh broccoli florets
name: teriyaki beef and broccoli

steps: Heat the butter in a large oven proof lidded casserole dish, add the onions and saut until soft and transparent. Add the sauerkraut, mix well and cook, uncovered, over a low heat for 5 minutes. Add the apples to the sauerkraut mixture together with the wine and enough stock to cover. Mix well then continue to cook over a low heat for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 170c, 325f, gas mark 3 during this cooking time. Stir in the sugar and celery seeds then cover and transfer to the oven. Bake for 30 minutes and serve hot.
ingredients: country-style spareribs, butter, pepper, sauerkraut, onion, carrot, apples, dry white wine
name: spareribs and apples

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: green bell peppers, red bell peppers, plum tomatoes, garlic cloves
name: italian roast bell peppers

steps: In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in bacon for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta.
ingredients: dry penne pasta, passata, bacon, baby spinach, button mushrooms, zucchini, carrot, celery, red capsicum, cheese
name: bacon and vegetable pasta bake

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, fennel bulbs, olive oil, water, turmeric, white pepper, black pepper, salt
name: chicken and fennel

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Lightly grease 4 holes of a 6 hole texas muffin tray. Combine chicken, lettuce, avocado, tomato, mayonnaise, chilli sauce and basil in a large bowl. Microwave tortillas on high in 15 second bursts until pliable and carefully place in prepared muffin holes, shaping into cups and then bake for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Place tortilla cups on serving plates and fill with chicken mixture and top with extra basil leaves. Serve with salad mix.
ingredients: butter, sugar, cinnamon, flour tortillas, cream cheese, cool whip, lime, zest of, fresh fruit
name: tortilla desserts cups

steps: Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, german chocolate cake mix, miniature marshmallows, chocolate chips, rolled oats, sweetened condensed milk
name: chocolate gooey bars

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease bottom only of 13x9-inch pan. Make brownie mix as directed on box, using oil, water and 2 eggs. Spread in pan. Make brownie mix as directed on pouch, using butter and 1 egg. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls evenly onto brownie batter. Press down lightly. Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted 2 inches from side of pan comes out almost clean. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Frost with frosting.
ingredients: chocolate cake mix, brownie mix, vegetable oil, eggs, chocolate chips, powdered sugar
name: chocolate crackle brownie cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: pasta, ricotta cheese, frozen spinach, nutmeg, crushed tomatoes, garlic salt, chili pepper flakes, dried basil, dried oregano, dried rosemary
name: spinach and ricotta pasta bake

steps: Combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: romaine lettuce, avocado, grapefruit, black olives, vinaigrette dressing
name: avocado olive salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Using solid shortening, grease and flour bottom only of 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In large bowl, blend all ingredients at low speed until moistened. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 15 minutes. Remove from pan. Wrap tightly and store in refrigerator.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, vegetable oil, eggs, warm water, poppy seed, lemons, juice of, powdered sugar
name: lemon poppy seed cake

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: roasting chickens, butter, garlic cloves, orange, orange juice, salt, pepper, dried rosemary, orange marmalade
name: orange rosemary roasted chicken

steps: Heat oven to 375 drgrees. Drop a piece of butter in the bottom of each of 10 compartments of a muffin tin. Arrange the banana slices on top. Sprinkle the pecans and brown sugar over the bananas. Top each compartment with a biscuit. Bake until golden, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from oven. Place a baking sheet on top of the buns in the muffin tin while they are atill hot. Carefully flip the tin over, tapping the bottom to release the buns. Transfer to a platter, serve warm.
ingredients: pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cinnamon-sugar mixture, brown sugar, butter, vanilla ice cream, pecans
name: the best sticky buns

steps: Place quinoa and 2 cups water in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15 minutes or until quinoa is tender. Drain well and return quinoa to saucepan. Add soymilk, apples, sugar and cinnamon. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 5 minutes. Transfer mixture to a blender, add vanilla and puree until smooth. Serve hot.
ingredients: quinoa, cinnamon sticks, water, almond milk, honey, orange blossom water, dried apricot, pistachios
name: quinoa pudding with apricots and pistachios

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 8x8 inch sqare baking pan. In a large bowl, stir together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. In another large bowl, beat together the milk, eggs, butter, bisquick, sugar, baking powder, cornmeal. Add the cornmeal-flour mixture and stir until just combined. Stir in the pork rinds. Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in the pan and cut into 9 squares.
ingredients: eggs, milk, butter, bisquick, sugar, baking powder, cornmeal
name: kokee cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fillet in a lightly oiled baking dish with the skin-side down. Cover it with onion-garlic mixture and tomatoes, then capers and dill. Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Roast for 15 to 20 minutes or till the fish becomes opaque.
ingredients: bluefish, fresh parsley, green onion, herbes de provence, celery, salt, pepper, olive oil, lemon, juice of
name: baked boston bluefish

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: bananas, orange zest, lime zest, fresh orange juice, fresh lime juice, raisins, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon
name: baked mexican bananas

steps: In a small saucepan, heat the sugar and water with a wooden spoon. Heat on medium until the sugar has dissolved, then boil the mixture for about 1 minute. Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Chop the chilli very finely, then thoroughly bruise in a small mortar and pestle. Place the mango flesh, sugar mixture and chilli in a blender. Use the lemon juice to rinse the last little bit of chilli juice from the mortar and pestle and add that to the blender too. Blend the mango mixture into the egg white until smooth. Freeze the sorbet in an ice-cream maker. Remove from the ice-cream maker when thick and store in an airtight container in the freezer for up to 3 days. The sorbet may need to stand at room temperature for a few minutes before serving, but this time will be minimised if the sorbet is made less than a day before it will be served.
ingredients: splenda granular, mango puree, water, egg white
name: mango sorbet

steps: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cup water, sugar and lemon zest. Bring to a boil, then decrease heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup through sieve placed over large measuring cup, discarding solids. Whisk in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Pour into molds and freeze until solid, for at least 4 hours. If you are using an ice pop kit, follow the manufacturers instructions.
ingredients: sugar, fresh mint leaves, lemons, cucumber, vodka, fresh lemon juice, club soda, ice
name: spring fling

steps: Rinse rice thoroughly for 2 minutes under running water. Drain well. Put 5 cups of water, rice and pandan leaves into a heavy stockpot. Simmer over medium heat for approximately 40 minutes. Add palm sugar syrup and continue to cook until most of the liquid has evaporated. Season with a pinch of salt. Remove from heat, allow to cool. Serve at room temperature, topped with a swirl of fresh squeezed creamy coconut cream.
ingredients: black sticky rice, water, coconut milk, raw sugar, salt, sweetened flaked coconut
name: thai coconut black sticky rice

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: great northern bean, salt, sugar, bacon, butter
name: baked beans a family recipe from chef patrick o connell

steps: Place diana s chicken casserole in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until chicken is cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, water, stuffing cubes, butter
name: diana s chicken casserole

steps: In a saucepan combine sugar, cornstarch and cocoa. Slowly add milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat and continue. Stirring until thick. Remove from heat and add margarine and vanilla.
ingredients: cocoa, sugar, cornstarch, milk, butter, vanilla
name: chocolate blender pudding

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, sugar, and salt, if used. Stir in 2 cups milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and mixture coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat and add 2 cups milk and extract. Chill several hours or overnight. Whirl in blender before serving. Add rum or brandy as desired, top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg.
ingredients: cream of coconut, sweetened condensed milk, egg substitute, evaporated milk, vanilla, malibu rum, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: coquito puerto rican eggnog

steps: Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the strawberries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: strawberry, strawberry kool-aid, sugar, water
name: strawberry stretcher

steps: Combine all marinade ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Cover tightly with plastic
ingredients: leg of lamb, garlic cloves, olive oil, lemons, juice of, dill, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, oregano
name: slow roasted paper wrapped leg of lamb from olive magazine april

steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees farenheit. In large bowl, beat egg whites until slightly stiff. Gradually add sugar and cream of tartar and continue to beat. Add vanilla and salt and continue beating until whites stand in stiff peaks. Spray 9 x 9- inch glass baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Spread meringue over entire bottom and sides of dish to form a crust. Bake in 300 degrees fahrenheit oven for 45 minutes. Remove and cool. After crust has cooled, prepare pudding mix according to package directions and fold in sliced bananas. Pour pudding mixture into crust and sprinkle ground graham crackers on top. Chill and serve.
ingredients: cocoa powder, unsweetened chocolate square, egg whites, salt, granulated sugar, vanilla
name: chocolate meringue kisses

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour, baking powder, salt and 3 tbsp sugar together in a bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture looks like coarse cornmeal. Pat an even layer of mixture on bottom and halfway up sides of 8 inch square baking pan, pressing pastry firmly with your hands until it holds. Arrange peaches over bottom pastry and sprinkle with remaining sugar and cinnamon. Bake for 15 minutes in 400 degree oven. Then pour mixture of beaten eggs and heavy cream over the top. Bake for 30 minutes longer. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, powdered sugar, salt, butter, eggs, peaches, sugar, cornstarch
name: peach squares

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: buttery cracker, blue cheese, bacon, green onion, butter, tomatoes, salt, ground black pepper
name: broiled blue cheese and bacon tomatoes

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Heat grill. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade. Discard marinade. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: beef, salad oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, black pepper, garlic, onion
name: texas steak marinade

steps: Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat until onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted.
ingredients: margarine, onion, celery, frozen broccoli, fat-free chicken broth, nonfat milk, velveeta reduced fat cheese product, salt and pepper
name: broccoli soup light

steps: In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions.
ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, feta cheese, small curd cottage cheese, egg, lemon peel, nutmeg, salt and pepper, butter, phyllo dough
name: tiropetakia spinach and feta filled phyllo triangles

steps: Heat oven to 160 degrees celsius. Season meat well and fry in a 3 tbsp olive oil over a high heat in a dutch oven about 8 minutes, turning until evenly browned. Remove to a plate. Thinly slice the onions and fry in dutch oven about 10 minutes until softened and browned, but not burnt. Add pasta. Cover tightly and bake 3 hours.
ingredients: lamb neck, stock, crushed tomatoes, garlic cloves, chili powder, olive oil, pasta
name: slow cooked lamb neck and pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cardamon and mix. Add flours, baking powder and baking soda and mix. Spoon into muffin tins and bake for 20-25 minutes until muffins are done and slightly browned on top.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, sugar, oil, bananas, water, vanilla
name: vegan banana cake

steps: Place watermelon slices in heavy duty zip lock bag. Seal and freeze for 2 hours. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge. Place the salt in a saucer and spin the rim of each glass in the salt and set aside. Process the frozen watermelon, tequila, and next 3 ingredients in blender until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides. Add the ice and blend well, pour into glasses and garnish if desired.
ingredients: watermelon, frozen limeade concentrate, tequila, sugar, limes
name: frozen watermelon margaritas for a crowd

steps: Heat oven 200 c, place a baking sheet in to heat. Slice wild mushrooms into 4 equal pieces, leaving the rind on. Turn the mushrooms cut side up. Place a piece of cheese in the middle of each mushroom. Top with some thyme leave and season to taste. Cut pastry into 4 strips lengthways. Wrap each mushroom in a strip of pastry so that the ends of the pastry are under the mushroom. Make slashes on top of the pastry with the. Brush exposed sides of mushroom with oil. Place them on hot baking sheet, cook 15 - 20 minutes til pastry is golden and cheese oozing and mushroom is tender.
ingredients: wild mushroom, unsalted butter, shallots, fresh thyme, lemon zest, parsley, chives, garlic cloves, goat cheese, frozen miniature phyllo tart shells
name: wild mushroom and goat cheese tartlets

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat together cheese, sour cream, and onion with electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in blue cheese, walnuts, and bacon. Mix well. Chill up to 24 hours. If dip thickens after chilling, stir in 1 to 2 tablespoons milk. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: bread, red apple, red onion, blue cheese, walnut pieces, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: blue cheese walnut and apple on toast

steps: Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta.
ingredients: butter, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, sugar, lime zest, cayenne pepper, shrimp, fresh parsley
name: garlic lime shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread one side of each slice of bread with 1 teaspoon mustard and 1 tablespoon 1000 island. Divide the suarkraut and turkey evenly between 2 of the bread slices. Top each with 1 slice of cheese and remaining slice of bread. Place sandwiches on a baking sheet or toaster oven sheet and bake until cheese melts and sandwiches are hot, about 6 minutes.
ingredients: rye bread, unsalted butter, corned beef, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing
name: my reuben sandwich with sauerkraut

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft.
ingredients: peanut butter, margarine, brown sugar, eggs, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, milk chocolate kiss, powdered sugar
name: valentine kiss cookies

steps: In a large wok, fry peanuts in oil for about 5 minutes, until soft but not brown, about 5 minutes. Stir in coconut milk and peanuts and bring to a simmer over moderate heat. Add onion and chilies and cook, stirring frequently, until soft but not brown, about 5 minutes. Reduce heat to its lowest point. Cook uncovered, stirring frequently, 2-3 minutes. Add onion and cook until heated through, 4-5 minutes more. Add spinach and cook until heated through, 4-5 minutes more. Add spinach and cook until cooked through, 4-5 minutes more. Add spinach and cook until cooked through, 4-
ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, oil, unsalted peanuts
name: spinach and groundnuts peanuts eastern africa

steps: Place spinach in colander. In pot, bring next 3 ingredients and enough salted water to cover, to a boil. Cook 20 minutes. Pour over spinach to drain. Discard rosemary. Return potatoes and spinach to pot and stir in butter and broth. Using hand masher, mash mixture until smooth. Stir in peppers and serve.
ingredients: boiling potatoes, heavy cream, unsalted butter, salt, black pepper, baby spinach
name: creamed mashed potatoes with spinach

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: hoagie roll, mayonnaise, sweet mustard, alfalfa sprout, tomatoes, bacon
name: not your father s blt

steps: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add pork, cooking 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove pan from heat and let pork stand for 30 seconds. While pork cooks, combine brown sugar, soy sauce, chile paste, hoisin and rice vinegar in a small bowl. Pour sauce over the pork, scraping the pan to loosen the fond. Turn the pork over to coat. Serve garnished with the green onion slices. I had a couple of thick boneless chops sitting around, so i cut them into thin, flat slices and cooked as above. Then doubled the sauce ingredients, tossed it all together and served with saffron rice. A nice variation.
ingredients: ketchup, honey, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, adobo sauce, salt, pepper, pork chops
name: sweet and spicy pork chops

steps: In a blender or food processor, combine strawberry-flavored tea bags, boiling water, sugar, lemon juice, cranberry-strawberry drink and blend until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings.
ingredients: strawberry-flavored tea bags, boiling water, sugar, lemon juice, cranberry-strawberry drink
name: strawberry tea

steps: Tear or cut bread into bite sized pieces. Mix all remaining ingredients except the cream cheese together and pour over the bread. Stuff randomly with chunks of the cream cheese. Refrigerate overnight and bake at 350 for 45-60 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar and serve with assorted warm syrups.
ingredients: eggs, vanilla extract, heavy cream, milk, cinnamon, sugar
name: the perfect french toast

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: potatoes, salt, pepper, butter, half-and-half
name: tasty mashed potatoes

steps: In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese, sour cream, and worcestershire sauce until creamy. Fold in parmesan cheese and chicken. Pour into pie plate sprayed with pam. Liberally sprinkle more parmesan on top. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. Serve hot with crackers.
ingredients: velveeta cheese, sour cream, chopped tomato, green onions, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce
name: entertaining dip

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place the fish fillets in a baking pan coated with cooking spray. Salt and pepper to taste. Combine the tomatoes, artichoke hearts, olives, and feta cheese. Top the fish with the mixture. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until the fish flakes easily.
ingredients: firm tofu, sliced mushrooms, black olives, sun-dried tomatoes, turmeric, salt
name: vegan mediterranean scramble

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Butter a 9 x 5 x 3 inch loaf pan. Cream butter with sugar for 6 minutes, until light. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Blend in bananas and lemon juice. Sift together flour, baking soda and salt. Blend into lemon mixture along with lemon zest. Turn into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour or until tested done. Remove, cool for 15 minutes and turn out of pan. Cool completely.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, lemon peel, milk, lemon extract, unsifted all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, pecans
name: lemon nut bread

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: baby back ribs, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sugar, ketchup, garlic
name: asian bbq ribs

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until berries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the berries against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the berries and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: berries, orange juice, red wine vinegar, honey
name: fresh berry sauce

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcrumbs mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: sesame oil, teriyaki sauce, chicken cutlets, plain breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, ground ginger, garlic powder, olive oil
name: sesame chicken cutlets

steps: In a large bowl, combine all vegetables and cabbage. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Toss together the vegetables and dressing until thoroughly combined. Taste and correct seasoning. Refrigerate 30 minutes to let flavors blend. Serve very cold.
ingredients: cabbage, onion, green bell pepper, granulated sugar, salt, vinegar, miracle whip, pepper, paprika
name: mom s ohio coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: bananas, oil, eggs, flour, sugar, nutmeg, baking powder
name: yummy banana cake no milk

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a loaf pan with cooking spray. In a bowl gently mix all your ingredients until well combined. Transfer meat mixture in loaf pan and gently press down. Bake until internal temperature reaches 180 degrees, about 1 hour and 15 minutes. As an option you can brush the top of the meatloaf with a little extra wing sauce when you pull it out of the oven to give it a better appearance.
ingredients: buffalo wing sauce, italian style breadcrumbs, boneless skinless chicken breasts, ranch dressing
name: baked buffalo chicken

steps: Place the pork shoulder in a slow cooker. Pour the root beer over the meat. Cover and cook on low until well cooked and the pork shreds easily, 6 to 7 hours. Drain well. Stir in barbecue sauce. Serve over hamburger buns.
ingredients: boneless pork shoulder, barbecue sauce, root beer, dry onion soup mix, salt and black pepper, hamburger bun, pickle
name: root beer bbq pulled pork

steps: Mix tuna with just enough mayonnaise to keep it together. Lightly spread each piece of bread with mayonnaise. Make 3 sandwiches spreading tuna not quite to the edge of the bread. Cut the crusts off the sandwiches. Cut each sandwich diagonally both ways, making 4 triangles. Combine egg, milk, flour and salt. Dip each triangle into egg mixture and then coat with the corn flake crumbs. Deep fry at 375 degrees until golden brown.
ingredients: tuna, celery, onion, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, sandwich bread, eggs, milk, butter
name: french toast tuna sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat together butter and shortening until light and fluffy. Add sugar and cream together until very light. Add vanilla, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each egg. Gradually fold in flour until a soft, workable dough forms. Shape into balls and place on cookie sheets. Dip the bottom of a flat bottomed glass in sugar and use it to mash down the balls of dough. Bake in preheated oven until done. Immediately remove from pan to cool.
ingredients: crisco, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla, milk, food coloring
name: my favorite decorator cake icing

steps: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the butter and sauté until melted. Add the garlic and sauté until fragrant. Add the parsley and sauté until fragrant. Add the ciabatta and sauté until fragrant. Add the ciabatta
ingredients: unsalted butter, dijon mustard, fresh thyme leaves, parsley, sea salt, ciabatta
name: mustard croutons

steps: Heat oven to 250 degrees f. Put foil baked corn in a large lightly buttered roasting pan. Melt margarine in medium saucepan. Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil without stirring 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in soda and vanilla. Pour over foil baked corn gradually, mixing well. Bake one hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool completely. Break apart if necessary and store in tightly covered tin box.
ingredients: corn, aluminum foil, butter, sugar, curry powder, red pepper flakes
name: foil baked corn

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely.
ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, cinnamon, walnuts, apples, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, milk, eggs
name: apple cheddar walnut bread

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, teriyaki sauce, mixed salad greens, sliced water chestnuts, green onions, pineapple chunks in juice, olive oil
name: hot teriyaki chicken salad

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, seasoning salt, dried thyme
name: herb seasoned chicken breasts

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake tilapia at 400 for 15-20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily.
ingredients: fresh tarragon, apple cider vinegar, butter, minced garlic clove, tilapia fillet
name: microwave tilapia

steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Stir well. Marinate for at least 12 hours or up to 3 days in refrigerator. Drain thoroughly. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: pitted ripe olives, garlic, chili paste, olive oil
name: spicy garlic olives

steps: Place your hot dogs bun on top of the bed of melted cheese, sprinkle a layer of shredded cheese inside, then insert them in your toaster oven until the cheese is slightly melted. Insert your cooked chorizo chihuahua dogs into each bun on top of the bed of melted cheese, sprinkle a layer of shredded cheese inside, then insert them in your toaster oven until the cheese is slightly melted. Place your cooked chorizo chihuahua dogs into each bun on top of the bed of melted cheese, sprinkle a layer of shredded cheese inside, then insert them in your toaster oven until the cheese is slightly melted. Place your cooked chorizo chihuahua dogs into each bun on top of the bed of melted cheese, sprinkle a layer of shredded
ingredients: hot dog buns, hot dogs, mozzarella cheese, pizza sauce, parmesan cheese
name: toasted pizza hot dogs

steps: In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, bell pepper, spaghetti, beef broth, pasta until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, bell pepper, spaghetti, beef broth, pasta
name: easy beef skillet dinner

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f. until done, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: catfish nuggets, eggs, cornmeal, flour, salt, seafood seasoning
name: quick and easy catfish cakes

steps: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chicken and water and cook 10 minutes or until browned. Add more water if necessary to prevent chicken from getting too dry. Set chicken aside. Pour off fat and water. Add remaining ingredients. Heat to a boil. Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat to low. Cover and cook 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: dark chicken meat, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, garlic, diced tomatoes, chicken broth, great northern beans
name: garlic basil chicken

steps: In a large pot or dutch oven heat oil over medium-high heat. Add scallions, celery, and onions, stir until vegetables are wilted, approximately 5 minutes. Add broth and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and add peas, stir until vegetables are wilted, approximately 5 minutes. Remove from heat and carefully transfer to bowl of food processor or blender, do this in batches if necessary. Add
ingredients: chicken broth, beef broth, bottled clam juice, white port, white pepper, sea scallops, green onion tops
name: scallop soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cook up ground beef. Drain off fat. Add tomato soup and seasonings. Simmer 5-8 minutes. Add green beans and corn. Put in baking dish, top with mashed potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes, or until bubbly. Serve topped with cheese.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, onion, celery ribs, frozen mixed vegetables, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, instant potato flakes, milk, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese
name: ww shepherd s pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together vegetable oil and lemon juice in small bowl. Mix cheese, biscuit mix, and pepper in a shallow small bowl. Dip chicken into oil mixture, then coat with cheese mixture. Heat margarine in large skillet over medium heat until hot. Saute chicken until golden and done. Serve with a squeeze of lemon, spaghetti sauce, or parmesan cheese.
ingredients: chicken, egg, milk, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, butter
name: oven fried parmesan chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degree celsius. Lightly grease and line a 20cm cake tin and line with baking paper. In a bowl combine the flour, oats, bicarbonate of soda, allspice, sugar and pecans. Make a well in the centre and then add the oil and egg and then the apples and combine all ingredients well together. Pour mix into the prepared tin and cook for 35 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: duncan hines butter cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, oil, water, cream sherry, pecans, eggs, sugar, butter, sherry wine
name: easy easy friendship cake

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pancetta, egg yolks, cream, parmesan cheese, egg yolks, cream, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan
ingredients: pancetta, olive oil, sea salt, ground pepper, egg yolks, cream, parmesan cheese, penne
name: penne alla carbonara

steps: In blender or food processor, puree the first 6 ingredients until smooth. Pour into serving bowl. Add cooked pasta, peas, shrimp, and avocado. Toss to coat well. Salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: raw shrimp, bow tie pasta, italian dressing, black olives, frozen peas, parmesan cheese, feta cheese with dried basil and tomato
name: shrimp with bow tie pasta

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine orange juice and honey. Add the fruits. Toss to coat. Refrigerate, covered, until chilled, at least 1 hour. Sprinkle with mint before serving.
ingredients: orange juice, lemon juice, honey, brandy, bananas, apples, dried apricot halves, crystallized ginger, kiwi fruit
name: gingered fruit salad

steps: Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately.
ingredients: eggs, potato, lemon juice, fresh chives, butter, salt and pepper
name: irish omelet

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: apples, cashew milk, water, pure maple syrup, cinnamon, flax seed
name: slow cooker overnight steel cut oats with apples

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffin cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done.
ingredients: bread, ham, swiss cheese, eggs
name: eggs in a cloud

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is golden brown.
ingredients: fish fillet, milk, onion, butter, cheddar cheese, salt & pepper
name: easy cheese baked fish

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. and grease a 12 hole donut pan. In a large mixing bowl stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, nutmeg, salt, buttermilk, eggs, butter, stir until just combined. Divide batter between prepared donut pan. Bake until toothpick comes out clean, 7 to 9 minutes. Let donuts cool in pans for 5 minutes then take them out of pan and let cool on a cooling rack.
ingredients: egg whites, buttermilk, safflower oil, whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar, nutmeg, clove, mace, cinnamon
name: baked buttermilk spiced doughnuts

steps: Place walnuts in blender. Pulse for a few seconds. Add walnuts. Process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in cheese. To serve, toss into warm buttered pasta. Can be refrigerated in a tightly covered jar for a week. May be frozen, but then it is best not to stir in cheese until after defrosting.
ingredients: basil leaves, olive oil, walnuts, garlic, parmesan cheese, butter, salt
name: basil walnut pesto

steps: To make the syrup, in a medium saucepan combine the zest, sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar. Remove from the heat, cover and let steep for 15 minutes. Transfer the syrup to a 2-quart pitcher. Let cool. Add the lemon juice, chopped lemon rinds and cold water. Stir well to combine. Chill until very cold. Serve over ice.
ingredients: lemons, limes, oranges, water, sugar
name: aunt frances lemonade

steps: Peel and core pears. Peel and seed lemon and orange. Put fruit though a grinder or food processor. Save juices. In a kettle or large saucepan, combine pulp and juice with sugar and pineapple. Tie cloves, cinnamon, and ginger in cheesecloth. Add to pot. Stir the mixture while heating. Simmer about 30 minutes. Remove spice bag and ladle into hot sterilized jars. Process pints in a water bath for 15 minutes.
ingredients: pineapple chunks, sugar, vinegar, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, salt, allspice, red food coloring
name: spiced pineapple

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: smoked sausage, sweet onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, mushrooms, salt & freshly ground black pepper, butter
name: sausage peppers and onions

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Grate the potatoes and onions on the middle sized hole of a grater. Either by hand or by food processor. If you grate the potatoes and onions together, the potatoes will not turn grey right away. Put into a large bowl or soup pot, and mix well with remaining ingredients. Grease your baking pans, and pour mixture evenly into the pans. Bake for 15 minutes at 500f, then lower the oven to 400f until done. Eat and enjoy.
ingredients: potato, beef flank steak, onion, salt, pepper
name: potato and steak overnight kugel aka yapchik

steps: Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Add thinly sliced beef and cook with the flour mixture another 5 minutes set aside and keep warm. For cheese sauce, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add thinly sliced beef and cook with the flour mixture another 5 minutes
ingredients: whole kernel corn, sharp cheddar cheese, red peppers, onion, cayenne pepper, chili powder, salt
name: dehydrator taco chips

steps: Heat skillet over medium high heat. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, green onions, dry mustard, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, fresh parsley, whipping cream
name: mushroom sauce for broiled or grilled steaks

steps: Place the pork tenderloin in a large pot and cover with a lid. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook for 10 minutes. Add the soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy sauce, soy
ingredients: pork spareribs, garlic cloves, thick soy sauce, dry sherry, sugar, vegetable oil, sesame oil, water
name: bergy dim sum 4 roasted spareribs

steps: In a large pot, bring 1 inch of water to a boil. Add kale and salt. Cover and cook, stirring once, for 5 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Return kale to pot. Drizzle with olive oil. Toss and serve.
ingredients: water, quinoa, kale, meyer lemon, scallions, walnut oil, pine nuts, goat cheese, salt & pepper
name: one pot kale and quinoa pilaf

steps: In a medium bowl combine the cajun seasoning, cayenne, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic
ingredients: mahi mahi, cajun seasoning, cayenne, salt, mixed fruit, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar
name: cajun mahi mahi with fruit salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: old bay seasoning, dried oregano leaves, garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, olive oil, lemon juice, large shrimp, angel hair pasta
name: old bay spicy shrimp scampi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: sugar, oil, eggs, banana, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, strawberry
name: banana strawberry muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place steamed ginger fish vegetables in a large bowl and set aside. In a small bowl, mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over steamed ginger fish vegetables. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: white fish fillets, cooked rice, fresh ginger, fresh lemon juice, mixed vegetables
name: steamed ginger fish vegetables

steps: Heat coconut oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stirring constantly
ingredients: cod, coconut, mayonnaise, honey, lemon juice, dijon mustard, curry powder, salt
name: lemon curry cod

steps: In a small saucepan, combine semolina, jaggery, coconut milk, cinnamon stick, green cardamom powder, dates, cashews. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Simmer, uncovered, for about 5-10 minutes or until the liquid is absorbed and the fruit softened.
ingredients: semolina, jaggery, coconut milk, cinnamon stick, green cardamom powder, dates, cashews
name: semolina porridge

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 2 quart casserole dish. Scrub potatoes, chop into halves or quarters, depending on size of potato. Place in casserole dish. Cut butter into pats. Place randomly around top of potatoes. Sprinkle with parsley. Sprinkle with garlic. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 10 minutes. Stir. Cover. Continue baking at 375 for about an hour, or until the potatoes are tender, stirring a couple more times during baking.
ingredients: baby potatoes, olive oil, minced garlic cloves, italian seasoning
name: boiled baby confetti potatoes
