steps: Heat grill or broiler to medium high heat. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on a platter and serve.
ingredients: orange, onion, garlic cloves, skirt steaks, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, beer, soy sauce
name: beer marinated grilled skirt steak

steps: In 2 large cups or glass mugs, mix the coffee and sugar. In a small saucepan over low heat, warm the cream. Add the cocoa and mix well. Add the cream mixture to the coffee and top with a dollop of whipped cream and the grated chocolate. Serve with a cinnamon stick.
ingredients: caramel syrup, apple schnapps, espresso, milk
name: hyper active apple

steps: Combine radishes, olives and scallions in a small bowl. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper together. Pour over radish mixture and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate. To serve, place one or two boston lettuce leaves on each plate and divide salad evenly among plates.
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, cinnamon, salt, olive oil, oranges, radishes, red onions, garlic cloves, fresh mint leaves
name: radish red onion and orange salad morocco

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion mixture to skillet and saute, stirring frequently, approximately 2 minutes until tender. Add peppers and onion mixture to skillet and saute, stirring frequently, approximately 2 minutes until tender. Blend onion soup mix with water, add to pan and add diced potatoes. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, 10 minutes. Return potatoes to skillet and simmer, covered, an additional 10 minutes or until potatoes are done and potatoes are fork tender.
ingredients: hamburger, yellow onion, green beans, tomato soup, potatoes, butter
name: lone ranger

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl, combine butter, banana, honey, egg white, pure vanilla extract, self-raising flour, milk, milk powder, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites. Mix well and allow to sit for 15 minutes. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, banana, honey, egg white, pure vanilla extract, self-raising flour, milk
name: sugar free banana soft cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Grease and flour 9x13 pan. Combine dry ingredients in mixing bowl. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, self-rising flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, vanilla essence, water. Beat for 2 minutes. Beat in egg whites, beat until very smooth. Bake for 35 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, self-rising flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, vanilla essence, water
name: easy eggless sponge cake

steps: In a large skillet melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook about 15 minutes or until onion gets soft and starts to brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium-low heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Keep warm in the oven until remaining quesadillas are cooked. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: cooked extra lean ground beef, taco sauce, burrito-size whole wheat tortillas, blue cheese, frozen chopped spinach, red pepper flakes
name: beef blue cheese and spinach quesadillas

steps: In a large nonstick frying pan, add olive oil and turn on low heat. Let oil warm. Add scallops with salt and pepper and add to hot oil. Add butter and cook on each side for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and add to serving dish. Sprinkle with fresh lemon. Place chives over top and serve.
ingredients: sea scallops, olive oil, fresh basil leaves, prosciutto
name: prosciutto wrapped scallops

steps: In a small bowl, combine evaporated milk, canned peach halves, lemon jelly crystals, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced
ingredients: evaporated milk, canned peach halves, lemon jelly crystals, lemon, juice of, toasted sliced almonds
name: peach whip parfait

steps: Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, garlic salt, boneless skinless chicken breast half, olive oil, zucchini, red potatoes, salt and pepper
name: foil chicken casserole for 1

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, ground turkey, carrot, onions, water, eggs. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: white rice, ground turkey, carrot, onions, water, eggs
name: puppy dog bad kidneys food

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix gently. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, spiral shaped pasta, tomatoes, green peppers, cheddar cheese, onion, iceberg lettuce, plain doritos, western salad dressing
name: taco pasta salad

steps: Heat a large saucepan over a low heat and add the butter. When the butter has melted, add the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper to taste, then increase the heat and stir. When the moisture from the mushrooms has been released, allow it to evaporate, concentrating the flavour. This might happen quickly or slowly, depending entirely on the type of mushrooms used. Add teh paprika and cayenne and fry for a few moments longer, until the paprika turns a shade darker. Finally, add teh sour cream or creme fraiche and dill, and allow it to bubbvle gently for a further 5 minutes or so. Serve immediately with rice, pasta or spatzle.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, shallot, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, pecans, heavy cream, madeira wine
name: pecan mushroom pat

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, sugar, half-and-half, vanilla
name: easy chocolate fondue

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts,
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, eggs, milk, crushed pineapple, vegetable oil, powdered sugar
name: pineapple drop doughnuts

steps: Beat egg. Add sugar and remaining ingredients. Stir well. Bake at 350 in a greased 7x11 shallow pan for 30-40 minutes. When cool, cut into bars. Sprinkled with powdered sugar if desired.
ingredients: sugar, dates, walnuts, milk, butter, vanilla
name: date loaf candies

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in the eggs, butter, chocolate, rum, coffee extract, whipped cream, vanilla extract, chili powder, powdered cocoa mix, boiling water, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream, instant coffee granules, whipped cream
ingredients: light brown sugar, semisweet chocolate, orange rind, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, strong coffee, half-and-half, cinnamon stick
name: frothy mexi mocha coffee

steps: Add all ingredients except octopus to a sauce pan. Bring to boil, stirring occassionally. Allow to boil for 3 minutes. Stir in octopus and remove from heat. Cover and let sit until tender, fluff with fork occassionally. Serve with a lemon slice and enjoy.
ingredients: octopus, olive oil, wine vinegar, onion, greek oregano, pepper, rosemary, lemon juice
name: marinated octopus

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Place ham in a 13x9 baking pan. Pour apple cider over ham. In medium bowl stir together remaining ingredients. Spoon sauce over entire ham. Bake, basting every 15 minutes with pan juices for 60 to 70 minutes or until heated through. Serve carved ham with pan juices, garnish with apple slices.
ingredients: low-sodium smoked ham, vegetable oil cooking spray, country-style dijon mustard, guinness stout, fresh parsley, dark brown sugar, ground cinnamon, fresh parsley sprig
name: guinness baked ham

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together ingredients. Let meat marinate at least one hour. Cook in 9x13 baking dish for 30 to 45 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: round steak, oil, garlic clove, soy sauce, salt, water, green pepper, onion, cornstarch, mushrooms
name: peppy mignon s pepper steak

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: chicken breast, lemons, juice of, cream cheese, olive oil, salt, herbs
name: chicken lemon cream cheese

steps: In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings.
ingredients: okra, salt, olive oil, onions, fresh tomato, cider vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper
name: okra with tomatoes bamies me saltsa

steps: Bring water to a rolling boil, then remove from heat. Stir together boiling water and powdered gelatin in a mixing bowl. Stir constantly until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cold water and alcohol. Pour mixture into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have lids. Pour the mix into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have l
ingredients: cherry jell-o, gelatin, triple sec, rum
name: beach comber jello shots cubes

steps: In a large skillet, cook rice in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until rice is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: long-grain rice, butter, mushroom, onion, celery, water, beef bouillon cube, salt, thyme leaves
name: rice and mushroom casserole

steps: In a large bowl combine flour and salt. Make a well. Mix together the wet ingredients and pour into well. Mix well. Turn out onto a floured board and knead until firm, shiny and elastic. At this point cover and chill for 1 hour, up to 24 hours. When ready to use follow instructions for manual pasta machine or cut into manageable pieces and roll out to desired thickness, cut into desired shape.
ingredients: flour, eggs, salt, water
name: hungarian noodles homemade

steps: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium-low heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley.
ingredients: spanish olives, garlic cloves, dried red chilies, black peppercorns, lemon, parsley, fresh bay leaves, salt, red wine vinegar
name: marinated black olives tapas

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a food processor, add the passata, chicken stock, onion, arborio rice, artichokes, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese. Process until it resembles large flake oatmeal or to your liking. Fill the hollowed out bread and replace the round cut out section. Wrap in aluminium foil and bake in the oven for about 40 minutes. I cut up a bagette for dipping and serve them around the hot garlic dip.
ingredients: passata, chicken stock, onion, arborio rice, artichokes, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese
name: baked artichoke and pesto risotto

steps: In a large stainless steel stockpot, combine all ingredients. Place over medium heat and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to very low and keep warm for about 30 minutes to let the flavours blend. Strain out the cloves and the cinnamon before serving. Ladle in to heatproof cups.
ingredients: red wine, orange, clove, cinnamon sticks, bay leaf, brown sugar, brandy
name: dawn s mulled wine

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick spray. Set aside. Crumble beef into large mixing bowl. Add all other ingredients and mix well with hands. Shape into two oblong loaves. Place on baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until at least 160f inside. We like ours well done. After 80 minutes it was 180f and perfect. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: lean ground beef, fresh breadcrumbs, milk, eggs, onion soup mix, ketchup, brown sugar, ground mustard, worcestershire sauce
name: barbecued beef loaf

steps: Put chicken in roaster. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid
ingredients: chicken, garlic, onion, crushed red pepper flakes, sesame oil, low sodium soy sauce, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, ground coriander, sesame seeds
name: bene s chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350. After browning and crumbling the breakfast sausage, place it in the bottom of a 9x13 baking dish. Beat eggs, add cheese and salsa verde. Pour egg mixture over the sausage. Bake for 45 minutes or until eggs are set.
ingredients: bread, bulk pork sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk
name: renewal egg casserole

steps: Place chicken thighs in slow cooker. Combine stock, peanut butter, soy sauce, cilantro, lime juice, chile pepper and ginger. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro.
ingredients: chicken thighs, chicken broth, lemon rind, fresh lemon juice, alfredo sauce, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, onion, dried calimyrna fig
name: chicken with figs and lemon crock pot

steps: In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, vegetable oil, gingerroot, garlic cloves, green onions, spinach, fresh cilantro, hoisin sauce, thai sweet chili sauce, reduced sodium soy sauce
name: sweet chili chicken

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: green onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, bacon, mushroom, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, fresh ground black pepper
name: quick creamy pasta sauce

steps: Heat oil in a frypan that will take the cutlets in a single layer and which will go into a preheated oven. Over a moderately high heat, brown the chops on both sides until they are golden, remove to a plate. Add the potatoes and cook them until they are a golden colour, remove to a plate. Add the chops back into the pan, and top with the potatoes and some of the bruised garlic. Season with salt and pepper and pour over the wine and boil for a few minutes. Put pan into the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Meanwhile melt the butter in a medium pot and add the cabbage and season with pepper and salt, cover and cook over a low heat for 3 to 5 minutes. To serve place a bed of cabbage on the plates and top with a chop and a portion of the garlic and potatoe wedges.
ingredients: fish fillets, sour cream, lemon juice, light soy sauce, instant minced garlic, onion flakes, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper
name: bergie s fish filets

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan, add the mushrooms and cook over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened. Toss the mushrooms in a large bowl with the shredded chicken. Combine all the lime and soy dressing ingredients in a small jug or bowl, mix well and pour two-thirds of the dressing over the warm mushrooms. Arrange the salad leaves in a serving dish and toss through the remaining dressing. Top with the chicken and mushrooms and serve warm.
ingredients: boneless chicken, onion flakes, soy sauce, honey, garlic powder, green pepper, sliced mushrooms
name: chicken mushrooms ww

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, custard powder, baking soda, powdered sugar, margarine, butter
name: custard cream cookies

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray and cook chicken for 6 minutes. Drain. Add hot sauce and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3-5 minutes or until sauce is thickened and chicken is no longer pink in center. Place lettuce on warm tortillas and drizzle dressing on top. Place chicken and sauce over lettuce and top with blue cheese. Roll up and serve.
ingredients: cooked rice, salsa, black beans, mexicorn whole kernel corn, cooked chicken, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas, sour cream
name: super easy chicken cheese wraps

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Toast oatmeal in a shallow pan for 10 minutes to brown, watch carefully. Remove from oven and in small mixing bowl combine oatmeal with remaining ingredients. Press into 9-inch pie plate. Fill with desired filling and bake or bake crust empty for later use.
ingredients: oatmeal, brown sugar, pecans, raspberries
name: steel cut oatmeal with a crispy maple crust

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions, drain and set aside. In a medium saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Add cheese slices, one by one, until all are melted through, and cheese is smooth. Stir in the canned milk, more or less to your desired consistency. Add drained macaroni to cheese mixture. Add salt and pepper to taste, and mix well until coated. Serve immediately.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, milk, condensed cream of mushroom soup, processed cheese
name: lil twist on macaroni and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line a 15x10 inch pan with foil, spray with nonstick cooking spray. Cube the potato chips into nugget size pieces or a little bigger. On a plate, mix the cornflakes, paprika, salt and pepper. On another plate, beat the egg until thoroughly mixed. Dip the potato chips into the egg, then the cornflake mixture. Place the potato chips onto the pan and drizzle with the butter. Bake twenty minutes or until brown on top, turning once. Please check to make sure they are done, as different breasts are of different thicknesses.
ingredients: sour cream and onion potato chips, parsley flakes, egg, worcestershire sauce, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: quick n crunchy potato chip chicken

steps: Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper. Blend cottage cheese and cream cheese together until fluffy. Spoon noodles into grease 10x6x2 inch baking dish. Spread cheese mixture over noodles. Pour meat sauce on top. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground chuck, water, beef bouillon cubes, cream of mushroom soup, salt, black pepper, egg noodles, sour cream
name: poohrona s beef noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool completely.
ingredients: egg white, salt, ground cumin, orange, paprika, blanched almonds
name: citrus spice marcona almonds

steps: Heat olive oil in heavy non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saute until just opaque in the center, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer fish to platter. Add parsley and crushed pepper to same skillet and saute for one minute. Add tomatoes, olives and garlic. Saute about two minutes until tomatoes soften and get juicy. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Spoon over fish and serve hot.
ingredients: garlic cloves, shallots, lemongrass, turmeric, chilies, salt, pepper, oil, boneless fish fillet, fish sauce
name: spicy grilled fish pieces

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: wakame seaweed, japanese cucumber, rice vinegar, sugar, soy sauce
name: seaweed and cucumber salad

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Remove skin from chicken breasts and place in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: egg, dry breadcrumbs, salt, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, roasted sweet red peppers, italian seasoning, feta cheese
name: chicken with red pepper sauce

steps: In large serving bowl, place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: red apple, pear, red grapes, lemon juice, mayonnaise, honey, cinnamon
name: apple pear salad

steps: In a large saucepan, combine wholemeal self-rising flour, self-raising flour, powdered milk, sugar, cinnamon, apple, sultana, water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and cool. Combine wholemeal self-rising flour, self-raising flour, powdered milk, sugar, cinnamon, apple, sultana, water. Add to creamed mixture and mix well. Drop onto greased cookie sheet in marble-sized balls. Press flat with bottom of greased glass dipped in the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Bake in 350f oven 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool.
ingredients: wholemeal self-rising flour, self-raising flour, powdered milk, sugar, cinnamon, apple, sultana, water
name: wholemeal apple cinnamon scones

steps: In a large saucepan combine the lemon, evaporated milk, sugar, salt, white chocolate chips, marshmallows, coconut, white almond bark and mix well. Transfer to a bowl and chill for 4 hours, or until firm. Form mixture by heaping teaspoons into balls and roll lightly in peanuts. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for 1 hour, or until firm. Chill on a baking sheet lined with wax paper for
ingredients: fresh lemon, evaporated milk, sugar, salt, white chocolate chips, marshmallows, coconut, white almond bark
name: lemon coconut white chocolate truffles

steps: Preheat oven to 450. When oven is ready, warm 2 tbsp of the olive oil in a 9 x 13 inch baking pan. Add rosemary, return to oven until rosemary begins to sizzle. Add shrimp, sprinkle with the orange zest, salt and pepper and remaining olive oil. Roast until the shrimp turns pink, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: pineapple preserves, orange marmalade, lemon juice, water, cornstarch, cooked shrimp
name: shrimp with orange pineapple sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: olive oil, sweet potatoes, fresh oregano, garlic, sea salt, cracked pepper, chicken breast fillets, oil
name: chicken roasted on sweet potatoes and garlic

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Cut chicken in half. Arrange, skin side up, in a roasting pan. Combine butter, lemon juice, and spices in a small bowl and mix well. Brush chicken with mixture. Roast until juices run clear. Broil 6 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
ingredients: parsley, garlic, dried rosemary, dried thyme, dried sage, unsalted chicken stock, potatoes, roasting chickens
name: roast chicken stuffed with herbed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, lemon zest, dill weed, salt, pepper and brown sugar. Cut the marinated asparagus in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the marinated asparagus in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes, or until the marinated asparagus is tender.
ingredients: asparagus, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic cloves, dill weed, salt & fresh ground pepper
name: marinated grilled asparagus

steps: Preheat oven to 400c 400f. Heat a fry pan over high heat add oil and chicken and cook for 3 mins each side or until well browned, set aside. Add leeks and zest to the pan and cook for 5 mins each side or until leeks are golden. Place leek mix, rice and stock in a baking dish, cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 20 mins. The risotto will be quite liquid at this stage. Stir the parmesan, lemon juice, mint and salt and pepper through the risotto. Stir for 2 mins to thicken then serve.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast, onions, red bell pepper, instant rice, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, chicken broth, artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese
name: lemon chicken and rice with artichokes

steps: Preheat oven 375f oil a 13x9x2-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine olive oil and garlic. In another bowl, combine crackers and parmesan cheese. Dip oysters into oil mixture then coat with crumb mixture until evenly coated. Arrange in baking dish. Sprinkle with sherry and any remaining cracker mixture. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes to brown.
ingredients: oysters, prosciutto, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese, tomatoes, lemon, chives
name: oysters oceania

steps: Cook pasta and let cool. Cut the tails off the shrimp and cut into bite sized pieces. I cut them in half. Mix pasta, mayonnaise, salad dressing and shrimp. Put in refrigerator to chill before serving.
ingredients: shell macaroni, shrimp, onion, celery ribs, dill pickles, eggs, mayonnaise, salad dressing
name: jan s macaroni salad

steps: Place strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Place cookies on bottom of 9-inch springform pan. Beat cream cheese and sugar in bowl on medium speed until well blended. Gradually add juice, beating well after each addition. Stir in strawberries. Add cool whip. Stir with wire whisk until well blended. Pour over cookies. Freeze several hours to overnight until firm. Let stand in fridge 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: berries, splenda granular, milk, vanilla
name: instant fruit ice cream

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first six ingredients and form into cocktail size meatballs. Place on jelly roll style pan with lip. Bake meatballs in oven for 15-20 minutes until done. Melt butter in saucepan. Add garlic and saut for 1-2 minutes. Stir in flour. Stir in chicken broth and cook until thickened. Combine meatballs and sauce. Keep warm in crockpot if serving for party
ingredients: ground beef, ground pork, eggs, pace picante sauce, ground pepper, salt, garlic powder, italian seasoning, instant mashed potatoes, parmesan cheese
name: shannon s meatballs

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Grease a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place bread in the bottom and sprinkle with sausage and cheese. Beat eggs, milk, salt, sugar, cooking oil, eggs, milk, cream-style sweet corn, cheese, onion, parsley. Pour over the bread mixture. Bake 40-45 minutes or until eggs are set in the center and lightly browned.
ingredients: self raising flour, salt, sugar, cooking oil, eggs, milk, cream-style sweet corn, cheese, onion, parsley
name: easy cheesy mielie bread

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. In a large skillet over medium heat, cook smoked haddock tomatoes and spinach until tender. Add onion and saute until tender. Stir in chicken broth and sage, simmer 1-2 minutes. Add spinach and cook just until it wilts. Salt and pepper to taste. Toss linguini with sauce and serve sprinkled with parmesan.
ingredients: dry linguine, smoked haddock, low-fat creme fraiche, cherry tomatoes, lemon, zest of, small capers, baby spinach
name: linguine with smoked haddock tomatoes and spinach

steps: Mix all dry ingredients first. Add oil and water, mix well. Use ladle to measure desired mixture into desired non-stick skillet. Cook as desired, flip and cook opposite side. Remove from heat. Use cooking spray to grease skillet with before cooking pancakes, or use 1 teaspoon butter to grease skillet, if desired for added flavor.
ingredients: pancake mix, flour, coconut flour, ground flax seeds, baking soda, ground cinnamon, kefir, whole milk, egg, coconut oil
name: gluten free pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: graham crackers, unsalted butter, sweetened flaked coconut, coconut extract, salt
name: graham cracker coconut pie crust

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add beef and potato. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: ground beef, chili powder, garlic powder, onion, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, cheese, salsa, tabasco brand chipotle pepper sauce, flour tortillas
name: beef and potato burritos

steps: Heat oil in a wok. Add potato slices, cover to avoid splatter. Cook 1 minute. Add marjoram, turmeric, salt, and pepper. Stir well. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are crispy and tender. Stir in cilantro.
ingredients: potato, salt, pepper, marjoram, turmeric powder
name: charishma s easy potatoes for beginner cooks

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: canola oil, onion, red bell pepper, brown sugar, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, ground cumin, water, reduced sodium black beans, white wine vinegar
name: very simple black beans caraotas negras

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt butter. Add eggs, one at a time. Beat in vanilla, flour, salt & xanthan gum do not overmix. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool and serve.
ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, splenda granular, eggs, egg yolks, vanilla, cocoa
name: flourless brownies sugar free low carb

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 13 pan with non stick spray. Place flour in bowl and dredge chicken and shake off excess. Place in pan. Sprinkle dry soup mix over all. Empty canned soups into a 4 cup measuring bowl and mix well with enough milk to arrive at the 4 cup level. Pour mixture over the chicken. Bake uncovered 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper, corn flakes
name: creamy cornflake chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325f and grease a ring mold. In a bowl, combine sausage, crushed crackers, 2 eggs, milk, finely chopped onion and finely chopped apple. Mix well. Place into a greased ring mold and unmold onto a baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour. Move to a warm serving plate. Scramble remaining 6 eggs in a skillet and spoon into the center of cooked sausage ring. Serve immediately.
ingredients: pork sausage, cracker crumbs, eggs, milk, onion, apple, cheddar cheese, parsley, salt and pepper, paprika
name: sausage apple ring

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together.
ingredients: italian bread, mayonnaise, lettuce, tomatoes, turkey, cheese
name: quick and easy loaf sized sub submarine sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine dijon mustard, lemon juice, egg and pepper. Brush chicken with mustard mixture. Bake in oven for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and chicken is cooked through. To serve, mix honey dijon sauce and spoon over each chicken breast. Bake in oven
ingredients: onions, garlic clove, butter, whole chicken breasts, dijon mustard, sour cream, salt and pepper, dry white wine, parsley sprig
name: a different chicken dijonaisse

steps: Cook tortellini as directed on package. Cover and cook on medium-low heat 5 minutes or until sauce is thick enough to coat tortellini, stirring occasionally. Stir in red and white clam sauce and cook until sauce is thick enough to coat tortellini, stirring occasionally. Stir in red and white clam sauce and cook until
ingredients: refrigerated cheese tortellini, spaghetti sauce, minced clams, parmesan cheese, alfredo sauce
name: baked tortellini with red and white clam sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place tahini paste on cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
ingredients: sesame seeds, lemon juice, vegetable oil, water, olive oil
name: sesame paste tahini

steps: Bring to a boil in a large saucepan the potatoes and enough salted cold water to cover. Reduce the heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, approx 10 minutes. Drain well. Combine buttermilk, chipotle, salt & pepper in a 1 cup glass measure stirring until blended. Set aside. Return the potatoes to the saucepan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until all the liquid has evaporated. Remove from heat and mash until blended while pouring in the buttermilk.
ingredients: idaho potatoes, butter, onion, salt, pepper, fresh parsley, dried thyme, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: oven chipped potatoes

steps: Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: sour cream, cooked chicken breasts, sliced mushrooms, diced green chilies, onion flakes, chili powder, salt, garlic powder, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: low carb chicken enchilada casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375degf. Combine onions, bacon, tomato juice, bacon drippings, brown sugar, salt, pepper, paprika, dill seed, fresh parsley, fresh parsley sprigpreparation:Preheat oven to 375degf. Combine onions, bacon, tomato juice, bacon drippings, brown sugar, salt, pepper, paprika, dill seed, fresh parsley, fresh parsley sprigpreparation:Preheat oven to
ingredients: onions, bacon, tomato juice, bacon drippings, brown sugar, salt, pepper, paprika, dill seed, fresh parsley
name: baked onions with dill

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, brown meat and onion. Add mushroom soup, mushrooms, black pepper and noodles. Mix well to combine. Simmer 10 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and parsley. Serve at once.
ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast half, fresh white mushrooms, onion, reduced-fat sour cream, chicken broth, fresh dill, salt, ground black pepper
name: quick and lean chicken mushroom stroganoff

steps: Heat oil in 10 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt.
ingredients: turnip greens, water, salt, white vinegar, sugar, bacon drippings, bacon, onion
name: turnip greens

steps: Place chicken pieces in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, and garlic. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges.
ingredients: chicken pieces, lime zest, lime juice, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, basil, kosher salt
name: caribbean lime chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown chicken in skillet. Remove chicken from skillet and place into a baking dish. In the same skillet, combine garlic, cayenne, sugar, salt, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary, thyme, flour, salt,
ingredients: flour, salt, beer, parsley, green onions, chicken drumsticks, salt and pepper, peanut oil
name: beer battered chicken

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: macaroni shells and cheese, ground beef, chili beans, mild green chilies, chili powder, salt, ground cumin
name: chili cheeseburger mac and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, seasoning
name: not grandma s brussels sprouts

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Combine the chicken, cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chiles, taco seasoning and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Fill each tortilla with 2 spoonfuls of filling mix. Fold tortillas and place in baking pan seam side down. When the pan is filled, pour enchilada sauce over the top of all the filled tortillas. Cover the pan and bake for 20-40 minutes.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, chicken, refried beans, salsa, oil, corn tortillas, enchilada sauce
name: chicken and refried bean enchiladas

steps: In a skillet over low heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove to paper towel. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper. Cook and stir over medium heat until eggs are almost set, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low. Add cheese and bacon, stirring gently until eggs are almost set, about 2 minutes.
ingredients: bacon, butter, onion, potatoes, eggs, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk
name: german farmer s breakfast

steps: Heat oil over medium heat in large skillet. Add bacon, onion, tomato soup, spaghetti, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon, tomato soup, bacon,
ingredients: bacon, onion, tomato soup, spaghetti
name: german spaghetti

steps: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits.
ingredients: olive oil, vidalia onion, red onion, fresh parsley, chive & onion cream cheese
name: three onion spread

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Bake potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley.
ingredients: cooking oil, baking potatoes, onion, water, salt and pepper
name: german potatoes

steps: In a large microwave safe bowl, combine the brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, and milk. Combine well, then cook on high in the microwave for 8 minutes. Remove the bowl from the microwave. Pour a small amount of the mixture into a small bowl. Add the egg yolks to the smaller bowl, mixing until well-combined. Pour the egg mixture back into the large bowl, combining well. Return the bowl back to the microwave and cook on high for and additional 1-2 minutes, until the mixture has thickened. Remove from the microwave and stir in the butter and vanilla. Stir until the butter has melted. Pour into the prepared pie shell and chill for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: butter, light brown sugar, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, crunchy peanut butter, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust
name: peanut butter pie oh my

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, evaporated milk, milk, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, cayenne
name: crock pot mac and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, garlic, dried basil, dried parsley, lemon juice, salt, butter, parmesan cheese, green onions
name: ravioli italiano

steps: In a saucepan, add chicken broth, leeks, oatmeal, water, salt and pepper, cream, fresh parsley. Add chicken broth, leeks, oatmeal, water, salt and pepper, cream, fresh parsley. Add chicken broth, leeks, oatmeal, water, salt
ingredients: chicken broth, leeks, oatmeal, water, salt and pepper, cream, fresh parsley
name: cock a leekie

steps: Cook anchovy linguini in a large pan of boiling salted water, uncovered, until just tender, drain. Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the prawns, chilli and garlic and cook, stirring, until the prawns are just cooked through. Remove from the heat and stir in the parsley and lemon rind. Combine the linguine with the prawn mixture and toss gently. This is great served with a simple green salad, if desired.
ingredients: linguine, garlic, olive oil, fresh parsley, anchovy fillets, water
name: anchovy linguini

steps: Cook tuna in water with a dash of salt. Combine all other ingredients in a large bowl with a lid. When pasta is cooked through, drain and rinse in cold water. Add pasta to other ingredients & mix thoroughly. Could be made gluten free if use gluten free pasta.
ingredients: tuna in water, fat free sour cream, pickle relish, hard-boiled eggs, macaroni
name: healthier tuna salad

steps: Wash, peel and cut the potatoes into pieces. Boil in salted water until tender. Mash and add the cheese, sour cream, the milk if needed for creaminess, and salt and pepper. Place in a large pan, top with butter slices and bake at 325 degrees until hot. Broil a few minutes to get the top nice a browned.
ingredients: potato, scallions, milk, salt & freshly ground black pepper, ground mace, butter, blue cheese
name: colcannon mash with blue cheese

steps: Combine the lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice, lime juice,
ingredients: lime, lemon, orange, sugar cube, ginger beer, of fresh mint
name: virgin caipirinha non alcoholic

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: garlic head, olive oil, cream cheese, goat cheese, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, milk, fresh chives
name: great garlic spread

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Heat 1 inch water to boiling in 2-quart saucepan. Add broccoli. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook about 5 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Mix broccoli, rice, broth, soup, pimientos and pepper in 2-quart casserole. Cover and bake 20 minutes. Cut margarine into baking mix, using pastry blender, until crumbly. Sprinkle crumbly mixture over broccoli mixture. Bake uncovered 8 to 10 minutes or until top is light brown.
ingredients: frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese spread, onion, seasoned croutons, salt, pepper
name: vegetable medley bake

steps: Brown beef in large skillet with cover. Add egg noodles, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, water, mexicorn, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese. Cook over low heat until thickened. Add grated cheese on top, if desired. Cover and set aside for 5 mins before serving.
ingredients: medium egg noodles, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, water, mexicorn, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese
name: easy beef skillet supper

steps: Put the red radish in a bowl. Mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Serve immediately, as both the sugar and salt draw out liquid from the vegetables, making the salad soggy.
ingredients: sugar, lemon, sour cream, red radishes, golden delicious apples, cucumber, fresh dill, salt and black pepper
name: red radish salad

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: watermelon, sugar, fresh lemon juice, cold water
name: refreshing watermelon lemonade

steps: In large saucepan, heat through, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, broccoli floret, garlic cloves, butter, parmesan cheese
name: baked farfalle with broccoli

steps: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saute pan over medium-high heat. Fry onions until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top.
ingredients: red lentil, basmati rice, potato, oil, cloves, cumin seed, onion, turmeric, salt, water
name: lentils with rice and potato

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: beef round tip steaks, vegetable oil, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic clove, salt, kaiser rolls, tomatoes
name: onion n pepper beef steak sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat butter and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot.
ingredients: unsalted butter, milk, eggs, white bread, honey, hot water, ground cinnamon, vanilla
name: 2bleu s honey pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease tube pan. Mix first four ingredients in bowl. Separate biscuits into 20 pieces, then cut biscuits into 4 pieces. Toss biscuits with bacon and other ingredients. Put all this into tube pan and drizzle with butter. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: french onion dip, milk, parsley, baking mix, butter
name: yummy french onion biscuits

steps: Put pork strips on a parchment covered sheet pan with sides. This worked for me and avoided that messy cleanup. Let marinade room at temp for half an hour. Bake in a 275 oven for about 90 min, turning once. Remove the meat, pour off any grease, put a flat rack on the pan, return meat laying now on the rack. Run the oven up to 450f bake for about 10 minutes more to crisp. Remove the meat, pour
ingredients: pork spareribs, barbecue sauce, onion, salt, ground black pepper
name: simple country ribs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Whisk butter over both surfaces of each slice of bread. Add lots of brown sugar to the tops, enough to cover the tops without seeing the butter. Sprinkle the cinnamon over the top of the brown sugar. Let bake for about 5-6 minutes, then turn to broil till the top of the brown sugar is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-2 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-
ingredients: bread dough, ground cinnamon, sugar, powdered sugar, margarine, vanilla, milk
name: cinnamon bubble bread

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately. Serve warm and garnish with maple syrup and fresh fruit if desired.
ingredients: green olives, pitted black olives, giardiniera, sesame seed rolls, provolone cheese, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted red peppers
name: meatless muffuletta panini

steps: In medium sized bowl whisk egg. Add salsa and seasoning. Mix in cheese, meat and bread crumbs. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over medium heat until done- about 15 minutes.
ingredients: smoked sausage, eggs, ranch dressing, salsa, cheddar cheese, refried beans, salt and pepper
name: tex mex breakfast

steps: Cook chicken with cooking spray in skillet. When done, add cream of mushroom, mushrooms, and cooked broccoli. Warm. Seperately cook rice. Put chicken on top of rice when serving.
ingredients: chicken breasts, rice, cream of mushroom soup, corn, milk
name: chicken and rice skillet

steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: onions, cucumbers, yoghurt, green coriander, tabasco sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper, stock
name: chilled cucumber soup

steps: Preheat oven 350. In a med bowl add cake mix, whipped egg, and cool whip mix together until well blended. Take a tablespoon of batter and roll into a ball in powdered sugar. Place on parchment paper lined cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 min.
ingredients: gelatin, water, boiling water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, oil
name: cool whip

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chickpeas and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the onion and cook for 2 minutes, or until soft. Add the chickpeas and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Uncover, stir in the pimientos and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve.
ingredients: fresh spinach, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon, juice of, chickpeas, pita bread
name: lemon spinach chickpeas

steps: Combine white wine vinegar, soy sauce, tomato paste, tamarind paste, water, cornstarch, sherry wine. Set aside. In saucepan heat all remaining ingredients until sugar is dissolved and liquid is hot. Slowly add the cornstarch and water mixture, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens, about 1 minute. Remove from heat. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: white wine vinegar, soft brown sugar, soy sauce, tomato paste, tamarind paste, water, cornstarch, sherry wine
name: not too sweet sweet and sour sauce

steps: Cook fettuccine according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove from pan using a slotted spoon. Set in on paper towels to soak up the grease and drain the skillet reserving 3 tablespoons of drippings. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Cook chicken in the bacon drippings over medium high heat until juices run clear. Drain fettuccine, stir into skillet with the chicken. Add the alfredo sauce, spinach, italian seasoning, and bacon. Cook and stir occasionally until heated through. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, parmesan cheese, milk, dry fettuccine, chicken breasts, italian spices, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper
name: chicken fettuccini alfredo

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add chopped parsnips and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the butter and continue stirring until the parsnips are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the baguette with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast baguette under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve baguette on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, ground cumin, parsnips, fennel, vegetable broth, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: fennel parsnip and cumin soup

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Cover and blend until smooth. Press fruit mixture through a fine-mesh strainer over a bowl to extract juices. Discard solids and pour mixture into 3-ounce paper or plastic drink cups or pop molds. Cover cups with foil. Cut a slit in the foil and insert wooden sticks. Freeze several hours or overnight until pops are firm. Remove from cups or molds to serve.
ingredients: gelatin, boiling water, seedless watermelon, granulated sugar, fresh lemon juice
name: watermelon ice pops

steps: In a saucepan, combine the boiling water and chocolate syrup. Add in the milk and stir until blended. Cook and stir over medium heat for 6-8 minutes or until well heated. Add in kahlua. Stir to combine. Pour into mugs or cups. Garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, milk, powdered chocolate milk mix, chocolate whipped cream
name: witches brew hot chocolate

steps: In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve.
ingredients: sour cream, cream cheese, fresh dill weed, lemon juice, rye cocktail bread, cucumber, smoked salmon, lemon peel, fresh dill sprig
name: open faced salmon tea sandwiches

steps: Heat deep skillet over medium-low to medium heat. Add oil and garlic and crushed pepper flakes. Let garlic begin to sizzle in oil. Add tomatoes and crushed tomatoes. Stir in herbs and spices and let sauce come to a boil. Reduce heat and let sauce simmer 10 minutes or until ready to serve. Serve over your favorite pasta.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, canned tomato, dry white wine, flat leaf parsley, tomato paste, fresh oregano, salt, crushed red pepper flakes
name: ww 5 pt shrimp in marinara sauce

steps: Melt 1 tbsp butter in a saucepan. Add lettuce, avocados, prawns, ketchup, mayonnaise, tabasco sauce, brandy. Stir and simmer 10-15 minutes. While the sauce is simmering melt the second tbsp of butter in a skillet and add prawns, saut until fully incorporated, add ketchup, stir. Add coconut milk slowly, stirring constantly, use a whisk so there are no lumps. Add wine and curry paste and tomatoes. Add wine and curry paste and
ingredients: lettuce, avocados, prawns, ketchup, mayonnaise, tabasco sauce, brandy
name: prawn avocado cocktail

steps: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat. Cook the onion, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until softened. Add the potatoes and garlic. Cook for about 12 minutes or until the potatoes have almost evaporated. Stir in the sage.
ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, potatoes, fresh sage
name: sage potatoes

steps: Cook carrots to tender, along with salt and sugar, in enough water to barely cover. Drain unless you have reduced all the water. Place butter, dark brown sugar, mustard and honey in heavy saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick and syrupy. Add cooked carrots and toss to coat them with sauce. Season to taste. Serve hot, sprinkled generously with the chopped parsley.
ingredients: carrots, unsalted butter, lemon juice, coarse grain mustard, cumin
name: carrots in cumin mustard sauce

steps: Mix together the flour, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter, salt, pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter,
ingredients: leeks, butter, flour, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt, spinach
name: leeks spinach

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turning to coat. Remove steak from sauce, reserving sauce mixture. Place steak on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Broil 6 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut steak diagonally across grain into thin slices. While steak stands, bring sauce mixture to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. Reduce heat, and cook 5 minutes. Serve with steak.
ingredients: flank steaks, lemon, shoyu, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, sambal oelek, green onion, dill weed, celery seed
name: flank steak hawaiin

steps: In a large skillet, cook the tabouleh over medium heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid is thickened and coats the tomatoes, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in lemon slices. Transfer to a shallow dish and marinate, chilled, at least 24 hours. These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: bulgar wheat, tomatoes, onion, parsley, salt, white pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil
name: tabouleh

steps: Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a large nonstick frypan over medium high heat. Add chicken, saute 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pan, keep warm. Heat 1 teaspoon oil in pan. Add onion, saute for 5 minutes or until browned. Add apple and marjoram, saute for 5 more minutes. Add the chicken and cider, bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until chicken is done.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, all-purpose flour, butter, onion, apple juice, garlic cloves, apple, fresh thyme leave
name: juicy apple chicken

steps: Place tomato, mozzarella and basil on serving plate. Drizzle with oil and dressing, season.
ingredients: tomatoes, fresh mozzarella ball, fresh basil leaves, salt, pepper, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
name: tomato and fresh mozzarella salad with basil

steps: In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f.
ingredients: butter, sharp cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, creole seasoning, crabmeat, english muffins
name: crab crispies

steps: In a medium saucepan over high heat, bring the potatoes to a boil. Slowly pour the salt and pepper over the potatoes. Cook, stirring constantly, until the potatoes are soft and not mushy. Remove the potatoes from the heat and stir in the polenta. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in the polenta. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in
ingredients: idaho potatoes, salt, bacon, montasio cheese, polenta, olive oil, onion
name: potato polenta

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and eggs over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: butter, unsweetened baking chocolate, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, walnuts, flour
name: boston cooking school brownies

steps: In a saucepan, over medium heat, heat the olive oil, add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds. Stir in the chicken stock and water. Bring to a boil. Add the rice. Reduce heat, cover and cook for 15 minutes or until rice is almost tender. Stir in seasonings, apricots and green onion. Cook an additional 5 minutes to blend flavors.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, long-grain rice, chicken stock, water, turmeric, salt, black pepper, tomato sauce, harissa
name: egyptian rice with spicy tomato sauce

steps: In a large heavy skillet with lid, warm canola oil over medium-low heat. Add the ginger, cinnamon, and cloves. Cook, stirring, for 10 to 15 seconds. Add the cabbage, apples, maple syrup, and salt. Stir, reduce heat to low, cover, and cook for about 30 minutes. After the 30 minutes, add the vinegar and increase heat to medium. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until most of the liquid evaporates. Sprinkle each serving of cabbage with 2 tablespoons of the pumpkin seeds.
ingredients: red cabbage, granny smith apple, russet potato, apple cider, white wine vinegar, sugar, caraway seed, salt and pepper
name: red cabbage and apples

steps: Put the vinegar mixture into a sauce pan, bring to the boil then set aside to cool. Wash the red beets, take them off their stalks and make sure you remove any remaining bits of stalk from the red beets. When the vinegar mixture is cool, remove the cinnamon stick. Take a clean jar and pack in the grapes. Pour the vinegar mixture into the jar to cover the grapes, then seal the jar tightly. Leave the jar in a cool dark place for 2 days before eating - i keep mine in the fridge, because i am not sure how well they keep if not chilled. Eat within 2 weeks of making.
ingredients: red beets, apple cider vinegar, beet juice, granulated sugar, salt, cloves, cinnamon sticks
name: pickled red beets

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions.
ingredients: hoisin sauce, dark soy sauce, dry sherry, garlic, fresh ginger, brown sugar, pork tenderloin, salt
name: bbq cantonese pork tenderloin

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add mustard and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add mustard and cook until
ingredients: cooked ham, light mayonnaise, dijon mustard, pecans, sweet pickle relish, worcestershire sauce, horseradish, hot pepper sauce
name: spice up the party ham spread

steps: To make the crust, mix the flour, sugar, and salt in a medium bowl. Using a pastry blender, cut in the shortening and butter until the mixture resembles coarse meal. Stirring with a fork, add just enough of the egg yolk mixture to moisten the dough so it holds together when pinched between the thumb and forefinger. Gather up into a thick disk and wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, sugar, unsalted butter, shortening, white vinegar, ice water
name: best ever pie crust

steps: Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking soda, salt, white chocolate chips, macadamia nuts
name: white chocolate chip and macadamia nut cookies

steps: Place pineapple marmalade in a large bowl and mix together. Add jalapeos, ginger, sugar, cinnamon, lemon juice, orange marmalade, peach preserves, pepper, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: crushed pineapple in juice, sugar, orange, juice and zest of, lemon, juice and zest of, jalapenos
name: pineapple jalapeno marmalade

steps: Mix spices with breadcrumbs and grated cheese. Thoroughly combine with remaining ingredients, by hand. Shape into balls. Brown in olive oil on all sides, or alternatively, bake in 400 degree oven for approx. 20 to 30 minutes, till browned but not cooked through. The meatballs maintain their shape better using the oven method. Add to spaghetti sauce and simmer for 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, italian style breadcrumbs, egg, mozzarella cheese, pasta sauce, spaghetti
name: cheesy stuffed meatballs and spaghetti

steps: Place the kahlua mixture in a large saucepan over medium high heat, stirring constantly. Add the heavy cream, sugar, kahlua, cornstarch, and water. Bring to a boil over medium high heat. Add the heavy
ingredients: heavy cream, sugar, kahlua, cornstarch, water
name: kahlua cream sauce

steps: In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended.
ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, yogurt, parmesan cheese
name: creamed spinach

steps: Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove foil and bake additional 20 minutes. Remove foil and bake additional
ingredients: corned beef, thousand island dressing, sauerkraut, swiss cheese, rye bread, butter
name: reuben and swiss casserole bake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle the bacon on top. Bake for additional 5 minutes. Serve with crackers or crusty bread.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, unsifted all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, stuffed green olive
name: cheesy olive appetizers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place all ingredients together in medium bowl and mix until blended. Spread in prepared pan. Bake until firm to touch and golden brown, about 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into squares and serve hot.
ingredients: jiffy corn muffin mix, butter recipe cake mix, eggs, milk, water, butter
name: boston market cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: french bread, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes, garlic powder, ground thyme
name: crunchy garlic bread
