steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2-quart baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except the bacon and mix well. Pour into the baking dish and lay the raw strips of bacon on top. Cover and bake for approximately 45 minutes, or until thick and bubbly. Uncover and bake for 5 more minute.
ingredients: bread, baked beans with molasses, bacon, american cheese, mustard, butter
name: boston beanwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender.
ingredients: round steak, sweet onion, olive oil, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, spinach, garlic, merlot, portabella mushroom
name: round steak recipes all dressed up

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the sesame seeds, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: sesame seeds, all-purpose flour, pepper, soy sauce, chicken breasts, margarine
name: oven fried sesame chicken

steps: Heat the oil in a large heavy-bottom saucepan, and stir-fry the onions until transparent. Add the cabbage and stir well. Add the remaining ingredients and stir again. Cover and simmer for 1 hour, or until cabbage is tender-crisp. Add salt and nutmeg. Mix well. Serve warm.
ingredients: vegetable oil, onions, red cabbage, vinegar, salt, sugar, apples, red wine, beef broth
name: rotkohl red cabbage

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: oil, red wine, onion, dried herbs, garlic clove, black pepper, button mushrooms, fresh parsley, low-fat cream cheese, balsamic vinegar
name: low fat mushroom and red wine pate

steps: Place the potatoes into a pot, and fill with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain, and set aside to cool. In a large bowl, mix together the sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, half of the onions, and half of the cheese. Gently stir in the cooled potatoes. Top with remaining cheese and onions, and sprinkle bacon bits over the top.
ingredients: baking potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, bacon, butter, sour cream, scallion, cheddar cheese
name: loaded baked potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 425. In a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. Add flour and stir thoroughly. Add chicken broth and cook until thickened. To the saucepan, add chicken, peas, carrots, onion and salt. Heat to boiling. Pour into a 1. 5 liter casserole. Top with uncooked biscuits. Bake at 425 8-10 minutes or until the biscuits are done.
ingredients: cooked chicken, cheese pasta sauce, frozen broccoli carrots cauliflower mix, bisquick baking mix, parmesan cheese, butter, egg
name: bisquick easy cheesy chicken casserole

steps: Mix sour cream, all but 1 t. Of the dill, the vinegar, salt, and red pepper sauce in small mixing bowl. Make 3 or 4 layers of onion, cucumber, and sour cream mixture in a 2-quart serving bowl. Refrigerate covered 1-2 hours, spooning juice from bottom of bowl over top several times. Sprinkle remaining 1 t. Dill over top and serve cold.
ingredients: cucumbers, sour cream, white vinegar, sugar, onion
name: sour cream cucumbers

steps: Place vanilla ice cream in a large mixing bowl. Mix in vanilla and sugar. Heat in microwave or on the stove for 2-3 minutes. When done mix in chocolate mix until it looks smooth. Add coolwhip or marshmellows.
ingredients: brewed coffee, vanilla fudge ripple ice cream, french vanilla non-dairy coffee creamer, vanilla extract, whole milk, ice, whipped cream, chocolate syrup
name: coffee vanilla chocolate smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Spray baking tray with non-stick spray. Place asparagus stalks on baking tray. Drizzle with olive oil. Add salt, pepper and garlic powder. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until stalks are tender. Sprinkle on sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: asparagus, butter, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, dried thyme, milk, salt and pepper
name: grannydragon s really quick cream of asparagus soup

steps: In a medium saucepan, cook onion, bean sprouts, sweet red pepper strips, sliced mushrooms, shrimp, udon noodles, red cabbage, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki sauce, water, teriyaki
ingredients: onion, bean sprouts, sweet red pepper strips, sliced mushrooms, shrimp, udon noodles, red cabbage, water, teriyaki sauce
name: teriyaki

steps: Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Season the chicken with salt and pepper and add to the hot skillet. Brown the chicken on both sides, 3 minutes per side. Remove and reserve the meat, covered with foil. Add another tablespoon of the olive oil, and then add the onions, garlic, thyme and honey. Season with salt and pepper and cook, stirring frequently for 7-8 minutes. You want the onions to get really brown and caramelized. Add cup of the cider vinegar and the stock. Turn up the heat to high and bring up to a simmer. Once at a simmer, return the chicken to the pan. Cook the chicken in the sauce for about 10 minutes, flipping halfway through the cooking time.
ingredients: olive oil, chicken thighs, onions, flour, chicken stock, dry cider, dried apricots, walnut halves, salt and pepper
name: chicken with apricots and cider

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first 7 ingredients. Add the steaks. Seal the bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steaks, uncovered, over medium-hot heat for 8-10 minutes or desired doneness.
ingredients: garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, boneless rib-eye steaks
name: rubbed rib eyes

steps: Scrub the clams under running water and soak them in salt water for 15 minutes. Drain. Heat the olive oil and add the onion, garlic and clams. Fry for about 10 minutes, stirring often to open the clams. Add the lime juice, wine, parsley, water and bread crumbs. Cook for 10 minutes more. Discard any unopened clams. Add salt to taste and serve.
ingredients: clams, shallots, garlic cloves, tomatoes, white wine, heavy cream, basil leaves, salt and pepper, bread
name: the best clams in the world with a delicious creamy sauce

steps: Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers.
ingredients: tomatoes, green onions, basil leaves, goat cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper, orzo pasta, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese
name: grilled stuffed tomato

steps: In a medium saucepan combine ground beef, tomato soup, salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, onion, avocado, fresh cilantro stem, red bell pepper, corn tortilla, tomatillo salsa. Add meat and refried beans and taco seasoning. Mix together and cook on low till beef is browned. Serve with corn tortillas.
ingredients: country-style pork ribs, salt, ground black pepper, dried oregano, onion, avocado, fresh cilantro stem, red bell pepper, corn tortilla, tomatillo salsa
name: slow cooked carnitas tacos

steps: Cook noodles according to the package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine soy sauce and the next seven ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well with a wire whisk. Pour over the noodles. Toss gently. Add toppings, if desired.
ingredients: udon noodles, peanut butter, egg, olive oil, chili flakes, salt
name: quick and simple thai style noodles

steps: In a small saucepan, combine all ingredients, except tea bags, and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer for three minutes. Strain. Pour liquid into serving cups with one tea bag and allow to steep for three minutes or to desired strength. Serve hot.
ingredients: water, anise seeds, sugar, lemon juice, honey, black tea
name: finjan erfeh saudi spicy tea

steps: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce.
ingredients: italian salad dressing, balsamic vinegar, honey, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, chicken breasts, asparagus, carrot, tomatoes
name: balsamic chicken and veggies

steps: In a small bowl, combine teriyaki sauce mix and water until dissolved. Set aside. Place cabbage in large skillet with remaining ingredients. Cook, covered, over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: head of cabbage, carrots, zucchini, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, low-sodium teriyaki sauce, black pepper
name: teriyaki cabbage

steps: Cook rice in the hot water, simmering over a low heat in a covered pan for around 20 minutes, until all the water has been absorbed. When the rice is fully cooked, remove from the heat and allow to cool, for about 10 minutes. Meanwhile, make the vinaigrette- in a bowl, beat the olive oil and red wine vinegar until they are completely blended. Add the ground oregano and salt and pepper to taste. When the rice is cool, add the cubed feta, black olives, cucumber and vinaigrette. Stir to mix and put in the fridge for 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavours to blend.
ingredients: cooked rice, greek salad dressing, green pepper, onion, black olives, tomatoes, feta cheese
name: linda s greek rice salad

steps: Bring 4 cups water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water.
ingredients: black tea bags, sugar, milk, ginger, cinnamon stick, hot water
name: somali tea

steps: Heat oven to 190c. Peel, quarter and thinly slice celeriac - can be done with slicing blade of food processor. Toss celeriac with walnut oil, season to taste. Place in a gratin dish, spread out evenly. Pour over stock, bake for 45 minutes. Scatter with walnuts and crumble over blue cheese. Cook another 15 minutes till crisp and golden.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, walnuts, pecorino romano cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, fresh ground black pepper
name: shaved brussels sprout slaw with walnuts and romano

steps: Cook beet in a small amount of water until crisp-tender. Drain and rinse in cold water. Place in a serving bowl. Add beet and sugar snap peas and leek to skillet. Stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes or until beet pods are crisp tender. Stir in dill and reserved lemon slices. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: beets, frozen sugar snap peas, dijon mustard, cider vinegar, olive oil, dried dill, sugar
name: beet and sugar snap pea salad

steps: Combine all ingredients except the meat in a medium bowl. Place the meat in a shallow glass or ceramic dish in one layer. Pour marinade over and turn meat to coat well. Marinate at room temperature for at least 2 hours. Drain meat. Thread on 6 skewers and grill 10 to 12 minutes, turning to cook all sides.
ingredients: lamb shank, water, salt, white pearl onion, yogurt, butter, garlic cloves, mint
name: lamb in yogurt

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Add celery, yellow onion, garlic, butter, half-and-half, chicken bouillon, red potatoes, buttermilk, salt and pepper. Stir in celery, yellow onion, garlic, butter, half-and-half, chicken bouillon, red potatoes, buttermilk, salt and pepper. Stir in celery, yellow onion, garlic, butter, half-and-half, chicken bouillon, red potatoes
ingredients: celery, yellow onion, garlic, butter, half-and-half, chicken bouillon, red potatoes, buttermilk, salt and pepper
name: celery mashed potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. In a large bowl, whisk together whole milk, yogurt, heavy cream, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, whisk together whole milk, yogurt, heavy cream, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl
ingredients: whole milk, yogurt, heavy cream, salt
name: wolfgang puck s homemade ricotta

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: betty crocker super moist white cake mix, all-purpose flour, water, canola oil, almond extract, egg whites
name: white wedding cake

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: egg, spicy brown mustard, vinegar, lemon juice, mayonnaise, chili powder
name: deviled eggs modern twist

steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine dry pasta, eggs, celery, red pepper, green onions, flat leaf parsley, mayonnaise, coarse grain mustard, lemon juice, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, parsley, pars
ingredients: dry pasta, eggs, celery, red pepper, green onions, flat leaf parsley, mayonnaise, coarse grain mustard, lemon juice
name: pasta and egg salad

steps: Heat the beans in a saucepan. Mash. Spread on 4 tortillas. Top with the cheese and another tortilla. Place on a cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes. Cut into slices and serve with the salsa.
ingredients: cream cheese, corn and black bean salsa, refried beans, sharp cheddar cheese, black olives, roma tomatoes
name: black bean and corn salsa dip

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Fill each tortilla with meat, fold in half. Dip the folded tortilla in the beaten egg and fry on a skillet in oil. Brown on both sides. Arrange the tortillas in an oven proof dish. Cover the tortillas with the tomato sauce, garlic, jalapenos and cheese. Season with salt & pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until hot through. Serve with black beans and rice.
ingredients: italian bread, ham, bacon, london broil beef, provolone cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, eggs
name: carlos ramos el uruguayo chivito sandwich from urug

steps: Mix all ingredients except the rice and lemon juice and cinnamon. Mix them well and then add the rice and lemon juice. Sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top. Place in a 8 x 10-inch baking dish and bake at 325 degrees for 50 minutes, or until it is lightly brown and the custard is set. Test with a table knife. Stick it in the center of the dish, and if it comes out clean the dish is baked. This can be served with maple syrup as was done in earlier times or milk will be enjoyed also.
ingredients: lemon pudding mix, sugar, milk, butter, cooked rice, flaked coconut, vanilla, egg yolks, egg whites
name: lemon coconut rice pudding

steps: In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, parmesan cheese, chives, seasoning salt, pepper, butter, bacon, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese
name: three cheese potatoes

steps: In a large pot with plenty of salted water, boil the potatoes until they are tender when a fork is inserted, about 10-12 minutes. Drain and let the potatoes cool until you can handle them. With a melon baller, remove a scoop from each potato. Cut a tiny sliver off the bottom of the potatoes so they will stand after filling. Combine the boursin, butter, and cream. Taste and add salt and pepper as needed. Spoon or pipe the cheese mixture into the potatoes. Garnish with fine sprinkling of parsley. Stand the potatoes on a platter to serve.
ingredients: small red potatoes, salt, cream cheese, buttermilk, green onion, dried thyme, dried tarragon, pepper, fresh parsley
name: creamed new potatoes

steps: Dice bacon and fry until tender. Drain on paper towel. Mix onion and worcestershire sauce with softened cream cheese. Add bacon. Mix well. Clean and remove stems from mushrooms. Fill mushroom caps with cream cheese mixture. Mushrooms can be refrigerated at this point, if made in advance. Bake in preheated oven, 375f for 13 to 15 minutes, or until tops are lightly golden. Watch carefully the last few minutes.
ingredients: mushrooms, onion, bacon, cream cheese, parmesan cheese
name: carol ann s bacon stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celcius. Put the chopped apples into a large bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice. Combine the nuts, sultanas, sugar, flour, salt and baking powder and mix well. Stir this mixture into the apples. Add in the vanilla essence and mix again. Pour into a lightly oiled cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned on top. Serve hot or cold. For a moister cake. Add to the ingredients a little fruit juice or water.
ingredients: olive oil, potatoes, granny smith apples, onion, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, jarlsberg cheese, butter
name: potato cake with tart apples jarlsberg

steps: Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita.
ingredients: unsalted butter, baguette, yellow mustard, ham, roast pork, swiss cheese, dill pickle slices
name: puerta sagua s real cuban sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a 9x13-inch baking pan with non-stick spray. Combine all ingredients except onion rings and mix well to combine. Transfer to prepared baking dish. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake 45 minutes or until bubbly and heated through. Uncover and top with onion rings. Bake a few minutes more.
ingredients: velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, tuna, pepper, milk, saltine crackers, elbow macaroni, margarine
name: tuna noodle crispy

steps: Combine the wine, grapefruit juice, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple,
ingredients: dry red wine, grand marnier, grapefruit juice, pineapple juice, orange juice, carbonated water, fruit
name: boomette s sangria

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small bowl, mix together peaches, marmalade, lemon juice, ginger, mustard, cinnamon and soy sauce. Place pork in medium baking dish. Glaze pork with peach mixture, using it all. Roast in oven for approximately one and a half hours. Serve.
ingredients: apricot preserves, ginger, ground thyme, garlic cloves, green onion, pork loin
name: apricot glazed pork loin

steps: Heat oven to 375. Mix crumbs, taco seasonings and butter. Dip nuggets into egg, then into crumbs, coating evenly. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake 10-15 minutes til chicken is done and coating is crisp. Serve with taco sauce for dipping.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, oil, ready-to-serve chicken broth, tomato sauce, taco seasoning mix, corn, red peppers, minute rice, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: zesty chicken taco rice salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, milk, water, baking powder, vanilla, eggs, sugar
name: steamed mamon filipino sponge cake

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crackers and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham cracker pie shell. Bake for 45 minutes or until edges are brown. Turn oven off and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove from oven and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove from wire rack to cool. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: graham crackers, butter, cream cheese, sour cream, heavy cream, granulated sugar, eggs, lemon, juice of, vanilla essence, sultana
name: gordon ramsay s baked new york cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat cake mix with eggs, oil and coffee in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Pour evenly into 2 greased round cake pans. Mix brown sugar and cinnamon in medium bowl. Stir in coconut and walnuts. Sprinkle evenly over cake batter. Bake 30 minutes. Cool completely on wire racks before removing cake layers from pans.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, water, graham cracker crumbs, cinnamon, butter, brown sugar, walnuts
name: graham cracker coffee cake

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, onion, celery, plain flour, milk, tuna, sweet corn, frozen peas, tasty cheese, fresh breadcrumb
name: tuna and corn bake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in brioche with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of brioche it sounds hollow. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you
ingredients: active dry yeast, bread flour, sugar, salt, eggs, egg yolk, water, unsalted butter
name: bread machine brioche

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pie plate and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning.
ingredients: milk, baking mix, eggs, salt and pepper, cheese, tomatoes, onions
name: quick quiche

steps: In a large frying pan, fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon and drain. Add cabbage, butter and water to bacon grease and cook until tender. Stop cooking when the cabbage is still a bit crunchy. Add salt and pepper to taste maybe a little more butter, not much. Slice sausage and lay on top of cabbage. Continue to cook a little longer to warm the sausage. Crumble bacon over all. Yummmy -- great with black eyed-peas and cornbread.
ingredients: smoked sausage, cooking apples, red cabbage, onion, brown sugar, salt, black pepper, apple juice
name: smoked sausage with cabbage and apples

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan and cook the onion, garlic and potatoes for 5 minutes until lightly golden. Add the stock, bring to the boil and simmer for 20 minutes until the potatoes are very soft and beginning to break up into the soup. Using a potato masher, roughly mash the potatoes into the soup. Stir in the chorizo and simmer gently for 5 minutes until the orange coloured oil from the chorizo rises to the surface of the soup. Check the seasoning, ladle into bowls and garnish with a sprig of flat leaf parsley. Serve with lots of crusty bread for mopping up.
ingredients: chorizo sausage, onion, lentils, parsnips, vegetable stock, chili flakes, plain yogurt, fresh coriander
name: chorizo and parsnip soup

steps: Cook tuna until tender but not brown. Add tuna, mayonnaise, anchovy fillets, garlic, lemon juice, cream, tuna, fresh lemon rind, parmesan cheese. Heat and stir. Break tuna in chunks and add to remaining ingredients. Pour into 2 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: fettuccine, mayonnaise, anchovy fillets, garlic, lemon juice, cream, tuna, fresh lemon rind, parmesan cheese
name: fettuccine in tuna sauce

steps: Heat oil in heavy skillet over high heat. Saute celery for 1 minute. Add apple mixture and stir fry 3-4 minutes, just until chicken is no longer pink. Add raisins and parsley, stir well and serve over rice.
ingredients: tart apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter
name: shaker fried apples

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Generously grease rectangular baking dish, 13x9x2 inches. Cook ground beef and onion in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until beef is brown. Drain. Stir in soup, vegetables and milk. Stir bisquick mix and water in baking dish until moistened. Spread evenly. Bake 30 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, ketchup, hamburger buns, cheddar cheese
name: cheeseburger joes

steps: In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping.
ingredients: fat-free sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, water, sugar-free lemon gelatin, cool whip free
name: lemon fluff

steps: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda, sour milk, baking soda
ingredients: flour, yeast, water, milk, eggs, butter, sugar, salt, vegetable oil
name: baursaki kazakhstan fried bread

steps: Place all ingredients in a large pot. Bring to a boil. Turn off heat and steep for about 10 minutes. Strain into a pitcher. Stir in honey while still warm. Store pitcher in refrigerator. Reheat one cup at a time in the microwave, adding more honey to taste, if desired. Drink twice a day, breathing steam through nose, for maximum benefit.
ingredients: mint sprigs, sugar, cold water, lemon juice, ginger ale, lemon
name: kentucky mock mint julep

steps: Place green beans in a steamer basket over boiling water. Cover saucepan and steam 5-7 minutes or until green beans are tender. Rinse under cold water and drain. Combine water and lemon juice in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Simmer 2-3 minutes or until green beans are tender. Stir in butter. Add green beans and lemon peel. Simmer 3-4 minutes or until green beans are heated throughout. Remove from heat. Add parsley and salt to taste and toss.
ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, basil leaves, oregano leaves, lemon, rind of, salt and pepper
name: lemon herb green beans

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, tomatoes, red pepper powder, coriander powder, cumin, turmeric, salt & pepper, and cook 3 minutes. Add curry coriander and onion, saute 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, simmer until liquid evaporates. Remove from heat. Add yogurt. Adjust seasonings to taste.
ingredients: fresh okra, canola oil, yellow onion, garlic, tomatoes, red pepper powder, coriander powder, cumin, turmeric, salt
name: vegetarian okra curry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Combine the sugar, flour and butter, using a pastry blender. Pour cranberry sauce into prepared dish and cover with the flour mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes. Cut into 9 pieces and serve warm or cold.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, crushed pineapple, sugar, mini marshmallows, whipping cream, vanilla
name: frosty cranberry salad

steps: Heat oven to 170c. Lightly grease inside of a muffin tray with butter. Line 1 muffin well per person with ham,. Place approx 1 tsp chopped tomato in each well,. Top with grated cheese & crack an egg on top. Season with salt & pepper. Place into the oven for 18 to 20 mins until egg white is cooked and. Yolk is as firm as you like.
ingredients: tomatoes, eggs, light cream, fresh parsley, chives, ham, tasty cheese, salt and pepper, toast
name: egg and ham filled tomatoes

steps: Heat oil in a wok. Add soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame seeds, scallions, sesame oil. Stir well. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are crispy and tender. Stir in cilantro.
ingredients: potatoes, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame seeds, scallions, sesame oil
name: seasoned potatoes kamjanamul

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel squash and cut into cubes about 1 inch square. Put squash into plastic mixing bowl, add olive oil, lemon juice, and minced lemon zest and toss well so squash is all coated with oil. Arrange squash on roasting pan in single layer. Dot with butter. Roast for 40-50 minutes, turning several times, or until squash is quite softened and getting browned on the edges. Season with sea salt and fresh ground black pepper, and serve hot.
ingredients: delicata squash, unsalted butter, coarse salt, cracked black pepper, meyer lemon zest, nutmeg, lemon wedge
name: roasted squash with lemon and nutmeg

steps: Heat oil in skillet on med, add onions, cook until soft. Add celery, cook until crisp tender. Increase heat to med hi, add peas. Cook until peas are heated through. Stir in celery leaves, salt and pepper.
ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, frozen peas, prosciutto, fresh italian parsley
name: peas and prosciutto

steps: Sift butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder,
ingredients: butter, flour, cream cheese, powdered sugar
name: hamentashen dough

steps: Place the potatoes in a large frying pan on medium heat until most of the fat has been rendered. Remove to a platter temporarily as you fry each batch. Remove onions and garlic from the pan briefly with a slotted spoon and pour off any fat that may have accumulated. Place mushroom soup and sauerkraut in the pan and stir well and scrape up any browned bits that may have stuck to the pan. Add onions, garlic, and apples and stir again. Place spareribs on top and cover pan. Cook for about an hour on low, stirring occasionally. Be cautious in adding any salt because of the sauerkraut, but taste and season accordingly. Boil potatoes in salted water until just barely fork-tender. Serve the sauce over the potatoes.
ingredients: russet potatoes, onion, sauerkraut, evaporated milk, cream cheese, kielbasa, water, salt and pepper
name: sauerkraut chowder

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving.
ingredients: orange juice, fat free chicken broth, honey, cornstarch, extra virgin olive oil, carrots, butter, salt
name: orange glazed shredded carrots reduced or low fat

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown.
ingredients: russet baking potatoes, water, olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: greek lemon roasted potatoes martha stewart

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Add cocoa and mix well. Add egg and almond extract. Mix well. Pour filling into crust. Bake for 35 minutes. Cool completely, then spread an even layer of cool whip over pie, then top with cherry pie filling. Refrigerate 2-3 hours before serving.
ingredients: pudding, milk, whipped topping, cherry pie filling, cream cheese spread, angel food cake, dark chocolate chips, dried cherries, rum extract
name: sam s pick me up trifle

steps: Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add turkey and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Garnish with salsa, sour cream.
ingredients: ground turkey, garlic clove, onion, tomato sauce, kidney beans, picante sauce, chili powder, salt, cheddar cheese, flour tortillas
name: turkey and bean burritos

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat in medium-sized saucepan. Saute onions and garlic until brown. Add tomato sauce and stir. Lower heat to medium-low. While stirring, add rosemary, basil and oregano. Allow sauce to bubble. Sprinkle with sugar and mix again. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Use immediately, or transfer to plastic container for storage.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, olive oil, basil, oregano, sugar, garlic cloves, onion, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: homemade marinara sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 200c. Grease an oven tray well with vegetable oil. Wash and cut potatoes into wedges. Combine egg white and spices into a large bowl. Mix well. Add potatoes and coat well. Bake potatoes skin side down for 40 minutes or until tender and golden brown. Serve with a relish or as a side.
ingredients: water, white sugar, red potatoes, canola oil, seasoning salt
name: kittencal s extra crispy french fries

steps: Heat butter in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add beef stock, stir-fry 2 minutes. Stir in mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Stir-fry 2 minutes. Stir-f
ingredients: butter, hot pepper sauce, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce
name: buffalo wing sauce

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add salt and pepper to taste. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Place lettuce, tomato slices and sliced chicken on top of tortilla. Roll up the wrap.
ingredients: fat-free mayonnaise, dried oregano leaves, garlic powder, flour tortillas, turkey breast, cucumber, red pepper
name: mediterranean wrap sandwich

steps: Place eggs in sauce pan and cover with water. Bring water to a quick boil. Remove from heat and cover for 20 minute. Let eggs cool. Sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: eggs, cream cheese, salad dressing, sweet pickle relish, hot sauce, salt & fresh ground pepper, cajun seasoning
name: creamy cajun deviled eggs

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Spray muffin cups with non-stick vegetable spray. Roll out biscuits until each is big enough to fit into muffin tins with enough dough to cover. Mix together catsup and mustard with ground beef. Fill each biscuit cup with meat mixture. Sprinkle cheese over all. Fold dough over top. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: ground beef, bacon, monterey jack cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, reynolds wrap foil
name: bacon cheese beef biscuits rsc

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack.
ingredients: butter, vanilla extract, sugar, flour, eggs, salt, water, baking soda, bananas
name: banana bread disneyland resort

steps: Heat the oil in a non-stick fry pan, add the chopped scallops and cook for 1-2 minutes until the scallops turn pink. Add the scallops and cook for 1-2 minutes until the scallops turn pink. Add the sc
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, white wine, red chile, prawns, scallops, spring onions
name: chilli tomato prawns and scallops

steps: Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, onion, parmesan cheese, black pepper, nutmeg, salt
name: spaghetti squash with onions garlic and herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth. Combine the dry ingredients in a bowl. Add to butter mixture and beat until moistened. Stir in peanut butter. Spread in a greased 7x11-inch greased baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until it is set in the center. Cool completely and cut in squares.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, peanut butter, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, miniature peanut butter cups
name: peanut butter tart

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place a skillet over high heat and add oil. Saute onion for 3 to 4 minutes. Add mushrooms and garlic and continue to saute until mushrooms have released their liquid and they are golden. Add chicken stock and bring to boil. Pour mushroom and stock mixture orzo and rosemary into a 8x8 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper and bake 35 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: orzo pasta, zucchini, tomatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt and pepper
name: garlic zucchini and tomato orzo

steps: Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well and set aside. Combine next 7 ingredients in a bowl. Stir well. Pour over cabbage mixture. Toss gently. Cover and chill 8 hours.
ingredients: apples, lemon juice, cabbage, celery, carrot, onion, sour cream, mayonnaise, celery salt
name: apple coleslaw

steps: In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper.
ingredients: mild italian sausage, olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, stock, white wine, dried thyme, kale, cannellini beans
name: sausage cannellini and kale soup

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Heat olive oil over medium heat, add onions and saute until tender, about 10 minutes. Add honey and vinegar, reduce heat and saute until onions are golden brown, about another 8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Place pizza crust on pizza stone or baking sheet, sprinkle with cheese and thyme. Top this with onion mixture, then mushrooms. Cook for about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: pizza dough, radicchio, blue cheese, mozzarella cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, italian sausage, dried mission figs
name: maggie and peter s blue cheese and fig pizza

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine chicken bouillon granule, dried parsley, basil, dill weed, dried onion flakes, seasoning salt, garlic powder, lemon pepper seasoning, almonds. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: chicken bouillon granule, dried parsley, basil, dill weed, dried onion flakes, seasoning salt, garlic powder, lemon pepper seasoning, almonds
name: rice seasoning mix

steps: Sprinkle with extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, salt and black pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: lettuce, green onions, sugar, vinegar, water, bacon
name: mom s wilted lettuce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container.
ingredients: quaker oats, honey, pecans, vegetable oil, orange peel, vanilla, ground cinnamon, salt, dried mixed fruit
name: sunshine morning granola

steps: Put pineapple juice, cornstarch, sugar, coconut extract in a large mixing bowl. Add cornstarch, sugar, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornstarch, cornst
ingredients: pineapple juice, cornstarch, sugar, coconut extract
name: pina colada sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 450f. Place tomato slices on a baking sheet and place under broiler. Brown both sides, about 5 minutes. Set aside to cool. Mix garlic and thyme into mayonnaise and spread on bread. Layer the eggplant and tomato slices on bread. Slice sandwich into 4 sections and serve.
ingredients: angel hair pasta, diced tomatoes with onion garlic and basil, onion, eggplant, garlic cloves, red table wine, fresh parsley, olive oil, fresh ground pepper
name: tomato eggplant aubergine pasta

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the tomatoes and cook, tossing and stirring often, until the skins begin to split, about 3 minutes. Do not over cook. Remove from the heat and toss with the herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. Makes 4-6 servings.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, cherry tomatoes, pine nuts, fresh basil, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper, basil sprig
name: sauteed cherry tomatoes with pine nuts

steps: Place the pears, butter, brown sugar, cream cheese, honey, vanilla, lemon juice, water, cinnamon, pecans. Pour the mixture into a lightly greased 20cm square tin and bake for 35-40 minutes at 180c, or until golden and cooked through. Leave to cool in the tin before slicing.
ingredients: pears, butter, brown sugar, cream cheese, honey, vanilla, lemon juice, water, cinnamon, pecans
name: pear extraordinaire

steps: Place the onion in a bowl with ice water to cover. Let stand for 30 minutes, then drain well in a colander and blot dry with a paper towel. Combine the vinegar and salt in a bowl and stir or whisk until the salt crystals are dissolved. Add the onion, tomato, pepper, cayenne, oil, cilantro and gently toss to mix. Correct the seasoning, adding salt, vinegar, or cayenne. The relish should be highly seasoned. The relish is good now. It will be amazing if you let it stand to ripen for a few hours before serving. Serve the relish the same day you make it. 2 cups is enough to serve 4 to 6.
ingredients: sweet onions, celery ribs, red bell pepper, butter, apple cider vinegar, water, brown sugar, celery seed, salt
name: easy onion relish

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cover a cookie sheet with tin foil. Lightly spray broccoli and garlic with non-fat cooking spray. Arrange on the cookie sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and oregano. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: fusilli, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, olive oil, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, fresh broccoli, cheese
name: fusilli broccoli

steps: Mix flour, salt, black pepper, milk, egg, dill pickle slices, cayenne pepper, oil in a large bowl. Add flour, salt, black pepper, milk, egg, dill pickle slices, cayenne pepper, oil in a large bowl. Add flour, salt, black pepper, milk
ingredients: flour, salt, black pepper, milk, egg, dill pickle slices, cayenne pepper, oil
name: shadows fried dill pickles

steps: Place greens in a bowl. Add corn kernels, jalapenos, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese, walnut pieces, balsamic vinegar, honey, dijon mustard, ground black pepper,
ingredients: walnuts, fresh corn kernels, jalapenos, fresh lime juice, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, pepper, feta cheese
name: corn salad with feta and walnuts

steps: Spread chilis on bottom of 8x8 baking dish. Mix eggs with garlic powder and pepper. Pour over chilis. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 25 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes, cut into squares. Serve on crackers.
ingredients: eggs, flour, baking powder, salt, small curd cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, butter, green chilies
name: chili egg puff

steps: Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl. Whisk until smooth. Store in a glass container or jar in the refrigerator for up to 1 week and also freezes well. To make scrambled eggs. Fry slowly over low heat in a nonstick frypan.
ingredients: chickpea flour, all-purpose flour, water, canola oil, yellow food coloring
name: vegan egg yolk substitute

steps: Heat all ingredients to boiling in 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Strain cider mixture to remove cloves and cinnamon if desired. Serve hot.
ingredients: apple cider, tangerine juice, pomegranate juice, cinnamon sticks, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, tangerine
name: tangerine pomegranate cider

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake at 350 degrees for 8-12 minutes. Cool 1 minute. Remove from oven and cool completely.
ingredients: applesauce, splenda sugar substitute, jell-o pudding mix, egg, whey protein, soy flour, vanilla, mint extract, baking powder, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: jessy s fav mint fudge pudding cookies

steps: Preheat grill to medium high. In a bowl, combine garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Brush the tomatoes with the seasoned oil, and grill until lightly charred, turning once - about 12 minutes, and set them aside. Brush the tomatoes with the seasoned oil, and grill the rolls for a couple of minutes, turning occasionally. Grill the steak, turning once, to desired temperature. Let the meat rest, then slice it thinly, and divide among 4 plates. Coarsely chop the rolls and tomatoes, and toss in a bowl with the rosemary, any residual meat juices, and additional salt and pepper if desired. Top each plate of steak with the bread salad.
ingredients: aluminum foil, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, seasoned bread crumbs, garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper, tomatoes
name: grilled garlic tomatoes

steps: In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice, cayenne, tandoori paste, dark brown sugarpreparation:In a food processer or blender, put in oil, soy sauce, dried rosemary, dried tarragon
ingredients: butter, dried rosemary, dried tarragon, salt, lemon juice
name: seafood butter sauce baste

steps: Beat eggs. Add sugar and mix well. Pour into ice cream mixer or machine. For best results let ice cream freeze over night.
ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, chocolate syrup, whipping cream, miniature marshmallow, chocolate chips, salted peanuts
name: rocky road freeze

steps: Spray a serving bowl with cooking spray. Crack the eggs into the bowl, and stir up with a fork, making sure the yolks are broken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover the bowl with a paper towel and microwave for 1 minute. Remove from the microwave, cut the eggs up and top with a pat of butter if you wish. As an option, put chunked ham or bacon in the eggs while cooking. Great as well with a small spoon of cheez whiz mixed in after it is done cooking.
ingredients: dates, eggs, butter, honey
name: scrambled eggs with dates

steps: Toss asparagus in asparagus, celery, yellow onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, white wine, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, white pepper, whipping creamseason to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, celery, yellow onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, white wine, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, white pepper, whipping cream
name: asparagus lemon soup

steps: Heat the oil in a large non stick frying pan. Fry the pork for 3 to 4 minutes on each side until cooked through. Add the scallions. Add the sherry. Add the wonton skins. Fry the pork for 3 to 4 minutes on each
ingredients: ground pork, scallions, bamboo shoots, soy sauce, dry sherry, sesame oil, superfine sugar, egg white, cornstarch, wonton skins
name: pork dim sum

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the asparagus with all the other other ingredients on the baking sheet until combined. Roast for 10 to 12 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: asparagus, sesame seeds, rice vinegar, dijon mustard, soy sauce, fresh ginger, orange rind, garlic clove, vegetable oil, sesame oil
name: asparagus with gingered orange sesame dressing

steps: Wash the rice in a sieve until the water runs clear, then drain well and set aside. Bring the water to a boil, remove from heat and add the saffron. Allow to infuse for 20 minutes. Heat the oil in a heavy saucepan and add the rice, stirring well so that all the rice is coated evenly in the oil. Add the saffron water and salt and stir well. Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Cover with a tight fitting lid, then simmer for 10-12 minutes until the water is absorbed. Turn off the heat and let stand, covered, for at least 10 minutes. Add the butter and fluff lightly with a fork. Serve and garnish with pistachios.
ingredients: vegetable oil, vermicelli, basmati rice, sea salt, boiling water, butter
name: koushary

steps: In blender, combine the milk, vanilla, sugar, chocolate and salt. Cover and process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. In small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired.
ingredients: hersheys chocolate syrup, whipping cream, oreo cookie crumbs, butter, egg whites, sugar
name: oreo chocolate mousse heaven

steps: In a mixing bowl beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold in vanilla and pecans. Drop by well-rounded teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets. Bake at 200 degrees for 50-55 minutes or until firm to the touch. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: egg whites, baking powder, sugar, soda crackers, pecans, strawberry, sweetened whipped cream
name: strawberry meringue

steps: Mix together unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, unsalted butter, ice water, sugar, egg yolk, waterpreparation:Cream together unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, unsalted butter, ice water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg yolk, water, sugar, egg
ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, unsalted butter, ice water
name: the perfect shortcrust pastry

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, combine the butter, water, powdered sugar, nonfat dry milk powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, salt, nuts, and vanilla. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares.
ingredients: butter, water, powdered sugar, nonfat dry milk powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, salt, nuts
name: easy cocoa fudge

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: cucumbers, mangoes, cooked shrimp, fresh dill, white vinegar, stevia, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, hot sauce, romaine lettuce leaves
name: shrimp mango and cucumber salad

steps: Sift flour, salt, cinnamon, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda, buttermilk, eggs, vanilla extractpreparation:Mix all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl and whisk to blend, then set aside. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. In another bowl, add the egg yolks, vanilla, oil and milk, whisking slightly to combine. Add the egg yolk mixture to the dry ingredients and beat until well mixed. Fold in the egg whites just until combined. Make waffles according to the machine instructions.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, eggs, milk, butter, canned pumpkin
name: great pumpkin waffle

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chopped rhubarb in a 13 x 9 cake pan and sprinkle with gelatin. Bake for 20 minutes. While apples are baking, mix the rest of the ingredients. Crumble mixture on top of cooked rhubarb and bake 40 minutes longer.
ingredients: rhubarb, sugar, water, strawberries, of fresh mint
name: rhubarb and strawberry compote

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: sour cream, honey, eggs, vanilla, whole wheat flour, pecans, salt
name: beehive cookies

steps: Heat oil in 2-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until onion wilts. Stir in cumin and pepper. Continue to cook for 2-3 minutes. Add oregano, potatoes, green chilies and chicken broth. Bring to a boil and simmer slowly for 45 minutes. Serve hot with cheese sprinkled in the middle of bowl.
ingredients: green chili, jalapeno, monterey jack cheese, wonton wrapper, avocados, lemon juice, seasoning salt, ground coriander, mayonnaise, green onions
name: louisville s green chili wontons

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies.
ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, garlic, salt, pepper, butter, milk
name: orgasmic mashed potatoes

steps: Place chicken breasts between wax paper enough to flatten. Combine oil, lime juice, vinegar, mustard, garlic, cilantro, salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken, coat well and marinate at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken breasts for about 6 minutes on each side, basting once with left over marinate mixture. Preperation time does not include marinate time.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, herbes de provence, dijon mustard, onion powder, garlic powder, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
name: grilled chicken with balsamic and herbs

steps: Preheat oven 325f. Bake frittata with asparagus canadian bacon and parmesan cheese. Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: egg substitute, parmesan cheese, skim milk, lemon zest, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, asparagus spears, canadian bacon
name: frittata with asparagus canadian bacon and parmesan

steps: Heat oil in a saucepan, add onion and saute until soft. Remove seeds and rib of pepper, chop, add to saucepan and cook for 5 minutes. Add beef cubes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cut tomatoes into small pieces, add to suacepan and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add stock and thyme. Season with salt and simmer for about half an hour. Serve with cooked rice.
ingredients: sunflower oil, carrots, red onions, basmati rice, hot chicken stock, turkey, curry paste, cilantro
name: leftover turkey biryani with red onion and cilantro

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Grease a 12 cup muffin pan or you can use a mini muffin pan. Combine cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, combine egg whites, onion, milk, parsley, oil and pepper. Add to dry ingredients stirring just until moistened. Spoon into prepared muffin tins. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove and cool on a rack for 5 minutes. Serve immediatlely.
ingredients: cornmeal, baking powder, salt, sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, milk, red pepper, chives, onion
name: hush puppies vi

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix the ground sirloin, salsa, bread crumbs, cheese, egg, garlic cloves, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Transfer to a 5x9 inch loaf pan. Bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven, or to a minimum internal temperature of 160 degrees f.
ingredients: white bread, ground sirloin, button mushrooms, part-skim mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt, eggs, ketchup
name: meatloaf with mozzarella mushrooms and pepperoni

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan or 12-cup fluted tube pan with non-stick cooking spray. In large mixing bowl, combine cake mix, eggs, flour, sour cream, sugar, milk, margarine. Beat to mix well. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour, or until done.
ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, red azuki bean paste, egg
name: baked manju

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray 9 x 9 baking dish with cooking spray. In mixing bowl combine half of soup, water and stuffing. Stir until moistened and mix in veggies. Season chops with seasonings. Pour stuffing mixture in bottom of casserole dish and top with pork chops. Top each chop with remaining soup. Bake uncovered for 30-35 minutes or until cooked through.
ingredients: herb stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, pork chops, milk
name: pork chops with stuffing casserole

steps: Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through.
ingredients: pancake mix, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, milk, parsley
name: cheesy snack

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut zucchini into wedges, like you would steak cut fries. Beat egg with 1 tablespoon water. Mix parmesan cheese with herb seasoning. Dip zucchini into egg, then coat with cheese by pressing slices into mixture. Bake on well greased baking sheet for approximately 15 minutes, or until they reach desired browness. You can also turn them carefully to brown on both sides. I do not turn them when i make them.
ingredients: zucchini, salt, shrimp, butter, olive oil, salt & pepper, garlic, chicken broth, red pepper flakes, parsley
name: shrimp w shredded zucchini

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl combine flour, soda and salt. Mix well, set aside. In a large bowl with a mixer blend sugars at medium speed. Add butter and mix to until it forms a grainy paste, scraping down the sides of the bowl. Add eggs and vanilla, and beat at medium speed until fully combined. Do not overmix. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to brown. Move immediately to cooling rack.
ingredients: flour, egg, vanilla, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, butter, white chocolate bark, macadamia nuts
name: v s white chocolate macadamia cookies

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: biscuits, paprika, seasoning salt, pepper, broiler
name: baked chicken on the grill

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: beer, onion, green bell pepper, soy sauce, honey, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, top round beef
name: round steak with beer marinade for the grill

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: chicken breasts, diced tomatoes with lime and cilantro, diced tomatoes with green chilies, water, black beans, sharp cheddar cheese, buttermilk ranch dressing, lettuce, taco shell
name: unique chicken tacos

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, smoked pork hocks, diced onion, salt, pepper, sugar, carrots, celery, potato, water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until navy beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: navy beans, smoked pork hocks, diced onion, salt, pepper, sugar, carrots, celery, potato, water
name: homemade navy bean soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut filets into 3 - 4 oz portions. Melt butter. Crush ritz crackers into crumb size pieces. Mix together dry ingredients. Dip halibut into melted butter then into cracker mixture. Place on baking sheet. Pour remaining melted butter over halibut. Bake at 400 degrees for 12 - 15 minutes or until flaky when touched with a fork.
ingredients: halibut fillets, onion, green onions, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, dried chili pepper flakes, dry white wine, sugar substitute, low-fat chicken broth
name: halibut with ginger garlic

steps: Place chicken, skin side down, in a large baking dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Combine remaining ingredients. Mix well. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for 30 minutes turn pieces and bake 20 minutes longer or until chicken is glazed and no longer pink.
ingredients: butter, chicken pieces, white vinegar, worcestershire sauce, salt, dry mustard, ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, cooked rice
name: kentucky style oven barbecued chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Rinse the kidney beans, and set aside to drain. Mix the remaining ingredients in a saucepan, and heat until the sugar has dissolved. Taste, and adjust seasoning if needed. Add beans and pour into an oven proof baking dish. I used a 1 quart, ovenproof glass bowl. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes.
ingredients: onions, bacon, brown sugar, dry mustard, salt, vinegar, butter beans, lima beans, dark red kidney beans, pork and beans
name: the best sweet sour baked beans

steps: Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Dissolve baking soda in boiling water and add to creamed mixture. Roll into balls and press down with glass dipped in flour. Press a quarter of a maraschino cherry in center. Bake 350f for 8-9 minutes.
ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, eggs, flour, baking soda, rolled oats, white chocolate chips, dried apricot
name: white chip apricot oatmeal cookies

steps: Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the white cake mix, egg, raspberry jell-o gelatin dessert, vanilla pudding mix, water, cool whippreparation:Place cake mix according to package directions. Mix the white cake mix, egg,
ingredients: white cake mix, egg, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cold water, cool whip
name: jello poke cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400f melt butter or oil in a 9-inch pie dish in the oven while it preheats. In a medium bowl, mix the dry ingredients. Use 2 of the tiny scoops of kal brand stevia extract powder or another sweetener in the equivalent of 2 teaspoons of sugar. Only use salt if you are using unsalted butter or coconut oil. Salted butter will give enough saltiness, so do not add additional salt. In a small-medium bowl, wisk the eggs and mix in the milk substitute, and other flavorings. Remove the pie plate from the oven and. Quickly pour the liquid into the dry mix and wisk thoroughly but quickly. Immediately pour into the hot greased pie dish and put into the hot oven. Bake about 12 minutes or until set in the middle. You might test with a dry knife similar to checking a pumpkin pie, when the knife removed comes out a little wet but no batter sticking to it.
ingredients: bread, milk, eggs, sugar, cinnamon, almonds, black cherries, butter
name: cherry pancakes from zurich

steps: In a large bowl, combine first 5 ingredients. Set aside. In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Microwave on high for 10 seconds. Stir until smooth. Pour over cereal mixture and mix well. Spread onto wax paper-lined baking sheets. Cool. Break apart. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: toasted oat cereal, corn chex, salted peanuts, slivered almonds, peanut brittle, butter flavor extract, small pretzels, white chocolate chips, vegetable oil
name: david venable s holiday party mix

steps: Heat the olive oil in a medium sized skillet. In a small bowl, beat the eggs and whites, salt, pepper. Saute the onion and bell peppers about 5 minutes. Slowly pour the mixture from the bowl into the skillet and sprinkle with cheese. Gently stir until the mixture becomes slightly firm. Then turn over the frittata and cook the other side about 2 minutes longer. After taking the frittata from the skillet, cut it in half, and roll it like a burrito. Serve with salsa.
ingredients: eggs, milk, mild salsa, cheddar cheese, ground cumin, salt
name: mini mexican frittatas weight watchers

steps: In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add to brown sugar mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Spread into a a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, light butter, egg whites, vanilla, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: skinny blondies

steps: Heat the oil in a pan and saut the potatoes for 5-6 minutes. Add potatoes, chilli and curry powder. Fry for a further few minutes. Stir in the yoghurt and cook for 2-5 minutes or until the potatoe is done. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: small red potato, salt, margarine, red onion, curry powder, honey, frozen green peas
name: curried potatoes and peas

steps: Place apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool.
ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, unsalted butter, apples, heavy cream
