name: apple cinnamon rings

steps: Sift together in large bowl flour, sugar & salt. In another bowl, beat eggs until cream colored. Blend in milk & butter. Pour egg mixture into dry mixture and beat smooth. Heat skillet or griddle. Grease lightly. For each pancake spoon a t of butter on the griddle. Cook each pancake over medium heat until lightly brown on bottom. Loosen edges wtih spatula, turn and lightly brown the other side.
ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, milk
name: swedish pancakes

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh thyme leaves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: garlic and herb tomatoes

steps: Combine the sour cream, dry ranch dressing mix, buttermilk, frozen peas, red onion, celery, cherry tomatoes, bacon, feta cheese, salt and black pepper in a food processor or blender. Process this for 20 seconds. Add the crushed red pepper and the mayonnaise. Process for another 20 seconds. Season the dressing with salt and cracked black peppercorn to suit your taste. Process dressing another 15 seconds. If not serving immediately, place dressing in a container. Tightly seal container and keep the dressing refrigerated until use.
ingredients: sour cream, dry ranch dressing mix, buttermilk, frozen peas, red onion, celery, cherry tomatoes, bacon, feta cheese, salt and black pepper
name: mixed up salad

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Add
ingredients: bean sprouts, hamburger, soy sauce, salt and pepper
name: sprout n burger

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olives and cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid is thickened and coats olives, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in lemon slices. Transfer to a shallow dish and marinate, chilled, at least 24 hours. These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: black olives, garlic, rosemary, thyme, red pepper flakes, olive oil
name: baked olives

steps: Place chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For marinade, stir together lime peel, lime juice, oil, thyme, pepper, salt, garlic cloves, salt and garlic. Pour over chicken seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for 30 minutes. Preheat broiler. Drain chicken, reserving marinade. Place chicken on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat about 6 minutes or until light brown. Turn chicken and brush lightly with reserved marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. Broil for 6 to 8 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. If desired serve with salsa and lime wedges.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lime juice, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, honey, olive oil, salt, pepper
name: lime and cilantro chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a medium non-stick skillet, over medium heat, add the first 4 ingredients and cook until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender. Drain if needed. While meat mixture is browning, boil water. In a large bowl add rest of ingredients except shredded cheese. Mix well. Pour into a greased or sprayed 2-quart baking dish. Cover with lid or foil and bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and bake until cheese is melted and lightly browned.
ingredients: ground beef, onions, cooking oil, salt and pepper, flour, whole tomatoes, tomato juice, hot water, ground nutmeg, sugar
name: u s navy minced beef gravy on toast

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon. Crumble and set aside. Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons of drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper to drippings. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are browned and tender, about 15 minutes. Make six wells in the potato mixture. Break one egg into each well. Cover and cook on low heat for 8-10 minutes or until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and bacon.
ingredients: english muffin, cheese, canadian bacon, egg, milk, salt and pepper, onions, grainy mustard
name: small brunch bake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: pie crusts, chicken, mixed vegetables, condensed cream of chicken soup
name: souper easy chicken pot pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes.
ingredients: reduced-fat yellow cake mix, sugar, nonfat sour cream, egg substitute, applesauce, almonds, mint sprig
name: low fat pound cake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: cornmeal, baking soda, salt, eggs, buttermilk, bacon drippings, cracklings
name: southern cracklin cornbread

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: rice chex, pretzel twists, whole almond, sweetened flaked coconut, light brown sugar, butter, honey, ground cardamom, dried cranberries
name: honey cardamom crunch

steps: Using a large mixing bowl, sift the flour and sugar and mix together. In a separate bowl, sift the flour and sugar and mix together. Fold in the cheese, nuts, and pineapple extract. Pour mixture into a greased 9 by 3-inch loaf pan. Bake for 1 hour. At 350 degrees.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, self-rising cornmeal, crushed pineapple in syrup, egg, pecans, whipped cream
name: pineapple cornbread

steps: In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted chicken. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika.
ingredients: sour cream, condensed cream of chicken soup, poppy seeds, cooked chicken, butter-flavored cracker crumbs, butter
name: poppy chicken

steps: Bring water to boil in a tea kettle. In a large tea pot, place tea bags, orange zest, mint leaves and cloves and then pour boiling water over all. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Cover and let steep until cool. Strain tea through mesh strainer into a large pitcher filled with ice. Stir in grapefruit juice. Serve over ice in large glasses, garnished with mint sprigs, if desired.
ingredients: lemons, pineapple juice, green tea, mint sprigs, mint sprig, sugar, pineapple
name: iced lemon pineapple green tea

steps: In a large serving bowl, combine olive oil, red onion, orange bell pepper, unsalted butter, corn, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh basil, fresh
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, orange bell pepper, unsalted butter, corn, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil
name: confetti corn salad ina garten back to basics

steps: In a saucepan, heat the oil and gently fry the ham spain for 5 mins until soft. Add the beans and sauce and stir together. Cover and gently simmer for 5-10 mins until thick and syrupy. Add the tomatoes and tomato stock and stir together. Cover and gently simmer for 5-10 mins until thick and sy
ingredients: broad beans, serrano ham, onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt
name: habas con jamn broad beans with ham spain

steps: Cover with wax paper and bake at 350 for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove from oven and set aside.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, pistachios, almonds, dried cherries
name: chocolate bark with mixed nuts and dried berries

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add onion slices. Cook 4 to 5 minutes, turning chicken once, until chicken is brown on all sides. Add beer, heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer about 10 minutes or until juice of chicken is clear when center of thickest part is cut. Stir in bell peppers. Increase heat to medium. Cook uncovered 5 minutes longer, stirring occasionally until peppers are crisp tender.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt & pepper, olive oil, bell peppers, onion, garlic, fresh basil, balsamic vinegar
name: balsamic chicken breasts with peppers and onions

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: sugar, hot water, water, gelatin, almond extract, pineapple juice, lemon juice, sprite
name: jell o party punch

steps: In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoon of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoon bacon fat and cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice.
ingredients: fresh green beans, bacon, red onion, butter, black pepper, salt
name: garden green beans with bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 450 f and have ready a frozen strawberry margarita pie shell or if you prefer, a frozen regular pie pastry. Whisk together the margarita mixer, the eggs, and the sweetened condensed milk until smooth. Pour into the pie shell and bake for about 10-15 minutes, or until pie is almost set and the top is getting bubbly and edges of filling are just beginning to brown. I placed a pie shield over the crust edges to keep them from overbrowning- if you do not have one, you can cover the crust edges with some foil. Set pie onto a wire rack to cool to room temperature, then cover and place in fridge until fully cooled, at least 1 hour. Before serving, garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: pretzel, butter, sugar, strawberries, frozen limeade concentrate, tequila, orange juice, vanilla ice cream, frozen whipped topping, pretzels
name: frozen strawberry margarita pie

steps: Place chicken pieces in crockpot. Sprinkle the garlic salt and onion soup mix over the chicken. Pour salad dressing and water over the chicken. Cover and cook for 7-8 hours. Remove chicken and cool slightly. Shred chicken from the bones, and return to crock pot. Serve on hamburger buns.
ingredients: barbecue sauce, pineapple chunks, green bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: slow cooker sweet and tangy chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, seasoned stuffing mix, condensed cream of celery soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms, water, frozen mixed vegetables
name: beef stuffing bake

steps: Heat oven to 325f. Preheat oven to 325f. Bake for 10 minutes at 325. Remove foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes.
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, plum tomatoes, tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, kalamata olive, olive oil, escarole, parmesan cheese
name: grilled sicilian pizza

steps: In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm.
ingredients: sweet onion, garlic clove, low sodium vegetable broth, kidney beans, diced tomatoes, carrots, elbow macaroni, dried oregano, baby spinach
name: spinach minestrone

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh basil leaf, avocado, tomatoes, salt, pepper
name: angel hair pasta with basil avocado and tomatoes

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: oatmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, low-fat milk, honey, pomegranate seeds, olive oil
name: pomegranate pancakes

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Place corn on baking sheet and bake at 425 degrees for 12 minutes. Add topping and return to oven to melt cheese.
ingredients: corn on the cob, butter, olive oil, garlic, breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: corn on the cob in a garlic butter crust

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large bundt pan. Combine all of the ingredients for the cake and mix on medium speed for 2 minutes or until smooth. Pour batter into bundt pan. Bake for 35-45 minutes or until knife insterted comes out clean. Invert onto a plate. Combine ingredients for the topping in a saucepan. Boil mixture for about 2 minutes. While still warm, poke holes in the top and sides of the cake with a fork. Pour margarita mixture over cake.
ingredients: vanilla ice cream, lime sherbet, margarita mix, tequila, carbonated water, maraschino cherries
name: 2bleu s margarita ice cream and sherbet fizz virgin

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine broccoli, mayonnaise, cheese, soup and eggs. Mix well. Place the mixture in pan. Top with crushed crackers and pour the melted butter evenly over crackers. Bake for 35 minutes or until set and browned.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, margarine, all-purpose flour, half-and-half, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, dry mustard, gruyere cheese, parmesan cheese
name: paula deen hard boiled egg casserole

steps: In a large nonmetal dish or resealable food storage plastic bag, combine all ingredients except steak. Mix well. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover dish or seal bag. Refrigerate atleast 4 hours or overnight to marinate. Heat grill. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade. Discard marinade. Place steak on gas grill over medium heat. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until desired doneness, turning once or twice. To serve, cut steak across grain into slices. Place on serving platter.
ingredients: worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, liquid smoke, balsamic vinegar, ketchup, red pepper flakes, onion salt, garlic, raspberry preserves, oil
name: raspberry marinade

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the flour, salt, thyme, marjoram and pepper. Add potatoes. Seal bag and shake to coat. Pour butter into a 13x9x2-inch baking dish. Stir in the garlic. Add potatoes and bay leaf. Cover and bake at 450 for 20 minutes. Uncover and stir. Bake 15-20 minutes longer or until potatoes are lightly browned and tender. Discard bay leaf.
ingredients: potatoes, farina, flour, salt, egg
name: bramborove knedliky potato dumplings

steps: In a medium saucepan on high heat, bring the water to a boil. Add the ginger and cayenne and reduce heat. Simmer for 20 minutes and strain. Add sweetener to taste. Drink and be healthy.
ingredients: hot water, fresh ginger, black tea leaves, milk, granulated sugar, whipped cream
name: ginger milk tea

steps: Place pasta mixture in a large bowl. Add capers and garlic. Cook stirring fo r1-2 minutes. Add shrimp, tomatoes, oregano and tarragon to skillet and saute for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally or until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese. Toss to combine. Spoon pasta mixture over the orzo. Toss.
ingredients: olive oil, shrimp, mushroom, chili peppers, garlic pepper seasoning, tomatoes, heavy cream, salt, linguine, parmesan cheese
name: pasta shrimp

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the dried plums, dried apricot, golden raisin, water, orange juice, granulated sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, salt, cinnamon sticks, cloves. Bring to a boil. Add the plums, dried apricot, golden raisin, water, orange juice, granulated sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, salt, cinnamon sticks, cloves
ingredients: dried plums, dried apricot, golden raisin, water, orange juice, granulated sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, salt, cinnamon sticks, cloves
name: spicy fruit soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix margarine, brown sugar, egg, applesauce, flour, baking soda, clove, cinnamon, nutmeg, raisins, pecanspreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, applesauce, flour, baking soda, clove, cinnamon, nutmeg, raisins
name: spice gem cookies old time recipe

steps: Cook sesame cashew noodles according to package directions, drain and rinse. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high hear. Add oil and saute garlic and chili powder until golden, about 1 minute. Add water and vegetables. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 3 minutes. Add the bbq sauce and peanut butter, stir until sauce is smooth. Toss sauce and vegetables with spaghetti and garnish with chopped peanuts.
ingredients: thin spaghetti, roasted cashews, garlic cloves, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, dried red pepper flakes, sugar, water, salt and pepper
name: easy sesame cashew noodles

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: lemon juice, chicken stock, honey, soy sauce, olive oil, skinless chicken thighs, onion, rice, pepper
name: lower fat honey lemon chicken thighs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease and flour a 9x13 size pan. Put all the ingredients into one large mixing bowl. Mix well. Pour into the prepared pan. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until done.
ingredients: pineapple juice, vanilla vodka, baileys irish cream, butterscotch schnapps, ice cube, brown sugar, grenadine, maraschino cherry, pineapple chunk
name: pineapple upside down cake cocktail

steps: Wash tomatoes, and cut into wedges to grind. Grind the tomatoes, onions, and peppers. Put together in a big container or pan, and put the salt over these 3 ingredients, and let. Stand for 5 hours. Drain off all liquid, and then add sugar, celery seed, mustard seed, vinegar, and tumeric powder. Boil all for 25 minutes. Put in hot jars while relish is hot, and process in a hot water bath for 15 minutes. Make sure the seal is down on top of canning jar when completed.
ingredients: green tomatoes, red peppers, onions, vinegar, sugar, mustard seeds, celery seed, pickling salt
name: green tomato sweet relish

steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare the vegetables for stuffing by removing the stalks of 4 of the tomatoes. Halve the tomatoes and discard the seeds. Halve 2 of the zucchini lengthwise and scoop out the centers with a spoon. Arrange the prepared vegetables on a greased baking sheet, season lightly with salt and pepper. Mince or grate the remaining 3 mushrooms and the leftover stems. Dice the remaining zucchini. Saute the ground pork with the onions over medium heat and add the minced mushrooms. Cook until soft, then add the can of tomatoes and continue to cook until very little liquid is left, about 10 minutes. Pile the filling into the prepared vegetables on the baking sheet and sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: canned artichoke hearts, celery, green onion, mayonnaise, tomatoes, cooked shrimp, bacon
name: a tomato well stuffed

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees fl. In a large bowl, sieve the flour with salt and baking soda. Add sugar, butter, 2 eggs, caraway seeds and blend well. Add the milk a little by little and knead to a smooth dough. Roll out on a floured board 1cm thick and cut out with fancy cookie cutters. Brush with remaining well beaten egg and sprinkle heavily with sesame seeds. Place on a greased baking sheet. Bake in a 325 degree oven for 10 minutes. Cool and enjoy with a good cup of tea.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, orange juice, flour, baking soda, baking powder, egg, milk
name: sesame greek easter cookies koulourakia

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f mix together the butter, brown sugar, honey, egg and water. Sift together the dry ingredients then stir in the oats. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and mix. Add any additional ingredients drop by heaping teaspoonsful onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on wire rack.
ingredients: rolled oats, all-purpose flour, flaked coconut, walnuts, brown sugar, butter, honey
name: oatmeal coconut chews

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. In a small bowl, combine half of spice mixture, sweet potatoes, olive oil and maple syrup. Toss to coat sweet potatoes thoroughly. Spread sweet potatoes onto foil-lined baking sheet into a single layer, leaving two spaces in the middle for the pork chops. Rub remaining half of spice mixture lightly over both sides of pork chops and nestle into spaces made in sweet potatoes. Roast for 35-40 minutes or until pork chops are done.
ingredients: tempeh, olive oil, tamari, apple cider vinegar, maple syrup, ground cumin, ground red chili pepper, paprika
name: maple marinated tempeh

steps: Heat oil in a large fry pan, add the vegetables and garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Saute to desired doneness. Add tomato sauce, and simmer for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley you can serve this on rice, or as a side dish, hot or cold or luke warm. You can put this on a ham sandwich. Yummm. You can put this in an omelette and top with mozzarella and parmesan. You can add hot sauce or peppers to your liking. This is very versatile.
ingredients: zucchini, chopped tomatoes, bread cubes, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: zucchini au bon gout

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: bread, onions, celery, vegetable oil, old bay seasoning, bell peppers, lump crabmeat, jumbo shrimp
name: baked stuffed shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, brown sugar, salt, butter, egg, buttermilk, raisins
name: n y c irish soda bread

steps: Put the bacon in a large bowl and mix with the eggs. Add the bacon and mix with the eggs.
ingredients: bacon, small red potato, red onion, rosemary, eggs, water, salt, ground black pepper, ground paprika
name: bacon potato and onion frittata

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together olive oil, paprika, ground cinnamon, sweet potatoes, salt, brown sugar. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes.
ingredients: idaho potatoes, olive oil, salt, fresh ground pepper, malt vinegar
name: idaho fries with vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Preheat oven to 350c. Butter a 9 inch springform pan in small bowl, blend butter and sugar, then add vanilla and egg. Beat well add flour, baking powder, and salt to butter mixture. Blend well. Spread dough over bottom and 1 inch up side of pan. Over dough, arrange 5-6 peach slices in center to create a circular shape place rest of slices around center circle to create the effect of sunrays. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake 35-45 minutes cool 10 minutes then remove the sides of pan.
ingredients: butter, honey, lemon juice, flour, baking powder, salt, nuts, fruit
name: cajun honey cake

steps: Combine tahini, lemon juice and garlic in food processor or blender. Blend until smooth and creamy consistency. Serve at room temperature, with pita bread, on crackers, as a sandwich spread, or as a dip for raw vegetables. Store in refrigerator. It will keep for up to 2 weeks.
ingredients: garbanzo beans, roasted red peppers, lemon juice, tahini, garlic, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh parsley, feta cheese
name: spiced sweet roasted red pepper feta hummus

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken strips on a baking sheet. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill. Remove from oven and drizzle with the lemon juice
ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper, kosher salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, lime, juice of, orange, juice of, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley
name: citrus chicken strips

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta is cooking, heat a cast iron skillet to medium high. Add pancetta and saute until fat begins to render. Add onion and saute until the onion is translucent and the pancetta begins to brown, about 5 minutes. Add the heavy cream and the sherry. Bring to a boil and then remove from heat. Add the gorgonzola and stir until smooth. Place the pan back on the heat just until the cheese is fully melted and stir in the nutmeg. Drain the pasta and put back into the pasta pot or a pasta bowl. Pour sauce over pasta and mix. Serve in shallow bowls and pass parmesan cheese for diners to grate over the hot pasta.
ingredients: pancetta, olive oil, onion, sea salt, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, tomato puree, linguine, pecorino romano cheese
name: pasta with pancetta and tomato sauce giada de laurentiis

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix together all ingredients except chicken or fish, in a flat dish. Moisten chicken with water. Coat with mixture. Place in a shallow baking dish. Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is baked through. At this time you may put the chicken under the broiler to turn the crust to gold. Watch carefully so the chicken does not burn, while under the broiler.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, egg, butter, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese
name: quick easy chicken parmigiana

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly spray baking dish with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine soup, cheddar cheese, milk and black pepper. Add garlic and potatoes to soup mixture. Mix well. Spoon potatoes into baking dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika. Cover with foil. Bake 1 hour. Remove foil. Bake and additional 15-20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: red potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, whipping cream, soft breadcrumbs, butter
name: elegant potatoes au gratin

steps: In a large skillet melt butter over medium-low heat. Add onion and cook about 15 minutes or until onion gets soft and starts to brown, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder. Remove from skillet. Place a tortilla in the same skillet. Arrange cheese slices across the whole tortilla. On one side of each tortilla, put the roast beef and top the other side with onions. Cook over medium heat until lightly browned. Carefully fold tortillas in half, pressing gently. Keep warm in the oven until remaining quesadillas are cooked. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, salt, pepper, vegetable oil, sliced mushrooms, onions, chili powder, dried oregano, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: steak onion quesadillas

steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the eggplant. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: eggplant, garlic clove, salt, sour cream, lemon juice, cayenne, fresh ground black pepper, sesame seeds
name: sesame eggplant

steps: Place pork loin roast, onion, barbecue sauce, salsa, chili powder, mexican seasoning, flour tortillas in crock pot. Add pork loin roast, onion, barbecue sauce, salsa, chili powder, mexican seasoning, flour tortillas to crock pot. Add pork loin roast, onion, barbecue sauce, salsa, chili powder, mexican seasoning
ingredients: boneless pork loin roast, onion, barbecue sauce, salsa, chili powder, mexican seasoning, flour tortillas
name: crock pot pulled pork fajitas

steps: Heat oil in skillet or wok, add garlic, ginger, steak, salt& pepper, cook 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, simmer until liquid evaporates. Remove from heat. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth.
ingredients: corned beef, chopped tomatoes, onion, curry powder, salt and pepper
name: corned beef and tomato twist

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: refrigerated sugar cookie dough, flour, peppermint extract, red food coloring
name: very easy candy cane cookies

steps: Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter, whipping cream, rum, vanillapreparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch, half-and-half, water, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, unsalted butter,
ingredients: caramels, mini marshmallows, whipping cream, rum
name: crock pot caramel rum fondue

steps: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add beef cubes and saute until browned. Add garlic. Saute until garlic is lightly browned. Add flour and stir until well coated. Transfer meat into the crockpot and add marsala, broth, soup and sliced mushrooms. Mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or on high for 5 to 7 hours or until meat is tender. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve with or over rice, egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: chicken, butter, shallots, garlic, marsala wine, sliced mushrooms, flour
name: yummy chicken marsala

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 muffin cups or use muffin papers. Stir all ingredients except blueberries together in large bowl til moistened. Stir in blueberries. Divide evenly among cups. Bake 13-18 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, oat bran, nonfat dry milk powder, salt, canola oil, baking powder
name: master baking mix low fat bisquick substitute

steps: Heat grill to medium hot. In a medium mixing bowl, combine the preserves, garlic, olive oil, soy sauce, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, salt and black pepper, and mix well to combine. Sprinkle the tenderloins with additional salt and pepper and place on the grill. Cook about 10 minutes on each side before brushing the upturned side with the glaze. Continue cooking for another 10 to 12 minutes, turning every 3 to 5 minutes and brushing each upturned side with glaze every time, until the meat is cooked through. Move the pork to a cooler part of the grill if it starts to get too dark before it is cooked through. Place the peach halves on the grill, cut-side down, and grill 2 minutes. Turn, and brush the tops with the glaze. Grill 3 ro 5 minutes more, until the peaches are soft and the cavities fill with juices. Transfer the cooked pork and peaches to a serving plate & serve immediately.
ingredients: watermelon, strawberry, kiwi, peach, fresh lime juice, honey, lime peel, mint leaf, peach preserves, pork tenderloin
name: pork with watermelon salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 180deg c. Beat egg whites and sugar together for 1 minute. Stir baking soda into apple sauce and then add to bowl. Gently fold in flour, rind and choc chips alternately with orange juice. Pour into prepared loaf tin. Bake 30- 35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: unsalted butter, caster sugar, oranges, eggs, self-raising flour, milk
name: orange tea cake

steps: Heat oil in skillet for 2 minutes over medium-high heat. Add fish and cook 3-4 minutes more, spooning fish occasionally over fish, until browned. Add salt and pepper to pan. Cook 5-7 minutes more, spooning fish occasionally over fish, until it flakes easily with fork. Fluff emblanco with a fork and serve with fish.
ingredients: white fish fillets, water, onion, parsley, potatoes, fish stock, oil, noodles, salt and pepper, lemon, zest of
name: emblanco white fish soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffin cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done.
ingredients: black forest ham, whole wheat bread, egg substitute, cheddar cheese, pepper, fresh chives
name: ham cheese n egg cups

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss potatoes, garlic, and olive oil together to coat. Place potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Place in 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender, allow to cool for 10 minutes. Combine mayonnaise, creole mustard, lemon juice, parsley, and scallions. Add to potatoes. Add salt or pepper to taste. Serve cold or room temperature.
ingredients: new potato, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, parsley, salt, pepper
name: italian potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Butter the sides and bottom of a 10-inch springform pan and set aside. In the top of a double boiler, combine the butter, chocolate and coffee and melt slowly, stirring occasionally, until smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar and vanilla until frothy. Whisk the eggs into the melted chocolate until combined. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour and cool on a wire rack until it reaches room temperature. Remove the sides of the pan, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight, before serving.
ingredients: almond cookies, orange liqueur, dark chocolate, mascarpone cheese
name: no cook chocolate mascarpone cake

steps: Preheat oven to 180c and grease an oven proof dish. Bring the cream to the boil, add the stock cube and stir to dissolve. Add salt, pepper and chives. Blend in half the grated jarlsberg until it melts and the sauce is smooth. Layer all the vegetables in the dish and pour in the sauce. Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top. Bake in mid oven for 30 - 45 minutes.
ingredients: tomatoes, butter, garlic cloves, sugar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, cream, dried breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: tomatoes au gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine shortening, baking potatoes, milk, egg, flour, salt, pepper, msg, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once.
ingredients: shortening, baking potatoes, milk, egg, flour, salt, pepper, msg, paprika, garlic powder
name: kfc potato wedges

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine all ingredients and knead ten times. Let stand for ten minutes. Put dough on a cookie sheet and roll or press out. Top with toppings. Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges are golden.
ingredients: active dry yeast, granulated sugar, warm water, all-purpose flour, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil
name: cuisinart food processor pizza dough

steps: In a skillet, heat butter or oil. Add in onions. Fry over medium heat until they are soft and golden brown. Prepare gravy and keep warm. Grill or fry hamburgers to desired degree of doneness. Cook french fries in the oven according to package directions. Right before the burgers and fries are done, toast the bread. Place 1 slice on each of 2 plates. Remove fries from oven and place half on each slice of toast. Ladle cup gravy over each serving, top each with half the fried onions, and serve immediately.
ingredients: lean ground beef, salt, pepper, yellow mustard, white bread
name: hamburger on toast

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad.
ingredients: head romaine lettuce, bacon, fresh bean sprout, hard-boiled eggs, salad oil, granulated sugar, vinegar, ketchup, onion, worcestershire sauce
name: foo yong salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine penne pasta, onion, bacon, cooked turkey, reduced-sodium turkey broth, camembert cheese, whipping cream, fresh basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. Remove from oven and let
ingredients: penne pasta, onion, bacon, cooked turkey, reduced-sodium turkey broth, camembert cheese, whipping cream, fresh basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: penne with turkey bacon and camembert

steps: Heat wok or deep frying pan over high heat. Add chicken, coconut milk, japanese eggplant, red curry paste, nam pla, sweet basil, palm sugar, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves, kaffir lime leaves
ingredients: chicken, coconut milk, japanese eggplant, red curry paste, nam pla, sweet basil, palm sugar, kaffir lime leaves
name: kaeng phet daeng kai hot red chicken curry

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line pan with parchment paper. Place squash on pan cut side up. Combine remaining ingredients and brush half of the mixture on the squash. Bake for 45 minute or until tender. Brush once more halfway through baking, and again near the end.
ingredients: acorn squash, dark rum, dark brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper
name: rum glazed acorn squash

steps: Spray a 4 quart crock pot with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. In a large bowl, combine the cake mix and pudding mix. In a medium bowl, beat the eggs with the water, then add the sour cream and oil and beat until smooth. Add to the dry ingredients and beat well. Stir in the white chocolate chips and almonds. Pour into crock pot. Cover slow cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours, until top springs back when touched very lightly with finger.
ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding, eggs, water, vegetable oil, lemonade concentrate, powdered sugar
name: burst of lemon cake

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: eggs, water, vanilla extract, agave nectar, almond flour, sea salt, baking soda, grapeseed oil
name: silver dollar pancakes gluten free

steps: Slice bananas in half lengthways. Place in baking dish. Cut side up. Pour over juice, drizzle honey. Sprinkle on nuts, cinnamon and sultanas. Bake 200 c for 15 minutes. Serve with yoghurt.
ingredients: bananas, fresh pineapple, mango, papaya nectar, fresh lime juice
name: tropical wave

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Cut the bottoms off the brussels sprouts and trim any damaged leaves. Cut in half. Add the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix to combine. Add brussels sprouts and mix until coated. Put in a roasting pan in the oven for 45 minutes, stiring once after about 25 minutes, until brown and caramelized.
ingredients: brussels sprout, walnut oil, garlic clove, vegetable broth, salt, nutmeg, pepper, walnuts, parmigiano-reggiano cheese
name: sauteed brussels sprouts with walnuts

steps: In a small saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk, chocolate syrup, almond extract, dark roast coffee, chocolate, nutmegpreparation:In a large saucepan, combine milk
ingredients: brewed coffee, milk, cream of coconut, nutmeg
name: coconut white russian

steps: In a large pot, saute the onion in oil over medium-high heat until the onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and thyme. Cook until fragrant, 1 minute. Add the drained beans, bay leaves and enough water to cover beans. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce temperature to simmer, cover and cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until beans are tender but not mushy. Check often and add from 1 to 2 cups additional water if beans start to cook dry. Drain beans, remove the bay leaves and fresh thyme springs, season with salt and pepper to taste. Please. If they are salted before they will not soften. When cool, divide into 1 cup servings and freeze in rigid container or vacuum pack in small bags.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, fresh sage, water, salt and pepper
name: mashed white beans

steps: Melt margarine in large non-stick pan over medium-low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until melted and smooth. Turn off flame. Stir in extracts. Fold in cereal and continue folding until well coated. Spray 13 x 9 pan with cooking spray and press mixture into pan. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: margarine, salt, miniature marshmallows, vanilla, unsweetened cocoa powder, cocoa krispies cereal
name: cocoa rice krispies treats

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: chicken breast, sun-dried tomato, garlic cloves, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, black beans, salsa verde, brown rice
name: chicken escondido

steps: Mix cream cheese, sour cream, apple, blue cheese, red onion, pecans, triscuit crackers. Bake on a greased cookie sheet for 10 minutes then allow to cool completely. In a small bowl, mix together cream cheese, sour cream, apple, blue cheese, red onion, pecans, triscuit crackers. In a small bowl, mix together cream cheese, sour cream,
ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, apple, blue cheese, red onion, pecans, triscuit crackers
name: apple blue cheese spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oats, eggs, bananas, vegetable oil, walnuts, blueberries
name: banana blueberry oatmeal bread

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, salt, butter, yellow onion, fresh parsley. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: white rice, apple juice, water, dry onion soup mix, margarine
name: apple onion rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Cover a glass baking dish with aluminum foil and place the chicken breasts on top. Zest all 3 of the lemons into a small bowl, and then add the juice of 2 of the lemons. Add the pepper and all the other ingredients into the bowl. Mix the combine and pour over all the chicken breasts. Bake for 1 hour. Remove from the oven and drizzle with the lemon juice of the last lemon, and a few more grinds from pepper mill.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, olive oil, lemon, juice and zest of, dried oregano, garlic cloves, salt and pepper
name: lemon oregano chicken

steps: In a medium bowl, mix together sea scallops, ground cumin, chili powder, black pepper, olive oil, whole grain rice, cilantro, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, lime. Place in rice cooker. Boil water. Add sea scallops, ground cumin, chili powder, black pepper, olive oil, whole grain rice, cilantro, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, lime. Add scallops, ground cumin, chili powder, black pepper, olive oil, whole grain rice, cilantro, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, lime. Add scallops, ground cumin, chili powder, black pepper, olive oil, whole
ingredients: sea scallops, ground cumin, chili powder, black pepper, olive oil, whole grain rice, cilantro, tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, lime
name: fiesta style scallops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl. I prefer to use a mixing spoon over an electric mixer since the dough will be very stiff. On an ungreased cookie sheet, shape dough into round balls and then slightly press the dough down with the bottom of a cup. Bake for 8-9 minutes. Allow to cool and remove from cookie sheet. Makes around 24 cookies. Once cooled, frost with a buttercream frosting. Store in a sealed container.
ingredients: vegetable oil, instant pudding mix, bisquick, egg
name: ethel s pudding cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: brown sugar, dark corn syrup, vanilla, baking soda, chocolate
name: sponge candy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: philadelphia cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, vanilla wafer, blueberry pie filling
name: easy mini cheesecakes

steps: To make sour sirloin, combine 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water over medium-high heat in a saucepan until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool completely before using. To store, refrigerate up to 2 months. In a glass, combine 2 cups of sugar and 2 cups of water over medium-high heat in a saucepan until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and
ingredients: round bone sirloin, lemon juice, orange juice, vegetable oil, whiskey, onion, peppercorns, salt, orange
name: whiskey sour sirloin

steps: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned.
ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, egg yolks, salt, butter, marshmallows, cereal, crisco shortening
name: sweet potato marshmallow puffs

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, tomatoes, potato, onion, stewed tomatoes, rice, macaroni, veg-all
name: grandma s vegetable soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place chicken breast on bottom of 9x13 baking pan. Pour soup mix over top. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover bake an additional 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, sauterne white wine, green pepper, water chestnuts, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: chicken breasts elegant

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add flour, cook and stir 1 minute. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: crushed tomatoes, water, cheese, frozen mixed vegetables, ground beef, milk, processed cheese
name: cheeseburger macaroni for a crowd

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place flounder fillets in a greased shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine sour cream, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, onion, and salt. Spread over fillets. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 20-25 minutes or until fillets flake easily with a fork.
ingredients: flounder fillets, plain low-fat yogurt, parmesan cheese, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, prepared horseradish
name: flounder with parmesan crust

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat together all ingredients except tomatoes, then add the sun-dried toimatoes. Mix with an electric mixer until smooth. Gradually add sugar, beating until creamy. Cover and chill at least 1 hour or up to 3 days covered. Let stand at room temperature 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: sun-dried tomatoes, walnuts, cream cheese, boiling water
name: roasted walnut and sun dried tomato dip

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon juice, garlic cloves, honey, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, fresh parsley, lemon, zest of, lemon
name: seared lemon chicken with garlic honey balsamic vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. And grease a 8 inch square baking pan. Sift the cornmeal, flour, baking powder and salt together. In a seperate bowl mix the egg, buttermilk oil and honey. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients. Beat until smooth. Pour into pan. Bake 20 minutes edges may start to brown a little.
ingredients: granulated sugar, whipping cream, honey, butter, salt
name: honey taffy

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a large bowl, mix together maple oil, paprika, ground cinnamon, sweet potatoes, salt, brown sugar. Toss the potato strips into mixture, to coat well, and spread onto baking sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt and brown sugar. Bake for 30 minutes, turning every 10 minutes.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, vegetable oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, ground ginger, nutmeg
name: sweet potato fries with cinnamon and maple syrup light

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: french bread, roma tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, salt
name: grilled tomato and basil bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In 2 pans place tomato halves cut side up. Sprinkle with oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic, and herbs. Bake tomatoes for 2 hours. Check the tomatoes after 1 hour and turn down the heat if they seem to be cooking too quickly. Then turn the oven to 400 degrees and bake another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and process tomatoes through a food mill using a medium dye over a small saucepan. Discard skins. Add wine, bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: whole canned tomatoes, garlic cloves, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper
name: michael symon s homemade pizza sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, salt, flour, cream of tartar, baking soda
name: easy bake oven angel cookies

steps: Preheat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, milk, bittersweet chocolate, butter, vanilla, pie crust, apples, walnuts
name: delicious chocolate apple walnuts pie

steps: In a medium sized glass bowl mix together the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, onion, garlic, sugar, salt and pepper. Combine well. Add in the juice. Cover and refrigerate for 3-4 hours before serving. Serve with fresh tortilla chips.
ingredients: green chilies, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro leaf, lemon juice, seasoning
name: easy salsa

steps: Combine sandwich bread, eggs, mustard, mayonnaise, cornichons, paprika, vinegar, salt and pepper, butter in small bowl. Place sandwich bread, eggs, mustard, mayonnaise, cornichons, paprika, vinegar, salt and pepper, butter in small bowl. Place sandwich bread, eggs, mustard, mayonnaise, cornichons, paprika,
ingredients: sandwich bread, eggs, mustard, mayonnaise, cornichons, paprika, vinegar, salt and pepper, butter
name: egg salad tea sandwich

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl, whisking together well with a whisk. Set aside.
ingredients: edamame, canola oil, carrot, onion, kung pao sauce, low sodium soy sauce, red pepper flakes
name: edamame in kung pao sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Bake in oven for 1 hour. Bake in
ingredients: prepared pizza crust, condensed bean with bacon soup, ketchup, prepared mustard, dried onion flakes, frankfurters, cheddar cheese
name: pauper s pizza

steps: Heat the oil in a heavy 4-quart saucepan over med-high heat. Add in the onion, carrots, and celery. Cook, stirring, until the vegetables begin to soften, 2-3 minutes. Add in the split peas, broth, and water. Bring to a boil. Partially cover pan, decrease heat to med-low, and simmer until the soup is thick, about 45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. You can add fresh herbs. Fresh dill is recommended. Also can add meat and ham bones to make it richer.
ingredients: smoked sausage, reduced-sodium chicken broth, dried split peas, carrots, celery ribs, onion, dried marjoram, bay leaf
name: savory split pea soup with smoked sausage

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Whisk the oil, chili powder, ground cumin, paprika, ground coriander, black pepper, chickpeas and saut for 1 minute. Add chickpeas and saut until heated through. Add peas. Season with black pepper and serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, ground cumin, paprika, ground coriander, black pepper, chickpeas
name: spiced roasted chickpeas

steps: Preheat oven to 200d celsius lightly grease 4 ramekins and place on a baking tray. Heat a medium sized fry pan over a moderate heat and add the oil to the pan, then add the spinach and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the leaves are just softened. Drain the spinach in a colander and as soon as spinach is cool enough to handle, squeeze out excess liquid. Divide the spinach between the ramekins and break two eggs on top of the spinach. Pour one tablespoon of cream over the eggs and sprinkle with one tablespoon of parmesan. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the eggs are set and puffed up. Serve immediately with toast.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, sour cream, green onions, seasoning salt, cayenne pepper, frozen chopped spinach, fresh chives
name: spinach stuffed eggs

steps: Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: linguine, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, extra virgin olive oil, anchovy fillets, flat leaf parsley, black pepper
name: aglio olio garlic and oil pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan.
ingredients: graham crackers, margarine, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cream cheese, cherry pie filling
name: cherry delight

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture.
ingredients: milk, butter, flour, jalapeno jack cheese, frozen spinach, oysters, artichokes, sliced water chestnuts, cheddar cheese
name: special spinach au gratin

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk & butter. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 238. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: granulated sugar, milk, peanut butter, butter, vanilla extract
name: super easy peanut butter fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 400c line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix. The dough is quite stiff and crumbly, but you should still be able to form it into balls that stick together. Roll dough into 1 inch balls and place on the cookie sheet. Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes or until golden. Allow to cool on the cookie sheet for a while and then transfer carefully on a wire rack to cool completely. Dust warm cookies with powdered sugar.
ingredients: butter, eggs, vanilla, frozen pineapple concentrate, whole wheat flour, baking soda, rolled oats, crushed pineapple, shredded coconut
name: bob s pina colada cookies

steps: Combine flour, baking powder, and sugar. In a separate bowl, mash the banana and add the soy milk and peanut butter. Combine flour mixture and peanut butter mixture. Let batter sit for 5 minutes while spraying the griddle and heating it. Pour 3 inch pancakes and cook for 2 minutes on each side. Serve with maple syrup, fruit spread, bananas, etc.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, old fashioned oats, baking powder, salt, creamy peanut butter, soymilk, brown sugar
name: yummy vegan peanut butter cookies

steps: In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden
ingredients: water, gingerroot, cinnamon stick, cloves, coriander seeds, honey, star fruit, brown sugar
name: broiled star fruit in ginger

steps: In a small bowl, combine the coconut oil, head cauliflower, white onion, garlic, water, salt, white pepper, parsley and mix well. Add the coconut oil, head cauliflower, white onion, garlic, water, salt, white pepper, parsley and mix well. Add the coconut oil, head cauliflower, white onion, garlic, water, salt, white pepper,
ingredients: coconut oil, head cauliflower, white onion, garlic, water, salt, white pepper, parsley
name: cauliflower rice vegan

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees. Process cookies in food processor until finely ground. Combine crumbs, butter, salt, vanilla and almonds, stirring until crumbs are moistened. Press mixture evenly across 9-inch pie plate. Bake crust until crisp, about 7 minutes. Let cool completely before filling. Crust may also be wrapped tightly in plastic and frozen up to one month.
ingredients: pie crust, eggs, real maple syrup, lemon juice, cinnamon, butter, pure vanilla extract, salt, walnut pieces
name: maple walnut pie

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally.
ingredients: red potatoes, red bell pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, nonfat sour cream, cream of chicken soup, ranch dressing mix, garlic salt
name: chicken with red potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake at 375, for 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, apple, nuts
name: apple brownies

steps: Slice egg in half lengthwise and place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 for 10-15 minute.
ingredients: egg, water, cornstarch, flour, salt, sugar
name: chinese egg roll wrap

steps: Place the olive oil in a large skillet over low heat. Add the tomatoes, garlic, half of the pinenuts, rocket and basil in a food processor and process until smooth. Toast the remaining pinenuts until golden. Set aside. Slowly add the oil to the olive oil while the processor is running. Turn the processor off and then stir through the parmesan. Stir pesto through the pasta then sprinkle with the reserved pinenuts. Serve immediately with salad and crusty bread.
ingredients: fettuccine pasta, eggs, cream, coarse grain mustard, sun-dried tomato, black olives, parmesan cheese, fresh basil, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: sun dried tomato olive and parmesan carbonara

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, pecan halves
name: pampered chef pecan tassies

steps: Heat the butter in a large pan over low heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the sugar and continue stirring until the onions are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add flour and cook for 3 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the baguette with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast baguette under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve baguette on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: barley, water, raisins, sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon stick, wine
name: wijnsoep wine soup

steps: Place mahi mahi fillets in a ziploc bag and let marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes. Spray non-stick baking pan with cooking spray. Place fish in pan. Drain juice from pineapple, reserve. Combine pineapple juice with curry powder and pour over fish. Add pineapple chunks and pepper slices on top of fish. Wrap pan tightly with foil. Bake for 15 minutes at 350 degrees, then uncover and bake for 5 minutes more, until fish flakes easily with fork.
ingredients: mahi mahi fillets, lemon juice, olive oil, fresh oregano, of fresh mint, garlic, lemon peel, salt
name: greek style marinated mahi mahi

steps: Add honey, cinnamon, sugar, tea, bourbon, ice, mint sprig. Serve over crushed ice. Garnish with mint leaves.
ingredients: irish whiskey, brewed tea, honey, lemon juice, cinnamon stick
name: irish whiskey honey remedy

steps: Heat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small ovenproof dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the brie in this dish. Spread sour cream over brie as though frosting a cake. Sprinkle top with brown sugar, then with pecans. Dot top with butter. Bake until cheese is very soft to the touch, 15-18 minutes. Increase heat to 425f and bake 5 minutes longer. Brie will be starting to melt on the bottom and the sugar will be bubbling on the top. Serve with bread, sliced apples and crackers.
ingredients: brie round, apricot preserves, frozen puff pastry, egg white
name: brie cheese appetizer france

steps: In a large serving bowl put the lettuce, carrots, feta cheese, cherry tomatoes and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all.
ingredients: lettuce, zucchini, carrots, feta cheese, cherry tomatoes
name: veggie salad

steps: In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries.
ingredients: bananas, strawberries, grape juice, nonfat yogurt, honey, pistachio nuts
name: mixed fruit smoothies

steps: Cook on low 6 hrs or high 4 hours.
ingredients: onion, green pepper, whole tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, red kidney beans, ground beef, chili seasoning mix
name: dad s chili

steps: Add all ingredients to a bowl and stir to combine. Use immediately or store in an air-tight container for later use. To use, sprinkle a generous amount of the dry rub over meat or fish. Pat the rub into the surface of the meat to help it adhere. Grill the coated meat over an open flame or add to a hot, well oiled skillet.
ingredients: espresso coffee, kosher salt, light brown sugar, sweet paprika, fresh coarse ground black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, ground cumin, ground coriander, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: java rub

steps: Heat oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees f. Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper. Stir egg into dry ingredients. Gradually mix in one beer until a thin batter is formed. You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped. Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil. Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown. Drain on paper towels, and serve warm.
ingredients: bread, salt cod fish, potatoes, salt pork, onions, butter, flour, water
name: fish and brewis

steps: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, raisins, vanillapreparation:Mix just until all flour is moistened. Roll out dough onto lightly floured surface with rolling pin. Roll out to about 2 inch thickness. Use a round cookie cutter or the top of a glass to cut out buns. Put them into a 13x9-inch baking pan. Place them all together, no need to separate them. Bake at 450f until golden brown about 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, dry yeast, milk, water, vegetable oil, white sugar, salt
name: tasty buns

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, broccolini, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, rye bread, sharp cheddar cheese
name: broccolini or broccoli cheddar melts

steps: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in heavy skillet. Add beef and brown. Sprinkle with flour and cook an additional minute. Add water, wine, soup mix and bouillon and stir. Transfer to casserole dish with lid and bake at 325f for 3 hours. Ensure it does not go dry by adding wine or water. Fry mushrooms in pan with 1 tbsp olive oil. Add mushrooms to mixture and return to oven for an hour. Cook noodles as directed. Remove mixture from oven and stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.
ingredients: lean ground beef, lipton onion soup mix, flour, tomato paste, water, sour cream, egg noodles, parsley
name: lipton chopped beef stroganoff

steps: Add in the vodka, lime juice, sugar, soda water, blue curacao, green creme de menthe. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Pour into the glass. Add in the sprite to the glass. Shake vigorously for 5-
ingredients: vodka, lime juice, sugar, soda water, blue curacao, green creme de menthe
name: secret from the blue lagoon
