steps: Preheat oven to 180dc. Heat oil in a heavy based pan, add onions, apples and ginger and cook until soft. Add mustard seeds and water and cook for 15 minutes. Remove mixture to warmed ovenproof dish. Deglaze pan with cider and add to onion mixture. Fry sausages in pan until browned. Drain and add to onion mixture. Bake in oven, uncovered for 25-30 mins. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: unsalted butter, chicken-apple sausages, onions, light brown sugar, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh thyme, garlic, dark beer, bourbon
name: emeril s bourbon braised chicken and apple sausage with onions

steps: Heat oil in a heavy skillet over high heat. Add garlic and turn steaks to coat. Season with salt& pepper, and cayenne pepper. Fry steaks until brown on both sides, turning once, about 4 minutes. Transfer to plates and serve. You can grill if you prefer.
ingredients: rib eye steaks, fresh coarse ground black pepper, garlic cloves, salt, brandy
name: pepper rib steak flambe

steps: Bake skewers for 10 minutes, or until cooked.
ingredients: bamboo skewers, fresh pineapple, red bell pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast, mango chutney, orange juice, vanilla, ground nutmeg
name: caribbean chutney kabobs

steps: Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add coconut oil, jumbo shrimp, green onion, amaretto liqueur, coconut milk, heavy cream, sugar, coconut extract, vanilla extract. Cook for 3 minutes then turn shrimp. Add coconut oil, jumbo shrimp,
ingredients: olive oil, jumbo shrimp, green onion, amaretto liqueur, coconut milk, heavy cream, sugar, coconut extract, vanilla extract
name: chef lin s coconut shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease 13-by-9-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Unroll beef cubes, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, water-packed artichoke hearts, fresh basil, salt, olive oil, parmesan cheese. Cover with drained tomatoes, artichoke hearts, and mushrooms. Sprinkle with feta cheese and sliced bell pepper. Bake for about 20 minutes until crust is golden brown.
ingredients: boneless beef cubes, onion, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, water-packed artichoke hearts, fresh basil, salt, olive oil, parmesan cheese
name: beef with tomatoes and artichokes easy elegance in 30 minutes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place roast in a large roasting pan. Combine soup mix, broth and beer in a bowl and stir until soup mix is dissolved. Pour over roast and place onions around it. Bake for 2 to 3 hours, basting frequently, or until beef is tender and looks stringy when pulled with a fork. If roast starts getting too crispy, cover pan with foil or lid. Slice meat thinly and serve on rolls. Serve juices in individual cups or bowls to dip sandwiches into.
ingredients: sour cream, dijon mustard, prepared horseradish, french baguettes, provolone cheese, roast beef, alfalfa sprout
name: hearty oven roast beef sandwiches

steps: Heat olive oil in large pot over medium-high heat. Add garlic and coriander and cook until fragrant. Add spinach and cook until there is no more pink. Add lentils, chicken broth, and bay leaves. Cover and bring to a boil, turn down heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add potatoes and cook for 15-20 minutes. When potatoes are soft add spinach and stir until completely wilted. Add olives and spinach. Add spinach and cook for 15-20 minutes. When potatoes are soft add olives and spinach. Cover and bring to a boil, turn down heat and simmer for
ingredients: spinach, onion, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, lentils, salt, ground cumin, pepper
name: lentils with spinach

steps: Combine kasseri cheese, butter, brandy, lemon, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy, lemon juice, brandy,
ingredients: kasseri cheese, butter, brandy, lemon, juice of
name: broiled brandy saganaki

steps: Mix together the meatballs, breadcrumbs, basil, pepper, salt, dried onion flakes, tomato soup, pineapple tidbits, brown sugar, green peppers. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes, or until the meatballs are crisp. Remove from oven and pour off the fat. Place the meatballs in a large flat baking dish so that the over lapping bacon is on bottom. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes, or until the
ingredients: lean hamburger, dry breadcrumbs, basil, pepper, salt, dried onion flakes, tomato soup, pineapple tidbits, brown sugar, green peppers
name: polynesian meatballs

steps: Heat 2 tbsp oil. Add onions and garlic. Saut until onions are tender. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and ham. Let sit 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally. The less you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. The
ingredients: rice, water, vegetables, onion, bacon, oil, tomato sauce, soy sauce
name: microwave fried rice

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine olive oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: garlic, olive oil, yukon gold potatoes, salt, pepper, flat leaf parsley, lemon rind
name: garlicky roasted potatoes with herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray non-stick spray in cassarole pan. Cook pasta and drain. Heat oil in deep skillet. Add onion & bell pepper. Cook and stir for a few minutes. Add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, olives, italian seasoniong. Mix to blend. Put mozzarella on top. Cook in oven for about 35 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil flavored cooking spray, wonton skins, egg, dried oregano, pecorino cheese
name: italian pasta chips baked not fried

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Spread turkey on top of potato roll. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until hot through and bubbly.
ingredients: potato dinner roll, sandwich bread, turkey gravy, prepared stuffing, mashed potatoes, turkey breast, cranberry sauce
name: ultimate thanksgiving leftovers sandwich

steps: Spray a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Cook ham steak in skillet over medium heat for 3 minutes per side, or until golden brown. Remove ham from skillet and keep warm. Squeeze lemon over pan, scraping up brown bits from the bottom of the pan. Add butter to pan. Once butter is melted, add garlic, parsley and tomatoes. Cook over medium heat for approximately 5 minutes, or until tomatoes soften and begin to lose their shape. Spoon sauce over ham steak and serve immediately.
ingredients: ham steaks, butter, onions, brown sugar, whiskey, flour, broth, salt and pepper
name: ham steaks with whiskey sauce

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with blueberries and strawberries, if desired.
ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, cream cheese, white chocolate baking squares, blueberries
name: white chocolate mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, cheddar cheese, salsa, sour cream, ranch dressing
name: taco salad low carb

steps: Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl. Whisk until smooth. Store in a glass container or jar in the refrigerator for up to 1 week and also freezes well. To make scrambled eggs. Fry slowly over low heat in a nonstick frypan.
ingredients: flour, salt, shortening, egg, cold water, lemon juice
name: egg pastry

steps: Mix everything together in a slow cooker except chicken. Lay chicken on top and cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 3-4 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir together. Top with cheese, sour cream, or tortilla chips, if desired.
ingredients: onion, kidney beans, black beans, frozen corn, tomato sauce, diced tomatoes with green chilies, taco seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breasts, tabasco sauce, chicken broth
name: slow cooker southwest chicken stew

steps: Combine first 5 ingredients in a large zip-top plastic bag. Add salmon. Seal and marinate in refrigerator 20 minutes. Prepare grill or broiler. Remove salmon from bag, reserving the marinade. Place salmon on a grill rack or broiler pan coated with cooking spray, and cook for 6 minutes on each side or until the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Baste salmon occasionally with the reserved marinade.
ingredients: dijon mustard, maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, salt, fresh ground pepper, salmon fillets, cooking spray
name: maple mustard salmon

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan or stockpot. Add the onion and thyme. Saut until the onion is soft, but not brown. Add the tomatoes and stir briefly. Add the garlic and stir for about 3 minutes, or until the garlic is fully incorporated into the mixture. Stir in the sugar, chicken stock, and tomato paste. Simmer, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Puree the soup mixture in a food processor and return ro the pot. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Just before serving, add the basil. Serve with a dollop of yogurt, if desired.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, chicken, cheddar cheese
name: tangy tomato soup

steps: Mix strawberry, baby spinach, brie cheese, dijon mustard, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, balsamic vinegar, honey, bals
ingredients: strawberry, baby spinach, brie cheese, dijon mustard, honey, balsamic vinegar, oil, pecans
name: caras strawberry brie spinich salad

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, prosciutto, diced tomatoes, fresh basil, penne pasta, parmesan cheese
name: prosciutto tomato pasta

steps: Place ham in deep baking dish. Spread marmalade over marmalade pressing it down by hand. Bake 45 minutes till golden brown.
ingredients: ham slices, milk, strong black coffee, pepper
name: country fried ham with red eye gravy

steps: Put all ingredients in a blender. Blend until blended. Pour into a glass. Put cinnamon on top of the poured smoothie.
ingredients: pineapple juice, brown sugar, butter, cloves, cinnamon sticks, lemon
name: hot buttered pineapple smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Peel and trim carrots and slice lengthwise into thin halves or quarters. Toss carrots in bowl with olive oil, rosemary and salt. Roast at 350 for 30 minutes, stirring half way through. Turn up oven to 425 and roast ten minutes longer or until the ends of the carrots begin to turn black. When carrots are almost done, melt apricot jam in microwave for 15-30 seconds. Remove carrots from oven, place in bowl and toss warm carrots with melted apricot jam. Toss with a little more rosemary if desired.
ingredients: onions, lemons, carrots, garlic cloves, rosemary, olive oil
name: lemon roasted onions carrots

steps: In a saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas and scallions. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later.
ingredients: canned chicken broth, creamed corn, cooked chicken, cornstarch, cold water, egg whites, fresh parsley
name: low cal chinese chicken corn soup

steps: Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve.
ingredients: chicken, french-fried onions, dried breadcrumbs, paprika, salt, sour cream
name: my onion fried chicken

steps: Heat dressing in large saucepan on medium heat. Add onions. Cook 10 minute or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Add broth, 2 soup cans water and worcestershire sauce. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer 5 minute. Preheat broiler. Ladle soup evenly into 4 large ovenproof bowls. Top with croutons and cheese. Broil 2 to 3 minute or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: onions, butter, salt, flour, beef broth, white wine, swiss cheese, french bread
name: golden brown french onion soup

steps: In a small saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer, stirring occasionally until the sugar dissolves. Add lemon peel and lemon juice, stir and remove from heat. Let cool completely, then strain into a clean pitcher. In a blender, puree the pint of strawberries and add to the lemon juice. Stir well and refrigerate. Add sparkling water and stir well when ready to serve.
ingredients: sugar, water, fresh strawberries, fresh lemon juice, light corn syrup, champagne
name: sparkling strawberry pops

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hour.
ingredients: italian sausages, potatoes, onions, carrots, white mushrooms, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, beef stock powder
name: creamy sausages

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: hot italian sausage, sweet italian sausage, unsalted butter, red seedless grapes, balsamic vinegar
name: roasted sausages and grapes

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine the first 4 ingredients. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until the dutch barley is tender. Stir in pearl barley, water, raisins, sugar, peaches, prune, peaches, prune, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, peaches, pe
ingredients: pearl barley, water, raisins, sugar, peaches, prune
name: dutch barley soup dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pretzel chicken in baking dish. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients and whisk together until well blended and smooth. Pour sauce mixture over chicken. Bake chicken with sauce mixture for about 20 - 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking.
ingredients: pretzels, cayenne, canola oil, whole grain mustard, dijon mustard, water, red wine vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: pretzel chicken with dijon or honey mustard dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. You will need a 12-inch cast iron skillet, or oven-proof skillet, and a blender. In a blender at medium speed, mix together the eggs, milk, flour, granulated sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon, until just combined, about 15 seconds. The batter should be a little bit lumpy. Melt the butter or margarine in a 12-inch cast iron skillet by putting it in the hot oven for about 30 seconds. Remove the skillet from the oven, spread the butter to coat the bottom and sides of the skillet, and pour in the batter. Return the skillet to the center oven rack and bake for about 20 minutes, or until the pancake is puffed and lightly browned.
ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, butter, powdered sugar
name: creeping pancake

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine eggs, corn syrup, apple, butter, vanilla extract, salt, ground cinnamon, macadamia nuts, nestl toll house butterscotch flavored morsels, unbaked 9-inch pie shellpreparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine eggs, corn syrup, apple, butter, vanilla extract, salt and cinnamon in large bowl. Mix well. Stir in nuts and morsels. Pour into pie shell. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until edge is set but center still moves slightly. Cool on wire rack for 2 hours. Serve immediately or cover and refrigerate.
ingredients: eggs, sugar, light corn syrup, salted macadamia nuts, butter, vanilla, 9 inch pie shell
name: macadamia nut pie

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green potatoes alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: small red potatoes, onion, head of garlic, olive oil, salt, rosemary sprigs, dijon mustard, balsamic vinegar
name: rosemary garlic roasted red potatoes

steps: Saute mushrooms and beef roast in butter. Add mushrooms and butter. Add broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth, broth
ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, beef roast seasoning, flour, water, cooked beef, sour cream, egg noodles
name: stroganoff made easy homemade gourmet

steps: Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour, or until cheese on top is melted and golden brown.
ingredients: bacon, eggs, milk, salt, dry mustard, pepper, cheddar cheese, tater tots
name: tater tot breakfast bake

steps: Boil syrup and sugar together for about 2 minutes. Pour over eggs gradually, stirring well. Add butter, vanilla and pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake in preheated 375 oven for about 50 minutes, or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
ingredients: white corn syrup, eggs, salt, vanilla, sugar, butter, pecans, pecan halves, 9-inch pie shell
name: farrah fawcett s pecan pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Fill 2 mini muffin tins with paper cups and spray with cooking spray. Place 1 key lime cooler cookie in the bottom of the cup, flat side down. Beat together cream cheese, egg, sugar, lime juice and zest until well mixed. Fill the cups to the top. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove tarts to cool. When completely cool, top with whipped cream.
ingredients: sugar-free shortbread cookies, light butter, unflavored gelatin, skim milk, non-fat vanilla yogurt, reduced-fat cream cheese, lime juice, lime zest, splenda granular, whipping cream
name: key lime pie sugar free splenda

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars.
ingredients: butter, caramel ice cream topping, pecans, bisquick, milk, sugar, cinnamon
name: caramel biscuit ring

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel onions, and cut in half crosswise. Place onions cut sides down, in an 8-inch square pan. Drizzle with water. Cover with foil. Bake for 30 minutes. Combine honey and remaining ingredients. Turn onions over. Brush half of honey mixture over onions
ingredients: baby onions, unsalted butter, sugar, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme leaves
name: balsamic glazed baby onions

steps: In a large bowl, combine cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, pickling salt, boiling water, sauerkraut, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt, pickling salt,
ingredients: head of cabbage, white vinegar, sugar, pickling salt, boiling water
name: sauerkraut

steps: Fry bacon in skillet. Set bacon aside. Reserve two tbs bacon drippings, turn heat down,. Drain bacon drippings, add to skillet along with the green pepper. Allow to cook until pepper is tender, about 5 minutes on med heat. Beat eggs and pour over panama mixture in skillet. Stir until eggs are just set. Crumble bacon and add to mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top.
ingredients: butter, onion, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, eggs
name: panama scramble

steps: Combine all ingredients except steak in a 13x9x2 inch glass baking dish. Add steak and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least two hours, turning occasionally. Preheat grill or broiler to medium high heat. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on a platter and serve.
ingredients: top round steaks, garlic cloves, limes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, onion, fresh parsley
name: cuban pan fried steak bistec de palomilla

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. If frozen, partially thaw fillets and cut into serving size pieces. Place in a greased baking dish. Combine sour cream or yogurt, mustard, onion, dill, and mayonnaise. Season with salt and pepper. Spread mixture over fish. Bake 20 minutes per inch of thickness of fish if frozen or 10-12 minutes if thawed. When just done, sprinkle with the cheeses and a dash of paprika. Broil 1 minute or until the cheese is bubbly and flecked with brown. Serve with lemon wedges.
ingredients: salmon fillets, crabmeat, shrimp, fat free cream cheese, mayonnaise, dill weed, onion, salt and pepper
name: salmon fillet with shrimp and crab stuffing

steps: Mix together cola, fresh ginger, brown sugar, lemons, lemon juice, lemon balm leaves, sugar, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves, lemon balm leaves
ingredients: cola, fresh ginger, brown sugar, lemons
name: warm ginger cola

steps: Put all ingredients in a stand mixer with a wire whip attachment and whip until butter is lighter in color and the volume has increased. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator. Or, dish it out on parchment paper and roll into a log. Wrap in plastic wrap and foil and it can be frozen for months. Best part is you can just unwrap and slice off what you need and rewrap it and stick it back in the freezer.
ingredients: pumpkin, honey, molasses, lemon juice, cinnamon
name: harvest pumpkin butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Bake for 15 minutes in 400 degree oven. Then pour mixture of beaten eggs and heavy cream over top. Bake for 30 minutes longer in 400 degree oven.
ingredients: vanilla yogurt, cinnamon, honey, peach
name: peaches with cinnamon cream

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh parsley, oregano leaves, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, ciabatta, unsalted butter
name: garlic ciabatta bread ina garten barefoot contessa back to basi

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. In a small bowl, combine almonds, breadcrumbs, walnuts, fresh apricots, granulated sugar, egg yolks, vanilla extract, unbaked 9-inch pie crustpreparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a small bowl, combine almonds
ingredients: sugar, ground allspice, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, pinto beans, egg, egg yolks, vanilla extract, unbaked 9-inch pie crust
name: pinto bean pie

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Cut off wedges, halve lengthwise, seeded and sliced into 1 inch half moons. In a small saucepan, combine maple syrup and sage, bring to simmer, reduce heat to low, cover and cook 15 minutes, set aside, covered. In a bowl, toss wedges with olive oil and salt. Transfer to a a foil lined baking sheet in a single layer, bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Pour maple syrup mixture evenly on top of wedges, halve lengthwise, seeded and sliced into 1 inch half moons. Transfer to a a a foil lined baking sheet in a single layer, bake at 400 for 20 minutes. Pour
ingredients: delicata squash, nonstick cooking spray, brown sugar substitute, cinnamon, salt, chili powder, cayenne, ketchup
name: roasted delicata squash wedges

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar until thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean.
ingredients: turnips, egg, soda cracker, evaporated milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, allspice
name: turnip custard crock pot

steps: Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until combined well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, flour, cider vinegar, vanilla, unbaked pie shells
name: jarrett house vinegar pie

steps: Spray a bundt pan or an angel food cake pan with nonstick cooking spray. Place the rolls in the pan, sprinkle the whole package of butterscotch pudding mix over the rolls, sprinkle the brown sugar over the pudding mix, pour the butter over the brown sugar, and top with the pecans. Cover and place in the refrigerator overnight, or let rise for 4-5 hours before baking. Preheat oven to 350. Bake the rolls for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: frozen dough rolls, butterscotch pudding mix, cinnamon, brown sugar, butter, milk, nuts, cherries
name: caramel buns

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container.
ingredients: rolled oats, raisins, coconut, honey, butter, cinnamon, vanilla, salt
name: honey granola

steps: In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towels then crumble. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper the, brown in the bacon drippings for about 5 minutes on each side. Place the breasts in a 4-6-quart slow cooker. Sprinkle with mushrooms. In the same skillet heat the soup and parmesan cheese with onions and garlic for 5 minutes until bubbly, then pour over the chicken and mushrooms. Cover and cook on low setting for about 4 hours. After about 4 hours sprinkle with the cheese cubes and bacon. Cover and cook on high for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
ingredients: hash browns, bacon, onion, bell pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper
name: crock pot breakfast casserole

steps: In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden.
ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheese, corn flakes, butter
name: cornflake potatoes

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in pork ribs, garlic, onion, tamarind soup mix, water, bok choy, daikon radish, tomatoes, potatoes, saltpreparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Stir in pork ribs, garlic, onion, tamarind soup mix, water, bok choy, daikon radish, tomatoes, potatoes, saltpreparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency
ingredients: pork ribs, garlic, onion, tamarind soup mix, water, bok choy, daikon radish, tomatoes, potatoes, salt
name: filipino sinigang tamarind soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add the brown sugar, cinnamon and pecans and mix well. Cook until the sugar is dissolved. Add the sweet potatoes and stir until it is well blended and the sweet potatoes blends inches. Once it is well blended, add the pecans and stir. Pour this mixture over the potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, ground cinnamon, orange juice, eggs, salt, southern comfort, pecans, brown sugar
name: southern comfort sweet potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 13 x 9 baking dish. Spread pineapple with juice evenly in dish. Spread cherry pie filling over pineapple. Sprinkle dry cake mix over cherries, then spread pecans over cake mix. Bake for 50 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, crushed pineapple, flaked coconut, vanilla, unbaked pie shells
name: pineapple coconut pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: shrimp, garlic cloves, olive oil, diced tomato, feta cheese, lemon, juice of, fresh dill, salt, pepper
name: greek scampi

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook
ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic cloves, thai chiles, fresh ginger, ground pork, fish sauce, green onion, cilantro, yellow onion
name: ginger ground pork

steps: Place the roast on the roast. Put the worchester or 57 sauce on the roast. Open the condensed soups and add them over the top of the roast. You can use an extra can of the soup for more gravy for putting over rice or potatoes. Slow cook for 8-10 hours. Serve with yellow rice or whole grain rice and i promise it will be a feast for your family with almost no effort. It tastes much better and is much less expensive than going out to eat after church or work.
ingredients: chuck roast, vegetable oil, onion soup mix, cream of mushroom soup, water
name: pressure cooker pot roast with mushroom gravy easy

steps: Whip egg whites until frothy. Add cream of tarter and salt. Whip until stiff and dry. Fold in chocolate chips, crushed candy canes, nuts, and vanilla. Drop by spoonfuls onto heavy brown paper. Bake at 300 degrees until the meringue sets. Cool. Remove from brown paper.
ingredients: semisweet baking chocolate, canola oil, cocoa powder, egg whites, brown sugar
name: chocolate meringue fudge cups

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add asparagus and cook, stirring, until just
ingredients: asparagus, chicken broth, butter, cashews
name: asparagus with cashew butter

steps: Let butter soften to room temperature. Beat in other ingredients. Pack butter into molds or crocks or form balls with a melon baller. Chill for at least 3 hours before serving. Can be stored for upto 1 month in the refrigerator or 3 months in the freezer.
ingredients: butter, garlic, oregano, dill, cayenne pepper
name: greek butter

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add mushrooms, and season with salt, if desired. Saute mushrooms 10 minutes or until beginning to brown. Add garlic and saute 2 minutes more. Sir in white wine and simmer until vinegar is almost evaporated, stirring to scrape up browned bits from pan. Drain wheat berries and add to mushroom mixture with vegetable broth and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 20 minutes. Add kale, and cook 10-20 minutes more, or until kale is tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
ingredients: garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, vegetable stock, salt, cayenne, pasta, dry sherry
name: sherry laced garlic soup with pasta stars

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, instant minced garlic, basmati rice, chicken broth, green onion, dried thyme
name: herbed basmati pilaf

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffin cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done.
ingredients: macaroni, ham, egg yolks, cheese, sour cream, salt and pepper
name: buried ham

steps: Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add chickpeas, onion, long-grain rice, water, saffron, olive oil, tomato puree, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in chickpeas, onion, long-grain rice, water, saffron, olive oil, tomato puree, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper. Cover, reduce heat and
ingredients: chickpeas, onion, long-grain rice, water, saffron, olive oil, tomato puree, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper
name: revithopilafo chickpea pilaf

steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, add the collard greens and saute until wilted but still retain their bright colour, about 3-4 minutes. Add the vinegar, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt and black pepper to taste and toss well. Transfer to a warmed serving bowl and serve immediately.
ingredients: collard greens, sugar, salt, onion, red pepper flakes, garlic powder, vinegar, liquid smoke, ham hock, water
name: southern style collard greens

steps: Wash the spinach well and cut as finely as possible. Clean onions and cut into fine strips. Put onions into a saucepan with the oil and cook til softened. Add dill and cook a bit longer. Add the spinach, salt and pepper, add 3 c water and the rice. Cover the saucepan and allow to boil. Just before spinach is fully cooked, add in 3 more cups water and the rice. Just
ingredients: onion, spinach, olive oil, rice, tomato paste, water, chicken stock cube, salt & pepper
name: spanakorizo

steps: Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: whole kernel corn, butter, chicken bouillon, sugar, salt
name: corn my way

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut plum amarettinis into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of plum amarettini. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: plums, amarettinis, flour, baking powder, eggs, yoghurt, sugar, oil
name: plum amarettini muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, bread, boursin cheese, butter, kosher salt
name: my favorite open faced tomato sandwich

steps: Heat broth, soy ginger glaze, pickled ginger, sesame seeds, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger, pickled ginger
ingredients: cooked sushi rice, soy ginger glaze, pickled ginger, sesame seeds
name: ginger rice balls

steps: Combine ground beef, onion, garlic, saltines, and garlic together and form into 2 loaves. Bake covered at 350 degress fahrenheit in stoneware for 45 to 75 minutes. Drain grease. For the sauce, combine tomato sauce, brown sugar, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Pour sauce over loaves. Cover meatloaf and cook 15 minutes. Remove cover and cook 10 to 15 minutes. To freeze, just freeze the meat mixture in meal size portions. Thaw it in the refrigerator for a day before cooking. You could make and freeze the sauce too, but i usually mix it up when i cook the meat.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, salt, pepper
name: seasoned ground beef oamc

steps: Sprinkle olive oil, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic, onion, garlic
ingredients: vegetable stock, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, button mushroom, tomato paste, tomato sauce, basil leaves
name: mushroom tapenade

steps: Heat grill to high. Melt butter in a frying pan and fry mushrooms until tender. Add garlic and thyme and cook for another minute. Toast the bread, top with the mushrooms and then the cheese. Grill until cheese is brown and bubbly.
ingredients: fresh white mushrooms, butter, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, dried parsley flakes, italian style breadcrumbs
name: sauteed breaded mushrooms

steps: Mix together peanut butter, honey, mayonnaise, bananas, lemon juice, lettuce, peanuts. In a separate bowl, mix peanut butter, honey, mayonnaise, bananas, lemon juice, lettuce, peanuts. Spread the peanut butter over the top of the salad. Spread the peanut
ingredients: peanut butter, honey, mayonnaise, bananas, lemon juice, lettuce, peanuts
name: banana nut salad

steps: In a two-quart bowl, mix the first 4 ingredients together. Fold the beaten egg whites in until all are well mixed. Pour into unbaked pie shell of 9inch pan. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. When taken from oven, filling will seem a little shaky, but when cooled, will be creamy. Prep time does not include making pie crust.
ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, cocoa, salt, milk, egg yolks, butter, pie crusts
name: mom s most requested chocolate pie

steps: Preheat waffle iron and coat with cooking spray. Cook waffles in waffle iron.
ingredients: eggs, orange juice, vanilla, milk, flour, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, salt
name: healthy waffles

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Saute spinach in skillet over medium heat in oil until softened, about 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and chiles, let cook 2 minutes. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and stir in spinach, cheese, cream cheese, half and half, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into shallow baking dish like a 9 inch quiche dish or pie plate. Bake in the preheated oven until the dip is bubbly and the top is light brown, about 35 minutes.
ingredients: butter, onion, artichoke hearts, frozen chopped spinach, cream cheese, sour cream, tabasco sauce, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: spicy spinach artichoke dip

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. For sauce combine soup, mayo, lemon juice and curry powder in a bowl. In bottom of 13x9x2-inch baking dish layer frozen broccoli, chicken, and sauce. Sprinkle with grated cheese and breadcrumbs. Bake for 30 minutes. Can be eaten plain or on top of rice.
ingredients: frozen broccoli, chicken breasts, chicken stock, rice flour, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder, cheddar cheese
name: broccoli chicken dish gluten free

steps: Place potatoes and garlic in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil then cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Drain well, then return potatoes to the pot. Add the butter, milk and salt and mash well. Stir in parmesan cheese.
ingredients: red potatoes, garlic, butter, half-and-half cream, white sugar, steak seasoning, garlic powder
name: red garlic mashed potatoes

steps: Mix seasonings in small bowl. Coat pork skins evenly with the rub. Refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 3 hours for extra flavor. Grill over medium heat 25 to 30 minutes or until desired doneness, turning occasionally. Let pork stand 5 minutes before cutting into thin slices. Test kitchen.
ingredients: pork skins, water, oregano, salt, lime
name: dominican style chicharron fried pork skins

steps: In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from the freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, sugar, water, lime juice, orange juice, lemon juice, ginger ale, frozen raspberries
name: raspberry float punch

steps: Combine butter, cream cheese, caraway seed, pickled capers, dijon mustard, paprika, anchovy fillet. Bake at 425 for 7 to 10 minutes or until spread has melted and is a light golden brown. To serve, slice diagonally.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, caraway seed, pickled capers, dijon mustard, paprika, anchovy fillet
name: liptauer cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place pizza crust on pizza stone or baking sheet, sprinkle with cheese and thyme. Top this with onion mixture, then mushrooms. Cook for about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: red onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, pita bread rounds, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh basil leaf
name: caramelized onion pizza

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and mash. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute tomatoes, onion, chile sauce, green onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Stir in potatoes and cook until heated through. Spoon potato mixture into a 2 quart casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Serve when the cheese has melted.
ingredients: salsa con queso, butter, sour cream, onions, frozen hash browns, mexican cheese
name: mexican style cheesy potatoes

steps: In a bowl, combine chicken broth, cornstarch, mustard and dill weed. Mix well and set aside. Heat butter in large skillet. Saute chicken and onion until lightly browned. Slowly add chicken broth to chicken, stirring constantly over medium heat, bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and cook until slightly thickened. Pour chicken mixture over hot cooked noodles and toss, serve.
ingredients: boneless veal steaks, pork steak, egg, milk, cracker crumbs
name: cheyenne chicken

steps: Preheat the oven to 375f heat the vegetable oil in a small ovenproof frying pan. Fry the chicken wings for 2-3 minutes on each side, until golden. Remove the pan from the heat and add the soy sauce, water and honey. Transfer to the oven and cook for 10-12 minutes, turning the chicken wings once. Arrange the chicken wings on a warmed platter, scatter over the sesame seeds and serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, gin, ground ginger, chicken wings
name: my kids favorite wings

steps: Heat oil in a large cast-iron skillet over medium heat. Add pepper-and-onion mixture and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Add thinly sliced beef and cook with the pepper mix another 5 minutes set aside and keep warm. For cheese sauce, melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add flour, whisking constantly until bubbly, about 1 minute. Slowly whisk in milk until thickened, about 3 minutes. Stir in black pepper, cheese, chipotle peppers, and adobo sauce. Divide steaks and pepper-and-onion mixture among 4 baguette slices. Top with cheese sauce and remaining 4 bread slices.
ingredients: white bread, pureed chipotle chiles, cheese, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro leaf, butter
name: grilled cheese chipotle sandwich

steps: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and salt, blending well. Slowly add milk, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture boils and thickens. Set aside press tomatoes through a sieve or blend until smooth. In a soup pot, combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 10 minutes. Pour white sauce into soup, stirring constantly. Heat thoroughly before serving.
ingredients: crushed tomatoes, crushed red pepper flakes, seasoning salt, chicken broth, sugar, whipping cream, butter, fresh ground black pepper, crouton
name: easy creamy tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In large mixing bowl, combine flour, white sugar, baking soda, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, brown sugar, nuts, vanilla, evaporated milk, butter. Mix well. Pour mixture into an ungreased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and chopped nuts over cake batter. Bake for 30 minutes. Ten minutes before cake is done, start making the frosting. Combine all frosting ingredients in a medium size sauce pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat slightly and let boil for 5 minutes. Pour frosting on cake as soon as it comes out of the oven. Serve cake cool or warm. Top with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: brown sugar, syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, fresh pineapple, butter
name: pineapple foster

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: water, salt, flour, mixed herbs, olive oil, sugar, instant yeast, kosher salt
name: herbed focaccia bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange apple slices in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f.
ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, stilton cheese, applesauce
name: pork chop melts

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 375. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, salt, canola oil, ice water
name: whole wheat canola oil pastry

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. Serves 6.
ingredients: shallots, balsamic vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, low sodium chicken broth, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, flat-leaf italian parsley
name: balsamic spritzer

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In bowl, combine apples, orange juice, white sugar, butter, cornstarch, brown sugar, cinnamon, pecans. Blend well and spread in the bottom of a ungreased 8 or 9 inch round cake pan. Separate dough into 4 rectangles, firmly press perforations to seal. In small bowl combine sugar and cinnamon, sprinkle mixture evenly over rectangles. Sprinkle 1 t of pecans on each rectangle. Starting at shorter side, roll up each rectangle and pinch edges to seal. Cut each roll into 4 slices. Place cut side down, over brown sugar mixture in pan. Bake at 375f for 20 to 27 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan for 1 minute, invert onto serving platter or foil.
ingredients: crescent rolls, apples, orange juice, white sugar, butter, cornstarch, brown sugar, cinnamon
name: apple crescents

steps: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in saut pan. Saut apple slices until just turning soft. Beat together eggs, cream or milk, and salt & pepper until blended but not frothy. Melt remaining butter in omelet pan over high heat until foam begins to recede but before beginning to color. Pour in egg mixture and prepare omelet, stirring lightly, but allowing it to set on the bottom. Fill with sauted apples and brie. Fold or roll and slide out of pan onto a heated plate.
ingredients: prepared tart shells, butter, sweet red pepper, brie cheese, bacon, eggs, whipping cream, cayenne pepper, salt
name: brie and pepper tarts

steps: Mix all ingredients for the base and put into greased 8x8 pan. Spread ice cream squares over base. Mix the topping together well and spread over ice cream squares. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: cinnamon graham crackers, margarine, vanilla ice cream, frozen lemonade concentrate, cool whip, fresh strawberries
name: lemonade ice cream squares

steps: In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the grapes, cream cheese, blue grapes, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, toothpick, and salt and pepper to taste. Add the plums to a serving platter. Sprinkle with the croutons and serve hot.
ingredients: italian plums, cream cheese, blue grapes, sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, toothpick
name: healthy sweet penguins grapes and italian plums

steps: Heat oil in a wok until very hot. Stir fry celery ribs for 2 to 3 minutes. Add broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots and saut on medium heat adding cup of water can help steam the vegetables. Cover pan for about 2 minutes. Cover for 1 to 2 minutes. Then uncover and saut until done ideally 1 more minute to keep veggies crisp. Salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: canola oil, broccoli florets, celery ribs, mushrooms, garlic cloves, tamari soy sauce, ground ginger, chicken broth, cornstarch, black pepper
name: veggie stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy.
ingredients: broad beans, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, gnocchi, basil, parmesan cheese
name: gnocchi with broad beans and tomato

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir in vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. Cook
ingredients: corn flakes, quick-cooking oats, all-purpose flour, dried apple, eggs, honey, peanut butter, butter
name: peanut butter breakfast bars

steps: Place noodles, chicken broth, onion, soy sauce, bok choy, corned beef, oil in slow cooker. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove noodles, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chicken broth, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chicken broth
ingredients: noodles, chicken broth, onion, soy sauce, bok choy, corned beef, oil
name: sapa sui samoan chop sui

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine flour, cheese, sugar, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, milk, canola oil, egg, self-rising flour, shredded cheddar cheese, margarine. In a medium bowl, add milk, oil, and egg, mixing well. Stir into wet bowl into dry bowl, until moistened. Pour into a greased 9x5-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 f for 50 to 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted near centre comes out clean. When you remove from oven, spread margarine over top with paper towel. Cool for 10 minutes in pan. Remove to wire rack and cool for 10 more minutes, then enjoy.
ingredients: french bread, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, salt, garlic powder, fresh coarse ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes
name: peppy garlic bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Saute onion in skillet over medium heat in oil until softened, about 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and chiles, let cook 2 minutes. Transfer the mixture to a large bowl and stir in spinach, cheese, cream cheese, half and half, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into shallow baking dish like a 9 inch quiche dish or pie plate. Bake in the preheated oven until the dip is bubbly and the top is light brown, about 35 minutes.
ingredients: fresh chili peppers, vegetable oil, red onion, monterey jack cheese, creme fraiche, double cream, tomatoes, tortilla chips
name: mexican chilli and cheese dip

steps: Combine all gravy ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: ground beef, egg, soft breadcrumbs, beefy mushroom soup
name: beef patties with beefy mushroom gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: butter, garlic, frozen corn, creole seasoning, salt, italian parsley
name: cajun corn

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. Serves 6.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, new potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parsley
name: portuguese fried potatoes batatas a portuguesa

steps: In a 3 quart saucepan, melt butter and saute onions. Add potatoes, water, and bouillon cubes. Cover and bring to a boil then reduce heat to medium. Cook just until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place frozen broccoli and cheddar cheese in crock pot on low to start melting and thawing. Once the potatoes are done, using a hand blender, blend contents of saucepan to desired consistency and then pour into the crock pot. Heat on low until warmed.
ingredients: butter, onion, garlic cloves, milk, yukon gold potato, cauliflower, salt, red pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, blue cheese
name: two cheese potato cauliflower soup

steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook pasta in boiling water until just al dente. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet. Cook until fragrant. Add remaining ingredients except pasta. Simmer about 10 minutes. Drain pasta. Add to sauce and cook, stirring, about 2 minutes. Season with salt and serve.
ingredients: bacon, garlic cloves, onion, extra virgin olive oil, diced tomatoes, salt, black pepper, bucatini pasta, parmigiano
name: bucatini amatriciana alla romana

steps: Heat oil at medium-high in large skillet. Add pork chops and cook until browned. Set aside.
ingredients: pork chops, flour, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, cloves, sour cream, water, balsamic vinegar, dark brown sugar, bay leaves
name: sweet n sour pork chop bake

steps: Heat the oil in a pan and add the turnips. Add the turnips to the pan with the garlic. Cover the pan and cook over low heat till the turnips are tender
ingredients: turnips, long grain rice, ground lamb, onions, split peas, turmeric, of fresh mint, cooking oil, salt, black pepper
name: aash e shalgham

steps: Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberrypreparation:Mix
ingredients: cream cheese, dream whip, milk, vanilla, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, hot water, cold water, strawberry
name: judy s strawberry dessert

steps: Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place apples in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired.
ingredients: apples, heavy whipping cream, kahlua, brown sugar, golden raisin, pecan pieces
name: apples with kahlua dip

steps: Preheat over 450 degrees. Place asparagus in a roasting pan. Drizzle iwth olive oil. Sprinkle evenly with salt and pepper. Bake for 8 minutes or until tender-crisp. In the meantime, melt butter and minced garlic in a small skillet over medium-high heat. Cook 3 minutes or until lightly browned and foamy, shaking pan occasionally. Do not burn. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice. Drizzle butter mixture over roasted asparagus, toss well to coat. Srinkle lemon zest over asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus spears, butter, lemon, nutmeg, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: asparagus with nutmeg butter

steps: Preheat oven to 280f. In large baking dish place down 2 long pieces aluminum foil, criss cross. Put meat on foil pour bbq sauce on top drizzle honey over it. Sprinkle with garlic. Place onions all over. Salt and pepper it. Wrap up foil and seal it well. Cook for about 6 hours.
ingredients: beef short ribs, onion, barbecue sauce, honey, flour, yellow mustard
name: slow cooker bbq short ribs

steps: Place salmon skin side down on grill for 15-20 minutes. You may also broil salmon or chicken for 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: hollandaise sauce mix, olive oil, dried rosemary, lemon peel, seasoning salt, salmon fillets, fresh basil leaf, lemon
name: grilled salmon with basil and hollandaise sauce

steps: Place meat, onions, potatoes, carrots, onion, beef stew meat, beef stock, butter, parsley, carrotspreparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a little oil in frying pan and brown stew meat along with onions and carrots. Remove from pan. Layer sliced potatoes, onion, carrot and meat in a 3 pint casserole, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock. Brush the potatoes with 1 tbsp melted butter. Cover and bake for 1 hour. Remove the hot pot from the oven. Uncover and brush the potatoes again with melted butter or dripping. Return to the oven for a further 30 minutes, uncovered, to brown the potatoes. Serve garnished with parsley.
ingredients: beef, beef broth, carrot, rutabaga, potatoes, onion, salt, pepper
name: norwegian beef stew lapskaus

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the beef until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the beef onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: lean hamburger, onions, diced tomato, taco seasoning, water, ramen noodles, mexican blend cheese, tortilla chips, sour cream, salsa
name: ramen taco bowls

steps: In a small bowl, mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add in the eggs, buttermilk, melted butter, yogurt and vanilla and mix until smooth. Spray griddle with pam or use a slab of butter for each pancake and heat over medium heat. Pour approximately cup of batter onto a preheated griddle. Cook for 8-10 minutes or the top is nice and bubbly. Turn and brown the other side. Serve with warm maple syrup.
ingredients: pancake mix, milk, egg, vegetable oil, oreo cookies, bananas, fresh strawberries, vanilla frozen yogurt, strawberry syrup
name: cookie pancakes

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, orange juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: rhubarb, sugar, orange zest, orange juice, jalapeno pepper, shallots, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt and pepper, fresh lemon juice, olive oil
name: grilled chicken with rhubarb relish

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: green beans, diced tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
name: quick italian green beans

steps: Place hamburgers in crock pot. Pour sauce over hamburgers. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat is cooked and tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, ketchup, salt, egg, seasoned bread crumbs, barbecue sauce
name: crock pot barbecued hamburgers

steps: Place a heavy, deep skillet over medium-high heat. After a few minutes, add the oil. Wait a minute or so and add the green beans. Turn the heat to high and stir-fry for about 5 minutes, or until the beans are well seared. Add the garlic, salt and red pepper, if using. Stir-fry for several more minutes, then remove from heat.
ingredients: light olive oil, toasted sesame oil, scallions, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, szechwan pepper
name: five flavor oil

steps: In a 12 inch skillet, heat oil over medium high heat and brown chicken. Drain. Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms and garlic combined with onion soup mix. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve over hot noodles and sprinkle, if desired, with chopped fresh parsley.
ingredients: lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, olive oil, water, lime juice, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast, assorted fresh vegetables, cooked rice
name: santa fe stir fry

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, white onions, dried oregano, ground cumin, lemon-pepper seasoning, salsa, garlic clove, sharp cheddar cheese, black olives, olive oil
name: i found my salsa chicken recipe

steps: Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: farfalle pasta, fresh green beans, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, tomatoes, garlic clove, chives, fresh basil, feta cheese, salt and pepper
name: fresh tomato garden pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Stir in the mushrooms and onion, and cook until tender. Sprinkle with the flour. Reduce heat to low, and continue cooking 5 minutes. Mix in sour cream and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper transfer to a small casserole dish, and top with parmesan cheese. Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.
ingredients: butter, fresh mushrooms, shallot, garlic cloves, dry white wine, pine nuts, sour cream, salt and pepper
name: savory mushroom spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes.
ingredients: hot dog, pork and beans, onion, ketchup, brown sugar, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cheddar cheese
name: beans n wiener biscuit casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place the beaten eggs in a small bowl. Dredge the pork chops lightly in flour, dip in the egg, and coat liberally with bread crumbs. Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the pork chops 5 minutes per side, or until the breading appears well browned. Transfer the chops to a 9 x 13 baking dish, and cover with foil. Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour. While baking, combine the cream of mushroom soup, milk and white wine in a medium bowl. After the pork chops have baked for an hour, cover them with the soup mixture. Replace foil, and bake for another 30 minutes.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, italian dressing, breadcrumbs, boneless pork loin chops, vegetable oil
name: italian pork chops

steps: Heat oven to 400. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. Pour over cooked asparagus.
ingredients: asparagus, watercress, light sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: asparagus with watercress sauce

steps: Place the rice in a bowl with the milk and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth or fine mesh sieve. Stir in the sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and peel. Chill in the refrigerator and serve.
ingredients: long-grain white rice, water, milk, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, white sugar
name: lola s horchata

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Pour the marmalade over the bananas. Bake for 20 minutes.
ingredients: bananas, lemon juice, milk, sugar, powdered milk, cream, almonds
name: banana frappe

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: olive oil, italian sausage, green pepper, red pepper, potatoes, onion soup mix, water
name: sausage peppers and potatoes
