steps: In a large wok, heat oil with red pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Stir in green beans. Cook, stirring frequently, for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger. Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, and then stir in black bean sauce. Cover and continue cooking until green beans are tender, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, red onion, fennel bulb, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, escarole, garbanzo beans, salt, lemon
name: garbanzo beans with escarole and fennel

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. In 2-quart casserole dish, combine soup, milk, chives, mustard, and hot pepper sauce. Stir in macaroni and cheese. Sprinkle with bread crumbs. Bake 25 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, ham, gouda cheese, heavy cream, breadcrumbs, butter
name: dutch style macaroni

steps: Place chicken pieces in slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 5 hours. Add chopped onion and cook on low for 1 hour. Add chopped apricot jam and continue to cook on low for 1 hour. Add chopped onion and continue to cook on low for 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, onion soup mix, apricot jam, chili sauce, cooked brown rice
name: dump and do chicken 3

steps: Cream butter and sugar, then add to creamed mixture alternately with apple mixture. Fold in applesauce and walnuts. Pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan and bake at 350 for 60 to 70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, applesauce, baking powder, egg, baking soda, walnuts
name: 4 h applesauce nut bread

steps: In a heavy saucepan, gently saute the onions in the butter until soft and translucent. Add milk and bring to a simmer. Stir in cheddar cheese until melted and smooth. Whisk together cornstarch and whiskey until smooth. While constantly stirring, slowly pour whiskey mixture into cheese mixture and continue to cook until thickened. Pour cheddar whiskey fondue into a fondue pot or heat-proof bowl. Serve with rye or onion bread cubes as dippers.
ingredients: beer, swiss cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, flour, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, mustard powder, pepper
name: melting pot swiss cheddar fondue

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: cooked chicken, chicken, hard-boiled eggs, butter, tabasco sauce, celery
name: buffalo chicken deviled eggs aka buffalo horns

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Spread into a 9x9 baking dish. Top with reserved parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake until bubbly and lightly browned on top approximately 30 minutes.
ingredients: round sourdough loaf, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, artichoke hearts packed in oil, garlic cloves
name: artichoke dip that s always in demand

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x9 pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: sugar, oil, vanilla extract, chocolate syrup, flour
name: easy bake oven brownies

steps: Preheat oven to 180deg c. Beat egg whites and sugar together for 1 minute. Stir baking soda into apple sauce and then add to bowl. Gently fold in flour, rind and choc chips alternately with orange juice. Pour into prepared loaf tin. Bake 30- 35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: eggs, superfine sugar, vegetable oil, sour cream, orange juice, all-purpose flour, baking powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, orange, zest of
name: marbled chocolate orange cake

steps: Heat oil in saucepan. Stir in garlic and seasoning and saute for 3 minutes. Stir in greens. Cover and cook until wilted. Remove cover and stir in beans. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken broth for juice and most importantly, flavor.
ingredients: onion, unsalted butter, whole wheat flour, milk, vegetable stock cube, haricot beans, fresh parsley, sour cream
name: haricot green bean soup

steps: Combine olive oil, vinegar, orange juice, sugar, salt and pepper. Set aside. In a small bowl, lightly toss segmented avocado, red leaf lettuce, and pineapple chunks. Pour vinegar dressing over all. Enjoy.
ingredients: olive oil, vinegar, orange juice, sugar, salt and pepper, iceberg lettuce, pineapple chunks, red onion, avocado, lime
name: avocado and pineapple salad ensalada de aguacate y pina

steps: Preheat oven to 180c and grease an oven proof dish. Bring the cream to the boil, add the stock cube and stir to dissolve. Add salt, pepper and chives. Blend in half the grated jarlsberg until it melts and the sauce is smooth. Layer all the vegetables in the dish and pour in the sauce. Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top. Bake in mid oven for 30 - 45 minutes.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, butter, yellow onion, red pepper flakes, fresh thyme, sour cream, shredded cheddar cheese
name: spaghetti squash au gratin

steps: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat until hot. Cook chicken and cheese tortellini until tender. Stir in broth and tomatoes and bring to a boil. Add tortellini and simmer 9-10 minutes until tortellini are tender. Stir in basil and pepper and simmer 1 minute. Serve sprinkled with cheese.
ingredients: low-sodium tomato juice, low sodium chicken broth, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheese-filled tortellini, fat-free cheddar cheese, ground basil, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano
name: chicken and cheese tortellini tomato basil soup

steps: In a large bowl, mix all brine ingredients thoroughly. In a large, deep pan combine whole salmon fillets with the brine mixture to soak over night, keeping refrigerated. Rinse thoroughly after brining. Pat dry with a paper towel and allow to air dry for at least one hour prior to smoking. Lay salmon fillets on smoker rack skin side down. Cook in smoker at 165f for 3-5 hours. Cooking time will depend on the thickness of your fillets.
ingredients: salmon fillets, green pepper, yellow pepper, olive oil, capers, cherry tomatoes, linguine, parmesan cheese, salt
name: smoked salmon and capers over linguini

steps: Mix all ingredients in blender until smooth. Pour mixture over the avocado halves and serve immediately.
ingredients: unflavored gelatin, chicken broth, red wine vinegar, onion, lime juice, avocados, salt, hot sauce, mayonnaise, heavy cream
name: avocado mousse

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: heavy cream, superfine sugar, lemons, juice of, lemon, zest of, powdered sugar
name: no bake lemon brulee

steps: Rinse and scrub mussels under cold water. Using your fingers or paring knife, remove beards, and discard. In a large stockpot set over medium heat, combine wine, shallots, garlic, and salt. Simmer 5 minutes. Add mussels, cover, and increase heat to high. Cook until all mussels are open, about 5 minutes. Stir in herbs and butter. Remove from heat. Divide mussels and broth among four bowls. Serve immediately.
ingredients: fresh mussels, garlic, butter, tomatoes, dry white wine, heavy cream, parsley, lemon, salt & pepper
name: mussels with garlic white wine

steps: In a large skillet, cook bacon, cornmeal, milk, salt and pepper, green tomatoes, mayonnaise, chili sauce, bread, lettuce leaf. Add greens, seasoned salt, and remining ingredients. Cook over medium heat 35 to 45 minutes or until tender.
ingredients: bacon, flour, cornmeal, milk, salt and pepper, green tomatoes, mayonnaise, chili sauce, bread, lettuce leaf
name: the whistle stop cafe s blfgt sammy sandwiches

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack.
ingredients: mashed banana, egg, milk, martha white wild berry muffin mix
name: berry banana bread

steps: Place chicken in a large zip-top plastic bag. In a bowl, whisk together lime juice and zest, oil, oregano, garlic, jalapeno pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Pour marinade into plastic bag over chicken and lay flat in a shallow dish. Refrigerate for at least 90 minutes or up to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken until browned and internal temperature reaches 165 degrees f.
ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano leaves, dried thyme leaves, salt, fresh ground pepper
name: grilled oregano chicken kotopoulo riganato tes skaras

steps: Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Meanwhile, cut the mozzarella into small cubes and quarter the cherry tomatoes. When the pasta is cooked, drain it and rinse it in cold water until the pasta is cold. Drain it again. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil, parmesan cheese, walnut pieces, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, farfalle pasta, cherry tomatoes, pitted black olivespreparation:Cook the pasta according to the directions on the package. Mix the pesto sauce, olive oil, parmesan cheese, walnut pieces, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, extra virgin olive
ingredients: watercress, parmesan cheese, walnut pieces, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, farfalle pasta, cherry tomatoes, pitted black olives
name: watercress pesto pasta

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix together bacon, olive oil, new potatoes, broccoli, carrots, dried oregano, salt and pepper, water, kielbasaseason with salt and pepper, and serve.
ingredients: lean bacon, olive oil, new potatoes, broccoli, carrots, dried oregano, salt and pepper, water, kielbasa
name: kielbasa skillet supper

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: kosher salt, sugar, water, garlic, salt, cayenne pepper, paprika, olive oil, lemon juice, large shrimp
name: grilled spicy garlic shrimp

steps: Heat oil in a non stick skillet. Add garlic and saute for one minute. Add sliced portobello mushrooms and saute until cooked and reduced, about 10 minutes on medium heat. Add optional red wine or cooking wine, mix well until reduced. Set aside once finished. When burgers are almost ready, top with pan roasted portabello mushroom mixture and a slice of cheese, continue grilling or broiling until cheese is melted.
ingredients: portabella mushrooms, nonstick cooking spray, garlic, salt & pepper
name: pan roasted portabellas

steps: In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: olive oil, salsa, refried black beans, black beans, low sodium chicken broth, sour cream, fresh cilantro
name: too easy black bean soup

steps: Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese.
ingredients: ground beef, cream of chicken soup, salsa, tortilla chips, cheddar cheese
name: tortilla beef casserole

steps: In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread
ingredients: graham cracker pie crusts, apple pie filling, cream cheese, sugar, lemon juice, vanilla, eggs, caramel ice cream topping, pecans
name: washington state caramel apple cheesecake pie

steps: Mix all of the dry ingredients together in a large bowl and whisk to blend, then set aside. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. In another bowl, add the egg yolks, vanilla, oil and milk, whisking slightly to combine. Add the egg yolk mixture to the dry ingredients and beat until well mixed. Fold in the egg whites just until combined. Make waffles according to the machine instructions.
ingredients: eggs, granulated sugar, butter, pure vanilla extract, baking powder, all-purpose flour
name: waffle cones or bowls

steps: In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through.
ingredients: lime juice, italian salad dressing, garlic, fresh basil, fresh thyme, salt, pepper, chicken breasts
name: lime herb chicken

steps: Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar substitute, egg, water, margarinepreparation:Blend flours, baking powder, and sugar substitute in bowl. Mix in egg, water, and melted margarine. Let batter stand for 10 minutes. Melt 1 teaspoon margarine in a 10-in nonstick skillet over medium heat. Drop batter by the tablespoonful onto hot skillet. Allow pancakes to cook until bubbles form around the pancakes. Thin remaining batter with additional water if necessary. Turn pancakes over with a spatula. Continue cooking until pancakes are done. Place on heated dish and continue cooking until all the pancakes have been prepared.
ingredients: buckwheat flour, whole wheat flour, egg, baking powder, water, unsweetened applesauce, vanilla extract
name: buckwheat pancakes south beach phase 2

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place parsnips, oil, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter
ingredients: parsnips, oil, butter, clear honey
name: roast parsnips with honey

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Combine cheese, mayonnaise and bacon in a bowl. Mix well. Spread about 1 tablespoon cheese mixture on each bread slice. Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet for 7 to 9 minutes or until lightly brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: bacon, shredded cheddar cheese, prepared mustard, mayonnaise, bread
name: bacon and cheese party bread

steps: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with water. Cover and bring to a boil. Cook for 20-25 minutes or until very tender. Drain well. Add soymilk, vegan margarine, salt and pepper. Mash until light and fluffy. Add more soymilk and vegan margarine, if needed, to get a creamier texture.
ingredients: potatoes, butter, salt, pepper, sour cream, prepared horseradish
name: mashed potatoes with horseradish

steps: Cook spiked and spicy tomato soup for 5 to 10 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: red onion, jalapeno pepper, cumin, garlic powder, kahlua, grape tomatoes, chicken broth, salt and pepper
name: spiked and spicy tomato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, yellow onions, chicken thighs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, barley, chicken stock, fresh parsley
name: barley chicken and onions

steps: Combine the sugar, butter and milk in large saucepan. Let boil stirring frequently at medium heat until soft ball stage. Add marshmallows, walnuts and vanilla. Stir well. Pour into 9 x 13 pan.
ingredients: sugar, milk, vanilla, butter, mini marshmallows, chocolate stars, chocolate chips, unsweetened chocolate, nuts
name: mackinac fudge

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired.
ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, brown sugar, salt, milk, egg yolks, vanilla, chocolate bars
name: chocolate bar cake filling

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the eggs, sugar, and salt, if used. Stir in 2 cups milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and mixture coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat and add 2 cups milk and extract. Chill several hours or overnight. Whirl in blender before serving. Add rum or brandy as desired, top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg.
ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, milk, whipped cream, nutmeg, alcohol
name: aunt helen s eggnog

steps: In large, resealable plastic bag, or shallow glass container, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag, or cover container, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight, turning occasionally. Drain and discard marinade. Grill, covered, over medium-hot coals for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until meat reaches desired doneness.
ingredients: fresh cilantro, slivered almonds, jalapeno pepper, salt, black pepper, garlic clove, plain yogurt, fresh lime juice, flank steak
name: flank steak with cilantro almond pesto

steps: In a large bowl, combine the marshmallow, instant coconut pudding mix, crushed pineapple, whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, frozen whipped topping, whipped topping,
ingredients: miniature marshmallow, instant coconut pudding mix, crushed pineapple, whipped topping
name: creamy coconut salad

steps: Mix together sugar and shortening. Beat in egg. Sift together dry ingredients, and add to mixture. Beat until well blended. Add in flour, baking powder and salt. Drop in the shape of a ball on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375, for 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, shortening, vanilla, salt, eggs, flour, baking soda, walnuts, gumdrop
name: zion s gumdrop cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars.
ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, granulated sugar, dark brown sugar, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nonstick cooking spray
name: bittersweet beachside brownies

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Holding a beef burger, nest a chunk of beef in the natural curve of the burger then wrap the burger around the burger and pineapple. Place with beef burger seam side down in heated oil, or you can secure with a wooden toothpick if you like. Continue with remaining beef burger, bacon, and pineapple. Cook each for 3 minutes on each side or until bacon is crisp and shrimp are opaque and firm.
ingredients: beef burgers, pineapple slices, bacon, salt, pepper
name: cecil s porky pines

steps: In a tall thin glass, crush or muddle part of the mint with a fork to coat the inside. Add the sugar and lime juice and stir thoroughly. Top with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. Top with soda and stir. Serve in a collins glass, garnished with raspberry and mint sprigs.
ingredients: fresh mint leaves, sugar, lime juice, tangerine juice, white rum, ice cubes, club soda, tangerine
name: tangerine mojito

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Stir together brown sugar, cayenne, and black pepper in a small bowl. Arrange bacon slices in l layer on a large broiler pan and bake in middle of oven for 20 minutes. Turn slices over and sprinkle evenly with spiced sugar. Continue baking until bacon is crisp and brown, 15 to 20 minutes more, then transfer to paper towels to drain.
ingredients: vegetable oil, light brown sugar, cayenne pepper, bacon
name: cayenne candied bacon

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely.
ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, butter, banana, eggs, flour, baking powder, baking soda, walnuts
name: banana cream cheese bread

steps: Preheat a grill for medium-high heat. When the grill is hot, lightly oil the grate. In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, worcestershire sauce, hickory seasoning, salt and pepper until well blended. Make 8 or 10 balls, and flatten into patties. On one half of the patties, distribute the onions, mushrooms, ham and cheese. Carefully cover the piles with the remaining patties, making sure to seal all of the edges of the patties together tightly and enclose the filling. Grill the patties for 8 to 10 minutes per side, or until meat is well done, and cheese in the center is melted.
ingredients: eggs, worcestershire sauce, onion salt, seasoning salt, seasoned pepper, garlic powder, hot sauce, ground chuck, bulk pork sausage
name: bbq seasoned sausage burgers

steps: Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next.
ingredients: cucumbers, carrots, onion, green pepper, canning salt, splenda granular, white vinegar
name: cukes n carrots

steps: Melt butter in a large frying pan. Add chicken and cook until browned, about 10 minutes. Remove from pan and set aside. Add chicken to the pan. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for about 5 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, cream of chicken soup, milk
name: swiss chicken

steps: Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, veggie burgers, chili, tomatoes, coconut milk, long grain rice, beans, salt and pepper
name: lindas rice n beans

steps: In a small saucepan combine sugar, corn syrup, water, and salt. Cook to hardball stage,, stirring only until sugar dissolves. Meanwhile, as temperature of syrup reaches 250 degrees, beat egg white until stiff peaks form. When syrup reaches 260 degrees, very gradually add the syrup to egg whites, beating at high speed with electric mixer. Add vanilla and beat until candy holds its shape, 4-5 minutes. Stir in the chopped nuts or cherries, if desired. Quickly drop candy from a teaspoon onto waxed paper, swirling the top of each piece. Let cool.
ingredients: sugar, vinegar, water, light corn syrup
name: golden syrup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin tins or line with paper cups. Combine bran cereal, oat bran, flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl beat the eggs. Beat in buttermilk, honey and oil. Add to dry ingredients and stir just enough to blend. Fold in prunes. Pour into muffin cups and bake 20 minutes.
ingredients: boiling water, all-bran cereal, white sugar, crisco, eggs, buttermilk, flour, salt, baking soda
name: ice box bran muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour,
ingredients: mashed potatoes, eggs, parmesan cheese, salt, cream of tartar
name: mommom s potato parmesan souffle

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: vinegar, ketchup, honey, worcestershire sauce, salt, ground mustard, paprika, garlic cloves, pepper, short rib of beef
name: saucy short ribs

steps: In a saucepan, combine sugar substitute, butter, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, fat-free liquid egg product, whipping cream, walnuts. Cook and stir over low heat until well thickened. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla, and then pour into 6-8 small custard cups. When cool, place in refrigerator to chill before serving.
ingredients: sugar substitute, butter, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, fat-free liquid egg product, whipping cream, walnuts
name: french silk dessert

steps: Heat oil in a skillet. Add onion, carrot, celery, and red pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until tender. Add broth. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and peas. Cover. Simmer 5 minutes before serving. To save time, replace all the veggies with 3 cups frozen mixed vegetables or frozen broccoli florets and add them when you would have added the peas.
ingredients: beef mince, celery, bacon, white rice, onions, green beans, cabbage, beef stock cube, chicken noodle soup mix, curry powder
name: hi li min

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water in a large bowl. Add 1/2 cup of water to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment. Add 1/4 cup of water to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment. Add 1/4 cup
ingredients: mashed potatoes, rice, peas, shredded cheddar cheese, egg, seasoned bread crumbs, olive oil
name: potato rice balls

steps: Place cucumbers and onion in a large bowl. Combine rest of ingredients in a measuring cup. Stir well. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Chill for 4 hours.
ingredients: garlic cloves, english cucumber, red onion, of fresh mint, plain yogurt, olive oil, salt, pepper, mint sprig
name: minty cucumber

steps: Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through.
ingredients: apple, brown sugar, baking mix, milk, eggs, cheddar cheese, smoked bacon
name: cheesy apple bacon breakfast casserole

steps: In a 4-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain and cool slightly. While potatoes are cooking, combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Add potatoes and toss to coat. Season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper.
ingredients: bacon, low-fat mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, french bread, salt, ground black pepper, canola oil, romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes
name: bacon lettuce and tomato salad

steps: Heat 1 cup of cooking oil hot enough to cook chicken. Cut chicken into 2 inch pieces, season with the creole seasoning and fry in oil until done. Remove the chicken from the oil. In another frying pan, saute onions, celery, bell pepper and garlic until opaque looking and slightly limp. To the vegetable mixture, add your chicken which has slightly cooled. Add tomatoes and water to the mixture, then lower the flame allowing mixture to simmer for one hour, stirring about every 10 minutes. Serve with rice. If you like yours to be a bit thicker, use 2 cans of diced tomatoes and 1 can tomato paste and 1 cup water.
ingredients: frozen yellow beans, frozen green beans, frozen baby carrots, smoked bacon, cider vinegar, sugar, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, tabasco sauce
name: piquant prince edward medley

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, stir together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and sugar. Add the oil, vanilla, milk and chocolate chips and mix together gently. Pour mixture into a lightly oiled 9x13 inch pan and bake for 25-30 minutes. Test with a toothpick for doneness. Let cool 10 minutes before cutting into bars.
ingredients: brewed coffee, prune, ground flax seeds, canola oil, pure vanilla extract, sugar, whole wheat pastry flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt
name: low fat vegan brownie bites

steps: In small saucepan bring milk and cinnamon just to a boil. Stir in couscous. Remove pan from heat. Cover and allow to stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle walnuts over top and serve.
ingredients: instant couscous, nonfat dry milk powder, dried cherries, walnuts, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, water
name: cherry walnut breakfast couscous

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place wax paper on a large baking sheet. Combine dry ingredients in a second bowl. Beat together butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda and salt. Mix into wet ingredients. Stir in crispies, and chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoon full onto greased cookie sheet 1 inch apart. Bake at 350 for 10-12 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: flour, ginger, cinnamon, clove, baking soda, egg whites, vegetable oil, honey, buttermilk, mini chocolate chip
name: honey spice chocolate chip madelines

steps: Melt butter, syrup and brown sugar in a saucepan large enough to mix all the ingredients. Mix in coconut, oats and flour until combined. Spread in seperate shallow pans. Place in low temp oven to roast them until light brown. Meanwhile melt butter over low heat in a 2 qt pan. Add sugar, corn syrup and water. Cook, stirring occasionally to hard crack stage watch close, when it gets to 280, quickly stir in coarse chopped nuts. Spread in ungreased pan. Cool. Spread with melted chocolate chips. Sprinkle with nuts. Flip over onto wax paper. Spread more chocolate and nuts.
ingredients: butter, almonds, light corn syrup, brown sugar, water, crisp rice cereal, ice cream
name: caramel crunch ice cream topping

steps: In separate microwaveable bowls, microwave to melt the two chocolates as directed on the packages. Mix almonds & dried fruits together, putting half of this mixture into the dark chocolate & half of it into the white chocolate. Stir each until well blended. Drop the chocolate mixtures by spoonfuls onto a wax paper-covered baking sheet, alternating the dark & white. Cut through the chocolate mixtures with a knife several times to give a marble effect. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until firm. Break into pieces, about 24, & store in a tightly covered container at room temperature.
ingredients: pine nuts, dried cherries, toffee pieces, chocolate, butter
name: chocolate bark filled with pine nuts and dried cherries

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Spread batter into lightly greased 12 inch pizza pan. Bake at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 minutes until slightly brown. In a skillet brown ground meat. Drain and add seasoning. Put bisquick, cold water, ground beef, taco seasoning, green pepper, tomatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise. Top with cheese. Put back into oven until topping is bubbly and cheese is melted. Top with sour cream if you please. In a skillet
ingredients: bisquick, cold water, ground beef, taco seasoning, green pepper, tomatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise
name: baked taco casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly coat 12 muffin tin liners with cooking spray and place in muffin tin. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Whisk in egg, milk, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. In separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to banana mixture and combine well. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Spoon equal amounts of batter into 12 muffin cups. Bake 20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Allow to cool slightly in pan, then remove to wire rack.
ingredients: bananas, weet-bix, milk, eggs, margarine, self-raising flour, brown sugar, chocolate chips
name: banana weet bix choc chip muffins

steps: In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the rice vinegar in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the rice vinegar is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: light chunk tuna in water, apple cider vinegar, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, sweet relish, cooked rice, sweet peas
name: tuna salad with rice and vegetables

shavings, marshmallowspreparation:Stir together coffee ice cubes
ingredients: coffee ice cubes, vanilla ice cream, sugar, whipped cream, chocolate shavings
name: frosty joe

steps: In a bowl, stir dry ingredients together. In a pot, melt honey with peanut butter over low heat. When liquid, remove from heat and add dry mixture and vanilla. Mix well. Spread into 8x8-inch pan. Refrigerate.
ingredients: honey, peanut butter, walnuts, carob powder, sesame seeds, coconut, sunflower seeds, lecithin granules, vanilla
name: excellent carob fudge

steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Butter the sides and bottom of a 10-inch springform pan and set aside. In the top of a double boiler, combine the butter, chocolate and coffee and melt slowly, stirring occasionally, until smooth. Remove from the heat and let cool for 5 minutes. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar and vanilla until frothy. Whisk the eggs into the melted chocolate until combined. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for 1 hour and cool on a wire rack until it reaches room temperature. Remove the sides of the pan, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight, before serving.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, whipping cream, butter, vanilla
name: easy microwave chocolate glaze

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: sugar, shortening, maple syrup, milk, flour, baking powder, egg whites
name: maple syrup cake

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Stirring
ingredients: chicken breast, vegetable oil, onion, potatoes, yellow curry paste, coconut milk
name: easy yellow thai curry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, oatmeal, bananas, milk, dark brown sugar, butter, egg, salt, baking powder, cinnamon
name: low fat 100 whole grain banana muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, garlic cloves, dried basil, honey, soy sauce, ketchup
name: crock pot honey garlic chicken

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: kohlrabi, scallions, red onion, part-skim ricotta cheese, mayonnaise, coarse grain mustard
name: creamy kohlrabi salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Spray 9x13 pan with non-stick cooking spray. Arrange tenderloins in pan and sprinkle with mozzarella. In seperate bowl, mix tomatoes, chicken stuffing, and water. Mix until stuffing is moistened. Spread evenly over chicken. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, onion, dried basil, dried oregano, pepper, mozzarella cheese, diced tomatoes, chicken stuffing mix
name: bruschetta chicken bake weight watchers

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients except parmesan cheese. Mix ingredients lightly till well blended. Press lightly into an 8 by 8 pan. Cover with waxed paper & microwave on high for 12 to 14 minutes, turning dish once. Drain fat, if needed. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese & cook uncovered on high for 1- 2 minutes or till cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: ground turkey, tomato ketchup, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, egg, onion, nonfat milk
name: turkey parmesan meatloaf

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add potatoes, onions, eggs, milk, baking powder, fresh spinach, hard cheese. Cover pan with lid and turn heat down to medium-low. Check after about 3 minutes and see if omelette has set - the middle should not jiggle. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: potatoes, onions, eggs, olive oil, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: spanish omelette with sweet onions

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potatoes and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp.
ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, butter, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper
name: garlic and rosemary smashed potatoes

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl, stir together butter, garlic, cheese and parsley. Remove biscuits from container. On baking pan with sides, make 2 loaves of 5 biscuits each. Set the biscuits on their sides, just touching each other end to end, like they were in the can, only in 2 groups of 5. Split each biscuit in half. Divide the butter evenly between biscuits and spread in between split layers. Reshape the loaves. Bake 11 to 14 minutes or until loaves are deep golden brown and thoroughly baked.
ingredients: butter, garlic powder, dry mustard, biscuit dough, parmesan cheese
name: parmesan monkey bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove cover and sprinkle with cheese.
ingredients: chicken breasts, flour, butter, salt and pepper, mushrooms, mozzarella cheese
name: mozzarella chicken bake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degree f. Put entire stick butter into a 9 x 13 inch pan. Put pan with butter into the oven until butter is melted. Beat the eggs, milk, and salt until frothy. Add flour. Beat until mixed. Pour over melted butter. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Serve with syrup or jelly.
ingredients: eggs, flour, milk, salt
name: hootenanny

steps: Heat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix butter, sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, eggs, sugar, vanilla essence, egg yolks, milk, pastry shells and mix well together. Pour into a medium saucepan and mix well. Put over a medium heat and stir continuously until it thickens and has a rich glossy brown colour, about 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool and pour into prepared cooked pie pastry shell. Optional extra. Beat 2 egg whites till soft peaks form, slowly add in 4 tablespoon sugar until glossy and have stiff peaks. Spoon meringue onto caramel, making sure it covers the pastry. Put into a hot oven and bake till golden - should only take a few minutes. Cut and serve with thick cream.
ingredients: pie pastry, watermelon, eggs, powdered sugar, flour, milk, honey
name: watermelon tart morocco

steps: Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: salmon fillet, mirin, soy sauce, fresh ginger, honey, hot sauce, garlic, green onion, fresh coriander
name: steamed ginger garlic salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Cut ribs into serving sizes. Place in greased roasting pan. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. In a saucepan combine the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, cook for one minute. Drain grease from ribs. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover and bake 1 hour. Uncover, bake for 30 minutes longer, basting twice.
ingredients: breakfast sausage, olive oil, onion, green pepper, navy beans, red pepper flakes, black pepper, salt
name: spicy stick to the ribs bean sausage casserole

steps: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl and mix well. Pour into a large bowl. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce
ingredients: puff pastry, egg yolks, sugar, flour, milk, heavy cream, unflavored gelatin, vanilla extract, vanilla sugar, orange zest
name: krempita or vanilla slice

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x9 baking pan. Peel and thinly slice apples. Arrange in the bottom pan. Melt 3 tbsp butter. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and yogurt. Whisk in melted butter. Add cereal and brown sugar, and stir to combine. Spread over the apples and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Cut remaining 3 tbsp butter into small pieces and sprinkle on top. Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until golden and bubbly.
ingredients: tart apples, splenda brown sugar blend, cinnamon, lemon juice, butter, granola cereal, milk, cream
name: breakfast apple cobbler

steps: In a large bowl, combine the frozen peaches, cucumber, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, of fresh mint, honey, cumin seed, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh raspberry. Pour over cucumber mixture. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve with a slotted spoon.
ingredients: frozen peaches, cucumber, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, of fresh mint, honey, cumin seed, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh raspberry
name: peach salad with cumin dressing

steps: Heat oven to 350. Beat milk and eggs together, and toss with the spaghetti. Spread spaghetti mixture in the bottom of a greased high-sided jelly roll pan or 11x18 roasting pan. Top with spaghetti sauce. Arrange pepperoni in rows over the sauce, and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake for 30 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting into squares with a sharp knife or pizza cutter.
ingredients: hamburger meat, mushroom stems and pieces, spaghetti noodles, italian seasoning, garlic powder, mild cheddar cheese, vegetable oil, butter, salt and pepper
name: mama s favorite

steps: Bring water to a rolling boil, then remove from heat. Stir together boiling water and powdered gelatin in a mixing bowl. Stir constantly until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cold water and alcohol. Pour mixture into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have lids. Pour the mix into the cup, add the lid, then turn it upside down prior to refrigeration. Place shots on a tray in refrigerator. Chill until firm. Refrigerate until served.
ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, vodka, triple sec, sour mix, cold water
name: kamikaze jello shots

steps: In a large skillet, put in peppers and onions and coat them with olive oil. Make sure they are lightly coated. Start to cook the veggies on med-high heat until they soften a bit, season with salt, pepper, basil and oregano. Add the wine and continue to cook the veggies on medium heat. Cook the veggies until they cook down and become tender, 10 minutes or so. In a separate skillet, pan fry your sausage. When they are cooked through, add your peppers and onions and mix. Serve on hoagie rolls or italian bread. If you are going to serve these on sandwiches, cut the sausage into bite sized pieces before pan frying them.
ingredients: green bell peppers, olive oil, salt and pepper, hot italian sausage, red wine
name: frank sinatra s sausage and green peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 325 f. Line 9x13 pan with tin foil. Grease the foil, then set pan aside. Mix all ingredients in a large bowl until well combined. Press evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until golden brown across the top of the bars. Immediately remove from pan and invert on to a cooling rack so that the foil can be removed from the bars. Allow to cool, then cut into bars. I wrap them indiviually, so they can be quickly snatched for a snack of breakfast on the run. Bake for 25
ingredients: quick oats, butter, light corn syrup, brown sugar, milk chocolate chips, creamy peanut butter
name: o henry bars

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add lemonade. Mix well. Reheat, and serve hot. Garnish each serving with half an orange slice and a sprig of mint or a green cherry.
ingredients: orange drink mix, sweetened lemonade drink mix, sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves
name: russian refresher mix

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place graham crackers close together on large cookie sheet. Mix butter and brown sugar in a 1 quart saucepan. Stir over low heat until butter and sugar are melted together. Stir in almonds and cherries. Spoon mixture over crackers. Bake 8 minutes. Cool about 5 minutes. Remove from pan and cool completely.
ingredients: honey graham crackers, butter, sugar, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips
name: chocolate toffee graham treats

steps: Heat butter in a large pan over low heat. Add sliced onions and cook until soft, translucent and lightly browned, stirring often. Add the sugar and continue stirring until the onions are deep brown in colour. This may take around 20 minutes. Add water and bonox and simmer for 30 minutes. Top each slice of the baguette with a tablespoon of parmesan cheese. Toast baguette under a hot grill until golden brown. Serve baguette on top of the soup, and sprinkle with chopped parsley.
ingredients: butter, onions, beef broth, coca-cola, salt, vinegar, pepper, french bread, parmesan cheese
name: onion soup with a twist

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit. Unroll rolls into 4 rectangles and place in a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Press up sides slightly and press perforations together. Layer cooked sausage, cooked bacon, hash browns, and cheese. At this point you can make it ahead and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over the dish. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: sausage, crescent rolls, hash brown, cheddar cheese, eggs, half-and-half cream, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: breakfast recipe

steps: In 2-quart saucepan, thoroughly combine sugar and flour. With wire whisk, gradually stir in milk until smooth. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring frequently, until mixture has thickened and boils. Reduce heat to low. Cook 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and cool completely. In medium bowl, with mixer at medium speed, beat butter until light and fluffy. Gradually beat in milk mixture. Beat in vanilla.
ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, milk, butter, semi-sweet chocolate baking squares, vanilla extract
name: silky chocolate butter frosting

steps: Heat oven to 400f. Cook sausage in nonstick skillet over medium heat until browned, stirring frequently. Drain. Add pepper and cook 3 minute stir in pizza sauce. Spread sausage mixture on pizza crust. Sprinkle with french onions and cheese. Bake pizza on baking sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minute until cheese melts and crust is golden an crispy. Cut into wedges to serve.
ingredients: italian sausage, green pepper, white onion, alfredo sauce
name: alfredo sauce with italian sausage

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place cubed chicken in a ungreased rectangular baking dish, 13 x 9 x 2 inches. Bake chicken for 25-30 minutes, cook thoroughly. Meanwhile, start cooking your rice according to your package directions. Then in a large bowl, add the remaining ingredients and still well. When the chicken is done remove it from oven. Spoon in the ingredients from the bowl. Cover and cook for 30 minutes. Serve hot over rice and be sure to get lots of the juice.
ingredients: chicken, rice, onion, chicken bouillon cubes, water, salt, pepper, mushroom, margarine
name: chicken rice roger

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Pour over chex mixture, mixing well to coat. Microwave on high for 6 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes. Drain on paper towels that have been put on top of newspaper.
ingredients: margarine, seasoning salt, worcestershire sauce, chex cereal, salted nuts, pretzel stick
name: great grandma pady s traditional chex party mix

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, lemon slices, sugar and oregano. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered 40 minutes. It is ready when the sauce is thickened and the chicken is cooked through. Stir in olives in the last few minutes. Season with salt and pepper, if needed.
ingredients: frying chicken, lemon, juice of, coriander, dried oregano, garlic cloves, green olives, olive oil, lemon
name: marrakesh chicken

steps: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce.
ingredients: spinach, feta, craisins, bacon, garlic cloves, shallot, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice
name: wilted spinach and balsamic vinegar

steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cherries, sugar, sour cream, eggs, unsalted butter. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the butter. Pour the batter into the prepared bread pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely.
ingredients: baguette, bittersweet chocolate, extra virgin olive oil, coarse salt
name: bread and chocolate tapas pan y chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, italian bread, oregano, salt
name: garlic bread pane strofinato all aglio

steps: Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla, all-purpose flour, chocolate chips
name: brownies double chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking for another 10 minutes. Remove foil and cover dish with foil. Preheat oven to 400 degrees and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and cover dish
ingredients: heavy cream, baking potatoes, onion, salt, white pepper
name: baked scalloped potatoes

steps: Cook cabbage goulash in fat. Add onions and celery and cook 10 minutes. Gently mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer or place in a buttered 2 qt casserole. Simmer 30 minutes, or bake at 350f for 45.
ingredients: ground beef, pork sausage, tomato paste, white vinegar, chili powder, cabbage
name: cabbage goulash

steps: Heat olive oil in 5-quart pot over medium heat. Add sliced bacon and saut for 2 to 3 minutes. Add all remaining ingredients except salt and simmer for 20 minutes. Turn off heat and use an immersion or regular blender to puree bacon. Taste. Add salt to your liking. Serve warm or cold with beef empanadas, pork dishes, soups, stuffed sweet plantains, tortilla chips or plantain chips.
ingredients: olive oil, thick slab bacon, diced tomatoes, red onion, pureed chipotle chile, lime juice, fresh ground black pepper
name: chipotle bacon salsa

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, shrimp, lemon zest, black pepper, garlic cloves, prosciutto, parsley
name: roasted shrimp potatoes and prosciutto

steps: Put the radish in a bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce. Add to radish mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: red radish, soy sauce, rice wine, fresh coriander leaves, garlic granules
name: chinese quick pickled radish salad with garlic

steps: In a 3-quart saucepan, combine rice mix, special seasonings, water, chicken, beans, tomatoes, green bell pepper, chili powder, ground cumin. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Simmer uncovered, about 20 minutes or until rice is tender, stirring occasionally. Top with cheese, sour cream and cilantro if desired.
ingredients: tomatoes, ro-tel diced tomatoes with peppers, fat free chicken broth, barley, chili powder, cumin, garlic cloves, onion, great northern beans, cooked chicken breasts
name: chicken chili with barley

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, fresh herb, fresh lemon juice, garlic cloves, shallot, salt and pepper, shrimp, spinach leaves, lemon slice
name: australian shrimp on the barbie

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in butter, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: chicken breasts, butter chicken paste, butter, tomato puree, garlic, light cream, jasmine rice, coriander
name: skinny butter chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Bake for 10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, maple syrup, ground cinnamon, dark rum, vanilla extract, bananas, pecans, waffles, sweetened whipped cream
name: maple glazed bananas with waffles

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, dried dill, salt, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, basil pesto, frozen chopped spinach, feta cheese
name: spanakopita spinach pie muffins

steps: Heat butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Saute onion, stirring, until tender. Stir in the rice, raisins, broth, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15 to 20 minutes, or until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. Stir in almonds before serving.
ingredients: butter, long grain rice, salt, pepper, consomme, water, blanched almond
name: browned rice

steps: Place strawberries in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Reduce heat to medium-high. Reduce heat to medium
ingredients: fresh strawberries, melba sauce, kirsch liqueur, cool whip
name: strawberries chantilly

steps: In a saucepot, bring 2 inches of water to a boil. Add broccoli. Cover. Cook for 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender. Place peppers and tomatoes in colander, pour in cooked broccoli and hot water to drain. In skillet over high heat, cook garlic in olive oil 1 minute. Add vegetables and seasoning blend. Cook 2 minutes. Arrange on serving platter.
ingredients: onion, canola oil, orange bell pepper, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, frozen whole kernel corn, chicken broth, frozen edamame, fresh parsley, salt and pepper
name: edamame succotash

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Line a greased 9x9 pan with bread. Combine broccoli with margarine, cheese, salt, tobasco, and onion. Spoon over bread. Beat eggs, add milk powder and water, mix well, pour over broccoli. Bake at for 20-25 minutes.
ingredients: parmesan cheese, dried oregano, dried thyme, garlic powder, fresh ground black pepper, sesame seeds, eggs, frozen puff pastry
name: puff pastry cheese stick appetizers

steps: In small bowl, combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing.
ingredients: tomatoes, avocados, mozzarella cheese, marjoram, extra virgin olive oil, salt, lemon juice
name: avocado salad

steps: Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Spray a small baking dish with nonstick cooking spray. Place the coconut pecan brownies in this dish. Spread sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, shredded coconut, pecans, butter, brown sugar, pecans, butter, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar, brown sugar
ingredients: vanilla wafers, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, shredded coconut, pecans, butter, brown sugar
name: caramel coconut pecan brownies

steps: Heat the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the corn, water, salt, and butter. Saute until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Stir in the corn, water, salt, and butter. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly
ingredients: yellow corn grits, water, salt, butter
name: southern grits rice style

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce.
ingredients: ground turkey, zucchini, reduced-fat cheese, red onion, salt, ground black pepper, ketchup, low-fat mayonnaise, buns
name: turkey cheddar burgers

steps: Place the rice in a large bowl and add cold water to cover by 3 inches. Swirl around with your fingers until the water becomes cloudy, then pour through a strainer to drain. Repeat this process until the water remains clear. This will take 4 to 6 rinsings. Place the rice, salt and the 6 cups water in a deep, nonstick saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer the rice gently, uncovered, for about 18 minutes. When the rice has absorbed all the water, reduce the heat to the lowest possible setting and sprinkle the butter pieces over the top. Wrap a clean kitchen towel around the pot lid, piling any excess cloth on top of the lid. Place the cloth-covered lid over the rice and steam for 20 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Gently fluff the rice with a fork and serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, basmati rice, water, butter, chicken bouillon, onion, frozen corn
name: baked basmati rice

steps: Combine the mayonnaise, cider vinegar, fresh lemon juice, black pepper, cayenne pepper in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks.
ingredients: mayonnaise, cider vinegar, fresh lemon juice, black pepper, cayenne pepper
name: alabama white barbecue bbq sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Preheat oven to 350f. Bake for 10 minutes, should be very puffy. Allow to cool for 5 minutes on baking sheet, they will fall considerably due to the lack of egg.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, vegetable oil, brown sugar, eggs, graham crackers, semisweet chocolate morsel
name: daycare cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, oil, water, fresh broccoli florets, stove top stuffing mix, cheddar cheese
name: chicken and broccoli stuffing skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line shallow roasting pan with foil. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Heat oil in small nonstick skillet over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic. Cook 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic begins to soften. Remove from heat. Stir in brown sugar until well mixed. Place chicken breast halves in sprayed foil-lined pan. Spread garlic mixture evenly over chicken. Bake at 500 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, water, olive oil, garlic powder, pepper, breadcrumbs, salt, cayenne pepper
name: garlic chicken nuggets

steps: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in condensed milk, pudding mix, cold milk and vanilla until smooth. Fold in half the whipped topping. In 9 x 13 dish layer vanilla wafers with bananas and pudding mixture. Top with remaining whipped topping. Chill well. Cook time is the chill time. There is no cooking involved.
ingredients: vanilla wafer, bananas, blueberries, cream cheese, nestle sweetened condensed milk, water, instant banana pudding mix, cream
name: banana blueberry pudding pie

steps: Put all of your ingredients on top of the quesadillas and place them on a baking tray and bake for about 5 minutes.
ingredients: lean ground beef, cumin, tomato sauce, pickled hot peppers, jalapenos, red onion, flour tortillas, monterey jack pepper cheese, margarine
name: bree s hot and spicy quesadillas

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13-inch x 9-inch x 2-inch baking dish. Crush butter-flavored crackers either in a ziploc bag with a rolling pin or bottle of sherry, or in a food processor. Melt butter over low heat, and place in a shallow bowl. In another bowl, combine the crackers, cheese and seasonings. Dip fillets in butter, then coat with crumbs. Place coated cod fillets in baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 15-20 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, capers, crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper, fresh basil, cod fish fillets
name: poached cod in tomato sauce

steps: In a large saucepan over high heat, bring the polenta and water to a boil. Slowly pour the cornmeal into the hot liquid, wisking constantly. Stir in the salt. Lower the heat to cook the mixture at a gentle simmer. Cook, stirring frequently, until the polenta is creamy and not grainy, about 30 minutes. Remove the polenta from the heat and stir in scallion. Polenta can be served soft, or poured into a baking pan to cool. Once cooled, polenta can then be cut into solid squares.
ingredients: water, milk, butter, onion soup mix, yellow cornmeal, whole kernel corn, bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, cheddar cheese
name: polenta appetizers

steps: Cook noodles, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, spaghetti sauce mix, water, mozzarella cheese. Simmer on stove for 2 hours or till the sauce reduces. Serve with pasta, ravioli, etc --.
ingredients: noodles, ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, spaghetti sauce mix, water, mozzarella cheese
name: pizza skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Grease 12 large muffin cups. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt in a large bowl. Combine buttermilk, butter, eggs and vanilla in small bowl until blended. Stir into flour mixture just until moistened. Fold in white chocolate. Spoon into prepeared muffin cups, filling half full. Bake 25-30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack for 5 minutes. Remove from pan. Cool on wire rack 10 minutes. Serve warm or completely cool.
ingredients: flour, coconut, baking powder, butter, milk, egg, vanilla essence, icing sugar
name: vanilla and coconut muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube acorn squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender.
ingredients: olive oil, chard leaves, garlic cloves, acorn squash, gruyere cheese
name: garlic chard stuffed acorn squash with gruyere cheese

steps: Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink.
ingredients: lemon juice, vegetable oil, dijon-style mustard, brown sugar, salt, pepper, chicken breasts
name: mustard lemon chicken

steps: Place hors d oeuvres in a large mixing bowl and mix until well blended. Add dressing, milk and dill weed. Mix well until well blended. Stir in cucumber and onion. Cover and refrigerate at least one hour to allow flavor to blend.
ingredients: good seasons salad dressing mix, cream cheese, cucumber, dill, pumpernickel cocktail bread
name: cucumber hors d oeuvres

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a buttered 9-in. Deep-dish pie or cake pan. Bake at for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack until room temperature. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, salt, cooked rice, light raisins
name: old fashion rice custard

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done.
ingredients: bananas, peanut butter, shredded coconut, honey
name: tropical banana snack

steps: In a large skilled cook the chorizo over medium heat until browned and done. Drain reserving 3 t. Drippings, setting sausage aside. Return drippings to the pan and over medium heat saute the onions and garlic for 4-5 minutes. Add the chiles and stir well. Add the potatoes, reduce heat to medium low and cook for 20 minutes, stirring often. Add the tomatoes to heat through. Spoon onto plates, top with eggs and offer salsa at the table. Garnish with chopped cilantro and cheese if you wish.
ingredients: black beans, frozen corn, frozen peas, ground cumin, salt, pepper, green chilies, beer, mozzarella cheese, tortillas
name: tex mex pie

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the peas until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic
ingredients: yellow split peas, garlic cloves, ground turmeric, cumin, baking powder, flour, salt, pepper, water, vegetable oil
name: phoulourie

steps: Heat oil in fry pan over medium high heat until a popcorn kernal pops. Add half of shrimp to oil, cook to golden brown both sides. Remove and add second half of shrimp and repeat.
ingredients: jumbo shrimp, prepared horseradish, bacon, balsamic vinegar, virgin olive oil, lemon, old bay seasoning, toothpicks
name: horseradish shrimp

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a 9-inch springform tart pan or individual tartlet pans with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine the almond meal with the flour and salt. Stir in the butter then stir in the honey or agave syrup, eggs, vanilla extract, almond extract and almond extract. Pour the batter in the prepared pan and scatter the blackberries on top, pressing them lightly in the batter. Bake until lightly browned, 20 to 25 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, caster sugar, plain flour, slivered almonds, desiccated coconut, orange, orange juice, lemon juice, butter, milk
name: almond citrus coconut tart with gluten free option

steps: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute onion and green pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until onions are tender. Add cayenne pepper. Cook and stir until cayenne pepper is melted. Remove cayenne pepper from skillet. Serve hot.
ingredients: green peppers, onions, roma tomatoes, red potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper, cayenne pepper, eggs
name: simple and easy tunisian scrambled eggs with veggies

steps: Place the mushrooms, gill side up, on a baking sheet. Whisk together almonds, olive oil, tamari soy sauce, water, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, dried oregano, portabella mushrooms, onion. Pour mixture over mushrooms, making sure it pools up over gills. Allow to marinate for 30 minutes, turning a few times during marination and brushing the tops with marinade. While mushrooms are marinating, whisk together ingredients for vinaigrette and set aside. Oil grill or skillet and cook mushrooms about 5 minutes per side, or until the have become slightly crispy. Toss mesclun with vinaigrette and set aside. Serve two mushrooms in warm pita bread or nane lavash, along with some dressed meslun.
ingredients: almonds, olive oil, tamari soy sauce, water, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, dried oregano, portabella mushrooms, onion
name: portabella mushroom bake

steps: Mix all the ingredients together well. Rub into the hot garlic sauce. Place on rack in a roasting pan. Bake at 400 for 45 minutes----rare. 60 minutes---medium rare. 65 minutes---medium. 73 minutes---well done. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: beef sirloin, baby spinach, vegetable oil, dark sesame oil, garlic cloves, nam pla, chili flakes, sugar, cornstarch
name: beef in hot garlic sauce

steps: Heat oven to 450. Combine first 7 ingredients in medium-sized bowl just til all is moistened. Drop heaping tbls. Of dough onto ungreased baking sheet making 10 mounds. Melt butter with rest of ingredients, and spoon on top of each biscuit. Bake for 8-10 minutes or til golden brown. My oven takes 10 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, plain yogurt, cheddar cheese, dried chives
name: cheddar chive drop biscuits

steps: In a microwave-safe 8-in. Square dish, melt butter. Stir in cracker crumbs. Press mixture onto bottom of dish. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Whisk in the ice cream, pour over crust. Cover and freeze for 2 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with crushed candy bars. Return to the freezer until firm, but remove from the freezer approx 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: unsweetened kool-aid powdered drink mix, sweetened condensed milk, frozen whipped topping, chocolate crumb crusts, cool whip
name: extremely easy creamy kool aid pie

steps: In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive
ingredients: broccoli, blue cheese, cream, butter, garlic, walnuts, fresh ground pepper
name: blue broccoli

steps: Slice the potatoes as thin as possible and dry with a paper towel. Saut potatoes and onions in olive oil over medium heat, turning frequently, until golden brown. Meanwhile, beat the eggs with salt and pepper until foamy, 1-2 minutes. Pour the eggs over the potatoes, cover, lower the heat, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, until the omelette is set and the bottom is golden brown. Slide the omelette onto a plate, cover, lower the heat, and slide the omelette back into the pan, so that the cooked side is on top. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes longer. Cut into wedges and serve.
ingredients: potatoes, tomatoes, eggs, salt and pepper, olive oil
name: tomato potato omelette cyprus dish
