steps: Drain liquid from canned fruit. Dump everything into large bowl. Mix really well. Chill at least 1 hour. Serve cold.
ingredients: apple, pear, sugar, vegetable juice cocktail, grapes, seedless watermelon, orange juice
name: fruit al licious salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs until well beaten and slightly frothy. Whisk in milk, chives and black pepper. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, heat olive oil or butter over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add egg mixture to skillet and then quickly arrange remaining ingredients on top of eggs. Cook for 3 minutes on the stovetop without stirring. Transfer to oven. Bake until the top is golden brown and the frittata is set, about 30 minutes. Let cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: smoked salmon, butter, cream cheese, fresh chives, shallots, fresh tarragon, lemon juice, salt, pepper
name: smoked salmon butter

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart.
ingredients: vegetable oil, popcorn, margarine, light brown sugar
name: quick and easy caramel corn

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a plastic bag, combine cheese, flour, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place potatoes inthe bag and toss to coat with mixture. Pour butter into an 8x8-inch baking dish. Stir in potatoes, coating well. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 1 hour and 15 minutes, to 1 hour and 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: russet potatoes, unsalted butter, half-and-half, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper
name: easy smashed taters

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Place stew in a large bowl with all remaining ingredients and toss well to combine. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: onion, vegetable oil, potato, green beans, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, tomatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: lebanese style green bean stew

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first seven ingredients. Add the shrimp. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Drain and discard marinade. On each of 12 metal or soaked wooden appetizer skewers, thread two shrimp and any veggies you want to add. Grill kabobs, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-8 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, turning once.
ingredients: garlic clove, fresh ginger, sesame oil, chili bean sauce, soy sauce, tomato paste, sugar, lemon juice, large raw shrimp, scallops
name: chili scallop and shrimp kebabs

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: corn flakes, white corn syrup, sugar, peanut butter
name: teresa s peanut butter chews

steps: Place fish on a broiler rack that has been coated with a non-stick cooking spray. Brush tops of fish with 3 tablespoons of the butter or margarine. Dust with flour. Sprinkle with paprika. Broil 5-6 inches from the heat for 5 minutes or until fish just begins to brown. Combine lemon juice, parsley, worcestershire sauce and remaining butter. Pour over the fish. Broil 5 minutes longer or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: fish steaks, cornmeal, salt, white pepper, butter-flavored cooking spray
name: un fried fish

steps: Heat milk, add crumbs. Add cheese, butter, onion and parsley. Add beaten eggs. Pour sauce over peas and ham. Bake for 45 minutes at 325 degrees.
ingredients: butter, cooked ham, potatoes, fresh parsley
name: country ham and potatoes

steps: Combine first 4 ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Refrigerate until ready to use and then form into 6 patties. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add patties to pan and fry until brown, turning once. Serve on hamburger buns with lettuce, mayo and tomatoes or as desired.
ingredients: ground chicken, ranch dressing mix, dijon mustard, egg, breadcrumbs, hamburger buns
name: ranch chicken burgers

steps: Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, chicken legs, garlic cloves, white vinegar, soy sauce, red pepper flakes, sugar
name: chile garlic chicken legs

steps: Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, balsamic vinegar, onions, limes, pepper, cayenne, vinegar, salt, peanut oil
name: senegal yassa

steps: Heat olive oil in 5-quart pot over medium heat. Add sliced onions and saut for 2 to 3 minutes. Add all remaining ingredients except salt and simmer for 20 minutes. Turn off heat and use an immersion or regular blender to puree salsa. Taste. Add salt to your liking. Serve warm or cold with beef empanadas, pork dishes, soups, stuffed sweet plantains, tortilla chips or plantain chips.
ingredients: tomatillos, plum tomatoes, garlic, onion, canned chipotle chiles, fresh cilantro, vegan sugar, salt
name: chipotle salsa

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add coriander, onion, paprika, dried thyme, and garlic. Add garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add beef and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add coriander, onion
ingredients: ground coriander, ground cumin, paprika, dried thyme, fresh coarse ground black pepper, salt, cinnamon, beef flank steak, vegetable oil
name: north african flank steak

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: boneless chicken, olive oil, garlic cloves, hot sauce, butter, parmesan cheese, salt & pepper
name: boneless buffalo chicken with garlic parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Grease 9x13 pan. In a large bowl combine pumpkin, eggs, brown sugar, white sugar, evaporated milk and salt and spice. Stir well to combine, or beat on low to mix. Pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with cake mix and nuts over the top of that. Drizzle the melted butter over all. Bake for 50-60 minutes until edges are lightly browned. Cool and serve with whipped cream.
ingredients: sugar, vegetable oil, eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, apples, nuts, raisins
name: apple dump cake

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl. Mix in beaten eggs, applesauce and melted butter. Evenly scoop mixture into muffin pans. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Test to see if toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, carrots
name: extremely easy carrot muffins

steps: In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Remove chops. Combine corn starch& cold water until smooth and stir into slow cooker. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Combine corn starch& cold water
ingredients: pork chops, flour, salt, pepper, chicken bouillon cube, vegetable oil
name: breaded southern fried pork chops

steps: Sift plain flour into a bowl and add water. Stir to combine. Gradually add 180ml water, while stirring, to form a sticky dough. Cover with plastic wrap and rest for 35 minutes. Fill a deep-fryer or large saucepan one-third full with vegetable oil and heat over medium heat to 180c. Knead dough on a lightly floured work surface for 1 minute, then divide into 12 and shape into 8cm logs. Working in batches, gently drop logs into oil and fry, turning halfway, for 5 minutes or until golden. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel. Serve bread warm.
ingredients: plain flour, water, olive oil, vegetable oil, salt, sugar
name: ajeen basic dough

steps: Place the mushrooms in the oven proof ceramic dish, approximately 6-8 inches in diameter and at least 1 inch high. Add garlic slices and cover with oil. Pour lemon juice over the mushrooms. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper. If the dish can be used on the stove burner, heat on top of stove over medium high heat for about 6 minutes until the oil is bubbly and the mushrooms are cooked. If dish can not be used directly on the burner, place under the broiler in the oven and broil until the oil is bubbly and the mushrooms are cooked serve with crispy french bread for dipping in the heated garlic oil.
ingredients: button mushrooms, chicken stock, butter, garlic cloves
name: champignons l ail garlic mushrooms

steps: Drain canned chicken, put inot bowl and break up with fork. Chop cucumber and add to meat. Stir in cheese and dressing. Mix well. Spoon one-forth of the mixture on edge of tortilla, top with one forth of the lettuce. Fold the edge nearest the filling over the filling till it is covered. Then roll up the tortillia. Repeat to make three more burritos.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, canola oil, chili powder, salad greens, salsa, ranch dressing, cheddar cheese, tortilla chips
name: taco chicken ranch salad

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, olive oil, ground red pepper, garlic powder, coarse sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, fresh parsley, fresh rosemary
name: fresh herbed pork tenderloin

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, olive oil, all-purpose flour, red onion, white wine, chicken broth, lemons, butter
name: 4 step chicken rustic lemon onion chicken

steps: Mix dry ingredients. Cut shortening and bacon grease. Add dill and mix well. Bake at 375f until golden brown. Can be frozen before baking.
ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, butter, dried onion flakes, dill
name: fast company biscuits

steps: Combine the beef broth, dried sherry, celery, scallions, soy sauce, sliced water chestnuts, fresh mushrooms, frozen pea pods, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, sc
ingredients: beef broth, dry sherry, celery, scallions, soy sauce, sliced water chestnuts, fresh mushrooms, frozen pea pods, scallion
name: oriental vegetable soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease 9x9 inch baking dish. Combine the artichoke hearts, feta, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, pimientos, garlic cloves, tomatoes, green onions in a bowl. Blend thoroughly. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake in preheated oven until top is bubbly and lightly browned, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove and garnish with tomatoes and green onions.
ingredients: canned artichoke hearts, feta cheese, red capsicum, garlic, fresh parsley, extra virgin olive oil
name: artichokes with feta cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large pot of water, boil noodles until al dente. Drain well. In a medium saucepan, combine flour, butter, and salt. Stir until butter is melted and ingredients are combined evenly. Add cheese to mixture, and whisk until cheese is melted and mixture is well blended. Stir in tuna, peas, broccoli, and noodles. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top noodles begins to turn golden brown.
ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, milk, pimiento, peas, tuna, cooked egg noodles, dry breadcrumbs, butter, cheddar cheese
name: tuna noodle casserole

steps: Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes.
ingredients: lentils, coconut milk, ground cardamom, sugar, salt
name: sweet lentil stew east africa

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: bell peppers, onion, garlic cloves, italian sausage, marinara sauce, red wine, cornstarch, cooked pasta, parmesan cheese
name: italian sausage and peppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a shallow dish, combine biscuit mix, pecans, paprika, salt, poultry seasoning, rubbed sage, broiler-fryer chickens, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a skillet, warm honey with chipotle powder and cinnamon over low heat, then add the nuts and stir to coat evenly. Bake in preheated oven until nuts are fragrant. Allow to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine sugar and salt. Add the warm pecans, and toss to coat evenly. Spread out on fresh sheet of waxed paper and let dry completely. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: chicken, corn flakes, mayonnaise, buttermilk, salt and pepper, butter, honey, soy sauce, pecans
name: baked chicken with honey and pecans

steps: Place fish on a broiler rack that has been coated with a non-stick cooking spray. Brush tops of fish with 3 tablespoons of the butter or margarine. Dust with flour. Sprinkle with paprika. Broil 5-6 inches from the heat for 5 minutes or until fish just begins to brown. Combine lemon juice, parsley, worcestershire sauce and remaining butter. Pour over the fish. Broil 5 minutes longer or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
ingredients: olive oil, dried fennel, thyme, parsley, lemon juice, ouzo, firm white fish, cognac
name: fish flambe with fennel

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve over rice garnished with orange sliced.
ingredients: turkey breast tenderloin, italian salad dressing, olive oil, onion, green bell pepper, zucchini, penne pasta, oregano, salt & fresh ground pepper, parmesan cheese
name: my italian stir fry

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny.
ingredients: eggs, whole milk ricotta cheese, unsalted butter, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, italian bread, butter, tomatoes
name: scrambled eggs with ricotta cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: spaghetti, lean ground beef, onion, bacon, ketchup, dill pickle, barbecue sauce, prepared mustard, shredded cheddar cheese
name: bacon cheeseburger spaghetti

steps: Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add onions, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter, butter,
ingredients: onions, butter, water, orange rind, orange juice, salt, marjoram, thyme, long-grain rice
name: orange herb rice

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Combine sugar and melted butter in large bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add vanilla. Beat until well mixed. Pour batter into greased and floured 10-inch angel food cake pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, evaporated milk, salt, vanilla wafers, butter, ice cream
name: ice cream cake with vanilla wafers

steps: Heat oven to 425. Line baking sheet with foil. Place pork in pan. In small bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over pork tenderloin. Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until pork has slight blush of pink in center and meat thermometer inserted reads 160. Let stand 5 minutes. Cut diagonally into slices.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, lemon pepper, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, fresh chives
name: pork tenderloin with lemon mustard sauce ww 5 points

steps: Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats.
ingredients: yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, peaches, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, ground cumin, salt, cayenne pepper
name: peach pepper salad

steps: Pour the hot coffee into a heatproof 10-ounce glass. Add the ice cubes and stir until coffee is chilled. Add the ice cream and top with the whipped cream. Taste and add sugar, if desired. Serve with a long-handled spoon and a straw.
ingredients: coffee, milk, cocoa powder, granulated sugar, caramel syrup
name: delicious iced coffee

steps: In a large, heavy pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Cook the onion for 3 to 4 minutes, or until translucent, stirring occasionally. Stir in the corn. Cook for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the broth and rosemary. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Add the salt and white pepper. Reduce the heat. Simmer for 40 minutes. Working in batches, process the soup in a blender or food processor until almost smooth. Reheat. To serve, garnish with rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, chanterelle mushroom, flour, white wine, chicken stock, heavy cream, salt and pepper, fresh chives
name: cream of chanterelle soup

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until softened and starting to brown, about 10 minutes. In food processor combine sour cream, cream cheese, onion mixture, parsley, salt and pepper. Refrigerate for at least one hour. Serve with chips, pita or vegetables.
ingredients: corn on the cob, olive oil, cream cheese, plain yogurt, fresh basil, fresh thyme, hot pepper sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: roasted corn and herb dip

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until mixture starts to boil. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: jellied cranberry sauce, vinegar, sugar, cardamom, oil
name: cranberry vinaigrette

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Using a food processor, chop the spinach, breadcrumbs, green onions, bacon and parsley. Add the remaining ingredients and process until finely chopped but not pureed, about 10 seconds. Layer the oysters in their half shells on a pan with rock salt. Spoon some of the spinach mixture one each oyster. Bake 10 minutes until cooked through, then broil until browned on top. Serve hot.
ingredients: vegetable oil, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, sugar, parmesan cheese, dried dill weed, oyster crackers
name: less oily seasoned oyster crackers

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and chocolate chips. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. Let the muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes, then serve warm or transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
ingredients: whole wheat flour, raisin bran cereal, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, ground cinnamon, eggs, buttermilk, cooking oil, unsweetened applesauce
name: whole grain brown sugar cinnamon pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Dip pierogies in egg then breadcrumbs. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: potatoes, onions, lasagna noodles, butter, cheese, evaporated milk
name: lasagna pierogi

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Place stick of butter in 9x13 size casserole pan and let sit in oven during preheating to melt butter. Mix flour, sugar, milk and vanilla with blender until well mixed. Pour batter over melted butter. Pour fruit and juice evenly over batter. Bake for 1 hour. Serve warm with ice cream.
ingredients: butter, milk, self rising flour, sugar, canned fruit
name: mom s easy fruit cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl combine all of the ingredients. Form meat mixture into a loaf and place into a casserole dish. Bake for 50-60 minutes. Nice with scalloped potatoes and steamed green beans.
ingredients: hamburger, ground pork, onion, applesauce, breadcrumbs, ketchup, salt, pepper
name: german applesauce meatloaf

steps: In a wok or frying pan heat 2 tbsp oil. Add onions and garlic. Saut until onions are tender. Add rice, soy sauce, eggs, teriyaki sauce and ham. Let sit 10-15 minutes stirring occasionally. The less you stir it the more crunchiness there will be. Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.
ingredients: long-grain rice, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, pork, eggs, fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar
name: fried rice with pork

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Using a food processor, chop the spinach, breadcrumbs, green onions, bacon and parsley. Add the remaining ingredients and process until finely chopped but not pureed, about 10 seconds. Layer the oysters in their half shells on a pan with rock salt. Bake 10 minutes until cooked through, then broil until browned on top. Serve hot.
ingredients: oysters, bacon, pine nuts, worcestershire sauce, fresh chives
name: oysters with pine nuts and bacon

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups flour, yeast, sugar, salt and pepper. Mix well in a saucepan, heat milk, water and shortening until warm. Add to flour mixture add egg and beat at low speed until moistened. Beat 3 minutes at medium speed. By hand, add cheese and enough flour to make a firm dough. Knead well on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes. Punch dough down, divide into 2 parts. Shape into 2 round loaves. Place on a greased baking sheet, cover and let rise in a warm oven until light and doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on racks, makes 2 loaves.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, peppercorn, butter, sugar, eggs, romano cheese, milk
name: black peppercorn romano cheese biscotti

steps: Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and onion. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges.
ingredients: medium shrimp, onion, butter, garlic salt, salt, pepper, bell pepper
name: shrimp and onions

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, lemon, zest of, beaten egg yolks, butter and milk. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: boiling water, pecans, lime gelatin, cream cheese, crushed pineapple, 7-up soda
name: lime soda pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks.
ingredients: vanilla frosting, peppermint extract, green food coloring, butter flavored crackers, dark chocolate confectionary coating
name: easy no bake mint sandwich cookies

steps: Brown beef in a large high-sided skillet or soup pot. Drain the fat from the beef and discard. Return the cooked beef to the pot and add the onion, beans, and barbecue sauce. Cook for about 30 minutes over medium heat, stirring occaisionally. Serve with corn muffins, fried potatoes, hot sauce, or diced raw onion.
ingredients: ground beef, smoked sausage, baked beans, black beans, instant minced garlic, worcestershire sauce
name: fancy franks beans

steps: Mix together shortening, sugar, egg yolks, milk, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, pecans, cinnamonpreparation:Mix together shrtening, sugar and egg yolks. Stir in milk and vanilla. Add in flour, baking powder and salt. Chill dough. Roll into balls the size of walnuts and roll balls in mixture of nuts and cinnamon. Place 3 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees for 12-15 minutes, until golden brown, but still soft. Yields 5 dozen 2-inch cookies.
ingredients: shortening, sugar, vanilla, eggs, cake flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon
name: rich cinnamon cookies

steps: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add the water, rice, natural-style peanut butter, wheat, millet, lemon, milk, sugar and stir-fry for about 10 minutes or until desired tenderness is reached.
ingredients: water, rice, natural-style peanut butter, wheat, millet, lemon, milk, sugar
name: la bouillie africa

steps: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and saute 1 minute. Add mushrooms and saute 3 minutes, until mushrooms release juice. Add broccoli and rosemary and cook 3 to 5 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: broccoli floret, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: broccoli aglio olio with garlic and olive oil

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. In a med saute pan spray with non stick cooking spray. Saute onions about 2-3 minutes until translucent. Add garlic on top of sauteed onions. Add chopped garlic on each filet. Add tomato slices or chopped tomatoes. Place pan with topped filets in the oven. Bake 12-15 minutes until fish is white.
ingredients: tilapia fillets, olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, fresh green beans, fresh spinach, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, fresh basil
name: belinda s tilapia recipe

steps: Mix greens, egg, blue cheese, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, grape tomatoes, red onion, cooked chicken breasts, lettuce leaves. Cover and refrigerate. Right before serving, add chicken, lettuce leaves and toss to combine. Serve with crusty bread.
ingredients: mixed salad greens, hard-boiled egg, blue cheese, bacon bits, cheddar cheese, grape tomatoes, red onion, cooked chicken breasts, lettuce leaves
name: copycat bob evan s cobb salad

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender.
ingredients: flour, paprika, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, fresh mushrooms, onion, evaporated milk, water
name: chicken and gravy

steps: Beat egg with hand beater until fluffy. Add rest of ingredients. Grease griddle and heat. Pour about 3 tbsp batter onto hot griddle and cook until edges of pancake puff and look dry around edges. Flip, and cook opposite side until golden brown.
ingredients: flour, dry buttermilk, salt, baking powder, brown sugar, blueberries, oil, egg, water
name: nana s blueberry pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: flour, oats, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramel topping, raisins, walnuts
name: raisin caramel bars

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Line large baking dish with bacon. Pour rice evenly over top of bacon. Place chicken on top of rice. Season chicken with salt, pepper, chicken seasoning and paprika. Mix together soup, broth, milk and pour over chicken and rice. Cover and bake for 3 hours at 325. Uncover and bake for 15 minute more.
ingredients: olive oil, shallot, israeli couscous, chicken broth, salt
name: israeli couscous rice cooker

steps: In a large microwave-safe bowl combine the white sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and peanut putter. Microwave on high for 3-4 minutes or until melted, stirring once. Stir in vanilla. Fold in rice cereal and the chopped peanuts until well combined. Spread into a lightly buttered 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish. Cover and chill for 1 hour or until set. Cut into squares.
ingredients: special k cereal, peanut butter, light corn syrup, sugar
name: super special special k bars

steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the jalapeno, corn, chicken broth, milk, fresh jalapeno pepper, roasted red peppers, feta cheese. Cook over high heat for 10 minutes, or until the mixture reduces and thickens slightly. Cook over high heat
ingredients: corn, chicken broth, milk, fresh jalapeno pepper, roasted red peppers, feta cheese
name: jalapeno corn chowder

steps: Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft.
ingredients: quick-cooking grits, water, unsweetened baking cocoa, sugar, butter
name: chocolate grits

steps: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, tomatoes, cucumber, maple syrup, black pepper. Mix everything together. Pour dressing mixture over tomato mixture. Toss. Cover and chill 30 minutes, if desired.
ingredients: roma tomatoes, oranges, cucumber, maple syrup, black pepper
name: orange tomato cucumber salad with orange and maple dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars.
ingredients: chocolate wafer crumbs, butter, chocolate extract, flaked coconut, semisweet chocolate, butterscotch chips, sweetened condensed milk, pecans
name: chocolate butterscotch bars

steps: Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, monterey jack cheese, sour cream, green chilies, flour tortillas
name: chicken enchilada sour cream casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: wild rice, olive oil, skinless chicken breasts, carrots, dried rosemary leaves, reduced-calorie orange marmalade, dijon mustard, garlic powder, ground pepper
name: rosemary chicken with wild rice weight watchers

steps: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream until melted. Add strawberries and cake broken into small pieces. Chill until set. Slice in squares. Top with whipped cream.
ingredients: angel food cake, jello gelatin, hot water, cold water
name: mom s jello angel cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake.
ingredients: refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough, cream cheese, eggs, sugar, vanilla
name: cream cheese filled chocolate chip cookie squares

steps: Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until hungarian beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired.
ingredients: dried navy beans, water, ham hock, flour, sour cream, milk, vinegar
name: hungarian bean soup

steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine egg whites, granulated sugar, egg yolk, unsalted butter, salt, all-purpose flour, fresh lemon juice, buttermilk, lemon, zest of, hot water. In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold into lemon mixture. Pour into buttered 6 cup casserole dish. Place this casserole inside a large pan. Pour hot water into the 9x13 pan to a depth of about 1 inch. Bake at 350 degrees for about 40 minutes or until the topping is set and golden brown. During baking this separates into a cake-like topping with a lemon sauce beneath.
ingredients: egg whites, granulated sugar, egg yolk, unsalted butter, salt, all-purpose flour, fresh lemon juice, buttermilk, lemon, zest of, hot water
name: lemon buttermilk pudding cake

steps: Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Stir in berries. Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm. Cut into bars.
ingredients: orange gelatin, boiling water, ginger ale, peaches
name: ginger ale fruit jello salad

steps: In a small bowl, mix together amaretto-flavored coffee, vanilla extract, almond extract, cocoa powder, sugar, whipped cream, candy sprinkles, cherries. Stir well and leave to sit for 1 hour. Lightly beat amaretto-flavored coffee, vanilla extract, almond extract, cocoa powder, sugar, whipped cream, candy sprinkles, cherries. Lightly beat amaretto-flavored coffee, vanilla extract, almond extract, cocoa powder, sugar, whipped cream, candy sprinkles,
ingredients: amaretto-flavored coffee, vanilla extract, almond extract, cocoa powder, sugar, whipped cream, candy sprinkles, cherries
name: cafe alvancocoa

steps: Preheat oven to 200c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve.
ingredients: okra, olive oil, red onions, kosher salt, garlic, tomatoes, fresh ginger, grains of paradise, cardamom, sugar
name: okra and tomatoes with grains of paradise

steps: Drain liquid from pickles into a non reactive pan. Put in jars and refrigerate. No need to can, just keep in refrigerator. They will keep indefinetely in refrigerator.
ingredients: green onion, white rice vinegar, salt, brown sugar, shallots
name: pickled spring onions dua hanh vnese

steps: Sprinkle the lemon wedges with lemon zest and serve.
ingredients: salmon fillets, orange juice, lime juice, honey, ground cumin, chili powder, hot pepper sauce, salt, fresh ground black pepper, lime wedge
name: salmon with chili honey glaze

steps: Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, fresh cilantro, garlic cloves, jalapeno pepper, cooked rice
name: fire and rice

steps: Spray an 8-inch square baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Layer the hash browns, ham and cheeses. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, egg substitute, milk, pepper and dijon mustard. Pour over the casserole, cover and refrigerate overnight. Remove the casserole from the refrigerator 30 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Uncover the casserole and bake for 1 hour or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Allow to stand for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares. Serve with salsa on top.
ingredients: egg substitute, fat-free evaporated milk, salt, ground black pepper, frozen hash brown potatoes, low-fat cheddar cheese, onion, green bell pepper, turkey bacon
name: low fat hash browns casserole

steps: Place salmon fillets on a grill rack or broiler pan coated with cooking spray, and cook for 6 minutes on each side or until the fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Baste salmon occasionally with the reserved marinade.
ingredients: maple syrup, dijon mustard, garlic, ground ginger, cayenne pepper, salmon fillets, oil
name: grilled dijon maple salmon

steps: To make the syrup, in a medium saucepan combine the zest, sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring to dissolve the sugar. Remove from the heat, cover and let steep for 15 minutes. Transfer the syrup to a 2-quart pitcher. Let cool. Add the lemon juice, chopped lemon rinds and cold water. Stir well to combine. Chill until very cold. Serve over ice.
ingredients: fresh lemon juice, sugar, cold water, lemon, ice cube, yellow food coloring
name: kittencal s really great old fashioned lemonade

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl. Add to the creamed mixture. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown.
ingredients: granulated sugar, heavy cream, corn syrup, sweet unsalted butter, salt, maple extract, vanilla, pecans
name: opera creams candies

steps: Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well.
ingredients: fresh broccoli, rotini pasta, garlic, heavy cream, butter, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: rotini pasta with broccoli cream sauce

steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat together the onion, tomatoes, turkey, lettuce, and basil. Sprinkle with the brown sugar and drizzle with the vinegar and olive oil. Toss well and season with salt and pepper. Cover and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least two hours. To make the sandwich, mound the mixture into the pita pockets and serve at once.
ingredients: olive oil, vidalia onions, sugar, salt, dried tarragon, dried thyme, pita bread, soft fresh goat cheese, fresh parsley
name: grilled pitas with caramelized onions and goat cheese

steps: Boil and drain noodles. In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the topping. Pour into greased 8 x 8 baking pan. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
ingredients: oil, onion, celery, carrots, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, frozen spinach, eggs, matzo meal, salt and pepper
name: muffin size passover vegetable kugels

steps: Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss peas, shallot, oil, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired.
ingredients: peas, butter, scallions, celery ribs, cream, french tarragon, salt, black pepper
name: peas in tarragon cream

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Place chicken pieces in 13x9-inch baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Arrange onion slices over top. In small saucepan, combine ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, fresh lemon juice, chicken legs, cooking spray, lemon wedge, green onion toppreparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in a large ziploc plastic bag, add chicken. Seal and marinate in refrigerator for 4 hours or overnight, turning ocacsionnally. Prepare grill. Remove chicken from bag, reserving marinade. Place marinade in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, cook 1 minute. Place chicken on grill rack coated with cooking spray. Grill 20 minutes or until done, turning and basting frequently with cooked marinade. Garnish with lime wedges and green onion tops, if desired.
ingredients: strong coffee, ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, vinegar, fresh lemon juice, chicken legs
name: caffeine jolt chicken

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: chicken breast, paprika, garlic powder, hot sauce, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, blue cheese dressing, milk, pasta
name: creamy buffalo chicken pasta

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a large, shallow roasting pan with foil, grease well with a thin layer of olive oil. Combine crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper and paprika in a shallow bowl. Dredge chicken in potato chips and place in prepared pan. Bake uncovered for 1 hour, or until done.
ingredients: shortening, garlic salt, pepper, chicken pieces, potato chips
name: garlic potato chip chicken for 2

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Stir often to prevent sticking. When mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low. Cook mixture until fruit is tender and the relish has thickened, approximately 40-50 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool, serve.
ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, walnuts, orange marmalade, lemon juice
name: baked cranberry relish

steps: Heat grill to high.
ingredients: butter, pork schnitzels, onion, sliced mushrooms, evaporated milk, flour, salt, pepper
name: schnitzel in mushroom sauce not breaded

steps: In a large saucepan, cover potatoes with 2 inches salted water. Bring to a simmer and cook until potatoes are just tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain thoroughly. In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Add potatoes and garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook, mashing potatoes slightly, until golden brown in spots, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a serving dish and keep warm. Add bacon to skillet. Cook until bacon is browned, about 3 minutes. Add to potatoes along with lemon juice to taste. Season with salt and pepper and toss gently to combine.
ingredients: red potatoes, salt, mayonnaise, green chilies, fresh cilantro, green onions, fresh lime juice, fresh garlic clove, black pepper, maple bacon
name: amanda s delicious cilantro potato salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Cream sugar, eggs and butter. Add dry ingredients. Add mashed bananas, nuts, cinnamon and vanilla. Cook in greased loaf pan for about an hour. For small-medium muffins. 20-30 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, buttermilk, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, nuts
name: gold medal flour s best ever banana bread

steps: Heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions, cook stirring for 5 minutes. Add sugar, cook about 7 minutes until carmelized. Add water if necessary to prevent sticking. Add zucchini, cook about 5 minutes until tender. Add tomato and pepper flakes. Cook until heated through and tomato begins to release juices, about 5 minutes add salt and pepper.
ingredients: zucchini, summer squash, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, fresh asparagus, red onion, extra virgin olive oil, salt, black pepper
name: oven roasted vegetables south beach

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Place tomato slices on broiler pan. Brush slices with oil, and sprinkle with herbes, salt, pepper, cheese and parsley. Broil until warmed through, about 3 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: tomatoes, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, fresh flat-leaf parsley, fresh chives, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese
name: glazed broiled tomatoes

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, eggs, ketchup, herb stuffing mix, ranch dressing mix, fried onions
name: ranch meatloaf

steps: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Combine rolled oats, coconut, nuts, cinnamon, salt, vegetable oil, honey, maple syrup, dried fruit. Pour liquid mixture over the dry ingredients and stir together. Spread onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for approx 20-25 minutes. The longer you bake it the crunchier the granola will be. It may still be sticky when it comes out of the oven, but it will become crisp and dry as it cools. Place baking sheet on a wire cooling rack. Once cooled, mix in the dried fruit and store in an airtight container or plastic bag in the refrigerator. It will keep for several weeks.
ingredients: margarine, natural-style peanut butter, honey, vanilla, salt, chocolate protein powder, rolled oats, raisins
name: peanut butter protein granola

steps: Put the radishes in a bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, and cayenne. Mix and eat.
ingredients: radishes, onion, seasoned rice vinegar, sugar, salt
name: pickled radishes

steps: Boil noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: flour, egg, salt, baking powder
name: homemade noodles for 2

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, egg, mashed bananas, applesauce
name: banana bread banana bomb bread

steps: In a large heavy saucepan combine all the ingredients and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Stir often to prevent sticking. When mixture is simmering, reduce heat to low. Cook mixture until fruit is tender and the relish has thickened, approximately 40-50 minutes, stirring occasionally. Let cool, serve.
ingredients: black cherry jell-o, boiling water, cranberry juice cocktail, cinnamon sticks, cloves, pears
name: crock pot brilliant red pears

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. Melt butter and allow it to cool. Use 1 tablespoon to coat 10 muffin tin moulds or individual oval baking moulds measuring 5 x 10 cm. Sift icing sugar and flour into bowl, mix in the ground almonds. Lightly beat egg whites with a fork, fold them into dry ingredients. Add cooled, melted butter and orange rind, mix well. Three quarters fill each mould with mixture and bake on the middle shelf of oven for 10 minutes. Turn tray around, and bake for another 5- 10 minutes, till tops are golden, and springy to the touch. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes, then gently unmould onto a wire tray and leave to cool. Dust the friands with icing sugar to serve.
ingredients: flour, butter, egg yolk, icing, vanilla sugar, salt, lemon, rind of
name: angel eyes engelsaugen

steps: Heat oven to 350. Mix salt, rosemary, pepper and garlic. Rub mixture into chicken. Place chicken, meaty side up, in pan and bake for 25 minutes. Meanwhile, mix apricot jam, lemon juice, and mustard. Brush apricot mixture over chicken. Bake for 20 minutes longer or until juices run clear. Serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, orange juice, dijon mustard, dried rosemary, salt and pepper
name: rosemary dijon chicken

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the flour, oats, sugar, salt, unsalted butter, buttermilk and mix until well combined. Add the flour mixture to the skillet and cook for about 5 minutes or until the mixture is light and fluffy. Add the flour mixture
ingredients: starch, yogurt, sugar, cooking oil, rose water
name: zoolbia

steps: Heat oven to 425. Place chicken breasts in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2. Spread 1 tsp butter on each of the four chicken breasts. Sprinkle salt and paprika on the breasts. Drizzle all with the lemon juice. Bake uncovered 35- 45 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with snipped parsley and serve.
ingredients: lemon juice, orange juice, garlic, olive oil, ground ginger, tarragon leaf, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts
name: citrus tarragon chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix first 5 ingredients in a bowl. Mix thoroughly and set aside. Heat oil in a heavy nonstick skillet over medium heat. Saut onion 5 minutes, or until softened. Stir in tomatoes and basil and saut 5 minutes. Add zucchini and saut 5 minutes, or until zucchini is tender. Stir vegetables into egg mixture. Pour into a buttered shallow baking dish and bake 15 minutes or until casserole is set. Do not overcook. Cut into wedges.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, diced fire-roasted tomatoes, salt and pepper, eggs, provolone cheese, prepared polenta
name: italian egg and tomatoes

steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and cook onions until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add potatoes, chicken broth, and water. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Working in batches, puree potato mixture with cucumbers and return to pot. Stir in cream. Meanwhile, heat a heavy skillet over medium high heat, and add the corn and cook until golden. Scrape corn from cob and add to soup. Stir in parsley, salt and pepper. If desired, chill soup in refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: butter, onion, celery, flour, frozen whole kernel corn, whipping cream, half-and-half, fresh parsley, kosher salt, cracked black pepper
name: creamy corn soup

steps: Combine all ingredients in a 2 quart pitcher. Press mint leaves against sides of pitcher with back of spoon to release flavors. Stir in tea and bourbon. Serve over crushed ice. Garnish with mint leaves.
ingredients: mint leaves, sugar cube, lime, sweet tea flavored vodka, ice, club soda
name: bp oil slick

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. When cutlets are crispy and golden on both side and juices run clear, place them on a baking sheet. Place a slice of provolone cheese on top of each cutlet and place in the oven. In the meantime, heat sauce in the microwave or on the stove top. When cheese is melted, remove cutlets from oven and spoon some sauce nicely over each one. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. Serve with your favorite pasta and remaining sauce.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, pepper, flour, butter, cooking oil, prosciutto, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, chicken broth
name: chicken bolognese

steps: Cook marcella s stuffed rigatoni in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the beef, oregano, onions, green pepper, garlic, cream of mushroom soup, milk, ketchup, rigatoni pasta and stir to coat well. Place marcella s stuffed rigatoni in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the beef,
ingredients: ground beef, oregano, onions, green pepper, garlic, cream of mushroom soup, milk, ketchup, rigatoni pasta
name: marcella s stuffed rigatoni

steps: In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic,
ingredients: green beans, instant minced onion, bacon bits, salt, pepper
name: better than average canned green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350, or 325 if you have dark non-stick pan. Prepare pan whichever way. In a bowl, cream together sugar and butter. Add the sifted flour and baking powder. Beat in eggs. Stir in vanilla. Finally, stir in milk until batter is smooth. Bake for about 30-40 minutes, until cake springs back at touch.
ingredients: white cake mix, eggs, oil, water, cream of coconut, cool whip, flaked coconut
name: dreamy coconut cake

steps: Heat oil in a frying pan and add the onions. Saut about 2 to 4 minutes. Add tomato and greens and saut about 1 minute. Add cup water and then add salt to taste. Let the mixture simmer until the sukuma is tender.
ingredients: bread, carrot sticks, peanut butter, raisins
name: kid sushi

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Brush a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with olive oil. Layer the sliced potatoes, mushrooms, and onions, in the dish. Sprinkle with the salt and sage leaves. Pour the cream over evenly. Brush the pork chops with olive oil, and rub the breadcrumbs onto both sides of each pork chop. Place pork chops on top of the vegetables. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or just until the pork chops are cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
ingredients: egg whites, cornstarch, panko breadcrumbs, pecans, salt, dried rosemary, rubbed sage, pork loin chops, olive oil
name: oven fried pork chops

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon.
ingredients: oats, pumpkin puree, sugar-free maple syrup, cinnamon, low calorie sweetener, salt
name: fancy schmancy oatmeal

steps: Heat the oil in a small saucepan. Add chili peppers and cook until the chili peppers are translucent. Add garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chili peppers are translucent. Add tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a couple of minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of tamarind. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge.
ingredients: chili peppers, dried hot red chili peppers, cumin seed, coriander seeds, caraway seed, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt
name: fiery tunisian harrisa

steps: Boil rice with short-grain rice, milk, vanilla essence, crushed pineapple, sugar, cream. Add sugar, water, saffron, ghee, cinnamon sticks, cardamom pods, canned crushed pineapple, lemonpreparation:Boil rice with short-grain rice, milk, vanilla essence, crushed pineapple, sugar, cream. Add sugar, water, saffron, ghee, cinnamon sticks, cardamom pods, canned crushed pineapple, lemonpreparation:B
ingredients: short-grain rice, milk, vanilla essence, crushed pineapple, sugar, cream
name: pineapple rice cream

steps: In 3 quart saucepan, melt butter, stir in flour until blended. Cook 30 seconds. Gradually stir in half and half- cook, stirring, until mixture boils and slightly thickens. Stir in all cheeses, salt and pepper. Boil fettuccine till al dente. Drain and pour into large bowl or round casserole dish. Mix in cheese sauce along with parsley, until well blended. Serve immediately.
ingredients: pasta, butter, flour, milk, parmesan cheese, monterey jack cheese, salmon, fresh spinach, sun-dried tomato, fresh oregano
name: salmon and spinach pasta

steps: Combine peaches and vanilla extract in a saucepan. Cover and let stand at least an hour to macerate, tossing once or twice. Cook over low heat until sugar dissolves and mixture darkens and turns clear, 25 to 30 minutes stirring as needed to keep from sticking add raspberries, continue cooking over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick, about 10 minutes. Stir in chambord and remove from heat. Immediately pour into 2 hot sterilized 1 pint canning jars. Once jars are sealed, let them cool completely upside down on top of a clean kitchen towel, and store in the fridge or in the freezer.
ingredients: peaches, vanilla extract, vanilla ice cream, melba sauce, sweetened whipped cream
name: peach melba for 2

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Line a large baking tray with baking parchment. Place bread in a blender or food processor and blend to make fine breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the grated cheese and. Place the egg white and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dip the chicken pieces in the flour first to lightly dust then dip into the egg whites and finally into the cheesy breadcrumbs, turning to evenly coat. Place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, there is no pink meat and the juices run clear when pierced with a sharp knife. Serve the chicken dippers with tomato sauce or mayonnaise.
ingredients: chicken piece, flour, corn chips, spike seasoning, egg, milk
name: erik s cheesy cheetoh chicken

steps: Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces.
ingredients: unsweetened baking chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, walnuts
name: chocolate coconut bonbons

steps: Place the almonds in a food processor or blender, add in coconut milk and water. Process until smooth, scraping down the sides as necessary. Add the rum, grenadine and ice. Blend until smooth and thick. Serve immediately, garnish with sliced strawberries if desired.
ingredients: malibu rum, dark creme de cacao, creme de noyaux, ice cream, pineapple juice, grenadine
name: creamy almond joy

steps: Preheat the oven to 350f. Melt the chocolate in the microwave or in a heavy pot on low heat. Pour it evenly into the unbaked pie shell. In a large bowl, mix the eggs, corn syrup, sugar, butter, and vanilla well. Stir in the walnuts. Pour the mixture into the chocolate-lined pie shell and bake until the filling is set, 45 to 50 minutes. Remove to a rack and let cool. The pie may be made ahead several days, or frozen for up to 3 months. Serve with whipped cream if desired.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, margarine, heavy cream, karo light corn syrup, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, macadamia nuts, 9 inch pie shell
name: chocolate macadamia nut pie

steps: In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, water, tabasco and salt in a bowl and whisk until smooth. In a large non-stick omelette pan, melt the butter and add the eggs, water, tabasco and salt in a bowl and whisk until smooth. Spread the soft goat cheese equally over the slices of toast. Add the scrambled eggs on top of the goat cheese and cut each of the toast slices in half. Garnish with sun dried tomatoes, basil leaves, and drizzle of pesto.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, bacon, sour cream, dry curd cottage cheese, salt, pepper, dill
name: turos csusza dry curd cottage cheese and noodles

steps: In a large pot with boiling salted water cook pasta until al dente. Drain. In a large saucepan heat the italian dressing and olive oil together over medium heat. Add drained spaghetti. Toss well to coat. Add chopped tomatoes, cooked chicken, and grated parmesan cheese and toss lightly. Serve warm.
ingredients: rotini pasta, oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, red peppers, italian dressing, chili powder, salsa, sour cream, cheddar cheese
name: fiesta chicken pasta

steps: Melt chocolate in microwave on med. Power. Stir occasionally. Set aside.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate morsels, orange liqueur, chocolate frosting, candy sprinkles
name: chocolate truffles in a flash

steps: Melt pork chops in skillet. Add pork chops to pan. Bring to a boil and reduce until thickened. Add apple cider vinegar, ketchup, ginger, garlic powder, red pepper flakes. Return pork chops to pan
ingredients: pork chops, chicken broth, brown sugar, soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, ketchup, ginger, garlic powder, red pepper flakes
name: bourbon chops

steps: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour milk and chocolate syrup over the ice. Add cold coffee and stir well until chocolate syrup is dissolved. Can be fancied up with a dollop of whipped cream, a shot of kahlua, and a few curls of shaved chocolate if you like. Diabetics and dieters can substitute sugar-free chocolate syrup.
ingredients: regular grind coffee, water, soymilk, splenda sugar substitute, guar gum, ice cubes, sugar-free chocolate syrup
name: chocolate coffee frappuccino

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir into the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm.
ingredients: unsalted butter, semisweet baking chocolate, powdered sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, egg yolk, all-purpose flour
name: our favorite brownies

steps: Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt, pepper, olive oilpreparation:Place cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jal
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, white onion, green onion, fresh cilantro, fresh flat-leaf parsley, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, salt
name: east african tomato chutney

steps: Put your brats in a large pot and dump in the 2 beers, onion, season all and garlic powder. Add water until the brats are fully covered. Cook 20 minutes on medium heat, meanwhile, heat up your grill. Transfer your brats to the grill and cook 4-5 minutes on each side. Be careful not to pierce the brats with a fork or anything because this will let the good tasting juices out. Discard the beer & onion mixture. Place a slice of cheese in each hot dog bun and add your brats on top. Add desired condiments.
ingredients: bratwursts, lager beer, onions, olive oil, green pepper, red pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hoagie rolls, mustard
name: midwestern style beer brats

steps: Wash tomatoes, and cut into wedges to grind. Grind the tomatoes, onions, and peppers. Put together in a big container or pan, and put the salt over these 3 ingredients, and let. Stand for 5 hours. Drain off all liquid, and then add sugar, celery seed, mustard seed, vinegar, and tumeric powder. Boil all for 25 minutes. Put in hot jars while relish is hot, and process in a hot water bath for 15 minutes. Make sure the seal is down on top of canning jar when completed.
ingredients: tomatoes, green peppers, onion, salt, celery, mustard seeds, vinegar, sugar
name: chicago hot relish

steps: In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion over medium heat. Drain off excess fat. Stir in the remaining ingredients until well blended. Cover and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve hot on your favorite buns or bread.
ingredients: hamburger, onion, brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, water, cornstarch
name: barbecue sloppy joes

steps: Sift dry ingrediants in one bowl, and, using a fork, lightly beat the wet ingrediants in a serapate bowl. Add the dry into the wet and add the chocolate chips, mixing until just combined. Pour into a preheated greased waffle iron, and i cook mine for 3-4 minutes with my waffle iron. This recipe yeilds 4 square waffles for me. These freeze well.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, unsweetened chocolate square, flour
name: chocolate waffle cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: baking potatoes, parmesan cheese, salt, garlic powder, paprika, margarine
name: cheesy oven fries

steps: Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium heat for one minute. Add garlic. The instant it begins to sizzle, add spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is completely wilted. Turn heat to low. Stir in sugar and soy sauce. Cook for a few more moments. Turn off heat. Taste to see if you need additional salt or soy sauce. Serve hot, warm, room temp or cold. Before serving, drizzle with remaining sesame oil and spinkle with sesame seeds.
ingredients: fresh spinach, soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, garlic, sugar, vinegar, black pepper
name: sigumchi namul korean spinach salad kimchi

steps: In a heavy saucepan, gently saute the onions in the butter until soft and translucent. Add milk and bring to a simmer. Stir in cheddar cheese until melted and smooth. Whisk together cornstarch and whiskey until smooth. While constantly stirring, slowly pour whiskey mixture into cheese mixture and continue to cook until thickened. Pour cheddar whiskey fondue into a fondue pot or heat-proof bowl. Serve with rye or onion bread cubes as dippers.
ingredients: swiss cheese, american cheese, cornstarch, dry mustard, worcestershire sauce, beer
name: cheese fondue

steps: In 1 quart saucepan, combine sugar and cornstarch. Gradually stir in water until smooth. Cook over medium heat, stirring often until boiling. Boil 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir in butter, juice, and peel until butter is melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: onion, butter, honey, lemon, juice of, soy sauce, orange peel, orange juice, cornstarch
name: orange barbecue sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Season chops with salt and pepper-brown in 1 tbs. Butter. Place in 9x13 baking dish. Melt remaining tbs. Butter-lightly brown diced apple-sprinkle over chops. Cover chops and apple with undrained sauerkraut. Separate onion into rings-sprinkle over kraut. Sprinkle on caraway seeds. Sprinkle on brown sugar. Pour onion soup over all. Cover with foil-bake for 1 hour.
ingredients: pork loin roast, caraway seed, black pepper, baking apple, sauerkraut, brown sugar, butter, salt
name: crock pot pork and sauerkraut

steps: Heat water in a large nonstick sauce pan, over medium heat. Add the cauliflower, onion, garlic, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, red curry paste, vegetable broth, coconut milk, milk, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and simmer until all ingredients are well cooked. Using an immersion blender, puree all ingredients to desired smoothness and return to heat. Lower temperature and add milk and coconut milk. Heat through and serve.
ingredients: water, vegetable broth, cauliflower, carrots, onion, parsley, salt, white pepper
name: creamy cauliflower soup

steps: Cover and bake at 450 for 20 minute or until heated through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, light cream cheese, portabella mushroom, refrigerated reduced-fat crescent rolls, italian seasoning
name: super easy chicken in a blanket

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with nonstick pan coating or grease lightly with solid shortening. Cut potatoes into 1 inch cubes. Place half in a prepared baking dish. Sprinkle half of the salt, pepper and bacon. Top with half of the sour cream & cheese. Repeat layers. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped green onions to garnish.
ingredients: sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, chicken broth, onions, butter, fresh ground pepper, frozen hash browns, cream of chicken soup, corn flakes, fresh parsley
name: low cal potato casserole

steps: Put jello in a small bowl and mix with warm water. Add whipped topping and mix until smooth. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, tapioca, strawberry gelatin, warm water, fresh strawberries, cool whip
name: strawberry jello tapioca fluff

steps: Mix all ingredients except the cream cheese together and pour over the bread. Stuff randomly with chunks of the cream cheese. Refrigerate overnight and bake at 350 for 45-60 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar and serve with assorted warm syrups.
ingredients: french bread, eggs, milk, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, butter, brown sugar, light corn syrup
name: baked french toast

steps: Cut cucumber in half lengthwise. Remove and discard seeds. Cut a thin slice from bottom if necessary so they sit flat. In a bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Spoon into the cucumbers. Serve immediately.
ingredients: cucumbers, cooked chicken breast, cheddar cheese, celery, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, onion, lemon juice, salt, pepper
name: chicken cucumber boats

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute garlic and artichokes 3-5 minutes, add remaining ingredients and lower heat to medium low. Simmer about 10 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: marinated artichoke hearts, eggs, onions, dried oregano, dried parsley, sharp cheddar cheese, garlic
name: suz s artichoke canapes

steps: Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness.
ingredients: cornstarch, cold water, carrots, onions, coarse salt, ground black pepper, chuck roast, worcestershire sauce
name: slow cooker pot roast

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Whisk together all ingredients until well blended. Pour dressing mixture over coleslaw mix and toss to coat. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: sweet onions, seasoned rice vinegar, salt, mayonnaise, coleslaw mix
name: 4 ingredient tangy coleslaw

steps: Heat a saute pan on medium high heat. Add in garlic, butter, wine, and half and half. Cook for 10 minutes or until reduced by half. Add in the fresh basil and the clams. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Portion a half cup of linguini on each plate, top each plate with equal portions of the clam sauce. Garnish with parmesean cheese and chopped fresh parsley and enjoy.
ingredients: linguine, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese
name: linguini
