steps: Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Combine the rest of the ingredients in a medium pot and heat on medium high. Stirring occasionally until cream cheese is incorporated. Pour sauce over chicken in crock pot, and heat on low approximately 4 hours until chicken is tender and falling apart. Sprinkle with parsley flakes. Serve over pasta, egg noodles, or rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, dried thyme, fresh ground black pepper, salt, chicken stock, cooking sherry, sliced mushrooms, whipping cream, dijon mustard, cornstarch
name: chicken with mushrooms in the crockpot inspired by breezermom s

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all of the ingredients. Form meat mixture into a loaf and place into a casserole dish. Bake for 50-60 minutes. Nice with scalloped potatoes and steamed green beans.
ingredients: ground lean pork, mcintosh apples, breadcrumbs, chili powder, dry mustard, worcestershire sauce, bacon, apple jelly, applesauce, salt and pepper
name: pork and apple meatloaf

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the water, sugar-free lemon jell-o powder, lemons, rind of, apple juice, fat-free whipped topping, frozen raspberries. Pour into container such as a bowl or individual cups. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: boiling water, sugar-free lemon jell-o powder, lemons, rind of, apple juice, fat-free whipped topping, frozen raspberries
name: delightful lemon mousse

steps: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter over medium-high heat. Whisk in 1 jar of clam juice, until smooth. Stir in 1 jar of baby clams, until smooth. Pour in half-and-half, and rest of clam juice, stirring constantly. Stir in clams, reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes. Season with pepper and serve.
ingredients: onion, unsalted margarine, flour, pepper, baby clams, worcestershire sauce, half-and-half, egg yolk
name: creamy clam bisque

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix first 7 ingredients by hand or in blender. Pour into pie crust, bake 30 minutes until set. Remove and refrigerate overnight. Spread lemon jell-o powder on top, serve.
ingredients: sugar-free lemon jell-o powder, cream cheese, splenda sugar substitute, boiling water, vanilla coffee syrup
name: low carb lemon cheesecake

steps: In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large skillet, saute shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprikapreparation:In a large
ingredients: water, dry white wine, low sodium soy sauce, szechwan pepper, large shrimp, sweet and sour sauce, chinese mustard
name: chilled shrimp in chinese mustard sauce

steps: Steep 1 tea bag, 6 mint stems and cayenne pepper in 2 cups of boiling water. Strain the mixture, keeping only the liquid. Add the sugar, lemon juice and cinnamon stick to the tea. Serve in a tall glass with ice, add a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice for garnishing.
ingredients: orange juice, tea bags, lemon juice, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, ground nutmeg, lemon slices
name: tropical tea

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the herbs alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: small potato, olive oil, garlic cloves, coarse salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, rosemary, thyme, sage, oregano
name: roasted potatoes in olive oil and herbs

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Saute chicken in broth for 2 minutes. Add peppers, onions, garlic, salsa and taco seasoning. Cook until veggies are soft. Place tortillas on a baking sheet and spread refried beans onto half of each trotilla., top with chicken and veggie mixture and shredded cheese. Fold each tortilla over and bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 minutes. Serve with fat free sour cream and salsa.
ingredients: flour tortillas, cooked chicken, paprika, thyme, ground allspice, crushed red pepper flakes, green onions, fresh peaches, monterey jack cheese
name: caribbean chicken quesadillas

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions and drain completely. Stir in parmesan cheese. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, lite olive oil, white wine, chicken broth, broccoli floret, cooked pasta, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese
name: broccoli garlic pasta for one

steps: Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast half, jamaican jerk spice, frozen peppers and onions, orange juice, cornstarch
name: jerk seasoned chicken and pepper saute

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm.
ingredients: spaghetti squash, unsalted butter, extra virgin olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chicken sausage, plain breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, basil leaves
name: spaghetti squash and meatballs

steps: Preheat oven to 425f place a 10-inch cast iron skillet into the oven. In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, salt, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, eggs, cream, water, butter, splenda sugar substitute, and stir to combine. Pour batter into the skillet. Bake until the cornbread is golden brown and springs back upon the touch, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: yellow cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, vegetable oil, light butter, eggs, low-fat milk
name: low fat cornbread

steps: Place all the ingredients in a bowl. Beat until blended well. Pour into a greased flan dish. Bake for about one hour at 175 degrees celsius. When baked it will surprisingly have a base, a custard centre, and a coconut topping.
ingredients: butter, dark brown sugar, dark corn syrup, molasses, cinnamon, semi-sweet chocolate chips, eggs, kahlua, graham cracker pie crust
name: schadenfreude pie

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: turkey neck, salt and pepper, water, onion, green bell pepper, rice, stock
name: turkey necks with rice

steps: Heat oil in large pan, add onion, garlic, zucchini, carrots, self-raising flour, eggs, cheese, chili sauce, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, about 5 mins or until onion is soft. Add vegetables and cook, stirring, about 5 mins or until any liquid is evaporated. Cool. Combine vegetable mixture with sifted flour and remaining ingredients in a medium bowl. Mix well. Spread mixture into prepared pan. Bake in moderate oven for about 30 mins or until firm.
ingredients: butter-flavored cooking spray, eggs, heavy cream, dijon mustard, baby spinach leaves, tomatoes, jarlsberg cheese, fresh basil leaf
name: cheesy spinach tomato strata

steps: In a large pot, combine oil and onion. Cook over medium heat for 1 minute, or until sizzling. Add broth, pasta, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Add meatballs and spinach. Reduce heat to low. Cook for 5 minutes or until pasta is tender.
ingredients: chicken broth, italian pastina, eggs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley
name: zuppa di pollo italian chicken soup with pasta cheese

steps: In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoned bread crumbs, seasoning salt, cooking spray, laughing cow cheese, lean ham
name: chicken with laughing cow cheese

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown.
ingredients: fresh spinach, onions, nonfat milk, light cheddar cheese, sole fillets, lemon juice, salt and pepper, paprika
name: sole and spinach casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool.
ingredients: egg white, sugar, garlic salt, hot pepper sauce, ground cumin, chili powder, whole almond
name: spiced almonds

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon and zest. Add the milk and mix until you have a smooth and lump free batter. Add the egg and vanilla, mix, now add the melted butter and mix again. Heat a non-stick frying. Dip and coat the bread in the batter, fry until light golden.
ingredients: light brown sugar, unsalted butter, whole milk, eggs, vanilla, lemon juice, ground cinnamon, salt, cayenne pepper, whole wheat bread
name: deen bros cinnamon french toast

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cream cheese, mayonnaise, pecans, black olives, olive juice, pepper and sauté until melted. Add the mayonnaise. Add the black olives. Add the olive juice. Add
ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, pecans, black olives, olive juice, pepper
name: heloises olive nut sandwich spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, brown sugar, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisinspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f mix together the butter, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour
ingredients: light brown sugar, shortening, milk, vanilla, oats, flour, baking soda, salt, raisins
name: andrea s oatmeal raisin cookies

steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick saucepan. Add the cauliflower, sliced onion, and garlic. Split the vanilla pod and scrape out the seeds, adding them to the contents of the saucepan. Simmer the soup for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Remove from heat and stir in the heavy cream, then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour the mixture into a blender, in batches if necessary, and whir until smooth or to desired texture. Serve immediately with good crusty bread. Also good garnished with a shaving of parmesan or asiago.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, potato, cauliflower, chicken stock, milk, nutmeg, salt & pepper, parsley
name: the best cauliflower soup ever

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, raisins, dates, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnutspreparation:Preheat oven to 350f.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, salted peanuts, potato chips
name: nutchos

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Beat egg whites, vanilla and cream of tartar on high speed using an electric mixer, until soft peaks form. Combine sugar and cocoa. Gradually add sugar mixture, one tablespoon at a time, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form. Gently fold in chocolate chips. Drop by spoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, or until meringues are firm and they are very lightly browned underneath. Allow to cool on wire rack. Drizzle melted chocolate over cookies.
ingredients: cocoa, sugar, salt, milk, boiling water
name: miss jean s cocoa

steps: Heat the oil in a pan add leeks and garlic and cook until soft. Add carrots, garlic, stock and water and cook covered until pumpkin is soft. Spoon 2 cups of liquid out, blend or process soup until smooth. Add pepper to your liking. Serve soup in bowls pour a about 1-2 tablespoons of cream over top and serve immediately. Makes about 6-8 servings great for lunches or as a starter.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, leeks, potato, vegetable broth, fresh parsley, borlotti beans
name: leek and bean soup

steps: In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper.
ingredients: italian turkey sausage, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, onion, chicken broth, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves
name: turkey sausage and bell peppers weight watchers style

steps: Mix all ingredients in a small bowl and let stand for 3 hours. Process in a blender on pulse until seeds are bruised and broken. Add dry vinegar, salt, allspice, and water, mix well. Cover loosely, and allow to stand overnight. Refrigerate unused portions.
ingredients: white vinegar, mustard powder, water, brown sugar, eggs
name: gourmet mustard

steps: Heat olive oil in a large saut pan over high heat. Add the onions, bell peppers, and garlic. Saut until they are soft and golden, about 10 minutes. Cover and reduce the heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft, about 45 minutes. Drain and season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: onion, olive oil, eggs, butter, salt and pepper, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, garlic powder
name: omlet

steps: Cover houmous with water and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, until liquid is thickened and coats houmous, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in lemon slices. Transfer to a shallow dish and marinate, chilled, at least 24 hours. These will keep for 1 month if kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: chickpeas, olive oil, garlic clove, lemon juice, harissa, tomato puree
name: harissa spiked houmous

steps: In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you german yogurt salad.
ingredients: plain yogurt, sugar, canola oil, white balsamic vinegar, chives, onion, dill, garlic, mustard
name: german yogurt salad dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices.
ingredients: flax seed meal, baking powder, salt, splenda sugar substitute, eggs, water, olive oil
name: low carb flax flat bread

steps: In a large saucepan, mix the eggs, sugar, and salt, if used. Stir in 2 cups milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and mixture coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat and add 2 cups milk and extract. Chill several hours or overnight. Whirl in blender before serving. Add rum or brandy as desired, top with whipped cream and ground nutmeg.
ingredients: butter, egg, sugar, light corn syrup, water, vanilla
name: egg butter

steps: Put all the above into a roaster. Stir occasionally cook at 250 - 300 deg. For most of the day. Serve the sausage and peppers and onions on french bread. Always well liked.
ingredients: hot sausage, water, red wine, onion, green peppers, tomato paste, hoagie rolls
name: hot sausage sandwiches

steps: Mix powdered sugar with milk and use as glaze for cinnamon rolls. Bake at 425 degrees for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in the pan for 5 minutes. Top each prepared muffin cup with a biscuit. Bake at 425 degrees for
ingredients: pecans, brown sugar, rolls, butter, cinnamon, butterscotch pudding
name: mom s sticky buns

steps: Melt butter over low heat in large saucepan. Add flour, heat until bubbly. Add milk and light cream. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
ingredients: italian pastina, heavy cream, sugar, butter, cinnamon
name: pasta pudding

steps: Place in crock pot. Cover and cook on high for one hour. Turn crock pot to high. Combine whole berry cranberry sauce, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham, maple syrup, cider
ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, maple syrup, cider vinegar, ground mustard, ham
name: cranberry glazed ham

steps: Melt butter in a 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat. Add brown sugar, allspice and nutmeg and stir until sugar dissolves. Add banana liqueur and bring sauce to simmer. Add bananas and cook for 1 minute on each side, carefully spooning sauce over bananas as they are cooking. Remove bananas from pan to a serving dish. Bring sauce to a simmer and carefully add the rum. If the sauce is very hot, the alcohol will flame on its own. If not, using stick flame, carefully ignite and continue cooking until flame dies out, approximately 1 to 2 minutes. If sauce is too thin, cook for 1 to 2 minutes until it is syrupy in consistency. Immediately spoon the sauce over bananas and serve.
ingredients: bananas, butter, light brown sugar, cinnamon, vanilla extract, salt, amaretto
name: amaretto bananas foster

steps: Heat olive oil in pan over medium heat and saute garlic 1 minute. Add potatoes and turn to coat with oil. Add lemon juice, salt& pepper and mix. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: water, chicken bouillon powder, orzo pasta, butter, garlic, fresh lemon rind, fresh lemon juice, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper
name: lemon garlic parmesan orzo

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf
name: roasted cherry tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Mix first four ingredients and add hot water. Knead well. Let stand 10 minutes. Cut into desired size. Fry in hot grease.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, eggs, kiwi fruit
name: kiwi quick bread

steps: Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix together all ingredients except chicken or fish, in a flat dish. Moisten chicken with water. Coat with mixture. Place in a shallow baking dish. Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is baked through. At this time you may put the chicken under the broiler to turn the crust to gold. Watch carefully so the chicken does not burn, while under the broiler.
ingredients: pasta sauce, breaded chicken nuggets, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: quick easy chicken parmesan

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Cover a cookie sheet with tin foil. Lightly spray broccoli and garlic with non-fat cooking spray. Arrange on the cookie sheet in a single layer. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and oregano. Roast in the oven for 20 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: butter-flavored cooking spray, pecans, unseasoned breadcrumbs, dried marjoram, dried chervil, parsley, broccoli, salt and pepper
name: herb crumbled broccoli

steps: Wrap wieners tightly with bacon and place in the freezer for at least 20 minutes to help the bacon adhere to the wieners better. Heat a non-stick stove top grill or outdoor grill, oiling lightly, and cook wieners until the bacon is slightly crispy. Open buns and toast lightly over the grill or in a broiler. Insert wieners into buns and top with cheese. Wrap with foil and return to grill for a few minutes to allow cheese to melt. Serve with desired condiments along with potato salad or potato chips and baked beans.
ingredients: cocktail franks, buttermilk biscuits, sharp cheddar cheese, mustard
name: pillow dogs

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves.
ingredients: crookneck yellow squash, onion, salt, sugar, oil, egg, baking powder, all-purpose flour, butter
name: mom s yellow squash fritters

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: ground beef, onion white, cream of mushroom soup, taco sauce, enchilada sauce, green chilies, water, corn tortillas, salt, cheddar cheese
name: wilma s mexican casserole

steps: Put caramel raisin fudge in a large bowl and mix well. Pour into a greased 9x9 inch baking pan. Cool at room temperature.
ingredients: caramels, dark chocolate, sweetened condensed milk, butter cookie, raisins
name: caramel raisin fudge

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, and vanilla. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden.
ingredients: french vanilla cake mix, blueberry pie filling, eggs, cinnamon
name: easy blueberry cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick spray. Slice the onions width wise and then break them apart into rings. Put the flour in 1 bowl, the egg whites into a second, and into the third put the bread crumbs and all the spices. Dip each onion ring into the flour, then the egg whites, and then the bread crumbs. Place them on the baking sheet and then repeat with the next ring. Bake them all for about 20 minutes or until crispy.
ingredients: flour, cornstarch, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, seasoning salt, beer, eggs, onion
name: onion haystacks

steps: Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl.
ingredients: mushroom, butter, onions, seasoned stuffing mix, cashews, white wine
name: cashew stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 220c. Spread the halibut topping over the halibut base. Scatter with garlic, chilli, basil leaves, dried herbs and pinch of salt. Add walnuts, walnuts, then cheese. Bake until cooked. About 12 - 15 minutes.
ingredients: california walnuts, halibut fillets, eggs, water, flour, olive oil, soy sauce, honey, salt and pepper
name: walnut crusted halibut with honey soy sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve.
ingredients: plain flour, mustard powder, garlic salt, butter, fresh parsley, fresh basil, fresh chives, tasty cheese, egg yolk
name: herb and garlic triangles

steps: In a large skillet sprayed with butter-flavored cooking spray, saute celery and onion for 6 to 8 minutes or until just tender. Stir in rice and corn. In a small bowl, combine dry milk powder and water. Add milk mixture to the celery mixture. Mix well to combine. Stir cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and lemon pepper into celery mixture. Lower heat and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: olive oil, celery, onion, mushroom, brown rice, cheddar cheese, parsley
name: brown rice and cheese

steps: Mix all ingredients for the base and put into greased 8x8 pan. Spread jam over base. Mix the topping together well and spread over jam. Bake at 300 degrees for 20 minutes. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg yolks, orange, juice and zest of, flour, baking powder, chocolate chips, egg whites
name: orange slice square

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Line two baking sheets with baking parchment and set aside. Beat egg whites and salt in small bowl at high electric-mixer speed until frothy. With mixer still at high speed, add sugar gradually and continue beating until meringue peaks stiffly. Beat in vanilla, then by hand fold in lemon zest. Drop meringue from rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets, spacing 2-inches apart. Set in oven, immediately turn oven off, and let cookies remain in the oven for 2 hours peel meringue off parchment and store in airtight container.
ingredients: sugar, egg, lemon zest, lemon juice, butter, powdered sugar, flour, salt
name: lemon snowdrop cookies

steps: Boil onion rings in salt water for 3 hours. Peel skin from the onion rings. Mix remaining ingredients in a large, nonreactive pot and bring to a boil. Add meat and boil for 10 minutes. Cool and store in refridgerator for one week. Slice onion thinly to serve.
ingredients: onion, boiling water, white vinegar, water, sugar, salt, hot pepper sauce
name: tre s pickled onion rings

steps: Cream butter and granulated sugar. Pour over batter. Bake at 350f for 1 hour.
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, granulated sugar, milk, cooking apples, lemon juice, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, boiling water, sweetened whipped cream
name: caramel apple dessert squares

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl, combine eggs, milk, and seasonings. Beat well and pour into casserole. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, bake casserole at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
ingredients: sausage, new potatoes, red peppers, sweet onions, eggs, table cream
name: breakfast hash

steps: Scoop egg yolks into bowl. Set aside egg whites. Add mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper to yolks. Mash together with fork until smooth. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle tops with paprika,.
ingredients: hardboiled egg, mayonnaise, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, apple cider vinegar, salt, paprika
name: nyte s deviled eggs

steps: In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns.
ingredients: lean ground beef, salt, pizza crust, ketchup, thousand island dressing, dill pickle, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, onion, lettuce
name: iowa girl cheeseburger pizza with secret sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain and cut the artichokes into smaller pieces and place in a medium size bowl. Add the spinach, garlic and shallots. Mix the chicken broth and wine and pour over spinach and artichokes mixture. Mix well and set aside. Skin the thighs and remove any fat. Place in a 9 inch square baking dish. Mix the chicken soup, milk and green chilies together and set aside. Spread spinach mixture over the chicken. Pour soup mixture over spinach mixture. Cover with a lid or foil. Put it in the oven and bake for 1 hour or until chicken is done and juices are hot and bubbly.
ingredients: flour, black pepper, olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, roasted red peppers, olives, marinated artichokes, dry pasta
name: chicken artichokes roasted peppers and olives

steps: Preheat oven to 425f set a wire rack on a baking sheet and coat it with cooking spray. Place breadcrumbs, almonds, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a food processor. Pulse until the almonds are coarsely chopped. Transfer the mixture to a shallow dish. Place egg white in another shallow dish. Dip both sides of each pork slice in egg white, then evenly coat with the almond mixture. Place the pork on the prepared rack and coat on both sides with cooking spray. Bake the pork until golden brown and no longer pink in the center, 16 to 18 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk honey, soy sauce and mustard in a small bowl. Serve the pork with the honey-mustard sauce.
ingredients: scallops, cooking spray, dry sherry, dijon mustard, heavy cream, salt and pepper
name: scallops dijon

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: skinless boneless turkey breasts, maple syrup, herb stuffing mix, pecans, apple
name: pecan maple turkey or chicken breast on stuffing

steps: In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried ancho chile powder, pinto beans, low sodium chicken broth, salt and pepper, fresh cilantro leaves
name: healthier refried beans

steps: To make the stuffing, melt butter, add onion, saut gently and add all other ingredients except the fish. Cut each fillet in half lengthwise. Place stuffing on each fillet, roll up and wrap a thin slice of bacon around each roll. Place in a buttered ovenproof dish, cover and bake in a moderate oven for 15 minutes. Remove cover to brown the dish for last five minutes. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.
ingredients: cod fish fillets, bacon, onion, flour, milk, butter, salt and pepper
name: creamed codfish with bacon and onion

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Line a 7x11 pan with parchment paper. In a pan, melt all the butter over medium heat, taking care that it doesnt burn. Set aside to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, stir together the eggs, demerara sugar, and granulated sugar. Stir in the melted butter, salt, vanilla, flour, baking soda, and baking powder. Spoon the batter into the prepared pan in an even layer. Dollop the nutella over the surface of the batter, and swirl the. Bake for 25-30 minutes, checking frequently to make sure the blondies dont overbake. The blondies are done when the batter is puffed and golden, and is still a little moist in the middle. The blondies will collapse slightly once they come out of the oven, and will harden into slice-able pieces in about an hour.
ingredients: unsalted butter, flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, hazelnuts, nutella
name: hazelnut blondies

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake for 45 minutes or until edges are brown. Turn oven off and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove to wire rack to cool. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, miniature peanut butter cups, cream cheese, all-purpose flour, pure vanilla extract, eggs
name: peanut butter cheesecake minis paula deen

steps: Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables, cream
ingredients: cream of broccoli soup, chicken breasts, milk, frozen vegetables
name: crock pot creamy broccoli chicken

steps: Grill the burgers. Mix sour cream, garlic and cucumber in food processor, till well blended. Cover pita breads with tomatoes, lettuce and drizzle with cucumber sauce. Top each with 1 burger and sprinkle with feta cheese. I like to cut off one end of the pita bread and make a pocket burger. Just place everything in the pita pocket.
ingredients: veggie burgers, nonfat sour cream, cucumber, garlic clove, pita breads, plum tomatoes, lettuce
name: veggie gyro burgers

steps: In a medium bowl, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, and salsa. Blend well. Stir in vegetable soup mix and cilantro. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: lean ground beef, beef broth, water, elbow macaroni, condensed cheddar cheese soup, chunky salsa
name: salsa mac and beef

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Wash zucchini, leaving skins on, and grate either by hand or in a food processor. Blot zucchini with paper towels to remove as much moisture as possible. Place in an 8 inch square baking dish that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Cut butter into small pieces and place evenly over zucchini. Bake for 15 minutes, uncovered. Remove from oven and pour off any liquid that has accumulated in the bottom of the dish. Stir in sour cream, salt and pepper. Sprinkle top with parmesan cheese and bake until zucchini is tender and cheese melts. About 5-10 more minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, butter, onion, salt
name: baked zucchini cheddar casserole

steps: Mix everything except crabbetizers. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm.
ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, green onion, garlic, egg roll wraps, egg, sweet and sour sauce
name: crabbetizers

steps: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool completely. Place onions and eggs in a large jar. Add enough vinegar mixture to completely cover. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Use a clean spoon each time you remove eggs for serving. May be refrigerated for up to 1 week.
ingredients: red beets, brown sugar, white vinegar, cold water, salt, cloves, cinnamon stick, hard-cooked eggs
name: son s favorite pickled eggs

steps: Place all ingredients except oil in food processor. Blend until combined. While machine is running slowly pour in oil in thin steady stream. Continue to add oil until mayonnaise reaches desired thickness. Do not over beat.
ingredients: fresh rosemary, water, white vinegar, egg, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, extra virgin olive oil, oil
name: rob evan s charred rosemary mayonnaise

steps: In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. Add onion, cover, and cook over low heat for 4 minutes. Combine beef and egg, mixing well. To beef mixture, add cooked onion, parsley, worcestershire and tabasco sauces and mix well. Shape mixture into 4 large patties, scoring each with a knife. Heat remaining tablespoon of oil in large frying pan. When hot, add meat patties and cook 10 to 12 minutes over medium heat. Turn 4 times during cooking, and once seared, season well. When burgers are done, transfer to ovenproof dish. Cover each burger with a slice of cheese and broil 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: onion, cider vinegar, water, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, irish soda bread, mayonnaise, spicy mustard, corned beef, sage derby cheese
name: open face corned beef and cheese sandwiches with pickled onions

steps: Place pork chops in a slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over chops. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: pork chops, dry breadcrumbs, onions, salt, pepper, milk, cream of mushroom soup
name: stuffed pork chops in mushroom soup

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: onion, garlic clove, water, brown sugar, ketchup, sesame seeds
name: sesame chicken sauce

steps: Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown.
ingredients: veggie burgers, fresh spinach leaves, green onions, water, tomatoes, reduced-fat feta cheese with dried basil and tomato
name: spinach feta burgers

steps: In the crock pot, soak the dried fruits and ginger in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: rump roast, flour, bacon grease, onion soup mix, water, carrots, potatoes, frozen peas
name: granny s pot roast

steps: Wash asparagus and trim away outside of woody stalks. Cut stalks into 1-inch pieces. Melt margarine in a large saucepan over medium heat. Saute asparagus, onion, and potatoes until onion is translucent. Add chicken broth and water, and bring to a boil. Turn down the heat and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes place in blender and blend until vegetables are pureed. Return to saucepan over low heat. Stir in white pepper, nutmeg, cream or half-and-half, and lemon juice. Heat a few minutes longer, but do not allow soup to boil.
ingredients: fresh asparagus, potato, leeks, butter, chicken stock, creme fraiche, salt and pepper
name: irish cream of asparagus soup

steps: Heat a skillet over medium heat until hot but not smoking. Add the lemon juice and saut for 30 seconds. Remove from skillet and reserve. Heat the oil in the same skillet, add the garlic, and saut for 30 seconds. Add the toasted dill, salt and pepper, toss well and serve.
ingredients: head cauliflower, dijon mustard, garlic cloves, lemons, juice of, salt, extra virgin olive oil, fresh dill, fresh ground black pepper
name: lemon roasted cauliflower with dill

steps: In a large mixing bowl, steam rice for 1-2 minutes until the rice is cooked through. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir well, mashing the rice against the sides of the bowl until the mixture holds together. Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray. With dampened hands, pack a heaping cup of the rice mixture into a ball. Roll the ball in the bread crumbs and place on the baking sheet. Repeat the process until all of the rice mixture is used up. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the balls are heated through and crisp on the outside.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, long-grain rice, salt, pepper, chicken stock, fresh spinach, nutmeg, lemon, juice of, butter, feta cheese
name: rice with spinach greek

steps: In a large skillet, saute ground beef and onion over medium heat, stirring often, until beef is browned. Add tomato sauce, chili powder, and worcestershire sauce. Bring mixture to a boil, lower heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Add your favorite regular toppings, too. To make the sauce taste as if it came from a new york pushcart, add a little cinnamon. Oregano will give it a greek or italian flavor and a teaspoon of ground cumin will make it an authentic chili dog.
ingredients: ground beef, chili powder, sugar, tomato puree
name: canton arcade market coney sauce

steps: In a small heavy saucepan, combine milk, cinnamon stick, whole cloves, sugar, cornstarch, ground nutmeg, and vanilla. Reduce heat to low. Continue to cook and stir until thickened. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. Roll into 1-inch balls. Then roll in nuts or sprinkles to coat. Store candies in refrigerator.
ingredients: milk, cinnamon stick, whole cloves, sugar, cornstarch, ground nutmeg
name: santa claus milk

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large shallow dish, combine biscuit mix, pecans, paprika, salt, poultry seasoning, rubbed sage, broiler-fryer chickens, evaporated milk, butterpreparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large shallow dish, combine biscuit mix, pe
ingredients: chicken, corn flakes, cashews, seasoning salt, milk, butter
name: marla s oven fried chicken with cashew crust

steps: Place chicken in pressure cooker and top with cranberry sauce. Bring to pressure and cook 12 minutes. While pressure is released, open top and stir in cooked egg noodles. The dish is ready to serve.
ingredients: chicken breast fillets, camembert cheese, plain flour, egg, water, breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, oil, cranberry sauce
name: cranberry camembert chicken

steps: Add in the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips.
ingredients: marshmallows, fat free chocolate syrup, low-fat graham crackers, fat-free caramel topping
name: diet and have your s mores too

steps: Heat oven to 350f place chunk chicken, cream cheese, ranch dressing, lime juice, barbecue sauce, buffalo wing sauce, mexican blend cheese, red pepper flakes, ground cumin, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder, onion powder,
ingredients: chunk chicken, cream cheese, ranch dressing, lime juice, barbecue sauce, buffalo wing sauce, mexican blend cheese, red pepper flakes, ground cumin, onion powder
name: barbecued buffalo wing dip with a twist

steps: Mix in order given. Bake at 325f for about 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, cream cheese, sugar, egg yolk, vanilla, orange rind, flour, salt, cinnamon
name: joanne s snowflake cookies

steps: In a blender container, combine all ingredients except ice cream. Blend well. Add ice cream. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: orange juice, powdered milk, banana, fresh strawberries, ice cube
name: drink till you drop breakfast shake

steps: Cook noodles according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add garlic. Stir fry 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes or until onion softens. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes.
ingredients: peanut oil, red pepper flakes, chinese cabbage, garlic, rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil, gingerroot, toasted sesame seeds
name: stir fried chinese cabbage

steps: Place beef in shallow roasting pan. Sprinkle granules and soup mix over roast. Pour beef broth over all. Cover and bake in 350 degree oven for about 1 hour or until beef is fork tender. Remove beef. Mix 1 tablespoon drippings and flour in roasting pan. Cook and stir until mixture boils and thickens. Slice beef and serve with gravy.
ingredients: boneless beef cubes, cream of mushroom soup, water, dry onion soup mix
name: easy oven beef and gravy

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Form into small balls and roll in some powdered sugar to coat. Set on greased baking sheets and bake for 12-15 minutes. Cool on wire racks.
ingredients: sweet unsalted butter, vanilla extract, cake flour, egg, salt, ground pecans, powdered sugar
name: sandy s snowballs

steps: Place the meat on top of the meat in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours.
ingredients: chuck roast, carrots, potatoes, yellow onions, condensed golden mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, water, pepper
name: soul pot roast

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a glass bowl. Place the lamb in a extra large heavy-duty plastic bag or glass bowl. Pour the marinade over the lamb, and turn to coat well on all sides. Cover tightly with plastic wrap. Place in the fridge for a minimum of 24 hours. When ready to grill, remove from fridge and save marinade for basting if desired. Turn the grill to high heat. Sear both sides for about 5 minutes on each side. Reduce grill temperature to medium heat and finish cooking the lamb. You may baste the lamb with the leftover marinade if desired.
ingredients: plain yogurt, olive oil, lemon, zest of, fresh lemon juice, fresh rosemary leaf, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, butterflied leg of lamb
name: grilled leg of lamb

steps: Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoon jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: fresh spinach, pear, walnuts, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, orange juice, olive oil
name: spinach pear and toasted walnut salad

steps: Boil in the water over medium heat for 5 to 6 minutes, until the milk is soft and the milk is very thick. Keep stifring to incorporate the starch from the milk into the milk and to prevent the milk from sticking to the bottom of the pot. Add the sugar, almonds, lemons, water, salt, ground cardamom, and nutmeg and cook for another 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat. Sprinkle with the rose water. Serve warm or chilled in dessert bowls.
ingredients: yogurt, sugar, cardamoms, almonds, lemons, water, salt
name: cardamom lassi

steps: In a resealable storage bag thoroughly combine all ingredients except the steak, when combined add steak. Seal bag, turn to coat. Place in the refrigerator and marinate 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Remove meat from marinade and discard marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer steak to work surface and let stand 5 minutes. Cut across grain into thin strips. Arrange on a platter and serve.
ingredients: fresh goat cheese, fresh chives, fresh parsley, fresh basil, beef tenderloin steaks, garlic clove, salt and pepper
name: grilled steak with creamy herbed goat cheese sauce

steps: Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown.
ingredients: brownie mix, all-purpose flour, canola oil, eggs, water, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts
name: brownie mix double chocolate chip cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: sugar cookie mix, all-purpose flour, butter, egg, sugar, ground cinnamon, green decorating icing, red decorating icing
name: holiday snickerdoodles

steps: Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas, miniature marshmallows, instant vanilla pudding, cool whippreparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and
ingredients: pineapple chunks, strawberries, blueberries, seedless grapes, instant banana pudding mix, milk, sour cream, crushed pineapple
name: trifle fruit salad

steps: Heat the grill to high. Brush the eggplant slices with some of the oil. Grill the eggplant slices on both sides until brown, then place them in the bottom of a lightly greased, small shallow baking pan that will fit under the grill, and set aside. Over a medium heat, add the rest of the oil to a small saut pan, add the cherry tomatoes and garlic and saut for a couple of minutes, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes begin to soften. While still stirring, add the capers and leave the pan over the heat for an additional minute. Remove the pan from the heat. Cover the eggplant slices with the tomato, garlic and capers, season to taste and spoon the ricotta over the tomatoes. Place the baking pan under the grill until the ricotta starts to bubble. Scatter the basil leaves over the top and serve.
ingredients: eggplants, salt, olive oil, tabasco sauce, garlic cloves, balsamic vinegar, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper
name: spicy eggplant cutlets

steps: Bake at 375 for 8-10 minutes or until the bread is golden and cheese is melted.
ingredients: reduced-fat mayonnaise, dijon mustard, cayenne, pumpernickel cocktail bread, fontina cheese, turkey pastrami, fresh ground black pepper, sauerkraut, vegetable oil
name: mini reubens

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all ingredients into a large mixing bowl and mix until just moistened. Spoon into lined or nonstick, sprayed mini muffin pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove muffins from the tray and cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: bananas, sugar, low-fat vanilla yogurt, unsalted butter, vanilla extract, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt
name: flying biscuit cafe low fat banana muffins

steps: Heat oven to 425. Prepare pie crust as directed on package for 2 pie using a 9 in pan. In large saucepan combine gravy, and cornstarch. Add frozen mixxed vegetables, mushrooms, worcestershire sauce and mix well. Cook over med-high heat until bubbly. Stir in the roast beef. Pour into pie crust lined pan. Top with the second crust and flute. Cut decorations as you like but at least put several slits into top crust to allow steam to escape. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of crust with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: lean ground beef, stewed tomatoes, onion, green pepper, barbecue sauce, chili powder, pepper, corn muffin mix
name: beef pie

steps: Place all ingredients in a sauce pot. Cook on high heat until mixture starts to boil. Stirring occasionally until berries pop. Lower heat to medium and using the back of a large wooden spoon, squeeze the grapes against the side of pot or use a potato masher to pop grapes, leaving some whole. The pectin from the grapes and sugar will thicken the sauce as well as the heat the reducing the mixture.
ingredients: cranberry juice cocktail, grapefruit juice, orange juice, sugar, ginger ale
name: cranberry fizz non alcoholic

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, mix all of the dry ingredients, excluding the chocolate chips. Stir in the wet ingredients. Add the chocolate chips. If the batter is too dry, add 1tbs of soymilk. Bake tablespoon-sized cookies on a greased cookie sheet for 7-10 minutes. Be sure to place the cookies about 2 apart, because they expand as they bake.
ingredients: banana, canola oil, sugar, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, quick-cooking oatmeal, chocolate chips
name: banana everything cookies from vegan cookies take over the world

steps: Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Drain excess marinade from salmon. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre.
ingredients: fresh lime juice, beer, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, garlic, salmon fillet, red bell peppers, lime zest, fresh ground black pepper
name: beer and lime marinated salmon

steps: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl combine the macaroni, eggs, red potatoes, salt, vinegar, mayonnaise, ground allspice, pepper, frozen peas. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for 2 hours. Just before serving add bacon.
ingredients: macaroni, eggs, red potatoes, salt, vinegar, mayonnaise, ground allspice, pepper, frozen peas
name: macaroni potato salad

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice.
ingredients: panko breadcrumbs, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper, chicken breasts, fresh lemon juice, honey, tabasco sauce, extra virgin olive oil
name: fiery lemon glazed chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place salmon in 8-inch baking dish and set aside. In a small cup or bowl mix together next 3 ingredients and pour over salmon. Bake for 20 - 25 minutes or until cooked through. Sprinkle with salt, parsley and green onion.
ingredients: salmon fillets, olive oil, onion, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper, paprika
name: grilled soy ginger salmon

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour.
ingredients: mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, herb with garlic soup mix, boneless chicken breasts, dry breadcrumbs, butter, mozzarella cheese
name: savory baked garlic chicken

steps: Heat oven to 425. Prepare patties as directed on package for 2 patties using a 9 in pan. In large saucepan combine gravy, and cornstarch. Add frozen mixxed vegetables, mushrooms, worcestershire sauce and mix well. Cook over med-high heat until bubbly. Stir in the roast beef. Pour into pie crust lined pan. Top with the second patties and flute. Cut decorations as you like but at least put several slits into top patties to allow steam to escape. Bake at 425 for 30-45 mins or until patties are golden brown and filling is bubbly. Cover edge of patties with strips of foil after the first 15 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning.
ingredients: roast beef, phyllo pastry, butter, parsley, chives, horseradish cream
name: beef and horseradish bonbons

steps: Put the glazed bananas in a bowl with the lemon juice and honey. Add the lemon juice and honey and stir until dissolved. Add the
ingredients: butter, liquid honey, lemon juice, bananas, liqueur
name: grilled glazed bananas

steps: In a large skillet, cook pork chops over medium high heat, turning once until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate. Add rice and seasonings from mix to skillet, along with water, tomatoes and their liquids, scallions and raisins. Mix well. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and place pork chops on top of the rice. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes or until rice is cooked.
ingredients: pork chops, oil, onions, rice, vegetable juice
name: pork chops and pink rice

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Chop onions and slice mushrooms. Melt margarine in skillet. Saute onions until transparent. Add mushrooms. Cover and cook 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Mix together egg, flour, non-dairy milk and wine. Salt and pepper to taste. Pour into pie crust. Form lattice strips from second crust and place on top of quiche. Bake for 2 minutes.
ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, butter, frozen spinach, swiss cheese, eggs, half-and-half cream, salt and pepper
name: spinach quiche tarts

steps: In a large skillet, saute mushrooms in butter until lightly browned, 5 minutes. Set aside. Bring water to a boil in medium saucepan. Slowly add cornmeal, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and soupy. Continue cooking and stirring over medium heat until mixture is as thick as cooked oatmeal. Stir in cheese and half-and-half. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in mushrooms. Serve immediately.
ingredients: polenta, cooking spray, mushrooms, garlic, salt, classico alfredo with sun dried tomatoes, fresh basil, fontina cheese
name: polenta gratin with mushrooms and fontina

steps: Heat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add in the butter, cheese, onion, flour tortillas, salsa, bacon, salt and pepper to taste, and cook, stirring, until barely set. Stir in the bacon. Remove the pan from the heat. Put the quesadillas on a flat surface and spoon half of the eggs on each tortilla. Top with equally with cheese. Fold quesadillas in half. Brush lightly with oil. Wipe out the skillet and heat over medium heat. Toast the quesadillas until lightly browned on both sides, about 1 minute per side. Serve hot.
ingredients: monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, onion, flour tortillas, salsa
name: cheese quesadillas

steps: In large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in corn. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 400 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm.
ingredients: flour, whole kernel corn, eggs, milk, salt, baking powder, shortening
name: grandpa s favorite corn fritters

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes.
ingredients: flour, baking soda, salt, butter, splenda granular, splenda brown sugar blend, vanilla extract, eggs, semisweet chocolate morsels
name: splenda blend chocolate chip cookies

steps: Mix all ingredients except the milk and cream. Mix them well and then add the rice and cream. Mix
ingredients: milk, light cream, vanilla, salt, maple syrup, eggs, cooked long-grain rice
name: maple custard rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, raisins, lard, allspice, clove, salt, cinnamon
name: poor man s cake

steps: In a nonmetallic bowl, combine apricots, strawberry, fresh blueberries, fresh raspberry, jicama, jalapeno chiles, fresh lime juice, honey, vegetable oil, sunflower seeds. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Refrigerate, covered, until chilled, at least 1 hour. Sprinkle with mint before serving.
ingredients: apricots, strawberry, fresh blueberries, fresh raspberry, jicama, jalapeno chiles, fresh lime juice, honey, vegetable oil, sunflower seeds
name: apricot berry and jicama salad with honey lime dressing

steps: In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in bacon for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta.
ingredients: lean bacon, onions, fresh parsley, dry pasta, low-fat cooking spray, cavenders all purpose greek seasoning, creme fraiche
name: ww low fat creamy bacon and onion pasta

steps: Combine all ingredients in a medium size heavy skillet. Heat over medium-high heat to boiling. Cook, stirring constantly, until all of the liquid is evaporated and nuts are coated and sugary. Transfer to a non-stick baking sheet. Break nuts apart while still warm. Let cool.
ingredients: sugar, fresh orange juice, orange extract, walnuts
name: candied orange walnuts

steps: Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon.
ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, cooking oil, lemon
name: seared salmon

steps: Place the pork shoulder, garlic, salt and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to coat. Season the pork shoulder with salt and pepper. Lay atop the pork. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast, sprinkle with caraway seeds. Cook in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours.
ingredients: pork shoulder, garlic, salt, dried oregano, sazon goya, adobo seasoning
name: puerto rican style pernil roast pork

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more. Make-ahead. Bake in preheated 350f oven 45 minutes or until bubbly.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, fresh parsley, fresh cilantro, mustard, low-fat mayonnaise, hard-boiled eggs, salt and pepper
name: australian style potato salad

steps: In a medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately.
ingredients: white shoepeg corn, cucumber, red onion, miracle whip, salt, pepper
name: robyn s corn salad no vinegar

steps: In heavy saucepan, mix sugar, cocoa powder, flour and salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled.
ingredients: semisweet chocolate, unsweetened chocolate, unsalted butter, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, whipped cream, cocoa powder
name: warm chocolate pudding cakes oamc

steps: Place chocolate chips, egg and vanilla in blender and blend for 30 seconds. Remove center of blender lid and while machine is running, slowly pour heated cream into the chocolate mixture. Blend until well mixed and chocolate chips are melted. Pour into parfait or wine glasses and refrigerate until set. Can serve with a garnish of sweetened whipped cream.
ingredients: half-and-half, chocolate chips, egg, salt, creme de menthe, whipped cream
name: chocolate mousse ii

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, refried beans, salsa, cheddar cheese, sour cream, olive
name: burrito meatloaf

steps: Place salmon in 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Combine remaining ingredients and pour over salmon. Turn salmon so that it gets coated with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Bake in preheated 425 f oven for 10-12 minutes, or until fish flakes easily and is opaque in centre.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic, salt, vinegar, dried thyme leaves, dried oregano leaves, white wine, salmon fillets, parmesan cheese
name: marinated grilled salmon

steps: Heat the oil in a pan add onion, butter, pumpkin, chicken stock, orange juice, orange, zest of, sugar, salt & pepper and cook until soft. Add chicken stock and zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of zest of
ingredients: onion, butter, pumpkin, chicken stock, orange juice, orange, zest of, sugar, salt & pepper, orange
name: pumpkin and orange soup

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Mix filling ingredients with fork until crumbly. Press mixture in ungreased 13x9-inch pan. Bake for 10-12 minutes. Cool slightly. In saucepan melt filling ingredients over low heat, stirring constantly. Spread over filling. In saucepan over low heat, melt chocolate chips and shortening, stirring constantly. Stir in cereal. Carefully spread over filling. Cool completely.
ingredients: caramel candies, water, peanut butter, cheerios toasted oat cereal, salted peanuts, chocolate chips, shortening
name: caramel o bars

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Add hot water to stuffing mix. Stir till blended. Set aside. Saute italian sausage in a large nonstick skillet over med-high heat until nicely browned. Add vegetables to skillet, saute until crisp tender. Drain any oil in skillet. Cover with tomato sauce. Cover with prepared stuffing. Bake 25 minutes or until heated throughout.
ingredients: italian sausage, butter, cayenne pepper, cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix
name: so easy sausage cheese balls

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a non-stick 8 inch round cake pan with non-stick cooking spray and set aside. Add cake mix and remaining ingredients for the cake to a medium sized mixing bowl. With electric mixer, beat on medium speed 2 minutes or until thoroughly mixed and batter is smooth. Pour batter into prepared pan and bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted off center comes out clean. Cool on a rack for 10 minutes, invert onto wire rack and cool completely before frosting. For the frosting, add all ingredients except milk to a medium size bowl. Garnish as desired, strawberries make a nice garnish.
ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, sour milk, baking soda, clove, cinnamon, egg, raisins, currants
name: raisin crumb cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray muffin tins with nonstick spray. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until set.
ingredients: butter, mushrooms, ham, eggs, mayonnaise, cheese, green onion
name: dinner scramble

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3
ingredients: parmesan cheese, butter, reduced-fat mayonnaise, scallions, worcestershire sauce, catfish fillets, tabasco sauce
name: catfish a la shannon

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cooked long-grain rice, coleslaw mix, fresh cilantro leaves, dry roasted peanuts, peanut sauce, vegetable oil, soy sauce, water
name: spicy thai chicken rice salad

steps: Spray a deep baking dish, or roaster with non stick spray. Combine 1 tbs of olive oil, the juice and zest of both lemons, plus the additional lemon juice, and the 4 cloves of garlic minced in a small bowl. Place the chicken in the roasting pan. Sprinkle liberally with the lemon pepper salt. Pour the lemon mixture over all- you can throw the lemon rinds into the baking dish too. Bake at 400 for about 45 minutes to an hour, turning the chicken over halfway through baking. I sometimes make this, and seal it in a ziplock bag in the freezer, then when you are ready, thaw, dump in the roaster and bake- just adding the lemon pepper salt. My family likes this when i take the sauce from the chicken, combine it with a small amount of half and half and serve it over pasta.
ingredients: garlic, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, salt, chicken thighs
name: garlic lemon roast chicken thighs

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Chop yellow squash and onion into small, uniform pieces. Add the squash and onion to a medium sized pot and cook in the butter over medium heat until soft and mushy. Season cooked mixture to taste. Beat the egg with a fork and add it to the squash mixture. Add one cup of shredded cheese to the mixture and stir until melted and mixed. Pour mixture into casserole dish and top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 min or until cheese lightly browned.
ingredients: yellow squash, onion, butter, seasoned dry bread crumb
name: mom s squash casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Pour sauce into 13 by 9 inch baking dish. Stir in 4 tbsp of parmesan cheese. Place the chicken breasts in the sauce, turning to coat them well. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Sprinkle remaining parmesan cheese, and the mozzarella over the chicken breasts, and and continue baking for 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, pasta sauce, milk, parmesan cheese
name: chicken parmesan made simple

steps: In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops.
ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, butter, onion, mushroom, sage, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable broth
name: savory stuffed pork chops
