steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until lightly browned. Add remaining ingredients. Cook and stir about 10 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: vegetable oil, green onion, eggs, green peas, shrimp, rice, barbecued pork, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce
name: yang chow fried rice

steps: In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce. Cover tightly and simmer 10 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, raw rice, spaghetti, margarine, beef broth, salt and pepper
name: homemade rice a roni with ground beef

steps: In a large skillet, combine oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, and garlic. Pour evenly over sprouts then sprinkle with the cheese. Bake at 350 for about 20 minutes, or until brussels sprouts are tender.
ingredients: brussels sprouts, ice water, maple syrup, dijon mustard, cider vinegar, olive oil, sea salt, black pepper, pecans
name: brussels sprouts salad with maple mustard dressing

steps: Brown beef and onion, drain and add celery. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add noodles and cover and cook until tender, stirring occasionally. Remove. From heat and sprinkle with cheese.
ingredients: beef, celery, onion, tomato paste, water, noodles, american cheese, ripe olives, salt, pepper
name: hacienda hamburger skillet

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly spray baking dish with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine soup, cheddar cheese, milk and black pepper. Add garlic and potatoes to soup mixture. Mix well. Spoon potatoes into baking dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika. Cover with foil. Bake 1 hour. Remove foil. Bake and additional 15-20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: baking potatoes, french-fried onions, half-and-half, ricotta cheese, salt, garlic powder, pepper, white cheddar cheese
name: crispy potatoes au gratin

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend cake flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack.
ingredients: bananas, sugar, water, ghee, almonds, cardamom seed, saffron
name: banana halva

steps: In a large bowl, whisk together the warm water, cocoa powder, sugar, coffee, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice cream, vanilla ice
ingredients: warm water, cocoa powder, sugar, coffee, vanilla ice cream
name: iced cocoa cappuccino

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: tamales, chili, cheese, sour cream, green onion, corn chips
name: leftover chili recipe

steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased shallow baking dish. Season with the taco seasoning mix. Pour the salsa over the chicken. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender. When ready to serve, remove the chicken from the pan, stir sour cream into salsa, then return chicken. Serve salsa sour cream chicken with a big tossed salad and spanish rice. This chicken breast recipe serves 4.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salsa, brown sugar, brown mustard
name: cowboy chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: green beans, bacon, onion, apple cider vinegar, white sugar
name: sweet sour green beans

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Spread garlic in an 11 x 7-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Arrange asparagus in an even layer over garlic. Bake at 400 for 15 minutes or until asparagus is crisp-tender, turning once.
ingredients: garlic, fresh parsley, olive oil, fresh asparagus, bacon, salt and black pepper
name: bacon wrapped garlic asparagus bundles

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: english cucumber, salt, carrots, cherry tomatoes, red onion, fresh cilantro, vegetable oil, rice wine vinegar, ground black pepper
name: cucumber vegetable salad with cilantro red onion

steps: Melt butter and cheese over low heat. Add lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt and pepper. Mix well. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve immediately.
ingredients: mayonnaise, celery, chives, tabasco sauce, salt and pepper, avocados, lemon, juice of, crab legs, fresh dill
name: crab stuffed avocado half shells

steps: In a large bowl, combine cheese, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of chicken soup,
ingredients: margarine, flour, salt, paprika, pepper, chicken, cream of chicken soup, milk, pillsbury refrigerated biscuits, cheese
name: joyce s cheese n chicken dinner

steps: Toss sun-dried tomato, water, boiling water, potato, scallions, ground cumin, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mix well and serve chilled.
ingredients: sun-dried tomato, water, boiling water, potato, scallions, ground cumin, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper
name: mediterranean potato salad 2

steps: In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot.
ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, chili powder, butternut squash, quinoa, chopped tomatoes, red kidney beans, fresh cilantro
name: chilli butternut squash pumpkin with quinoa

steps: Saute the onion and bacon in a large pot until the onion is softened and the bacon is cooked through. Add the garlic and cook for about another two minutes, stirring frequently. Add the cabbage to the pot. It will take up a lot of room but will wilt down as it cooks. Cook until the cabbage is done, stirring frequently. It will take about ten to twelve minutes. If you want a softer cabbage, cover the pot and let it steam for about an extra five minutes or so. If desired, a little bit of sugar and vinegar can be added near the end of cooking time.
ingredients: bacon, onions, salt, cayenne pepper, pepper, sugar, bay leaves, cabbage, dark beer
name: emeril s favorite cabbage

steps: Place all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until reduced to a chunky sauce, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat, cool, and refrigerate until needed. You can also freeze in ice cube trays. Keep frozen cubes in a plastic bag so you can remove one portion at a time.
ingredients: dry white wine, honey, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground ginger, granny smith apple, mcintosh apple, pears, non-dairy whipped topping
name: apple pear compote

steps: In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired.
ingredients: oil, garlic clove, ground beef, kidney beans, onion, tomato sauce, chili powder, salt
name: quick homemade chili con carne with beans

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion. Cover and cook for 3 minutes. Uncover and cook for 11 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently. Place the pizza crust on a baking sheet. Combine the sauce and tomatoes. Spread sauce mixture over pizza crust. Top with onion and cheese. Bake at 450 for 10 minutes or until crust is golden brown. Sprinkle with basil. Cut into 6 wedges.
ingredients: sun-dried tomatoes, hot water, olive oil, white wine vinegar, lemon juice, goat cheese, garlic cloves, dried marjoram, dried thyme, salt and pepper
name: sun dried tomato and goat cheese dressing

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham cracker crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham cracker pie shell. Bake for 45 minutes or until edges are brown. Turn oven off and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove to wire rack to cool. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
ingredients: graham cracker pie crust, sour cream, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, cream cheese, butter
name: cheater s new york style cheesecake

steps: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, lemon, tomatoes, sea salt, angel hair pasta, fresh basil, pepper
name: angel hair pasta with simple garlic basil

steps: Preheat griddle to just above medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately.
ingredients: french bread, eggs, half-and-half, whole milk, sugar, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt
name: overnight french toast

steps: Add spices to a tea kettle along with the water, rose water and sugar. Stir mixture to dissolve sugar. Bring mixture to a boil, then reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove cardamom pods before serving. Serve with additional sugar, if desired.
ingredients: water, cardamoms, cinnamon, green tea, almonds, saffron, sugar
name: qahwa kashmiri tea

steps: Beat cream cheese and sugar in large bowl, with a mixer, on high speed until smooth. Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Add pie filling as a topping. Keep leftovers refrigerated.
ingredients: cream cheese, granulated sugar, sour cream, eggs, graham cracker pie crust
name: simple cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Peel onions and cut in half crosswise. Place onions, cut sides down, in an 8-inch square baking dish, drizzle with water. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Combine honey and remaining ingredients. Turn onions over. Brush half of the honey mixture over the onions. Bake, uncovered, an additional 30 minutes or until tender, basting with remaining honey mixture after 15 minutes.
ingredients: vidalia onions, beef bouillon cubes, butter, salt and pepper, aluminum foil
name: vidalia onion special

steps: Preheat oven to 425f. Mix sugar, flour and cinnamon,. Stir in berries, and kiwi to coat. Turn filling into pie shell. Bake at 425f for 35-45 minutes.
ingredients: strawberries, sugar, cornstarch, water, red food coloring, cream cheese, fresh lemon zest, pie crusts
name: fresh strawberry pie

steps: Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tuna, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, celery, cel
ingredients: light chunk tuna in water, mayonnaise, celery, flour tortillas, carrots
name: tuna salad sushi

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: brownie mix, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, coconut flakes, pecans, eagle brand condensed milk
name: coconut brownie bars

steps: Heat oil over medium heat. Saut garlic until soft, being careful not to let it burn. Add sliced mushrooms and saut until they look fairly cooked and shiny. Add almonds and saut for a couple more minutes. Finally, add frozen green beans and splash of soy sauce. Stir frequently until beans are just cooked and, of course, no longer frozen. If not on the south beach diet or watching sugar intake, you could add oyster sauce or other asian condiment to the mixture.
ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic cloves, green beans, diced tomatoes, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt, pine nuts, cumin
name: lebanese green beans lubie

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Grease 13x9 pan. In a large bowl whisk together butter, sugar and vanilla. Add eggs and whisk until well blended. Stir in flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt. Mix well and reserve 2 cups. Spread batter in greased pan. Arrange the patties in a single layer. Bake for 50-55 minutes.
ingredients: sugar, unsweetened cocoa, flour, baking powder, egg whites, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, peppermint extract, fat free cream cheese, egg white
name: mint cream cheese brownies

steps: In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, milk, cocoa, and corn syrup. Heat on medium heat until the mixture reaches 240f stirring constantly. Take the mixture off the heat and add butter and vanilla. Let cool to 110f and then stir until mixture loses its gloss. Spoon into a foiled 9x13-inch pan and let harden. Cut into squares.
ingredients: sugar, salt, vanilla, peanut butter, cocoa, milk, butter
name: old fashioned peanut butter chocolate fudge

steps: In a mixing bowl, beat together cheese, sour cream, and onion with electric mixer until fluffy. Stir in blue cheese, walnuts, and bacon. Mix well. Chill up to 24 hours. If dip thickens after chilling, stir in 1 to 2 tablespoons milk. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: bacon, garlic cloves, cream cheese, half-and-half, blue cheese, fresh chives, smoked almonds
name: warm blue cheese dip with garlic and bacon

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: onions, celery ribs, olive oil flavored cooking spray, brown lentils, vegetable broth, water, tomatoes, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese
name: hearty tomato and lentil soup

steps: Heat sandwich press. Add first piece of bread. Top with cheese slice. Add ham. Then top with shredded cheddar. Add remaining slice of bread. Close press and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: deli ham, cheese, hamburger buns, butter, mustard, poppy seeds, onion flakes, sugar
name: hot ham and cheese sandwiches with a kick

steps: Preheat oven to 180c. Spray a medium baking dish with the olive oil spray to coat. Place the halved tomatoes, cut side up, in a single layer in the prepared dish. Sprinkle with the sea salt and lightly spray with more olive oil spray. Bake for 40 minutes or until tomatoes are lightly browned and tender. Meanwhile, combine the vinegar, oil and mustard in a small bowl and set aside. Mix the herbs and feta together and set aside. Remove tomatoes from oven when cooked and place them on a serving platter and sprinkle with the combined herbs and feta. Drizzle with the dressing and freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
ingredients: tomatoes, vidalia onion, cucumber, fresh basil, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper, dill weed, sugar
name: chunky garden tomato salad

steps: In a large saucepan, heat olive oil and gently cook onion without browning, for 3-4 minutes. Add pumpkin, carrot and rosemary and cook, stirring for 2-3 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 12-15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Remove any rosemary stalks and bay leaves. Place a third of the soup in the blender with a third of the skim milk powder and puree. Pour into a large bowl. Repeat with the remaining soup and milk powder and pour the whole lot back into the saucepan, heat through and serve. For vegetarian use vegetable stock.
ingredients: butter, carrots, celery, onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, cloves, whipping cream, honey
name: pumpkin soup with honey and cloves

steps: In a large saucepan, bring 1 quart of water to a boil. Add the salt and orzo and cook until the orzo is tender and has absorbed almost all of the cooking liquid, 8 to 9 minutes. Stir in the butter, parmesan and blue cheeses and walnuts. Serve immediately. Watch carefully because nuts will burn quickly.
ingredients: orzo pasta, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, salt
name: parmesan orzo

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. Serves 6.
ingredients: potatoes, harissa, olive oil, coarse sea salt, sesame seeds, lemon
name: moroccan oven roasted sesame potatoes

steps: Beat pistachios, sugar, orange zest, mini chocolate chip, strawberries until smooth. Beat pistachios, sugar, orange zest, mini chocolate chip, strawberries until creamy. Beat pistachios, sugar, orange zest, mini chocolate chip, strawberries until smooth. Beat pistachios, sugar, orange zest
ingredients: pistachios, ricotta cheese, sugar, orange zest, mini chocolate chip, strawberries
name: cannoli cream dip with strawberries

steps: Cook, drain and crumble bacon. Melt butter or margarine in a skillet. Add onions and hash browns. Cook and stir until potatoes are lightly browned. Grease a 9x13 inch pan and place hash browns in the bottom of the pan. Beat eggs, milk and salt and pepper 1- 2 minutes. Stir in grated cheese and bacon. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees 45-50 minutes, until a knife inserted comes out clean.
ingredients: potatoes, cooked chicken, cheese, bacon, egg, butter, breadcrumbs, cream, oil, milk
name: chicken cheese bacon potato balls

steps: Mix all ingredients for the base and put into greased 8x8 pan. Spread jam over base. Mix the topping together well and spread over jam. Bake at 300 degrees for 20 minutes. Cool and cut into squares.
ingredients: chickpeas, honey, raspberry jam, crunchy peanut butter, vanilla extract, flax seed meal, spelt flour, baking powder
name: chickpea pb j blondies

steps: Preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add tomatillos cut side down. Brown on both sides, turning over halfway through, about 7 minutes total. Transfer tomatillos to a blender or food processor. Add garlic, chiles, water, salsa seasoning and salt. Process to a coarse puree. Let cool before serving.
ingredients: dried chipotle chiles, vegetable oil, garlic cloves, salt
name: chipotle salsa negra dark chipotle salsa

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine ground beef, eggs, breadcrumbs, vidalia onion, whiskey, beer, barbecue sauce, hot sauce, salt and pepper in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly. Place meatballs in oven-proof glass pan. Bake uncovered 350 degrees f. 1 hour.
ingredients: lean ground beef, eggs, breadcrumbs, vidalia onion, whiskey, beer, barbecue sauce, hot sauce, salt and pepper, oil
name: kentucky boilermaker meatballs

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon. Set aside. Place nuts in a bowl and pour the egg white over them. Stir until nuts are coated and sticky. Sprinkle cinnamon-sugar mixture over nuts and stir until nuts are completely coated. Spread on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 30 minutes.
ingredients: mixed nuts, honey, dried chipotle powder, canola oil
name: chipotle honey mixed nuts

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree. Brown the cubed meat. Mix rest of ingredients together with it in an oven safe pan. Place in oven for 1 hour. After 1 hour taste juice. If you add more water you may want to add a little more onion soup. Serve over rice or egg noodles.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, flour, paprika, garlic salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, sour cream
name: mom s american stroganoff

steps: In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving.
ingredients: olive oil, short-grain brown rice, garlic, water, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, salt, green onion
name: garlicky brown rice

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees celsius in a small saucepan, add pears, sugar, and 4 tbsp water. Cook gently over low heat about 5 minutes until pears are just tender. Remove from heat and stir in the sultanas. Spoon mixture into a 1. 75 litre baking dish and leave to cool. For the crumble mixture, rub butter into the flower until crumbly. Stir in sugar and pecans, then sprinkle mixture over the fruit mixture. Bake at 180 degrees c for 30 minutes until lightly browned on top. If freezing, prepare to end of step 2. Wrap whole dish in large freezer bag, seal, and freeze up to 1 month. Can be baked from frozen in a 160 degree c oven for 50 minutes. Serve with cream or vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: pear halves, juice, sultanas, butter, plain flour, caster sugar
name: pear and sultana crumble

steps: Heat oil in wok 375 degrees. Add 1st 4 ingredients. Cook about one minute. Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Serve.
ingredients: ramen noodles, egg, gingerroot, vegetable bouillon cube, bean sprouts, soy sauce, sriracha sauce, red pepper flakes, chives
name: spicy sriracha ramen

steps: In a small saucepan, mix milk, flour and salt until smooth. Place over low heat and cook, stirring constantly until thickened. Remove from heat and cool. Add maple flavoring. Once cool enough, place in an old syrup bottle, mrs. Butterworths size works really well.
ingredients: pure maple syrup, granulated sugar, egg whites, salt, vanilla extract
name: fluffy maple frosting

steps: Mix together all ingredients using hands in a big bowl. To get the right consistency it is important that all ingredients get well mixed and gets softened a bit. I would say that you should knead for around 5 minutes. Form into meatballs according to the size you prefer. In denmark meatballs used for dinner is the size of the palm of your hand, and lunch meat balls are about half of that. Heat a non-stick pan to medium-hot and place the meatballs in the pan. If you feel they stick too much to the pan, you can add a bit of butter to the pan. Turn the meatballs with a fork once they have started to brown. Keep turning them every 4 min or so being careful that they do not brown too much. Cook for approx 15-20 min until cooked through. Serve with a potato salad, mashed potatoes or cooked potatoes with a white milk based gravy.
ingredients: ground beef, breadcrumbs, eggs, milk, salt and pepper, onions, vegetable oil, cream of mushroom soup
name: smothered meatballs

steps: In a small saucepan, combine the raspberry, lemon zest, lemon curd, lemon juice, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd, lemon curd,
ingredients: fresh raspberry, fresh lemon zest, lemon curd, limoncello, mascarpone cheese, lemon extract, heavy whipping cream, fresh mint leaves, lemon verbena leaf
name: limoncello raspberry mascarpone mousse

steps: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Bake another 15 minutes,
ingredients: carrots, butter, brown sugar, cream, chives
name: littlemafia s creamy carrots

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately.
ingredients: sugar, unsweetened baking cocoa, nonfat milk, fat-free half-and-half, semi-sweet chocolate chips, vanilla
name: healthified decadent hot chocolate

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine dijon mustard, lemon juice, egg and pepper. Brush chicken with mustard mixture. Coat with bread-crumbs. Melt butter in large frypan. Saut chicken until golden on both sides. Place on top of chicken. Bake in oven for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and chicken is cooked through. To serve, mix honey dijon sauce and spoon over each chicken breast.
ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter, dijon mustard, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: baked parmesan dijon chicken breasts

steps: Heat the olive oil and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat. When garlic is tender, remove from skillet and set aside. Place the broccoli and carrot in the skillet, and cook 2 minutes, just until heated through. In a pot, bring the vegetable broth to a boil. Add the partially cooked pasta and broth to the skillet. Mix in the peas. Cover skillet, and continue cooking 10 minutes over medium heat, or until pasta is almost al dente. Remove and discard garlic clove. Transfer the partially cooked pasta and broth to the skillet. Cover skillet, and continue cooking 10 minutes over medium heat, or until pasta is almost al dente and vegetables are tender. Toss with the parmesan cheese to serve.
ingredients: pasta, olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless chicken breast, pepper, frozen vegetables, chicken broth, basil, parmesan cheese
name: garlic chicken pasta primavera

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium high heat. Add chicken. Cook and stir until lightly browned. Add remaining ingredients. Cook and stir about 10 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: bacon, green onion, red bell pepper, green peas, egg, cooked rice, soy sauce
name: new year fried rice

steps: Melt butter in medium saucepan over med high heat. Add onions and celery. Cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add broth, water, rice, contents of seasoning packet, and fruit. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and simmer 25 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in pecans and serve.
ingredients: bacon, fresh okra, onion, green bell pepper, long-grain rice, salt, pepper, chicken stock
name: okra pilau

steps: Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through.
ingredients: rice noodles, olive oil, lean ground chicken, garlic cloves, ginger, sweet chili sauce, fish sauce, soy sauce, coriander leaves, lettuce cups
name: chinese chicken lettuce cups

steps: Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking.
ingredients: cornish hen, lemon juice, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried ginger, seasoning salt
name: german style hens

steps: In 4-quart saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook onion and garlic in butter 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until tender. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring constantly, 1 minute. Stir in broth, broccoli and corn. Heat to boiling over high heat. Reduce heat. Simmer 5 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender. Stir in half-and-half. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until hot.
ingredients: butter, potatoes, onion, salt, flour, paprika, water, chicken flavored bullion cubes, frozen whole kernel corn, half-and-half
name: potato corn chowder

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium high heat. Saut celery and onions together. Add potatoes and chicken broth. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 12 minutes. In batches, puree potatoes in blender and return to sauce pan. Stir in milk and seasonings. Garnish with paprika, croutons, and parsley.
ingredients: southern style hash browns, onion, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, butter, cheese, salt and pepper
name: the best cheesy potatoes

steps: Put chicken in roaster. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Bake 30 minutes longer uncovered. Bake 30 minutes longer
ingredients: chicken, butter, onion, garlic, water, soy sauce, salt, pepper, nutmeg
name: s more chicken

steps: Whisk the eggs, flour, salt, and eggs together really well in a bowl to make your batter. Pour the batter into a jug, and let it sit for 30 minutes before you use it. Turn your oven up to the highest setting, and place a 12 cup muffin tray in the oven to heat up for 5 minutes. Place 1 tb of oil in each muffin hole, and put the tray back into the oven and heat until oil is very hot. Open oven door, slide the tray half out, and carefully pour the batter into the muffin holes. Close the door and cook for 15 minutes without opening the oven door. Serve immediately.
ingredients: milk, all-purpose flour, salt, eggs, olive oil
name: jamie oliver s huge yorkshire puddings

steps: Preheat oven to 450. Mix chicken, soup, vegetables, chicken broth, hot water, frozen broccoli, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, pepperpreparation:Preheat oven to 450. Mix chicken, soup, vegetables, chicken broth, hot water
ingredients: white rice, chicken broth, hot water, frozen broccoli, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper
name: quick and easy chicken and vegetable casserole

steps: In large, shallow dish, combine egg, cream, brown sugar, orange juice, and spices. Place bread in mixture. Leave 5 minutes. Turn bread over. Leave 5-10 minutes until all liquid is absorbed. Transfer bread to non-stick cookie sheet or cookie sheet lined with buttered foil. Bake at 375 f for 10 minutes. Turn carefully and bake 10-15 minutes longer, or until puffed and golden. Drizzle with warmed syrup, or sift icing sugar on top, and serve with fresh fruit.
ingredients: challah, eggs, heavy cream, orange, zest of, orange juice, butter, maple syrup
name: easy morning french toast bake

steps: In a small bowl, combine water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Pour into a blender and process for 1 minute or until slushy. Cover and freeze for 3 hours or until almost firm. Transfer to a blender and process again for 30-40 seconds or until slushy. Cover and freeze over night. Remove from freezer just before serving. Using a fork, scrape into 2 dessert dishes.
ingredients: vodka, lime, raw sugar, ice
name: caipiroska

steps: Place crackers in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until lightly browned.
ingredients: crackers, chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, sliced water chestnuts, margarine
name: cracker chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place all the ingredients, except 3 garlic cloves and cheese slices, in a large, deep roasting tin. Roast in the oven for about 40 minutes or until the vegetables are beginning to soften and turn golden brown. Stir occasionally as they cook. While the vegetables are cooking, place 3 garlic cloves and cheese slices in a food processor or blender and pulse into rough breadcrumbs. When the vegetables are ready, remove from the oven and season with freshly ground black pepper. Sprinkle the crumbs over the ratatouille and return to the oven for a further 15 minutes or until the crumbs are golden and crispy.
ingredients: bacon, onion, butternut squash, frozen corn kernels, basil, dry mustard, salt, ground black pepper, fresh basil
name: corn and butternut squash with basil

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine frangelico, cake mix, eggs, water, and almond extract. Pour batter into two prepared 8 inch cake pans. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Turn onto a cooling rack. Beat cream with the sugar until stiff. Split the cake layers in half. Spread with whipped cream and stack on a serving plate. Frost the top and sides of the cake with your choice of frosting or frangelico frosting. Sprinkle with coconut.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, sugar, milk, coconut flavoring, cool whip, coconut
name: refrigerator coconut cake

steps: Place ingredients in bread machine in order as listed. Bake at 375 for 10-15 minute.
ingredients: yeast, bread flour, salt, buttermilk, butter, honey, water, egg whites
name: low fat honey buttermilk rolls

steps: Place the d s herbed tomato soup in the bottom of a large, deep saucepan or dutch oven and turn the heat to medium. Add the onion and butter. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the mixture boils, then turn the heat down to medium-high. Stir in basil, thyme, and pepper. Taste and add more salt, pepper and lemon juice to taste.
ingredients: onion, butter, whole canned tomatoes, chicken broth, tomato sauce, basil, thyme, pepper
name: d s herbed tomato soup

steps: Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheese crackers, taco seasoning, monterey jack pepper cheese, green chilies
name: easy green chile chicken bundles

steps: Heat oil in large skillet and add potatoes and onion. Turn until the potatoes are pale gold. Add garlic and cook until the garlic turns golden. Add chilli powder, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring to coat the potatoes and lightly toast chilli powder. Sprinkle with lime juice before serving.
ingredients: red potatoes, butter, garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper, fresh cilantro
name: cilantro chili potatoes

steps: In a medium saucepan, cook leek in oil over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add garlic, squash and water and simmer, stirring occasionally, until squash is very tender, about 15 minutes. Cool mixture slightly and in a blender puree in batches until smooth, transferring to a bowl. Season soup with salt and pepper. Chill soup, covered, at least until cold, about 6 hours, and up to 1 day. Before serving, season with salt and pepper, if necessary. Serve soup with dollops of sour cream and chutney.
ingredients: leeks, unsalted butter, yellow squash, chicken broth, watercress leaves, hot sauce, salt and pepper, sour cream
name: squash leek and watercress soup

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, milk, mild cheddar cheese
name: crock pot chicken n stuffing

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Grease 12-cup muffin tins. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and poppy seeds in a large mixing bowl and set aside. Whisk egg, sugar, and almond extract together until combined, then whisk in the buttermilk and melted butter. Add the buttermilk mixture to the flour and fold to combine. There should be not large pockets of flour but small streaks may remain. Do not over mix. The batter will be fairly thick.
ingredients: flour, poppy seeds, salt, baking soda, sugar, butter, eggs, plain yogurt, vanilla extract
name: poppy seed pound cake muffins

steps: Place cucumbers in a large bowl. Pour ingredients over the cucumbers. Bring to a boil. When it starts boiling, pack into jars. Wipe rims, and cap, using sterilized lids and bands. Let set for 6 weeks before eating. Place cucumbers in a large bowl. Let
ingredients: rice vinegar, water, caster sugar, lebanese cucumber, red chile
name: pickled cucumber dipping sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix the first six ingredients for crust. Place half of mix in a greased 9x13 inch pan. Bake crust for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and whipping cream. Place chocolate chips over baked crust, drizzel caramel over chips, then place the remaining crust mixture on top of the caramel. Bake another 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees. Cool.
ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, brown sugar, oatmeal, butter, sliced apples, cinnamon
name: apple bar

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, seasoned bread crumbs, olive oil, marinated artichoke hearts, garlic cloves, roasted red pepper, black pepper
name: chicken and artichokes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a baking sheet with parchment paper & set aside. Combine flour, oats, sugar, shortening, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, old fashioned oatspreparation:In a big mixing bowl, add the brown sugar, shortening, and margarine. Beat until fluffy. Add in the vanilla and eggs. Mix until well blended. Add in the flours, and baking powder. Stir to mix. Add in the oats. Stir well to mix. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of dough 2-inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 for 10-14 minutes or until a light golden brown. Cool for 1 minute, then transfer to cooling rack.
ingredients: butter, eggs, brown sugar, granulated sugar, real vanilla, water, salt, baking soda, flour, oats
name: church family oatmeal cookies

steps: Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using.
ingredients: textured vegetable protein, water, soy sauce, olive oil, taco seasoning, red pepper, salsa, flour tortillas
name: 10 minute tvp tacos

steps: Place the medallions in a large bowl and mix well. Place the medallions in a large bowl and mix well. Place the medallions in
ingredients: lamb medallions, rosemary, cumin, paprika, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper, extra virgin olive oil, butter, chicken stock
name: pan seared lamb medallions

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a small measuring cup. Place venison steaks in a large zip lock bag. Pour marinade over steaks and seal bag. Place bag in a flat casserole dish so that the steaks are in a single layer. Refrigerate and marinate at least 4 hours, turning every half hour to marinate each side. Drain marinade and grill steaks to desired doneness. I double or triple this recipe for each addition package of steak. Any wild game steak can be used in this recipe.
ingredients: ground deer meat, pork butt, sugar, salt, water, garlic, ground ginger, pepper, ground mace, casing
name: venison hot dogs for the grill

steps: Combine the chicken tenders, butter, white vinegar, cayenne pepper, cumin, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black pepper, black
ingredients: chicken tenders, butter, white vinegar, cayenne pepper sauce
name: copycat wings and things chicken tenders and hot sauce

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add flour tortillas, onion, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper, bell pepper,
ingredients: wheat flour tortillas, vegetable oil, onion, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, swordfish, pesto sauce, tomatoes, avocado
name: swordfish fajitas mexico

steps: In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, whole berry cranberry sauce, blueberriespreparation:In a mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Combine the dry ingredients together with a whisk. Add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture alternately with the buttermilk, beginning and ending with the dry ingredients. Stir in cranberry sauce and blueberries by hand. Pour into four greased mini loaf pans. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until bread passes a toothpick test. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pans and cooling completely on a wire rack.
ingredients: butter, atkins baking mix, sugar substitute, salt, heavy cream, water, eggs, almond extract, fresh blueberries
name: blueberry clafouti

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: fresh green beans, salad oil, white vinegar, instant minced onion, salt, garlic, pepper, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter
name: green beans caesar

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs.
ingredients: pumpkin, olive oil, chili pepper, garlic, chili powder, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: roast pumpkin

steps: Mix all ingredients except for mexican-style stewed tomatoes. Blend well to incorporate flavors. Finally mix in mexican-style stewed tomatoes. Chill till serving.
ingredients: dry onion soup mix, mexican-style stewed tomatoes, chili powder, cheddar cheese
name: fiesta onion dip

steps: In a medium nonstick saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft. Add quinoa and cook until soft. Add lemon juice, 1 cup water and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, until water is absorbed and quinoa is tender. Remove from heat and let stand 3 minutes. Add parsley, mint, currants and orange zest. Stir with a fork to combine and fluff up grain.
ingredients: vegetable stock, quinoa, shallots, fresh orange juice, butter, dried cherries, fresh thyme, fresh parsley, salt
name: quinoa with cherries and herbs

steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately.
ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, cayenne pepper, pimento-stuffed green olives, sesame seeds
name: sesame cheddar olive poppers

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour two cake pans and set aside. Mash banana and set aside. Combine cake mix and baking soda in the large bowl of an electric mixer. Add the rest of the ingredients and beat on low speed until combined. Beat at medium speed for 4-5 minutes. Divide batter between the two pans and bake 30-35 minutes or until center of cake springs back with lightly tapped. Allow to cool on a wire rack and frost.
ingredients: bananas, lemon juice, sugar, water, egg whites, cream of tartar, vanilla extract, flaked coconut, jelly beans
name: somebunny loves you easter cake

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place foil on a cookie sheet. Place fish on the foil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with pesto, tomatoes and then cheese. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until fish flakes with fork. To prevent wasting the rest of the pesto in the jar, i make one recipe for dinner and freeze the ingredients to have another day. Just place each of the ingredients in its own quart-size freezer bag, then place all in a gallon-size freezer bag along with directions and freeze. When ready to make, just thaw completely and follow the above directions to prepare.
ingredients: cream cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, basil pesto, nuts
name: tomato pesto torte

steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups flour, yeast, sugar, salt and pepper. Mix well in a saucepan, heat milk, water and shortening until warm. Add to flour mixture add egg and beat at low speed until moistened. Beat 3 minutes at medium speed. By hand, add cheese and enough flour to make a firm dough. Knead well on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes. Punch dough down, divide into 2 parts. Shape into 2 round loaves. Place on a greased baking sheet, cover and let rise in a warm oven until light and doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on racks, makes 2 loaves.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, milk, cheddar cheese, whole kernel corn, shortening
name: corny cheese bread

steps: In a small saucepan, heat water over medium high heat. Once water begins to boil, add the tofu. This will rinse the frying oil off and bring the tofu to room temperature. Boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove tofu from the water and drain the saucepan. Place tofu on a towel to dry. Return the saucepan to the stove and add the vinegar, sugar, and salt to it. Simmer until it reaches a slightly syrupy consistency, stirring often. Remove from heat and add remaining ingrediants. Serve in a small dipping bowl alongside tofu.
ingredients: medium firm tofu, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, seasoning salt, peanut oil
name: golden fried tofu bites

steps: Cream butter and sugar, then add egg. In another bowl, combine brown sugar, sour cream, egg, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips, walnuts. Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts. Pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan and bake at 350 for 60 to 70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to cool on a wire rack.
ingredients: brown sugar, sour cream, egg, baking soda, salt, flour, chocolate chips
name: chocolate chip bread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, whisk together all of the wet ingredients, except the cane sugar. Add the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, and whisk well to combine. Drizzle the cider vinegar over the top of the batter and whisk quickly to incorporate. Pour batter into greased 9inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, sugar, salt, baking soda, water, canola oil, vanilla extract, cider vinegar
name: all in one pan cake aka wacky cake

steps: Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe.
ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, limes, juice of, limes, zest of, cilantro, garlic, salt, cracked black pepper, striped bass
name: marinated grilled striped bass

steps: Preheat oven to 200. Place pasta on baking sheet and cover with baking sheet. Roast for 20-30 minutes or until skins are easily removed. Remove from oven and chop into small pieces. Meanwhile, cook and drain pasta. Place into a mixing bowl. Add the onions, tomatoes and peppers, toss to combine. Mix together the vinegar, mustard, parsley, basil, olive oil, salt and pepper. Beat with a whisk to combine. Pour over the pasta, add the cheese and toss again. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: small shell pasta, tomatoes, celery, green pepper, mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, garlic cloves, brown sugar, kosher salt, black pepper
name: macaroni salad dinosaur bbq

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Preheat oven to 350f. Place the beans in the oven proof baking dish. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes.
ingredients: kidney beans, pinto beans, red beans, catsup, water, brown sugar, molasses, spicy brown mustard, chili powder
name: emily s traveling beans

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a non-stick skillet brown meat with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: lean ground beef, onions, garlic, diced tomatoes, spaghetti sauce, small shell pasta, reduced-fat sour cream, provolone cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese
name: cheesy shell lasagna

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Combine maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar, maple syrup,
ingredients: bacon, maple syrup, dijon mustard, brown sugar
name: maple glazed bacon

steps: In a large bowl, combine 1 cup milk and peanut butter. Stirring frequently, cook over low heat until smooth. Increase heat to medium. Slowly stir in remaining 8 cups milk and chocolate mix. Stirring occasionally, cook just until mixture simmers. Garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: water, creamy peanut butter, hot cocoa mix, vanilla ice cream, peanuts
name: chocolate peanut butter milkshakes aka peanutty freeze

steps: Heat all but cornflakes and peanut butter to boiling stirring constantly. Take off heat and stir in cornflakes. Spread in greased pan. Cut when cool.
ingredients: corn syrup, sugar, peanut butter, corn flakes
name: peanut butter cornflake cookies

steps: Place in a saucepan over medium heat. Add mustard, brown sugar, butter, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, buns, deli
ingredients: prepared mustard, poppy seed, worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, butter, buns, deli turkey, deli ham, cheddar cheese, swiss cheese
name: barb s little sandwiches

steps: In a saucepan, bring first three ingredients to a second boil. Remove from heat, stir well, cover& refrigerate until chilled. Cream together next six ingredients. Blend in the cold date mixture. Pour into a greased 13x9 cake pan. Top with chocolate chips& nuts, then sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: butter pound cake, rum, strawberry preserves, apricot preserves, frozen whipped topping, toasted sliced almonds
name: viennese torte

steps: Cream butter. Gradually add sugar and light cream, alternately. Add vanilla and salt. Add melted chocolate for chocolate frosting. Refrigerate for a bit before spreading.
ingredients: flour, milk, egg, vegetable oil, salt, powdered sugar, orange marmalade, oil
name: crepes for two

steps: Toast egg in toaster to desired level. Put butter on one slice and mayo on the other. Put cheese in between slices of bread. Wrap a moist papertowel around sandwich and put in microwave for 20 sec. Enjoy.
ingredients: bread, cheese, egg, water, butter, tabasco sauce
name: midnight eggs and cheese sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, green tomatoes, ground cinnamon
name: green tomato breakfast cake or plum

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Place ham in a 13x9 baking pan. Pour apple cider over ham. In medium bowl stir together remaining ingredients. Spoon sauce over entire ham. Bake, basting every 15 minutes with pan juices for 60 to 70 minutes or until heated through. Serve carved ham with pan juices, garnish with apple slices.
ingredients: smoked ham, pear juice, orange juice, brown sugar, honey
name: honey baked ham copycat

steps: Mix ground beef with evaporated milk. Form into thin patties about 3 to 4 inches in diameter. Place a spoonful of prepared stuffing in center of each patty, then form into meatball. Place meatballs in oven-proof glass pan. Combine mushroom soup, ketchup and worcestershire sauce and pour over meatballs. Bake uncovered 350 degrees f. 1 hour.
ingredients: ground beef, evaporated milk, seasoned stuffing mix, condensed golden mushroom soup, worcestershire sauce, catsup
name: burger rollups

steps: Preheat oven to 350c. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean.
ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, baking powder
name: all in one sponge cake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, mix together soup, cheese and sour cream. Fold in simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion. Add potato mixture to large greased casserole dish. Top with doritos and bake for 45 minutes.
ingredients: simply potatoes traditional mashed potatoes, apple-smoked bacon, sour cream, smoked gouda cheese, green onions
name: simply heavenly potatoes 5fix

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix cooked pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot.
ingredients: small elbow macaroni, salt water, butter, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, paprika, salt and pepper
name: macaroni cheese

steps: Heat oven to 350. Spray 13x9 baking pan. Put cake mix in lg bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add water, vanilla, and egg. Mix well. Press dough into pan. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Cool for 15 minutes. Melt chocolate and drizzle over cake. Cool.
ingredients: chocolate graham crackers, butter, evaporated milk, egg, vanilla, sugar, self-rising flour, coconut, dark chocolate
name: chewy vanilla coconut bars

steps: Preheat oven to 425f melt butter or oil in a 9-inch pie dish in the oven while it preheats. In a medium bowl, mix the dry ingredients. Use 2 of the tiny scoops of kal brand stevia extract powder or another sweetener in the equivalent of 2 teaspoons of sugar. Only use salt if you are using unsalted butter or coconut oil. Salted butter will give enough saltiness, so do not add additional salt. In a small-medium bowl, wisk the eggs and mix in the milk substitute, and other flavorings. Remove the pie plate from the oven and. Quickly pour the liquid into the dry mix and wisk thoroughly but quickly. Immediately pour into the hot greased pie dish and put into the hot oven. Bake about 12 minutes or until set in the middle. You might test with a dry knife similar to checking a pumpkin pie, when the knife removed comes out a little wet but no batter sticking to it.
ingredients: eggs, low fat cottage cheese, canola oil, sugar, salt, fresh lemon juice, fresh lemon zest, baking powder, all-purpose flour
name: lemon souffle pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare a medium baking dish by spraying with cooking spray. In a large pot of water, boil noodles until al dente. Drain well. In a medium saucepan, combine flour, butter, and salt. Stir until butter is melted and ingredients are combined evenly. Add cheese to mixture, and whisk until cheese is melted and mixture is well blended. Stir in tuna, peas, broccoli, and noodles. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top noodles begins to turn golden brown.
ingredients: chicken broth, wide egg noodles, cream of mushroom soup, milk, tuna in water, sharp cheddar cheese, frozen sweet peas, italian bread, butter
name: cheesy skillet tuna casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature.
ingredients: fresh green beans, orange juice, dijon mustard, brown sugar, butter, red onion, pecans, salt, fresh thyme
name: orange pecan green beans

steps: Combine all ingredients except avocados, canned crabmeat, lime juice, mayonnaise, egg yolks, french dressing. Spread 2 tablespoons of mixture onto each avocado. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 8 minutes or until folden. Cut each avocado into 4 wedges. Bake in a 400 degree oven
ingredients: avocados, canned crabmeat, lime juice, mayonnaise, egg yolks, french dressing
name: crabmeat stuffed avocados

steps: In large saucepan, combine all ingredients except garnish. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered 20 minutes to blend flavors. Remove spices. Serve hot with raspberry kool-aid, lemon slices and sliced apples if desired.
ingredients: apple cider, raspberry jelly, sweetened lemonade drink mix, unsweetened raspberry kool-aid, lemon slices
name: raspberry cider

steps: In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan.
ingredients: peanut butter, butter, powdered sugar, graham cracker crumbs, miniature semisweet chocolate chips
name: no bake chocolate peanut butter bars

steps: Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven.
ingredients: mushrooms, butter, garlic cloves, shallots, parsley, lemon, juice of, salt, pepper
name: garlic butter mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 325- 350 degrees. Spread fruits in a sigle layer in a buttered 8 inch pan. Combine sugar, cinnamon, and butter and mix well with fingers. Add lemon juice and stir well with a spoon. Sprinkle mixture evenly over fruits. Bake 30- 35 minutes and serve warm with cream.
ingredients: asian pears, lemon, juice of, sugar, water, cinnamon, nutmeg, honey, lemongrass
name: lemon grass spiced poached pears

steps: Heat corn syrup, butter or margarine and chips just to boiling, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla. Pour over cereal in a large bowl. Toss quickly. Fold in marshmallow and press into pan.
ingredients: golden grahams cereal, mini marshmallows, chocolate chips, butter, peanut butter, powdered sugar
name: s more chow

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Rub a 10 ounce skinless salmon fillet with just enough olive oil to coat. Place in a 10-inch nonstick skillet with an ovenproof handle. Season with salt and pepper, a squeeze of lemon or lime, and freshly grated ginger or garlic to taste. Bake 12-15 minutes or until firm to the touch or to your liking.
ingredients: fresh lime juice, tamari soy sauce, ginger, shallot, scallions, olive oil, fish fillets
name: quick oven roasted ginger scallion lime sea bass

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Whisk together yogurt, greek yogurt, laughing cow cheese, creamy peanut butter, honey, cinnamon, vanilla extract, pineapple chunks, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pecans, pe
ingredients: greek yogurt, laughing cow cheese, creamy peanut butter, honey, cinnamon, vanilla extract, pineapple chunks, pecans
name: giggly cow creme

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl combine butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth. Combine the dry ingredients in a bowl. Add to butter mixture and stir until moistened. Stir in peanut butter. Spread in a greased 7x11-inch greased baking pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until it is set in the center. Cool completely and cut in squares.
ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, water, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, chocolate-flavor nestle nesquik powder, baking powder, salt, nuts
name: nesquik brownies

steps: Combine oats and flax meal. Add water and stir to combine, using less water for thicker oatmeal and more water for thinner oatmeal. Microwave on high stirring every 20-30 seconds until desired consistency is reached. Watch carefully or it might bubble over. Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired.
ingredients: old fashioned oats, light vanilla soymilk, water, unsweetened baking cocoa, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, splenda granular
name: chocolate spice oatmeal

steps: Place the jalapenos in a large pot, cover with cold water, and cook for 1 hour. When ready to cook bring beans to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 1 hour. Stir in remaining ingredients cover and simmer 3 hours or till beans are tender. Add more water if necessary.
ingredients: jalapenos, cayenne, fresh ground black pepper, chili powder, pinto beans, salt pork, onions, garlic
name: red caldwell s prize winnin pintos

steps: Melt butter or olive oil in a large skillet. Add onion and celery in butter and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture is smooth and bubbly. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture is smooth
ingredients: broccoli, mild cheddar cheese, low sodium chicken broth, dijon-style mustard, egg, dried rosemary, tomatoes
name: welsh rarebit with broiled tomatoes and broccoli

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving.
ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, water, onion, whole kernel corn, salsa con queso, tater tots
name: taco tater tots casserole

steps: Place pork chops on top of pressure cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 7 hours. Warm the other half of pressure cooker stir together half of the can of lemon juice, lemon juice, mace, and bouillon granules. Mix well. Place pork chops on top of mixture. Cover and cook on
ingredients: pork chops, cooking oil, lemons, onions, salt, pepper, ketchup, water
name: lemon pork chops pressure cooker

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add noodles and vegetables. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain. Meanwhile, heat oil in large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat. Meanwhile,
ingredients: pasta, chicken, sliced almonds, butter, orange rind, lemon, rind of, sour cream, salt, pepper, chicken broth
name: citrus chicken and noodles

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken breasts, russian salad dressing, apricot preserves, dry onion soup mix. Add chicken breasts, russian salad dressing, apricot preserves, dry onion
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, russian salad dressing, apricot preserves, dry onion soup mix
name: sweet sticky chicken

steps: In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks.
ingredients: steak fillets, oil, leeks, chicken stock, pepper
name: fillet steak with pepper cheese sauce

steps: In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles.
ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, hot red pepper flakes, sugar snap peas, frozen green pea, snow peas, soy sauce, sesame oil, toasted sesame seeds
name: three pea stir fry

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add flour and stir thoroughly. Add chicken broth and cook until thickened. To the saucepan, add chicken, peas, carrots, onion and salt. Heat to boiling. Pour into a 1. 5 liter casserole. Top with uncooked biscuits. Bake at 425 8-10 minutes or until the biscuits are done.
ingredients: chicken parts, au gratin potato mix, boiling water, milk, ground mustard, onions, frozen mixed vegetables, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese
name: au gratin chicken and potato bake

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease 13-by-9-inch baking pan with cooking spray. Unroll pizza dough and press evenly over bottom and about 1 inch up sides of prepared pan. Brush dough lightly with olive oil. Sprinkle with garlic and basil. Bake pizza for about 20 minutes until crust is golden brown.
ingredients: crushed tomatoes, marinated artichoke oil, chicken stock, garlic cloves, italian seasoning, marinated artichoke hearts, salt and pepper
name: marinated artichoke tomato sauce
