steps: Place broccoli floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower floret, cauliflower fl
ingredients: miracle whip, sugar, white vinegar, broccoli florets, red onion, raisins, pumpkin seeds, bacon, cheddar cheese
name: bea s broccoli salad

steps: Place sos creamed beef in a saucepan over medium high heat. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes or until done.
ingredients: ground beef, milk, flour, garlic powder, toast
name: sos creamed beef the real one

steps: Heat olive oil in pan over medium heat and saute garlic 1 minute. Add beans and turn to coat with oil. Add lemon juice, salt& pepper and mix. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: fresh green beans, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, butter
name: garlic lemon green bean casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees and spray an oven safe serving dish with non-stick cooking spray. Using an electric mixer, blend the cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in green chilies, jalapeno peppers, and mexican and mozzarella cheeses. Spoon this mixture into the prepared baking dish. Mix together the panko and parmesan cheese and sprinkle it over the cream cheese mixture. Spray the panko and parmesan with a quick spray of non-stick cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the mixture is hot and the topping is lightly browned.
ingredients: reduced-fat cream cheese, blue cheese, green onions, jalapeno pepper, roasted red pepper, black pepper, garlic powder, flour tortillas, lean bacon
name: johnny jalapeno s mexican bacon and cheese hors d oeuvres

steps: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and lightly cook the onion and garlic until golden. Add the water, stock, zucchini and basil. Bring to the boil, lower heat and simmer for about 10 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Process in a food processor until smooth return to pan, add the milk. And heat do not boil.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, water, zucchini, red bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic cloves, fennel seed, salt and pepper, basil leaves
name: summer garden soup

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a mixing bowl, beat together butter, cream cheese and milk. Beat in sugar and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour. Stir in walnuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls 2-inches apart on to ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 10-12 minutes or until edges begin to slightly brown.
ingredients: butter, sugar, cream cheese, egg, milk, vanilla, chocolate, plain flour, baking powder, pecan nuts
name: chocolate cheese cookies

steps: Mix together all ingredients in a plastic bag and add steak. Refrigerate and marinate for 4 to 8 hours, flipping the steaks occasionally. Remove steaks from refrigerator 30 minutes before grilling. Drain and discard marinade from steaks. Grill over medium heat until steaks reach your desired doneness. Remove from grill and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
ingredients: sirloin steaks, flour, olive oil, onion, italian spices, dry red wine
name: sirloin italian style

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, paprika, boneless skinless chicken breasts, canola oil, salsa, apricot preserves, apricot nectar, brown rice
name: apricot salsa chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the pork is nicely browned on both sides. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the mar
ingredients: pork tenderloin, oil, white onion, carrots, pineapple chunks, water, barbecue sauce, ground ginger, green bell pepper, minute white rice
name: caribbean pork n rice

steps: Place potatoes on a piece of heavy duty foil coated with nonstick spray. Sprinkle with onion, boullin, seasoned salt and pepper. Drizzle with butter. Fold foil around potatoes and seal tightly. Grill, covered over direct medium heat for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once.
ingredients: sweet onion, butter, frozen cubed hash brown potatoes, spam, frozen peas and carrots, ground black pepper, salt, garlic powder, sharp cheddar cheese
name: spam and vegetable hash

steps: In a large bowl cream together butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat in egg. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Beat in oatmeal and chocolate chips until well blended. On a baking sheet place a ball of dough 2 inches between each other. Bake at 350 degrees f. For about 8-10 minutes.
ingredients: butter, brown sugar, quick oats, corn syrup, mini chocolate chip, walnut pieces, mini marshmallows
name: no bake rocky road cookies

steps: Over medium-high, melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a 12-inch nonstick skillet. Add the onion. Cook stirring for 3-5 minutes, until tender. Reduce to medium-low heat, adding in the brown sugar. Cook until onion is glazed and golden, around 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally. While cooking, spread mustard over 4 slices of bread. Place cheese slice on each piece of bread. Spoon the onion mixture evenly over cheese and other bread slices. Spread tops of sandwiches with 1 tablespoon of butter. In skillet, over medium-low, heat until hot, placing buttered side down. Spread remaining butter on other sides and cook until cheese has melted. Serve warm.
ingredients: onion, sugar, salt, spicy brown mustard, horseradish, honey, light whole wheat bread, ham, gruyere cheese, mixed greens
name: ham caramelized onion grilled cheese

steps: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with paddle attachment, beat cream cheese, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Add cream cheese mixture and beat on low speed for 1 minute. Add onion mixture and beat on high speed for 1 minute. Add chili powder mixture and beat on low speed for 1 minute. Add chili powder mixture and beat
ingredients: lean ground beef, onions, green peppers, chili seasoning mix, mexican-style diced tomatoes, chili beans, tomato juice, garlic salt, tabasco sauce, unsweetened cocoa powder
name: rob s super bowl chili

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan, add onion and garlic, cook, stirring until the onion is soft. Pour the chicken stock into the saucepan with the onion and garlic and bring to the boil. Add the potatoes, boil uncovered for 5 minutes. Stir in the peas, bring to the boil and cook for a further 5 minutes or until the chopped potatoes are tender. Blend potato and pea mixture in batches until smooth. Serve soup with sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: yellow split peas, ham bone, onion, celery ribs, carrots, garlic clove, bay leaf, pepper, red onion, white vinegar
name: soupe aux pois pea soup

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine first 5 ingredients. Cut in butter with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Reserve 1 tbsp whipping cream. Add remaining whipping cream and chopped cranberries to dry ingredients, stirring just until dry ingredients are moist. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead 5- 6 times. Shape into an 8-inch circle. Cut into 8 wedges, and place on a lightly greased baking sheet. Prick wedges with a fork 3- 4 times, and brush with reserved 1 tbsp whipping cream. Bake at 425 for 18 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve warm with whipped cream drizzled on top.
ingredients: dried cranberries, boiling water, orange juice, bourbon, orange peel, gingerroot, unsalted butter, veal scallops, green onion
name: veal scallops with cranberry citrus compote

steps: In a large saucepan, heat butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and corn syrup. Add corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn syrup, corn
ingredients: light brown sugar, light corn syrup, butter, cream of tartar, salt, baking soda, popped corn
name: diana s favourite caramel corn

steps: In a medium sauce pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, celery, celery leafs, peppercorns, and bay leafs. Cook until very dark but not burned. 40-50 minutes. Stir in the flour and cook for 2-3 minutes. Slowly pour in the broth while stirring constantly. Bring to a boil, and then drop the heat to low, cover, and cook for 20 minutes. Strain through a cheesecloth and serve immediately. Enjoy.
ingredients: unsalted butter, low sodium chicken broth, kitchen bouquet, wondra flour, salt, poultry seasoning, black pepper
name: the perfect gravy

steps: Heat oil in a pot and saute garlic until golden brown. Add onion, potato, rice, broth, parsley, and 2 cups water. Stir, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Add more water if soup appears too thick. Stir in cheese and serve.
ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, onion, potato, cooked rice, vegetable broth, water, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese
name: potato rice soup

steps: Place chocolate in double boiler over low heat, stirring constantly until just melted. Add puff pastry, egg, milk chocolate, sugar, vanilla, salt, chocolate sprinkles, shredded coconut, finely chopped walnuts. Blend well. Remove from heat and cool 5 minutes. Roll small amounts of chocolate, about the size of a walnut, into balls. Coat with chocolate sprinkles, shredded coconut, finely chopped walnuts. Transfer to a cookie sheet and refrigerate until set.
ingredients: frozen puff pastry, egg, milk chocolate, sugar
name: petits pains au chocolat

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Remove stems from oven and place on cookie sheet. In frying pan, cook sausage over medium heat until brown. Then drain grease. Add breadcrumbs and mozzarella cheese and stir to mix. Stuff into mushroom caps. Bake 10-15 minutes until cheese starts to brown on top and the mushrooms are sizzling.
ingredients: mushrooms, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic clove, romano cheese, italian parsley, mushroom stems, salt
name: italian stuffed mushrooms

steps: Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus.
ingredients: boneless pork roast, tomato sauce, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, ground mustard
name: tender pork roast in the slow cooker

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place liners in muffin cups and bake until golden brown and a wooden pick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: fresh blueberries, baking powder, light margarine, splenda granular, all-purpose flour, honey, skim milk, salt, eggs, vanilla
name: blueberry muffins with splenda

steps: Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, chili con carne, whole kernel corn, tamales, garbanzo beans, olive, green chili, cheese
name: fiesta casserole

steps: Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat. Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Stir in tomatoes and salt. Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes. Serve with pasta.
ingredients: hot peppers, tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, pickling salt, pickling spices
name: red hot pepper sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Mix first 7 ingredients by hand or in blender. Pour into pie crust, bake 30 minutes until set. Remove and refrigerate overnight. Spread whole wheat cottage cheese filling on top, serve.
ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, eggs, butter, milk, whole wheat flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, nutmeg
name: whole wheat cottage cheese pancakes

steps: Place ribs in a large stock pot, and cover with water. Bring to a boil, and cook for 15 minutes. In a mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, garlic, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, and soy sauce. Remove ribs from water, and transfer to a slow cooker. Pour sauce over ribs. Cover, and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, or until ribs are tender. If sauce is too thin when cooking time is done, drain sauce from ribs, and pour into a sauce pan. Combine 1 teaspoon cornstarch with a small amount of cold water, stir into sauce, and bring to a boil. Cook until sauce has reached desired thickness.
ingredients: pork spareribs, chicken broth, brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, ketchup, seasoning salt
name: polynesian slow cooker spareribs

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line shallow roasting pan with foil. Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear. Remove from heat. Stir in brown sugar until well mixed. Place chicken breast halves in sprayed foil-lined pan. Spread garlic mixture evenly over chicken. Bake at 400 degrees for
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian style breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, apricot preserves
name: mommy s candy chicken

steps: Cover potatoes with water, bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer for 25 minutes, until done. When cooled, peel and cut into chunks. Place in 2-qt baking dish. In small saucepan combine remaining ingredients, cook and stir until mixture boils. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350f for 40 minutes.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, marshmallow cream, margarine, brown sugar, salt, marshmallows
name: fluffy stuffed sweet potatoes

steps: In a large saucepan, combine peanuts, oil, black mustard seeds, cloves, cumin seed, red onion, tomatoes, tomato paste, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry powder, curry
ingredients: unsalted peanuts, oil, black mustard seeds, cloves, cumin seed, red onion, tomatoes, tomato paste, curry powder
name: tomato chutney

steps: In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together. Fold until all is blended. Keep refrigerated in mason jars with lids, or in containers with tightly fitting lids. To make garlic bread, slice french bread and place on cookie sheet. Spoon spread onto bread. Toast, bake, or broil until cheese is bubbly and nicely browned.
ingredients: garlic clove, cream cheese, butter, dried oregano, dried dill weed, dried basil, dried marjoram, dried thyme, pepper
name: boursin cheese spread copycat

steps: Place all the ingreients except the maple syrup, flaxseed oil, and nuts in a medium saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring once or twice. Remove from heat and let sit, covered, for 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in maple syrup and flaxseed oil, if using. Sprinkle one tablespoon nuts over each serving, if desired.
ingredients: apple, apple juice, quick-cooking oats, ground cinnamon, salt, walnuts, honey, vanilla extract
name: apple walnut oatmeal

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix first 4 ingredients. Pour into pie plate or similar small baking dish. Bake for 30 minutes. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon of apricot fruit spread over cheese. Top each with 4 cucumber slices, a slice of swiss cheese and remaining bread slices. Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Cook sandwiches over medium heat until golden on bottoms, about 5 minutes. Spray tops of sandwiches with cooking spray and brown on the other side.
ingredients: light cream cheese, swiss cheese, miracle whip light, sliced almonds, green onions
name: hot creamy swiss almond spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes.
ingredients: butter, pinhead oats, water, half-and-half, salt
name: irish pin oats

steps: In small bowl, combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve on a bed of lettuce leaves.
ingredients: carrot juice, thyme, salt, cayenne, quick-cooking barley, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, black beans, diced tomato, avocado
name: barley black bean avocado salad

steps: Place potatoes in casserole. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Cook 20 minutes or until potatoes are soft. Drain well, and puree in a food processor, food mill, or blender. Return potato mixture to pot, add milk and salt and heat through. Sprinkle paprika over potatoes to garnish if desired.
ingredients: idaho potatoes, cheese, heavy cream, cilantro, salt
name: salpicon scalloped potatoes

steps: In the bowl of a mixer, blend gluten free mix ingredients, xanthan gum, sugar, salt, and milk powder. Add the water and beat on medium speed for 1 minute. Remove dough from mixer and form a ball. Divide into 6 or 8 parts and roll out each piece very thin until it forms a 10 to 12 round. Roll all the pieces, separating them with plastic wrap or wax paper before cooking. Heat a griddle to medium-hot or hot and cook each tortilla about 1 minute per side.
ingredients: chickpea flour, gluten-free cornflour, tapioca flour, salt, eggs, water
name: gluten free tortillas

steps: Combine ketchup, brown sugar, water, dry onion soup mix, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, soya sauce, garlic powder, so
ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, water, dry onion soup mix, garlic powder, soya sauce
name: pork steak chop sauce

steps: Heat oven to 375f. Cut bananas crosswise into halves. Cut each half lengthwise into halves and arrange in greased 9-inch pie plate. Dot with margarine or butter and drizzle with orange and lemon juices. Sprinkle with brown sugar and coconut. Bake until coconut is golden, 8 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: bananas, brown sugar, butter, orange juice, dark rum, coconut cream
name: jamaican rummed baked bananas

steps: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first 7 ingredients. Add the steaks. Seal the bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. Drain and discard marinade. Grill roma steaks, uncovered, over medium-hot heat for 8-10 minutes or desired doneness.
ingredients: rib eye steaks, fresh rosemary leaves, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, lemon, juice of
name: rib eye steaks roma style

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, salt, cayenne pepper, water, flour, eggs, asiago cheese, parmesan cheese, pecorino pepato cheese
name: wisconsin asiago cheese puffs

steps: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Stir in ice cream until melted. Add strawberries and cake broken into small pieces. Chill until set. Slice in squares. Top with whipped cream.
ingredients: hostess twinkies, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, hot water, fat-free cool whip, fresh strawberries
name: strawberry twinkie cake

steps: Sprinkle salt and pepper over the pumpkin and bake for 20 minutes or until the pumpkin is tender. Remove from oven and let cool for 10 minutes or until the pumpkin is tender. Remove from oven and let cool for 10
ingredients: olive oil, onion, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, rindless bacon, pumpkin, feta, silver beet
name: silverbeet with bacon pumpkin and feta recipe

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. For crust, mix cake mix, egg, and 1 stick of melted butter with a large spoon and pat into the bottom and up the sides of pan. For filling mix cream cheese, peanut butter, and eggs together with mixer until smooth, scraping down the sides. Add powdered sugar and vanilla. Mix until smooth. Pour the filling over the crust and bake 25 - 30 minutes. Check after 25 minutes. When it is done, the edges will pull away from the sides of pan and the filling will have browned, but middle should be very gooey. It will still jiggle.
ingredients: cream cheese, butter, egg, vanilla extract, chocolate cake mix
name: gooey chocolate cookies

steps: In an oblong dish, layer first lettuce then cauliflower. Spread mayonnaise over cauliflower, then make a layer of chopped onion. Spread bacon over the onion, then make a layer of parmesan cheese. Last, spread the sugar over the cheese. Refrigerate overnight, then toss before serving.
ingredients: iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, sunflower seeds, crouton
name: salad

steps: Mix orange jell-o, gelatin, orange juice, peach schnapps in a blender about 1 minute on high. Add gelatin and blend until gelatin is dissolved. Add peach schnapps and blend for about 1 minute. Pour into glasses slowly. Refrigerate and it will separate just like you remember it.
ingredients: orange jell-o, gelatin, orange juice, peach schnapps
name: fuzzy navel jello shots

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Place rolls, 1 buttered side down, in skillet. Cook until browned slightly, about 2 minutes per side. Open rolls. Fill with lettuce, then lobster mixture, serve immediately.
ingredients: rolls, butter, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese
name: stuffed rolls

steps: Combine the wine, orange juice, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple, pineapple
ingredients: orange, lemon, rum, grand marnier, rioja wine, orange juice, pomegranate juice, lemon juice, sugar, club soda
name: new year s eve red sangria

steps: Place the fizzy drink in a large mixing bowl. Add the lemon juice, salt, syrup, and ice water. Stir well and pour into glasses.
ingredients: lemon, gingerroot, water, splenda sugar substitute, seltzer water, ice
name: ginger lemon fizzy

steps: Spray a 13x9 inch baking pan with cooking spray. Put drumsticks in the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. In a bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients. Take drumsticks out of the oven and pour sauce mixture over them. Bake at
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, pepper, chicken drumsticks, margarine
name: delicious drumsticks

steps: Combine all the ingredients in a sauce pan, bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes, cool a bit. Place the slabs of ribs in a large plastic bag and pour in the sauce, turn to coat the ribs and seal the bag. Marinate in the fridge for at least an hour. Remove ribs from the marinade and reserve the marinade. Place ribs over medium heat and grill for 50-60 minutes turning the ribs and basting with the marinade during the last 20 minutes of cooking.
ingredients: your favorite barbecue rub, low-carb barbecue sauce, baby back rib rack, plastic wrap, aluminum foil
name: best barbecued baby back ribs

steps: Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set.
ingredients: red beets, walnut oil, white balsamic vinegar, fresh green beans, walnut pieces, egg, parsley, goat cheese
name: crumbled goat cheese red beet and green bean tartare

steps: Heat oil in a nonstick skillet, add one tortilla. Layer with half the cheddar cheese, all of the chicken and mushrooms and half of the monterey jack cheese. Top with the second tortilla. Cover and heat until cheese melts and bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown. Turn over. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Cook until bottom tortilla is crisp and golden brown and cheese is melted. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.
ingredients: eggs, tabasco sauce, tabasco jalapeno sauce, parmesan cheese, flour tortilla
name: breakfast scramble quesadilla

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut chicken in half. Mix water and egg togther in a small bowl. Mix bread crumbs and cheese together in separate bowl. Dip each piece of chicken in egg mixture then in bread mixture. Then set in a greased 9x13 greased pan. Cook for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: chicken drumsticks, italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, ground rosemary, egg, milk
name: italian parmesan baked chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Grease a 9x13 baking pan. In a large bowl combine cherry pie filling, lemon juice, white cake mix, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice, lemon juice
ingredients: cherry pie filling, lemon juice, white cake mix, butter
name: sweet dreams crunch cherry dump cake

steps: In a food processor, finely chop the walnuts and garlic. Add cilantro, parsley, salt and pepper and process until finely chopped. With processor running, slowly add the oil to create a smoothe puree. Place chicken in large, resealable bag plastic bag, add the marinade and seal tightly. Make sure marinade is evenly distributed on all the chicken tenders. Refrigerate for 2 hours. Remove chicken from bag and thread on skewers. Grill over direct high heat for about 6 to 8 mins, turning over once. Serve warm with lime wedges.
ingredients: rigatoni pasta, olive oil, fresh cilantro leaves, garlic, dried oregano leaves, pine nuts, black olives, salt, pepper
name: cilantro pesto pasta salad

steps: In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda, popcornpreparation:In a large bowl, combine the
ingredients: popped popcorn, cheerios toasted oat cereal, chex cereal, salted peanuts, brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, vanilla, baking soda
name: popcorn snacking mix

steps: Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350 f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars.
ingredients: butter pecan cake mix, butter, egg, caramel topping
name: cake mix butterscotch bars

steps: Place potatoes in an 8 inch square baking dish which has been wiped down with shortening or sprayed with pam. Potatoes will thaw over night in the fridge. Sprinkle dish with cheese, ham and onions. In a separate bowl, beate eggs, evaporated milk, pepper and salt together. Pour into baking dish over the potato mixture. Cover and refridgerate for several hours or overnight. Remove from refridgerator 30 minutes before baking. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 55-60 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
ingredients: frozen hash browns, ham, onion, green bell pepper, monterey jack cheese, eggs, skim milk, salt, black pepper
name: crock pot western omelet casserole

steps: Place all ingredients in a roaster. Cover the roaster with plastic wrap and then foil to seal. Bake at 250 for 8 hours. Remove coverings and stir. Remove bone and cartilage as meat will have fallen off. Turn oven up to 350. Continue cooking for 1 hour stirring occasionally as the dish caramelizes. Serve with mashed potatoes.
ingredients: pork chops, sauerkraut, onion, garlic, beer, salt, pepper, summer savory
name: pork chops sauerkraut in beer

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Place marinated pork in a roasting pan, and bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, basting meat often with marinade. Remove from the oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, fresh parsley, fresh thyme, garlic, fresh rosemary, butter, olive oil
name: herb and garlic roast pork tenderloin

steps: Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold.
ingredients: butter, olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, lemon juice, garlic cloves, ground black pepper, chicken wings
name: african chicken wings

steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except the italian bread crumbs. Vegetable oil. Form into 2 inch meatballs. For more intense italian flavor, roll each meatball in the italian bread crumbs. This is optional. If you are going to put the meatballs in sauce or soup do not roll in the crumbs. Place on a baking pan that is non-stick. Preheat oven 375. Cook on the middle rack for 30 - 35 minutes. Makes 25 to 30 meatballs.
ingredients: bulgar wheat, ground lamb, onion, garlic, raisins, cumin, ground cinnamon, allspice, egg, fresh parsley
name: turkish meatballs

steps: Cream butter and sugar to the consistency of mayonnaise, adding sugar gradually. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Add dry ingredients alternately with sour cream. Drop by heaping teaspoons onto a cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 degrees f for about 10 to 12 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, margarine, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, toffee pieces
name: skor cookies

steps: Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius. Place chopped butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat until light and creamy. Add egg and beat well. Using a flat knife, mix through flours and coconut until a soft dough forms. Mix chocolate chips into the dough. Using your hands, mould two tablespoons of dough mixture into a flat round. Place rounds on a baking tray that is lined with non stick baking paper. Repeat until all the mixture is used. Bake for 10 minutes or until light golden. Allow to cool on trays.
ingredients: self-raising flour, cinnamon, butter, coconut, caster sugar, golden syrup, jam
name: golden coconut crisps

steps: Heat oven to 200 degrees c. Melt butter and allow it to cool. Use 1 tablespoon to coat 10 muffin tin moulds or individual oval baking moulds measuring 5 x 10 cm. Sift icing sugar and flour into bowl, mix in the ground almonds. Lightly beat egg whites with a fork, fold them into dry ingredients. Add cooled, melted butter and orange rind, mix well. Three quarters fill each mould with mixture and bake on the middle shelf of oven for 10 minutes. Turn tray around, and bake for another 5- 10 minutes, till tops are golden, and springy to the touch. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes, then gently unmould onto a wire tray and leave to cool. Dust the friands with icing sugar to serve.
ingredients: cracked ice, lemonade, fresca soda, lime
name: fresca refresher

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher, stirring until sugar dissolves. Taste at this point and if you want it a little sweeter, add a little bit more sugar. Add fruit slices and cranberries. Cover and chill at least 8 hours. Stir in club soda. Pour sangria into 6 ice-filled glasses, being sure to include some fruit.
ingredients: orange, lemon, rum, grand marnier, riesling wine, vodka, lemon juice, sugar, granny smith apple, club soda
name: new year s eve white sangria

steps: Preheat oven to 350. In a small bowl combine the garlic and oil and mix well. In a small bowl combine parsley, thyme, marjoram and paprika. Add parmesan. Mix well. Cut each loaf lengthwise. Brush with garlic oil. Sprinkle herb mix on top of garlic oil. Wrap loosely in foil and place on baking sheet. Bake until heated through, about 10-15 minutes. Unwrap and slice.
ingredients: french bread, butter, mayonnaise, dried parsley, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic cloves
name: crowd favorite garlic bread

steps: Combine all ingredients and bring to soft ball stage, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Stir until mixture thickens, becomes creamy and cloudy, and pecans stay suspended in mixture. Spoon out on aluminum foil or parchment paper. Makes approximately fifteen to twenty pralines, depending on size.
ingredients: sugar, margarine, evaporated milk, vanilla flavoring, pecan halves
name: pecan pralines old fashioned

steps: Place candy corn, peanut butter, chocolate almond bark, candy coating in a food processor. Process until smooth. Pour into bars.
ingredients: candy corn, creamy peanut butter, chocolate almond bark, candy coating
name: butterfinger candy

steps: Whip the softened cream cheese together with the cream cheese and egg mixture until smooth. Place one layer of the sliced strawberries on top of the cheesecake mixture and pour on the lemon pie filling, spreading till even. Place in fridge to set and cool at least 1 hour. Garnish with cool whip and fanned strawberries at serving time.
ingredients: cream cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, garlic cloves, pepper jelly, cracker
name: red pepper jelly cheesecake

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown.
ingredients: ground beef, butter, chicken bouillon powder, chili sauce, cream cheese, flour tortillas
name: pasilla chili ground meat burritos

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet on medium-high. Add onion, garlic clove, potatoes, sweetcorn, dried oregano, egg, edam cheese, eggs and cook for about 5 minutes or until the top is bubbly and slightly browned. Cut in wedgse to serve.
ingredients: oil, onion, garlic clove, potatoes, sweetcorn, dried oregano, egg, edam cheese, eggs
name: corn and potato fritters

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees c. Place biscuit mix, rosemary, cream, salt, smoked ham, orange zest, sugar in a large mixing bowl. Mix the ingredients well together with fingers. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until light golden and hollow when tapped on top. Serve with jam and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and cream or honey and
ingredients: biscuit mix, rosemary, cream, salt, smoked ham, orange zest, sugar
name: rosemary and ham scones

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Unroll dough into large rectangle on ungreased baking sheet. Seal perforations. Melt butter in saucepan, cooking and stirring until light golden brown. Add almonds and sugar. Stirring to coat. Spoon and spread this mixture evenly over the dough. Bake for 12 to 16 minutes until crust is deep golden brown. Cool 10 to 15 minutes. Cut into triangles and serve.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cream cheese, egg, sugar, almond extract, sliced almonds
name: almond pastry

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oil, salt. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, vegetable oil, salt, soymilk, cinnamon
name: easy vegan pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a non-stick skillet brown meat with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, hamburger, spaghetti sauce, velveeta cheese, mozzarella cheese
name: cheesy crock pot lasagna

steps: In a large non-stick skillet, saute the bulgur wheat, onion, and bulgur wheat in butter until tender. Transfer to a 13-inch by 9-inch by 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Stir in the broth, barley, and pepper. Cover and bake at 350f for 50 minutes. Uncover and bake for another 5-10 minutes or until bulgur wheat is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Decrease heat to low and cook
ingredients: vegetable stock, onion, bulgur wheat, salt
name: easy soft seasoned bulgur

steps: Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake another 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, kosher dill pickles, miracle whip light, sugar, pepper
name: light chicken salad with pickles

steps: Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add octopus, olive oil, oregano, black pepper, sea salt, vinegar. Continue to stir-fry until octopus is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: octopus, olive oil, oregano, black pepper, sea salt, vinegar
name: chtapodi ladorigani

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, noodles, diced tomatoes, corn, condensed tomato soup, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, garlic salt
name: casserole dinner

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, bulk italian sausage, onion, vegetable oil, tomato bisque soup, milk, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, broccoli florets
name: sausage macaroni supper

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan. Cream butter with sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until combined well. Beat in egg, vanilla and salt. Add flour and beat just until combined. Stir in coconut. Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan. Sprinkle peanuts over, pressing them in lightly. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a tester comes out clean. Let cool, cut into 24 bars and then the bar on the diagonal, making 48 cookies.
ingredients: peanut butter, honey, seedless raisin, vanilla, flaked coconut
name: peanut butter coconuts

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking for another 10 minutes. Remove foil and continue baking for another 10
ingredients: russet potatoes, fresh ground black pepper, butter, beef broth
name: cheeseless scalloped potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 350f and line a couple of baking sheets with parchment paper. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and the sugar, beating with an electric mixer until light. Beat in the egg and orange zest. With the mixer on low speed, gradually add in the flour mixture, stirring only until just combined. Stir in the cranberries and chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets and bake for 9-12 minutes, until the edges are very lightly browned. Cool for 3-4 minutes on baking sheet then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: egg whites, cream of tartar, sugar, whole berry cranberry sauce, dried cranberries
name: cranberry cookie kisses

steps: Place the bratwurst in a large plastic ziploc bag. In a large bowl whisk together beer, corn syrup, onions, mustard, chili powder, garlic and black pepper. Pour the marinade over the bratwurst. Seal the bag tightly and turn to coat the meat. Place the bag in a large bowl and place in the refrigerator for 8-24 hours. When ready to cook prepare the rotisserie. Remove the roast from the marinade and bring to almost room temperature before cooking. Place the roast on the spit then set over heat and baste every 10-15 minutes or the internal temperature reads 155-160f. Discard any remaining marinade. Remove the roast from the spit and let rest for 15 minutes before slicing.
ingredients: bratwursts, dark beer, onion, ginger, water, coriander, cumin, spicy brown mustard
name: beer and brats

steps: Combine all the ingredients except the oil in a large plastic zip lock bag, mix well so the meat is coated. Place in the fridge for at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove pork from marinade -save marinade. Heat oil in a skillet and saute the pork over medium high heat for 3 minutes, flip and continue cooking for another 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. Pour in the marinade cook for an additional 3 minutes or until the sauce has
ingredients: hoisin sauce, fresh ginger, sesame oil, sesame seeds, pork tenderloin
name: sesame pork tenderloin

steps: Dice the white cabbage, carrots and onion long and thin. Mix carrots, cabbage and onion in a big bowl with a wooden spoon. Boil pasta and chicken separately. Then add all the ingredients and mix. Seal it with clingfilm and refrigerate.
ingredients: cabbage, carrot, onions, sugar, salt, white pepper, milk, mayonnaise, white vinegar, lemon juice
name: kfc coleslaw

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, stewed tomatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper
name: not your average macaroni and cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute butter, garlic, oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper, parmesan cheese, oregano, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper. Combine cheese, oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper, parmesan cheese, oregano, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper. Cook steaks under broiler, turning once. For rare, cook 8-10 minutes. For medium cook 12-14 minutes. For well done cook 18-20 minutes.
ingredients: butter, garlic, oregano, basil, thyme, black pepper
name: italian butter

steps: In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender.
ingredients: chicken fillets, apricot nectar, french onion soup, apricot halves, cellophane noodles, oil, stir fry vegetables
name: apricot noodle chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease a roasting pan or baking dish. Heat oil in a large skillet. Season the beef or pork steak with salt and pepper, then brown on both sides. Place into the prepared pan and top with the onion slices. In a bowl mix the bbq sauce, soy sauce and garlic then pour over meat in the pan. Cover tightly with foil then make a couple of slits in the foil with a sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Cook until meat is fork-tender, about 1 hour.
ingredients: chuck, dry mustard, garlic salt, onion salt, celery salt, salt, pepper, mayonnaise, vinegar, kitchen bouquet
name: basting sauce for roast for company

steps: In a 9 x 9 pan, melt butter. Beat eggs lightly in a large bowl. Add flour and baking powder. Combine. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients, except salsa. Combine cheese mixture to the flour. Blend well. Pour batter into pan and bake at 400f for 14 minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake 35-40 minutes longer. Cut into appetizer size squares and serve warm with salsa.
ingredients: eggs, double cream, gruyere cheese, nutmeg, pepper
name: oeufs en cocotte la suisse

steps: In a saucepan, soften fusilli and garlic in oil. Add celery salt and pepper. Add chicken stock and potatoes. Bring to boil. Cover and let simmer about 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Add spinach and keep cooking 1 minute. In blender, reduce in a creamy puree and homogeneous. Adjust seasoning. You can serve with firm plain yogurt on top. Or if you have people over, you can use whipped cream instead of yogurt.
ingredients: fusilli, extra virgin olive oil, leek, heavy cream, baby spinach, basil leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: fusilli with creamed leek and spinach

steps: Heat grill. In small bowl, combine pork chops with salt and pepper. Mix well. Place pork chops on gas grill over medium heat or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until pork is no longer pink in center, turning once and brushing occasionally with sauce.
ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, garlic pepper seasoning, real maple syrup, chardonnay wine, peaches, sweet onion, cooked couscous, fresh herb
name: maple pork and peach skewers

steps: Combine in a large pan the sugar, granulated sugar, cream, butter, pecans, cinnamon, brown sugar, mini marshmallows, flour, pecans, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly.
ingredients: brown sugar, granulated sugar, cream, butter, pecans
name: pralines aux pacanes pecan pralines

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place eggplant slices on a baking sheet and place under broiler. Bake at 350 for 15 minutes, until golden brown. Turn round once while baking.
ingredients: flour, salt, fresh ground pepper, non-dairy coffee creamer, eggs, eggplant, vegetable oil
name: southern battered eggplant aubergine

steps: Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth. Remove from heat and add in vanilla. Whisk until frothy. Pour into warmed mugs. Garnish with whipped cream.
ingredients: white sugar, cocoa, salt, water, butter, homogenized milk, heavy cream, maple syrup, pure vanilla extract, marshmallows
name: hot chocolate new england style

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Rinse, drain and hull berries. Turn into bowl and sprinkle with sugar and lemon juice. Toss gently to coat. Turn coated berries into shallow casserole or 10-inch ovenproof skillet and arrange in a single layer. Roast, stirring twice, until berries are just softened and syrup forms, about 5 minutes. Remove from oven. Stir in strawberry puree, pineapple, and lemon juice. Spoon mixture into a 13x9 inch pan. Freeze until firm. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes before serving.
ingredients: orange rind, orange juice, granulated sugar, real vanilla, cornstarch, fresh strawberries, brandy
name: strawberries jubilee fat free

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place the bread on a baking sheet and bake until golden brown, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.
ingredients: tomatoes, garlic clove, green onions, black olives, oregano, french bread, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese
name: fiesta bruschetta

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine mustard, honey and curry powder. Spread over chicken pieces. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. Remove from oven. Turn the chicken pieces over. With a spoon, baste with sauce. Bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked.
ingredients: boneless chicken breast, vegetable oil, garlic, honey mustard, red potatoes, broccoli stems, low-fat cheddar cheese
name: honey mustard chicken casserole

steps: Place potatoes in even layer in greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Combine 3 cups cheese, mayonnaise and onion in medium bowl. Spread mixture over potatoes. Sprinkle potato mixture with bacon, peppers and olives. Bake in preheated 350f oven 35 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 5 minutes more.
ingredients: new potatoes, mayonnaise, aioli, lemon juice, spring onion
name: wicklewood s addictive potato salad warm or cold

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the breadcrumbs, sesame seeds, five-spice and a little seasoning on a plate. Pat dry the chicken, dip into egg, then roll in the breadcumb mix. Arrange on the baking tray, then bake for 25 to 30 minutes until crips and cooked through. Mix the soy sauce with the citrus juices and sogar to make a dipping sauce. Serve the chicken with little dishes of the sauce for dipping, plus lime wedges for squeezing over.
ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh ginger, orange marmalade, dark soy sauce, chicken thighs, sesame seeds
name: baked sesame marmalade chicken

steps: Saut garlic in butter until soft. Add cream and bring to a boil. Slowly add parmesan, allowing to melt. Season with salt and pepper and add some chopped parsley for color. Serve immediately.
ingredients: butter, heavy whipping cream, ground nutmeg, ground black pepper, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt, fettuccine pasta
name: mean chef s fettuccine alfredo

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Heat olive oil over medium heat, add onions and saute until tender, about 10 minutes. Add honey and vinegar, reduce heat and saute until onions are golden brown, about another 8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Place pizza crust on pizza stone or baking sheet, sprinkle with cheese and thyme. Top this with onion mixture, then mushrooms. Cook for about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: pizza crust, hummus, red onions, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, roasted red peppers, dried rosemary
name: hummus pizza with caramelized onions and roasted red peppers

steps: In a small saucepan, combine water and agar-agar flakes and bring to a boil. Gently simmer until agar has dissolved completely, about 5 minutes. Add espresso and stir until dissolved. Cool slightly. In a food processor or blender, blend tofu, maple syrup, cocoa powder, vanilla, salt and cooled espresso mixture until completely smooth. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Refrigerate for several hours or overnight until firm. Serve topped with non-dairy topping.
ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, strong coffee, hemp milk, dark chocolate, vanilla extract, soy whip
name: vegan liquid chocolate mocha

steps: Place pork chops in greased slow cooker. Top with onions and mushrooms. Combine soup mix, water, and mushroom soup. Pour over mushrooms and onions. Cover. Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 4-5. Serve over rice or cooked noodles.
ingredients: pork loin chops, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, button mushrooms, apple juice, cream, chives
name: seared pork chops with creamy mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Unroll the crescent dough and place in a circle on round stone, with the wide ends in the middle and the pointed ends to the outside. You should have an circle in the middle of the stone. You will need to overlap the wide ends a bit to make a circle. Mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, using more mayo if mixture appears to be dry. Place the mixture in a circle on the crescent rolls on the wide ends. Fold the pointed ends over the mixture to the middle of the stone. Tuck the ends under. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the crescent rolls are golden brown. Slice and serve.
ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, vegetables, cooked chicken, chicken gravy, cheddar cheese, onion, pepper
name: chicken dinner

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a small bowl combine the mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, dijon mustard, brown mustard and oregano. Mix well to combine then season with salt and pepper to taste. Using a spoon top each tomato slice with a small amount of mayo mixture. Sprinkle each slice with mozzarella cheese, then sprinkle with chopped parsley. Bake for about 10-15 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: dijon mustard, white wine, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, chicken pieces
name: parmesan dijon baked chicken

steps: Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: wide egg noodles, mushroom, onion, cheese, egg, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper, butter
name: noodles with mushrooms

steps: In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops.
ingredients: pork spareribs, soy sauce, sesame oil, honey, chinese five spice powder
name: pork spareribs with honey soy and sesame

steps: Combine the chicken stock, water, chicken bouillon cubes, cream of chicken soup, egg noodles, veg-all, dried dill weed, bay leaves, salt and pepper, celery salt. Bring the water almost to a boil and add the cubes. Dissolve cubes. Once it has reached a boil pour in egg noodles. Cook for 5 minutes and then add vegall, cream of soup, dill weed, bay leaf, salt, pepper, and celery salt. Continue cooking for 5 minutes. Serve with a nice grilled cheese sandwich. Ps will thicken upon standing.
ingredients: chicken stock, water, chicken breast fillets, celery rib, carrot, egg noodles, light soy sauce, green onions
name: oriental chicken noodle soup

steps: Preheat oven to 175 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil.
ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, vanilla, water, oil, eggs, frosting
name: vanilla cream cake

steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender or food processor. Whirl until smooth. Place in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate for up to two weeks. Shake well before serving.
ingredients: egg, water, all-purpose flour, dry mustard, sugar, apple cider vinegar, vegetable oil, lemon juice
name: amish cooked salad dressing

steps: Place in a medium-sized pot a couple of slices of kombu and cover with cold water. Gently bring the water to a boil and remove the kombu just before it starts to boil. Let the water boil very gently. Take one of the items, swish it around in the hot water for a few seconds to a few minutes. Combine 2 parts soy sauce with 1 part lemon juice for dipping sauce. Serve with hot steamed rice.
ingredients: water, kombu seaweed, dried shiitake mushrooms, light soy sauce, sea salt, green onion
name: shiitake dashi

steps: Preheat grill to high. Lightly oil grates. Insert two 8-inch-long metal or presoaked wooden skewers through onion slices horizontally. Place prepared skewers and remaining vegetables on one or two rimmed baking sheets. Drizzle with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, remove from baking sheets. Arrange on grill. Cook, turning occasionally, until lightly browned and tender, 4 to 8 minutes for squash and 8 to 12 minutes for onions and peppers. Remove skewers, and serve.
ingredients: butter, onion, yellow squash, red bell peppers, tomatoes, salt, pepper, fresh spinach, monterey jack cheese
name: fresh vegetable skillet dinner

steps: Preheat broiler. Combine first 4 ingredients, stirring with a whisk. Arrange fish in a shallow baking dish coated with cooking spray. Spoon miso mixture evenly over fish. Broil 10 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork, basting twice with miso mixture. Sprinkle with chives.
ingredients: salmon fillets, brown sugar, miso, soy sauce, water
name: oven roasted salmon with miso glaze

steps: In the jar of a blender, combine the cherries, yogurt, milk, cocoa, and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately.
ingredients: water, green tea bags, blueberries, ice cubes, non-fat vanilla yogurt, almonds, flax seeds
name: blueberry and green tea smoothie

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Salt and pepper the turkey cutlets in a baking pan. Cut onion and bell pepper into pieces. Sprinkle on top and sides of pork chops. Pour wine over pork chops. Bake covered for 25 minutes. Flip chops over and bake uncovered for 15 minutes.
ingredients: turkey cutlets, lemon, white wine, onion, olive oil, flour, salt & pepper
name: lemon white wine turkey steak or cutlet

steps: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a cookie sheet with no stick cooking spray. Dip chicken in butter, coat with combined remaining ingredients. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or till tender.
ingredients: chicken, paprika, garlic powder, margarine, onions, light brown sugar, soy sauce, almonds
name: caramelized chicken with almonds

steps: Spray a 12 cup bundt pan. Combine all cake ingredients and beat until well mixed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until done via toothpick test. Cool 15 minutes, remove from pan and cool completely. Combine glaze ingredients and beat on low speed until powdered sugar is moistened. Increase speed to medium and beat until creamy. Drizzle glaze over cooled cake.
ingredients: fudge cake mix, eggs, oil, sour cream, chocolate chips, kahlua, powdered sugar
name: kahlua or amaretto chocolate bundt cake
