ingredients: whole milk, cream of coconut, frozen unsweetened strawberries, banana, fresh strawberries
name: coconut banana and strawberry smoothie

steps: In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste.
ingredients: rice flour, sugar, milk, green cardamom pods, saffron thread, rose water, pistachios
name: egyptian rice pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: white potatoes, andouille sausages, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil, paprika, creole seasoning, garlic powder, ground black pepper
name: roasted creole potatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking dish. Coat fillets evenly, and not too thickly, with mayo. Sprinkle evenly with sliced onion. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 325 degrees f until done, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: fish fillets, salt, pepper, butter, lemon juice, onion
name: easy baked fish

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add rice and cook, stirring constantly. Sprinkle with salt, cumin, and taco seasoning. Cook stirring constantly, until slightly translucent. Stir in onions and cook until tender. Stir in tomato sauce and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes. Fluff with a fork.
ingredients: olive oil, white onion, long-grain white rice, water, white corn, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, poblano chiles, mexican crema, monterey jack cheese
name: easy chile and cheese rice

steps: Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the wheat flour tortillas, chopped tomato, spinach, bean sprouts, raspberries, vinegar and cook, stirring for about 5 minutes or until wilted. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the raspberries and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Season to taste and serve.
ingredients: wheat flour tortillas, chopped tomato, spinach, bean sprouts, raspberries, vinegar
name: bree s low fat tomato bean sprout and spinach wrap w raspberry

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Place chicken in baking dish. Combine flour, margarine, honey, pecans, dry breadcrumbs, butter. Brush chicken with flour mixture. Fry in oil to a nice golden brown, taking care as the chicken can burn rather easy. Turn often. Serve with mashed potatoes, a vegetable and gravy.
ingredients: skinless chicken piece, all-purpose flour, margarine, honey, pecans
name: honey pecan chicken cutlets

steps: Cook on high 8-10 hours. Remove cover during last half of cooking. Remove cover
ingredients: peaches, butter pecan cake mix, butter, flaked coconut, pecans
name: nutty peach crisp

steps: Heat the oil in a saucepan and fry the carrots gently for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 mins until soft. Add the stock or water to loosen. Stir in the parsley and seasoning. Serve.
ingredients: carrots, parsley, celery, garlic cloves
name: ww 0 points immunity building cocktail

steps: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: zucchini, carrot, celery, leek, pumpkin, shallots, wholemeal self-rising flour, olive oil, eggs
name: vegetable slice

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Add the gravy mixture to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment and beat until smooth. Add the flour mixture to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment and beat until smooth. Add the onion mixture to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment and beat until smooth. Add the beef broth mixture to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment and beat until smooth. Add the beef broth mixture to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with
ingredients: fat, flour, broth, salt and pepper
name: basic formula for gravy

steps: In a teapot or large saucepan heat water until boiling. Steep tea bags in water for 2 hours. Add lemon juice and sugar to a 2 quart pitcher. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill.
ingredients: water, green tea, granulated sugar, honey, lemon juice, ginseng extract
name: arizona green tea w gingseng honey

steps: In a large bowl, mix all brine ingredients thoroughly. In a large, deep pan combine whole salmon fillets with the brine mixture to soak over night, keeping refrigerated. Rinse thoroughly after brining. Pat dry with a paper towel and allow to air dry for at least one hour prior to smoking. Lay salmon fillets on smoker rack skin side down. Cook in smoker at 165f for 3-5 hours. Cooking time will depend on the thickness of your fillets.
ingredients: water, apple juice, honey, worcestershire sauce, non-iodized salt, accent seasoning, bay leaves
name: brine for smoking salmon or trout

steps: Drain liquid from pickles into a non reactive pan. Throw in the onion, splenda, celery seed and mustard seed. Bring to a simmer for about 20 to 30 minutes. While that is simmering chop the pickles either by hand or in the food processor to the consistancy you like your relish to be, fine or coarse. Add the 2 tablespoons of cider vinegar to the chopped pickles. Put the chopped up pickles back in the jar and pour the brine back over the whole thing. Store in the fridge and use like store bought relish.
ingredients: kosher dill pickle, onion, sugar, prepared horseradish, white vinegar, celery seed
name: horseradish pickles

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line cookie sheet with parchment paper to keep from sticking. Combine flour, sugar and pepper in a gallon plastic bag. Put one bacon slice at a time in bag and shake to coat well. Place bacon on the cookie sheet so they are not touching each other. Bake for 30-40 minutes at 300 degrees. Drain on paper towels.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, ground nutmeg, eggs, milk, smoked bacon, yellow onion, olive oil, fresh parsley leaves, salt & freshly ground black pepper
name: bacon onion spaetzle

steps: In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium high heat. Saut celery and onions together. Add potatoes and chicken broth. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 12 minutes. In batches, puree potatoes in blender and return to sauce pan. Stir in milk and seasonings. Garnish with paprika, croutons, and parsley.
ingredients: potatoes, onion, celery, carrot, water, butter, milk, evaporated milk, paprika
name: great aunt fannie old traditional potato soup

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Dip chicken in milk, then roll in seasoned flour. Melt butter in 9 x 13 baking dish. Place chicken, skin side down, in butter. Cook 30 minutes. Mix water, remaining milk and soup together. Turn chicken and pour soup mixture over it. Bake 30 minutes more. Remove chicken and stir gravy.
ingredients: chicken tenderloins, salt, pepper, all-purpose flour, butter, chicken broth, brandy, berry juice, cheddar cheese
name: brandied chicken and cheese

steps: Place kabobs on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.
ingredients: plain fat-free yogurt, honey, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, strawberry, seedless grapes, pineapple chunk, honeydew melon, cantaloupe, bamboo skewers
name: fruit kabobs with cinnamon yogurt dipping sauce

steps: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well.
ingredients: tomatoes, breadcrumbs, garlic cloves, parsley, olive oil, eggs, salt, pepper
name: tomates recheados portuguese deviled tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line pan with parchment paper. Place squash on pan cut side up. Combine remaining ingredients and brush half of the mixture on the squash. Bake for 45 minute or until tender. Brush once more halfway through baking, and again near the end.
ingredients: butternut squash, apples, brown sugar, margarine, flour, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg
name: baked squash and apple casserole

steps: In a medium pot, heat the oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice.
ingredients: onion, bell pepper, butter, ground beef, whole kernel corn, tomato soup, sugar, salt, worcestershire sauce, fresh cracked pepper
name: indian corn stew

steps: Place hamburger meat, tomato soup, dark red kidney beans, chili beans, ranch style beans, cheese, white onion, frito corn chip on top. Bake in 350f oven uncovered for 30-35 minutes, or until hamburger meat is cooked and starting to brown.
ingredients: hamburger meat, tomato soup, dark red kidney beans, chili beans, ranch style beans, cheese, white onion, frito corn chip
name: simply the best easiest frito chili pie

steps: Using your processor pulse the basil, garlic and parsley. Slowly add the olive oil in a constant stream while the food processor is on. Stop to scrape down the sides of the food processor with a rubber spatula. Add the grated parmeasn cheese and lemon juice. Pulse again until blended. Add salt and freshly ground black pepper. Store pesto in a jar or airtight container in the refrigerator for about a week, or in the freezer for about six months. Keep it looking fresh and green by covering the top with a thin layer of olive oil or with a sheet of plastic wrap directly on its surface. This will keep it from oxidizing and turning brown. If your pesto darkens in color, it will still taste good. I freeze it by dropping tablespoons of it on a parchment paper, freezing it and storing in a zip lock bag in the freezer.
ingredients: cilantro, parsley, garlic, serrano peppers, olive oil, ground cumin, fresh ground black pepper, kosher salt, lemon, juice of
name: szug pesto from yemen

steps: Place biscuits in crockpot. Cover and cook on low 8-10 hours. Press mixture through a sieve. Return the extracted juice to crockpot and cook on high for half an hour. Add remaining ingredients and cook for 15 minutes. Chill.
ingredients: large refrigerated biscuits, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, tomatoes and green chilies, green onion, bacon, seasoning salt, fresh ground pepper
name: spicy tomato cups

steps: Cook beans in a 5-quart pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice and cold water to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry. Toss beans with oil, salt, and pepper to taste, then toss with lemon juice and half of zest. Serve beans sprinkled with remaining zest.
ingredients: kosher salt, green beans, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, sesame seeds
name: steamed green beans with lemon and sesame seeds

steps: In electric frying pan or large skillet saute onions and peppers until onions soften. Add corned beef. Continue to cook until cubes fall apart. Add frozen hash browns. Add seasoning if desired. Cook, stirring often until potatoes are done and start to brown.
ingredients: hash browns, lobster meat, green onions, old bay seasoning, lemon-infused olive oil
name: lobster hash sp5

steps: Mix dry ingredients. Cut in shortening and bacon grease. Add buttermilk and mix well. Drop on lightly greased cookie sheet by teaspoon. Bake at 375f until golden brown. Can be frozen before baking.
ingredients: potato starch, cornstarch, xanthan gum, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, butter, buttermilk
name: gluten free buttermilk biscuits

steps: In a small bowl, stir together the lemon juice, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest, lemon zest,
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon juice, dried oregano leaves, pepper, feta cheese, green onions
name: lemon feta chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place fish on center of foil and sprinkle with dill. Place lemon slices inside fish and rosemary on top. Salt to taste. Fold up edges of foil and add wine. Seal foil pouch and place in oven on 350 for 12 minutes.
ingredients: trout, olive oil, lemons, shallots, black peppercorns, salt, thyme
name: simple lake trout

steps: Mix the first three ingredients together. Then mix in the water. Knead the dough on a firm surface. Take 2 tablespoons of dough and dip it in cinnamon. Roll it with a rolling pin. Bake for about 5-6 minutes, then turn to broil till the top of the brown sugar is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-2 minutes.
ingredients: bread, cream cheese, butter, sugar, cinnamon
name: cinnamon snails

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all ingredients, except pecans and pie crust, together. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Top with pecan halves. Bake until done.
ingredients: vanilla pudding mix, dark corn syrup, evaporated milk, egg, pecans, 9 inch pie shell
name: jello pudding pecan pie

steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion, bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, red lentil, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, garlic, cayenne pepper, fresh parsley. Bring to boil and allow to simmer for 20 minutes. Puree the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pot. Add onion, bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, red lentil, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, garlic, cayenne pepper
ingredients: green onions, green bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, red lentil, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, garlic, cayenne pepper, fresh parsley
name: red lentil pilaf

steps: Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients, except butter and flour. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Blend melted butter with the flour to make a roux. Add roux to the corn and mix well. Remove from heat. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Broil until cheese is nicely browned.
ingredients: white shoepeg corn, butter, milk, salt, pepper
name: freezer fresh creamed corn

steps: Place the pesto in the refrigerator for about a week, or in the freezer for about six months. Keep it looking fresh and green by covering the top with a thin layer of olive oil or with a sheet of plastic wrap directly on its surface. This will keep it from oxidizing and turning brown. If your pesto darkens in color, it will still taste good. I freeze it by dropping tablespoons of it on a parchment paper, freezing it and storing in a zip lock bag in the freezer. ingredients: pine nuts, garlic cloves, fresh spinach, italian parsley, fresh sage leaf, fresh parmesan cheese, lemon juice, salt, extra virgin olive oil
name: sage spinach pesto

name: mimi s artisan bread bowls

steps: Heat the stock, soy sauce, garlic, and onion in a large stockpot and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and sauté for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the onion is translucent. Add the stock and sauté for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the onion is translucent. Add the stock and
ingredients: tenderloin, salt, sugar, garlic, ginger, fresh lemongrass, coarse black pepper, vegetable oil, onion
name: vietnamese sizzling steak and onions

steps: In a small saucepan on medium heat, warm the vinegar and sugar together until the sugar dissolves. Set liquid aside to cool. Chop the dill. Slice the cucumber very thinly and arrange in layers on a shallow, non-reactive platter with sloped edges. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and garnish with the fresh dill. Pour the dressing over the cucumbers. Let marinate at least 1 hour or overnight. Yield is estimated.
ingredients: imitation crabmeat, miracle whip, celery, scallion, lemon juice, dill weed, garlic salt, lemon pepper
name: amanda s world famous krab salad

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Beat butter until light and fluffy. Add sugar and continue beating until blended. Beat in egg yolks. Beat in vanilla extract. Beat in cherry extract. Beat in cocoa. Add flour and mix well. Using cookie press, press cookies out onto an ungreased baking sheet. Bake about 8 minutes, or until tops are dry but not browned.
ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, flour, salt, vanilla, almond extract
name: nelson cookie bake traditional spritz cookies

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together rice wine, seasoned rice vinegar, reduced sodium soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, wasabi paste, salmon fillet, salt, pepper, scallion, salt, pepper, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion, scallion
ingredients: rice wine, seasoned rice vinegar, reduced sodium soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, wasabi paste, salmon fillet, salt, pepper, scallion
name: ww honey glazed salmon with wasabi 4 points

steps: Mix the olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, couscous, fish stock, parsley, mint, trout, salt and pepper, almonds. Add splash of white wine and salt and pepper to taste. Bake in oven at 200c for 20 minutes, or until fish is cooked. I served this with rice flavoured with lemon juice and black pepper and a side dish of brocolli.
ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, couscous, fish stock, parsley, mint, trout, salt and pepper, almonds
name: trout stuffed with couscous almonds and herbs

steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately.
ingredients: hoagie rolls, american cheese, deli ham, roasted peppers, eggs
name: breakfast panini

steps: Preheat oven at 350 degrees. Spread butter, flour, baking powder, salt, heavy cream, brown sugar, peaches, egg yolks, cinnamon on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Let cool and refrigerate about 4 hours prior to serving.
ingredients: butter, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, heavy cream, brown sugar, peaches, egg yolks, cinnamon
name: tassajara peach kuchen

steps: Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place potatoes in a mixing bowl with all remaining ingredients and mix together. Cover and leave to stand for 1 hour. Heat oil for shallow frying in a frying pan and drop large spoonfuls of the mixture as for small pancakes and fry until golden brown on both sides and cooked in the middle, about 5 minutes. Drain well on paper towels and keep hot until ready to serve. Eat immediately.
ingredients: warm water, yeast, flour, cornmeal, sweet potato, salt, cayenne, cinnamon, vegetable oil
name: cornmeal sweet potato breadsticks

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown ground beef and onion with the minced garlic and salt and pepper. Add cans of celery soup and mix well. In 9 x 13 baking dish, spread tater tots on bottom. Spread turkey mixture over green beans. Sprinkle cheese over entire dish. Bake at 350 for 1 hour, or until cheese on top is melted and golden brown.
ingredients: extra lean ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, frozen tater tots
name: 1 2 3 4 tater tot casserole

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add egg and pineapple. Stir in vanilla. Sift flour, then measure it. To the flour, add salt, soda, and baking powder. Add dry mixture to the wet mixture. Drop by rounded tsps. Onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes at 350f, or until done.
ingredients: light brown sugar, granulated sugar, shortening, eggs, crushed pineapple, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, baking powder
name: soft and chewy pineapple cookies

steps: Heat sandwich press. Add first piece of bread. Top with cheese slice. Add ham. Then top with shredded cheddar. Add remaining slice of bread. Close press and cook for 5 minutes.
ingredients: white bread, american cheese, cheddar cheese, garlic, olive oil, broccoli
name: sandwich press recipe broccoli and cheese

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours.
ingredients: instant coffee, boiling water, marshmallows, cool whip, ladyfingers, chocolate
name: coffee mallow mousse

steps: Preheat grill on high heat. Lay out ground chuck in a single layer and season well with salt and pepper. Divide chuck into four portions. Wrap each piece of manchego in a 4-inch square piece of ham. Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add each ham-and-cheese bundle and fry, turning, until ham is crisped and cheese is beginning to melt. Allow to cool slightly, fold meat around each bundle to form hamburgers about 1 inch thick. Grill burgers for about 4 to 5 minutes a side or until just cooked through.
ingredients: ground chuck, salt and pepper, portabella mushrooms, olive oil, butter, sliced mushrooms, sherry wine, smoked gouda cheese
name: ultimate mushroom burger

steps: In a large skillet, brown, cook meat, along with 1 cup water and bouillon cubes until very tender or cook on low in the crock pot 8-10 hours, until tender. Shred meat with a fork after cooking and retain 1 cup of the juice from cooking. Add rest of the ingredients to shredded meat. Put in a crock pot and cook on low heat 3-4 hours. Serve over dinner rolls.
ingredients: hamburger, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, onions, dried basil leaves, egg, italian rolls, spaghetti sauce, parmesan cheese
name: meatball sandwiches for a george foreman type grill

steps: In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the butter, celery and onion. Saute for about 3 minutes, add the flour and stir well to make a dry roux. Add the reserved clams to make a paste, then slowly add enough cold water to reach the desired thickness. Add the potatoes, milk, thyme and salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and allow soup to simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Add the clams and allow to heat through.
ingredients: cooking oil, celery, onion, garlic clove, hot water, au gratin potatoes, salt, frozen whole kernel corn, milk, minced clams
name: seashells garlic potato clam chowder

steps: Place all the filling mixture in a large crock-pot then sprinkle with salt & pepper. Pour the enchilada sauce over the chicken then cover & cook on low for 4 hours. Remove the chicken & shred. Whisk in the cheese soup until smooth then add the chicken, beans, & chili powder. Continue to cook for another 2 hours. During the last 30 minutes add the cream cheese, stir to melt. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cream of chicken soup, cheese, tortilla chips, tortilla, sour cream
name: crock pot mexican chicken enchilada filling

steps: Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Place strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. Place strawberries in a blender and blend until the
ingredients: milk, cornstarch, sugar, salt, egg yolk, vanilla extract, fresh strawberries
name: strawberry flummery

steps: Dissolve jello in water. In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Add jello mixture. Beat until smooth. Stir in vanilla, fruit, soda, and pecans. Chill until mixture mounds slightly when dropped from a spoon. Fold in three-fourths of the cool whip. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan. Chill for 4 hours or until firm. Cut into squares. Garnish with remaining cool whip.
ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen limeade concentrate, cool whip
name: limeade jello

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Place fish, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish. In a bowl, combine mayonnaise, butter, onion, cheese, lemon juice, old bay, and pepper. Mix until a thick paste is formed. Spread mixture evenly over fish filets, then top with bread crumbs. Bake for about 10 minutes, or until fish is flaky. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or until fish is golden brown. To finish cooking, place fish under the broiler, for another 2-3 minutes, or
ingredients: fish fillets, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, lowfat margarine, mayonnaise, salt, green onions, tabasco sauce
name: favorite broiled fish

steps: Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes.
ingredients: cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, green chilies, chicken broth, onion, sliced mushrooms, corn tortillas, cheddar cheese
name: family chicken and chili casserole

steps: Sprinkle cheese and green chilies on top of mini quiche. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Cool 15 minutes before cutting.
ingredients: green chilies, white cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, evaporated milk, paprika, eggs, tabasco sauce
name: cheese and green chilies mini quiche

steps: In a small bowl combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Stir until blended. In a medium bowl, place the egg yolks, cream, and butter. Whisk until stiff, then fold them gently into the batter. Cook until waffles are golden, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, eggs, milk, butter
name: bob evans waffles or pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 12 regular-size muffin cups with cooking spray, or grease bottoms only of muffin cups. Crush cereal. Stir together cereal, flour, brown sugar, baking powder and baking soda in large bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients just until moistened. Divide batter evenly among muffin cups. Bake 18 to 22 minutes or until golden brown.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, poppy seed, baking powder, ground ginger, baking soda, clementines, low-fat plain yogurt, eggs, butter
name: clementine poppy seed muffins

steps: In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings.
ingredients: potatoes, raw potatoes, white flour, baking powder, buttermilk, salt, butter
name: boxty pancakes

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately.
ingredients: fontina cheese, gruyere cheese, emmenthaler cheese, mozzarella cheese, cherry brandy, white wine, sourdough bread, olive oil, garlic clove
name: honk if you love cheezus

steps: Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top.
ingredients: cottage cheese, elbow macaroni, water, cheddar cheese
name: amish macaroni cheese

steps: Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Line a greased 9x9 pan with bread. Combine butter, flour, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, cheese, eggs, instant dry milk powder, hot water, and mix well. Place saucepan over medium temperature and cook, whisking, until thick, about 7 to 9 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and add the grated cheese, stirring until melted. Stir in the herbs, if using. Makes 2 cups sauce. Serve over pasta or vegetables.
ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, cayenne, dried mustard, milk, cheddar cheese
name: zippy cheese sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. Let bread cool in
ingredients: bisquick baking mix, granulated sugar, butter, eggs, bananas, craisins
name: bisquick banana craisin bread

steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until browned stirring often. When done cut into strips. Place back into skillet and add soup, water, corn& tortillas. Bring to a boil. Cover, cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until hot. Top with cheese and serve.
ingredients: chili powder, ground cumin, salt, boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, garlic cloves, salsa, dijon mustard, monterey jack cheese, green onions
name: southwestern chicken skillet

steps: Heat oil in nonstick sauce pan. Add rice and saute until rice kernels are opaque. Add water, grated ginger, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, chicken stock, fresh cilantro. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in green onions and cilantro.
ingredients: jasmine rice, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, chicken stock, fresh cilantro
name: com gung tuong

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix together rotisserie-cooked chicken, chicken rice-a-roni, onion, shredded coconut, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, chinese noodles, cheese, chicken brothpreparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix
ingredients: rotisserie-cooked chicken, chicken rice-a-roni, onion, shredded coconut, crushed pineapple, slivered almonds, chinese noodles, cheese, chicken broth
name: polynesian stack ups

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place the pork tenderloin side by side, fat side up in a large heavy roasting pan. Insert an ovenproof meat thermometer in the center of one of the roast. Roast the pork for 30 minutes. Meanwhile in a bowl, crush the rosemary with the olive oil, pepper, vinegar and salt. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature.
ingredients: pork tenderloin, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, steak seasoning, fresh rosemary leaves, fresh thyme leaves
name: balsamic roast pork tenderloins

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook pasta 8 minutes, drain. Mix pasta shell ingredients and toss with pasta. In 9-inch pie plate press pasta to form a shell. Cook ground beef for 4-5 min., breaking into crumbles. Add garlic powder, salt and cumin, stir in tomatoes and cook until almost all liquid has evaporated, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and add sour cream. Spoon mixture into pasta shell. Add cheese to top and bake 15 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, penne pasta, salsa, black beans, mexican blend cheese
name: mexican penne

steps: In small saucepan, combine the coffee, milk, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into cups or mugs. Serve immediately.
ingredients: dark chocolate, coffee, almond extract, milk, whipped cream, chocolate shavings
name: the nutty chocolate coffee

steps: Place cabbage and cabbage in a colander. Rinse thoroughly with cold water to crisp. Let drain for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk cilantro, vinegar, oil and salt in a large bowl. Add cabbage and carrots. Toss well to coat.
ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, balsamic vinegar, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, celery seed, caraway seed, pepper
name: cole slaw no mayo

steps: Cook the macaroni according to package directions. While the macaroni is cooking melt the butter in a large saucepan on low to medium heat. Cut the velvetta in cubes and add to the butter and stir constantly. When the cheese starts to melt add the milk and stir to combine until smooth. Drain the macaroni and add to the cheese mixture. Pepper can be used at the table, but i would not use too much if a child is eating this. If putting in a crockpot to keep warm, you might need to add a little milk to it right before serving. Just use your judgement and how your family likes their mac & cheese.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese, eggs, sour cream, butter, salt, milk
name: the lady s macaroni and cheese paula deen

steps: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Chill mixture for 2 hours. Roll into small balls. Place balls on a cookie sheet and flatten slightly. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes.
ingredients: cheddar cheese, margarine, flour, salt, dried red pepper flakes
name: cheese dollars

steps: Heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. Add corn
ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, corn kernels, onion, flour, pepper, nonstick cooking spray
name: splendid chicken and corn

steps: Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Add chicken pieces and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes. Drain excess liquid before adding sauce ingredients. Mix remaining ingredients and add to skillet, stirring to coat chicken well. Cook on medium heat until chicken is well coated and sauce thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes. You can also cook them in a crock pot, on low setting. The meat just falls off the bone.
ingredients: corn oil, chili powder, oregano, ground cumin, corn chips, chicken wings
name: mexican chicken wings

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon of butter in frying pan over medium
ingredients: banana bread, ham steak, butter, maple syrup, bananas, lemon juice
name: grilled banana bread ham steak sandwiches

steps: Combine all ingredients in saucepan. Stir over medium heat until thickened. Lower heat and cook for ten minutes, stirring constantly to avoid lumping or burning. Pour into 8x8 inch dish and chill until set. Cut haupia into squares.
ingredients: taro root, fresh coconut, coconut water, coconut milk, brown sugar
name: kulolo hawaiian pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 400f. Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In medium bowl combine egg with 1 tbsp water. In pie plate place bread crumbs and cheese. Arrange on baking sheet. Roast until crisp and golden about 15 minutes.
ingredients: flour, margarine, eggs, sour cream, potato water
name: pierogies dough

steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add ginger, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Cook over high heat until thick, 3
ingredients: chicken breast tenders, soy sauce, olive oil, raw honey, garlic, sesame seeds, ground ginger, red pepper flakes
name: gluten free ginger soy sesame chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet, melt the butter in the oven. Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper. Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on. Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat. Bake for 15-18 minutes.
ingredients: vermicelli, roasted red peppers, reduced-fat cream cheese, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, garlic cloves, ground red pepper, large shrimp, fresh basil
name: shrimp with roasted red pepper cream

steps: In a large skillet, cook chicken in hot oil over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink, turning once halfway through cooking. Remove from skillet. Keep warm. For sauce, add green onion to skillet. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in coconut milk mixture. Cook and stir until bubbly. To serve, spoon the sauce over chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts.
ingredients: creole seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, vegetable oil, maple syrup, brown sugar, pecans
name: quick praline chicken

steps: Boil eggplants until soft. Saute onion, chopped shrimp, and celery in butter or oil. Combine with eggplant. Put in baking pan and sprinkle with bread crumbs or cracker crumbs. Bake approximately 30 minutes at 350f.
ingredients: garlic oil, eggplants, mozzarella cheese, flour tortillas
name: eggplant aubergine and mozzarella

steps: Mix together eggs, milk, salt, pepper, green pepper, tomatoes, mushrooms, ham, cheese, butter, mustard powder and the chopped onions. Serve hot.
ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, green pepper, tomatoes, mushrooms, ham, cheese, butter
name: spanish omelette

steps: Preheat oven to 350. Cook ground beef until done. Drain off fat. Stir in cheeses, chilies, taco sauce and eggs. Spray an 8x8 baking dish with cooking spray. Transfer meat mixture to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 40 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. Let cool for 15 minutes. Cut into squares.
ingredients: ground beef, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, green chilies, enchilada sauce, eggs, tortilla chips
name: mexi beef bites

steps: Place ham in a large mixing bowl and mix well. Pour dressing over ham. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
ingredients: broccoli, ham, cheddar cheese, onion, miracle whip, fresh lemon juice, ground black pepper
name: broccoli salad with ham

steps: Preheat oven to 350f grease 8-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients in medium bowl and mix until blended. Spread in prepared pan. Bake until firm to touch and golden brown, about 30 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into squares and serve hot.
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, egg, butter, milk, canned jalapeno peppers, cheddar cheese, salt
name: jalapeno cheddar cornbread

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat eggs until smooth. Add milk to eggs, then the lemon juice and zest. Mix until all ingredients are incorporated and mixture is smooth. Pour into pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Cool completely. Best served chilled.
ingredients: fat-free evaporated milk, gelatin, water, fresh lemon juice, splenda sugar substitute, lemon rind, lemon extract, graham cracker crust
name: lemon chiffon pie diabetic

steps: In a food processor, combine the yam, apple, salt and butter in a small bowl and set aside. Using steel blade, place flour and salt in bowl of food processor. Pour in yeast mixture through chute. Process till dough forms ball. Break dough apart and reprocess 2 or 3 times. Place dough in buttered bowl. Turn dough in bowl to butter all sides. Cover and let rise about 1 hour, till doubled in size. Punch down, shape into loaf and place in greased loaf pan. Let rise till doubled. Bake in preheated oven 25 to 30 minutes or till golden brown.
ingredients: unsweetened apple juice, yam, apple, salt, butter, bread flour, bread machine yeast
name: apple yam loaf bread machine

steps: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes to blend flavors. Remove spices. Serve hot with cinnamon sticks and sliced apples if desired.
ingredients: apple cider, apricot nectar, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, cheesecloth, kitchen twine
name: golden cider

steps: Place avocado slices on top of veggiewiches. Spread with cream cheese. Layer avocado slices. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil. Hot sauce to taste.
ingredients: avocado, cream cheese, alfalfa sprout, tomatoes, banana pepper, bacon, whole grain bread
name: veggiewiches with avocado spread

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Place all ingredients together in kitchenaid mixing bowl. Mix together with kitchenaid until all ingredients are thoroughly mixed. Place in 9 x 9 inch butter-greased glass baking dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. Place
ingredients: jiffy cornbread mix, eggs, creamed corn, sugar, salt, heavy cream
name: corn cake sweet

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Add cocoa and mix well. Add egg and almond extract. Mix well. Pour filling into crust. Bake for 35 minutes. Cool completely, then spread an even layer of cool whip over pie, then top with cherry pie filling. Refrigerate 2-3 hours before serving.
ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, whole milk, granulated sugar, cream cheese, frozen non-dairy topping, graham cracker pie crust
name: chocolate cream cheese pie

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil. Coat the foil with nonstick cooking spray and set aside. Remove stems from mushrooms. Set caps aside and chop stems. Saute the stems and onion in a small amount of water until soft. In a small bowl, combine the eggs and sour cream. Stir in the spinach, stuffing, feta cheese, garlic salt and onion mixture. Spoon into mushroom caps. Place on prepared baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese, bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until mushrooms are tender and cheese is melted.
ingredients: baby spinach, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, extra virgin olive oil, garlic powder, salt and pepper, baby portabella mushrooms
name: spinach parmesan stuffed mushrooms

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Place tomatoes on a rimmed baking sheet, cut side up. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with thyme leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until tomatoes begin to collapse, brushing occasionally with pan juices.
ingredients: tomatoes, sugar, salt, bottled lemon juice
name: canned fresh tomatoes

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipping cream.
ingredients: fresh rhubarb, sugar, strawberry gelatin, white cake mix, water, butter
name: rhubarb almost dump cake

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in large pyrex measuring cup and blend in remaining ingredients except cheese. Place pasta and butter back into saucepan used to cook the pasta in. Cook pasta for two minutes until reheated. Stir constantly. Put cooked pasta into serving bowl topped with parmesan cheese.
ingredients: spaghetti, water, salt, olive oil, butter, parmesan cheese
name: pasta with butter and cheese

steps: Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together.
ingredients: sandwich buns, dry salami, monterey jack pepper cheese, eggs
name: quarry sandwich

steps: Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Toss together all the ingredients except for the butter. Place in a roasting pan and roast 30 minutes, or until the butter is fork tender. Stir in the herbs and toss. Adjust seasoning if necessary.
ingredients: parsnips, unsalted butter, dark brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh thyme
name: roasted parsnips with thyme

steps: Preheat oven to 375. Combine the first 3 ingredients in a bowl. Press firmly into a lightly greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake for 11 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven and let cool. In a saucepan, combine the cream and next 4 ingredients. Bring to a simmer over med-low heat. Remove from heat. Add in chocolate, and stir until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. Pour filling into baked crust. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until firm. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of orange zest.
ingredients: flour, walnuts, sugar, butter, bittersweet chocolate, heavy cream, walnut halves, whipped topping, of fresh mint
name: chocolate ganache tarts

steps: Mix in gelatin, cold water, cold water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, oil, vanilla.
ingredients: gelatin, cold water, boiling water, ice water, nonfat dry milk powder, sugar, oil, vanilla
name: just like cool whip copycat

steps: Place marinara sauce in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks.
ingredients: marinara sauce, crushed tomatoes, onion, olive oil, ground beef, italian sausage, pepperoni, italian spices
name: olive garden three meat sauce

steps: In a small skillet, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. Stir in the milk unitl the mixture forms a thick batter. Drop the batter on top of the chicken a tablespoonful at a time. Cover, and reduce heat to low. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the flour
ingredients: all-purpose flour, eggs, salt, oil, chicken bouillon cubes, chicken broth, whole chicken
name: grandma s chicken n dumplings

steps: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Return pasta to the pot. Add cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper. Bring to a hard boil. When noodles are fully cooked and sauce is starting to thicken, add mushrooms and stir to combine. Remove from the heat. Add cheese. Toss and serve.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, asparagus, cooked ham, cream cheese with chives and onions, milk
name: easy pasta with ham and asparagus or broccoli

steps: Heat oven to 350 degrees f., cook and drain pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet, cook beef, onion, garlic powder and salt over medium heat 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beef is thoroughly cooked. Drain. Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, sugar and pasta. Pour into ungreased 8-inch square glass baking dish. Cover dish with foil. Bake 30-40 minutes or until bubbly around edges. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake uncovered 5-10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: ground beef, rigatoni pasta, pasta sauce, cheese, parmesan cheese, chili pepper, garlic salt, onion salt, italian seasoning
name: ez pasta bake

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In medium saucepan, combine coconut milk, sugar, baking powder, salt, baking soda, baking powder, baking soda, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder, baking powder,
ingredients: cherry pie filling, sour cream, sweetened coconut, margarine, self rising flour, salt, sugar, milk
name: cherry coconut cobbler

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Bake cupcakes for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Bake cupcakes for
ingredients: ground beef, onion, cheese, bread, mushroom soup, egg, breadcrumbs, salt & pepper
name: hamburger cupcakes

steps: Place all ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes or until slightly thick. Remove from heat, cool. Place blue cheese mixture in a blender. Process until smooth.
ingredients: blue cheese, butter, tabasco sauce, onion, toasted almond
name: bleu balls

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Coat a 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray. Cook the macaroni according to package directions. Drain and place in a large bowl. Add the remaining ingredents except for the corn chips. Mix well then pour into a casserole dish and sprinkle with corn chips bake for 30-35 minutes, or until hot and bubbly, and the top is golden.
ingredients: elbow macaroni, unsalted butter, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese, half-and-half cream, eggs, salt, black pepper
name: 3 cheese bake elbows plus al forno con salsa ai tre formaggi

steps: In a large skillet, combine all the ingredients except the potatoes and cheese over high heat. Mix well. Cook for 5 to 8 minutes, or until heated through, stirring frequently. Remove from the heat and and put into a deep cassarole dish. Dollop with the potatoes. Bake at 375 for 35 minutes. Cover with grated cheese last 10 minutes of cooking. Serve immediately.
ingredients: olive oil, ground beef, cumin powder, salt, pepper, onion, lemon juice, cauliflower, butter, cheddar cheese
name: scd gluten free shepherds pie

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine cranberries, orange zest, cinnamon, orange juice, brown sugar. Add enough water to cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Immediately reduce heat, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the sauce has thickened. Taste for sweetness, and adjust with additional sugar if necessary. You can not overcook, so continue cooking until you have a good thick consistency. Let mixture cool, then refrigerate in a covered container.
ingredients: sweet potato, orange, fresh cranberries, sugar, jalapeno peppers, pecans, cilantro, salt, cinnamon
name: cranberry tapenade

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Saute zucchini, eggs, onion, all-purpose flour, garlic, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil. Place in a casserole dish and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 30 minutes.
ingredients: zucchini, eggs, onion, all-purpose flour, garlic, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, seasoning salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, olive oil
name: kittencal s italian zucchini mozzarella patties

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired.
ingredients: boiling water, salad dressing, vanilla, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking cocoa, baking soda
name: low fat and low cholesterol chocolate cupcakes

steps: Mix flour, butter and almonds to make crust and press into an 8 in pie pan. Bake at 350 deg for about 15 minutes or until brown. Mix sugar, 2 teaspoon almond liquor and cream cheese together thoroughly till creamy. Fold in cool whip. Put mixture into pie shell. Mix 1 teaspoon of almond liquour with cherry pie filling. Top cheese mixture with cherry pie filling. Chill 2 hours or overnight.
ingredients: unbaked pastry shells, mincemeat, amaretto liqueur, almonds
name: mincemeat almond pie

steps: In small microwave-safe dish, microwave butter on high about 30 seconds or until melted. Stir in vanilla. In large microwavable bowl, mix all cereals and pecans. Pour butter mixture over cereal mixture, stirring until evenly distributed. Add sugar and spice mixture and stir until coated. Microwave uncovered on high 5 minutes or until mixture begins to brown, stirring every minute. Spread on wax paper or a cookie sheet to cool. Store in airtight container.
ingredients: cinnamon chex cereal, chex cereal, butter, brown sugar, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, rum flavoring, miniature marshmallows
name: hot buttered yum chex mix

steps: Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. Cover and bake in a preheated 375f oven for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake for a further 15 minutes, or until chicken is done as you like.
ingredients: dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, dried tarragon, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves
name: 15 minute marinated chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 375f. Salt and pepper the pork chops in a baking pan. Cut onion and bell pepper into pieces. Sprinkle on top and sides of pork chops. Pour wine over pork chops. Pour water in between pork chop pieces. Bake covered for 25 minutes. Flip chops over and bake uncovered for 15 minutes.
ingredients: pork chops, olive oil, green peppers, sliced mushrooms, garlic, diced tomato, tomato sauce, white wine, oregano, salt and pepper
name: pork chops with oregano wine sauce

steps: Preheat oven to 350f. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes or more until deep golden and set. Let pudding stand 5 minutes.
ingredients: eggs, half-and-half, salt, white pepper, nutmeg, sweet corn, cracker, unsalted butter, sharp cheddar cheese, paprika
name: nantucket corn pudding

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Sift flour with sugar, soda salt and cinnamon into a large bowl or food processor by pulsing 3-4 times. Mix in shortening and knead thoroughly. Combine egg and almond extract. Stir into flour mixture. Mix well. Shape into balls using 1 tablespoon of dough. Place on ungreased baking sheets and make a depression in the top with the thumb. Press a blanched whole or sliced almond into the center of each cookie. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes. Makes six dozen.
ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, milk, vanilla extract, almond extract, flour, baking powder, salt
name: soft sugar cookies with almond essence

steps: Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Tossing occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss.
ingredients: lemon juice, dijon mustard, red wine vinegar, egg substitute, fresh tarragon, fresh thyme, pepper, salt, oil
name: tarragon and thyme salad dressing

steps: Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook 1 minute. Discard garlic. Add onion and cook until softened. Add tomatoes with juice, sausage and pepper flakes. Cook over medium high heat, until sauce is thickened. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and toss with sausage in large bowl. Toss with mozzarella. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and chopped parsley. Serve hot.
ingredients: italian sausage, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, cornstarch, red wine, italian bread
name: italian fondue

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 9 x 13 pan. Put a bit of sauce on bottom of pan, put a layer of 3 noodles, meat sauce, some of the alfredo sauce, parsley, parmesan cheese, then mozzarella cheese. Repeat layers in that order ending with mozzarella cheese on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until cheese on top is golden brown. This is also good if made the night before, and left in the fridge over night. Can also be frozen.
ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, spaghetti sauce, ground beef, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese
name: easy mac and cheese lasagna

steps: Place the shrimp in the grill basket and place basket onto grill rack. Grill shrimp until just opaque in center, 2-3 minutes on each side. Serve with salsa. 3 points per serving.
ingredients: large raw shrimp, chili oil, garlic cloves, limes, juice of, papaya, mango, fresh cilantro, red chile, balsamic vinegar
name: barbecue shrimp with salsa

steps: Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees f. Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper. Stir egg into dry ingredients. Gradually mix in one beer until a thin batter is formed. You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped. Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil. Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown. Drain on paper towels, and serve warm.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, beer, egg, vegetable oil
name: beer batter for fish shrimp onion rings

steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line a 9x9x2-inch baking pan with parchment paper. In a large bowl, combine brown sugar, butter and maple flavoring. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Combine flour and baking powder and add to egg mixture. Stir in walnuts. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking pan. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until brownies test done. Cool.
ingredients: brown sugar, granulated sugar, light corn syrup, water, unsalted butter, walnuts
name: brown sugar syrup with walnuts

steps: Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.
ingredients: bow tie pasta, rice vinegar, peanut oil, sugar, hot chili oil, salt, cucumber, red bell pepper, red onions
name: cucumber bow tie salad

steps: In a small bowl, combine all seasonings, mixing well. Pierce roast all over. Rub in seasonings. Place in crock pot, cover with lid. Cook on low for 7 to 8 hours. Serve on buns if desired.
ingredients: pork loin roast, diced tomatoes with green pepper and onion, cream of mushroom soup, garlic cloves, italian salad dressing mix, mixed italian herbs, salt and pepper
name: italian pork loin for the slow cooker crock pot

steps: In a saucepan over medium heat melt the butter, add the flour, stirring constantly, and then gradually add the light cream, continuing to stir. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f.
ingredients: wonton wrappers, crabmeat, scallions, radishes, parsley, olive oil, lime, zest of, lime, juice of, hot sauce
name: zesty crab cups

steps: Mix in pan on stove top and bring slowly to a boil. If you like onions, you can chop some fine and sautee the, adding them instead of the onion powder. Spread on top of the chicken while on the grill when the chicken is completely cooked. Leave it on the grill for another 10 minutes. Eat it up.
ingredients: velveeta cheese, mayonnaise, horseradish, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce
name: bar cheese

steps: Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Spray a large rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Combine carrots and all remaining ingredients in large bowl. Toss to coat. Roast carrots until tender and lightly caramelized, turning carrots over once, 35 to 40 minutes.
ingredients: baby carrots, cumin seed, fresh thyme leave, butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chardonnay wine
name: baked carrots with cumin thyme butter and chardonnay

steps: In a 2- or 3-quart saucepan, saute onion and garlic over medium-high heat. Add beans, mashed sweet potatoes, and cumin. Mix well. Warm the tortillas and make burritos with the cheese. Good with salsa and sour cream.
ingredients: spanish onions, bell peppers, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, culantro, plum tomatoes, red bell pepper
name: sofrito

steps: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
ingredients: ramen noodles, sunflower seeds, cashews, sesame seeds, flax seed, butter
name: crunchy topping for tossed salad

steps: In a large pot melt butter, peanut butter chips and peanut butter. Heat just until melted together and smooth. Remove from heat and stir in chex cereal. Place powdered sugar in a gallon sized ziplock bag. Add peanut butter covered chex to the powdered sugar and shake until well coated.
ingredients: light karo syrup, sugar, butter, butter flavoring, baking soda, golden grahams cereal
name: tanya s sweet chex mix

steps: Mix all dry ingredients with flour. Take 1 cup of mixture and reserve for topping and set aside. Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add molasses, water and dissolved baking soda. Mix well. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with reserved topping mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean.
ingredients: cake flour, sugar, water, baking powder, sweet bean paste
name: anko manju

steps: Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments.
ingredients: avocados, garlic, red onions, fresh cilantro, tomatoes, lime juice, jalapeno, salt and pepper
name: incredible guacamole

steps: Cook eggs in boiling water for 20 minutes, cool under running water. Peel and cut eggs in half lenghtwise, remove yolks and set whites aside. Put still warm yolks into a plastic food storage bag with mayonnaise, mustard, pickle juice, worcestershire sauce and seasonings. Squeeze bag to mash yolks and mix ingredients. Refrigerate filling and eggs whites seperately. Fill egg whites just before service.
ingredients: hardboiled egg, mayonnaise, horseradish mustard, cajun seasoning
name: cajun eggs deviled eggs

steps: Put all but garnish berries in blender. Mix until smooth. Pour immediately into 4 glasses. Garnish with strawberries. Serve at once.
ingredients: strawberries, frozen limeade concentrate, pineapple juice, sprite, ice cubes, fresh strawberries
name: strawberry daiquiri punch

steps: Place pineapple, lemon juice and mustard on top of ham. Pour can of pineapple slices and juice on top. Cover and cook on low for an additional two hours.
ingredients: crushed pineapple, brown sugar, prepared mustard, ground cloves, ham steaks, avocados
name: pineapple ham with avocado

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 12-cup muffin tin with butter and set aside. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Add the butter and rub it into the flour with your finger. Add the buttermilk and stir until the dough is slightly firm. Spoon the mixture into the prepared muffin tin and bake in the center of the oven till brown and crusty, 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: ground beef, onion, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, ketchup, chili powder, biscuits, cheddar cheese
name: barbecue muffins

steps: Preheat oven to 400. In a large bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, basil and parmesan cheese and set aside. Cover a cookie sheet with tinfoil. Spray covered cookie sheet with non stick stray so fish will not stick. Place trout fillets on covered cookie sheet about 1 inch apart. Spoon mixture you reserved in bowl over fish. About 1 tablespoon full spreading evenly over fish. Place a couple of lemon slice over top of mixture on fish. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes. No need to add salt as parmesan will add salt to recipe. Wonderful served with a side salad or pasta.
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, sole fillets, lemon pepper, roma tomato, green onion, dried basil
name: lemony fish fillets

steps: Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine whole wheat pasta, savoy cabbage, olive oil, margarine, lemon, balsamic vinegar, low fat cottage cheese, parmesan cheese, sugar, salt, low fat cottage cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmesan cheese, parmes
ingredients: whole wheat pasta, savoy cabbage, olive oil, margarine, lemon, balsamic vinegar, low fat cottage cheese, parmesan cheese, sugar, salt
name: cabbage and noodles healthy version

steps: Preheat oven to 400. Place the fish on top and season with salt and pepper. Pour the lemon butter mixture on the fish and top with fresh lemon zest. Bake at 400 until cooked, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: tilapia fillet, orange juice, butter, orange zest, tarragon, salt and pepper
name: fragrant citrus tilapia

steps: Preheat oven to 350f line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. In a medium bowl, stir together melted butter, ricotta, milk, eggs and vanilla until smooth. Pour into dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Fold in berries. Distribute batter evenly into prepared muffin cups. Bake for 18-22 minutes, until a tester inserted into the cake part comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate in an airtight container. Cakes will stay moist for several days.
ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, butter, milk, fresh strawberries
name: south carolina strawberry shortcake

steps: In dutch oven or electric skillet, heat oil. Add onion, saute 2 min, add beef, cook and stir until done. Add milk, butter and spices, stir until creamy. Fold in macaroni. Top with cheese, cover and heat until cheese melts.
ingredients: nacho cheese soup, cheddar cheese, milk, prepared mustard, black pepper, elbow macaroni, french-fried onions
name: souper easy macaroni and cheese

steps: In a medium saucepan, combine 2 cups water, sugar, lemongrass, lemon, vanilla bean, soda water and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat, and cool completely. Stir in lemon juice and remaining 2 cups water. Refrigerate. Serve chilled over ice. Garnish with maraschino cherries, fresh mint, and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: water, sugar, lemongrass, fresh ginger, lemon, vanilla bean, soda water
name: house of blues ginger lemongrass soda water

steps: Put the raisins in a bowl with the rum. Let them soak while you saute the bananas. Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the sugar and stir until dissolved. Add the bananas and cook for a few minutes, until tender. Sprinkle the spices over the bananas, then pour the rum and raisins on top. Sprinkle on the almonds and serve. Good with ice cream.
ingredients: raisins, rum, bananas, lemon juice, orange juice, honey, heavy cream, cream of tartar, bittersweet chocolate, walnuts
name: rum raisin bananas with chocolate cream

steps: In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown roast pork chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat until juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the lean boneless pork loin, lemon rind, garlic cloves, reduced-sodium chicken broth, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce, low sodium soy sauce,
ingredients: lean boneless pork loin, lemon rind, garlic cloves, reduced-sodium chicken broth
name: lemon garlic roast pork
